engChrName: I heard from the police and the folks at Marduk about what's going on out there...
engSearchText:
I heard from the police and the folks at Marduk
about what's going on out there...
jpnChrName: ある程度他の街区などの状況も警察やＭＫ社の方に 教えてもらえましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ある程度他の街区などの状況も警察やＭＫ社の方に
教えてもらえましたが……

engChrName: We're having a real drought of clients, just like everyone else. Our whole organization is having trouble handling it.
engSearchText:
We're having a real drought of clients, just like
everyone else. Our whole organization is having
trouble handling it.
jpnChrName: やはり弊社も顧客もほとんどが止まっていて…… 組織だって対応は出来なさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり弊社も顧客もほとんどが止まっていて……
組織だって対応は出来なさそうですね。

engChrName: But if I try and address it myself, suddenly it becomes my responsibility.
engSearchText:
But if I try and address it myself, suddenly it becomes
my responsibility.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、私が動ける以上は私に責任が あるのだという捉え方もできます。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、私が動ける以上は私に責任が
あるのだという捉え方もできます。

engChrName: We at least should start budgeting for damages, so that we can weather the storm and pick up the pieces afterward.
engSearchText:
We at least should start budgeting for damages, so
that we can weather the storm and pick up the
pieces afterward.
jpnChrName: 終息後に円滑に対応できるよう……今のうちに 最低限、損害を見積もっておかないと……
jpnSearchText:
終息後に円滑に対応できるよう……今のうちに
最低限、損害を見積もっておかないと……

engChrName: It's good to see things have cleared up a bit outside.
engSearchText: It's good to see things have cleared up a bit outside.
jpnChrName: ある程度外が落ち着いたのは 助かりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ある程度外が落ち着いたのは
助かりましたが……

engChrName: I wonder how everybody at the company's doing... Our clients, too.
engSearchText:
I wonder how everybody at the company's doing...
Our clients, too.
jpnChrName: 会社や、顧客企業の方は 大丈夫でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
会社や、顧客企業の方は
大丈夫でしょうか……？

engChrName: I should at least get in contact with them, try and make sure they're okay. Once this is over, we need to start picking up the pieces.
engSearchText:
I should at least get in contact with them, try and
make sure they're okay. Once this is over, we need to
start picking up the pieces.
jpnChrName: 一刻も早く安否を確認して、 事後の損害対策をしないといけないのに……
jpnSearchText:
一刻も早く安否を確認して、
事後の損害対策をしないといけないのに……

engChrName: This festival will be a big boon for the economy going forward... Maybe it's time we considered expanding.
engSearchText:
This festival will be a big boon for the economy
going forward... Maybe it's time we
considered expanding.
jpnChrName: 記念祭は、経済的な影響や今後の商業施設の 事業展開が参考になるものですが……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭は、経済的な影響や今後の商業施設の
事業展開が参考になるものですが……

engChrName: But, well, perhaps I should just take my mind off work for today. Looking at the festival from a customer perspective is plenty valuable, too.
engSearchText:
But, well, perhaps I should just take my mind off
work for today. Looking at the festival from a
customer perspective is plenty valuable, too.
jpnChrName: まあ、私も今日くらいは息抜きをしましょうか。 客の立場でこそ見えるものもあるでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、私も今日くらいは息抜きをしましょうか。
客の立場でこそ見えるものもあるでしょうし。

engChrName: I just have to, erm...not do what I usually do to relax. I've learned my lesson...
engSearchText:
I just have to, erm...not do what I usually do to relax.
I've learned my lesson...
jpnChrName: もっとも、息抜きと思って酷い目に 遭った事もありますし……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、息抜きと思って酷い目に
遭った事もありますし……

engChrName: I can't let my guard down, or karma will pay me back tenfold.
engSearchText:
I can't let my guard down, or karma will pay me
back tenfold.
jpnChrName: 羽目は外し過ぎないようにしないとですがね。
jpnSearchText: 羽目は外し過ぎないようにしないとですがね。

engChrName: Oh, it's you! Thank you for earlier.
engSearchText: Oh, it's you! Thank you for earlier.
jpnChrName: おや貴方は……！　先程はどうも。
jpnSearchText: おや貴方は……！　先程はどうも。

engChrName: Give my regards to that young man who helped out with the orbal network stuff, next time you see him.
engSearchText:
Give my regards to that young man who helped out
with the orbal network stuff, next time you see him.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットの件でお世話になった あの少年にも、よろしくお伝え下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットの件でお世話になった
あの少年にも、よろしくお伝え下さいね。

engChrName: You know, I've just realized: the musical landscape here has really changed since I graduated.
engSearchText:
You know, I've just realized: the musical landscape
here has really changed since I graduated.
jpnChrName: そういえば聞くところによると……私が 学校を出てから音楽文化も随分変わったとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば聞くところによると……私が
学校を出てから音楽文化も随分変わったとか。

engChrName: Idols, rock bands, singer-songwriters... We didn't have any of that when I was younger.
engSearchText:
Idols, rock bands, singer-songwriters... We didn't
have any of that when I was younger.
jpnChrName: アイドルにロックにシンガーソングライター。 どれも私の時は聞いた事のないものです。
jpnSearchText:
アイドルにロックにシンガーソングライター。
どれも私の時は聞いた事のないものです。

engChrName: Then again, I wasn't much for partying in my youth anyway. I was nose-deep in the books, trying to guarantee I'd land a good job.
engSearchText:
Then again, I wasn't much for partying in my
youth anyway. I was nose-deep in the books, trying to
guarantee I'd land a good job.
jpnChrName: やや気後れしますが、青春の広範をことごとく 勉学と仕事に費やしてきましたし……
jpnSearchText:
やや気後れしますが、青春の広範をことごとく
勉学と仕事に費やしてきましたし……

engChrName: Perhaps I should give this new generation of music a listen—you're never too old to be hip and happening!
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should give this new generation of music a
listen—you're never too old to be hip and happening!
jpnChrName: 今になって若者の音楽に触れてみるのも 刺激にはなるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
今になって若者の音楽に触れてみるのも
刺激にはなるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Gotti's latest movie was...well, raunchy, as his usually are—but it brought back some ugly memories for me...
engSearchText:
Gotti's latest movie was...well, raunchy, as his usually
are—but it brought back some ugly memories
for me...
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の映画は……まあ、セクシーなのが かえって嫌な記憶を思い出させるので……
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の映画は……まあ、セクシーなのが
かえって嫌な記憶を思い出させるので……

engChrName: Once the state of emergency lifts and the festival begins, the marketplace should get a nice shot in the arm.
engSearchText:
Once the state of emergency lifts and the festival
begins, the marketplace should get a nice shot in
the arm.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言が解除され、記念祭も迎えられると なると経済活動も活発化するでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言が解除され、記念祭も迎えられると
なると経済活動も活発化するでしょう。

engChrName: I imagine plenty of industries will try to time their expansion with it—and that brings a need for eagle-eyed consultants like us.
engSearchText:
I imagine plenty of industries will try to time their
expansion with it—and that brings a need for
eagle-eyed consultants like us.
jpnChrName: それを受けて事業を拡大する業者もいます、 ここがコンサルタントの頑張りどころです。
jpnSearchText:
それを受けて事業を拡大する業者もいます、
ここがコンサルタントの頑張りどころです。

engChrName: And speaking of, the festival is an excellent opportunity to conduct some market research.
engSearchText:
And speaking of, the festival is an excellent
opportunity to conduct some market research.
jpnChrName: 記念祭もマーケティング調査のためには これ以上に無い舞台と言えますしね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭もマーケティング調査のためには
これ以上に無い舞台と言えますしね。

engChrName: It's nice that this uptick in my work will keep me busy...
engSearchText:
It's nice that this uptick in my work will keep
me busy...
jpnChrName: 当分は前向きな仕事も増えて忙しく なるとは思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
当分は前向きな仕事も増えて忙しく
なるとは思いますが……

engChrName: ...but man, I really need to find a better way of letting off steam. No more adult websites for me—I need to go cold turkey.
engSearchText:
...but man, I really need to find a better way of letting
off steam. No more adult websites for me—I need to
go cold turkey.
jpnChrName: ふう……やっぱり娯楽は欲しいですね。 あの手のサイトは懲りましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……やっぱり娯楽は欲しいですね。
あの手のサイトは懲りましたが……

engChrName: There must be something else that might help me unwind.
engSearchText:
There must be something else that might help
me unwind.
jpnChrName: 何か他に良い物は無いものか……
jpnSearchText: 何か他に良い物は無いものか……

engChrName: It doesn't surprise me that they froze that project's funding.
engSearchText:
It doesn't surprise me that they froze that
project's funding.
jpnChrName: やはりこの状況だと例のプロジェクトは…… いえ、投資が冷え込むのも無理ないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
やはりこの状況だと例のプロジェクトは……
いえ、投資が冷え込むのも無理ないですよ。

engChrName: I'm still reeling from all this...but I still have a job to do. I have to help the company however I can.
engSearchText:
I'm still reeling from all this...but I still have a job
to do. I have to help the company however I can.
jpnChrName: 私どもとしても心が痛む限りですが…… 何か御社のお力になれる事が他にもあれば。
jpnSearchText:
私どもとしても心が痛む限りですが……
何か御社のお力になれる事が他にもあれば。

engChrName: I can't sit idly by—someone needs to negotiate these bearish forecasts and spooked investors.
engSearchText:
I can't sit idly by—someone needs to negotiate these
bearish forecasts and spooked investors.
jpnChrName: 今後の投資の消極化を見据えての事業進行など、 私どもが提示できることはまだございますので……
jpnSearchText:
今後の投資の消極化を見据えての事業進行など、
私どもが提示できることはまだございますので……

engChrName: If the word had got out that we got phished on some explicit website...heavens, our reputation would have been sunk.
engSearchText:
If the word had got out that we got phished on some
explicit website...heavens, our reputation would have
been sunk.
jpnChrName: 会社の端末であんなサイトを見た挙句、詐欺に かかったと知れたら信用問題になりますからね……
jpnSearchText:
会社の端末であんなサイトを見た挙句、詐欺に
かかったと知れたら信用問題になりますからね……

engChrName: I can't thank you enough. Trust is paramount for our firm—it's not something you can simply buy.
engSearchText:
I can't thank you enough. Trust is paramount for our
firm—it's not something you can simply buy.
jpnChrName: コンサルタントという仕事上、信用問題は かなり重いので……本当に助かりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
コンサルタントという仕事上、信用問題は
かなり重いので……本当に助かりましたよ。

engChrName: So I'm swearing off those spaces. Now I just need to find some other way to unwind after a long day's work...
engSearchText:
So I'm swearing off those spaces. Now I just need to
find some other way to unwind after a long
day's work...
jpnChrName: まあ、今後はあの手のサイトは触れないように するとして……何か代わりの娯楽は欲しいですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今後はあの手のサイトは触れないように
するとして……何か代わりの娯楽は欲しいですが。

engChrName: But, really now, I can't believe there are scams like that on the orbal network. I tried bringing it to the police, but they weren't much help.
engSearchText:
But, really now, I can't believe there are scams like
that on the orbal network. I tried bringing it to the
police, but they weren't much help.
jpnChrName: はぁ……まさか導力ネット詐欺に遭うとは…… 一応警察には相談したがどうなるやら……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……まさか導力ネット詐欺に遭うとは……
一応警察には相談したがどうなるやら……

engChrName: And since I used a work computer, I've effectively incriminated myself. Is there some way to erase my search history, by chance...?
engSearchText:
And since I used a work computer, I've effectively
incriminated myself. Is there some way to erase my
search history, by chance...?
jpnChrName: 特に会社の端末であんな事をしていた事は…… 何とかして履歴を抹消しないと……
jpnSearchText:
特に会社の端末であんな事をしていた事は……
何とかして履歴を抹消しないと……

engChrName: With technology comes trickery, I suppose. Those who lack the savvy can find themselves trapped.
engSearchText:
With technology comes trickery, I suppose.
Those who lack the savvy can find
themselves trapped.
jpnChrName: 便利な時代になったぶんだけ 恐ろしい世の中になりましたよ……
jpnSearchText:
便利な時代になったぶんだけ
恐ろしい世の中になりましたよ……

engChrName: I'll need to be much more cautious on the orbal net going forward.
engSearchText:
I'll need to be much more cautious on the orbal net
going forward.
jpnChrName: これからは気になるサイトがあっても 慎重にならなくてはいけませんね……
jpnSearchText:
これからは気になるサイトがあっても
慎重にならなくてはいけませんね……

engChrName: *sigh* This old fogey just isn't with the times, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
*sigh* This old fogey just isn't with the times,
I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……全ては私の意識の甘さが 招いたという事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……全ては私の意識の甘さが
招いたという事ですね。

engChrName: I should read up on the orbal network to avoid making that mistake again.
engSearchText:
I should read up on the orbal network to avoid
making that mistake again.
jpnChrName: 同じ過ちを繰り返さない為にも 導力ネットについて勉強する必要がありそうです……
jpnSearchText:
同じ過ちを繰り返さない為にも
導力ネットについて勉強する必要がありそうです……

engChrName: At any rate, fingers crossed for good news!
engSearchText: At any rate, fingers crossed for good news!
jpnChrName: とにかく、私は待機していますので。 皆さんからの連絡をお待ちしていますよ……！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、私は待機していますので。
皆さんからの連絡をお待ちしていますよ……！

engChrName: A scam website... The mere thought just unnerves me.
engSearchText:
A scam website... The mere thought just
unnerves me.
jpnChrName: はぁ……まさかあれが 詐欺だっただなんて……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……まさかあれが
詐欺だっただなんて……

engChrName: I've already had to swallow my pride and put in a request... Do I just have to hope someone takes it?
engSearchText:
I've already had to swallow my pride and put in
a request... Do I just have to hope someone takes it?
jpnChrName: 恥を忍んで依頼を出したものの、 本当に来てくれるんだろうか……？
jpnSearchText:
恥を忍んで依頼を出したものの、
本当に来てくれるんだろうか……？

engChrName: (Hmm? I think that man may have put in a request.)
engSearchText: (Hmm? I think that man may have put in a request.)
jpnChrName: （……？ 　この人、誰かに依頼を出してるみたいだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（……？
　この人、誰かに依頼を出してるみたいだけど……）

engChrName: Phew. That request from the Verne Company is really taking the lion's share of my attention.
engSearchText:
Phew. That request from the Verne Company is
really taking the lion's share of my attention.
jpnChrName: ふう……ヴェルヌ関連企業の案件は やはり神経を使いますね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ヴェルヌ関連企業の案件は
やはり神経を使いますね……

engChrName: And upper management is already at their wits' end with that litigation debacle.
engSearchText:
And upper management is already at their wits' end
with that litigation debacle.
jpnChrName: ただでさえレッドスターとエトワスの特許訴訟で 上層部が神経を尖らせているうえ……
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえレッドスターとエトワスの特許訴訟で
上層部が神経を尖らせているうえ……

engChrName: Red Star and ETWS are poised to cause even more problems if we don't keep their power and foreign ties in check.
engSearchText:
Red Star and ETWS are poised to cause even more
problems if we don't keep their power and foreign ties
in check.
jpnChrName: 関連企業間のパワーバランスや、外国企業との 関係も考慮せねば相当なリスクがある。
jpnSearchText:
関連企業間のパワーバランスや、外国企業との
関係も考慮せねば相当なリスクがある。

engChrName: But then, there's the rub: we find that perfect balance and we put a king's ransom in our pockets.
engSearchText:
But then, there's the rub: we find that perfect balance
and we put a king's ransom in our pockets.
jpnChrName: 尤も、それに見合うだけのリターンがある であろう事も間違いない訳ですがね。
jpnSearchText:
尤も、それに見合うだけのリターンがある
であろう事も間違いない訳ですがね。

engChrName: This case is proving to be a cut above what we usually handle. I'd like to be there in the thick of it to make sure it all goes smoothly.
engSearchText:
This case is proving to be a cut above what we
usually handle. I'd like to be there in the thick of it to
make sure it all goes smoothly.
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、やはり他の案件に比べて一つ一つの 壁が高いのも事実……乗り越えたいですが……
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、やはり他の案件に比べて一つ一つの
壁が高いのも事実……乗り越えたいですが……

engChrName: But perhaps a little pick-me-up first wouldn't hurt.
engSearchText: But perhaps a little pick-me-up first wouldn't hurt.
jpnChrName: 流石に……ここらでリフレッシュをした方が より能率的になりそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
流石に……ここらでリフレッシュをした方が
より能率的になりそうですね……

engChrName: Word through the grapevine is, several BOE companies are looking to overhaul their investment portfolio once Erebonia's reparations dry up.
engSearchText:
Word through the grapevine is, several BOE
companies are looking to overhaul their investment
portfolio once Erebonia's reparations dry up.
jpnChrName: ＢＯＥ系列企業の話を聞く限り、やはり賠償金の 終了を境に投資を見直すところも多いようで。
jpnSearchText:
ＢＯＥ系列企業の話を聞く限り、やはり賠償金の
終了を境に投資を見直すところも多いようで。

engChrName: The smaller fish in the pond will need to rethink their own strategies as well.
engSearchText:
The smaller fish in the pond will need to rethink their
own strategies as well.
jpnChrName: となると、中小企業やベンチャーにも、 それに応じた経営戦略が求められる。
jpnSearchText:
となると、中小企業やベンチャーにも、
それに応じた経営戦略が求められる。

engChrName: I suspect that'll be good for us—we'll have plenty of companies in need of financial advice.
engSearchText:
I suspect that'll be good for us—we'll have plenty of
companies in need of financial advice.
jpnChrName: その意味でも、我々コンサルタントの 活躍が増える事は想像に難くない。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でも、我々コンサルタントの
活躍が増える事は想像に難くない。

engChrName: These days, clients appreciate the outsider perspectives we offer, free from the old norms of the industry.
engSearchText:
These days, clients appreciate the outsider
perspectives we offer, free from the old norms of
the industry.
jpnChrName: やはり既存の形態に捉われず、ゼロベースで 柔軟に考える力が求められるわけですからね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり既存の形態に捉われず、ゼロベースで
柔軟に考える力が求められるわけですからね。

engChrName: Hmm... So M&A needs a new hiring policy, do they...?
engSearchText:
Hmm... So M&A needs a new hiring policy, do
they...?
jpnChrName: ふむ、次の案件はＭ＆Ａに伴う 人事登用制度の刷新の相談か……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、次の案件はＭ＆Ａに伴う
人事登用制度の刷新の相談か……

engChrName: Our specialists all have their plates full, so I believe this falls to me. I should do some research on the topic first.
engSearchText:
Our specialists all have their plates full, so I believe
this falls to me. I should do some research on the
topic first.
jpnChrName: うちの専門のコンサルタントも忙しいし、 まずは私が現状の把握からしておきますかね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの専門のコンサルタントも忙しいし、
まずは私が現状の把握からしておきますかね。

engChrName: With the economy booming over these last two years, M&A has revamped their management strategy.
engSearchText:
With the economy booming over these last two years,
M&A has revamped their management strategy.
jpnChrName: この二年の好景気でＭ＆Ａ戦略や 経営形態の見直しも盛んです。
jpnSearchText:
この二年の好景気でＭ＆Ａ戦略や
経営形態の見直しも盛んです。

engChrName: Consultants react to changes in the market...and in turn, they influence the market themselves. They play off each other like that.
engSearchText:
Consultants react to changes in the market...and in
turn, they influence the market themselves. They play
off each other like that.
jpnChrName: まあ、コンサルティングが経済に及ぼしている 影響も責任も大きいと言えるでしょうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、コンサルティングが経済に及ぼしている
影響も責任も大きいと言えるでしょうねぇ。

engChrName: Heh. Kirk's runnin' his mouth like he always is. Guess if he's still business as usual, I can be, too.
engSearchText:
Heh. Kirk's runnin' his mouth like he always is.
Guess if he's still business as usual, I can be, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、カークも相変わらず生意気な口を 叩ける余裕があるなら心配はいらねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、カークも相変わらず生意気な口を
叩ける余裕があるなら心配はいらねぇな。

engChrName: But man, things have really gotten out of hand.
engSearchText: But man, things have really gotten out of hand.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、俺達には理解の及ばない状況に なっちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、俺達には理解の及ばない状況に
なっちまったが……

engChrName: I figure I can at least help out at a shelter or something. I'm used to corralling misfits, heh.
engSearchText:
I figure I can at least help out at a shelter
or something. I'm used to corralling misfits, heh.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、どこかの避難所の手伝いくらいはするか。 寄せ集め連中を纏めんのは慣れたモンだしな。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、どこかの避難所の手伝いくらいはするか。
寄せ集め連中を纏めんのは慣れたモンだしな。

engChrName: Well, looks like the team's having fun. Guess I should check in on downtown, see how things're going there.
engSearchText:
Well, looks like the team's having fun. Guess I should
check in on downtown, see how things're going there.
jpnChrName: さて、チームの連中も楽しめてるようだし 俺達もせいぜい下町に顔出す頃合いか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、チームの連中も楽しめてるようだし
俺達もせいぜい下町に顔出す頃合いか。

engChrName: Place's seen better days, for sure, but they deserve their time in the sun just like everybody else.
engSearchText:
Place's seen better days, for sure, but they deserve
their time in the sun just like everybody else.
jpnChrName: ま、ボロアパートばっかとはいえ こういう時には流石に皆弾けるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ボロアパートばっかとはいえ
こういう時には流石に皆弾けるしな。

engChrName: I'm gonna go downtown and play a game or two with the boys. I'll probably swing back here once it's dark.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna go downtown and play a game or two with
the boys. I'll probably swing back here once it's dark.
jpnChrName: せいぜい近所連中に付き合ってやりに行くんだ、 夜にはこっちに戻ってると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい近所連中に付き合ってやりに行くんだ、
夜にはこっちに戻ってると思うぜ。

engChrName: Sure, our team has some oddballs and some straight laces...
engSearchText:
Sure, our team has some oddballs and some
straight laces...
jpnChrName: ま、今の俺達のチームには訳アリの奴も居りゃ、 そうでもない奴もいるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今の俺達のチームには訳アリの奴も居りゃ、
そうでもない奴もいるけどよ。

engChrName: ...but we mesh together pretty well regardless. End of the day, we're all neighbors, and a good neighbor has your back.
engSearchText:
...but we mesh together pretty well regardless. End of
the day, we're all neighbors, and a good neighbor has
your back.
jpnChrName: この通り、今じゃあ皆落ち着いてる、寄り合い所帯 だけあって互いに個性は活かせてな。
jpnSearchText:
この通り、今じゃあ皆落ち着いてる、寄り合い所帯
だけあって互いに個性は活かせてな。

engChrName: When that emergency declaration went down, everybody kept in touch and worked to keep their streets clear.
engSearchText:
When that emergency declaration went down,
everybody kept in touch and worked to keep their
streets clear.
jpnChrName: あの非常事態宣言の中でも各々で情報は共有できたし、 皆自分の庭でもやる事やったようだしな。
jpnSearchText:
あの非常事態宣言の中でも各々で情報は共有できたし、
皆自分の庭でもやる事やったようだしな。

engChrName: Heh. I guess that's a benefit of throwin' together a buncha misfits like us.
engSearchText:
Heh. I guess that's a benefit of throwin' together a
buncha misfits like us.
jpnChrName: ……ハハ、これだから色んな奴らを 集めるのは面白いのなんのってな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハハ、これだから色んな奴らを
集めるのは面白いのなんのってな。

engChrName: The boys were all lookin' forward to the festival. Glad they were able to pull it off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
The boys were all lookin' forward to the festival.
Glad they were able to pull it off without a hitch.
jpnChrName: 記念祭もこいつらは楽しみにしてたしな。 無事迎えられて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭もこいつらは楽しみにしてたしな。
無事迎えられて良かったぜ。

engChrName: Really, the only thing we got in common is that we all have too much energy.
engSearchText:
Really, the only thing we got in common is that we all
have too much energy.
jpnChrName: 元気を持て余してんのがまあ、唯一の共通点 みたいなところだしな、ウチも。
jpnSearchText:
元気を持て余してんのがまあ、唯一の共通点
みたいなところだしな、ウチも。

engChrName: So it's nice to cut loose and let it all out like this.
engSearchText: So it's nice to cut loose and let it all out like this.
jpnChrName: こういうイベントの時は各々で好きなように 思い切り弾けるが良いさ。
jpnSearchText:
こういうイベントの時は各々で好きなように
思い切り弾けるが良いさ。

engChrName: Man... Things've really gone to Gehenna here.
engSearchText: Man... Things've really gone to Gehenna here.
jpnChrName: まったく……洒落にならない事に なっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
まったく……洒落にならない事に
なっちまったな。

engChrName: Once I make sure the team's all good, I'm gettin' my ass downtown to try and help.
engSearchText:
Once I make sure the team's all good, I'm gettin' my
ass downtown to try and help.
jpnChrName: 俺もチームの連中一通り見届けたら、 こんな時くらい下町のために働かねぇと。
jpnSearchText:
俺もチームの連中一通り見届けたら、
こんな時くらい下町のために働かねぇと。

engChrName: I'm not crazy about this whole lockdown thing...but, well, doesn't affect me much. I keep all my crazies in line.
engSearchText:
I'm not crazy about this whole lockdown thing...but,
well, doesn't affect me much. I keep all my crazies
in line.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言ってのは堅苦しくて好かねぇが…… ま、一応生意気な連中の面倒見てきた自負はある。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言ってのは堅苦しくて好かねぇが……
ま、一応生意気な連中の面倒見てきた自負はある。

engChrName: Best I can do now is keep an eye out for shady types, keep our area safe.
engSearchText:
Best I can do now is keep an eye out for shady types,
keep our area safe.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、俺の見てる範囲では変な気を起こす 奴は出ないようにさせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、俺の見てる範囲では変な気を起こす
奴は出ないようにさせてもらうさ。

engChrName: Man, James got straight embarrassed there. I could hardly believe my eyes.
engSearchText:
Man, James got straight embarrassed there. I could
hardly believe my eyes.
jpnChrName: あのジェイムスとか言う奴……結局、 無様なほどにコテンパンにされてたな。
jpnSearchText:
あのジェイムスとか言う奴……結局、
無様なほどにコテンパンにされてたな。

engChrName: But he wasn't pissed about it—he looked relieved, actually. Like a weight came off his shoulders... Guess he needed that.
engSearchText:
But he wasn't pissed about it—he looked
relieved, actually. Like a weight came off
his shoulders... Guess he needed that.
jpnChrName: まあ、それでも妙にスカッとしたツラだった辺り、 アイツにも色々あるんだろうがな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それでも妙にスカッとしたツラだった辺り、
アイツにも色々あるんだろうがな……

engChrName: Actually, Sasha was looking like she still had an itch afterward, so maybe float her a challenge?
engSearchText:
Actually, Sasha was looking like she still had an itch
afterward, so maybe float her a challenge?
jpnChrName: ──ちなみにその後、サーシャも物足りなさそう だったから、勝負を受けてやってよ。
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみにその後、サーシャも物足りなさそう
だったから、勝負を受けてやってよ。

engChrName: I was able to squeeze out a win, but man, she was tough as ever.
engSearchText:
I was able to squeeze out a win, but man, she was
tough as ever.
jpnChrName: 結果はまあ、ギリで何とか勝てたが…… アイツ、相変わらずのキレだったよ。
jpnSearchText:
結果はまあ、ギリで何とか勝てたが……
アイツ、相変わらずのキレだったよ。

engChrName: Heard Kirk tried to take her on, too—he held his own, but he couldn't beat her either.
engSearchText:
Heard Kirk tried to take her on, too—he held his own,
but he couldn't beat her either.
jpnChrName: ちなみに……カークのヤツも勝負を挑んで、 結構食い下がったが結局負けちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに……カークのヤツも勝負を挑んで、
結構食い下がったが結局負けちまってな。

engChrName: Probably looked past her 'cause she's a girl, the dumbshit. He's been real full of himself lately.
engSearchText:
Probably looked past her 'cause she's a girl,
the dumbshit. He's been real full of himself lately.
jpnChrName: 女だからってナメて挑んだようだが……まあ、 アイツは最近慢心し過ぎてた事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
女だからってナメて挑んだようだが……まあ、
アイツは最近慢心し過ぎてた事だしな。

engChrName: So y'know, it's good that he got knocked off his high horse like that. Better now than later.
engSearchText:
So y'know, it's good that he got knocked off his high
horse like that. Better now than later.
jpnChrName: カークもあれ以上調子に乗ると危なっかしいし、 丁度いいお灸になったんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
カークもあれ以上調子に乗ると危なっかしいし、
丁度いいお灸になったんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Now he's pullin' all-nighters practicing, heh. He's really taken that beating to heart. I'll keep an eye on him, see how that goes.
engSearchText:
Now he's pullin' all-nighters practicing, heh.
He's really taken that beating to heart. I'll keep an eye
on him, see how that goes.
jpnChrName: その証拠に、遅くまで練習してやがる。 ま、俺も最後まで見ててやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
その証拠に、遅くまで練習してやがる。
ま、俺も最後まで見ててやるぜ。

engChrName: Sasha got a ride to Aramis, she's playin' ball up there now. But a few years back, she was here dominating these streets!
engSearchText:
Sasha got a ride to Aramis, she's playin' ball up
there now. But a few years back, she was here
dominating these streets!
jpnChrName: サーシャっていやぁ、今やアラミスのエースにして、 数年前にここで猛威を見せてくれた女じゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
サーシャっていやぁ、今やアラミスのエースにして、
数年前にここで猛威を見せてくれた女じゃないか！

engChrName: Heh. I dunno who's all with you, but this'll be fun regardless. Been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Heh. I dunno who's all with you, but this'll be
fun regardless. Been a while, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: クク、一緒に連れてる奴は何なのか知らんが、 久しぶりに面白いモノを見せてくれそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、一緒に連れてる奴は何なのか知らんが、
久しぶりに面白いモノを見せてくれそうだ。

engChrName: I've been needing a little challenge in my life, too. Once this is over, let's scrap a bit for old times' sake!
engSearchText:
I've been needing a little challenge in my life, too.
Once this is over, let's scrap a bit for old times' sake!
jpnChrName: 俺も最近は不完全燃焼気味だったし…… 何年ぶりか判らんが、後で勝負させてもらうか！
jpnSearchText:
俺も最近は不完全燃焼気味だったし……
何年ぶりか判らんが、後で勝負させてもらうか！

engChrName: Damn, Sasha. You really grew up, didn't ya? You rock that uniform.
engSearchText:
Damn, Sasha. You really grew up, didn't ya? You rock
that uniform.
jpnChrName: サーシャ、見たのは久しいが随分と 制服も様になってるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
サーシャ、見たのは久しいが随分と
制服も様になってるじゃないか。

engChrName: Dumbass didn't know what hit him, pickin' a fight with a firecracker like you.
engSearchText:
Dumbass didn't know what hit him, pickin' a fight
with a firecracker like you.
jpnChrName: そっちの男子がどういう災難で この熱血娘にしごかれてるのか知らねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの男子がどういう災難で
この熱血娘にしごかれてるのか知らねぇが。

engChrName: I think I'll watch this one and see if he learns a thing or two.
engSearchText:
I think I'll watch this one and see if he learns a thing
or two.
jpnChrName: ま、たまには俺達も見る側に回ってみるか。 カークにも良い刺激になるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、たまには俺達も見る側に回ってみるか。
カークにも良い刺激になるだろ。

engChrName: Oh, it's you. Hey, thanks for helpin' out with that whole thing with Mark.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you. Hey, thanks for helpin' out with that
whole thing with Mark.
jpnChrName: ……あんた達か。 この前はマルクの件で世話になったな。
jpnSearchText:
……あんた達か。
この前はマルクの件で世話になったな。

engChrName: Those boys he got wrapped up with are still goin' and causin' trouble, if ya could believe it.
engSearchText:
Those boys he got wrapped up with are still goin' and
causin' trouble, if ya could believe it.
jpnChrName: マルクがいたあの半グレチーム、 まだ凝りてねぇって話だが聞いてるか？
jpnSearchText:
マルクがいたあの半グレチーム、
まだ凝りてねぇって話だが聞いてるか？

engChrName: They're just actin' like nothin' happened after they sent one of their own guys to die. Makes me wanna puke.
engSearchText:
They're just actin' like nothin' happened after they
sent one of their own guys to die. Makes me
wanna puke.
jpnChrName: 仲間一人捨て駒にしておいてのうのうと…… 虫唾が走るったらありゃしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間一人捨て駒にしておいてのうのうと……
虫唾が走るったらありゃしねぇ。

engChrName: And they're still gettin' new members—guess some numbnuts out there think they're cool.
engSearchText:
And they're still gettin' new members—guess some
numbnuts out there think they're cool.
jpnChrName: でも、そんな奴らにも憧れて入っちまう 馬鹿がいるっていうからよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんな奴らにも憧れて入っちまう
馬鹿がいるっていうからよ……

engChrName: Damn shame, really. Gullible kids think they're tough, so they fall in with the gangs and ride 'em all the way down into the gutter.
engSearchText:
Damn shame, really. Gullible kids think they're
tough, so they fall in with the gangs and ride 'em all
the way down into the gutter.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それにしてもここ最近は半グレになって 堕ちるところまで堕ちる奴が多いよなァ……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それにしてもここ最近は半グレになって
堕ちるところまで堕ちる奴が多いよなァ……

engChrName: I get it, I do. Everyone's got their own stuff going on. But gangs are the last thing a kid needs.
engSearchText:
I get it, I do. Everyone's got their own stuff going on.
But gangs are the last thing a kid needs.
jpnChrName: ったく、各々抱え込んでるのは判るが…… いつまでもそんなんで良いはずねぇだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、各々抱え込んでるのは判るが……
いつまでもそんなんで良いはずねぇだろうが。

engChrName: Even punks can find the right place to be—they just gotta look. That's what ball is to us.
engSearchText:
Even punks can find the right place to be—they just
gotta look. That's what ball is to us.
jpnChrName: 俺達のバスケもそうだが、不良だろうとてめぇの道を 探せる場なんて、探せばあるモンだってのに。
jpnSearchText:
俺達のバスケもそうだが、不良だろうとてめぇの道を
探せる場なんて、探せばあるモンだってのに。

engChrName: We ain't all got clean rap sheets, but that doesn't matter here. We leave it all on the court.
engSearchText:
We ain't all got clean rap sheets, but that doesn't
matter here. We leave it all on the court.
jpnChrName: ここにいる連中にもヤンチャやってた奴はいるが、 全力でぶつかってみりゃ筋の通った連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
ここにいる連中にもヤンチャやってた奴はいるが、
全力でぶつかってみりゃ筋の通った連中だ。

engChrName: Everybody has stuff on their plate, but you can find common ground—find a place where you belong—if you just get help and talk to people.
engSearchText:
Everybody has stuff on their plate, but you can find
common ground—find a place where you belong—if
you just get help and talk to people.
jpnChrName: 色々あっても、とりあえず吐き出せるだけ 吐き出せば分かり合える事もあるんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
色々あっても、とりあえず吐き出せるだけ
吐き出せば分かり合える事もあるんだろうが……

engChrName: But the gangs don't give a shit about that. They just drag people down and don't let go, bein' miserable for the sake of it.
engSearchText:
But the gangs don't give a shit about that. They just
drag people down and don't let go, bein' miserable for
the sake of it.
jpnChrName: 最近の半グレ共は、道に迷ってるヤツを 後戻りできない闇に引き込みやがるからな。
jpnSearchText:
最近の半グレ共は、道に迷ってるヤツを
後戻りできない闇に引き込みやがるからな。

engChrName: Makes me sick. That ain't no road to recovery, it's just a downward spiral.
engSearchText:
Makes me sick. That ain't no road to recovery, it's
just a downward spiral.
jpnChrName: ったく……居場所を見つけた奴らを 見てきた身としちゃ胸糞悪ぃな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……居場所を見つけた奴らを
見てきた身としちゃ胸糞悪ぃな。

engChrName: (Sounds like he knows the full story behind that request... We should ask him about it.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like he knows the full story behind
that request... We should ask him about it.)
jpnChrName: （コイツには依頼の顛末を 伝えといた方がいいかもな……）
jpnSearchText:
（コイツには依頼の顛末を
伝えといた方がいいかもな……）

engChrName: Hey, so we had a quick chat with Amy.
engSearchText: Hey, so we had a quick chat with Amy.
jpnChrName: よう、エイミーに会って話をして来たぜ。
jpnSearchText: よう、エイミーに会って話をして来たぜ。

engChrName: You did?! What did you tell her?
engSearchText: You did?! What did you tell her?
jpnChrName: ……！ 結局、彼女にはどう伝えたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……！
結局、彼女にはどう伝えたんだ？

engChrName: The truth.
engSearchText: The truth.
jpnChrName: 本当の事を伝えてやったさ。
jpnSearchText: 本当の事を伝えてやったさ。

engChrName: She took the news a bit rough, but I think she's accepted it.
engSearchText:
She took the news a bit rough, but I think she's
accepted it.
jpnChrName: ひと悶着ありはしたが、 事実を受け止めてくれた様子だったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ひと悶着ありはしたが、
事実を受け止めてくれた様子だったぜ。

engChrName: Got'cha. I think that'll make Mark happy...wherever he is.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. I think that'll make Mark happy...wherever
he is.
jpnChrName: そうか…… それならマルクも安心してくれるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
それならマルクも安心してくれるだろ。

engChrName: Thanks, guys... She deserved that closure.
engSearchText: Thanks, guys... She deserved that closure.
jpnChrName: ありがとな……俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとな……俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。

engChrName: I told her what Mark wanted her to hear.
engSearchText: I told her what Mark wanted her to hear.
jpnChrName: 手紙に書いてあった通り、伝えてやったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 手紙に書いてあった通り、伝えてやったぜ。

engChrName: That whole bit about him falling for some foreign girl and never coming back to Calvard.
engSearchText:
That whole bit about him falling for some foreign girl
and never coming back to Calvard.
jpnChrName: 外国に彼女を作っちまって もう共和国にはいねえってな。
jpnSearchText:
外国に彼女を作っちまって
もう共和国にはいねえってな。

engChrName: Got'cha. I think that's what Mark woulda wanted.
engSearchText: Got'cha. I think that's what Mark woulda wanted.
jpnChrName: そうか……それならマルクも 納得してくれるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……それならマルクも
納得してくれるだろうな。

engChrName: Thanks, guys... She deserved that closure.
engSearchText: Thanks, guys... She deserved that closure.
jpnChrName: ありがとな……俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとな……俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。

engChrName: I'll leave it up to you, what you say to Amy.
engSearchText: I'll leave it up to you, what you say to Amy.
jpnChrName: マルクの彼女にどうやって伝えるのか…… アンタ達に託させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
マルクの彼女にどうやって伝えるのか……
アンタ達に託させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: 'Sup? Haven't seen you guys around here. You don't look like tryouts...
engSearchText:
'Sup? Haven't seen you guys around here. You don't
look like tryouts...
jpnChrName: よお、見ない顔だな。 チームの参加希望者って訳でもなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
よお、見ない顔だな。
チームの参加希望者って訳でもなさそうだが。

engChrName: I'm running this street basketball team, see? Got some of the downtown guys here.
engSearchText:
I'm running this street basketball team, see?
Got some of the downtown guys here.
jpnChrName: 俺は下町の仲間とつるんで、とある “ストリートバスケ”のチームをやってるんだが──
jpnSearchText:
俺は下町の仲間とつるんで、とある
“ストリートバスケ”のチームをやってるんだが──

engChrName: We kinda sold out lately, so there haven't been as many guys comin' to try out.
engSearchText:
We kinda sold out lately, so there haven't been as
many guys comin' to try out.
jpnChrName: 最近名が売れちまったせいか 参加希望者が絶えなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
最近名が売れちまったせいか
参加希望者が絶えなくてな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I heard a thing or two about that—some team from the streets makin' noise around town.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I heard a thing or two about that—some
team from the streets makin' noise around town.
jpnChrName: そういや聞いた事があるな…… どこぞの“不良上がり”の強豪チームがあるとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういや聞いた事があるな……
どこぞの“不良上がり”の強豪チームがあるとか。

engChrName: Really blew up, didn't it? This street ball thing you started.
engSearchText:
Really blew up, didn't it? This street ball thing
you started.
jpnChrName: そもそもストリートバスケなんざ 若者が好き勝手始めた文化らしいけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもストリートバスケなんざ
若者が好き勝手始めた文化らしいけどな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah, it's real big business now. It's better as an outlet than what we used to do—now we can leave it all out on the court.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, it's real big business now. It's better as an
outlet than what we used to do—now we can leave it
all out on the court.
jpnChrName: ハハ、その通りだ。 だが鬱憤を溜め込んでるよりはいいだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、その通りだ。
だが鬱憤を溜め込んでるよりはいいだろ？

engChrName: You got some rough dudes, yeah, but they're pretty chill here.
engSearchText:
You got some rough dudes, yeah, but they're pretty
chill here.
jpnChrName: 確かにいきがってる連中もいるが 話してみりゃ案外イイ奴も多いんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
確かにいきがってる連中もいるが
話してみりゃ案外イイ奴も多いんだぜ。

engChrName: ...Okay, maybe rough's undersellin' it a bit. But why don'tcha take a look and see for yourself?
engSearchText:
...Okay, maybe rough's undersellin' it a bit. But why
don'tcha take a look and see for yourself?
jpnChrName: ウチのチームにはクソ生意気なのもいるが 良けりゃブラついて行けよ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチのチームにはクソ生意気なのもいるが
良けりゃブラついて行けよ。

engChrName: We've been getting some new guys around here lately. Real silver spoon types.
engSearchText:
We've been getting some new guys around
here lately. Real silver spoon types.
jpnChrName: 最近はこの辺りに出入りしてる事が多くてな。 親はエリート官僚って連中も増えてきたな。
jpnSearchText:
最近はこの辺りに出入りしてる事が多くてな。
親はエリート官僚って連中も増えてきたな。

engChrName: Some of our other guys can't stand 'em—downtown might as well be a whole 'nother world.
engSearchText:
Some of our other guys can't stand 'em—downtown
might as well be a whole 'nother world.
jpnChrName: 下町のボロアパート育ちの身からすりゃ 面白いもんだとつくづく思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
下町のボロアパート育ちの身からすりゃ
面白いもんだとつくづく思うぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, our guys are usually pretty chill, even if they get a bit full of themselves. Feel free to chat 'em up.
engSearchText:
Anyway, our guys are usually pretty chill, even if they
get a bit full of themselves. Feel free to chat 'em up.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いきがってる連中もいるが 案外イイ奴も多い、良けりゃブラついて行けよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、いきがってる連中もいるが
案外イイ奴も多い、良けりゃブラついて行けよ。

engChrName: Tch. Go figure Simon has to play the hero, helping other people out while we're all turning tail.
engSearchText:
Tch. Go figure Simon has to play the hero, helping
other people out while we're all turning tail.
jpnChrName: ……フン、逃げながらとはいえ人を助けてたとか サイモンばかりカッコつけて……
jpnSearchText:
……フン、逃げながらとはいえ人を助けてたとか
サイモンばかりカッコつけて……

engChrName: I'll have to step up my game, too.
engSearchText: I'll have to step up my game, too.
jpnChrName: ま、そういう事ならオレもせいぜい、 ここから先は手伝ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういう事ならオレもせいぜい、
ここから先は手伝ってやるよ。

engChrName: Damn it all... What do we even do here?
engSearchText: Damn it all... What do we even do here?
jpnChrName: ……く、こんな事になったら オレでも出来る事は……
jpnSearchText:
……く、こんな事になったら
オレでも出来る事は……

engChrName: And what the hell is Simon doing? He's seriously running home NOW, of all times?
engSearchText:
And what the hell is Simon doing? He's seriously
running home NOW, of all times?
jpnChrName: てか、サイモン達は何やってんの？ こんな時に限って実家に行ってたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
てか、サイモン達は何やってんの？
こんな時に限って実家に行ってたなんて……

engChrName: ...N-No, I'm overthinking. He'll be fine, this is Simon we're talking about.
engSearchText:
...N-No, I'm overthinking. He'll be fine, this is
Simon we're talking about.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ、サイモンなら無事に 戻ってくるとは思ってるけどさ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ、サイモンなら無事に
戻ってくるとは思ってるけどさ！

engChrName: So Simon and Frawla are going to check on their neighborhood, huh...?
engSearchText:
So Simon and Frawla are going to check on their
neighborhood, huh...?
jpnChrName: サイモンとフラゥラも実家の方を 見に行く、ねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
サイモンとフラゥラも実家の方を
見に行く、ねぇ……

engChrName: Well, whatever. We have some time to kill, so I guess I'll practice a little. It's been a while.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. We have some time to kill, so I guess
I'll practice a little. It's been a while.
jpnChrName: ま、自由に過ごせばいいさ。 オレは久しぶりにでも練習するさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、自由に過ごせばいいさ。
オレは久しぶりにでも練習するさ。

engChrName: Everyone's doing whatever, right? Might as well take a load off.
engSearchText:
Everyone's doing whatever, right? Might as well take
a load off.
jpnChrName: みんな好き勝手にやってるからな、 せいぜい更に差をつけてやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
みんな好き勝手にやってるからな、
せいぜい更に差をつけてやるさ。

engChrName: ...Not like my folks care if I come home or not, anyway.
engSearchText:
...Not like my folks care if I come home or
not, anyway.
jpnChrName: ……ま、親と居るのが気まずいってのもあるけど。
jpnSearchText: <S3>……ま、親と居るのが気まずいってのもあるけど。

engChrName: That really the best you got? Heh, barely broke a sweat. You'll have to train harder if you wanna beat me!
engSearchText:
That really the best you got? Heh, barely broke
a sweat. You'll have to train harder if you wanna
beat me!
jpnChrName: フン、アンタらまだその程度？ 結局成長、見られないねェ？
jpnSearchText:
フン、アンタらまだその程度？
結局成長、見られないねェ？

engChrName: Aaand there he goes back on his high horse. Prick.
engSearchText: Aaand there he goes back on his high horse. Prick.
jpnChrName: チッ、すっかり調子戻りやがって。
jpnSearchText: チッ、すっかり調子戻りやがって。

engChrName: Whatever. He was probably just so freaked out last time, it threw off his game.
engSearchText:
Whatever. He was probably just so freaked out last
time, it threw off his game.
jpnChrName: まあ、こいつがビビってたのも 調子狂ったし別に良いが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こいつがビビってたのも
調子狂ったし別に良いが……

engChrName: For the last time, I was NOT freaked out and I was NOT off my game. Got it?!
engSearchText:
For the last time, I was NOT freaked out and I was
NOT off my game. Got it?!
jpnChrName: ……何か言った？　何度も言うけどオレ、 ビビっても混乱しても無いからな？
jpnSearchText:
……何か言った？　何度も言うけどオレ、
ビビっても混乱しても無いからな？

engChrName: Maybe instead of running your mouth, you can run it back! Or do you know you'll lose again?
engSearchText:
Maybe instead of running your mouth, you can run
it back! Or do you know you'll lose again?
jpnChrName: とにかくだ、アンタ達には変わらず、 オレの腕を磨く贄になってもらうから。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくだ、アンタ達には変わらず、
オレの腕を磨く贄になってもらうから。

engChrName: I heard the festival's going forward as scheduled.
engSearchText: I heard the festival's going forward as scheduled.
jpnChrName: そういや、記念祭も無事にやるっていうけどさ。
jpnSearchText: そういや、記念祭も無事にやるっていうけどさ。

engChrName: It's nice and all, but man, some of these guys just will not shut up about it. Do they really have to drag me to it with them?
engSearchText:
It's nice and all, but man, some of these guys just will
not shut up about it. Do they really have to drag me
to it with them?
jpnChrName: アレ、みんな浮かれ過ぎてオレ的にはたまーに 面倒になるんだよね、馬鹿話に付き合わされたり。
jpnSearchText:
アレ、みんな浮かれ過ぎてオレ的にはたまーに
面倒になるんだよね、馬鹿話に付き合わされたり。

engChrName: But, well, I guess it's all in good fun. Least I can do is lend them an ear.
engSearchText:
But, well, I guess it's all in good fun. Least I can do is
lend them an ear.
jpnChrName: ま、みんながその気なら良いんじゃない？ オレはいつも通りにやらせてもらうからさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、みんながその気なら良いんじゃない？
オレはいつも通りにやらせてもらうからさ。

engChrName: They were just raised differently, I guess. The festival was never big in my household...not that I want to talk about my household.
engSearchText:
They were just raised differently, I guess. The festival
was never big in my household...not that I want to
talk about my household.
jpnChrName: まあ、洒落にならない事態ってのは判ってる。 親に関しては正直、あまり話したくないケド……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、洒落にならない事態ってのは判ってる。
親に関しては正直、あまり話したくないケド……

engChrName: ...Meh. That's all in the past now. Long as I keep myself out of trouble, we're all good.
engSearchText:
...Meh. That's all in the past now. Long as I keep
myself out of trouble, we're all good.
jpnChrName: ま、散々抜け出してきた身だし、 今日くらいは心配かけさせないでやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、散々抜け出してきた身だし、
今日くらいは心配かけさせないでやるか。

engChrName: No, I did NOT choke, I just let down my guard a little. Hmph.
engSearchText:
No, I did NOT choke, I just let down my guard
a little. Hmph.
jpnChrName: ……フン、別にオレのセンスが悪かった 訳じゃない、ちょっと油断しただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
……フン、別にオレのセンスが悪かった
訳じゃない、ちょっと油断しただけだ。

engChrName: This girl does have some hoops, I'll admit—she had to have been good for Simon to take notice.
engSearchText:
This girl does have some hoops, I'll admit—she had
to have been good for Simon to take notice.
jpnChrName: ま、あのサーシャって女がサイモンも 認めるほどってのは判ったけどな……
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのサーシャって女がサイモンも
認めるほどってのは判ったけどな……

engChrName: Next time we face off, it won't go so smoothly for her. You'll see.
engSearchText:
Next time we face off, it won't go so smoothly
for her. You'll see.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、気ィ抜いてた分の引き締め くらいはオレでもやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、気ィ抜いてた分の引き締め
くらいはオレでもやるさ。

engChrName: I guess I see what Simon's getting at—she DOES have potential.
engSearchText:
I guess I see what Simon's getting at—she DOES
have potential.
jpnChrName: サイモンも言ってるから一応、 オレも見てるけどさァ……
jpnSearchText:
サイモンも言ってるから一応、
オレも見てるけどさァ……

engChrName: But is it really worth tying up the court just for a one on one with some preppy Aramis kid?
engSearchText:
But is it really worth tying up the court just for a one
on one with some preppy Aramis kid?
jpnChrName: あのアラミスの女学生とあっちの冴えない ヤツの勝負、このコート貸すほどの価値あんの？
jpnSearchText:
あのアラミスの女学生とあっちの冴えない
ヤツの勝負、このコート貸すほどの価値あんの？

engChrName: I mean, where's the fun in watching a schoolboy go up against our queen of the streets?
engSearchText:
I mean, where's the fun in watching a schoolboy go
up against our queen of the streets?
jpnChrName: ガッコーの女子バスケの子が冴えない男と 遊ぶのなんて見てて面白いのかねェ？
jpnSearchText:
ガッコーの女子バスケの子が冴えない男と
遊ぶのなんて見てて面白いのかねェ？

engChrName: We're one of the strongest teams around. People don't wanna see us beating up small fry, they wanna see a challenge.
engSearchText:
We're one of the strongest teams around.
People don't wanna see us beating up small fry, they
wanna see a challenge.
jpnChrName: 一応、オレら強豪なんだしさ。 見るのも刺激あるのが良いよなァ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、オレら強豪なんだしさ。
見るのも刺激あるのが良いよなァ。

engChrName: Pfft, that's all you've got? Don't you catch on after losing over and over again?
engSearchText:
Pfft, that's all you've got? Don't you catch on after
losing over and over again?
jpnChrName: フン、その程度かい？ 二人がかりで負け続け、恥ずかしくない？
jpnSearchText:
フン、その程度かい？
二人がかりで負け続け、恥ずかしくない？

engChrName: Goddess, I hate his arrogant ass...but I gotta admit he's good. That ain't just dumb luck.
engSearchText:
Goddess, I hate his arrogant ass...but I gotta admit
he's good. That ain't just dumb luck.
jpnChrName: く、煽りやがって……だがこんだけやっても 勝てないならマグレでもねぇか……
jpnSearchText:
く、煽りやがって……だがこんだけやっても
勝てないならマグレでもねぇか……

engChrName: Simon's probably the only one who can take him on at this point.
engSearchText:
Simon's probably the only one who can take him on
at this point.
jpnChrName: ま、サイモンくらいかもしれねぇな、こいつを 超えてるのは今んところは……
jpnSearchText:
ま、サイモンくらいかもしれねぇな、こいつを
超えてるのは今んところは……

engChrName: But, Kirk, a little advice from someone who's been around longer than you: pride comes before the fall.
engSearchText:
But, Kirk, a little advice from someone who's been
around longer than you: pride comes before the fall.
jpnChrName: だがカーク、年長者として言っとくが、 慢心してると絶対痛い目見るぞ？
jpnSearchText:
だがカーク、年長者として言っとくが、
慢心してると絶対痛い目見るぞ？

engChrName: Sounds like you're just mad because you're bad, but thanks for the advice.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you're just mad because you're bad, but
thanks for the advice.
jpnChrName: ふーん、まあせいぜい心に留めておくよ。 正直、負け惜しみにしか思えないけどねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、まあせいぜい心に留めておくよ。
正直、負け惜しみにしか思えないけどねェ。

engChrName: Hate to say it, but I'm just built different from most of the players here.
engSearchText:
Hate to say it, but I'm just built different from most
of the players here.
jpnChrName: ま、オレの場合は見ての通り センスがあるってヤツだからね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、オレの場合は見ての通り
センスがあるってヤツだからね。

engChrName: Anybody can practice here, of course, but man, sometimes it gets hard to practice with those guys around. I can feel their jealous eyes on me.
engSearchText:
Anybody can practice here, of course, but man,
sometimes it gets hard to practice with those
guys around. I can feel their jealous eyes on me.
jpnChrName: 他の人が努力すんのは勝手だけど、 オレのセンスに嫉妬すんのも見苦しくない？
jpnSearchText:
他の人が努力すんのは勝手だけど、
オレのセンスに嫉妬すんのも見苦しくない？

engChrName: Is Simon really the only player good enough for me? I don't care if it's somebody talented or just a physical freak, just give me something!
engSearchText:
Is Simon really the only player good enough for me?
I don't care if it's somebody talented or just a physical
freak, just give me something!
jpnChrName: あーあ、別に天才型でも努力型でも何でもいいけど サイモン以外に歯ごたえある相手いないかなァ？
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、別に天才型でも努力型でも何でもいいけど
サイモン以外に歯ごたえある相手いないかなァ？

engChrName: Well, whatever. Two-on-one is fine by me—these guys can't beat me one-on-one.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. Two-on-one is fine by me—these
guys can't beat me one-on-one.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、２人がかりで来なよ。 １ｏｎ１じゃ物足りないからさァ。
jpnSearchText:
いいぜ、２人がかりで来なよ。
１ｏｎ１じゃ物足りないからさァ。

engChrName: Tch! This little prick's really pissing me off! You watch your mouth, punk!
engSearchText:
Tch! This little prick's really pissing me off!
You watch your mouth, punk!
jpnChrName: チッ……ガキの癖に クソ生意気だな、テメーはよ……！
jpnSearchText:
チッ……ガキの癖に
クソ生意気だな、テメーはよ……！

engChrName: Don't try him, he's not all talk. I heard they're gonna start giving him minutes on the team.
engSearchText:
Don't try him, he's not all talk. I heard they're gonna
start giving him minutes on the team.
jpnChrName: 油断すんなよ、こいつ強えーぞ。 今度レギュラー入りするらしいからな。
jpnSearchText:
油断すんなよ、こいつ強えーぞ。
今度レギュラー入りするらしいからな。

engChrName: What, with his height? Pssh.
engSearchText: What, with his height? Pssh.
jpnChrName: マジかよ、このタッパでか！？
jpnSearchText: マジかよ、このタッパでか！？

engChrName: ...You wanna say that again? I'll dunk on your ass, buddy.
engSearchText:
...You wanna say that again? I'll dunk on your
ass, buddy.
jpnChrName: ──今、チビって言った？ マジで泣かすよ……？
jpnSearchText:
──今、チビって言った？
マジで泣かすよ……？

engChrName: I didn't say nothin'!
engSearchText: I didn't say nothin'!
jpnChrName: 言ってねーだろ、一言も！！
jpnSearchText: <S4>言ってねーだろ、一言も！！

engChrName: Huh? What do you want? Would you mind staying out of my way?
engSearchText:
Huh? What do you want? Would you mind staying
out of my way?
jpnChrName: なに、アンタたち。 オレらの邪魔しないでくれる？
jpnSearchText:
なに、アンタたち。
オレらの邪魔しないでくれる？

engChrName: This court isn't for amateurs.
engSearchText: This court isn't for amateurs.
jpnChrName: 素人はお呼びじゃないんだよね～。
jpnSearchText: 素人はお呼びじゃないんだよね～。

engChrName: Still aloof as ever... Y'know, Kirk, it wouldn't hurt to let us know how you really feel sometimes.
engSearchText:
Still aloof as ever... Y'know, Kirk, it wouldn't hurt to
let us know how you really feel sometimes.
jpnChrName: カークも相変わらずだねー、こういう時こそ 素直になっても良いと思うんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
カークも相変わらずだねー、こういう時こそ
素直になっても良いと思うんだけど。

engChrName: I'll tag along with Simon if he's heading to the shelter. Helping kids out is my forte!
engSearchText:
I'll tag along with Simon if he's heading to
the shelter. Helping kids out is my forte!
jpnChrName: 何にせよサイモンがどこかの避難所を手伝うなら 私も当然一緒するよ、それこそ得意分野だしね！
jpnSearchText:
何にせよサイモンがどこかの避難所を手伝うなら
私も当然一緒するよ、それこそ得意分野だしね！

engChrName: I've known Simon and all the neighborhood folks basically forever.
engSearchText:
I've known Simon and all the neighborhood folks
basically forever.
jpnChrName: 今となってはサイモンや、親切なご近所の 人たちが私の家族みたいなものだもん。
jpnSearchText:
今となってはサイモンや、親切なご近所の
人たちが私の家族みたいなものだもん。

engChrName: My teammates are great, too, but the neighborhood is like one big family. It's really nice when we can all get together.
engSearchText:
My teammates are great, too, but the neighborhood is
like one big family. It's really nice when we can all
get together.
jpnChrName: チームのみんなも好きだけど、こういう時くらい ご近所さんとも一緒にお祝いしないとねー。
jpnSearchText:
チームのみんなも好きだけど、こういう時くらい
ご近所さんとも一緒にお祝いしないとねー。

engChrName: Tonight, though, I'm heading downtown with Simon. Gotta celebrate with the team this time.
engSearchText:
Tonight, though, I'm heading downtown
with Simon. Gotta celebrate with the team this time.
jpnChrName: 午後はサイモンと一緒に下町に行ってくるよ、 流石に夜はチームの皆とお祝いするけどねっ。
jpnSearchText:
午後はサイモンと一緒に下町に行ってくるよ、
流石に夜はチームの皆とお祝いするけどねっ。

engChrName: I'm glad everyone's back to normal. Gotta keep the team's spirits up!
engSearchText:
I'm glad everyone's back to normal. Gotta keep the
team's spirits up!
jpnChrName: みんないつも通りに調子戻って良かったよ。 このチームのみんなは元気でなくっちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
みんないつも通りに調子戻って良かったよ。
このチームのみんなは元気でなくっちゃ！

engChrName: I need to pitch in, too. They've helped me more times than I can count, so I gotta return the favor!
engSearchText:
I need to pitch in, too. They've helped me
more times than I can count, so I gotta return
the favor!
jpnChrName: うん、それなら私もみんなのために頑張らないと。 私もみんなに元気をもらってるところもあるしね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、それなら私もみんなのために頑張らないと。
私もみんなに元気をもらってるところもあるしね。

engChrName: Right, I'd better help out, too. Whatever it takes to get everybody back on their feet!
engSearchText:
Right, I'd better help out, too. Whatever it takes to
get everybody back on their feet!
jpnChrName: よーし、それじゃあ私もみんなのために、 一層張り切ってサポートしていかないと！
jpnSearchText:
よーし、それじゃあ私もみんなのために、
一層張り切ってサポートしていかないと！

engChrName: I've been through a lot myself...but we can't let it get us down.
engSearchText:
I've been through a lot myself...but we can't let it get
us down.
jpnChrName: ……まあ私は一応、昔も色々あったし へこたれるつもりもないけど……
jpnSearchText:
……まあ私は一応、昔も色々あったし
へこたれるつもりもないけど……

engChrName: Sometimes I worry about Kirk, though. Simon's always saying he's had it easy in life... Does he know how to handle the rough times?
engSearchText:
Sometimes I worry about Kirk, though.
Simon's always saying he's had it easy in life...
Does he know how to handle the rough times?
jpnChrName: カークは大丈夫かな……カークは逆境とかを 知らないんだってサイモンも言うし……
jpnSearchText:
カークは大丈夫かな……カークは逆境とかを
知らないんだってサイモンも言うし……

engChrName: He probably doesn't want me butting in there, but I want to at least be there if he needs help.
engSearchText:
He probably doesn't want me butting in there, but I
want to at least be there if he needs help.
jpnChrName: 世話焼かれるのは嫌いかもだけど、何かあったら 私からもちゃーんとフォローしとかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
世話焼かれるのは嫌いかもだけど、何かあったら
私からもちゃーんとフォローしとかないとね。

engChrName: Wow, a private school student's playing here? You don't see that every day.
engSearchText:
Wow, a private school student's playing here?
You don't see that every day.
jpnChrName: へぇ、珍しい事もあるんだね～。 このコートで、名門の学校の人がなんて。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、珍しい事もあるんだね～。
このコートで、名門の学校の人がなんて。

engChrName: It's nice to sit back and watch other people play every now and then. Looking forward to this one!
engSearchText:
It's nice to sit back and watch other people play every
now and then. Looking forward to this one!
jpnChrName: たまには他の人達のプレイを 見るのも面白そうだし、楽しみ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには他の人達のプレイを
見るのも面白そうだし、楽しみ。

engChrName: Wow, she's good. Really good. I hope I can play like that someday...
engSearchText:
Wow, she's good. Really good. I hope I can play like
that someday...
jpnChrName: あっちの女の人なんて見るからに強そう…… 私もああいう風になれたりするかなー？
jpnSearchText:
あっちの女の人なんて見るからに強そう……
私もああいう風になれたりするかなー？

engChrName: Kirk's got talent, but his stubborn streak isn't making him any friends.
engSearchText:
Kirk's got talent, but his stubborn streak isn't making
him any friends.
jpnChrName: う～ん、カークって強いけど、 やっぱり意地っ張りだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、カークって強いけど、
やっぱり意地っ張りだよね～。

engChrName: Well, aside from Simon and me, anyway. I guess that quirk of his is what makes him interesting, heh heh.
engSearchText:
Well, aside from Simon and me, anyway. I guess that
quirk of his is what makes him interesting, heh heh.
jpnChrName: ふふ、でもそこが面白いのかも。 サイモンも可愛がってるしねー。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、でもそこが面白いのかも。
サイモンも可愛がってるしねー。

engChrName: He acts all standoffish, but then every so often he turns into this spoiled little kid. He just REFUSES to eat peppers, can you believe that?
engSearchText:
He acts all standoffish, but then every so often he
turns into this spoiled little kid. He just REFUSES to
eat peppers, can you believe that?
jpnChrName: カーク、あんな感じだけどピーマンとか 食べられないのも何か可愛いしねー。
jpnSearchText:
カーク、あんな感じだけどピーマンとか
食べられないのも何か可愛いしねー。

engChrName: Hey, knock it off! You're better than that!
engSearchText: Hey, knock it off! You're better than that!
jpnChrName: ケンカはメッ！ みんな仲良く、だよっ！
jpnSearchText:
ケンカはメッ！
みんな仲良く、だよっ！

engChrName: Wha—HE started it!
engSearchText: Wha—HE started it!
jpnChrName: でもよフラゥラ、悪いのはこいつで……！
jpnSearchText: でもよフラゥラ、悪いのはこいつで……！

engChrName: Don't listen to him, Frawla! He's just tilted 'cause he can't beat me fair!
engSearchText:
Don't listen to him, Frawla! He's just tilted 'cause he
can't beat me fair!
jpnChrName: いーや、騙されんなよフラゥラ！ こいつら、実力で勝てねえからって──！
jpnSearchText:
いーや、騙されんなよフラゥラ！
こいつら、実力で勝てねえからって──！

engChrName: You keep arguing and you're on your own for dinner tonight. Maybe for-EVER.
engSearchText:
You keep arguing and you're on your own for
dinner tonight. Maybe for-EVER.
jpnChrName: も～、そんな事言ってたら 今度からゴハン作ってあげないよ～？
jpnSearchText:
も～、そんな事言ってたら
今度からゴハン作ってあげないよ～？

engChrName: H-Hey, keep the dinner out of this...
engSearchText: H-Hey, keep the dinner out of this...
jpnChrName: そ、そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そ、そいつは……

engChrName: Yeah, we're, uh... W-We're still friends! You don't have to do that!
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're, uh... W-We're still friends! You don't
have to do that!
jpnChrName: ちょっと待てって！　別に ゼッコーとは言ってねえっつーか……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと待てって！　別に
ゼッコーとは言ってねえっつーか……！

engChrName: (Huh... The boys hold a lot of respect for her.)
engSearchText: (Huh... The boys hold a lot of respect for her.)
jpnChrName: （この女の子……なんだか   みんなに慕われてるみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（この女の子……なんだか
みんなに慕われてるみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Wow. She looks younger than the boys, but they all respect her. She's really cool!)
engSearchText:
(Wow. She looks younger than the boys, but they all
respect her. She's really cool!)
jpnChrName: （この子、周りの人より   年下なのに凄いですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（この子、周りの人より
年下なのに凄いですね……）

engChrName: (Sounds like she rules the roost around here. Dumbasses all wrapped around her finger.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like she rules the roost around here.
Dumbasses all wrapped around her finger.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……ちびっこいのに   仕切ってるヤツがいるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……ちびっこいのに
仕切ってるヤツがいるみてえだな。）

engChrName: (Guess she's the team manager? Interesting buncha misfits they got here.)
engSearchText:
(Guess she's the team manager? Interesting buncha
misfits they got here.)
jpnChrName: （チームのマネージャーってトコかね。   ……確かに面白い連中ではあるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（チームのマネージャーってトコかね。
……確かに面白い連中ではあるな。）

engChrName: You keep arguing and you're on your own for dinner tonight. Maybe for-EVER.
engSearchText:
You keep arguing and you're on your own for
dinner tonight. Maybe for-EVER.
jpnChrName: も～、そんな事言ってたら 今度からゴハン作ってあげないよ～？
jpnSearchText:
も～、そんな事言ってたら
今度からゴハン作ってあげないよ～？

engChrName: H-Hey, keep the dinner out of this...
engSearchText: H-Hey, keep the dinner out of this...
jpnChrName: そ、そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そ、そいつは……

engChrName: Yeah, we're, uh... W-We're still friends! You don't have to do that!
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're, uh... W-We're still friends! You don't
have to do that!
jpnChrName: ちょっと待てって！　別に ゼッコーとは言ってねえっつーか……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと待てって！　別に
ゼッコーとは言ってねえっつーか……！

engChrName: (Huh... The boys hold a lot of respect for her.)
engSearchText: (Huh... The boys hold a lot of respect for her.)
jpnChrName: （この女の子……なんだか   みんなに慕われてるみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（この女の子……なんだか
みんなに慕われてるみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Wow. She looks younger than the boys, but they all respect her. She's really cool!)
engSearchText:
(Wow. She looks younger than the boys, but they all
respect her. She's really cool!)
jpnChrName: （この子、周りの人より   年下なのに凄いですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（この子、周りの人より
年下なのに凄いですね……）

engChrName: (Sounds like she rules the roost around here. Dumbasses all wrapped around her finger.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like she rules the roost around here.
Dumbasses all wrapped around her finger.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……ちびっこいのに   仕切ってるヤツがいるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……ちびっこいのに
仕切ってるヤツがいるみてえだな。）

engChrName: (Guess she's the team manager? Interesting buncha misfits they got here.)
engSearchText:
(Guess she's the team manager? Interesting buncha
misfits they got here.)
jpnChrName: （チームのマネージャーってトコかね。   ……確かに面白い連中ではあるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（チームのマネージャーってトコかね。
……確かに面白い連中ではあるな。）

engChrName: Hey, thanks for checking up on the apartments, Frawla.
engSearchText:
Hey, thanks for checking up on the
apartments, Frawla.
jpnChrName: フラゥラ、アパートの方の様子を 見てきてくれてありがとよ。
jpnSearchText:
フラゥラ、アパートの方の様子を
見てきてくれてありがとよ。

engChrName: Not that I was worried—those guys're tough as nails. If anybody can fend for themselves, it's them.
engSearchText:
Not that I was worried—those guys're tough as nails.
If anybody can fend for themselves, it's them.
jpnChrName: ま、俺らの住処なくらいだし、どいつも 変わらずしぶとくやれるとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺らの住処なくらいだし、どいつも
変わらずしぶとくやれるとは思うが……

engChrName: Yeah. They were helping each other out, same as always.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They were helping each other out, same
as always.
jpnChrName: うん、皆相変わらずお互いに 助け合ってたみたいだよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、皆相変わらずお互いに
助け合ってたみたいだよ。

engChrName: Once we're done here, I should head over there to see if I can help.
engSearchText:
Once we're done here, I should head over there to see
if I can help.
jpnChrName: 後で私も出来るお手伝いは しにいかないとね～。
jpnSearchText:
後で私も出来るお手伝いは
しにいかないとね～。

engChrName: Incidentally, you two are from the same complex downtown, right?
engSearchText:
Incidentally, you two are from the same complex
downtown, right?
jpnChrName: ああ、そういやサイモンとフラゥラって 下町の同じ集合住宅に住んでるんだっけか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういやサイモンとフラゥラって
下町の同じ集合住宅に住んでるんだっけか？

engChrName: Yup. Different floors, though.
engSearchText: Yup. Different floors, though.
jpnChrName: うん、階が違うけどね。
jpnSearchText: うん、階が違うけどね。

engChrName: Simon used to come check up on me every now and then, after my parents died.
engSearchText:
Simon used to come check up on me every now and
then, after my parents died.
jpnChrName: 両親が亡くなってから、時々面倒を 見に来てくれたりしてたの。
jpnSearchText:
両親が亡くなってから、時々面倒を
見に来てくれたりしてたの。

engChrName: Yeah, I knew her parents pretty well. Funny that she'd wind up here with me on the team... Almost sounds pre-destined, doesn't it?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I knew her parents pretty well. Funny that
she'd wind up here with me on the team...
Almost sounds pre-destined, doesn't it?
jpnChrName: ま、コイツの両親とも一応顔馴染みだったしな。 何かと縁があってこのチームに来たって訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、コイツの両親とも一応顔馴染みだったしな。
何かと縁があってこのチームに来たって訳だ。

engChrName: How about your place, Kirk? I get it's a safe part of town, but you sure you don't need to check in on your folks?
engSearchText:
How about your place, Kirk? I get it's a safe part of
town, but you sure you don't need to check in on
your folks?
jpnChrName: カークのところは……まあ、そこそこ良い家 だっていうしこんな状況でも心配いらないか？
jpnSearchText:
カークのところは……まあ、そこそこ良い家
だっていうしこんな状況でも心配いらないか？

engChrName: I'm sure they're fine, but thank you.
engSearchText: I'm sure they're fine, but thank you.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……心配はいらないぜ。
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……心配はいらないぜ。

engChrName: I imagine they have their hands full, but they don't need me. And I've been fine without them.
engSearchText:
I imagine they have their hands full, but they don't
need me. And I've been fine without them.
jpnChrName: 親はだいぶ忙しそうではあるけどまあ、 オレも親なんていなくても十分やってけるしさ。
jpnSearchText:
親はだいぶ忙しそうではあるけどまあ、
オレも親なんていなくても十分やってけるしさ。

engChrName: Are you...sure, Kirk? You don't look 'fine' to me, being honest.
engSearchText:
Are you...sure, Kirk? You don't look 'fine' to me,
being honest.
jpnChrName: でも……そういうカークも 無理してるように見えるのは気のせい？
jpnSearchText:
でも……そういうカークも
無理してるように見えるのは気のせい？

engChrName: Wha—I mean... Tch! You think I'd lose my cool over something like this? Who do you take me for?!
engSearchText:
Wha—I mean... Tch! You think I'd lose my cool over
something like this? Who do you take me for?!
jpnChrName: ふ、フン……何を！　オレがこの程度で 何を無理するって……！？
jpnSearchText:
ふ、フン……何を！　オレがこの程度で
何を無理するって……！？

engChrName: All right, you two, that's enough! This ain't the time for mouthin' off.
engSearchText:
All right, you two, that's enough! This ain't the time
for mouthin' off.
jpnChrName: ハイハイ、喧嘩はやめ！ 一番不毛な事を今やっても仕方ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハイハイ、喧嘩はやめ！
一番不毛な事を今やっても仕方ねぇ。

engChrName: Don't think we'll be playin' ball anytime soon... Things've really gone to shit.
engSearchText:
Don't think we'll be playin' ball anytime soon...
Things've really gone to shit.
jpnChrName: とにかく──状況が状況だから、 バスケは当分自粛だ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく──状況が状況だから、
バスケは当分自粛だ。

engChrName: Just make sure you've got your neighbors' backs, yeah? Times like these, we all gotta band together.
engSearchText:
Just make sure you've got your neighbors' backs, yeah?
Times like these, we all gotta band together.
jpnChrName: お前らもその間はせいぜい、家族やご近所さんを たまには気遣ってやれ、良いな？
jpnSearchText:
お前らもその間はせいぜい、家族やご近所さんを
たまには気遣ってやれ、良いな？

engChrName: Sorry to make ya worry, Kirk. But we're all accounted for now.
engSearchText:
Sorry to make ya worry, Kirk. But we're all accounted
for now.
jpnChrName: 心配かけて悪かったなカーク。 何とか戻って来れたぜ、今の俺達のホームに。
jpnSearchText:
心配かけて悪かったなカーク。
何とか戻って来れたぜ、今の俺達のホームに。

engChrName: Well, you sure took your sweet time, Simon! I was starting to get worried.
engSearchText:
Well, you sure took your sweet time, Simon! I was
starting to get worried.
jpnChrName: お、遅いんだよサイモン……！ 流石に少しは心配しない事もなかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
お、遅いんだよサイモン……！
流石に少しは心配しない事もなかったからな。

engChrName: And the others are all useless out here.
engSearchText: And the others are all useless out here.
jpnChrName: メンバーの連中も停まっちまってるしさ……
jpnSearchText: メンバーの連中も停まっちまってるしさ……

engChrName: Ah, sorry about that. We had a bit of a close call, but we're safe and sound now!
engSearchText:
Ah, sorry about that. We had a bit of a close call, but
we're safe and sound now!
jpnChrName: あはは、ごめんねカーク。 私達も頑張って逃げてきたんだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、ごめんねカーク。
私達も頑張って逃げてきたんだよ～！

engChrName: Certain somebody just had to stop and help people out.
engSearchText:
Certain somebody just had to stop and help
people out.
jpnChrName: サイモンなんて、途中で 人助けまでしてたし……
jpnSearchText:
サイモンなんて、途中で
人助けまでしてたし……

engChrName: Aww, I didn't do much. Just some stuff here and there—all that basketball's really buffed me up.
engSearchText:
Aww, I didn't do much. Just some stuff here and
there—all that basketball's really buffed me up.
jpnChrName: ま、大した事はしてねぇけどな。 一応、バスケで肩は鍛えられてるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、大した事はしてねぇけどな。
一応、バスケで肩は鍛えられてるからよ。

engChrName: And I just took a free throw or two with some pots and stuff—whatever I could find on the street. That helped distract the bastards a bit.
engSearchText:
And I just took a free throw or two with some pots
and stuff—whatever I could find on the street.
That helped distract the bastards a bit.
jpnChrName: 陶器やら何やら、派手な音がするモンを投げて 化け物の注意を逸らしながら来たってところだ。
jpnSearchText:
陶器やら何やら、派手な音がするモンを投げて
化け物の注意を逸らしながら来たってところだ。

engChrName: I think we got everybody out that we could. I'm glad you're okay, too.
engSearchText:
I think we got everybody out that we could. I'm glad
you're okay, too.
jpnChrName: それで道すがら他の連中にも隙を作ってやったが…… それより、お前こそ無事で何よりだカーク。
jpnSearchText:
それで道すがら他の連中にも隙を作ってやったが……
それより、お前こそ無事で何よりだカーク。

engChrName: And don't sell yourself short—you could've backed up and ran, but you helped out, too. Good job, bud!
engSearchText:
And don't sell yourself short—you could've backed up
and ran, but you helped out, too. Good job, bud!
jpnChrName: チーム連中も大勢停まっちまった中、 よく一人でやったな。
jpnSearchText:
チーム連中も大勢停まっちまった中、
よく一人でやったな。

engChrName: W-Well... Duh! I'm not some helpless kid like you two seem to think!
engSearchText:
W-Well... Duh! I'm not some helpless kid like you
two seem to think!
jpnChrName: う、うるさい……こ、子供扱いするな！ まったく、これだから二人は……
jpnSearchText:
う、うるさい……こ、子供扱いするな！
まったく、これだから二人は……

engChrName: But...admittedly I AM glad we're all here safe and sound.
engSearchText:
But...admittedly I AM glad we're all here safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: でもまあ、この面子で無事に 揃えて良かったよ……
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、この面子で無事に
揃えて良かったよ……

engChrName: Of all the times, why must Trion Tower wait until now to reveal its true splendor? How cruel...
engSearchText:
Of all the times, why must Trion Tower wait until
now to reveal its true splendor? How cruel...
jpnChrName: ……トリオンタワーの秘めた魅力…… 何故かこんな時だからこそ引き立っているような……
jpnSearchText:
……トリオンタワーの秘めた魅力……
何故かこんな時だからこそ引き立っているような……

engChrName: Oh, I just can't stop myself. I simply MUST capture its magnificence!
engSearchText:
Oh, I just can't stop myself. I simply MUST capture
its magnificence!
jpnChrName: くぅ、何とかこのインスピレーションを 絵に落とし込まないとっ！
jpnSearchText:
くぅ、何とかこのインスピレーションを
絵に落とし込まないとっ！

engChrName: The world mustn't forget what has happened here today. I will preserve this chaotic scene for the future to behold!
engSearchText:
The world mustn't forget what has happened
here today. I will preserve this chaotic scene for the
future to behold!
jpnChrName: ――この誰も信じそうにない悪夢の記録を、 作品の中に残して伝えるためにも……！
jpnSearchText:
――この誰も信じそうにない悪夢の記録を、
作品の中に残して伝えるためにも……！

engChrName: I know I shouldn't be poking my head outside right now, but...I swear to you, I saw something in the Tower!
engSearchText:
I know I shouldn't be poking my head outside right
now, but...I swear to you, I saw something in
the Tower!
jpnChrName: 改めて外を観察していて……不謹慎を承知で 言うけど、何かが見えてきた気がするの……
jpnSearchText:
改めて外を観察していて……不謹慎を承知で
言うけど、何かが見えてきた気がするの……

engChrName: Something strange, something...supernatural! Words fail to describe it!
engSearchText:
Something strange, something...supernatural!
Words fail to describe it!
jpnChrName: そう、あのトリオンタワーの本質を見通す ための何か……超常的な何かが……！
jpnSearchText:
そう、あのトリオンタワーの本質を見通す
ための何か……超常的な何かが……！

engChrName: Why...? Oh, WHY must I languish indoors, unable to partake of the tower's beauty?
engSearchText:
Why...? Oh, WHY must I languish indoors, unable
to partake of the tower's beauty?
jpnChrName: くうっ、この状況下でじっくりタワーを 観察しに行けないのが悔しいっ！
jpnSearchText:
くうっ、この状況下でじっくりタワーを
観察しに行けないのが悔しいっ！

engChrName: I can hardly believe my eyes... Has time truly frozen? Are my senses not playing tricks on me?
engSearchText:
I can hardly believe my eyes... Has time truly frozen?
Are my senses not playing tricks on me?
jpnChrName: ……何という事……私の感覚が覚醒したのかと 思ってたら本当に時間が止まってたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……何という事……私の感覚が覚醒したのかと
思ってたら本当に時間が止まってたなんて……

engChrName: I shudder to imagine that had I sat there stunned just a moment longer, I might have fallen prey to some freakish monster, brush and all!
engSearchText:
I shudder to imagine that had I sat there stunned just
a moment longer, I might have fallen prey to some
freakish monster, brush and all!
jpnChrName: あと少し気づくのが遅かったら……筆を持ったまま 化け物に連れ去られるところだったわ……！
jpnSearchText:
あと少し気づくのが遅かったら……筆を持ったまま
化け物に連れ去られるところだったわ……！

engChrName: A dramatic way to go, in retrospect. Poetic, even... but no. My life's work is not yet done. I will—nay, I MUST put that Tower to canvas!
engSearchText:
A dramatic way to go, in retrospect. Poetic, even...
but no. My life's work is not yet done. I will—nay, I
MUST put that Tower to canvas!
jpnChrName: でもそれはそれで芸術家の最期として……いえ、 私にはまだ攻略していないあのタワーがッ！
jpnSearchText:
でもそれはそれで芸術家の最期として……いえ、
私にはまだ攻略していないあのタワーがッ！

engChrName: Something is...missing, I'm afraid. Something vital. I had hoped to weave this festive atmosphere into my work...
engSearchText:
Something is...missing, I'm afraid. Something vital.
I had hoped to weave this festive atmosphere into
my work...
jpnChrName: 何かが……何かが足りない…… 記念祭の空気が作用すると見込んでたのに……
jpnSearchText:
何かが……何かが足りない……
記念祭の空気が作用すると見込んでたのに……

engChrName: ...yet still the Tower eludes my brush! Oh, how I despair...but oh, how sweet the satisfaction will be when I finally tame it!
engSearchText:
...yet still the Tower eludes my brush! Oh, how I
despair...but oh, how sweet the satisfaction will be
when I finally tame it!
jpnChrName: やはりトリオンタワーは最難関……！ それでこそ攻略のし甲斐があるはず……！
jpnSearchText:
やはりトリオンタワーは最難関……！
それでこそ攻略のし甲斐があるはず……！

engChrName: But just what am I missing? What could it be...?
engSearchText: But just what am I missing? What could it be...?
jpnChrName: でも……足りないのは一体……
jpnSearchText: でも……足りないのは一体……

engChrName: I had hoped to finish my painting before the festival, but perhaps it might be better to incorporate it into the painting instead.
engSearchText:
I had hoped to finish my painting before the festival,
but perhaps it might be better to incorporate it into
the painting instead.
jpnChrName: 記念祭までの完成を目標にしていたけど…… むしろ記念祭を挟んでの方が良さそうね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭までの完成を目標にしていたけど……
むしろ記念祭を挟んでの方が良さそうね。

engChrName: Perhaps this jovial air will shine a light on the Tower's true colors—a side I've never seen before.
engSearchText:
Perhaps this jovial air will shine a light on the
Tower's true colors—a side I've never seen before.
jpnChrName: 記念祭なら、トリオンタワーの何か違った 一面とかも見られそうだし……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭なら、トリオンタワーの何か違った
一面とかも見られそうだし……

engChrName: I just have a feeling in my heart of hearts... I know the Tower's up to something! What spectacle does it have in store for me?
engSearchText:
I just have a feeling in my heart of hearts... I know
the Tower's up to something! What spectacle does it
have in store for me?
jpnChrName: 何より、それ以上に何か凄いものを見れるって 芸術家の勘が叫んでいるのよ！
jpnSearchText:
何より、それ以上に何か凄いものを見れるって
芸術家の勘が叫んでいるのよ！

engChrName: The only cure for this ache of mine is to capture that essence for good and all!
engSearchText:
The only cure for this ache of mine is to capture that
essence for good and all!
jpnChrName: なら、それを見てから攻略する他無いじゃない！
jpnSearchText: なら、それを見てから攻略する他無いじゃない！

engChrName: Trion Tower, your time has come! You will be mine this day!
engSearchText:
Trion Tower, your time has come! You will be mine
this day!
jpnChrName: 待っていたわねトリオンタワー！ 今一度改めて攻略してやるわ！
jpnSearchText:
待っていたわねトリオンタワー！
今一度改めて攻略してやるわ！

engChrName: I had to spend a time inside, of course, but I hardly gave in. What, did you think I would? You wound me!
engSearchText:
I had to spend a time inside, of course, but I hardly
gave in. What, did you think I would? You
wound me!
jpnChrName: 流石にこの前までは自粛していたけど、 逃げた訳じゃないのよ、驚いた！？
jpnSearchText:
流石にこの前までは自粛していたけど、
逃げた訳じゃないのよ、驚いた！？

engChrName: This time! THIS time, I will unveil that je ne sais quoi, that mystic aura of yours, and display it for all to see!
engSearchText:
This time! THIS time, I will unveil that je ne sais
quoi, that mystic aura of yours, and display it for all
to see!
jpnChrName: そのよく分かんないオーラ的なサムシング、 今度こそ可視化させてもらうわよ！
jpnSearchText:
そのよく分かんないオーラ的なサムシング、
今度こそ可視化させてもらうわよ！

engChrName: NOOO! I had nearly a fifth of it done!
engSearchText: NOOO! I had nearly a fifth of it done!
jpnChrName: ひ、ひぃぃぃいいい！ せっかくイメージの２割が形になったのに！
jpnSearchText:
ひ、ひぃぃぃいいい！
せっかくイメージの２割が形になったのに！

engChrName: And now I've gone and spilled paint all over it! Mariquita, you bumbling swine!
engSearchText:
And now I've gone and spilled paint all over it!
Mariquita, you bumbling swine!
jpnChrName: 絵具がキャンバスに頭からざっぷりー！
jpnSearchText: 絵具がキャンバスに頭からざっぷりー！

engChrName: The Tower eludes me one more day... I curse the criminals who committed this atrocity!
engSearchText:
The Tower eludes me one more day... I curse the
criminals who committed this atrocity!
jpnChrName: またしても攻略完遂が遠のいて…… 赦せないわ、事件を起こした犯人とやら！
jpnSearchText:
またしても攻略完遂が遠のいて……
赦せないわ、事件を起こした犯人とやら！

engChrName: When I heard the announcement, I was... I was overcome with grief. In my anguish, I spilled my paint bucket!
engSearchText:
When I heard the announcement, I was... I was
overcome with grief. In my anguish, I spilled my
paint bucket!
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の件を聞いて慌てて……絵具を溶かした バケツを絵の上から落としてしまったわ！
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の件を聞いて慌てて……絵具を溶かした
バケツを絵の上から落としてしまったわ！

engChrName: What is this avant-garde bilge on my canvas now? This is no art!
engSearchText:
What is this avant-garde bilge on my canvas now?
This is no art!
jpnChrName: 何よ……こんな似非前衛みたいなものは 私は求めていないというのに！
jpnSearchText:
何よ……こんな似非前衛みたいなものは
私は求めていないというのに！

engChrName: Those fiends who razed the village have TWO crimes to answer for now. The art community shan't forgive them!
engSearchText:
Those fiends who razed the village have TWO crimes
to answer for now. The art community shan't
forgive them!
jpnChrName: 村を焼いた人達……芸術の恨みも買った事を 知って後悔するが良いわ……！
jpnSearchText:
村を焼いた人達……芸術の恨みも買った事を
知って後悔するが良いわ……！

engChrName: Mmgh... I just can't do it. Try as I might, the Tower's mysteries still leave me stumped!
engSearchText:
Mmgh... I just can't do it. Try as I might, the Tower's
mysteries still leave me stumped!
jpnChrName: く……ダメ……何度やってもあの よくわからないオーラが掴めない……！
jpnSearchText:
く……ダメ……何度やってもあの
よくわからないオーラが掴めない……！

engChrName: Goodness, it's been...3 years and 67 days now, by my count, since I last had this severe a case of artist's block. What's gotten into me...?
engSearchText:
Goodness, it's been...3 years and 67 days now, by my
count, since I last had this severe a case of
artist's block. What's gotten into me...?
jpnChrName: 多分、３年と６７日ぶりのスランプよこれ…… どうしたものかしら……
jpnSearchText:
多分、３年と６７日ぶりのスランプよこれ……
どうしたものかしら……

engChrName: I've sunk far too great a cost to turn back now. I WILL conquer the Tower with my trusty brush, Goddess as my witness!
engSearchText:
I've sunk far too great a cost to turn back now.
I WILL conquer the Tower with my trusty brush,
Goddess as my witness!
jpnChrName: トリオンタワーの攻略に色々と賭けて、 他の誘いとかも断っちゃった後なのに……！
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワーの攻略に色々と賭けて、
他の誘いとかも断っちゃった後なのに……！

engChrName: If I could just catch the faintest glimpse, the slightest touch of the Tower's true colors...!
engSearchText:
If I could just catch the faintest glimpse, the slightest
touch of the Tower's true colors...!
jpnChrName: せめて何か……何かトリオンタワーのオーラに 指先だけでも絡まるきっかけがあれば……
jpnSearchText:
せめて何か……何かトリオンタワーのオーラに
指先だけでも絡まるきっかけがあれば……

engChrName: Perhaps I'm looking at it wrong. Maybe I'll know what the Tower truly is if I know what it truly ISN'T—its reverse, so to speak.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I'm looking at it wrong. Maybe I'll know
what the Tower truly is if I know what it truly
ISN'T—its reverse, so to speak.
jpnChrName: 何かあのタワーの……対極概念みたいなものとか、 或いは普段と違う顔とか……
jpnSearchText:
何かあのタワーの……対極概念みたいなものとか、
或いは普段と違う顔とか……

engChrName: If I can change my perception of the Tower like that...then I may very well have a breakthrough on my hands.
engSearchText:
If I can change my perception of the Tower like
that...then I may very well have a breakthrough on
my hands.
jpnChrName: そういうのを見れれば一気にオーラを 巻き取るのが加速しそうな気がするけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういうのを見れれば一気にオーラを
巻き取るのが加速しそうな気がするけど……

engChrName: Hrm... No, it's just... Bah, no, this is a mockery! This isn't the Tower at all!
engSearchText:
Hrm... No, it's just... Bah, no, this is a mockery!
This isn't the Tower at all!
jpnChrName: フーッ、フーッ……！ ダメ、こんなものでは……！
jpnSearchText:
フーッ、フーッ……！
ダメ、こんなものでは……！

engChrName: I have to put my all into this! I MUST put the Tower's mystique to canvas, or that Imperial fop will have me beat at the concours!
engSearchText:
I have to put my all into this! I MUST put the
Tower's mystique to canvas, or that Imperial fop will
have me beat at the concours!
jpnChrName: あの帝国の芸術家に、次の大会で勝つには…… あの塔のオーラの表現に賭けるしか……！
jpnSearchText:
あの帝国の芸術家に、次の大会で勝つには……
あの塔のオーラの表現に賭けるしか……！

engChrName: I can feel burnout creeping into my body, but I BANISH it! I can't give out until I've cracked the Tower's code!
engSearchText:
I can feel burnout creeping into my body, but I
BANISH it! I can't give out until I've cracked the
Tower's code!
jpnChrName: 私の感性、私の脳……どうか焼き切れないで もう少し持ちこたえてッ……！
jpnSearchText:
私の感性、私の脳……どうか焼き切れないで
もう少し持ちこたえてッ……！

engChrName: Art is a subtle thing. Behind the obvious shapes and colors lie abstract feelings and emotions...and that's what makes artwork so important.
engSearchText:
Art is a subtle thing. Behind the obvious shapes and
colors lie abstract feelings and emotions...and that's
what makes artwork so important.
jpnChrName: 芸術って、結局は感じたよくわからない何かを、 絵とかで何となくわかる何かにする事なのよね。
jpnSearchText:
芸術って、結局は感じたよくわからない何かを、
絵とかで何となくわかる何かにする事なのよね。

engChrName: What may appear unimportant on the surface can turn out to be vital in understanding the bigger picture. You need to firmly grasp your subject!
engSearchText:
What may appear unimportant on the surface can turn
out to be vital in understanding the bigger picture.
You need to firmly grasp your subject!
jpnChrName: だからよくわからない変なモノも、描いてて 何か判った感じの手応えがあれば答えに近い証！
jpnSearchText:
だからよくわからない変なモノも、描いてて
何か判った感じの手応えがあれば答えに近い証！

engChrName: And for me, there's no subject more enigmatic than Trion Tower. Something about it just speaks to me, and I'm driven to find out why!
engSearchText:
And for me, there's no subject more enigmatic than
Trion Tower. Something about it just speaks to me,
and I'm driven to find out why!
jpnChrName: で、その最後の砦があのトリオンタワー！ 何か判らないけど、何か感じるのよ私はね。
jpnSearchText:
で、その最後の砦があのトリオンタワー！
何か判らないけど、何か感じるのよ私はね。

engChrName: If I can put that abstract quality to canvas, I'll understand this feeling deep inside me, and share it with the whole world!
engSearchText:
If I can put that abstract quality to canvas, I'll
understand this feeling deep inside me, and share it
with the whole world!
jpnChrName: それを絵にして初めて私も、自分が何を 感じてたか知る事ができるはずだわ！
jpnSearchText:
それを絵にして初めて私も、自分が何を
感じてたか知る事ができるはずだわ！

engChrName: The Tower stands out at night, too. It has this...this je ne sais quoi. This mysterious aura. It's no simple skyscraper, that much is clear.
engSearchText:
The Tower stands out at night, too. It has this...this
je ne sais quoi. This mysterious aura. It's no simple
skyscraper, that much is clear.
jpnChrName: 夜に見えるトリオンタワーも…… 単なるビルとは違う不思議な雰囲気よね。
jpnSearchText:
夜に見えるトリオンタワーも……
単なるビルとは違う不思議な雰囲気よね。

engChrName: And see how today the rain shrouds it. See how it defies our attempts to comprehend it!
engSearchText:
And see how today the rain shrouds it. See how it
defies our attempts to comprehend it!
jpnChrName: しかも今日は雨で霞んで…… くっ、なんて捉えようのない……！
jpnSearchText:
しかも今日は雨で霞んで……
くっ、なんて捉えようのない……！

engChrName: But no, I shall not turn away! With my own two hands and my trusty brush, I shall illuminate the Tower's secret!
engSearchText:
But no, I shall not turn away! With my own two
hands and my trusty brush, I shall illuminate the
Tower's secret!
jpnChrName: いいえ、だからこその攻略よ！ 必ずこの手で絵の中に落とし込んでみせるわ！！
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、だからこその攻略よ！
必ずこの手で絵の中に落とし込んでみせるわ！！

engChrName: I've put many other skyscrapers to canvas before—the Great Spire and Orchis Tower, just to name two.
engSearchText:
I've put many other skyscrapers to canvas before—the
Great Spire and Orchis Tower, just to name two.
jpnChrName: 高層建築自体の絵画は何度か攻略に成功しているわ、 煌天楼とかクロスベルのオルキスタワーとか。
jpnSearchText:
高層建築自体の絵画は何度か攻略に成功しているわ、
煌天楼とかクロスベルのオルキスタワーとか。

engChrName: So I dare say there's not a soul more fit for the task than I. If I can tame Trion Tower, my muse will be freed at last!
engSearchText:
So I dare say there's not a soul more fit for the task
than I. If I can tame Trion Tower, my muse will be
freed at last!
jpnChrName: だからこそ……トリオンタワーさえ攻略すれば、 必ず次こそ挽回できるはずなのよ……！
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ……トリオンタワーさえ攻略すれば、
必ず次こそ挽回できるはずなのよ……！

engChrName: Hrrm... The Tower plays hard to get once again. Elusive as ever, the vixen!
engSearchText:
Hrrm... The Tower plays hard to get once again.
Elusive as ever, the vixen!
jpnChrName: くっ、《トリオンタワー》…… 相変わらず捉えどころの無い構造にオーラ！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、《トリオンタワー》……
相変わらず捉えどころの無い構造にオーラ！

engChrName: But therein lies the value in my efforts to capture its essence!
engSearchText:
But therein lies the value in my efforts to capture
its essence!
jpnChrName: でも、だからこそ絵にしてこの手に 収まるようにする価値があるというもの！
jpnSearchText:
