でも、だからこそ絵にしてこの手に
収まるようにする価値があるというもの！

engChrName: Just you wait. Though fate may tear us apart for now, weep not for me today...
engSearchText:
Just you wait. Though fate may tear us apart for now,
weep not for me today...
jpnChrName: 待っていなさいトリオンタワー、 たとえ遠回りになってもいつか……
jpnSearchText:
待っていなさいトリオンタワー、
たとえ遠回りになってもいつか……

engChrName: ...for I shall return in time and tame you!
engSearchText: ...for I shall return in time and tame you!
jpnChrName: ……いつか“攻略”を成し遂げてみせるわ！
jpnSearchText: ……いつか“攻略”を成し遂げてみせるわ！

engChrName: For what else can I call the art of exposing your true nature? Capturing your most primal essence? Laying your secret bare for the world to see?
engSearchText:
For what else can I call the art of exposing your
true nature? Capturing your most primal essence?
Laying your secret bare for the world to see?
jpnChrName: 捉えどころの無い題材の、特徴を捉えて 人の心に残る絵に変えるのが芸術なら……
jpnSearchText:
捉えどころの無い題材の、特徴を捉えて
人の心に残る絵に変えるのが芸術なら……

engChrName: Just as the beastmaster tames the majestic lions and tigers, I shall bring you to my heel!
engSearchText:
Just as the beastmaster tames the majestic lions and
tigers, I shall bring you to my heel!
jpnChrName: これを“攻略”と言わずして何というかしら！
jpnSearchText: これを“攻略”と言わずして何というかしら！

engChrName: Trion Tower, my respect to you—you have proven my most challenging foe yet. But that only motivates me further! I WILL surpass you!
engSearchText:
Trion Tower, my respect to you—you have proven
my most challenging foe yet. But that only motivates
me further! I WILL surpass you!
jpnChrName: トリオンタワー……あの難関を攻略すれば、 私もきっと、次こそは……！
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワー……あの難関を攻略すれば、
私もきっと、次こそは……！

engChrName: I haven't wrapped my head all the way around our strategy as of yet.
engSearchText:
I haven't wrapped my head all the way around our
strategy as of yet.
jpnChrName: 作戦の詳細については自分はまだ 把握しきれていないですが……
jpnSearchText:
作戦の詳細については自分はまだ
把握しきれていないですが……

engChrName: But the inspector is back in town, and the force is slowly reassembling. Soon enough, we'll be able to move out and get to work.
engSearchText:
But the inspector is back in town, and the force is
slowly reassembling. Soon enough, we'll be able to
move out and get to work.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部も帰還され、警察もある程度 組織だって動けるくらいには持ち直しています。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部も帰還され、警察もある程度
組織だって動けるくらいには持ち直しています。

engChrName: No matter what comes our way, we still have a duty to uphold: to protect the people of Edith!
engSearchText:
No matter what comes our way, we still have a duty
to uphold: to protect the people of Edith!
jpnChrName: ……この先何があるにせよ……やはり市民の 安全を守るのは自分達警察の使命ですから！
jpnSearchText:
……この先何があるにせよ……やはり市民の
安全を守るのは自分達警察の使命ですから！

engChrName: No offense, but it kinda surprised me to hear that you guys helped get everything under control.
engSearchText:
No offense, but it kinda surprised me to hear that you
guys helped get everything under control.
jpnChrName: ……まさか、皆さんが事態の鎮静化に 貢献して下さるとは……
jpnSearchText:
……まさか、皆さんが事態の鎮静化に
貢献して下さるとは……

engChrName: And not just you, either. Heiyue, the church, even Crown Prince Sherid... Everybody's pitching in to take the city back.
engSearchText:
And not just you, either. Heiyue, the church, even
Crown Prince Sherid... Everybody's pitching in to
take the city back.
jpnChrName: あなた達だけでなく、シェリド殿下や黒月に 教会の方もこの地区の解放を……
jpnSearchText:
あなた達だけでなく、シェリド殿下や黒月に
教会の方もこの地区の解放を……

engChrName: You bet we're gonna follow suit—we can't drag our feet when everybody else is stepping up.
engSearchText:
You bet we're gonna follow suit—we can't drag our
feet when everybody else is stepping up.
jpnChrName: ──となればやはり自分達警察も 手をこまねいている訳にはいきません。
jpnSearchText:
──となればやはり自分達警察も
手をこまねいている訳にはいきません。

engChrName: Thanks to you, we've got the police station back— and after I got back in contact with the force, we finally got to work together!
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, we've got the police station back—
and after I got back in contact with the force, we
finally got to work together!
jpnChrName: お陰様で警察署も解放し、仲間とも合流 出来ましたし、自分も警察の一員として……！
jpnSearchText:
お陰様で警察署も解放し、仲間とも合流
出来ましたし、自分も警察の一員として……！

engChrName: Thank the Goddess I happened to be heading this way—I was in the right place at the right time.
engSearchText:
Thank the Goddess I happened to be heading this
way—I was in the right place at the right time.
jpnChrName: ……たまたま自分がこちらに出向いていて 良かったです、守備のお役に立てて……
jpnSearchText:
……たまたま自分がこちらに出向いていて
良かったです、守備のお役に立てて……

engChrName: We're stuck between a rock and a hard place... Forcing our way into the station is too dangerous, but we're sitting ducks with Polanski here.
engSearchText:
We're stuck between a rock and a hard place...
Forcing our way into the station is too dangerous, but
we're sitting ducks with Polanski here.
jpnChrName: 警察署の方に無理に戻るのは危険そうですが…… ここにはポランスキー議員などもいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
警察署の方に無理に戻るのは危険そうですが……
ここにはポランスキー議員などもいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: Maybe this was fated... I almost feel like Aidios herself guided me here to fulfill my duty.
engSearchText:
Maybe this was fated... I almost feel like Aidios
herself guided me here to fulfill my duty.
jpnChrName: 自分がここに来たのも、警官として使命を 果たすための女神様の導きかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
自分がここに来たのも、警官として使命を
果たすための女神様の導きかもしれません。

engChrName: I'm gonna form up with the hotel guards and keep this area secure!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna form up with the hotel guards and keep
this area secure!
jpnChrName: ホテルの警備員とも共同して、 この場は自分なりに守り通してみせます！
jpnSearchText:
ホテルの警備員とも共同して、
この場は自分なりに守り通してみせます！

engChrName: This is my first year getting assigned to security detail for the festival. It's a real doozy.
engSearchText:
This is my first year getting assigned to security detail
for the festival. It's a real doozy.
jpnChrName: 記念祭当日の警備に当たるのは、自分も 今年が初になりますが……やはり大変ですね。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭当日の警備に当たるのは、自分も
今年が初になりますが……やはり大変ですね。

engChrName: I've been running around everywhere, helping everybody with everything...
engSearchText:
I've been running around everywhere, helping
everybody with everything...
jpnChrName: 外国から来た人への対応や、イベントの混雑での トラブルの相談に来る方も多くいますし……
jpnSearchText:
外国から来た人への対応や、イベントの混雑での
トラブルの相談に来る方も多くいますし……

engChrName: ...but that's my job, after all. I'm here to help the people of this fine city!
engSearchText:
...but that's my job, after all. I'm here to help the
people of this fine city!
jpnChrName: ですが、それでこそお役に立てていると、 平和を守っていると自認できるものです！
jpnSearchText:
ですが、それでこそお役に立てていると、
平和を守っていると自認できるものです！

engChrName: There's still quite a bit more festival to go, so I gotta keep at the grind until it's all wrapped up!
engSearchText:
There's still quite a bit more festival to go, so I gotta
keep at the grind until it's all wrapped up!
jpnChrName: 残りの時間もまだまだありますが、 最後までしっかりやりきりますよ！
jpnSearchText:
残りの時間もまだまだありますが、
最後までしっかりやりきりますよ！

engChrName: The festival was already close to the President's heart, but after...everything, I think everybody's wanted this even more than usual.
engSearchText:
The festival was already close to the President's heart,
but after...everything, I think everybody's wanted this
even more than usual.
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭は元より大統領の肝いりですが、国難を 乗り越えた後です、一層期待も高いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭は元より大統領の肝いりですが、国難を
乗り越えた後です、一層期待も高いでしょう。

engChrName: It's been a big ask for us here at the force, but we're taking it in stride. Everybody old and young is really putting their backs into it.
engSearchText:
It's been a big ask for us here at the force, but we're
taking it in stride. Everybody old and young is really
putting their backs into it.
jpnChrName: 警察では自分の先輩も同期も皆張り切っています。 大変とはいえ、それに見合う意義がありますしね。
jpnSearchText:
警察では自分の先輩も同期も皆張り切っています。
大変とはいえ、それに見合う意義がありますしね。

engChrName: We're not gonna let some seedy evildoer undermine this festival—not after everything Calvard's been through!
engSearchText:
We're not gonna let some seedy evildoer undermine
this festival—not after everything Calvard's
been through!
jpnChrName: 盛大な記念祭を決して事故や犯罪で 台無しにされないよう、精一杯警備に励みますよ！
jpnSearchText:
盛大な記念祭を決して事故や犯罪で
台無しにされないよう、精一杯警備に励みますよ！

engChrName: I've heard we're about done rounding up the Almata stragglers around the capital.
engSearchText:
I've heard we're about done rounding up the Almata
stragglers around the capital.
jpnChrName: 首都内でもアルマータの関係者の検挙は ほぼ完了したと聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
首都内でもアルマータの関係者の検挙は
ほぼ完了したと聞きました。

engChrName: Serves 'em right. Justice always prevails! It's just... Just a shame we couldn't do anything about it earlier. All those we lost...
engSearchText:
Serves 'em right. Justice always prevails! It's just...
Just a shame we couldn't do anything about it earlier.
All those we lost...
jpnChrName: やはり正義は勝つのですね……！ もっとも、失われた命は戻りませんが……
jpnSearchText:
やはり正義は勝つのですね……！
もっとも、失われた命は戻りませんが……

engChrName: But it really warms my heart to see the citizens banding together and keeping things under control throughout the state of emergency.
engSearchText:
But it really warms my heart to see the citizens
banding together and keeping things under control
throughout the state of emergency.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、しっかり非常事態宣言に協力し、 秩序を守ってくれた市民にも感謝したいです。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、しっかり非常事態宣言に協力し、
秩序を守ってくれた市民にも感謝したいです。

engChrName: Just goes to show that when the police, the bracers, and the public put their minds together, there's nothing they can't do!
engSearchText:
Just goes to show that when the police, the bracers,
and the public put their minds together, there's
nothing they can't do!
jpnChrName: 共和国の市民と警察、そしてギルドなどが 力を合わせて巨悪に勝ったと言えますよ！
jpnSearchText:
共和国の市民と警察、そしてギルドなどが
力を合わせて巨悪に勝ったと言えますよ！

engChrName: We're not out of the woods yet, though: we've got the festival coming up, and that's always a doozy for us cops.
engSearchText:
We're not out of the woods yet, though: we've got the
festival coming up, and that's always a doozy for
us cops.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、もうすぐ記念祭の警備もありますし、 まだまだ気を抜く訳にはいきません。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、もうすぐ記念祭の警備もありますし、
まだまだ気を抜く訳にはいきません。

engChrName: After everything we've been through, we all need a break like this. I want everyone to enjoy it to the fullest.
engSearchText:
After everything we've been through, we all need a
break like this. I want everyone to enjoy it to
the fullest.
jpnChrName: 大きな国難を乗り越えた後の記念祭ですしね、 安心して享受できるものにしたいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
大きな国難を乗り越えた後の記念祭ですしね、
安心して享受できるものにしたいですよ。

engChrName: I knew Almata were scum, but THIS...?!
engSearchText: I knew Almata were scum, but THIS...?!
jpnChrName: アルマータ……とんでもない奴らだとは 思っていましたが、まさかここまで……！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ……とんでもない奴らだとは
思っていましたが、まさかここまで……！

engChrName: Despicable bastards... Goddess have mercy, because I won't! I say we round 'em up and give 'em the firing squad!
engSearchText:
Despicable bastards... Goddess have mercy, because
I won't! I say we round 'em up and give 'em the
firing squad!
jpnChrName: 奴らが許されて良いはずはありません！ 何としてでも捕らえて極刑に処さねば……！
jpnSearchText:
奴らが許されて良いはずはありません！
何としてでも捕らえて極刑に処さねば……！

engChrName: The public needs to work with us on this. We have to take those scum down!
engSearchText:
The public needs to work with us on this. We have to
take those scum down!
jpnChrName: そのためにも、市民の皆さまにはご協力を お願いいたします！
jpnSearchText:
そのためにも、市民の皆さまにはご協力を
お願いいたします！

engChrName: I know things will get a bit tight under the state of emergency, but just trust in us to restore order.
engSearchText:
I know things will get a bit tight under the state of
emergency, but just trust in us to restore order.
jpnChrName: しばらくは窮屈な生活になるかもしれないですが、 きっと警察が平和を取り戻しますから……！
jpnSearchText:
しばらくは窮屈な生活になるかもしれないですが、
きっと警察が平和を取り戻しますから……！

engChrName: So I've been hearing less and less about Grimcat lately... Wonder what's up with her?
engSearchText:
So I've been hearing less and less about
Grimcat lately... Wonder what's up with her?
jpnChrName: そういえばグリムキャッツって最近は出没が 減りましたが、結局どうなったんですかね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばグリムキャッツって最近は出没が
減りましたが、結局どうなったんですかね？

engChrName: Not that I'm complaining, honestly. I think it'd be best for everybody if she just up and got gone.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm complaining, honestly. I think it'd be
best for everybody if she just up and got gone.
jpnChrName: まあ、ウワサも色々あるようですが…… このままいなくなるなら何よりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ウワサも色々あるようですが……
このままいなくなるなら何よりですよ。

engChrName: Her being this 'gentlewoman thief' and all makes it awkward trying to arrest her, because it's still a crime. Just a celebrated one.
engSearchText:
Her being this 'gentlewoman thief' and all makes it
awkward trying to arrest her, because it's still a crime.
Just a celebrated one.
jpnChrName: 盗賊とは言え義賊となると、何だか普通に 逮捕をするのも少し気が引けますが……
jpnSearchText:
盗賊とは言え義賊となると、何だか普通に
逮捕をするのも少し気が引けますが……

engChrName: We can't just look the other way when she robs some fat cat, despite the morality of it all.
engSearchText:
We can't just look the other way when she robs some
fat cat, despite the morality of it all.
jpnChrName: かといって、このまま盗難被害が 出続けるのも許されませんからね。
jpnSearchText:
かといって、このまま盗難被害が
出続けるのも許されませんからね。

engChrName: I heard Almata was behind those terrorist attacks on Basel and Anchorville...
engSearchText:
I heard Almata was behind those terrorist attacks on
Basel and Anchorville...
jpnChrName: この前のバーゼルとアンカーヴィルでのテロ、 またしても黒幕はアルマータだったそうで……
jpnSearchText:
この前のバーゼルとアンカーヴィルでのテロ、
またしても黒幕はアルマータだったそうで……

engChrName: Scum bastards. We gotta tighten up our security to make sure they won't weasel their way into Edith!
engSearchText:
Scum bastards. We gotta tighten up our security to
make sure they won't weasel their way into Edith!
jpnChrName: 本当に許しがたい連中です、首都で同じような事件を 起こされるのは何としても防がないと……！
jpnSearchText:
本当に許しがたい連中です、首都で同じような事件を
起こされるのは何としても防がないと……！

engChrName: I did hear, though, that it was a private company that got Basel back under control, and not the police.
engSearchText:
I did hear, though, that it was a private company that
got Basel back under control, and not the police.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、バーゼルの方では最近たまに聞く、 例の民間警備会社が事態収束に対応したとか。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、バーゼルの方では最近たまに聞く、
例の民間警備会社が事態収束に対応したとか。

engChrName: I can't complain, as long as they're keeping the public safe...but I wish the force could've put on a better show there.
engSearchText:
I can't complain, as long as they're keeping the public
safe...but I wish the force could've put on a better
show there.
jpnChrName: 市民の安全を思えば仕方ないとはいえ…… 警察官としてはどうもやるせないというか……
jpnSearchText:
市民の安全を思えば仕方ないとはいえ……
警察官としてはどうもやるせないというか……

engChrName: That new mafia, Almata... They've really gone and wrought havoc on Edith.
engSearchText:
That new mafia, Almata... They've really gone and
wrought havoc on Edith.
jpnChrName: アルマータというマフィアのシノギ、 首都でも結構被害があるようですね……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータというマフィアのシノギ、
首都でも結構被害があるようですね……

engChrName: Those guys have no moral compass at all. Peddling drugs, extorting money from innocent people... Tch!
engSearchText:
Those guys have no moral compass at all.
Peddling drugs, extorting money from
innocent people... Tch!
jpnChrName: 詐欺にしても薬物にしても平気で一般市民を 食い物にするなんて……まったく許せません！
jpnSearchText:
詐欺にしても薬物にしても平気で一般市民を
食い物にするなんて……まったく許せません！

engChrName: Make sure that you don't get tangled up in one of their schemes. They're getting more crafty by the day.
engSearchText:
Make sure that you don't get tangled up in one of
their schemes. They're getting more crafty by the day.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも、騙されないよう気をつけてください。 最近は本当に巧妙なものも多いらしいので……！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも、騙されないよう気をつけてください。
最近は本当に巧妙なものも多いらしいので……！

engChrName: Now, we're no strangers to dealing with smugglers and gangs here in Edith. That just comes with the territory.
engSearchText:
Now, we're no strangers to dealing with smugglers
and gangs here in Edith. That just comes with
the territory.
jpnChrName: それにしても、この首都でも密売人や 半グレのチームも度々問題を起こしますが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、この首都でも密売人や
半グレのチームも度々問題を起こしますが……

engChrName: But how're they lighting the whole black market on fire like that...?
engSearchText:
But how're they lighting the whole black market on
fire like that...?
jpnChrName: 彼らは普段、どこに潜伏して、どういった ルートで禁制品を仕入れているのでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
彼らは普段、どこに潜伏して、どういった
ルートで禁制品を仕入れているのでしょう？

engChrName: Unless they've got some kinda stash or hideout in Edith, it just doesn't add up.
engSearchText:
Unless they've got some kinda stash or hideout in
Edith, it just doesn't add up.
jpnChrName: どうも、首都のどこかに隠れ場所が 無いと数が合わない気もするし……
jpnSearchText:
どうも、首都のどこかに隠れ場所が
無いと数が合わない気もするし……

engChrName: It gets quiet around here at night, and that can be a bit disconcerting, but it's still pretty safe to walk here.
engSearchText:
It gets quiet around here at night, and that can be a
bit disconcerting, but it's still pretty safe to walk here.
jpnChrName: ここはビジネス街ですし、夜はやや閑散としますが、 比較的安心して歩けるのではないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ここはビジネス街ですし、夜はやや閑散としますが、
比較的安心して歩けるのではないでしょうか。

engChrName: There's this basketball court in the alley over there, you get some punkish types around there. But they usually keep to themselves.
engSearchText:
There's this basketball court in the alley over there,
you get some punkish types around there. But they
usually keep to themselves.
jpnChrName: 路地裏のバスケコートにはやんちゃな若者も たむろしますが、迷惑は特にかけませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
路地裏のバスケコートにはやんちゃな若者も
たむろしますが、迷惑は特にかけませんしね。

engChrName: I heard there was a terrorist attack in Seiden a while ago... Too close to home. Hope we can keep things under control now.
engSearchText:
I heard there was a terrorist attack in Seiden a
while ago... Too close to home. Hope we can keep
things under control now.
jpnChrName: もっとも、昔はこのサイデンもテロがあったりした らしいですし……今の平和を守りたいですよね。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、昔はこのサイデンもテロがあったりした
らしいですし……今の平和を守りたいですよね。

engChrName: So you know that Grimcat lady everyone's talking about? I swear I saw something fitting her description the other night.
engSearchText:
So you know that Grimcat lady everyone's
talking about? I swear I saw something fitting her
description the other night.
jpnChrName: そういえばたまに噂になるグリムキャッツ…… 実はそれらしい影を、ここで見た事がありまして……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばたまに噂になるグリムキャッツ……
実はそれらしい影を、ここで見た事がありまして……

engChrName: Can't see anybody else just leaping between buildings like that. I went and reported it, but we don't have any other leads for now.
engSearchText:
Can't see anybody else just leaping between buildings
like that. I went and reported it, but we don't have
any other leads for now.
jpnChrName: ビルの間を飛び回る人影なんて他に考えられないし、 報告はしましたが……未だ尻尾は掴めないようで。
jpnSearchText:
ビルの間を飛び回る人影なんて他に考えられないし、
報告はしましたが……未だ尻尾は掴めないようで。

engChrName: People are all, 'She only steals from people who deserve it!' But a thief is still a thief—she's not above the law!
engSearchText:
People are all, 'She only steals from people who
deserve it!' But a thief is still a thief—she's not above
the law!
jpnChrName: 義賊とは言いますが……盗賊に違いは無いですしね。 警察として見てみぬふりという訳にはいきません！
jpnSearchText:
義賊とは言いますが……盗賊に違いは無いですしね。
警察として見てみぬふりという訳にはいきません！

engChrName: Welcome to the Seiden headquarters of the Edith Police Department. Whatever you need, from civil disturbances to full-blown felonies, you come to us.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Seiden headquarters of the Edith
Police Department. Whatever you need, from civil
disturbances to full-blown felonies, you come to us.
jpnChrName: 首都警察・サイデン本署にご用事ですか？ 何か困り事があれば遠慮なく言って下さい。
jpnSearchText:
首都警察・サイデン本署にご用事ですか？
何か困り事があれば遠慮なく言って下さい。

engChrName: Crime's been on the up and up lately... Got some real seedy business ventures in town. We've been swamped.
engSearchText:
Crime's been on the up and up lately... Got some real
seedy business ventures in town. We've
been swamped.
jpnChrName: 最近は物騒な事件や、新手の悪徳商法もあり、 警察署に相談に来る方も前より多いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は物騒な事件や、新手の悪徳商法もあり、
警察署に相談に来る方も前より多いですよ。

engChrName: So you might need to wait a little bit before we can get to you, but just give us time and we'll tackle your problem.
engSearchText:
So you might need to wait a little bit before we can
get to you, but just give us time and we'll tackle
your problem.
jpnChrName: そのため多少は待つかもしれないですが、警察は 誠心誠意、市民の安全のため向き合いますので！
jpnSearchText:
そのため多少は待つかもしれないですが、警察は
誠心誠意、市民の安全のため向き合いますので！

engChrName: Seiden District is home to the police HQ, so that naturally makes it the safest district in town.
engSearchText:
Seiden District is home to the police HQ, so that
naturally makes it the safest district in town.
jpnChrName: ここサイデン地区は警察の本署もあるため、 首都の中でも特に治安は良い方のはずです。
jpnSearchText:
ここサイデン地区は警察の本署もあるため、
首都の中でも特に治安は良い方のはずです。

engChrName: I heard other districts haven't been so lucky as of late—got gangsters pourin' out of the woodwork.
engSearchText:
I heard other districts haven't been so lucky as of
late—got gangsters pourin' out of the woodwork.
jpnChrName: 最近は他の街区だと、半グレの類が 出没する事も多くなったと聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
最近は他の街区だと、半グレの類が
出没する事も多くなったと聞きます。

engChrName: Every district should be as safe as Seiden, that's our goal. I can't wait to get my own beat and start helping out.
engSearchText:
Every district should be as safe as Seiden, that's
our goal. I can't wait to get my own beat and start
helping out.
jpnChrName: まあ、他の街区の治安もより良くしたいですしね。 自分も早く一人前になって貢献したいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、他の街区の治安もより良くしたいですしね。
自分も早く一人前になって貢献したいですよ。

engChrName: I'm seeing taxi drivers and delivery folks are using their cars to help people out.
engSearchText:
I'm seeing taxi drivers and delivery folks are using
their cars to help people out.
jpnChrName: 走り屋とかタクシードライバーの人とかが、 今もあちこちで活躍してるって聞いた……
jpnSearchText:
走り屋とかタクシードライバーの人とかが、
今もあちこちで活躍してるって聞いた……

engChrName: Man, if I just had a car and a license, I could be out there helping, too!
engSearchText:
Man, if I just had a car and a license, I could be out
there helping, too!
jpnChrName: くぅ、僕も車と免許があれば、 こんな時でも役に立てたのに……！
jpnSearchText:
くぅ、僕も車と免許があれば、
こんな時でも役に立てたのに……！

engChrName: I mean, hopefully this doesn't happen again...
engSearchText: I mean, hopefully this doesn't happen again...
jpnChrName: こういう事は二度と無いのが一番ではあるけど……
jpnSearchText: こういう事は二度と無いのが一番ではあるけど……

engChrName: ...but IF it does, having a car for it would be great!
engSearchText: ...but IF it does, having a car for it would be great!
jpnChrName: いざという時に役に立てるなら、やっぱり オレも早く車を持てるようになりたいよ！
jpnSearchText:
いざという時に役に立てるなら、やっぱり
オレも早く車を持てるようになりたいよ！

engChrName: I just happened to be passing by, and everybody was just...stopped. Like time froze or something.
engSearchText:
I just happened to be passing by, and everybody was
just...stopped. Like time froze or something.
jpnChrName: ……たまたまこっちに来ていた時に 皆止まっちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
……たまたまこっちに来ていた時に
皆止まっちゃって……

engChrName: I hope everybody at the dealership is okay... The people there at the shop look like they're frozen. It's really freaky...
engSearchText:
I hope everybody at the dealership is okay...
The people there at the shop look like they're frozen.
It's really freaky...
jpnChrName: ディーラーの方は大丈夫かな……お店の人、 皆止まっちゃってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ディーラーの方は大丈夫かな……お店の人、
皆止まっちゃってたけど……

engChrName: That place has those huge glass windows, so it's probably not the best place to try to hole up.
engSearchText:
That place has those huge glass windows, so it's
probably not the best place to try to hole up.
jpnChrName: ガラス張りだし、立てこもるのにも 向いていないだろうし……
jpnSearchText:
ガラス張りだし、立てこもるのにも
向いていないだろうし……

engChrName: Maaan, those new tanks are baller! I mean, what's not to love about tanks? They're like big, badass versions of cars!
engSearchText:
Maaan, those new tanks are baller! I mean, what's not
to love about tanks? They're like big, badass versions
of cars!
jpnChrName: 新型戦車……すごいカッコ良かったよな！ 戦車も導力車の一種、車好きにはたまらないよ！
jpnSearchText:
新型戦車……すごいカッコ良かったよな！
戦車も導力車の一種、車好きにはたまらないよ！

engChrName: Or, our tanks, anyway. Unlike those Erebonian models, ours have wheels and not tracks, so they're closer to cars like that.
engSearchText:
Or, our tanks, anyway. Unlike those Erebonian
models, ours have wheels and not tracks, so they're
closer to cars like that.
jpnChrName: ほら、共和国の戦車は帝国と違って装輪式だし、 車の技術とも結びつきが強いっていうし。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、共和国の戦車は帝国と違って装輪式だし、
車の技術とも結びつきが強いっていうし。

engChrName: Man, if they can make tanks like that, I can't wait to see what kind of cars they come up with next!
engSearchText:
Man, if they can make tanks like that, I can't wait to
see what kind of cars they come up with next!
jpnChrName: あんな戦車を見せられたら……今後どんな 導力車が作られるか、一層期待しちゃうな！
jpnSearchText:
あんな戦車を見せられたら……今後どんな
導力車が作られるか、一層期待しちゃうな！

engChrName: The festival really is the end of the year, both physically and metaphorically. It's out with the old and in with the new.
engSearchText:
The festival really is the end of the year, both
physically and metaphorically. It's out with the old
and in with the new.
jpnChrName: しかし記念祭って事はもうすぐ 一年が終わるんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし記念祭って事はもうすぐ
一年が終わるんだよなぁ。

engChrName: And that means the new model year of cars is coming up. Oh, man, I can't wait...
engSearchText:
And that means the new model year of cars is
coming up. Oh, man, I can't wait...
jpnChrName: 本当なら来年発表される車のラインナップとか 色々楽しみだったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
本当なら来年発表される車のラインナップとか
色々楽しみだったんだけど……

engChrName: But with the CEO of ETWS getting arrested and all, that's gotta change the automotive landscape for the year, no?
engSearchText:
But with the CEO of ETWS getting arrested and all,
that's gotta change the automotive landscape for the
year, no?
jpnChrName: エトワスの社長が逮捕されちゃったし、 来年の車業界どうなるかわからないしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
エトワスの社長が逮捕されちゃったし、
来年の車業界どうなるかわからないしなぁ……

engChrName: Y'know, that Lugan guy isn't so bad after all. He's got a lot more heart than I gave him credit for.
engSearchText:
Y'know, that Lugan guy isn't so bad after all. He's got
a lot more heart than I gave him credit for.
jpnChrName: マクシム・ルーガン……見直したよ、 思ってたよりも誠実じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
マクシム・ルーガン……見直したよ、
思ってたよりも誠実じゃないか。

engChrName: I feel kinda bad for just taking those Buzzraider rumors at face value. I judged him unfairly.
engSearchText:
I feel kinda bad for just taking those Buzzraider
rumors at face value. I judged him unfairly.
jpnChrName: バズレイダーの流したウワサを真に受けて 失望してたのもなんか悪い気がしてきたな……
jpnSearchText:
バズレイダーの流したウワサを真に受けて
失望してたのもなんか悪い気がしてきたな……

engChrName: And he can always patch up his reputation out on the track. He's still the Comet, after all.
engSearchText:
And he can always patch up his reputation out on
the track. He's still the Comet, after all.
jpnChrName: まあ、何であれあの人が《流星》なのには 変わりはないしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何であれあの人が《流星》なのには
変わりはないしね。

engChrName: As a Z1 fan and a gearhead, I can't wait to see him get back behind the wheel.
engSearchText:
As a Z1 fan and a gearhead, I can't wait to see him
get back behind the wheel.
jpnChrName: 車とＺ１を愛する者として、 改めて応援していくとするかな。
jpnSearchText:
車とＺ１を愛する者として、
改めて応援していくとするかな。

engChrName: D-Did they really just...wipe a whole village off the map? They're all just gone...?
engSearchText:
D-Did they really just...wipe a whole village off
the map? They're all just gone...?
jpnChrName: 村一つが消し飛んだって本当なのか…… そこにいた人も皆……
jpnSearchText:
村一つが消し飛んだって本当なのか……
そこにいた人も皆……

engChrName: What do I even say...? How do I even FEEL?
engSearchText: What do I even say...? How do I even FEEL?
jpnChrName: ……正直、こういう時どんな顔して 過ごせば良いのかわからなくてさ……
jpnSearchText:
……正直、こういう時どんな顔して
過ごせば良いのかわからなくてさ……

engChrName: We're gonna keep the store open, of course...but am I really supposed to just carry on, all casual like I was? It doesn't feel right anymore...
engSearchText:
We're gonna keep the store open, of course...but am I
really supposed to just carry on, all casual like I was?
It doesn't feel right anymore...
jpnChrName: 店とかは普通に開いてるけど…… 普段通り呑気に暮らすものでもないよね……？
jpnSearchText:
店とかは普通に開いてるけど……
普段通り呑気に暮らすものでもないよね……？

engChrName: I was chatting with the staff over at one of the dealerships.
engSearchText:
I was chatting with the staff over at one of
the dealerships.
jpnChrName: さっきこのディーラー店の中に入って 色々と話聞けたんだけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきこのディーラー店の中に入って
色々と話聞けたんだけどさ。

engChrName: Apparently Leno's trying to field a Z1 entry! Whoda thunk? They haven't been competitive for years.
engSearchText:
Apparently Leno's trying to field a Z1 entry!
Whoda thunk? They haven't been competitive
for years.
jpnChrName: まさか久しくＺ１優勝から遠ざかっていたレノが 今になってリベンジ狙い始めたなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか久しくＺ１優勝から遠ざかっていたレノが
今になってリベンジ狙い始めたなんて……！

engChrName: I'm not a big Leno guy myself, but more makes is never a bad thing—especially with factory support.
engSearchText:
I'm not a big Leno guy myself, but more makes is
never a bad thing—especially with factory support.
jpnChrName: レノは正直趣味じゃないけど、 これも結構な見物にはなりそうだよ。
jpnSearchText:
レノは正直趣味じゃないけど、
これも結構な見物にはなりそうだよ。

engChrName: As a car buff, I can't wait to see what they've got!
engSearchText: As a car buff, I can't wait to see what they've got!
jpnChrName: あのレノがどんなマシンを披露するのか…… 車好きなら気になっちゃうよね！
jpnSearchText:
あのレノがどんなマシンを披露するのか……
車好きなら気になっちゃうよね！

engChrName: Word on the street is, Lugan's a bit of a playboy. Just rumors, of course, but something had to spread them.
engSearchText:
Word on the street is, Lugan's a bit of a playboy.
Just rumors, of course, but something had to
spread them.
jpnChrName: マクシム・ルーガン……女にだらしないとか ウワサは聞いた事あったけど……
jpnSearchText:
マクシム・ルーガン……女にだらしないとか
ウワサは聞いた事あったけど……

engChrName: That whole thing with him going after that actress kinda soured my opinion of him.
engSearchText:
That whole thing with him going after that actress
kinda soured my opinion of him.
jpnChrName: 実際にこうやって女優に手を出してると、 興醒めというか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
実際にこうやって女優に手を出してると、
興醒めというか何というか……

engChrName: He really built up this professional image on the track, but now he's gone and thrown it all away.
engSearchText:
He really built up this professional image on the
track, but now he's gone and thrown it all away.
jpnChrName: 一応、レーサーの風格とかオーラもあったけど、 そういうのが全部吹き飛んで見えてさ……
jpnSearchText:
一応、レーサーの風格とかオーラもあったけど、
そういうのが全部吹き飛んで見えてさ……

engChrName: You ask me, he shoulda stayed in his lane... People looked up to the guy, for crying out loud.
engSearchText:
You ask me, he shoulda stayed in his lane...
People looked up to the guy, for crying out loud.
jpnChrName: 夢とロマンをぶち壊された気分だよ……
jpnSearchText: 夢とロマンをぶち壊された気分だよ……

engChrName: You ask anybody on the street and they'll tell you ETWS is where the luxury's at.
engSearchText:
You ask anybody on the street and they'll tell you
ETWS is where the luxury's at.
jpnChrName: 高級車っていうと、詳しくない人は エトワスだろって言うけど……
jpnSearchText:
高級車っていうと、詳しくない人は
エトワスだろって言うけど……

engChrName: But the other companies want a piece of that market, too. They're putting out their own high-end models.
engSearchText:
But the other companies want a piece of that
market, too. They're putting out their own
high-end models.
jpnChrName: 他のメーカーも強みを活かして一流の車を 出してるんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
他のメーカーも強みを活かして一流の車を
出してるんだよな。

engChrName: It'll be really interesting to see how they each do luxury—and you bet I'm gonna be comparing their specs.
engSearchText:
It'll be really interesting to see how they each do
luxury—and you bet I'm gonna be comparing
their specs.
jpnChrName: 今年もきっと、新しく開発されてるだろうし…… 早く新モデルを見比べたいなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
今年もきっと、新しく開発されてるだろうし……
早く新モデルを見比べたいなぁ。

engChrName: I heard they're showing 'em off at Basel's motor pavilion before they hit the market. Man, I'd love to head over there someday.
engSearchText:
I heard they're showing 'em off at Basel's motor
pavilion before they hit the market. Man, I'd love to
head over there someday.
jpnChrName: バーゼルの《モーターパビリオン》なんかはいち早く 展示があるっていうし、一度は行ってみたいよ。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの《モーターパビリオン》なんかはいち早く
展示があるっていうし、一度は行ってみたいよ。

engChrName: Yooo, that's the new ETWS! I love how they just casually slid some Z1 car design in there!
engSearchText:
Yooo, that's the new ETWS! I love how they just
casually slid some Z1 car design in there!
jpnChrName: おお、あれがエトワスの新型か！ Ｚ１カーの意匠もさり気無く入ってる！
jpnSearchText:
おお、あれがエトワスの新型か！
Ｚ１カーの意匠もさり気無く入ってる！

engChrName: I'm tellin' ya, the world of cars is DEEP. That's the beauty of it all.
engSearchText:
I'm tellin' ya, the world of cars is DEEP. That's the
beauty of it all.
jpnChrName: やっぱり導力車は奥が深いよね、 何ていうか機能美ってやつなのかな？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり導力車は奥が深いよね、
何ていうか機能美ってやつなのかな？

engChrName: There's just something really cool about a car that goes mad fast, y'know? From an engineering standpoint, it's like a work of art.
engSearchText:
There's just something really cool about a car that
goes mad fast, y'know? From an engineering
standpoint, it's like a work of art.
jpnChrName: どこのメーカーのも、性能を突き詰めた車は 風格のあるカッコよさになるっていうか……！
jpnSearchText:
どこのメーカーのも、性能を突き詰めた車は
風格のあるカッコよさになるっていうか……！

engChrName: Man, I can't wait to get my license and hit the road! Though, uh...I can't afford any of those really cool ones.
engSearchText:
Man, I can't wait to get my license and hit the road!
Though, uh...I can't afford any of those really
cool ones.
jpnChrName: はぁ、僕も早く免許取って車乗りたいよ！ でも、カッコイイのは大概高いんだよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、僕も早く免許取って車乗りたいよ！
でも、カッコイイのは大概高いんだよなぁ……

engChrName: I feel like cars are starting to become a status symbol—you gotta have the cash to afford one, right?
engSearchText:
I feel like cars are starting to become a status
symbol—you gotta have the cash to afford one, right?
jpnChrName: やっぱり良い車に乗るってのは、一種の ステータスなんじゃないかと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり良い車に乗るってのは、一種の
ステータスなんじゃないかと思うんだ。

engChrName: So that's my plan: get my license, scrape together all the mira I can, and get me the best sports car my budget will buy!
engSearchText:
So that's my plan: get my license, scrape together all
the mira I can, and get me the best sports car my
budget will buy!
jpnChrName: 僕も早く免許取って……その上でミラ貯めて 最高にカッコイイスポーツカーに……！
jpnSearchText:
僕も早く免許取って……その上でミラ貯めて
最高にカッコイイスポーツカーに……！

engChrName: ...It's just kinda daunting, when I say it out loud like that.
engSearchText:
...It's just kinda daunting, when I say it out loud
like that.
jpnChrName: ……考えれば考えるほど先が長そうだな……
jpnSearchText: ……考えれば考えるほど先が長そうだな……

engChrName: I managed to take cover, but...man, I had to go and check on my baby.
engSearchText:
I managed to take cover, but...man, I had to go and
check on my baby.
jpnChrName: ……先ほどまでは隠れていたが……俺の 屋台の様子を見に来たところでな。
jpnSearchText:
……先ほどまでは隠れていたが……俺の
屋台の様子を見に来たところでな。

engChrName: This cart's more than just a cart to me, y'know? I'm really happy that it's okay.
engSearchText:
This cart's more than just a cart to me, y'know?
I'm really happy that it's okay.
jpnChrName: やはりこの屋台は俺の半身のようなもの。 無事で何よりだった。
jpnSearchText:
やはりこの屋台は俺の半身のようなもの。
無事で何よりだった。

engChrName: Come hell or high water, if I've got customers, I gotta serve 'em.
engSearchText:
Come hell or high water, if I've got customers, I gotta
serve 'em.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、どんな状況だろうと 客が来てくれる以上、もてなさねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、どんな状況だろうと
客が来てくれる以上、もてなさねえとな。

engChrName: You folks look like you could use a break, though.
engSearchText: You folks look like you could use a break, though.
jpnChrName: お前達も、休んでいくと良い。
jpnSearchText: お前達も、休んでいくと良い。

engChrName: Anybody needs my cart, I'll be there for 'em. Nothing more to it.
engSearchText:
Anybody needs my cart, I'll be there for 'em.
Nothing more to it.
jpnChrName: 俺の店を必要とするなら俺も職人として 応える、ただそれだけだ……
jpnSearchText:
俺の店を必要とするなら俺も職人として
応える、ただそれだけだ……

engChrName: I wonder how many festivals I've done now... It's been a while since I moved here.
engSearchText:
I wonder how many festivals I've done now...
It's been a while since I moved here.
jpnChrName: 記念祭……俺もこの地で迎えるのは これで何度目になるか……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭……俺もこの地で迎えるのは
これで何度目になるか……

engChrName: I get flooded with customers, naturally, so I gotta put my back into it and whip up the best soba I can.
engSearchText:
I get flooded with customers, naturally, so I gotta put
my back into it and whip up the best soba I can.
jpnChrName: ……何にせよ、より多様な客が来る。 普段以上に気合を入れて蕎麦を出すのみだ。
jpnSearchText:
……何にせよ、より多様な客が来る。
普段以上に気合を入れて蕎麦を出すのみだ。

engChrName: I really appreciate all those lovely bracers protecting the city. I hope they get to take it easy now.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate all those lovely bracers protecting
the city. I hope they get to take it easy now.
jpnChrName: 首都を守る女性遊撃士の皆か…… 今は羽を休めて欲しいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
首都を守る女性遊撃士の皆か……
今は羽を休めて欲しいものだな。

engChrName: I gotta do my part to help take the load off them, y'know?
engSearchText:
I gotta do my part to help take the load off
them, y'know?
jpnChrName: 俺も、彼女らには俺なりに 報いるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
俺も、彼女らには俺なりに
報いるとしよう。

engChrName: We have to stop Creil Village from happening again... We're never getting all those people back. We can't let that tragedy repeat.
engSearchText:
We have to stop Creil Village from
happening again... We're never getting all those
people back. We can't let that tragedy repeat.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村は二度と戻らんが…… 再びの事件が無ければ手向けにもなろう……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村は二度と戻らんが……
再びの事件が無ければ手向けにもなろう……

engChrName: I might already have a new buckwheat supplier, but... it's just not the same. I won't forget them. Never.
engSearchText:
I might already have a new buckwheat supplier, but...
it's just not the same. I won't forget them. Never.
jpnChrName: ……かの村は忘れんが、蕎麦の 仕入れ先も新しく確保した……
jpnSearchText:
……かの村は忘れんが、蕎麦の
仕入れ先も新しく確保した……

engChrName: For now, I just gotta do what I can.
engSearchText: For now, I just gotta do what I can.
jpnChrName: 俺はこの地で、すべき事をするだけだ。
jpnSearchText: 俺はこの地で、すべき事をするだけだ。

engChrName: You were getting your buckwheat from Creil, weren't you...?
engSearchText:
You were getting your buckwheat from Creil, weren't
you...?
jpnChrName: カンザの旦那……そういえば、 あんたの屋台の蕎麦は……
jpnSearchText:
カンザの旦那……そういえば、
あんたの屋台の蕎麦は……

engChrName: Yeah... It was Creil. They had the authentic stuff...
engSearchText: Yeah... It was Creil. They had the authentic stuff...
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村産の蕎麦粉だ。 東方産は貴重になりつつあるからな……
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユ村産の蕎麦粉だ。
東方産は貴重になりつつあるからな……

engChrName: I remember going there once or twice to meet up with my supplier... The chief, too...
engSearchText:
I remember going there once or twice to meet up
with my supplier... The chief, too...
jpnChrName: 仕入れのために行き、商人や村長と 語らったこともあったが……
jpnSearchText:
仕入れのために行き、商人や村長と
語らったこともあったが……

engChrName: It hurts. It really hurts. But they'd want me to keep on working in their memory...so that's what I'm gonna do.
engSearchText:
It hurts. It really hurts. But they'd want me to keep on
working in their memory...so that's what I'm
gonna do.
jpnChrName: ……いや、彼らのためにも俺は 職人の仕事を続けるだけだ……
jpnSearchText:
……いや、彼らのためにも俺は
職人の仕事を続けるだけだ……

engChrName: Creil wasn't just a supplier of buckwheat to me.
engSearchText: Creil wasn't just a supplier of buckwheat to me.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユは蕎麦粉の仕入れ先、 というわけでは決してなかった。
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユは蕎麦粉の仕入れ先、
というわけでは決してなかった。

engChrName: Someday, I wanna head there and leave my respects at their graves. Maybe... Maybe with some buckwheat soba...
engSearchText:
Someday, I wanna head there and leave my respects
at their graves. Maybe... Maybe with some
buckwheat soba...
jpnChrName: ……いつか彼らの墓にも 最高の蕎麦を備えてやるか……
jpnSearchText:
……いつか彼らの墓にも
最高の蕎麦を備えてやるか……

engChrName: Heading to Longlai, huh? Got'cha, got'cha...
engSearchText: Heading to Longlai, huh? Got'cha, got'cha...
jpnChrName: 龍來に行くか、なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: 龍來に行くか、なるほどな……

engChrName: Oh, that's where you're from, right?
engSearchText: Oh, that's where you're from, right?
jpnChrName: そういやカンザの旦那は、やっぱり あっちの系統の出なのか？
jpnSearchText:
そういやカンザの旦那は、やっぱり
あっちの系統の出なのか？

engChrName: Figured you weren't from Langport.
engSearchText: Figured you weren't from Langport.
jpnChrName: 煌都の出身ではないと思うが……
jpnSearchText: 煌都の出身ではないと思うが……

engChrName: Yeah, I've got a bit of Longlai in me.
engSearchText: Yeah, I've got a bit of Longlai in me.
jpnChrName: ……一応流れは汲んでいると 言えるだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
……一応流れは汲んでいると
言えるだろうな……

engChrName: Wasn't there all that long, though.
engSearchText: Wasn't there all that long, though.
jpnChrName: もっとも、龍來にもそこまで長く 住んでいた訳ではないが……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、龍來にもそこまで長く
住んでいた訳ではないが……

engChrName: Makes sense. Guess not everybody Eastern is from the same place.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Guess not everybody Eastern is from
the same place.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……まあ、東方文化にしても 色々ある、それは人も同じってところか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……まあ、東方文化にしても
色々ある、それは人も同じってところか。

engChrName: Longlai's big thing is tea. They're the tea capital of the world, or so they say.
engSearchText:
Longlai's big thing is tea. They're the tea capital of
the world, or so they say.
jpnChrName: ……龍來は茶葉の産地でもある。
jpnSearchText: ……龍來は茶葉の産地でもある。

engChrName: Its unique climate gives it a lot of other unique stuff, too. It's a place like no other, so I hope you get to take it all in.
engSearchText:
Its unique climate gives it a lot of other unique
stuff, too. It's a place like no other, so I hope you get
to take it all in.
jpnChrName: 他にも風土を活かした東方文化は多い、 楽しむと良い。
jpnSearchText:
他にも風土を活かした東方文化は多い、
楽しむと良い。

engChrName: Hey there. You're just in time to try some of my new buckwheat soba. I got the real authentic stuff this time.
engSearchText:
Hey there. You're just in time to try some of my new
buckwheat soba. I got the real authentic stuff
this time.
jpnChrName: ……新しく仕入れた蕎麦粉で麺を打った ところだ、食べていくと良い。
jpnSearchText:
……新しく仕入れた蕎麦粉で麺を打った
ところだ、食べていくと良い。

engChrName: Creil buckwheat just blows me away every time. I dunno how they do it.
engSearchText:
Creil buckwheat just blows me away every time.
I dunno how they do it.
jpnChrName: 毎度ながら……クレイユ村の蕎麦の 品質には俺も感心する。
jpnSearchText:
毎度ながら……クレイユ村の蕎麦の
品質には俺も感心する。

engChrName: With Eastern imports getting harder to come by, Creil's really the only place to get authentic buckwheat.
engSearchText:
With Eastern imports getting harder to come by,
Creil's really the only place to get
authentic buckwheat.
jpnChrName: 輸入も減りつつある東方産のものの代替として 申し分ない蕎麦が他にどれほどあるか……
jpnSearchText:
輸入も減りつつある東方産のものの代替として
申し分ない蕎麦が他にどれほどあるか……

engChrName: Y'know, I've been wondering: how come you switch to skewers at night?
engSearchText:
Y'know, I've been wondering: how come you switch
to skewers at night?
jpnChrName: そういや、少し気になっていたんだが…… どうして夜は串焼き屋台をやっているんだ？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、少し気になっていたんだが……
どうして夜は串焼き屋台をやっているんだ？

engChrName: I mean, it still tastes good, but why only at night?
engSearchText: I mean, it still tastes good, but why only at night?
jpnChrName: どっちも美味いが、わざわざ分けて やる必要も無いと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
どっちも美味いが、わざわざ分けて
やる必要も無いと思うけどな。

engChrName: I'm a soba man, so that's what I sell during the day.
engSearchText: I'm a soba man, so that's what I sell during the day.
jpnChrName: ……本業はあくまで蕎麦屋だ、それを貫くため 昼はあくまで本業に徹している。
jpnSearchText:
……本業はあくまで蕎麦屋だ、それを貫くため
昼はあくまで本業に徹している。

engChrName: But I had some regulars telling me they wanted some skewers to go with their drinks after work.
engSearchText:
But I had some regulars telling me they wanted some
skewers to go with their drinks after work.
jpnChrName: だが、元は付け合わせに作った串焼きを 酒と一緒に食いたいという意見もあったのでな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、元は付け合わせに作った串焼きを
酒と一緒に食いたいという意見もあったのでな。

engChrName: So I threw 'em a bone and here we are.
engSearchText: So I threw 'em a bone and here we are.
jpnChrName: それに応えただけの事だ。
jpnSearchText: それに応えただけの事だ。

engChrName: Damn. That's dedication. Not every vendor goes outta the way for customer requests like that.
engSearchText:
Damn. That's dedication. Not every vendor goes
outta the way for customer requests like that.
jpnChrName: へぇ、意外にも客のリクエストを 反映させているのか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、意外にも客のリクエストを
反映させているのか。

engChrName: ...Hey, so uhh, think you could start stockin' some Eastern sweets? Customer request.
engSearchText:
...Hey, so uhh, think you could start stockin' some
Eastern sweets? Customer request.
jpnChrName: だったら、東方の甘味なんかも一緒に 置いたらどうだ、色々あるって聞くしな？
jpnSearchText:
だったら、東方の甘味なんかも一緒に
置いたらどうだ、色々あるって聞くしな？

engChrName: Sorry, request declined.
engSearchText: Sorry, request declined.
jpnChrName: ……それは断る。
jpnSearchText: ……それは断る。

engChrName: I'm a soba man and that's all I've got. Sweets aren't really my forte.
engSearchText:
I'm a soba man and that's all I've got. Sweets aren't
really my forte.
jpnChrName: 本業は蕎麦屋だ、職人としての 在り処はそれをおいて他に無い。
jpnSearchText:
本業は蕎麦屋だ、職人としての
在り処はそれをおいて他に無い。

engChrName: If I'm doing a customer request, I wanna do it right. I'm just not the guy to ask for those, sorry.
engSearchText:
If I'm doing a customer request, I wanna do it right.
I'm just not the guy to ask for those, sorry.
jpnChrName: ……だが、他の料理でも求められるなら 手は抜かず作る事に異存はない。
jpnSearchText:
……だが、他の料理でも求められるなら
手は抜かず作る事に異存はない。

engChrName: I hear your clients are keeping you busy. That's a valuable thing to have at your age—it's good to have people that trust and depend on you.
engSearchText:
I hear your clients are keeping you busy. That's a
valuable thing to have at your age—it's good to have
people that trust and depend on you.
jpnChrName: 若いのに随分と忙しい兄ちゃんだ…… それだけ頼られているとも言えるか。
jpnSearchText:
若いのに随分と忙しい兄ちゃんだ……
それだけ頼られているとも言えるか。

engChrName: Just remember to take care of yourself, too, all right?
engSearchText: Just remember to take care of yourself, too, all right?
jpnChrName: まあ、今はせいぜい英気を養うと良い。
jpnSearchText: まあ、今はせいぜい英気を養うと良い。

engChrName: Hey there. Been a while, huh?
engSearchText: Hey there. Been a while, huh?
jpnChrName: お前さんか、久しいな。
jpnSearchText: お前さんか、久しいな。

engChrName: You look like you're in the middle of something, though.
engSearchText:
You look like you're in the middle of
something, though.
jpnChrName: 仕事中のようだが……
jpnSearchText: 仕事中のようだが……

engChrName: Yeah, long time no see.
engSearchText: Yeah, long time no see.
jpnChrName: ああ、ご無沙汰してるぜ、カンザの旦那。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ご無沙汰してるぜ、カンザの旦那。

engChrName: Oh, is that Eastern-style pottery? And food, too?
engSearchText: Oh, is that Eastern-style pottery? And food, too?
jpnChrName: ここは東方のお蕎麦や焼き物の屋台……？
jpnSearchText: ここは東方のお蕎麦や焼き物の屋台……？

engChrName: Do you come here often, Van?
engSearchText: Do you come here often, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんはこちらを 利用される事も多いんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんはこちらを
利用される事も多いんですか？

engChrName: This cart looks really neat. Do you come here a lot, Van?
engSearchText:
This cart looks really neat. Do you come here a
lot, Van?
jpnChrName: 随分と珍しい雰囲気の屋台ですね…… ヴァンさんも常連なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
随分と珍しい雰囲気の屋台ですね……
ヴァンさんも常連なんですか？

engChrName: Huh. Eastern, but not the stuff I was raised on.
engSearchText: Huh. Eastern, but not the stuff I was raised on.
jpnChrName: 東方風だが、オレらの馴染みとは いくらか違った料理の店みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
東方風だが、オレらの馴染みとは
いくらか違った料理の店みたいだな。

engChrName: Doesn't look half bad, though. I take it you come by often?
engSearchText:
Doesn't look half bad, though. I take it you come
by often?
jpnChrName: 蕎麦ってのも見てみりゃ美味そうだ。 オッサンもここでよく飲むのか？
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦ってのも見てみりゃ美味そうだ。
オッサンもここでよく飲むのか？

engChrName: Every now and then, yeah. The soba and skewers are really good.
engSearchText:
Every now and then, yeah. The soba and skewers are
really good.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょくちょくな。 ここは蕎麦も串焼きもかなり美味いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちょくちょくな。
ここは蕎麦も串焼きもかなり美味いぜ。

engChrName: I'm happy as long as I have mouths to feed.
engSearchText: I'm happy as long as I have mouths to feed.
jpnChrName: ……俺としては飯と酒を味わって もらえるなら何も言う事は無い。
jpnSearchText:
……俺としては飯と酒を味わって
もらえるなら何も言う事は無い。

engChrName: Come on by again sometime, will ya? I'll throw in some tasty sides with your meal.
engSearchText:
Come on by again sometime, will ya? I'll throw in
some tasty sides with your meal.
jpnChrName: まあ、気が向いたらまた来い。 上手いツマミでも出してやろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、気が向いたらまた来い。
上手いツマミでも出してやろう。

engChrName: I do skewers at night, so if you're in the mood for those, come swing on by after dark.
engSearchText:
I do skewers at night, so if you're in the mood for
those, come swing on by after dark.
jpnChrName: 夜は夜で串焼きを出している。 そっちも気が向いたら食いに来ると良い。
jpnSearchText:
夜は夜で串焼きを出している。
そっちも気が向いたら食いに来ると良い。

engChrName: I'm really trying my best to fill out the Literature pages, but maaan, it's hard work.
engSearchText:
I'm really trying my best to fill out the Literature
pages, but maaan, it's hard work.
jpnChrName: はぁぁ、僕も文芸部で ちゃんと仕事したいんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁ、僕も文芸部で
ちゃんと仕事したいんですけど……

engChrName: Sounds like you've got it rough, bud.
engSearchText: Sounds like you've got it rough, bud.
jpnChrName: そうか……兄ちゃんも大変だな。
jpnSearchText: そうか……兄ちゃんも大変だな。

engChrName: Yeah. I guess I'm just an easy target for other people's work.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I guess I'm just an easy target for other
people's work.
jpnChrName: ええ……どうにも仕事を振りやすい 雰囲気があるとかそんな感じなのか……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……どうにも仕事を振りやすい
雰囲気があるとかそんな感じなのか……

engChrName: Feels like the first time in a while I got to do my own thing—I met up with this columnist today.
engSearchText:
Feels like the first time in a while I got to do my own
thing—I met up with this columnist today.
jpnChrName: まあ、今日は久しぶりに本業の方で コラムニストと打ち合わせしてきたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今日は久しぶりに本業の方で
コラムニストと打ち合わせしてきたんですが……

engChrName: Nice. How about a drink or two to wash it down?
engSearchText: Nice. How about a drink or two to wash it down?
jpnChrName: ……飯だけじゃなく一杯どうだ？
jpnSearchText: ……飯だけじゃなく一杯どうだ？

engChrName: A little buzz can help take your mind off things.
engSearchText: A little buzz can help take your mind off things.
jpnChrName: こういう時は飲むのも良いだろう……
jpnSearchText: こういう時は飲むのも良いだろう……

engChrName: Thanks, but I'll pass. I'd love to throw one back, but my little sister's waiting on me.
engSearchText:
Thanks, but I'll pass. I'd love to throw one back, but
my little sister's waiting on me.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、飲みたいのは山々だけど…… 妹も一応待っているものでね……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、飲みたいのは山々だけど……
妹も一応待っているものでね……

engChrName: I wouldn't wanna stay too long and come back sloshed.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't wanna stay too long and come
back sloshed.
jpnChrName: お酒飲んで遅く帰ると色々面倒なもので……
jpnSearchText: お酒飲んで遅く帰ると色々面倒なもので……

engChrName: Got'cha, got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha, got'cha.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: I'm glad Inspector Daswani made it back. And we're finally getting reports back from the field, so we know where our officers are.
engSearchText:
I'm glad Inspector Daswani made it back. And we're
finally getting reports back from the field, so we
know where our officers are.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部が無事に帰還されて何よりです…… 各地で防戦する警官の状況も聞きましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部が無事に帰還されて何よりです……
各地で防戦する警官の状況も聞きましたよ。

engChrName: Our comms are back up, too. Once we're all back in contact with each other, we're forming up and getting to work.
engSearchText:
Our comms are back up, too. Once we're all back in
contact with each other, we're forming up and getting
to work.
jpnChrName: 通信も回復しましたし、今後はある程度 我々も組織だって動けるはず……
jpnSearchText:
通信も回復しましたし、今後はある程度
我々も組織だって動けるはず……

engChrName: Since I'm good at coordinating everybody, I'll go ahead and round the officers up. We need to get feet out in the field.
engSearchText:
Since I'm good at coordinating everybody, I'll go
ahead and round the officers up. We need to get feet
out in the field.
jpnChrName: 私が各所の警官との連絡・調整は引き受けると しましょう、その手の仕事は慣れてますので。
jpnSearchText:
私が各所の警官との連絡・調整は引き受けると
しましょう、その手の仕事は慣れてますので。

engChrName: For now, you can leave the cleanup and coordination to us, all right?
engSearchText:
For now, you can leave the cleanup and coordination
to us, all right?
jpnChrName: ……件の作戦に際して、後方の守りは 我々警察にどうか任せてください。
jpnSearchText:
……件の作戦に際して、後方の守りは
我々警察にどうか任せてください。

engChrName: We owe you one, spriggan, for helping free up the station. But we're not out of the woods yet.
engSearchText:
We owe you one, spriggan, for helping free up
the station. But we're not out of the woods yet.
jpnChrName: ……警察署の解放への協力、感謝しますよ裏解決屋。 ですが……まだ何も終わっていません。
jpnSearchText:
……警察署の解放への協力、感謝しますよ裏解決屋。
ですが……まだ何も終わっていません。

engChrName: We've taken casualties. Still got plenty of officers holding the line, but we're not at full strength.
engSearchText:
We've taken casualties. Still got plenty of officers
holding the line, but we're not at full strength.
jpnChrName: “動ける”警察官は限られてはいますが……各地で 奮闘を続けている者も多いと聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
“動ける”警察官は限られてはいますが……各地で
奮闘を続けている者も多いと聞きます。

engChrName: We have to gather everybody up, first and foremost. Once we get some structure back, security will follow.
engSearchText:
We have to gather everybody up, first and foremost.
Once we get some structure back, security will follow.
jpnChrName: 私も、まずは近辺で動ける者を纏め…… 警備体制を整える事を目指しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私も、まずは近辺で動ける者を纏め……
警備体制を整える事を目指しましょう。

engChrName: Stay safe out there.
engSearchText: Stay safe out there.
jpnChrName: そちらも、どうか気を付けて……
jpnSearchText: そちらも、どうか気を付けて……

engChrName: I can't believe Almata would go that far... The bastards!
engSearchText:
I can't believe Almata would go that far...
The bastards!
jpnChrName: しかし、この異変もアルマータの仕業とは…… 奴らめ、一体どこまでやれば……！
jpnSearchText:
しかし、この異変もアルマータの仕業とは……
奴らめ、一体どこまでやれば……！

engChrName: But we can't give in to fear—that's the whole point of a terrorist attack. They want us to be afraid.
engSearchText:
But we can't give in to fear—that's the whole point of
a terrorist attack. They want us to be afraid.
jpnChrName: ですがおそらく、恐怖に飲まれては連中の 思う壺なのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
ですがおそらく、恐怖に飲まれては連中の
思う壺なのでしょう……

engChrName: We have to restore order ASAP, and the first step is getting our force re-organized.
engSearchText:
We have to restore order ASAP, and the first step is
getting our force re-organized.
jpnChrName: そうならないためにも、とにかく最低限の秩序と 安全は確保していかねば……
jpnSearchText:
そうならないためにも、とにかく最低限の秩序と
安全は確保していかねば……

engChrName: It's a huge relief that the festival's going off without a hitch. Everybody's having a good time, from what I can see.
engSearchText:
It's a huge relief that the festival's going off without
a hitch. Everybody's having a good time, from what I
can see.
jpnChrName: さて……記念祭は無事に開催でき、市民も 楽しんでいるようで何よりですが……
jpnSearchText:
さて……記念祭は無事に開催でき、市民も
楽しんでいるようで何よりですが……

engChrName: But that's even more reason not to let our guard down. We need to make sure it stays safe to the end.
engSearchText:
But that's even more reason not to let our
guard down. We need to make sure it stays safe to
the end.
jpnChrName: だからこそ我々も、この催事が無事に終わりを 迎えられるよう、気を抜く訳にはいきません。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ我々も、この催事が無事に終わりを
迎えられるよう、気を抜く訳にはいきません。

engChrName: You picking anything up, spriggan? Anything feel off to you?
engSearchText:
You picking anything up, spriggan? Anything feel off
to you?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、どんな些細な事でも、何か不穏な 気配などは感じ取っていませんか？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋、どんな些細な事でも、何か不穏な
気配などは感じ取っていませんか？

engChrName: Listen, if you catch a whiff of anything strange, you tell us right away, got it?
engSearchText:
Listen, if you catch a whiff of anything strange, you
tell us right away, got it?
jpnChrName: もし何か嗅ぎ取ったら、まずは我々に 知らせる事ですからね？
jpnSearchText:
もし何か嗅ぎ取ったら、まずは我々に
知らせる事ですからね？

engChrName: We heard about those Almata remnants swimming around in the sewers.
engSearchText:
We heard about those Almata remnants swimming
around in the sewers.
jpnChrName: ……地下水道にアルマータの残党がいた件は こちらでも報告を受けています。
jpnSearchText:
……地下水道にアルマータの残党がいた件は
こちらでも報告を受けています。

engChrName: Heard you were there, too, helping out the CID. Thanks for that.
engSearchText:
Heard you were there, too, helping out the CID.
Thanks for that.
jpnChrName: まあ、ＣＩＤと協同してくれた事は 協力に感謝、と言っておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ＣＩＤと協同してくれた事は
協力に感謝、と言っておきましょうか。

engChrName: We've been combing over the place real thorough, so I want to believe we're finally done with them.
engSearchText:
We've been combing over the place real thorough, so
I want to believe we're finally done with them.
jpnChrName: 警察でも改めて洗い出していますし、これ以上の 事件は流石に無いものと信じたいですが……
jpnSearchText:
警察でも改めて洗い出していますし、これ以上の
事件は流石に無いものと信じたいですが……

engChrName: But you guys seem to have a knack for drawing out Almata, so if you find anything, let us know.
engSearchText:
But you guys seem to have a knack for drawing out
Almata, so if you find anything, let us know.
jpnChrName: 対アルマータではあなた達も経験が豊富、 何かあれば情報提供を願いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
対アルマータではあなた達も経験が豊富、
何かあれば情報提供を願いますよ。

engChrName: I did hear from the inspector that you've got a keen eye for suspicious activity.
engSearchText:
I did hear from the inspector that you've got a keen
eye for suspicious activity.
jpnChrName: そういえば裏解決屋は、今までも独自の嗅覚で 嗅ぎまわってきたとダスワニ警部に聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば裏解決屋は、今までも独自の嗅覚で
嗅ぎまわってきたとダスワニ警部に聞きました。

engChrName: I mean, I'm not chasing after EVERY lead you give us, but it never hurts to have more intel.
engSearchText:
I mean, I'm not chasing after EVERY lead you give
us, but it never hurts to have more intel.
jpnChrName: まあ、アテにする訳ではないですが、 情報源は多いに越した事は無いですしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アテにする訳ではないですが、
情報源は多いに越した事は無いですしね。

engChrName: If something feels off at the Revolution Festival, make sure to call us first, okay? Don't go rushing in by yourselves.
engSearchText:
If something feels off at the Revolution Festival,
make sure to call us first, okay? Don't go rushing in
by yourselves.
jpnChrName: もし記念祭中に何かに気づいたら、 勝手に介入する前に我々に言うように。
jpnSearchText:
もし記念祭中に何かに気づいたら、
勝手に介入する前に我々に言うように。

engChrName: We're making quick work of those Almata stragglers.
engSearchText: We're making quick work of those Almata stragglers.
jpnChrName: アルマータの残党の摘発は 今のところ順調に進んでいますね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの残党の摘発は
今のところ順調に進んでいますね。

engChrName: As for me, I'm collecting intel from reports about shady businesses in town.
engSearchText:
As for me, I'm collecting intel from reports about
shady businesses in town.
jpnChrName: 私も、市民からの相談で知った悪徳商法などの 情報の内、気になるものを纏めていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
私も、市民からの相談で知った悪徳商法などの
情報の内、気になるものを纏めていましたが……

engChrName: Some of those leads are actually payin' off. Helped us pin down some Almata funding sources in Edith, plus some of their shell companies.
engSearchText:
Some of those leads are actually payin' off. Helped us
pin down some Almata funding sources in Edith, plus
some of their shell companies.
jpnChrName: どうやら首都内でのアルマータの資金源や 末端組織の洗い出しに役立てられたようですね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら首都内でのアルマータの資金源や
末端組織の洗い出しに役立てられたようですね。

engChrName: All the more reason why doing work on the ground is so important. Everyday people have plenty to share.
engSearchText:
All the more reason why doing work on the ground is
so important. Everyday people have plenty to share.
jpnChrName: 市民と接し、やり取りする業務も 決して軽視できないという事です。
jpnSearchText:
市民と接し、やり取りする業務も
決して軽視できないという事です。

engChrName: The inspector says that you guys helped out some, too.
engSearchText:
The inspector says that you guys helped out
some, too.
jpnChrName: ……貴方達も役に立ったらしい事は ダスワニ警部から聞きましたからね。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方達も役に立ったらしい事は
ダスワニ警部から聞きましたからね。

engChrName: That said, you can't expect us to just keep our mouths shut when we see you skirting the law.
engSearchText:
That said, you can't expect us to just keep our mouths
shut when we see you skirting the law.
jpnChrName: まあ、グレーゾーンの稼業をする者に 忠告するのは警察として当然ですが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、グレーゾーンの稼業をする者に
忠告するのは警察として当然ですが……

engChrName: But...well, results are results. I guess I can cut you some slack.
engSearchText:
But...well, results are results. I guess I can cut you
some slack.
jpnChrName: 一応、ある程度は大目に見るのも やむを得ない事も認めざるを得ないですか。
jpnSearchText:
一応、ある程度は大目に見るのも
やむを得ない事も認めざるを得ないですか。

engChrName: But you'd best stay on the right side of the law, spriggan. You don't want the police coming after you, too.
engSearchText:
But you'd best stay on the right side of the
law, spriggan. You don't want the police coming after
you, too.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、せいぜい警察と敵対せず、 一線を引いて共存できることを願いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋、せいぜい警察と敵対せず、
一線を引いて共存できることを願いますよ。

engChrName: I know you've been talking with Inspector Daswani, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I know you've been talking with Inspector
Daswani, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……アークライドさん……先ほどは ダスワニ警部とも話していたようですが……
jpnSearchText:
……アークライドさん……先ほどは
ダスワニ警部とも話していたようですが……

engChrName: And for one reason or another, he trusts you...somehow.
engSearchText:
And for one reason or another, he trusts
you...somehow.
jpnChrName: なるほど、警部も警部なりに 貴方達を認めているという事ですか……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、警部も警部なりに
貴方達を認めているという事ですか……

engChrName: You sound bitter about it. You don't trust me yourself? Not that that's a problem...or that I care.
engSearchText:
You sound bitter about it. You don't trust
me yourself? Not that that's a problem...or that I care.
jpnChrName: ああ、それであんたはどうするんだ？ 別に胡散くせぇと思われ続けても仕方ねぇが……？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それであんたはどうするんだ？
別に胡散くせぇと思われ続けても仕方ねぇが……？

engChrName: ...I have to. Being stubborn about it won't get me anywhere.
engSearchText:
...I have to. Being stubborn about it won't get
me anywhere.
jpnChrName: ……少なくとも意地で動くべき事態でない事は 私も理解しているつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
……少なくとも意地で動くべき事態でない事は
私も理解しているつもりです。

engChrName: As my superior, the inspector knows who to trust. If he sees what you've done out there and finds you trustworthy, then what he says goes.
engSearchText:
As my superior, the inspector knows who to trust.
If he sees what you've done out there and finds you
trustworthy, then what he says goes.
jpnChrName: 現場で貴方の活動を多く見ているダスワニ警部が ああいった事には、相応の理由もあるはず。
jpnSearchText:
現場で貴方の活動を多く見ているダスワニ警部が
ああいった事には、相応の理由もあるはず。

engChrName: And at any rate, you're not the real enemy— Almata is.
engSearchText:
And at any rate, you're not the real enemy—
Almata is.
jpnChrName: もちろん、敵が同じくアルマータだというのは 私も完全に同意ですしね……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、敵が同じくアルマータだというのは
私も完全に同意ですしね……

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ……
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ……

engChrName: But as a man of the law, there are certain things I can't overlook. Lines I can't let you cross.
engSearchText:
But as a man of the law, there are certain things I
can't overlook. Lines I can't let you cross.
jpnChrName: ……あくまで警察としての一線は守る事は 譲るつもりもありませんがね。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまで警察としての一線は守る事は
譲るつもりもありませんがね。

engChrName: We DO need all the help we can get, no matter where it comes from.
engSearchText:
We DO need all the help we can get, no matter
where it comes from.
jpnChrName: だが、こういう事態で貴方達のような特殊な 立ち位置にいる者がどう動くのか……
jpnSearchText:
だが、こういう事態で貴方達のような特殊な
立ち位置にいる者がどう動くのか……

engChrName: And I'd be lying if I said I weren't relying on you... a little. In a roundabout way.
engSearchText:
And I'd be lying if I said I weren't relying on you...
a little. In a roundabout way.
jpnChrName: 少々の期待をしてしまわないと 言えばまあ、嘘になるか。
jpnSearchText:
少々の期待をしてしまわないと
言えばまあ、嘘になるか。

engChrName: Let sleeping dogs lie, yeah? We're both workin' against Almata here, so no point barkin' at each other.
engSearchText:
Let sleeping dogs lie, yeah? We're both workin'
against Almata here, so no point barkin' at
each other.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、ともかくお互い敵を 増やしたくないのは同じだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、ともかくお互い敵を
増やしたくないのは同じだろう。

engChrName: You got your code as a cop, and I got mine as a spriggan. For now, those codes're takin' us in the same direction.
engSearchText:
You got your code as a cop, and I got mine as
a spriggan. For now, those codes're takin' us in the
same direction.
jpnChrName: 俺にも譲れない解決屋の流儀があるが…… 今はあんた達の流儀と同じものを向いている。
jpnSearchText:
俺にも譲れない解決屋の流儀があるが……
今はあんた達の流儀と同じものを向いている。

engChrName: The enemy of my enemy is my friend, the way I see it.
engSearchText:
The enemy of my enemy is my friend, the way I
see it.
jpnChrName: そういう事でいいんだろ。
jpnSearchText: そういう事でいいんだろ。

engChrName: I suppose. Almata is too dangerous, too evil for us to go making other enemies.
engSearchText:
I suppose. Almata is too dangerous, too evil for us to
go making other enemies.
jpnChrName: そうなりますね……まあ、共通の敵が あまりにも最悪だったという事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そうなりますね……まあ、共通の敵が
あまりにも最悪だったという事でしょう。

engChrName: That said, once this Almata business is said and done, we're putting our sights back on you. Heh, look forward to it.
engSearchText:
That said, once this Almata business is said and done,
we're putting our sights back on you. Heh, look
forward to it.
jpnChrName: 事件が解決したら、今まで通り貴方達も警戒するが…… まずはそんな日常を取り戻さないと始まりません。
jpnSearchText:
事件が解決したら、今まで通り貴方達も警戒するが……
まずはそんな日常を取り戻さないと始まりません。

engChrName: To think we used to just turn a blind eye and let you shade-of-gray types get off with a warning...
engSearchText:
To think we used to just turn a blind eye and let you
shade-of-gray types get off with a warning...
jpnChrName: ……たかがグレーの貴方達に小言を言えていただけ、 これまでは平和だったという事ですか……
jpnSearchText:
……たかがグレーの貴方達に小言を言えていただけ、
これまでは平和だったという事ですか……

engChrName: ...meh. I can't go ruminating on that. I've got a job to do, and that's taking down Almata. Conveniently, they're not gray at all.
engSearchText:
...meh. I can't go ruminating on that. I've got a job to
do, and that's taking down Almata.
Conveniently, they're not gray at all.
jpnChrName: アルマータ……問答無用で真っ黒な連中を 倒すには、意地など言っていられない場合です。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ……問答無用で真っ黒な連中を
倒すには、意地など言っていられない場合です。

engChrName: These guys aren't just criminals—they're a threat to the whole world. We all need to be banding together against them.
engSearchText:
These guys aren't just criminals—they're a threat to
the whole world. We all need to be banding together
against them.
jpnChrName: 警察だけじゃない、どこも皆、同じ敵と 向き合うべき局面でしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
警察だけじゃない、どこも皆、同じ敵と
向き合うべき局面でしょうな……

engChrName: We've been getting a lot of reports about scams and shady deals. There's always a chance the mafia's behind those in the bigger picture.
engSearchText:
We've been getting a lot of reports about scams and
shady deals. There's always a chance the mafia's
behind those in the bigger picture.
jpnChrName: 最近は新手の詐欺や悪徳商法の相談もありますが、 何割かはマフィアが絡んでいる可能性もあります。
jpnSearchText:
最近は新手の詐欺や悪徳商法の相談もありますが、
何割かはマフィアが絡んでいる可能性もあります。

engChrName: Folks gotta be careful who they trust nowadays. We need to get the word out that we can help.
engSearchText:
Folks gotta be careful who they trust nowadays.
We need to get the word out that we can help.
jpnChrName: 市民には騙されないよう注意し、 協力して欲しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
市民には騙されないよう注意し、
協力して欲しいものです。

engChrName: Drying up a crime ring's funding is a good way to starve 'em out.
engSearchText:
Drying up a crime ring's funding is a good way to
starve 'em out.
jpnChrName: 少しでも犯罪組織の資金源は絞っていって、 委縮させねばなりませんから。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも犯罪組織の資金源は絞っていって、
委縮させねばなりませんから。

engChrName: Just so you know, though: if I have to arrest a spriggan poking his nose into those deals himself, I will. Are we clear, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText:
Just so you know, though: if I have to arrest a
spriggan poking his nose into those deals himself,
I will. Are we clear, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: ……裏解決屋のアークライドさん、貴方もそういう 領域に踏み込んだらアウトなのはわかりますね？
jpnSearchText:
……裏解決屋のアークライドさん、貴方もそういう
領域に踏み込んだらアウトなのはわかりますね？

engChrName: We request that everyone report anything suspicious they see in town—fraudsters, swindlers, anything shady under the sun.
engSearchText:
We request that everyone report anything suspicious
they see in town—fraudsters, swindlers, anything
shady under the sun.
jpnChrName: 市民には違法ビジネス検挙のため、情報提供や 通報の形でも協力を求めています。
jpnSearchText:
市民には違法ビジネス検挙のため、情報提供や
通報の形でも協力を求めています。

engChrName: You rub shoulders with those types, don't you, spriggan? If you know anything, make sure to loop us in.
engSearchText:
You rub shoulders with those types, don't
you, spriggan? If you know anything, make sure to
loop us in.
jpnChrName: 案外、グレーな解決屋は知っていたりしますか？ もしそうなら、ちゃんと警察に連絡しなさい。
jpnSearchText:
案外、グレーな解決屋は知っていたりしますか？
もしそうなら、ちゃんと警察に連絡しなさい。

engChrName: We officers have resources that you don't. If you want something done right, you come to us.
engSearchText:
We officers have resources that you don't. If you want
something done right, you come to us.
jpnChrName: 筋を通すというのなら、然るべき事件を警察に 連絡した上で活動するのが筋というものです。
jpnSearchText:
筋を通すというのなら、然るべき事件を警察に
連絡した上で活動するのが筋というものです。

engChrName: Honestly, though, with the uptick in fraud and scams lately, I feel like citizens aren't taking street smarts seriously anymore.
engSearchText:
Honestly, though, with the uptick in fraud and scams
lately, I feel like citizens aren't taking street smarts
seriously anymore.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、最近の犯罪や防犯の相談を聞くと、 共和国人の警戒心が薄れていないか不安です。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、最近の犯罪や防犯の相談を聞くと、
共和国人の警戒心が薄れていないか不安です。

engChrName: This is gonna sound a bit morbid, but...those regular attacks back in the day made everybody more alert and aware of their surroundings, I feel.
engSearchText:
This is gonna sound a bit morbid, but...those regular
attacks back in the day made everybody more alert
and aware of their surroundings, I feel.
jpnChrName: かつて恐慌やテロがあった時期は…… それなりに皆、危機感がありましたがね。
jpnSearchText:
かつて恐慌やテロがあった時期は……
それなりに皆、危機感がありましたがね。

engChrName: I think with things booming the way they are, everybody's letting their guard down.
engSearchText:
I think with things booming the way they are,
everybody's letting their guard down.
jpnChrName: 今は好景気のせいか、どうもわきが甘い 市民も増えている気がします。
jpnSearchText:
今は好景気のせいか、どうもわきが甘い
市民も増えている気がします。

engChrName: Not to say things SHOULDN'T be peaceful, it's just opening the door back up for lowlifes and gangsters to take advantage of people.
engSearchText:
Not to say things SHOULDN'T be peaceful, it's just
opening the door back up for lowlifes and gangsters
to take advantage of people.
jpnChrName: マフィアや半グレは、そうした隙につけいって 悪事を働くものだというのに。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアや半グレは、そうした隙につけいって
悪事を働くものだというのに。

engChrName: I've dealt with my fair share of reporters in my job, but that Dingo Brad guy's stumping me. What's he really after...?
engSearchText:
I've dealt with my fair share of reporters in my job,
but that Dingo Brad guy's stumping me. What's he
really after...?
jpnChrName: 記者への応対はそれなりにこなしてきましたが…… ディンゴ・ブラッドは何を追っているのやら。
jpnSearchText:
記者への応対はそれなりにこなしてきましたが……
ディンゴ・ブラッドは何を追っているのやら。

engChrName: He knows more than he seems to let on, from the times I've worked with him. I don't buy that he's just some Meld journo.
engSearchText:
He knows more than he seems to let on, from the
times I've worked with him. I don't buy that he's just
some Meld journo.
jpnChrName: 彼に対応したのも数度目だが、メルドの仕事以外で 追っている案件には何か事情もありそうなもので。
jpnSearchText:
彼に対応したのも数度目だが、メルドの仕事以外で
追っている案件には何か事情もありそうなもので。

engChrName: Feels like getting involved with him is only asking for trouble, though. I'd best keep my distance.
engSearchText:
Feels like getting involved with him is only asking for
trouble, though. I'd best keep my distance.
jpnChrName: 深入りするつもりは無いですがね、どの道安易に 情報を漏らさない一線を譲るつもりも無いですし。
jpnSearchText:
深入りするつもりは無いですがね、どの道安易に
情報を漏らさない一線を譲るつもりも無いですし。

engChrName: There're all kinds of reporters out there, and we need to make sure to treat them all fairly.
engSearchText:
There're all kinds of reporters out there, and we need
to make sure to treat them all fairly.
jpnChrName: 記者にも色々な人はいるが、警察として 情報開示はあくまでも公平にやっています。
jpnSearchText:
記者にも色々な人はいるが、警察として
情報開示はあくまでも公平にやっています。

engChrName: Some of those guys try to kiss up to us or appeal to emotion, shit like that.
engSearchText:
Some of those guys try to kiss up to us or appeal to
emotion, shit like that.
jpnChrName: たまに正義感を煽ろうとしたり、同情を引くような 口上で聞き出そうとするような記者もいますが……
jpnSearchText:
たまに正義感を煽ろうとしたり、同情を引くような
口上で聞き出そうとするような記者もいますが……

engChrName: But sometimes they just need to back off. Confidential information is usually confidential for a reason.
engSearchText:
But sometimes they just need to back off.
Confidential information is usually confidential for
a reason.
jpnChrName: 開示できる情報の基準には相応の理由がある、 それを忘れない限り騙されはしませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
開示できる情報の基準には相応の理由がある、
それを忘れない限り騙されはしませんよ。

engChrName: Tharbad PD's been asking for reinforcements. Apparently there was a big spike in the expected turnout for the film festival.
engSearchText:
Tharbad PD's been asking for reinforcements.
Apparently there was a big spike in the expected
turnout for the film festival.
jpnChrName: サルバッド警察はまだ応援が必要そうか…… 急に映画祭の見込み来場者数も増えましたしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド警察はまだ応援が必要そうか……
急に映画祭の見込み来場者数も増えましたしねぇ。

engChrName: We're sending a lot of our guys over to be safe. I'm guessing most of them will be on investigation teams.
engSearchText:
We're sending a lot of our guys over to be safe.
I'm guessing most of them will be on
investigation teams.
jpnChrName: 首都警察からもそれなりの人員は行くはずだが…… いや、うちは捜査チームの方が多くなりますか。
jpnSearchText:
首都警察からもそれなりの人員は行くはずだが……
いや、うちは捜査チームの方が多くなりますか。

engChrName: That's been happening a lot lately, come to think about it: got PDs around the country asking for reinforcements from us.
engSearchText:
That's been happening a lot lately, come to think
about it: got PDs around the country asking for
reinforcements from us.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ最近は地方の発展で、首都警察が サポートせねばならない事も増えたな……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ最近は地方の発展で、首都警察が
サポートせねばならない事も増えたな……

engChrName: It's good that we've got each other's backs, but I'm thinkin' we may need to reallocate funding for more head count and local powers.
engSearchText:
It's good that we've got each other's backs, but I'm
thinkin' we may need to reallocate funding for more
head count and local powers.
jpnChrName: 情報共有が促進されるのは良いが……場合によって 地方署の規模や権限の見直しも必要ですね。
jpnSearchText:
情報共有が促進されるのは良いが……場合によって
地方署の規模や権限の見直しも必要ですね。

engChrName: Backing up local offices when they need it is one of Edith PD's responsibilities. There's nothing wrong with it, per se...
engSearchText:
Backing up local offices when they need it is one of
Edith PD's responsibilities. There's nothing wrong
with it, per se...
jpnChrName: ……首都警察には地方警察で対応しきれない 時にバックアップをする役割もある。
jpnSearchText:
……首都警察には地方警察で対応しきれない
時にバックアップをする役割もある。

engChrName: ...it just brings up questions of local vs. outsider authority, and how wide we should be casting our net.
engSearchText:
...it just brings up questions of local vs.
outsider authority, and how wide we should be
casting our net.
jpnChrName: 首都警察の捜査範囲の広さや地方署の署長の 権限など色々と議論されているとはいえ……
jpnSearchText:
首都警察の捜査範囲の広さや地方署の署長の
権限など色々と議論されているとはいえ……

engChrName: End of the day, we're the biggest force in the Republic. As its beating heart, we gotta make sure the whole country's under control.
engSearchText:
End of the day, we're the biggest force in
the Republic. As its beating heart, we gotta make sure
the whole country's under control.
jpnChrName: 共和国全体の治安のため、中央が責任を持って 牽引しなければならないのも確かな事です。
jpnSearchText:
共和国全体の治安のため、中央が責任を持って
牽引しなければならないのも確かな事です。

engChrName: Oh, you're that spriggan the inspector dragged in for questioning. Twice, if memory serves.
engSearchText:
Oh, you're that spriggan the inspector dragged in
for questioning. Twice, if memory serves.
jpnChrName: おや、君達は……以前、二度もダスワニ警部が 事情聴取で連れて来た裏解決屋とかいう……
jpnSearchText:
おや、君達は……以前、二度もダスワニ警部が
事情聴取で連れて来た裏解決屋とかいう……

engChrName: Mr. Arkride, correct? Just a friendly reminder that you ARE in our system.
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride, correct? Just a friendly reminder that
you ARE in our system.
jpnChrName: 確かアークライドさんでしたか。 一応、記録は残しておいてありますからね？
jpnSearchText:
確かアークライドさんでしたか。
一応、記録は残しておいてありますからね？

engChrName: Aww, shucks. You're too kind.
engSearchText: Aww, shucks. You're too kind.
jpnChrName: ああ、その節はどうもってな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その節はどうもってな。

engChrName: Ah. I'm sorry if we caused any trouble.
engSearchText: Ah. I'm sorry if we caused any trouble.
jpnChrName: あ、あの時は色々とご迷惑をおかけしました……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの時は色々とご迷惑をおかけしました……

engChrName: But why, though? Van isn't breaking the law or causing trouble for people. He just has his own way of doing things.
engSearchText:
But why, though? Van isn't breaking the law or
causing trouble for people. He just has his own way of
doing things.
jpnChrName: でも、ヴァンさんも筋は通していますし、法律を明確に 破ったり市民に迷惑をかけたりもしないので……
jpnSearchText:
でも、ヴァンさんも筋は通していますし、法律を明確に
破ったり市民に迷惑をかけたりもしないので……

engChrName: Or, wait... Were you breaking the law BEFORE I got here? Is that how they're tracking you?
engSearchText:
Or, wait... Were you breaking the law BEFORE I
got here? Is that how they're tracking you?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、わたしが来る前も ああいう事があったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、わたしが来る前も
ああいう事があったんですか？

engChrName: Ooh, spicy. Our boss has a criminal record? You spend some time in the clink?
engSearchText:
Ooh, spicy. Our boss has a criminal record?
You spend some time in the clink?
jpnChrName: ハッ、普通にサツの世話になってたんだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、普通にサツの世話になってたんだな。

engChrName: Hmph. Shameless to the bone, I see—and your friends seem aware of that themselves.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Shameless to the bone, I see—and your
friends seem aware of that themselves.
jpnChrName: ふう、連れの人はともかく、 貴方は相変わらず悪びれもしないか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、連れの人はともかく、
貴方は相変わらず悪びれもしないか……

engChrName: I admit, you weren't directly involved with what was going on, and you didn't TECHNICALLY break any laws...
engSearchText:
I admit, you weren't directly involved with what was
going on, and you didn't TECHNICALLY break
any laws...
jpnChrName: あのねぇ、あの事件に関与していなかった事も、 明確な違法行為をしてない事も今は判ってますよ。
jpnSearchText:
あのねぇ、あの事件に関与していなかった事も、
明確な違法行為をしてない事も今は判ってますよ。

engChrName: ...but you're walkin' a fine line, bub. You stick your nose in too deep and you can expect a visit to the clink.
engSearchText:
...but you're walkin' a fine line, bub. You stick your
nose in too deep and you can expect a visit to
the clink.
jpnChrName: だが、グレーな活動をあまり続けるようなら、 我々とて相応の対処をせざるを得ません。
jpnSearchText:
だが、グレーな活動をあまり続けるようなら、
我々とて相応の対処をせざるを得ません。

engChrName: Just thought I'd give you that heads up.
engSearchText: Just thought I'd give you that heads up.
jpnChrName: 一応、貴方のためを思って 忠告しているのですからね？
jpnSearchText:
一応、貴方のためを思って
忠告しているのですからね？

engChrName: I'll keep it in mind. If you guys keep draggin' my ass here all the time, it's gonna start cutting into my bottom line.
engSearchText:
I'll keep it in mind. If you guys keep draggin'
my ass here all the time, it's gonna start cutting
into my bottom line.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜい気をつけさせてもらうぜ。 毎回連行されてちゃ業務に支障が出るしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、せいぜい気をつけさせてもらうぜ。
毎回連行されてちゃ業務に支障が出るしな。

engChrName: Honestly, I'd be happy if you did have to walk away from that little 'business.' But I doubt you care about what I think.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'd be happy if you did have to walk away
from that little 'business.' But I doubt you care about
what I think.
jpnChrName: その“業務”自体を正直控えて欲しいのですが…… まあ、言って素直に聞きはしないか。
jpnSearchText:
その“業務”自体を正直控えて欲しいのですが……
まあ、言って素直に聞きはしないか。

engChrName: I will say this, though: you only have to screw up once to land yourself in serious trouble. You can't skirt the law forever.
engSearchText:
I will say this, though: you only have to screw up once
to land yourself in serious trouble. You can't skirt the
law forever.
jpnChrName: これは言っておきます、例えグレー止まりでも、 その気になれば警察が止める手立てはある。
jpnSearchText:
これは言っておきます、例えグレー止まりでも、
その気になれば警察が止める手立てはある。

engChrName: We're letting you off the hook this time, but don't push your luck with the law, spriggan. It'll bite you in the ass one day.
engSearchText:
We're letting you off the hook this time, but don't
push your luck with the law, spriggan. It'll bite you in
the ass one day.
jpnChrName: この前は不問になったが、だからといって グレーなら何をしても良いと勘違いしないように。
jpnSearchText:
この前は不問になったが、だからといって
グレーなら何をしても良いと勘違いしないように。

engChrName: The inspector has a lot on his plate. He's getting ready for a business trip right now.
engSearchText:
The inspector has a lot on his plate. He's getting
ready for a business trip right now.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部はお忙しい、近いうちに 出張の予定も入っている。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部はお忙しい、近いうちに
出張の予定も入っている。

engChrName: He's always in pursuit of the truth, no matter where it takes him. He's on countless investigations both in and out of the capital.
engSearchText:
He's always in pursuit of the truth, no matter where it
takes him. He's on countless investigations both in
and out of the capital.
jpnChrName: 地方での活動も含め、多くの捜査を 粘り強くこなして叩き上げた人ですからね……
jpnSearchText:
地方での活動も含め、多くの捜査を
粘り強くこなして叩き上げた人ですからね……

engChrName: Meaning he seldom has time to deal with shade-of-gray types like you. The whole department would rather you keep out of that business, really.
engSearchText:
Meaning he seldom has time to deal with
shade-of-gray types like you. The whole department
would rather you keep out of that business, really.
jpnChrName: ……そういう意味でも本来、君達のような グレーゾーンに構う余裕はあまり無いはず。
jpnSearchText:
……そういう意味でも本来、君達のような
グレーゾーンに構う余裕はあまり無いはず。

engChrName: How 'bout you have a heart and stop tying up our resources with your stunts?
engSearchText:
How 'bout you have a heart and stop tying up our
resources with your stunts?
jpnChrName: 彼に限らずですが、あまり我々に余計な 手間をかけさせるものじゃないですからね？
jpnSearchText:
彼に限らずですが、あまり我々に余計な
手間をかけさせるものじゃないですからね？

engChrName: We've been able to confirm the situation in each area, and rendezvous with the inspector and his detail.
engSearchText:
We've been able to confirm the situation in each area,
and rendezvous with the inspector and his detail.
jpnChrName: 各所の状況も掴めてきて……ダスワニ警部らとも 合流する事が出来ました。
jpnSearchText:
各所の状況も掴めてきて……ダスワニ警部らとも
合流する事が出来ました。

engChrName: The veteran officers are really amazing... They put their lives on the line without a second thought, all for the people of Edith.
engSearchText:
The veteran officers are really amazing... They put
their lives on the line without a second thought, all
for the people of Edith.
jpnChrName: しかし先輩方すごいですね……この状況でも 各々で市民を守ろうと奮闘していて……
jpnSearchText:
しかし先輩方すごいですね……この状況でも
各々で市民を守ろうと奮闘していて……

engChrName: But I can't just let them do all the work! I'm in the force, too!
engSearchText:
But I can't just let them do all the work! I'm in the
force, too!
jpnChrName: いえ……私もその一員です、感心している だけじゃダメですよね！
jpnSearchText:
いえ……私もその一員です、感心している
だけじゃダメですよね！

engChrName: We've got a plan of action ourselves. For the time being, I need to provide backup for Colordo!
engSearchText:
We've got a plan of action ourselves. For the time
being, I need to provide backup for Colordo!
jpnChrName: 大きな作戦もあると言いますし……今はとにかく、 コロルド巡査長の補佐をやり通さないと！
jpnSearchText:
大きな作戦もあると言いますし……今はとにかく、
コロルド巡査長の補佐をやり通さないと！

engChrName: Crazy how fast this is all moving... Just a bit ago, we were holing up in our armory and holding cells.
engSearchText:
Crazy how fast this is all moving... Just a bit ago, we
were holing up in our armory and holding cells.
jpnChrName: 先ほどまでは警察署の奥の……頑丈な 武器庫や留置場に籠っていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほどまでは警察署の奥の……頑丈な
武器庫や留置場に籠っていたのですが……

engChrName: But now that we've gone out and started taking the city back, we've gotta get a move on.
engSearchText:
But now that we've gone out and started taking the
city back, we've gotta get a move on.
jpnChrName: こうして最低限の安全が確保された以上、 私も怯えているだけでいい訳がありません。
jpnSearchText:
こうして最低限の安全が確保された以上、
私も怯えているだけでいい訳がありません。

engChrName: Colordo is back on his feet already, so I need to back him up with everything I've got!
engSearchText:
Colordo is back on his feet already, so I need to back
him up with everything I've got!
jpnChrName: コロルド巡査長も立て直しに尽力して くれていますし、精一杯補佐します！
jpnSearchText:
コロルド巡査長も立て直しに尽力して
くれていますし、精一杯補佐します！

engChrName: I may just be a receptionist, but I'm still in the force, and I still have a duty to fulfill!
engSearchText:
I may just be a receptionist, but I'm still in the force,
