and I still have a duty to fulfill!
jpnChrName: 今の私は……受付とはいえ、 一人の警察官なのですから！
jpnSearchText:
今の私は……受付とはいえ、
一人の警察官なのですから！

engChrName: Up until last year, I was just another civvie enjoying the festival on the ground.
engSearchText:
Up until last year, I was just another civvie enjoying
the festival on the ground.
jpnChrName: 記念祭……去年までは私も市民として 楽しむだけの立場でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭……去年までは私も市民として
楽しむだけの立場でしたが……

engChrName: It wasn't until I joined the force that I realized how important their role is during the festivities.
engSearchText:
It wasn't until I joined the force that I realized how
important their role is during the festivities.
jpnChrName: 警察の一員として過ごしてみると、 如何に責任重大なのかが判るというか……
jpnSearchText:
警察の一員として過ごしてみると、
如何に責任重大なのかが判るというか……

engChrName: Everyone's able to relax and breathe easy thanks to the tireless work the officers do in the background.
engSearchText:
Everyone's able to relax and breathe easy thanks to
the tireless work the officers do in the background.
jpnChrName: 警察が秩序を守るために努力しているからこそ、 皆安心して楽しめるのだって実感します。
jpnSearchText:
警察が秩序を守るために努力しているからこそ、
皆安心して楽しめるのだって実感します。

engChrName: And now I'm one of them—another officer working hard to make sure folks can enjoy themselves at the festival.
engSearchText:
And now I'm one of them—another officer working
hard to make sure folks can enjoy themselves at
the festival.
jpnChrName: それなら私も今は、市民の皆さんが記念祭を 安心して過ごせるよう努めるのみです。
jpnSearchText:
それなら私も今は、市民の皆さんが記念祭を
安心して過ごせるよう努めるのみです。

engChrName: I still have a hard time believing the festival's going so smoothly, after all that...
engSearchText:
I still have a hard time believing the festival's going so
smoothly, after all that...
jpnChrName: しかし、何とかあの事件を乗り越えて 記念祭も予定通り開催できる事になって……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、何とかあの事件を乗り越えて
記念祭も予定通り開催できる事になって……

engChrName: I mean, I should know, I'm helping with the whole thing, but it just...doesn't seem real.
engSearchText:
I mean, I should know, I'm helping with the whole
thing, but it just...doesn't seem real.
jpnChrName: 正直、ここまで自分が付いて来れて まだ実感が湧かない気もしますが……
jpnSearchText:
正直、ここまで自分が付いて来れて
まだ実感が湧かない気もしますが……

engChrName: I'm just glad the people of the city have something to look forward to again... We all do, now.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad the people of the city have something to
look forward to again... We all do, now.
jpnChrName: 何とか、市民の皆さんと共に新しい 日々を迎えられそうで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
何とか、市民の皆さんと共に新しい
日々を迎えられそうで何よりです。

engChrName: This was my first year with the force. I like to think I've grown a little so far.
engSearchText:
This was my first year with the force. I like to think
I've grown a little so far.
jpnChrName: 私も、この一年で少しでも警察の一員として 成長できていれば良いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
私も、この一年で少しでも警察の一員として
成長できていれば良いのですが……

engChrName: Actually, right after the festival is my one year anniversary.
engSearchText:
Actually, right after the festival is my one
year anniversary.
jpnChrName: 思えば、記念祭が終わって少ししたら、 私も警察に入って一年が経つのですよね……
jpnSearchText:
思えば、記念祭が終わって少ししたら、
私も警察に入って一年が経つのですよね……

engChrName: My goals for next year are to broaden my horizons and learn new ways to help out around the city. Gotta keep working harder...!
engSearchText:
My goals for next year are to broaden my horizons
and learn new ways to help out around the city.
Gotta keep working harder...!
jpnChrName: 来年はもっと見識を広め、より柔軟に 市民のお役に立ちたいところですが……
jpnSearchText:
来年はもっと見識を広め、より柔軟に
市民のお役に立ちたいところですが……

engChrName: And the next step on that road of mine is making sure the festival is secure!
engSearchText:
And the next step on that road of mine is making
sure the festival is secure!
jpnChrName: そのためにはまず、記念祭の警備を しっかりと全うしないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
そのためにはまず、記念祭の警備を
しっかりと全うしないとですね！

engChrName: I always knew Senior Officer Colordo was keeping records on stuff beyond even his usual investigative work.
engSearchText:
I always knew Senior Officer Colordo was
keeping records on stuff beyond even his usual
investigative work.
jpnChrName: コロルド巡査長、規定にない事でもマメに 記録を付けていると思っていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
コロルド巡査長、規定にない事でもマメに
記録を付けていると思っていましたが……

engChrName: But I never thought his side notes would end up exposing Almata collaborators.
engSearchText:
But I never thought his side notes would end up
exposing Almata collaborators.
jpnChrName: まさかアルマータの関連企業の摘発に 繋がる情報も含まれていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかアルマータの関連企業の摘発に
繋がる情報も含まれていたなんて……

engChrName: I guess it goes to show how important it is to talk with everyday people.
engSearchText:
I guess it goes to show how important it is to talk
with everyday people.
jpnChrName: 市民と直接やり取りをする仕事も…… このような形に役立つことがあるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
市民と直接やり取りをする仕事も……
このような形に役立つことがあるんですね。

engChrName: Even as a receptionist, I hope some day I get the chance to go above and beyond the call of duty like that.
engSearchText:
Even as a receptionist, I hope some day I get the
chance to go above and beyond the call of duty
like that.
jpnChrName: 私も窓口担当として、今後はしっかり 期待以上の貢献を出来るようになりたいです。
jpnSearchText:
私も窓口担当として、今後はしっかり
期待以上の貢献を出来るようになりたいです。

engChrName: I need to do more than just connect with the public,  I need to put their information to good use.
engSearchText:
I need to do more than just connect with the public,
I need to put their information to good use.
jpnChrName: 単なる担当部署と市民の繋ぎ役ではなく…… 市民の声から汲み取ったものを活かせるように。
jpnSearchText:
単なる担当部署と市民の繋ぎ役ではなく……
市民の声から汲み取ったものを活かせるように。

engChrName: Please direct all requests to me, if you would. The other officers have their hands full right now!
engSearchText:
Please direct all requests to me, if you would.
The other officers have their hands full right now!
jpnChrName: 各種の手続きはこちらでお願いします、 他の係員は手が埋まっていますのでこちらまで！
jpnSearchText:
各種の手続きはこちらでお願いします、
他の係員は手が埋まっていますのでこちらまで！

engChrName: I'm at a loss for words about Creil, but...this job won't do itself. We still have to keep the peace...!
engSearchText:
I'm at a loss for words about Creil, but...this job won't
do itself. We still have to keep the peace...!
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村の事件は筆舌しがたいですが、 だからこそできる事をしないと……！
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユ村の事件は筆舌しがたいですが、
だからこそできる事をしないと……！

engChrName: If we officers can keep our chins up, even a little, that'll go a long way toward giving the public peace of mind!
engSearchText:
If we officers can keep our chins up, even a little,
that'll go a long way toward giving the public peace
of mind!
jpnChrName: 私達警察が少しでもしっかりしているのを 見せて、少しでも市民の皆さまに安心を……！
jpnSearchText:
私達警察が少しでもしっかりしているのを
見せて、少しでも市民の皆さまに安心を……！

engChrName: Colordo was saying he has this really important investigation to coordinate, and it's taking up a lot of his time.
engSearchText:
Colordo was saying he has this really important
investigation to coordinate, and it's taking up a lot of
his time.
jpnChrName: コロルド巡査長も、より高度な調整事務で 手一杯になると思います……
jpnSearchText:
コロルド巡査長も、より高度な調整事務で
手一杯になると思います……

engChrName: So this is my chance to really step up as an officer and handle public reports myself!
engSearchText:
So this is my chance to really step up as an officer and
handle public reports myself!
jpnChrName: 今こそ、しっかり自分で市民の方々に対応して、 警察の一人として貢献しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
今こそ、しっかり自分で市民の方々に対応して、
警察の一人として貢献しないと……！

engChrName: Lately we've been getting a lot of reports from teachers and parents of older children.
engSearchText:
Lately we've been getting a lot of reports from
teachers and parents of older children.
jpnChrName: 最近、年頃のお子さんのいる方や 教育関係の方からの相談も多いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
最近、年頃のお子さんのいる方や
教育関係の方からの相談も多いのですが……

engChrName: They're telling us about these shady part-time jobs going around...
engSearchText:
They're telling us about these shady part-time jobs
going around...
jpnChrName: いわゆる“闇バイト”というのでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: いわゆる“闇バイト”というのでしょうか……

engChrName: It's a real problem. Good kids can get dragged into awful bad stuff without even knowing it.
engSearchText:
It's a real problem. Good kids can get dragged into
awful bad stuff without even knowing it.
jpnChrName: 半グレでもない青少年が、犯罪組織に 利用される事件もあるみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
半グレでもない青少年が、犯罪組織に
利用される事件もあるみたいで……

engChrName: Monsters, all of them. We need to round them all up and get them off the streets!
engSearchText:
Monsters, all of them. We need to round them all up
and get them off the streets!
jpnChrName: 本当に許しがたいです……一刻も早く、 大本の組織を検挙しないといけませんよね……！
jpnSearchText:
本当に許しがたいです……一刻も早く、
大本の組織を検挙しないといけませんよね……！

engChrName: Our ties with the CID? Well, I wouldn't know much about that, honestly—all the groundwork for that was already laid when I joined.
engSearchText:
Our ties with the CID? Well, I wouldn't know much
about that, honestly—all the groundwork for that was
already laid when I joined.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤとの関係ですか……私の場合、 警察に入った時はもう今の体制でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤとの関係ですか……私の場合、
警察に入った時はもう今の体制でしたが……

engChrName: Though I know some of my fellow officers have some...strong opinions about it.
engSearchText:
Though I know some of my fellow officers have
some...strong opinions about it.
jpnChrName: やはり現政権による再編前の体制を 知っている方には、思う所もあるみたいです……
jpnSearchText:
やはり現政権による再編前の体制を
知っている方には、思う所もあるみたいです……

engChrName: But Colordo has quite a few connections in the CID branch we work with. That's made things much easier.
engSearchText:
But Colordo has quite a few connections in the CID
branch we work with. That's made things
much easier.
jpnChrName: コロルド巡査長も、ＣＩＤの警察系の 部局に知人が何人かいると言いますしね……
jpnSearchText:
コロルド巡査長も、ＣＩＤの警察系の
部局に知人が何人かいると言いますしね……

engChrName: We've had an uptick in reports from victims of these...just, awful crimes. My heart aches when I listen to them...
engSearchText:
We've had an uptick in reports from victims of
these...just, awful crimes. My heart aches when I
listen to them...
jpnChrName: 最近は悪質な犯罪被害の相談が増えて…… 被害者の方と話していて胸が痛みます。
jpnSearchText:
最近は悪質な犯罪被害の相談が増えて……
被害者の方と話していて胸が痛みます。

engChrName: They really run the gamut: fraud, assault, gang violence, business violations...even some strange reports tracing back to the church.
engSearchText:
They really run the gamut: fraud, assault, gang
violence, business violations...even some strange
reports tracing back to the church.
jpnChrName: 詐欺や悪徳商法、半グレによる暴力事件もですが、 何やら宗教的な犯罪まであるようで……
jpnSearchText:
詐欺や悪徳商法、半グレによる暴力事件もですが、
何やら宗教的な犯罪まであるようで……

engChrName: Criminals may be diversifying, but their targets remain the same: poor, innocent people. Crime never changes...
engSearchText:
Criminals may be diversifying, but their targets
remain the same: poor, innocent people. Crime
never changes...
jpnChrName: 犯罪も随分と多様化していますが……被害に遭うのは 善良な市民の方々に変わりないですしね……
jpnSearchText:
犯罪も随分と多様化していますが……被害に遭うのは
善良な市民の方々に変わりないですしね……

engChrName: Of course, crime isn't all we handle. We get folks turning in lost items, asking about public services, that kinda stuff.
engSearchText:
Of course, crime isn't all we handle. We get folks
turning in lost items, asking about public services,
that kinda stuff.
jpnChrName: 悪質な犯罪だけでなく、落とし物や 公共サービスの相談に来る方も変わらずいます。
jpnSearchText:
悪質な犯罪だけでなく、落とし物や
公共サービスの相談に来る方も変わらずいます。

engChrName: There's a lot to handle, and it all goes through me as the receptionist here. I do my best to make sure everybody's needs are met!
engSearchText:
There's a lot to handle, and it all goes through me as
the receptionist here. I do my best to make sure
everybody's needs are met!
jpnChrName: 仕事は多いですが……総合受付を 任せられた以上、何とか期待に応えたいです！
jpnSearchText:
仕事は多いですが……総合受付を
任せられた以上、何とか期待に応えたいです！

engChrName: I try to be clear and concise with people's questions, so their visit goes as smoothly as possible!
engSearchText:
I try to be clear and concise with people's questions,
so their visit goes as smoothly as possible!
jpnChrName: 少しでも市民の方にご不便のないよう、 円滑に案内していってあげないと……！
jpnSearchText:
少しでも市民の方にご不便のないよう、
円滑に案内していってあげないと……！

engChrName: Colordo's really good at his job... No matter what you throw at him, he has it all down to a science.
engSearchText:
Colordo's really good at his job... No matter what you
throw at him, he has it all down to a science.
jpnChrName: コロルド巡査長はどんな分野の事務処理も テキパキこなせて凄いですよね……
jpnSearchText:
コロルド巡査長はどんな分野の事務処理も
テキパキこなせて凄いですよね……

engChrName: I can't wait till I become as precise and professional on the job as he is...
engSearchText:
I can't wait till I become as precise and professional
on the job as he is...
jpnChrName: 私も早く一人前になって、あれくらい 正確で素早く出来るようにならないと。
jpnSearchText:
私も早く一人前になって、あれくらい
正確で素早く出来るようにならないと。

engChrName: More and more people are coming into the station lately... I've gotta step up my game. They should feel comfortable here.
engSearchText:
More and more people are coming into the
station lately... I've gotta step up my game.
They should feel comfortable here.
jpnChrName: 最近は警察に来る市民も増えましたし、 少しでもスムーズに回せるよう貢献しないと……
jpnSearchText:
最近は警察に来る市民も増えましたし、
少しでもスムーズに回せるよう貢献しないと……

engChrName: U-Umm... Ah. W-Welcome to the Edith Police Department Seiden HQ. This is the general reception desk.
engSearchText:
U-Umm... Ah. W-Welcome to the Edith Police
Department Seiden HQ. This is the general
reception desk.
jpnChrName: しゅ、首都警察サイデン本署にお越しの方々、 総合受付はこちらになりますっ。
jpnSearchText:
しゅ、首都警察サイデン本署にお越しの方々、
総合受付はこちらになりますっ。

engChrName: I've got the paperwork for you right here... A-Ah, if you wanted to report a crime, I mean. That's right there, or umm...
engSearchText:
I've got the paperwork for you right here... A-Ah, if
you wanted to report a crime, I mean. That's right
there, or umm...
jpnChrName: 所定の書類をご用意しますので、 犯罪被害の相談や公共サービスの……
jpnSearchText:
所定の書類をご用意しますので、
犯罪被害の相談や公共サービスの……

engChrName: You're getting ahead of yourself, Kiara. First, figure out what the person's actually here for.
engSearchText:
You're getting ahead of yourself, Kiara. First, figure
out what the person's actually here for.
jpnChrName: キアラ君、もう少し肩の力を抜いて。 まずは正確に伝える事を意識しよう。
jpnSearchText:
キアラ君、もう少し肩の力を抜いて。
まずは正確に伝える事を意識しよう。

engChrName: You've got the passion and motivation. You just need to dial it back a bit and focus on listening first.
engSearchText:
You've got the passion and motivation. You just need
to dial it back a bit and focus on listening first.
jpnChrName: 意気込みややる気は確かだし、あとは 市民に安心して聞いてもらう事を心がけて。
jpnSearchText:
意気込みややる気は確かだし、あとは
市民に安心して聞いてもらう事を心がけて。

engChrName: Y-Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Y-Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: は、はいコロルド巡査長……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいコロルド巡査長……！

engChrName: Umm, I have a reception form right here, so please fill in the details of your inquiry.
engSearchText:
Umm, I have a reception form right here, so please
fill in the details of your inquiry.
jpnChrName: えー……所定の書類がございますので、 相談事があれば詳細情報のご記入をお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
えー……所定の書類がございますので、
相談事があれば詳細情報のご記入をお願いします。

engChrName: Once I've confirmed your inquiry, I'll get you in contact with an officer who can help you.
engSearchText:
Once I've confirmed your inquiry, I'll get you in
contact with an officer who can help you.
jpnChrName: 確認が取れ次第、 担当の部署に直ちに連絡いたします。
jpnSearchText:
確認が取れ次第、
担当の部署に直ちに連絡いたします。

engChrName: If you have any other questions or concerns, we can answer them here at the reception desk.
engSearchText:
If you have any other questions or concerns, we can
answer them here at the reception desk.
jpnChrName: 他にも不明点等がございましたら、 総合受付でご案内しますので……
jpnSearchText:
他にも不明点等がございましたら、
総合受付でご案内しますので……

engChrName: Good. That was much better.
engSearchText: Good. That was much better.
jpnChrName: うむ、問題無さそうだね。
jpnSearchText: うむ、問題無さそうだね。

engChrName: You sound a lot better when you relax and speak naturally. Bear that in mind, okay?
engSearchText:
You sound a lot better when you relax and
speak naturally. Bear that in mind, okay?
jpnChrName: 肩の力を抜いて自然に話せば大丈夫だ、 今後もそういう意識でやると良いよ。
jpnSearchText:
肩の力を抜いて自然に話せば大丈夫だ、
今後もそういう意識でやると良いよ。

engChrName: Sorry about that. I just started this year... I'm still learning the ropes around here.
engSearchText:
Sorry about that. I just started this year... I'm still
learning the ropes around here.
jpnChrName: 先ほどはすみません、今年入ったばかりで まだ慣れなかったもので……
jpnSearchText:
先ほどはすみません、今年入ったばかりで
まだ慣れなかったもので……

engChrName: But I can't hide behind excuses like that. I have an oath to fulfill as a police officer!
engSearchText:
But I can't hide behind excuses like that. I have an
oath to fulfill as a police officer!
jpnChrName: でも、市民を守る警察の一員として、 そんな事ばかり言ってはいられません！
jpnSearchText:
でも、市民を守る警察の一員として、
そんな事ばかり言ってはいられません！

engChrName: Please let me know if there's anything you need! I need to get used to this so I can help people out as much as possible.
engSearchText:
Please let me know if there's anything you need!
I need to get used to this so I can help people out as
much as possible.
jpnChrName: 一刻も早く慣れて市民の役に立つためです、 皆さまもどんどん私に頼ってください！
jpnSearchText:
一刻も早く慣れて市民の役に立つためです、
皆さまもどんどん私に頼ってください！

engChrName: I heard Cremona and the young miss are safe... Thank Goddess. I feel a great weight lifted from my shoulders.
engSearchText:
I heard Cremona and the young miss are safe...
Thank Goddess. I feel a great weight lifted from
my shoulders.
jpnChrName: お嬢様とクレモナがご無事と聞き…… 肩の荷が下りた気分ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様とクレモナがご無事と聞き……
肩の荷が下りた気分ですよ。

engChrName: So they took refuge at Aramis... That's good. They should be safe there until this all blows over.
engSearchText:
So they took refuge at Aramis... That's good.
They should be safe there until this all blows over.
jpnChrName: そうですか、アラミスに避難を……それならば、 一旦は安心できるというものです。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか、アラミスに避難を……それならば、
一旦は安心できるというものです。

engChrName: And with them safe, that lets me devote my undivided attention to protecting the building.
engSearchText:
And with them safe, that lets me devote my
undivided attention to protecting the building.
jpnChrName: ──でしたら、後顧の憂いも無いというもの。 改めてこの場を守る事に全力を尽くしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
──でしたら、後顧の憂いも無いというもの。
改めてこの場を守る事に全力を尽くしましょう。

engChrName: Lord Rocksmith and Elder Gien remain inside—they need someone to defend them.
engSearchText:
Lord Rocksmith and Elder Gien remain inside—they
need someone to defend them.
jpnChrName: ロックスミス閣下やギエン老もいらっしゃる、 決してこの場を離れる訳にはいきませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス閣下やギエン老もいらっしゃる、
決してこの場を離れる訳にはいきませんが……

engChrName: But I can't help but worry about the young lady... I had been tasked with keeping her safe.
engSearchText:
But I can't help but worry about the young lady...
I had been tasked with keeping her safe.
jpnChrName: やはりお嬢様がご無事であるかも不安ですな、 お嬢様の身の安全も託されておりますし……
jpnSearchText:
やはりお嬢様がご無事であるかも不安ですな、
お嬢様の身の安全も託されておりますし……

engChrName: ...No. I must focus on the task at hand. I can't let this old noggin of mine play tricks on me.
engSearchText:
...No. I must focus on the task at hand. I can't let this
old noggin of mine play tricks on me.
jpnChrName: 今は目の前の事に集中せねばならないのに、 やはり私も老いたものですか……
jpnSearchText:
今は目の前の事に集中せねばならないのに、
やはり私も老いたものですか……

engChrName: They've confirmed that the district police stations and other vital services are under control. That should allow them to reorganize.
engSearchText:
They've confirmed that the district police stations and
other vital services are under control. That should
allow them to reorganize.
jpnChrName: ……警察署など、地区内の各施設の無事も確認 できました、ある程度方針は立てられそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……警察署など、地区内の各施設の無事も確認
できました、ある程度方針は立てられそうです。

engChrName: I'm worried about the young miss...not to mention the countless others caught out there. But I can't let this hotel fall, either.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about the young miss...not to mention the
countless others caught out there. But I can't let this
hotel fall, either.
jpnChrName: お嬢様の事も含め心配事はまだ多いですが…… このホテルが重要な拠点となるのもまた事実。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様の事も含め心配事はまだ多いですが……
このホテルが重要な拠点となるのもまた事実。

engChrName: Until this storm clears, I know what I must do!
engSearchText: Until this storm clears, I know what I must do!
jpnChrName: でしたら、まずは私のすべき事は 決まっていると言えるでしょうな……！
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、まずは私のすべき事は
決まっていると言えるでしょうな……！

engChrName: It puts me at ease to see you safe. We've kept the hotel under our control so far...
engSearchText:
It puts me at ease to see you safe. We've kept the
hotel under our control so far...
jpnChrName: 皆さまもご無事でしたか……今のところ、 当ホテルの安全は確保されていますが……
jpnSearchText:
皆さまもご無事でしたか……今のところ、
当ホテルの安全は確保されていますが……

engChrName: ...but several guests are still inside. They're understandably confused—we're still in the dark, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
...but several guests are still inside.
They're understandably confused—we're still in the
dark, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: “停まって”しまったお客様もいますし、 何が起こるかわからない状況です……
jpnSearchText:
“停まって”しまったお客様もいますし、
何が起こるかわからない状況です……

engChrName: We've been able to recruit Heiyue, the police, and several VIP bodyguards to shore up our security, but our work is far from done.
engSearchText:
We've been able to recruit Heiyue, the police, and
several VIP bodyguards to shore up our security, but
our work is far from done.
jpnChrName: 警察や黒月、ＶＩＰの護衛の方とも共同で 守りを固めていますが、予断は許せませぬ……
jpnSearchText:
警察や黒月、ＶＩＰの護衛の方とも共同で
守りを固めていますが、予断は許せませぬ……

engChrName: I can only hope the young miss and Cremona are safe, wherever they may be.
engSearchText:
I can only hope the young miss and Cremona are
safe, wherever they may be.
jpnChrName: それに……お嬢様やクレモナの方も ご無事だと良いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
それに……お嬢様やクレモナの方も
ご無事だと良いのですが……

engChrName: I worry for Cremona and the young miss...but I cannot leave my post here at the hotel.
engSearchText:
I worry for Cremona and the young miss...but I
cannot leave my post here at the hotel.
jpnChrName: バーゼリアお嬢様やクレモナも心配ですが、 私にはお客様方の安全への責任があります……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼリアお嬢様やクレモナも心配ですが、
私にはお客様方の安全への責任があります……

engChrName: I have a duty to protect the guests here. As much as I wish to search for them, my fears will have to wait.
engSearchText:
I have a duty to protect the guests here. As much as I
wish to search for them, my fears will have to wait.
jpnChrName: すぐにでも二人を探しに行きたいですが、 こればかりはホテルマンとして仕方のない事。
jpnSearchText:
すぐにでも二人を探しに行きたいですが、
こればかりはホテルマンとして仕方のない事。

engChrName: I won't let these abominations lay a claw on our guests.
engSearchText:
I won't let these abominations lay a claw on
our guests.
jpnChrName: 今はこのホテルにいる方々を お守りする事に専念いたします。
jpnSearchText:
今はこのホテルにいる方々を
お守りする事に専念いたします。

engChrName: That said...if I may ask a favor of you: should you find them, please keep them safe for me.
engSearchText:
That said...if I may ask a favor of you: should you find
them, please keep them safe for me.
jpnChrName: ですが……あなた達がお嬢様達を見つける 事があれば、その時はお嬢様をどうかお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……あなた達がお嬢様達を見つける
事があれば、その時はお嬢様をどうかお願いします。

engChrName: Oh, have you come to enjoy the festival as well?
engSearchText: Oh, have you come to enjoy the festival as well?
jpnChrName: おや、皆さんも記念祭を見回られて おられるところですかな？
jpnSearchText:
おや、皆さんも記念祭を見回られて
おられるところですかな？

engChrName: Cremona and the young miss are attending the festival together today.
engSearchText:
Cremona and the young miss are attending the
festival together today.
jpnChrName: お嬢様も現在、クレモナの付き添いで 記念祭を楽しみに行かれております。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様も現在、クレモナの付き添いで
記念祭を楽しみに行かれております。

engChrName: She looked to be in high spirits when she went out. I believe she's been getting along much better with the president lately.
engSearchText:
She looked to be in high spirits when she went out.
I believe she's been getting along much better with
the president lately.
jpnChrName: 随分と晴れ晴れとした様子で出かけられました、 最近は頭取との仲も良好のようですしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
随分と晴れ晴れとした様子で出かけられました、
最近は頭取との仲も良好のようですしなぁ。

engChrName: You have my thanks for lifting her spirits... It brings a tear to this old man's eye.
engSearchText:
You have my thanks for lifting her spirits... It brings a
tear to this old man's eye.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こうしてお嬢様が前向きになれたのも 皆さまのお陰ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こうしてお嬢様が前向きになれたのも
皆さまのお陰ですよ。

engChrName: A pity that the president couldn't be here with her, but their relationship seems to be mended now.
engSearchText:
A pity that the president couldn't be here with her,
but their relationship seems to be mended now.
jpnChrName: 頭取は帰国が間に合いませんでしたが…… お嬢様との関係も改善しているようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
頭取は帰国が間に合いませんでしたが……
お嬢様との関係も改善しているようで何よりです。

engChrName: We must accept our own fault in stifling her and stunting her experiences.
engSearchText:
We must accept our own fault in stifling her and
stunting her experiences.
jpnChrName: まあ、お嬢様に窮屈な思いをさせていた私達にも やはり責任はあると思いますからね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お嬢様に窮屈な思いをさせていた私達にも
やはり責任はあると思いますからね。

engChrName: The young miss decided today to tour the festival with Cremona.
engSearchText:
The young miss decided today to tour the festival
with Cremona.
jpnChrName: 今日はクレモナに付き添ってもらって、 お嬢様には記念祭を楽しんでもらっています。
jpnSearchText:
今日はクレモナに付き添ってもらって、
お嬢様には記念祭を楽しんでもらっています。

engChrName: I do believe this will put the wind back in her sails. The President should be happy with that.
engSearchText:
I do believe this will put the wind back in her sails.
The President should be happy with that.
jpnChrName: これを機に、お嬢様のお気持ちが一層 晴れてくれると頭取も喜ばれるでしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
これを機に、お嬢様のお気持ちが一層
晴れてくれると頭取も喜ばれるでしょうな。

engChrName: We're a touch short-staffed today—Cremona is at the festival with the young miss. No need to worry, though.
engSearchText:
We're a touch short-staffed today—Cremona is at the
festival with the young miss. No need to
worry, though.
jpnChrName: クレモナがお嬢様に付き合っているため、 人手は減りましたがご心配には及びません。
jpnSearchText:
クレモナがお嬢様に付き合っているため、
人手は減りましたがご心配には及びません。

engChrName: I had already planned on being down on headcount for today in advance.
engSearchText:
I had already planned on being down on headcount
for today in advance.
jpnChrName: このラムズフェルド、記念祭の日の 人手不足などとうに織り込み済みですから。
jpnSearchText:
このラムズフェルド、記念祭の日の
人手不足などとうに織り込み済みですから。

engChrName: We'll still provide our top-shelf service in spite of it.
engSearchText: We'll still provide our top-shelf service in spite of it.
jpnChrName: 賓客の方々や外国からいらした方への対応も、 つつがなく行えておりますよ。
jpnSearchText:
賓客の方々や外国からいらした方への対応も、
つつがなく行えておりますよ。

engChrName: I'll have that cake sent along to your office, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I'll have that cake sent along to your office,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: 先程のケーキはヴァン様の事務所に 配達させて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
先程のケーキはヴァン様の事務所に
配達させて頂きます。

engChrName: I do hope you all enjoy it.
engSearchText: I do hope you all enjoy it.
jpnChrName: 是非、事務所の皆様と一緒に 召し上がってくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
是非、事務所の皆様と一緒に
召し上がってくださいませ。

engChrName: Oooh, thanks much. Hope that'll fit in our fridge, heh.
engSearchText:
Oooh, thanks much. Hope that'll fit in our
fridge, heh.
jpnChrName: 冷蔵庫に入り切るか心配だが…… ま、ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText:
冷蔵庫に入り切るか心配だが……
ま、ありがとよ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, the President's obligations will be keeping him away from home for the festival... I fear the young miss is hurt by his absence.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, the President's obligations will be
keeping him away from home for the festival... I fear
the young miss is hurt by his absence.
jpnChrName: やはり頭取は記念祭にも間に合わないようで…… お嬢様も内心では残念なのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
やはり頭取は記念祭にも間に合わないようで……
お嬢様も内心では残念なのでしょうな……

engChrName: She's taken to poetry, lately—she says it helps her put her more complicated thoughts into words.
engSearchText:
She's taken to poetry, lately—she says it helps her put
her more complicated thoughts into words.
jpnChrName: 今ではお嬢様はご自身の気持ちを上手く伝えるため、 ポエムにする事も模索しているようで……
jpnSearchText:
今ではお嬢様はご自身の気持ちを上手く伝えるため、
ポエムにする事も模索しているようで……

engChrName: I believe their worries will come to pass. They are parent and child. If they are open and honest with each other, all will heal in time.
engSearchText:
I believe their worries will come to pass. They are
parent and child. If they are open and honest with
each other, all will heal in time.
jpnChrName: そう焦らずとも親子の絆はある、 普通に交流を続ければ良いとは思うのですが……
jpnSearchText:
そう焦らずとも親子の絆はある、
普通に交流を続ければ良いとは思うのですが……

engChrName: Though, as things are now, I believe the young miss is putting on a forced smile. She hides a deep-seated ache in her heart...
engSearchText:
Though, as things are now, I believe the young miss is
putting on a forced smile. She hides a deep-seated
ache in her heart...
jpnChrName: やはり実際には、平気と言いつつも 寂しいところがあるのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
やはり実際には、平気と言いつつも
寂しいところがあるのでしょうな……

engChrName: This time of year is quite hectic for the hotel—VIPs aplenty are booking rooms for the festival.
engSearchText:
This time of year is quite hectic for the hotel—VIPs
aplenty are booking rooms for the festival.
jpnChrName: このホテルも、記念祭とその直後は多くの ＶＩＰで賑わうことになりますが……
jpnSearchText:
このホテルも、記念祭とその直後は多くの
ＶＩＰで賑わうことになりますが……

engChrName: But after the festival comes and goes, I should see about bringing the president and the young miss closer together.
engSearchText:
But after the festival comes and goes, I should see
about bringing the president and the young miss
closer together.
jpnChrName: 諸々が落ち着いたら、お嬢様と頭取の 交流の機会をご用意できれば良いものです。
jpnSearchText:
諸々が落ち着いたら、お嬢様と頭取の
交流の機会をご用意できれば良いものです。

engChrName: On the surface, the situation has calmed down—the city is awash with festival cheer.
engSearchText:
On the surface, the situation has calmed down—the
city is awash with festival cheer.
jpnChrName: 世間的には事態が収束し、記念祭も無事に 開かれるというムードではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
世間的には事態が収束し、記念祭も無事に
開かれるというムードではありますが……

engChrName: But the order of events in Oración remains a mystery, and the government and economy are rife with turmoil.
engSearchText:
But the order of events in Oración remains a mystery,
and the government and economy are rife
with turmoil.
jpnChrName: やはりオラシオン方面での顛末もあり、 政財界には今でも混乱が残っております。
jpnSearchText:
やはりオラシオン方面での顛末もあり、
政財界には今でも混乱が残っております。

engChrName: The President has his hands full trying to navigate it all... He's told us that he won't be home for the festival as a result.
engSearchText:
The President has his hands full trying to navigate
it all... He's told us that he won't be home for the
festival as a result.
jpnChrName: 頭取もそうした影響への対処でお忙しくなり…… 記念祭もお嬢様と迎える事は出来ないようで……
jpnSearchText:
頭取もそうした影響への対処でお忙しくなり……
記念祭もお嬢様と迎える事は出来ないようで……

engChrName: The young miss feels as though she only ever sees him through a screen these days.
engSearchText:
The young miss feels as though she only ever sees
him through a screen these days.
jpnChrName: もっとも、お嬢様は今では頭取と通信で 多少なりとの交流は出来ているようですが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、お嬢様は今では頭取と通信で
多少なりとの交流は出来ているようですが。

engChrName: We've had quite a number of emergency meetings at the hotel recently.
engSearchText:
We've had quite a number of emergency meetings at
the hotel recently.
jpnChrName: この数日間、当ホテルでも多くの 緊急会合が行われましたが……
jpnSearchText:
この数日間、当ホテルでも多くの
緊急会合が行われましたが……

engChrName: Though the boardroom is not my place, I would be honored to assist the president with whatever official matters he might need.
engSearchText:
Though the boardroom is not my place, I would be
honored to assist the president with whatever official
matters he might need.
jpnChrName: 窓口として少しでも会合の円滑化に 役立てていたならこの上なく光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
窓口として少しでも会合の円滑化に
役立てていたならこの上なく光栄です。

engChrName: The President and the young miss finally had a heart-to-heart. They had a lot on their chests, it seems...
engSearchText:
The President and the young miss finally had
a heart-to-heart. They had a lot on their chests,
it seems...
jpnChrName: 今回は頭取はお嬢様に直接心配のご連絡を…… やはり、内心気に病んでおられたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
今回は頭取はお嬢様に直接心配のご連絡を……
やはり、内心気に病んでおられたのでしょう。

engChrName: And, well, perhaps being relieved might be a bit uncouth of me...
engSearchText:
And, well, perhaps being relieved might be a bit
uncouth of me...
jpnChrName: ですが……この非常時に在って喜びなどと 言って良いのかは分かりませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ですが……この非常時に在って喜びなどと
言って良いのかは分かりませんが……

engChrName: ...but it puts me at ease to see them finally being forthcoming with each other, even as these revelations cause them grief.
engSearchText:
...but it puts me at ease to see them finally being
forthcoming with each other, even as these
revelations cause them grief.
jpnChrName: お嬢様に頭取の気持ちが届き、そしてお嬢様も 想いを返さんとしているのは感無量です。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様に頭取の気持ちが届き、そしてお嬢様も
想いを返さんとしているのは感無量です。

engChrName: This is the first step on the road to a mended relationship. Now they can begin to heal.
engSearchText:
This is the first step on the road to a
mended relationship. Now they can begin to heal.
jpnChrName: もっとも、お嬢様も不器用故、気持ちがちゃんと 伝わっているかは不安もあるようですが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、お嬢様も不器用故、気持ちがちゃんと
伝わっているかは不安もあるようですが。

engChrName: In case you were wondering about the young miss, she was worried that her father wouldn't accept her feelings... When he found out, he was hurt.
engSearchText:
In case you were wondering about the young miss,
she was worried that her father wouldn't accept her
feelings... When he found out, he was hurt.
jpnChrName: この状況を心配し、頭取がお嬢様に真っ先に 連絡して下さるとは……
jpnSearchText:
この状況を心配し、頭取がお嬢様に真っ先に
連絡して下さるとは……

engChrName: Surprisingly, he took the initiative and reached out to her himself. She was quite taken aback...but eager to talk, indeed.
engSearchText:
Surprisingly, he took the initiative and reached out to
her himself. She was quite taken aback...but eager to
talk, indeed.
jpnChrName: お嬢様も驚き、そして何か秘めた言葉を 訴えたいご様子……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様も驚き、そして何か秘めた言葉を
訴えたいご様子……

engChrName: I'm not privy to what they discussed...but I don't need to be. I only need to watch over them and help them mend their bond.
engSearchText:
I'm not privy to what they discussed...but I don't need
to be. I only need to watch over them and help them
mend their bond.
jpnChrName: ご家族のご縁が再び結ばれる貴重な機会…… 成就できるよう、しかとお守りせねば。
jpnSearchText:
ご家族のご縁が再び結ばれる貴重な機会……
成就できるよう、しかとお守りせねば。

engChrName: Come what may, I will keep our guests safe here day in and day out.
engSearchText:
Come what may, I will keep our guests safe here day
in and day out.
jpnChrName: このような事態になってしまいましたが、私は ホテルの皆さまを責任をもってお守りいたします。
jpnSearchText:
このような事態になってしまいましたが、私は
ホテルの皆さまを責任をもってお守りいたします。

engChrName: We're coordinating a plan of action with Polanski. Information is scarce, but we cannot act too rashly.
engSearchText:
We're coordinating a plan of action with Polanski.
Information is scarce, but we cannot act too rashly.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員などとも連携し、各所の情報を 把握しつつ、対応してまいります。
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員などとも連携し、各所の情報を
把握しつつ、対応してまいります。

engChrName: Godspeed to those brave souls out there... It puts me at ease to know my Edith is in capable hands.
engSearchText:
Godspeed to those brave souls out there... It puts me
at ease to know my Edith is in capable hands.
jpnChrName: 私の古巣であるこの国の公安も…… 信頼に足る方々のはずです。
jpnSearchText:
私の古巣であるこの国の公安も……
信頼に足る方々のはずです。

engChrName: For now, all we can do is wait. We must hold firm and yield no quarter!
engSearchText:
For now, all we can do is wait. We must hold firm
and yield no quarter!
jpnChrName: 今は各々が守るべきを守り、そして 然るべき報せを待つとしましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
今は各々が守るべきを守り、そして
然るべき報せを待つとしましょう……！

engChrName: Young miss Berzelia returned home earlier than usual today...
engSearchText:
Young miss Berzelia returned home earlier than
usual today...
jpnChrName: バーゼリアお嬢様は……今日は普段より早く 最上階にお戻りになりました。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼリアお嬢様は……今日は普段より早く
最上階にお戻りになりました。

engChrName: I do sympathize... She and her father have a complicated relationship.
engSearchText:
I do sympathize... She and her father have a
complicated relationship.
jpnChrName: お父様との関係を思えば、複雑な気持ちも わかりますが……難しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
お父様との関係を思えば、複雑な気持ちも
わかりますが……難しいものです。

engChrName: Forgive me, young miss... I have failed you. I was entrusted with your safety, and I could not protect it.
engSearchText:
Forgive me, young miss... I have failed you. I was
entrusted with your safety, and I could not protect it.
jpnChrName: 先日の事件は今思っても、護衛を含め 託された身としては痛恨の極みでした……
jpnSearchText:
先日の事件は今思っても、護衛を含め
託された身としては痛恨の極みでした……

engChrName: My only solace is that the president found an opportunity to show the young miss his love. That she's always in his heart, come what may.
engSearchText:
My only solace is that the president found an
opportunity to show the young miss his love.
That she's always in his heart, come what may.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、頭取がお忙しいながらお嬢様を 想っている事が伝わった事だけは……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、頭取がお忙しいながらお嬢様を
想っている事が伝わった事だけは……

engChrName: I cannot express how deeply it moves me to be able to help them.
engSearchText:
I cannot express how deeply it moves me to be able to
help them.
jpnChrName: お二人に仕えて、これほどまでに 感慨深く思えた事は無いでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
お二人に仕えて、これほどまでに
感慨深く思えた事は無いでしょうな……

engChrName: That incident was nerve-racking. Thank Aidios the young miss has returned safely.
engSearchText:
That incident was nerve-racking. Thank Aidios the
young miss has returned safely.
jpnChrName: お嬢様が紆余曲折の末、無事に戻られて 何よりではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様が紆余曲折の末、無事に戻られて
何よりではありますが……

engChrName: Her relationship with the Presi—her father. I can tell they care deeply for each other, despite their strained ties.
engSearchText:
Her relationship with the Presi—her father. I can tell
they care deeply for each other, despite their
strained ties.
jpnChrName: やはり、頭取……いえ、お父様との 関係には根深いものがあるのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、頭取……いえ、お父様との
関係には根深いものがあるのでしょうな……

engChrName: If only there were a way for her father to... demonstrate that to her.
engSearchText:
If only there were a way for her father to...
demonstrate that to her.
jpnChrName: お父様とてお嬢様を忘れている訳ではない。 その事が伝われば良いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
お父様とてお嬢様を忘れている訳ではない。
その事が伝われば良いのですが……

engChrName: Oh. Hello, sir.
engSearchText: Oh. Hello, sir.
jpnChrName: おや、ごきげんよう。
jpnSearchText: おや、ごきげんよう。

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, yeah. Hi.
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, yeah. Hi.
jpnChrName: ？　ああ……どうも。
jpnSearchText: ？　ああ……どうも。

engChrName: (Guy looks like a butler or something. What's he doin' here?)
engSearchText:
(Guy looks like a butler or something. What's he
doin' here?)
jpnChrName: （執事みてえだが……   こんな所でどうしたんだ？）
jpnSearchText:
（執事みてえだが……
こんな所でどうしたんだ？）

engChrName: (He seems to be waiting for someone.)
engSearchText: (He seems to be waiting for someone.)
jpnChrName: （どなたかと待ち合わせをしている   ような雰囲気ですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（どなたかと待ち合わせをしている
ような雰囲気ですが……）

engChrName: That staged kidnapping, Desire's betrayal... These few days have been a whirlwind.
engSearchText:
That staged kidnapping, Desire's betrayal...
These few days have been a whirlwind.
jpnChrName: 狂言誘拐に、《ディザイア》の裏切り…… 色々な事がありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
狂言誘拐に、《ディザイア》の裏切り……
色々な事がありましたが……

engChrName: But at the end of it all, I was able to see the young miss smile in earnest. I could ask for nothing more than that.
engSearchText:
But at the end of it all, I was able to see the young
miss smile in earnest. I could ask for nothing more
than that.
jpnChrName: お嬢様の晴れやかな表情を見る事が出来ましたし、 お嬢様のご友人も増え、嬉しく思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様の晴れやかな表情を見る事が出来ましたし、
お嬢様のご友人も増え、嬉しく思いますよ。

engChrName: But this is no time to rest on my laurels.
engSearchText: But this is no time to rest on my laurels.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、安堵してばかりもいられません。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、安堵してばかりもいられません。

engChrName: I need to reevaluate our security detail and report my findings to the president.
engSearchText:
I need to reevaluate our security detail and report my
findings to the president.
jpnChrName: 警備体制の見直しなど 旦那様への報告も考えておかねばなりませんな。
jpnSearchText:
警備体制の見直しなど
旦那様への報告も考えておかねばなりませんな。

engChrName: I do wish he would... No, no, I mustn't overstep my bounds.
engSearchText:
I do wish he would... No, no, I mustn't overstep
my bounds.
jpnChrName: ……あのお方とて、決して…… いえ、そこに口を出すべきではないですか……
jpnSearchText:
……あのお方とて、決して……
いえ、そこに口を出すべきではないですか……

engChrName: I simply can't help but wish they would reach out to each other. Watching over the young miss has made me see the clouds within her heart.
engSearchText:
I simply can't help but wish they would reach out to
each other. Watching over the young miss has made
me see the clouds within her heart.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……託され…、見守る以上は…… 何とかお二人が歩み寄ってくだされば……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……託され…、見守る以上は……
何とかお二人が歩み寄ってくだされば……

engChrName: Welcome, and thank you for coming to the Maserati Hotel.
engSearchText:
Welcome, and thank you for coming to the
Maserati Hotel.
jpnChrName: 《マセラティ・ホテル》へようこそ おいで下さいました。
jpnSearchText:
《マセラティ・ホテル》へようこそ
おいで下さいました。

engChrName: If you need anything, don't hesitate to ask the staff.
engSearchText: If you need anything, don't hesitate to ask the staff.
jpnChrName: 何かご用件があれば、スタッフに 遠慮なくお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
何かご用件があれば、スタッフに
遠慮なくお申し付けください。

engChrName: Our parent company, the Bank of Edith, holds a host of meetings and other events at our conference center.
engSearchText:
Our parent company, the Bank of Edith, holds a host
of meetings and other events at our
conference center.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルは親会社であるＢＯＥ（バンクオブイーディス）関連企業との 会合等でも使われております。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルは親会社であるＢＯＥ（バンクオブイーディス）関連企業との
会合等でも使われております。

engChrName: For such occasions, I act as a liaison between our guests and visitors. If I may help you in any way, you need only ask.
engSearchText:
For such occasions, I act as a liaison between our
guests and visitors. If I may help you in any way, you
need only ask.
jpnChrName: そうした方面との窓口としても責任を持って 対応しますので、何かあればご相談ください。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方面との窓口としても責任を持って
対応しますので、何かあればご相談ください。

engChrName: Hmm. I do wish that the president might... Ah. Sorry, pay me no mind.
engSearchText:
Hmm. I do wish that the president might... Ah.
Sorry, pay me no mind.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、それにしても最近はあの方も…… いえ、何でもございません。
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、それにしても最近はあの方も……
いえ、何でもございません。

engChrName: I am but one of many entrusted with your visit here. If there's anything you need, we're happy to help.
engSearchText:
I am but one of many entrusted with your visit here.
If there's anything you need, we're happy to help.
jpnChrName: このホテルを含め諸々を預かる身として、 何かあればお伺いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
このホテルを含め諸々を預かる身として、
何かあればお伺いいたします。

engChrName: In addition to hospitality, we offer other services such as meetings and catering on behalf of the Bank of Edith.
engSearchText:
In addition to hospitality, we offer other services such
as meetings and catering on behalf of the Bank
of Edith.
jpnChrName: ご宿泊・ご休憩の他、ＢＯＥ関係者への取次なども 可能な範囲で対応しますので何なりと。
jpnSearchText:
ご宿泊・ご休憩の他、ＢＯＥ関係者への取次なども
可能な範囲で対応しますので何なりと。

engChrName: The young miss returned to her room earlier than usual today...
engSearchText:
The young miss returned to her room earlier than
usual today...
jpnChrName: ……お嬢様、今日は随分と早く 自室に戻られるようで……
jpnSearchText:
……お嬢様、今日は随分と早く
自室に戻られるようで……

engChrName: It does relieve me, honestly. We've seen some... unscrupulous activity on these streets as of late. I'd rather her be here where it's safe.
engSearchText:
It does relieve me, honestly. We've seen some...
unscrupulous activity on these streets as of late.
I'd rather her be here where it's safe.
jpnChrName: もっとも、近頃外で見知らぬ若者らと 交流していた事を思えば安心できますが……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、近頃外で見知らぬ若者らと
交流していた事を思えば安心できますが……

engChrName: You promised not to mention that... I just came home early because there wasn't much else going on.
engSearchText:
You promised not to mention that... I just came home
early because there wasn't much else going on.
jpnChrName: じいや、それは言わない約束ですわ。 今日だって音沙汰がなかったから帰るだけ。
jpnSearchText:
じいや、それは言わない約束ですわ。
今日だって音沙汰がなかったから帰るだけ。

engChrName: So I figured I'd just...ruminate to myself tonight. Everyone needs those nights every now and then...
engSearchText:
So I figured I'd just...ruminate to myself tonight.
Everyone needs those nights every now and then...
jpnChrName: わたしだって、一人で自分の境遇と向き合う 感傷に浸って過ごす夜くらい欲しいもの。
jpnSearchText:
わたしだって、一人で自分の境遇と向き合う
感傷に浸って過ごす夜くらい欲しいもの。

engChrName: I see... My apologies. I will respect your wishes.
engSearchText: I see... My apologies. I will respect your wishes.
jpnChrName: ……そうですか、お嬢様のご意思は 最大限尊重するつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
……そうですか、お嬢様のご意思は
最大限尊重するつもりです。

engChrName: That said, if I may help you with anything at all, you need only ask.
engSearchText:
That said, if I may help you with anything at all, you
need only ask.
jpnChrName: ですが、何か悩みがあれば私に言ってください。
jpnSearchText: ですが、何か悩みがあれば私に言ってください。

engChrName: I've been tasked with seeing to your needs, and that extends beyond just cooking and cleaning.
engSearchText:
I've been tasked with seeing to your needs, and that
extends beyond just cooking and cleaning.
jpnChrName: 私とて、単に身の回りの事を 託されているだけでは決してありませんので。
jpnSearchText:
私とて、単に身の回りの事を
託されているだけでは決してありませんので。

engChrName: Sure, maybe, eventually. Just...not right now.
engSearchText: Sure, maybe, eventually. Just...not right now.
jpnChrName: その時が来たらね、今はそんな気分じゃないの。
jpnSearchText: その時が来たらね、今はそんな気分じゃないの。

engChrName: Tonight I'm just going to head up and let my mind wander into the night sky... *sigh* As I always do.
engSearchText:
Tonight I'm just going to head up and let my mind
wander into the night sky... *sigh* As I always do.
jpnChrName: 今夜も最上階で夜景を見ながら寝る事にするわ。
jpnSearchText: 今夜も最上階で夜景を見ながら寝る事にするわ。

engChrName: (Those two related or somethin'?)
engSearchText: (Those two related or somethin'?)
jpnChrName: （この二人は……どういう関係なんだ？）
jpnSearchText: （この二人は……どういう関係なんだ？）

engChrName: (She doesn't strike me as just a guest—not with how they talk to each other.)
engSearchText:
(She doesn't strike me as just a guest—not with how
they talk to each other.)
jpnChrName: （単にホテルの主任と最上階に泊まってる   お嬢様ってだけじゃないのは明白だが……）
jpnSearchText:
（単にホテルの主任と最上階に泊まってる
お嬢様ってだけじゃないのは明白だが……）

engChrName: (I should make a mental note of that. Might come up later.)
engSearchText:
(I should make a mental note of that. Might come
up later.)
jpnChrName: （仕事に絡む可能性もあるし、   一応は気に留めておくとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（仕事に絡む可能性もあるし、
一応は気に留めておくとするか。）

engChrName: Whenever the festival rolls around, we get a bunch of VIPs and other influential guests from every corner of the continent.
engSearchText:
Whenever the festival rolls around, we get a bunch of
VIPs and other influential guests from every corner of
the continent.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に際しては、当ホテルには他国の 有力者も含め多くのＶＩＰがいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に際しては、当ホテルには他国の
有力者も含め多くのＶＩＰがいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: It's kind of exciting, honestly. It's not often you get this many of the world's movers and shakers all in one place.
engSearchText:
It's kind of exciting, honestly. It's not often you get
this many of the world's movers and shakers all in
one place.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ここまで多くの有力者が一堂に会する 機会はそうそうありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ここまで多くの有力者が一堂に会する
機会はそうそうありませんしね。

engChrName: The festival's our big chance to strut our stuff, and this year's shaping up to be even bigger than usual.
engSearchText:
The festival's our big chance to strut our stuff, and
this year's shaping up to be even bigger than usual.
jpnChrName: 毎年、記念祭は腕が鳴るものです。 今年はより一層楽しいものになりそうですしね。
jpnSearchText:
毎年、記念祭は腕が鳴るものです。
今年はより一層楽しいものになりそうですしね。

engChrName: There was that whole thing with the Quincy Company in Oración, so a lot of suits and bigwigs are under investigation right now.
engSearchText:
There was that whole thing with the Quincy
Company in Oración, so a lot of suits and bigwigs are
under investigation right now.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでは、クインシー社などの事もあり、 企業や名家の方々に捜索が入っているようで……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでは、クインシー社などの事もあり、
企業や名家の方々に捜索が入っているようで……

engChrName: I've heard even Hotel Leclerc got dragged into it, since that was where a lot of them were staying.
engSearchText:
I've heard even Hotel Leclerc got dragged into it,
since that was where a lot of them were staying.
jpnChrName: 社交界等で使用される、オラシオンのホテルでも 相応の混乱があると聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
社交界等で使用される、オラシオンのホテルでも
相応の混乱があると聞きます。

engChrName: We've dealt with a few Oración VIPs here ourselves, come to think of it.
engSearchText:
We've dealt with a few Oración VIPs here ourselves,
come to think of it.
jpnChrName: ……私もある程度はオラシオンの名士の方々を 接客した経験はございますが……
jpnSearchText:
……私もある程度はオラシオンの名士の方々を
接客した経験はございますが……

engChrName: ...And y'know, I do think they had some shady business going on, between you and me. Maybe all that scrutiny is warranted.
engSearchText:
...And y'know, I do think they had some shady
business going on, between you and me. Maybe all
that scrutiny is warranted.
jpnChrName: 今思えば、ある程度は調査の入りそうな 家や企業は想像できますね……
jpnSearchText:
今思えば、ある程度は調査の入りそうな
家や企業は想像できますね……

engChrName: It just... It breaks my heart. But we can't lose our way... We have to all band together to overcome this.
engSearchText:
It just... It breaks my heart. But we can't lose
our way... We have to all band together to
overcome this.
jpnChrName: 酷い事件で胸が張り裂けそうな想いですが、 今は共和国が一丸となって動くべき時……
jpnSearchText:
酷い事件で胸が張り裂けそうな想いですが、
今は共和国が一丸となって動くべき時……

engChrName: I was actually working here when the war broke out. A bunch of Calvardian VIPs came here for an emergency meeting.
engSearchText:
I was actually working here when the war broke out.
A bunch of Calvardian VIPs came here for an
emergency meeting.
jpnChrName: 前の戦争の時も、このホテルで私は有力者の方々の 緊急会合をサポートして参りました。
jpnSearchText:
前の戦争の時も、このホテルで私は有力者の方々の
緊急会合をサポートして参りました。

engChrName: And now we've got Senator Polanski and others here. We have to keep them safe and help them resolve this, ASAP.
engSearchText:
And now we've got Senator Polanski and others
here. We have to keep them safe and help them
resolve this, ASAP.
jpnChrName: 今回も、ポランスキー議員を始めとした皆さまを できる事で支え、事態の打開に助力できれば……
jpnSearchText:
今回も、ポランスキー議員を始めとした皆さまを
できる事で支え、事態の打開に助力できれば……

engChrName: The Republican Party frequents this hotel for their meetings—Polanski's a familiar face here.
engSearchText:
The Republican Party frequents this hotel for their
meetings—Polanski's a familiar face here.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員を始め、共和党の方々には 昔から当ホテルをよくご利用いただいています。
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員を始め、共和党の方々には
昔から当ホテルをよくご利用いただいています。

engChrName: That CEO who just checked out, she's been coming here more often as of late.
engSearchText:
That CEO who just checked out, she's been coming
here more often as of late.
jpnChrName: 先ほどお出かけになった女性社長は ここ最近のご利用ですが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほどお出かけになった女性社長は
ここ最近のご利用ですが……

engChrName: And she's far from the only one. A lot of those types hold meetings here with members of the Republican Party.
engSearchText:
And she's far from the only one. A lot of those types
hold meetings here with members of the
Republican Party.
jpnChrName: あのように、共和党議員との会合などで 当ホテルをご利用になる事業者も多いものです。
jpnSearchText:
あのように、共和党議員との会合などで
当ホテルをご利用になる事業者も多いものです。

engChrName: I think those two over there are on a blind date. See them over there...?
engSearchText:
I think those two over there are on a blind date.
See them over there...?
jpnChrName: あちらのお二人、どうやらお見合いのようで……
jpnSearchText: あちらのお二人、どうやらお見合いのようで……

engChrName: She looks like she hasn't gone on that many dates before...kinda awkward, ish. But there's something cute about that, heehee.
engSearchText:
She looks like she hasn't gone on that many dates
before...kinda awkward, ish. But there's something
cute about that, heehee.
jpnChrName: 女性の方は自然体とは言い難いですが、 そこにも初々しさがあるもので……
jpnSearchText:
女性の方は自然体とは言い難いですが、
そこにも初々しさがあるもので……

engChrName: Him, on the other hand... That young man's got it all figured out. Just look at how he carries himself—a real cock of the walk type.
engSearchText:
Him, on the other hand... That young man's got it all
figured out. Just look at how he carries himself—a
real cock of the walk type.
jpnChrName: 男性の方は所作と身なりを見るに、 若いながらそれなりの地位のある方のようで……
jpnSearchText:
男性の方は所作と身なりを見るに、
若いながらそれなりの地位のある方のようで……

engChrName: Even if they don't have the chemistry, it'll still be a good learning experience for her. It's nice to get out there!
engSearchText:
Even if they don't have the chemistry, it'll still be a
good learning experience for her. It's nice to get
out there!
jpnChrName: 仮に失敗したとしても、あちらの女性にとって 良い経験となり、次に活きる事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
仮に失敗したとしても、あちらの女性にとって
良い経験となり、次に活きる事でしょう。

engChrName: The young miss would normally be hanging around in the lobby at this time of day...
engSearchText:
The young miss would normally be hanging around in
the lobby at this time of day...
jpnChrName: 普段であればこの時間はロビーに いらっしゃるあのお嬢様……
jpnSearchText:
普段であればこの時間はロビーに
いらっしゃるあのお嬢様……

engChrName: And she's not in her penthouse either. Where could she have gone, I wonder?
engSearchText:
And she's not in her penthouse either. Where could
she have gone, I wonder?
jpnChrName: 最上階の宿泊部屋にもいらっしゃらない ようですが、どこに行かれたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
最上階の宿泊部屋にもいらっしゃらない
ようですが、どこに行かれたのでしょう。

engChrName: It's a little early for her usual walk, and she's been gone far longer than usual.
engSearchText:
It's a little early for her usual walk, and she's been
gone far longer than usual.
jpnChrName: 普段の出歩きにしては、どうにも 急な上に長いというか……
jpnSearchText:
普段の出歩きにしては、どうにも
急な上に長いというか……

engChrName: Rumsfeld has been acting strangely, too. Something smells fishy...
engSearchText:
Rumsfeld has been acting strangely, too.
Something smells fishy...
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド主任も只ならぬご様子ですし、 もしや何かが……
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド主任も只ならぬご様子ですし、
もしや何かが……

engChrName: So you see, the young miss is the daughter of the president of the Bank of Edith.
engSearchText:
So you see, the young miss is the daughter of the
president of the Bank of Edith.
jpnChrName: あのお嬢様がＢＯＥ頭取のご息女だったとは……
jpnSearchText: あのお嬢様がＢＯＥ頭取のご息女だったとは……

engChrName: I knew our penthouse had been permanently booked for ages, but I didn't realize she was outright living there.
engSearchText:
I knew our penthouse had been permanently booked
for ages, but I didn't realize she was outright
living there.
jpnChrName: 随分と長い事最上階を借り切っているとは 思いましたが、そのような事情が……
jpnSearchText:
随分と長い事最上階を借り切っているとは
思いましたが、そのような事情が……

engChrName: I just can't believe they would take advantage of the young miss like that... The nerve of them!
engSearchText:
I just can't believe they would take advantage of the
young miss like that... The nerve of them!
jpnChrName: ……それにしてもその不良たち、お嬢様の寂しさに 付け込んであのような事をするとは……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしてもその不良たち、お嬢様の寂しさに
付け込んであのような事をするとは……

engChrName: I was just beside myself when I heard the news. How dare they play with family ties...?!
engSearchText:
I was just beside myself when I heard the news.
How dare they play with family ties...?!
jpnChrName: 他者の家族の絆を弄んでいると言えますね、 伝え聞いただけでも許せない思いです。
jpnSearchText:
他者の家族の絆を弄んでいると言えますね、
伝え聞いただけでも許せない思いです。

engChrName: This hotel is popular among government officials— we even have some staying here now.
engSearchText:
This hotel is popular among government officials—
we even have some staying here now.
jpnChrName: 今もございますが、当ホテルには議員など 政財界の方がご宿泊される事も多いです。
jpnSearchText:
今もございますが、当ホテルには議員など
政財界の方がご宿泊される事も多いです。

engChrName: That did bite us once...twenty years ago. Several senators were targeted here...
engSearchText:
That did bite us once...twenty years ago.
Several senators were targeted here...
jpnChrName: ２０年前のあの事件じゃ……そうした 議員の方が標的になったと言います。
jpnSearchText:
２０年前のあの事件じゃ……そうした
議員の方が標的になったと言います。

engChrName: We've since upped our security to make sure that never happens again.
engSearchText:
We've since upped our security to make sure that
never happens again.
jpnChrName: 無論、今では二度と同じ事のないよう 安全対策に一層気を遣っておりますが。
jpnSearchText:
無論、今では二度と同じ事のないよう
安全対策に一層気を遣っておりますが。

engChrName: Oh, but, err, please don't tell anyone I referenced that incident. It's a sensitive topic.
engSearchText:
Oh, but, err, please don't tell anyone I referenced
that incident. It's a sensitive topic.
jpnChrName: あっ、あの事件の事を 私がお話した事は内緒にして下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、あの事件の事を
私がお話した事は内緒にして下さいね。

engChrName: It WAS twenty years ago, so I don't really think it's all that big anymore...
engSearchText:
It WAS twenty years ago, so I don't really think it's
all that big anymore...
jpnChrName: ２０年前の事ですから 時効だとは思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
２０年前の事ですから
時効だとは思いますけど……

engChrName: ...but the top brass wanted us to keep quiet for a reason.
engSearchText:
...but the top brass wanted us to keep quiet for
a reason.
jpnChrName: お偉方からきつく 口止めされていた話ですから。
jpnSearchText:
お偉方からきつく
口止めされていた話ですから。

engChrName: We had SOME security twenty years ago, but nothing like what we have today.
engSearchText:
We had SOME security twenty years ago, but
nothing like what we have today.
jpnChrName: ２０年前にも当ホテルでは防犯には 気を遣っておりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
２０年前にも当ホテルでは防犯には
気を遣っておりましたが……

engChrName: We wouldn't let something like that happen in today's Maserati. No, sir.
engSearchText:
We wouldn't let something like that happen in
today's Maserati. No, sir.
jpnChrName: 現在ではあの事件を教訓に安全対策を より一層充実させれおります、特に……
jpnSearchText:
現在ではあの事件を教訓に安全対策を
より一層充実させれおります、特に……

engChrName: Mr. Rumsfeld, he's been a big part of that overhaul. He was working elsewhere in the Bank before joining us as head of security.
engSearchText:
Mr. Rumsfeld, he's been a big part of that overhaul.
He was working elsewhere in the Bank before joining
us as head of security.
jpnChrName: ＢＯＥからの出向の形でいらした責任者である ラムズフェルド主任の功績は大きいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ＢＯＥからの出向の形でいらした責任者である
ラムズフェルド主任の功績は大きいでしょう。

engChrName: Welcome to the Maserati Hotel! Thank you for visiting us today.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Maserati Hotel! Thank you for
visiting us today.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、《マセラティ・ホテル》へ ご来館ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、《マセラティ・ホテル》へ
ご来館ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Our dining hall is open for reservations, if you're in the market for fine dining.
engSearchText:
Our dining hall is open for reservations, if you're in
the market for fine dining.
jpnChrName: ダイニングをご利用されている方は、 私共にお気軽にお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
ダイニングをご利用されている方は、
私共にお気軽にお申し付けください。

engChrName: I haven't just rested on my laurels in my twenty years here. I've polished my skills to a mirror sheen— you request it, I can handle it!
engSearchText:
I haven't just rested on my laurels in my twenty
years here. I've polished my skills to a mirror sheen—
you request it, I can handle it!
jpnChrName: 私も伊達に２０年以上働いていません。 最高の休息の場を提供すべく尽力いたします。
jpnSearchText:
私も伊達に２０年以上働いていません。
最高の休息の場を提供すべく尽力いたします。

engChrName: The young miss really enjoyed herself today. I'm glad I was able to come with her!
engSearchText:
The young miss really enjoyed herself today. I'm glad
I was able to come with her!
jpnChrName: ふふ、お嬢様がとても楽しんでいるようで、 付き添わせて頂いた甲斐がありました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お嬢様がとても楽しんでいるようで、
付き添わせて頂いた甲斐がありました。

engChrName: And I must say, it's a relief to see you talking to your father more. I can tell it's lifted your spirits.
engSearchText:
And I must say, it's a relief to see you talking to your
father more. I can tell it's lifted your spirits.
jpnChrName: お父様とも最近は連絡されていますし、 ご機嫌がよろしいようで……
jpnSearchText:
お父様とも最近は連絡されていますし、
ご機嫌がよろしいようで……

engChrName: I-It hasn't! It just...happened to coincide with some brighter times.
engSearchText:
I-It hasn't! It just...happened to coincide with some
brighter times.
jpnChrName: そ、そんなんじゃないわよクレモナ…… ただ、こういう機会は無駄にしたくないだけ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなんじゃないわよクレモナ……
ただ、こういう機会は無駄にしたくないだけ！

engChrName: If he truly cared, he'd attend the festival with me...but of course not. He's too busy for his family. Did you forget that little detail?
engSearchText:
If he truly cared, he'd attend the festival with me...but
of course not. He's too busy for his family. Did you
forget that little detail?
jpnChrName: お父様だって、結局記念祭に間に合ってないの、 別に許したわけじゃないんだからねっ！
jpnSearchText:
お父様だって、結局記念祭に間に合ってないの、
別に許したわけじゃないんだからねっ！

engChrName: I did not. These things will take time, of course... For now, I'm just happy to see you happy.
engSearchText:
I did not. These things will take time, of course...
For now, I'm just happy to see you happy.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでもお嬢様が前向きに 楽しんでいるだけでも嬉しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでもお嬢様が前向きに
楽しんでいるだけでも嬉しいものです。

engChrName: Now, do you have somewhere in mind you'd like to visit? Perhaps the Riverside Concert Hall?
engSearchText:
Now, do you have somewhere in mind you'd like
to visit? Perhaps the Riverside Concert Hall?
jpnChrName: さて、この後はどこに行かれますか？ リバーサイドのライブハウスなどでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
さて、この後はどこに行かれますか？
リバーサイドのライブハウスなどでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm... The Blue Score has an idol concert today. I'm not too fond of those...
engSearchText:
Hmm... The Blue Score has an idol concert today.
I'm not too fond of those...
jpnChrName: そうねぇ……《ブルースコア》は今日はアイドルの ライブらしくて、私好みではないわ。
jpnSearchText:
そうねぇ……《ブルースコア》は今日はアイドルの
ライブらしくて、私好みではないわ。

engChrName: Why don't we tour Aramis instead? I'm set to go there in a few years, after all.
engSearchText:
Why don't we tour Aramis instead? I'm set to go
there in a few years, after all.
jpnChrName: どうせなら、アラミスを見に行くのはどうかしら？ 私も何年かしたら入る予定なのだし……
jpnSearchText:
どうせなら、アラミスを見に行くのはどうかしら？
私も何年かしたら入る予定なのだし……

engChrName: My, my. Making such forward-thinking decisions at your age?
engSearchText:
My, my. Making such forward-thinking decisions at
your age?
jpnChrName: おや……お嬢様がご自身の将来を見据えて そのような選択をされるとは……
jpnSearchText:
おや……お嬢様がご自身の将来を見据えて
そのような選択をされるとは……

engChrName: You're wise beyond your years, I must say.
engSearchText: You're wise beyond your years, I must say.
jpnChrName: お嬢様、今年の出来事を通して 本当に大人になられているのですね……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様、今年の出来事を通して
本当に大人になられているのですね……

engChrName: Oh, stop it! I just felt like...like, we should go there so I can get used to it.
engSearchText:
Oh, stop it! I just felt like...like, we should go there so
I can get used to it.
jpnChrName: は、恥ずかしい事言うものではないわよクレモナ！ ただ、少し下見がしたいというだけ！
jpnSearchText:
は、恥ずかしい事言うものではないわよクレモナ！
ただ、少し下見がしたいというだけ！

engChrName: And they've got their own festival going on next month. I'd very much like to go to that.
engSearchText:
And they've got their own festival going on
next month. I'd very much like to go to that.
jpnChrName: 来月には学藝祭もあるのだし、 その時にも改めて来たいしね！
jpnSearchText:
来月には学藝祭もあるのだし、
その時にも改めて来たいしね！

engChrName: I heard they're preparing some sort of counterattack.
engSearchText: I heard they're preparing some sort of counterattack.
jpnChrName: ……作戦に向けて準備が 進んでいると聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
……作戦に向けて準備が
進んでいると聞きます。

engChrName: Whatever the case, I've a duty to protect the hotel, and the Seiden District with it.
engSearchText:
Whatever the case, I've a duty to protect the hotel,
and the Seiden District with it.
jpnChrName: 私はこのホテルとサイデン地区を 守る事に専念しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
私はこのホテルとサイデン地区を
守る事に専念しましょう。

engChrName: This place is more than just a hotel now—it's a beacon and a gathering point for the disparate defenders out in the city.
engSearchText:
This place is more than just a hotel now—it's a
beacon and a gathering point for the disparate
defenders out in the city.
jpnChrName: “攻め”に入る皆さまが、迷わないためにも。 司令塔となり得るこの施設を死守するためにも。
jpnSearchText:
“攻め”に入る皆さまが、迷わないためにも。
司令塔となり得るこの施設を死守するためにも。

engChrName: Rumsfeld is taking care of things inside.
engSearchText: Rumsfeld is taking care of things inside.
jpnChrName: 建物内の事はラムズフェルド主任が 引き受けてくださいました。
jpnSearchText:
建物内の事はラムズフェルド主任が
引き受けてくださいました。

engChrName: So I'm staying here to hold the entrance, come what may.
engSearchText:
So I'm staying here to hold the entrance, come
what may.
jpnChrName: でしたら私は……危険ではありますが、 だからこそ外の守りを引き受けましょう。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら私は……危険ではありますが、
だからこそ外の守りを引き受けましょう。

engChrName: I never thought I'd fight side by side with Heiyue... but the enemy of my enemy is my friend. If they help me uphold my duty, then so be it!
engSearchText:
I never thought I'd fight side by side with Heiyue...
but the enemy of my enemy is my friend. If they help
me uphold my duty, then so be it!
jpnChrName: 黒月の構成員と肩を並べる日が来るとは 思いませんでしたが、自分の役割は全うします！
jpnSearchText:
黒月の構成員と肩を並べる日が来るとは
思いませんでしたが、自分の役割は全うします！

engChrName: Rumsfeld's clear coordination has calmed things down inside the hotel. I owe him for that.
engSearchText:
Rumsfeld's clear coordination has calmed things
down inside the hotel. I owe him for that.
jpnChrName: ……ラムズフェルド主任の的確な指示もあり、 ホテル内に混乱はありません。
jpnSearchText:
……ラムズフェルド主任の的確な指示もあり、
ホテル内に混乱はありません。

engChrName: That said, I worry what might happen if this draws on too long.
engSearchText:
That said, I worry what might happen if this draws
on too long.
jpnChrName: ですが……この状況が長引けば、 どのような影響があるかわかりません。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……この状況が長引けば、
どのような影響があるかわかりません。

engChrName: We can't have our guests and VIPs getting any more restless than they already are. We need to act quickly.
engSearchText:
We can't have our guests and VIPs getting any more
restless than they already are. We need to act quickly.
jpnChrName: お客様とＶＩＰのため、こうした状況だからこそ この場の秩序維持には最後まで尽力します。
jpnSearchText:
お客様とＶＩＰのため、こうした状況だからこそ
この場の秩序維持には最後まで尽力します。

engChrName: It's an honor to have both President Rocksmith and Prince Sherid staying with us.
engSearchText:
It's an honor to have both President Rocksmith and
Prince Sherid staying with us.
jpnChrName: ロックスミス前大統領閣下やシェリド殿下が 当ホテルにいらして光栄の至りです。
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス前大統領閣下やシェリド殿下が
当ホテルにいらして光栄の至りです。

engChrName: They've both got their own security personnel, but that doesn't mean I can ignore my own job.
engSearchText:
They've both got their own security personnel, but
that doesn't mean I can ignore my own job.
jpnChrName: 閣下や殿下もご自身の護衛を伴っていますが、 だからと私も気を抜く訳にはいきません。
jpnSearchText:
閣下や殿下もご自身の護衛を伴っていますが、
だからと私も気を抜く訳にはいきません。

engChrName: They are still guests, and as such, they fall under my protection. I'm to make sure whatever happens outside stays outside.
engSearchText:
They are still guests, and as such, they fall under
my protection. I'm to make sure whatever happens
outside stays outside.
jpnChrName: このホテルの安全を守るのが警備員としての 私の役割、それは如何なる時も変わりません。
jpnSearchText:
このホテルの安全を守るのが警備員としての
私の役割、それは如何なる時も変わりません。

engChrName: We host many government officials and other VIPs during the festival.
engSearchText:
We host many government officials and other VIPs
during the festival.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に当たっては多くの政府関係者が 当ホテルに滞在されることになります。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に当たっては多くの政府関係者が
当ホテルに滞在されることになります。

engChrName: Rumsfeld just met with Polanski. We've got all our security measures in place.
engSearchText:
Rumsfeld just met with Polanski. We've got all our
security measures in place.
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド主任がポランスキー議員と 打ち合わせて下さり、警備の段取りも完璧です。
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド主任がポランスキー議員と
打ち合わせて下さり、警備の段取りも完璧です。

engChrName: As security, we're here to make sure everyone can enjoy the festival to the fullest.
engSearchText:
As security, we're here to make sure everyone can
enjoy the festival to the fullest.
jpnChrName: 必ずや、安心して新しい時代を共に迎え、 希望の持てる記念祭にしたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
必ずや、安心して新しい時代を共に迎え、
希望の持てる記念祭にしたいものです。

engChrName: Looks like the situation is all under control... The hotel itself isn't in any trouble, thankfully.
engSearchText:
Looks like the situation is all under control...
The hotel itself isn't in any trouble, thankfully.
jpnChrName: ……事態が無事に収束し、当ホテルでも 大きなトラブルはありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
……事態が無事に収束し、当ホテルでも
大きなトラブルはありませんでした。

engChrName: Berzelia seems to have calmed down. She should be able to enjoy the festival herself now.
engSearchText:
Berzelia seems to have calmed down. She should be
able to enjoy the festival herself now.
jpnChrName: バーゼリアお嬢様も落ち着かれているようですし、 このまま記念祭を問題無く迎えられそうです。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼリアお嬢様も落ち着かれているようですし、
このまま記念祭を問題無く迎えられそうです。

engChrName: I do hope she's looking forward to it. She could use the wind in her sails.
engSearchText:
I do hope she's looking forward to it. She could use
the wind in her sails.
jpnChrName: お嬢様も記念祭を楽しみに されているのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様も記念祭を楽しみに
されているのでしょうか？

engChrName: I've been a few times myself, albeit usually on the job. One of these years, I'd like to go just for pleasure instead of business.
engSearchText:
I've been a few times myself, albeit usually on the job.
One of these years, I'd like to go just for pleasure
instead of business.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どなたかに同行してはいただきますが、 たまには満喫していただきたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どなたかに同行してはいただきますが、
たまには満喫していただきたいですね。

engChrName: We're rolling out new measures here at the hotel, in compliance with the state of emergency. We can't let our guard down for even a moment.
engSearchText:
We're rolling out new measures here at the hotel, in
compliance with the state of emergency. We can't let
our guard down for even a moment.
jpnChrName: ……安全のため、非常事態宣言には最大限協力し、 ホテルとしても独自に安全対策に取り組みます。
jpnSearchText:
……安全のため、非常事態宣言には最大限協力し、
ホテルとしても独自に安全対策に取り組みます。

engChrName: Rumsfeld has an impeccable service record in public and private security. I trust him to keep the hotel safe.
engSearchText:
Rumsfeld has an impeccable service record in public
and private security. I trust him to keep the hotel safe.
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド主任は元公安警察官にして歴戦の 護衛官……必ずやホテルをしかと守るでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド主任は元公安警察官にして歴戦の
護衛官……必ずやホテルをしかと守るでしょう。

engChrName: As his righthand man, I have to follow his lead— anything to keep our guests and VIPs safe.
engSearchText:
As his righthand man, I have to follow his lead—
anything to keep our guests and VIPs safe.
jpnChrName: 私も彼の右腕として、お客様方やバーゼリアお嬢様、 議員の方々を命に代えてお守りいたします。
jpnSearchText:
私も彼の右腕として、お客様方やバーゼリアお嬢様、
議員の方々を命に代えてお守りいたします。

engChrName: Little while ago, this kid named Eddy came to apologize to the young miss—apparently he was involved in that whole mess.
engSearchText:
Little while ago, this kid named Eddy came to
apologize to the young miss—apparently he was
involved in that whole mess.
jpnChrName: ……先ほど、お嬢様を予てより連れ回していた エディという青年が謝罪に来ましてね。
jpnSearchText:
……先ほど、お嬢様を予てより連れ回していた
エディという青年が謝罪に来ましてね。

engChrName: We can't exactly let him see her given...everything, so I just passed his message along.
engSearchText:
We can't exactly let him see her given...everything, so
I just passed his message along.
jpnChrName: まあ……この状況でお嬢様に直接会わせるのも リスクがありますし、言葉だけ預かりました。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……この状況でお嬢様に直接会わせるのも
リスクがありますし、言葉だけ預かりました。

engChrName: Though he DID end up helping her patch things up with her father, so...all's well that ends well, I suppose.
engSearchText:
Though he DID end up helping her patch things up
with her father, so...all's well that ends well,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……お嬢様と頭取の関係改善のきっかけ となった事も考えると難しいものですが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……お嬢様と頭取の関係改善のきっかけ
となった事も考えると難しいものですが。

engChrName: Our thanks for helping rescue Berzelia.
engSearchText: Our thanks for helping rescue Berzelia.
jpnChrName: 先日はバーゼリアお嬢様の救出に ご協力いただきありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
先日はバーゼリアお嬢様の救出に
ご協力いただきありがとうございました。

engChrName: For all the trust Rumsfeld put in me, I let him and the young miss down... I've brought shame to my post.
engSearchText:
For all the trust Rumsfeld put in me, I let him and
the young miss down... I've brought shame to
my post.
jpnChrName: あのような事件を防げず、ラムズフェルド主任の 信任を受けた身として至らない限りですが……
jpnSearchText:
あのような事件を防げず、ラムズフェルド主任の
信任を受けた身として至らない限りですが……

engChrName: I can't believe it all stemmed from their family dispute... How did things get so out of hand?
engSearchText:
I can't believe it all stemmed from their
family dispute... How did things get so out of hand?
jpnChrName: 根底にあったのが、お嬢様の御父上への 複雑な気持ちであったとは……
jpnSearchText:
根底にあったのが、お嬢様の御父上への
複雑な気持ちであったとは……

engChrName: I'll have to pay more attention to them going forward. If I weren't so impersonal, I might have been able to help her...
engSearchText:
I'll have to pay more attention to them going forward.
If I weren't so impersonal, I might have been able to
help her...
jpnChrName: 距離を置かず、しっかり気持ちを汲み取って あげていれば防げたかもしれないのに……
jpnSearchText:
距離を置かず、しっかり気持ちを汲み取って
あげていれば防げたかもしれないのに……

engChrName: The young miss has been spending more and more time outside lately. The other day, she all but vanished—we were all in a panic.
engSearchText:
The young miss has been spending more and more
time outside lately. The other day, she all but
vanished—we were all in a panic.
jpnChrName: お嬢様は最近は外出も多く、先日は 姿をくらまし心配しましたが……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様は最近は外出も多く、先日は
姿をくらまし心配しましたが……

engChrName: She came home all right, like nothing had happened...but it's clear to me she's struggling with her emotions right now.
engSearchText:
She came home all right, like nothing had
happened...but it's clear to me she's struggling with
her emotions right now.
jpnChrName: 無事に帰って来たとはいえ、どうにも 複雑なお悩みを抱えているようで……
jpnSearchText:
無事に帰って来たとはいえ、どうにも
複雑なお悩みを抱えているようで……

engChrName: I feel like she's been avoiding us staff lately, too... I feel like she needs help. Maybe we should reach out to her...
engSearchText:
I feel like she's been avoiding us staff lately, too...
I feel like she needs help. Maybe we should reach out
to her...
jpnChrName: 避けられている気もしますが、少しは 気持ちを汲み取ってあげた方が良いでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
避けられている気もしますが、少しは
気持ちを汲み取ってあげた方が良いでしょうか？

engChrName: Thank you for helping us rescue the young miss. Really, I can't thank you enough.
engSearchText:
Thank you for helping us rescue the young miss.
Really, I can't thank you enough.
jpnChrName: ……先ほどはお嬢様の救出に ご助力いただき、感謝いたします。
jpnSearchText:
……先ほどはお嬢様の救出に
ご助力いただき、感謝いたします。

engChrName: You're a...'spriggan,' was it? I see... Well, if Rumsfeld trusts you, then so do I. It's good to have you as an acquaintance.
engSearchText:
You're a...'spriggan,' was it? I see... Well, if Rumsfeld
trusts you, then so do I. It's good to have you as
an acquaintance.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、ですか……なるほど、主任も認めて いらっしゃるようですし、覚えておきますね。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋、ですか……なるほど、主任も認めて
いらっしゃるようですし、覚えておきますね。

engChrName: Rumsfeld is out of office at the moment.
engSearchText: Rumsfeld is out of office at the moment.
jpnChrName: ……ただいま、ラムズフェルド主任は 席を外している状況になります。
jpnSearchText:
……ただいま、ラムズフェルド主任は
席を外している状況になります。

engChrName: I can help you with whatever security concerns you may have—or, if you have a service request, you can reach out to Cremona.
engSearchText:
I can help you with whatever security concerns you
may have—or, if you have a service request, you can
reach out to Cremona.
jpnChrName: ……サービスについてはクレモナさんに、 セキュリティは私にご相談いただければ……
jpnSearchText:
……サービスについてはクレモナさんに、
セキュリティは私にご相談いただければ……

engChrName: (The young miss really worries me lately... Is everything all right with her?)
engSearchText:
(The young miss really worries me lately...
Is everything all right with her?)
jpnChrName: （……しかし、例の件……本当に   大丈夫でしょうか……）
jpnSearchText:
（……しかし、例の件……本当に
大丈夫でしょうか……）

engChrName: (Rumsfeld left me in charge here, but...would I be more help out there?)
engSearchText:
(Rumsfeld left me in charge here, but...would I be
more help out there?)
jpnChrName: （主任はこの場を私に預けて下さいましたが……   やはり私も動いた方が良いのか……）
jpnSearchText:
（主任はこの場を私に預けて下さいましたが……
やはり私も動いた方が良いのか……）

engChrName: The young miss has been avoiding me lately... Do kids just find me that scary?
engSearchText:
The young miss has been avoiding me lately...
Do kids just find me that scary?
jpnChrName: うーむ……自分って子供から見て怖かったりするの でしょうか……どうも避けられているような……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ……自分って子供から見て怖かったりするの
でしょうか……どうも避けられているような……

engChrName: Oh, well. I can't let that get to me—I still have a duty to keep her safe.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I can't let that get to me—I still have a duty
to keep her safe.
jpnChrName: いえ……仮にそうだとしても、 警護の職務には支障がある訳ではないですね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……仮にそうだとしても、
警護の職務には支障がある訳ではないですね。

engChrName: She's just at a difficult age. I'll give her the space she needs, and if she asks for help, I'll step in.
engSearchText:
She's just at a difficult age. I'll give her the space she
needs, and if she asks for help, I'll step in.
jpnChrName: ……あの方も年頃だ、遠巻きに見守り、 何かあった時にこそお守りできれば……
jpnSearchText:
……あの方も年頃だ、遠巻きに見守り、
何かあった時にこそお守りできれば……

engChrName: Welcome to Maserati Hotel. Rest assured, you're in capable hands with our experienced security detail.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Maserati Hotel. Rest assured, you're in
capable hands with our experienced security detail.
jpnChrName: 《マセラティ・ホテル》へようこそ、 安全対策に関してもご安心ください。
jpnSearchText:
《マセラティ・ホテル》へようこそ、
安全対策に関してもご安心ください。

engChrName: We serve a veritable who's who of celebrities and government officials here, so our security is top-shelf to match.
engSearchText:
We serve a veritable who's who of celebrities and
government officials here, so our security is top-shelf
to match.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルは議員や著名人の方もご利用されます。 そのためセキュリティは万全に備えております。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルは議員や著名人の方もご利用されます。
そのためセキュリティは万全に備えております。

engChrName: You've nothing to fear, as long as I'm on the job. All you need to do is relax and enjoy your stay.
engSearchText:
You've nothing to fear, as long as I'm on the job.
All you need to do is relax and enjoy your stay.
jpnChrName: 自分も誠意をもって警備を全うしますので、 ご心配せずお寛ぎいただければ。
jpnSearchText:
自分も誠意をもって警備を全うしますので、
ご心配せずお寛ぎいただければ。

engChrName: Rummy, Roddy, and I thought up that cipher, heehee.
engSearchText:
Rummy, Roddy, and I thought up that
cipher, heehee.
jpnChrName: あの暗号は私とラムズフェルドと ロデリックさんで考えたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの暗号は私とラムズフェルドと
ロデリックさんで考えたのよ。

engChrName: I'm glad you stuck with it and figured it out!
engSearchText: I'm glad you stuck with it and figured it out!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、最後まで解いて 辿り着いてもらえてよかったわ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、最後まで解いて
辿り着いてもらえてよかったわ！

engChrName: Yes, I did get kidnapped, but I got to see that Father cares about me, so...it was all right. This was a good year, overall.
engSearchText:
Yes, I did get kidnapped, but I got to see that Father
cares about me, so...it was all right. This was a
good year, overall.
jpnChrName: 誘拐されるような事もあったけど……結果的には お父様の想いも判って実りある一年だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
誘拐されるような事もあったけど……結果的には
お父様の想いも判って実りある一年だったわ。

engChrName: I can't have Rummy and the staff picking up after me forever, though. I need to start figuring things out on my own.
engSearchText:
I can't have Rummy and the staff picking up after me
forever, though. I need to start figuring things out on
my own.
jpnChrName: もう、じいやたちに苦労をかけさせるわけにも 行かないし、今後は自分の力で向き合わないと。
jpnSearchText:
もう、じいやたちに苦労をかけさせるわけにも
行かないし、今後は自分の力で向き合わないと。

engChrName: There's got to be a better way to tell Father how I feel. Maybe... Maybe a poem?
engSearchText:
There's got to be a better way to tell Father how
I feel. Maybe... Maybe a poem?
jpnChrName: そうね……何か、例えばポエムなんかでお父様に 私なりの気持ちは伝えられないかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
そうね……何か、例えばポエムなんかでお父様に
私なりの気持ちは伝えられないかしら……？

engChrName: This was quite the year, what with me running from home and all. But I got to see Father actually care about me, so...
engSearchText:
This was quite the year, what with me running from
home and all. But I got to see Father actually care
about me, so...
jpnChrName: 家出もしたりして色々あった一年だったけど、 お父様に心配してもらえただけでも実りがあったわ。
jpnSearchText:
家出もしたりして色々あった一年だったけど、
お父様に心配してもらえただけでも実りがあったわ。

engChrName: ...it's something. I think it'll be a while before he's a real father to me, but this is progress.
engSearchText:
...it's something. I think it'll be a while before he's a
real father to me, but this is progress.
jpnChrName: まあ……今から普通の親子みたいに、というのも 正直私にも難しい事だけれど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……今から普通の親子みたいに、というのも
正直私にも難しい事だけれど……

engChrName: If I could just find a good way to tell him how I feel... Something quintessentially me.
engSearchText:
If I could just find a good way to tell him how I feel...
Something quintessentially me.
jpnChrName: せめて私なりに……お父様にもっと上手く 応える事が出来れば……
jpnSearchText:
せめて私なりに……お父様にもっと上手く
応える事が出来れば……

engChrName: Father said he won't be able to make it to the festival this year...again. I know it's not his fault, but still...
engSearchText:
Father said he won't be able to make it to the festival
this year...again. I know it's not his fault, but still...
jpnChrName: お父様は今年の記念祭も一緒に過ごせないのね…… でも、状況が状況だし仕方ないわ。
jpnSearchText:
お父様は今年の記念祭も一緒に過ごせないのね……
でも、状況が状況だし仕方ないわ。

engChrName: He hasn't completely forgotten me, at least. That's... Well, that's a good note to end the year on.
engSearchText:
He hasn't completely forgotten me, at least. That's...
Well, that's a good note to end the year on.
jpnChrName: お父様が私を忘れてなどいない事がわかった だけでも、この一年には収穫があったわ。
jpnSearchText:
お父様が私を忘れてなどいない事がわかった
だけでも、この一年には収穫があったわ。

engChrName: I should just suck it up and tell him how I really feel.
engSearchText: I should just suck it up and tell him how I really feel.
jpnChrName: ……お父様にはもう少し、私の方でも 色々と伝えなきゃいけないのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……お父様にはもう少し、私の方でも
色々と伝えなきゃいけないのだけど……

engChrName: He dropped everything and called when he heard the news, in spite of all his work.
engSearchText:
He dropped everything and called when he heard the
news, in spite of all his work.
jpnChrName: お父様、仕事の方も忙しいはずなのに 真っ先に私を心配して連絡を……
jpnSearchText:
お父様、仕事の方も忙しいはずなのに
真っ先に私を心配して連絡を……

engChrName: At first, I thought it was all an act. A façade. But no... He really was concerned for me. Those were his true colors.
engSearchText:
At first, I thought it was all an act. A façade. But no...
He really was concerned for me. Those were his
true colors.
jpnChrName: ……こないだ誘拐されかけた時に 送られた想い、嘘ではなかったのね……
jpnSearchText:
……こないだ誘拐されかけた時に
送られた想い、嘘ではなかったのね……

engChrName: I should talk with him again, try to tell him how I really feel... If I could just work up the courage to.
engSearchText:
I should talk with him again, try to tell him how I
really feel... If I could just work up the courage to.
jpnChrName: 改めて話し合い、私の想いも伝えるべき かもしれないわ……少し、自信はないけど……
jpnSearchText:
改めて話し合い、私の想いも伝えるべき
かもしれないわ……少し、自信はないけど……

engChrName: Father's a bit awkward when we're talking, but, well, I'm hardly one to talk.
engSearchText:
Father's a bit awkward when we're talking, but, well,
I'm hardly one to talk.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、お父様も不器用だけど、 こうしてみると私も人の事は言えないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、お父様も不器用だけど、
こうしてみると私も人の事は言えないわね。

engChrName: I can't believe he just dropped everything to call like that... He really was worried about me! He...DOES care!
engSearchText:
I can't believe he just dropped everything to call
like that... He really was worried about me!
He...DOES care!
jpnChrName: お父様がこの緊急時に私を心配して 連絡をくれるなんて……信じられないわ。
jpnSearchText:
お父様がこの緊急時に私を心配して
連絡をくれるなんて……信じられないわ。

engChrName: Here I thought he always held his business above me...
engSearchText:
Here I thought he always held his business
above me...
jpnChrName: あの人はてっきり、私なんかより取引先の人 ばかりを見ているのかと……
jpnSearchText:
あの人はてっきり、私なんかより取引先の人
ばかりを見ているのかと……

engChrName: I guess I owe him an apology. Just, how do I put that into words...?
engSearchText:
I guess I owe him an apology. Just, how do I put that
into words...?
jpnChrName: 勘違いしていたのならお父様に申し訳ないわ…… 何とかこの言葉にできない気持ちを……
jpnSearchText:
勘違いしていたのならお父様に申し訳ないわ……
何とかこの言葉にできない気持ちを……

engChrName: Oh, umm, thank you, again. For the other day, I mean.
engSearchText:
Oh, umm, thank you, again. For the other day,
I mean.
jpnChrName: ……あなたたちは……先日はその、 ありがとう……改めて礼を言うわ。
jpnSearchText:
……あなたたちは……先日はその、
ありがとう……改めて礼を言うわ。

engChrName: I'm sure Eddy would've kept me safe, but still.
engSearchText: I'm sure Eddy would've kept me safe, but still.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんな事件になっても、エディは 私を守ろうとしてくれた事と……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あんな事件になっても、エディは
私を守ろうとしてくれた事と……

engChrName: It was all worth it to find out that my father really does care about me.
engSearchText:
It was all worth it to find out that my father really
does care about me.
jpnChrName: 何よりお父様が私をあんな風に想ってくれて いたのが判ったのは収穫だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
何よりお父様が私をあんな風に想ってくれて
いたのが判ったのは収穫だったわ。
