engChrName: Looking at it like that... Heehee. I think it ended up being a valuable experience for us all.
engSearchText:
Looking at it like that... Heehee. I think it ended up
being a valuable experience for us all.
jpnChrName: ふふ……そう思うと狂言誘拐、意味のある 人生経験というものになったのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……そう思うと狂言誘拐、意味のある
人生経験というものになったのかしら？

engChrName: I did plan to run away from home for a bit, but I didn't mean to worry everyone so much.
engSearchText:
I did plan to run away from home for a bit, but I
didn't mean to worry everyone so much.
jpnChrName: ……家出もしてみるものと思ったけど…… 流石にこの前は心配をかけてしまったわね……
jpnSearchText:
……家出もしてみるものと思ったけど……
流石にこの前は心配をかけてしまったわね……

engChrName: Even Father was worried about me in his own way, at least according to Rumsy.
engSearchText:
Even Father was worried about me in his own way, at
least according to Rumsy.
jpnChrName: まあ、お父様もお父様なりには心配して くれてるのかしら、じいやの言伝通りなら。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お父様もお父様なりには心配して
くれてるのかしら、じいやの言伝通りなら。

engChrName: Now it's just up to me to decide how I want to act around him going forward.
engSearchText:
Now it's just up to me to decide how I want to act
around him going forward.
jpnChrName: 今後、お父様とどう付き合うべきかは…… まあ、私に課せられた課題かしら……
jpnSearchText:
今後、お父様とどう付き合うべきかは……
まあ、私に課せられた課題かしら……

engChrName: I mean, am I really all right bein' here? I stick out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
I mean, am I really all right bein' here? I stick out like
a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: あのさ……こんな高級ホテルに オレみたいなのがいたら場違いじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
あのさ……こんな高級ホテルに
オレみたいなのがいたら場違いじゃねえか？

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about those prying eyes! You're welcome here as my friend, so relax!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about those prying eyes!
You're welcome here as my friend, so relax!
jpnChrName: 他人の目なんて気にしなくていいのよ！ エディは私の友人なんだから堂々としていて。
jpnSearchText:
他人の目なんて気にしなくていいのよ！
エディは私の友人なんだから堂々としていて。

engChrName: So, you're planning your exit from Desire, I heard?
engSearchText: So, you're planning your exit from Desire, I heard?
jpnChrName: それで……結局《ディザイア》からは 抜けるつもりなのよね？
jpnSearchText:
それで……結局《ディザイア》からは
抜けるつもりなのよね？

engChrName: Yeah. I can't believe Jeffrey was... All of them, really. Can't believe they're all like that.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I can't believe Jeffrey was... All of them, really.
Can't believe they're all like that.
jpnChrName: ああ……まさかジェフリーさんが…… 《ディザイア》があんな連中だと思わなかった。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……まさかジェフリーさんが……
《ディザイア》があんな連中だと思わなかった。

engChrName: Looks like they're willin' to let me off easy, so I'm gettin' out and I ain't lookin' back.
engSearchText:
Looks like they're willin' to let me off easy, so I'm
gettin' out and I ain't lookin' back.
jpnChrName: 今なら簡単に抜けさせて もらえるみたいだし、抜けるよ。
jpnSearchText:
今なら簡単に抜けさせて
もらえるみたいだし、抜けるよ。

engChrName: I don't wanna be some punk livin' on the edge for the rest of my life.
engSearchText:
I don't wanna be some punk livin' on the edge for the
rest of my life.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、イカした不良では あり続けるつもりだけどな！
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、イカした不良では
あり続けるつもりだけどな！

engChrName: Oh, don't judge yourself so harshly, Eddy. You're no punk!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't judge yourself so harshly, Eddy. You're
no punk!
jpnChrName: イカした不良……？ えっと、エディのどこら辺が？
jpnSearchText:
イカした不良……？
えっと、エディのどこら辺が？

engChrName: ...Wha? Thought that's how I came across, I mean... Ain't that me?
engSearchText:
...Wha? Thought that's how I came across, I mean...
Ain't that me?
jpnChrName: えっと……初めて会った時から そのつもりだったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと……初めて会った時から
そのつもりだったんだけど……

engChrName: At any rate, I find myself in the same boat. I wish to figure out how I want to live my life.
engSearchText:
At any rate, I find myself in the same boat. I wish to
figure out how I want to live my life.
jpnChrName: ……私だってもう子供じゃない、 好きなものも自分で見つける。
jpnSearchText:
……私だってもう子供じゃない、
好きなものも自分で見つける。

engChrName: Though I doubt Father would respect my wishes, no matter what I choose.
engSearchText:
Though I doubt Father would respect my wishes, no
matter what I choose.
jpnChrName: ……でも、お父様は私がそれくらいは 大人になった事も知らないのでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
……でも、お父様は私がそれくらいは
大人になった事も知らないのでしょうね。

engChrName: It's as if I never grew up to him.
engSearchText: It's as if I never grew up to him.
jpnChrName: あの人の中ではきっと、時間も 止まったままなのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
あの人の中ではきっと、時間も
止まったままなのでしょう……

engChrName: *sigh* It's clear to me that Father cares about his business trips more than his own daughter.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's clear to me that Father cares about his
business trips more than his own daughter.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、お父様は私よりも辺境の お仕事の方が大切なのね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、お父様は私よりも辺境の
お仕事の方が大切なのね。

engChrName: How lovely it would be for him to at least TRY and reach out to me, while he's off gallivanting around the continent.
engSearchText:
How lovely it would be for him to at least TRY and
reach out to me, while he's off gallivanting around
the continent.
jpnChrName: 共和国を長く離れるにしても……せめて 一言くらい私に言っても良いじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
共和国を長く離れるにしても……せめて
一言くらい私に言っても良いじゃない。

engChrName: What am I to him...? Am I just some doll?
engSearchText: What am I to him...? Am I just some doll?
jpnChrName: やはり……あの人にとって私なんて、 人形のような物なのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
やはり……あの人にとって私なんて、
人形のような物なのかしら。

engChrName: A doll in his dusty little dollhouse?
engSearchText: A doll in his dusty little dollhouse?
jpnChrName: あてがわれたあのお部屋だって──
jpnSearchText: あてがわれたあのお部屋だって──

engChrName: (Huh... She sticks out. What's she mumblin' about...?)
engSearchText:
(Huh... She sticks out. What's she mumblin'
about...?)
jpnChrName: （どこかのお嬢様のようだが……   ふむ、何か事情があるみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（どこかのお嬢様のようだが……
ふむ、何か事情があるみたいだな。）

engChrName: (...I see. Might as well make a note of that. 'Rich girl in Seiden has daddy issues.')
engSearchText:
(...I see. Might as well make a note of that. 'Rich girl
in Seiden has daddy issues.')
jpnChrName: （ま……念のために覚えておくとするか。   サイデンに訳アリお嬢様……っと。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま……念のために覚えておくとするか。
サイデンに訳アリお嬢様……っと。）

engChrName: I don't know if I can even trust Rummy anymore...
engSearchText: I don't know if I can even trust Rummy anymore...
jpnChrName: じいやの言う事だってどこまでが 本心なのか……
jpnSearchText:
じいやの言う事だってどこまでが
本心なのか……

engChrName: I'm not a little girl anymore. I won't just trust anything an adult tells me!
engSearchText:
I'm not a little girl anymore. I won't just trust
anything an adult tells me!
jpnChrName: 私だってもう子供じゃないわ、 そう簡単に言いくるめられないんだから！
jpnSearchText:
私だってもう子供じゃないわ、
そう簡単に言いくるめられないんだから！

engChrName: Only Rocksmith could keep Elder Lu that close without revealing his hand.
engSearchText:
Only Rocksmith could keep Elder Lu that close
without revealing his hand.
jpnChrName: ルウ大老とかくも親密かつ、隙の無い付き合いが 出来るとは、やはり流石はロックスミスだ……
jpnSearchText:
ルウ大老とかくも親密かつ、隙の無い付き合いが
出来るとは、やはり流石はロックスミスだ……

engChrName: As the future of the Republican Party, I'd best study his methods. They'd serve me well.
engSearchText:
As the future of the Republican Party, I'd best study
his methods. They'd serve me well.
jpnChrName: 私も、今の共和党を預からせてもらった一人として 今一度彼の姿勢を学んでいく必要もあるな……
jpnSearchText:
私も、今の共和党を預からせてもらった一人として
今一度彼の姿勢を学んでいく必要もあるな……

engChrName: I've gotten my foot in the door with Elder Lu. Once this mess is over, I'll make my contribution to the Party.
engSearchText:
I've gotten my foot in the door with Elder Lu.
Once this mess is over, I'll make my contribution to
the Party.
jpnChrName: 今回、ルウ大老と話す機会を持てた事も── 異変が終われば、きっと私なりに役立てよう。
jpnSearchText:
今回、ルウ大老と話す機会を持てた事も──
異変が終われば、きっと私なりに役立てよう。

engChrName: Seems we still need to address the root of the problem here.
engSearchText:
Seems we still need to address the root of the
problem here.
jpnChrName: 事態の根本的な解決こそまだ なされていないが……
jpnSearchText:
事態の根本的な解決こそまだ
なされていないが……

engChrName: Fortuitous, though, that Huckberry, Fan, and Prince Sherid all happen to be gathered here.
engSearchText:
Fortuitous, though, that Huckberry, Fan, and Prince
Sherid all happen to be gathered here.
jpnChrName: 僥倖というべきか、この場にはハックベリーも ファン大人も、シェリド殿下もいらっしゃる。
jpnSearchText:
僥倖というべきか、この場にはハックベリーも
ファン大人も、シェリド殿下もいらっしゃる。

engChrName: This is a remarkable opportunity to discuss the future of our states—I suspect we'll broker many a deal here.
engSearchText:
This is a remarkable opportunity to discuss the future
of our states—I suspect we'll broker many a deal here.
jpnChrName: それぞれの領分で今後の対応を、そして事後の 処理を話し合うにはまたとないと言えよう。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれの領分で今後の対応を、そして事後の
処理を話し合うにはまたとないと言えよう。

engChrName: Now if I could just have a seat of my own, once they've cleared up their business.
engSearchText:
Now if I could just have a seat of my own, once
they've cleared up their business.
jpnChrName: 各々の用が済み次第…… 席を設けさせて頂ければ幸いだ。
jpnSearchText:
各々の用が済み次第……
席を設けさせて頂ければ幸いだ。

engChrName: I never saw anything like this in my wildest dreams...
engSearchText: I never saw anything like this in my wildest dreams...
jpnChrName: ……まあ、流石にこの事態は私も 想定していなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、流石にこの事態は私も
想定していなかったが……

engChrName: Jennifer lost her cool, I see... She'll need to be more levelheaded than that if she wants to climb the political ladder.
engSearchText:
Jennifer lost her cool, I see... She'll need to be more
levelheaded than that if she wants to climb the
political ladder.
jpnChrName: ジェニファー君はやはり、取り乱し過ぎだな。 情熱と野心だけはある女性のはずなのに。
jpnSearchText:
ジェニファー君はやはり、取り乱し過ぎだな。
情熱と野心だけはある女性のはずなのに。

engChrName: Though I suppose I shouldn't be too hard on her—I got the drop on all this from a friend of mine, after all.
engSearchText:
Though I suppose I shouldn't be too hard on her—I
got the drop on all this from a friend of mine,
after all.
jpnChrName: もっとも私が落ち着いていられるのも、盟友から 異常な現象の話を聞いていたお陰でもあるが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも私が落ち着いていられるのも、盟友から
異常な現象の話を聞いていたお陰でもあるが。

engChrName: Just another favor I owe to Rocksmith, heh.
engSearchText: Just another favor I owe to Rocksmith, heh.
jpnChrName: ふふ、改めてロックスミスには 感謝をせねばなるまいな……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、改めてロックスミスには
感謝をせねばなるまいな……

engChrName: They say the wise warrior avoids the battle...but I'm not sure that quite describes him.
engSearchText:
They say the wise warrior avoids the battle...but I'm
not sure that quite describes him.
jpnChrName: ふう、能ある鷹は……というのとも 違うのでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、能ある鷹は……というのとも
違うのでしょうが……

engChrName: Never a dull moment with him, though. That, I can say for certain.
engSearchText:
Never a dull moment with him, though. That, I can
say for certain.
jpnChrName: これだから飽きないものですよ、 この男との付き合いも……。
jpnSearchText:
これだから飽きないものですよ、
この男との付き合いも……。

engChrName: To think he's still going over economics and investments in spite of it all... Like clockwork, the man.
engSearchText:
To think he's still going over economics and
investments in spite of it all... Like clockwork,
the man.
jpnChrName: この調子でさらりと、的を得た経済論・投資法を 語ってくれるから逆に信頼できるというか……
jpnSearchText:
この調子でさらりと、的を得た経済論・投資法を
語ってくれるから逆に信頼できるというか……

engChrName: I've been in politics for decades, you see...
engSearchText: I've been in politics for decades, you see...
jpnChrName: それにしても、政治の世界で生きて 数十年にはなるが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、政治の世界で生きて
数十年にはなるが……

engChrName: ...but in all my years, I never expected the world around us to change quite this much.
engSearchText:
...but in all my years, I never expected the world
around us to change quite this much.
jpnChrName: まさかここまでの時代の節目に 自分が立ち会うことになるとはなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
まさかここまでの時代の節目に
自分が立ち会うことになるとはなぁ……

engChrName: It does make me wonder how my colleagues and rivals are approaching the changing times.
engSearchText:
It does make me wonder how my colleagues and
rivals are approaching the changing times.
jpnChrName: 正直、心のどこかで好奇心を駆られている 自分もいるのだ、政敵の動向にね……
jpnSearchText:
正直、心のどこかで好奇心を駆られている
自分もいるのだ、政敵の動向にね……

engChrName: Perhaps I should invite Rocksmith for drinks one of these days, and we can wax poetic about the future together.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should invite Rocksmith for drinks one of
these days, and we can wax poetic about the
future together.
jpnChrName: ロックスミスとも久しぶりに一杯やって、 改めてこの先の不透明な未来を語らいたいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミスとも久しぶりに一杯やって、
改めてこの先の不透明な未来を語らいたいものだ。

engChrName: Phew. I and the political world can finally breathe easy.
engSearchText:
Phew. I and the political world can finally
breathe easy.
jpnChrName: ふう、ようやく政界のゴタゴタも 落ち着いてきたようでほっとしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ようやく政界のゴタゴタも
落ち着いてきたようでほっとしたよ。

engChrName: Our party does still house some...undesirables. White supremacists, namely—they're a nasty bunch.
engSearchText:
Our party does still house some...undesirables.
White supremacists, namely—they're a nasty bunch.
jpnChrName: 古い政治家の中には、少数ではあるが 白人至上主義に近い考えを持つ者もいるからね。
jpnSearchText:
古い政治家の中には、少数ではあるが
白人至上主義に近い考えを持つ者もいるからね。

engChrName: One of the party's main priorities is keeping those old boys in check.
engSearchText:
One of the party's main priorities is keeping those old
boys in check.
jpnChrName: 党としても、彼らが暴走しないよう どうにか舵取りをしていた所さ。
jpnSearchText:
党としても、彼らが暴走しないよう
どうにか舵取りをしていた所さ。

engChrName: And as luck would have it, curtailing them helps keep Almata at bay, too.
engSearchText:
And as luck would have it, curtailing them helps keep
Almata at bay, too.
jpnChrName: またアルマータと繋がりを持つ者が いないか洗う契機にもなった。
jpnSearchText:
またアルマータと繋がりを持つ者が
いないか洗う契機にもなった。

engChrName: I can hardly fathom the lives lost... We're doing what we can, but it all feels so small.
engSearchText:
I can hardly fathom the lives lost... We're doing what
we can, but it all feels so small.
jpnChrName: 犠牲に比べれば、あまりにも矮小だが── 我々もすべき事をせねばな。
jpnSearchText:
犠牲に比べれば、あまりにも矮小だが──
我々もすべき事をせねばな。

engChrName: We haven't even been able to reclaim the bodies... Horrible, all of it. Just, horrible.
engSearchText:
We haven't even been able to reclaim the bodies...
Horrible, all of it. Just, horrible.
jpnChrName: 未だ遺体すら回収できず…… 何とも痛ましい事件だったが……
jpnSearchText:
未だ遺体すら回収できず……
何とも痛ましい事件だったが……

engChrName: As the representatives of this great nation, our party must right these wrongs and bring these terrorists to justice.
engSearchText:
As the representatives of this great nation, our party
must right these wrongs and bring these terrorists
to justice.
jpnChrName: 我々もすべき事をせねばならん。 党としても、一人の政治家としてもな。
jpnSearchText:
我々もすべき事をせねばならん。
党としても、一人の政治家としてもな。

engChrName: In times like these, we need to move forward together, rather than squabbling among ourselves and jawing with the President's office.
engSearchText:
In times like these, we need to move forward
together, rather than squabbling among ourselves and
jawing with the President's office.
jpnChrName: 共和党としてもどう動くべきか── 安易に与党批判をしている場合でもないしな。
jpnSearchText:
共和党としてもどう動くべきか──
安易に与党批判をしている場合でもないしな。

engChrName: This is quickly becoming an international crisis. Calvard could have saved a lot of face by taking the initiative here...
engSearchText:
This is quickly becoming an international crisis.
Calvard could have saved a lot of face by taking the
initiative here...
jpnChrName: すでに国際問題にもなりつつある。 そちらで主導権を握るのが国益にも叶うだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
すでに国際問題にもなりつつある。
そちらで主導権を握るのが国益にも叶うだろうが……

engChrName: As it stands, our investigation is hitting a snag. We could use some of Huckberry's wisdom to help shed light on all this...
engSearchText:
As it stands, our investigation is hitting a snag.
We could use some of Huckberry's wisdom to help
shed light on all this...
jpnChrName: 肝心の被害調査とマフィアの追及が手詰まりとは。 ううむ、ハックベリーの知恵を借りたかったが……
jpnSearchText:
肝心の被害調査とマフィアの追及が手詰まりとは。
ううむ、ハックベリーの知恵を借りたかったが……

engChrName: Jennifer has a lot of initiative, and that's good in a president. I just wish she weren't so rash—she needs to think things through.
engSearchText:
Jennifer has a lot of initiative, and that's good in
a president. I just wish she weren't so rash—she needs
to think things through.
jpnChrName: ジェニファー社長は活動的ではあるが、 いささか直情的・短絡的なのが玉に瑕だね。
jpnSearchText:
ジェニファー社長は活動的ではあるが、
いささか直情的・短絡的なのが玉に瑕だね。

engChrName: Not that she's unwelcome in the party, not at all. Everyone brings their own skills and strengths to the table.
engSearchText:
Not that she's unwelcome in the party, not at all.
Everyone brings their own skills and strengths to
the table.
jpnChrName: まあ、ああいう人でも取り入ろうとしてくれるなら 拒みはしないよ、使いようも幾らでもある。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ああいう人でも取り入ろうとしてくれるなら
拒みはしないよ、使いようも幾らでもある。

engChrName: Politics is all about connections, you see—and stringing them together to get what you want.
engSearchText:
Politics is all about connections, you see—and
stringing them together to get what you want.
jpnChrName: やはり、政治というのは人の繋がり、 人脈によって紡がれるモノなのだ……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、政治というのは人の繋がり、
人脈によって紡がれるモノなのだ……

engChrName: History is full of fools—perhaps good men—who tried to move the political world all by themselves. Seldom do they succeed.
engSearchText:
History is full of fools—perhaps good men—who
tried to move the political world all by themselves.
Seldom do they succeed.
jpnChrName: それを理解せず、一人で全てを背負おうとした者が、 足を掬われた歴史も多いしな。
jpnSearchText:
それを理解せず、一人で全てを背負おうとした者が、
足を掬われた歴史も多いしな。

engChrName: I do see that risk in Jennifer at times...but then, she's still young.
engSearchText:
I do see that risk in Jennifer at times...but then,
she's still young.
jpnChrName: ジェニファー社長はまだ若いから あのようになっている側面もある。
jpnSearchText:
ジェニファー社長はまだ若いから
あのようになっている側面もある。

engChrName: That ambition will help her. You can see plain as day how much she cares about every issue she tackles.
engSearchText:
That ambition will help her. You can see plain as day
how much she cares about every issue she tackles.
jpnChrName: だが、彼女の野心家っぷりも行動力も、 一つの事への執着力も……
jpnSearchText:
だが、彼女の野心家っぷりも行動力も、
一つの事への執着力も……

engChrName: At the right time and in the right place, she could be an effective player on the political stage.
engSearchText:
At the right time and in the right place, she could be
an effective player on the political stage.
jpnChrName: 成長して然るべき時に発揮できるようになれば、 政治力の一つとしては有用になるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
成長して然るべき時に発揮できるようになれば、
政治力の一つとしては有用になるだろうな。

engChrName: Now, don't let anyone tell you Jennifer's a bad businesswoman.
engSearchText:
Now, don't let anyone tell you Jennifer's a
bad businesswoman.
jpnChrName: ジェニファー社長も決して実業家として 無能ではないはずだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ジェニファー社長も決して実業家として
無能ではないはずだろう。

engChrName: But she does tend to hyperfixate on individual issues over the bigger picture.
engSearchText:
But she does tend to hyperfixate on individual issues
over the bigger picture.
jpnChrName: だが、一つの事に固執し、他が見えなくなる…… 大局というものが理解できんのだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、一つの事に固執し、他が見えなくなる……
大局というものが理解できんのだ。

engChrName: Until she can step back and look at broader problems, she'll find it difficult to work with people.
engSearchText:
Until she can step back and look at broader problems,
she'll find it difficult to work with people.
jpnChrName: 彼女が私にとっての政治的パートナーと言える ようになるのは、彼女が大局を理解してからだな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女が私にとっての政治的パートナーと言える
ようになるのは、彼女が大局を理解してからだな。

engChrName: Jennifer seems to be expecting me to make a move, announce some big initiative, as the heart of the party.
engSearchText:
Jennifer seems to be expecting me to make a move,
announce some big initiative, as the heart of
the party.
jpnChrName: ジェニファー社長は、一応は共和党の幹部である 私に大きな攻勢を期待しているようだが……
jpnSearchText:
ジェニファー社長は、一応は共和党の幹部である
私に大きな攻勢を期待しているようだが……

engChrName: But speaking from experience, I prefer not to be so...rash. The bigger picture is more complicated than she makes it out to be.
engSearchText:
But speaking from experience, I prefer not to be
so...rash. The bigger picture is more complicated than
she makes it out to be.
jpnChrName: この世界にいて長いからこそ、目先での対抗より 大局こそを根拠に行動したいのだがね、私は。
jpnSearchText:
この世界にいて長いからこそ、目先での対抗より
大局こそを根拠に行動したいのだがね、私は。

engChrName: I understand she has her own interests, her own agenda to push, but she could stand to think a little more critically about this.
engSearchText:
I understand she has her own interests, her own
agenda to push, but she could stand to think a little
more critically about this.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女の場合は利権もあるし焦るのは わかるが……ここは厳しさも学んで欲しいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女の場合は利権もあるし焦るのは
わかるが……ここは厳しさも学んで欲しいものだ。

engChrName: I'm not saying yea OR nay to this whole 'pork barrel' business.
engSearchText:
I'm not saying yea OR nay to this whole 'pork
barrel' business.
jpnChrName: バラマキ政策、ワシは否定も肯定もせんよ。
jpnSearchText: バラマキ政策、ワシは否定も肯定もせんよ。

engChrName: What I WILL say is, the president knows how to use the mira as a bargaining chip. He's got that down pat even more than the old administration.
engSearchText:
What I WILL say is, the president knows how to use
the mira as a bargaining chip. He's got that down pat
even more than the old administration.
jpnChrName: むしろ彼はミラという“道具”の使い方が上手い。 ……恐らく前政権よりはな。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ彼はミラという“道具”の使い方が上手い。
……恐らく前政権よりはな。

engChrName: Haha. You never pull your punches, do you?
engSearchText: Haha. You never pull your punches, do you?
jpnChrName: ハハ、相変わらず辛辣だな君は……
jpnSearchText: ハハ、相変わらず辛辣だな君は……

engChrName: Now, there's nothing WRONG with that on paper. I do that, myself, so I get where he's coming from.
engSearchText:
Now, there's nothing WRONG with that on paper.
I do that, myself, so I get where he's coming from.
jpnChrName: ワシも“仕事道具”として使っておるからのぉ。 親近感が湧くくらいじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ワシも“仕事道具”として使っておるからのぉ。
親近感が湧くくらいじゃ。

engChrName: But when you start throwing money around to get what you want, eventually you run out of money. Those reparations won't last forever.
engSearchText:
But when you start throwing money around to get what
you want, eventually you run out of money. Those
reparations won't last forever.
jpnChrName: もっとも、賠償金が切れてからの話は “別口”になりそうじゃがな。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、賠償金が切れてからの話は
“別口”になりそうじゃがな。

engChrName: Indeed. And by then, the narrative will have shifted out of his favor.
engSearchText:
Indeed. And by then, the narrative will have shifted
out of his favor.
jpnChrName: ふむ……経済政策の範疇ではない、か。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……経済政策の範疇ではない、か。

engChrName: I've heard the president of BOE saying the same thing. He was your student, yes?
engSearchText:
I've heard the president of BOE saying the
same thing. He was your student, yes?
jpnChrName: ＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）の現頭取も同じ事を言っていたよ。 ──確か君の教え子だったな？
jpnSearchText:
ＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）の現頭取も同じ事を言っていたよ。
──確か君の教え子だったな？

engChrName: Student? Nah, he just hung around my place way back when. I haven't actually sat down with him in years.
engSearchText:
Student? Nah, he just hung around my place way
back when. I haven't actually sat down with him
in years.
jpnChrName: 若い頃にウチにいたというだけじゃよ。 ワシも最近会っとらんの～。
jpnSearchText:
若い頃にウチにいたというだけじゃよ。
ワシも最近会っとらんの～。

engChrName: (Two bigwigs shootin' the shit... Figured they'd circle back around to politics.)
engSearchText:
(Two bigwigs shootin' the shit... Figured they'd circle
back around to politics.)
jpnChrName: （野党の大物、ポランスキー議員に   “ハックベリー社長”……流石のやり取りだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（野党の大物、ポランスキー議員に
“ハックベリー社長”……流石のやり取りだな。）

engChrName: (Don't wanna stick my nose where it doesn't belong, though. I'll leave 'em be.)
engSearchText:
(Don't wanna stick my nose where it doesn't
belong, though. I'll leave 'em be.)
jpnChrName: （ま、面子が面子だ。   立ち聞きもほどほどにしておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、面子が面子だ。
立ち聞きもほどほどにしておくか。）

engChrName: Don't get me wrong, I'm not completely against his methods.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong, I'm not completely against
his methods.
jpnChrName: 私も彼のやり口を 完全否定しているわけではないんだが……
jpnSearchText:
私も彼のやり口を
完全否定しているわけではないんだが……

engChrName: It's just my directive as the leader of the opposition to find the flaws in his agenda.
engSearchText:
It's just my directive as the leader of the opposition to
find the flaws in his agenda.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、野党として 突破口くらいは見出したいものだが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、野党として
突破口くらいは見出したいものだが。

engChrName: Your pardon, Jennifer. Sorry to keep you waiting like that.
engSearchText:
Your pardon, Jennifer. Sorry to keep you waiting
like that.
jpnChrName: さてと、お待たせしたねジェニファー君。
jpnSearchText: さてと、お待たせしたねジェニファー君。

engChrName: Oh, think nothing of it.
engSearchText: Oh, think nothing of it.
jpnChrName: いえ、お気になさらず。
jpnSearchText: いえ、お気になさらず。

engChrName: If you don't mind my asking, is something the matter? You don't seem yourself.
engSearchText:
If you don't mind my asking, is something
the matter? You don't seem yourself.
jpnChrName: それにしても……何かあったのですか？ 少し元気が無い様子ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……何かあったのですか？
少し元気が無い様子ですけど。

engChrName: Oh, just waxing nostalgia—we were talking about an old colleague of mine.
engSearchText:
Oh, just waxing nostalgia—we were talking about an
old colleague of mine.
jpnChrName: ああ……少し懐かしい同志の事を 思い出してしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……少し懐かしい同志の事を
思い出してしまってな。

engChrName: But enough about me. Let's get back to the matter at hand.
engSearchText:
But enough about me. Let's get back to the matter
at hand.
jpnChrName: さて、私の事はこのくらいにして 話の続きに戻ろうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、私の事はこのくらいにして
話の続きに戻ろうじゃないか。

engChrName: Our multi-party system is coming undone. If the minority just mirrors the majority, then they're hardly different parties at all.
engSearchText:
Our multi-party system is coming undone. If the
minority just mirrors the majority, then they're hardly
different parties at all.
jpnChrName: 現大統領率いる愛国同盟と我々共和党は、 明確に違ったアプローチをせねば意味が無い。
jpnSearchText:
現大統領率いる愛国同盟と我々共和党は、
明確に違ったアプローチをせねば意味が無い。

engChrName: The Patriot League is enjoying a nice boost among the middle class, what with their pork barrel politics and local investments.
engSearchText:
The Patriot League is enjoying a nice boost among
the middle class, what with their pork barrel politics
and local investments.
jpnChrName: 愛国同盟はバラマキ経済政策により短期的な 効力を得て、中産階級の圧倒的支持を確保した。
jpnSearchText:
愛国同盟はバラマキ経済政策により短期的な
効力を得て、中産階級の圧倒的支持を確保した。

engChrName: But that's a bit short-sighted, no? Our party should push for broader welfare, interest control, things that will help all classes in the long run.
engSearchText:
But that's a bit short-sighted, no? Our party should
push for broader welfare, interest control, things that
will help all classes in the long run.
jpnChrName: 我々はそれよりも地盤を固めた上で福祉や再分配、 金利政策などを長期的に検討していくのだ……
jpnSearchText:
我々はそれよりも地盤を固めた上で福祉や再分配、
金利政策などを長期的に検討していくのだ……

engChrName: S-So, erm... How should we, uh, address this, Polanski?
engSearchText:
S-So, erm... How should we, uh, address
this, Polanski?
jpnChrName: ど、ど、どうしましょう ポランスキー議員……！？
jpnSearchText:
ど、ど、どうしましょう
ポランスキー議員……！？

engChrName: If this keeps up, they'll set their sights on the trade laws next, and...and...!
engSearchText:
If this keeps up, they'll set their sights on the trade
laws next, and...and...!
jpnChrName: こ、こんな事が続いていたら、 土地取引法の改正も……
jpnSearchText:
こ、こんな事が続いていたら、
土地取引法の改正も……

engChrName: Easy, Jennifer, easy.
engSearchText: Easy, Jennifer, easy.
jpnChrName: 落ち着きなさいジェニファー君。
jpnSearchText: 落ち着きなさいジェニファー君。

engChrName: That's a concern, certainly, but not the MAIN concern right now.
engSearchText:
That's a concern, certainly, but not the MAIN
concern right now.
jpnChrName: どう考えてもそんな心配を している場合じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
どう考えてもそんな心配を
している場合じゃない。

engChrName: Take a deep breath and think about what you, the president of your company, should focus on.
engSearchText:
Take a deep breath and think about what you, the
president of your company, should focus on.
jpnChrName: 君が社長として今考えねばならないのは 何なのか、少し深呼吸でもして……
jpnSearchText:
君が社長として今考えねばならないのは
何なのか、少し深呼吸でもして……

engChrName: Okay... Whew... Think, Jennifer, think, what should I be focusing on...?
engSearchText:
Okay... Whew... Think, Jennifer, think, what should
I be focusing on...?
jpnChrName: わ、私が今考えるべき事は…… スゥーッ……ハーッ……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私が今考えるべき事は……
スゥーッ……ハーッ……

engChrName: Right now, it's... Keeping the company safe. Minimizing the damage, and organizing rescue and cleanup efforts for when this is over.
engSearchText:
Right now, it's... Keeping the company safe.
Minimizing the damage, and organizing rescue and
cleanup efforts for when this is over.
jpnChrName: わ、私はまず会社の安全と損害の見立て、 事態終息後の対応を考えないと……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私はまず会社の安全と損害の見立て、
事態終息後の対応を考えないと……

engChrName: Correct.
engSearchText: Correct.
jpnChrName: ……うむ、当然だな。
jpnSearchText: ……うむ、当然だな。

engChrName: To be a president is to be a steady hand, to be rational—to analyze the full situation before jumping to conclusions.
engSearchText:
To be a president is to be a steady hand, to be
rational—to analyze the full situation before jumping
to conclusions.
jpnChrName: 君も仮にも社長なら、こういう時にこそ 冷静に状況を分析できるようになりなさい。
jpnSearchText:
君も仮にも社長なら、こういう時にこそ
冷静に状況を分析できるようになりなさい。

engChrName: That is what your constituents expect of you, understand?
engSearchText:
That is what your constituents expect of
you, understand?
jpnChrName: 私が政治の友を欲するとしたら、 そうした泰然とした人物だよ？
jpnSearchText:
私が政治の友を欲するとしたら、
そうした泰然とした人物だよ？

engChrName: I... Yes, I understand.
engSearchText: I... Yes, I understand.
jpnChrName: わ、わかりました……っ。
jpnSearchText: わ、わかりました……っ。

engChrName: I-I need to be focusing on what I can do.
engSearchText: I-I need to be focusing on what I can do.
jpnChrName: な、何とか私なりに出来る事を……
jpnSearchText: な、何とか私なりに出来る事を……

engChrName: We're eyeing the global marketplace for our next step, once we secure our footing here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
We're eyeing the global marketplace for our next step,
once we secure our footing here in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ……という訳でして、私どもの業界も今後、 国外市場を含め拡大するでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……という訳でして、私どもの業界も今後、
国外市場を含め拡大するでしょう。

engChrName: With that in mind, please do prioritize those bills and amendments when you secure the majority in the next election.
engSearchText:
With that in mind, please do prioritize those bills and
amendments when you secure the majority in the
next election.
jpnChrName: それを踏まえて、どうか次の選挙で 勝った暁には件の法案を……
jpnSearchText:
それを踏まえて、どうか次の選挙で
勝った暁には件の法案を……

engChrName: We'll support you on our end however we can.
engSearchText: We'll support you on our end however we can.
jpnChrName: 選挙の支援でしたら組合を 動かす事も考えておりますし……
jpnSearchText:
選挙の支援でしたら組合を
動かす事も考えておりますし……

engChrName: Hmm... Yes, fair enough. Your industry presents interesting opportunities for our party. It's time we embraced this new economic age.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Yes, fair enough. Your industry presents
interesting opportunities for our party. It's time we
embraced this new economic age.
jpnChrName: まあねぇ、君らの業界の利権に興味が 無い訳ではないがね、時代は変わるのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあねぇ、君らの業界の利権に興味が
無い訳ではないがね、時代は変わるのだよ。

engChrName: That said, you need to keep the bigger picture in mind. If you chase the short-term, you may lose sight of the long-term.
engSearchText:
That said, you need to keep the bigger picture
in mind. If you chase the short-term, you may lose
sight of the long-term.
jpnChrName: 目先の利権で私を動かそうと思うくらいなら、 一緒に遠く広い未来を見据えたいものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
目先の利権で私を動かそうと思うくらいなら、
一緒に遠く広い未来を見据えたいものだよ。

engChrName: We can address your immediate legislative concerns, of course, but we should do so in a forward-thinking way, no?
engSearchText:
We can address your immediate legislative concerns,
of course, but we should do so in a forward-thinking
way, no?
jpnChrName: 与党時代は現実主義的な政治も行ったが…… それとて、大局や未来を蔑ろにしてはいない。
jpnSearchText:
与党時代は現実主義的な政治も行ったが……
それとて、大局や未来を蔑ろにしてはいない。

engChrName: I understand that, but surely we can't overlook the short-term? The market is awfully turbulent—we need to strike when the iron's hot.
engSearchText:
I understand that, but surely we can't overlook
the short-term? The market is awfully turbulent—we
need to strike when the iron's hot.
jpnChrName: ですが、私達にとってはまず 短期的な見込みあってこその投資も……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、私達にとってはまず
短期的な見込みあってこその投資も……

engChrName: Incidentally, erm... I do have these sweets from Quincy Bell, if you'd like some.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, erm... I do have these sweets from
Quincy Bell, if you'd like some.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですわ……もしよろしければ、 このクインシー・ベルのお菓子をどうぞ……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですわ……もしよろしければ、
このクインシー・ベルのお菓子をどうぞ……

engChrName: And for your help, we'd be happy to welcome you to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel for some well-deserved rest and relaxation.
engSearchText:
And for your help, we'd be happy to welcome you to
the Al-Jumeirah Hotel for some well-deserved rest
and relaxation.
jpnChrName: もしよろしければ、ほんのお気持ちとして アルジュメイラホテルでの余暇にもご招待……
jpnSearchText:
もしよろしければ、ほんのお気持ちとして
アルジュメイラホテルでの余暇にもご招待……

engChrName: Oh, give it a rest, Jennifer. Retract that little offer at once, and I'll pretend I never heard it.
engSearchText:
Oh, give it a rest, Jennifer. Retract that little offer at
once, and I'll pretend I never heard it.
jpnChrName: ……ジェニファー君、いい加減にしなさい。 今引けば、その接待の話は聞かなかった事にする。
jpnSearchText:
……ジェニファー君、いい加減にしなさい。
今引けば、その接待の話は聞かなかった事にする。

engChrName: You're a talented businesswoman—you should know better than to butter me up with cheap favors.
engSearchText:
You're a talented businesswoman—you should know
better than to butter me up with cheap favors.
jpnChrName: 君にも多少は商才がある、そのような安直で 邪道な手で未来を絶つものではないよ……
jpnSearchText:
君にも多少は商才がある、そのような安直で
邪道な手で未来を絶つものではないよ……

engChrName: I... You're right. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: I... You're right. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員…… わ、私とした事が申し訳ございません……
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員……
わ、私とした事が申し訳ございません……

engChrName: I got a bit too anxious there... I need to cool my head. Forgive me.
engSearchText:
I got a bit too anxious there... I need to cool my head.
Forgive me.
jpnChrName: ……何にせよ、少々焦り過ぎでしたね。 少し頭を冷やしてきます。
jpnSearchText:
……何にせよ、少々焦り過ぎでしたね。
少し頭を冷やしてきます。

engChrName: So, Polanski, do you really think the Republican Party has a shot at taking the chamber back?
engSearchText:
So, Polanski, do you really think the Republican Party
has a shot at taking the chamber back?
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員……共和党は本当にそのような 在り方で復権できるとお思いなのですか？
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員……共和党は本当にそのような
在り方で復権できるとお思いなのですか？

engChrName: The Patriot League plays everything close to the chest, and I'm sure you've heard those grumblings about some mysterious Verne contract.
engSearchText:
The Patriot League plays everything close to the
chest, and I'm sure you've heard those grumblings
about some mysterious Verne contract.
jpnChrName: 《愛国同盟》の秘密主義やヴェルヌ社との 不可解な契約の噂はあなたもご存知でしょう？
jpnSearchText:
《愛国同盟》の秘密主義やヴェルヌ社との
不可解な契約の噂はあなたもご存知でしょう？

engChrName: I'm worried that we'll be left behind if we don't follow suit. We have to respond, don't we?
engSearchText:
I'm worried that we'll be left behind if we don't
follow suit. We have to respond, don't we?
jpnChrName: 共和党ももっと思い切って、多少強引な手を 使ってもバチは当たらないと思います！
jpnSearchText:
共和党ももっと思い切って、多少強引な手を
使ってもバチは当たらないと思います！

engChrName: I understand that, Jennifer, but I assure you, the party is not just sitting idly by.
engSearchText:
I understand that, Jennifer, but I assure you, the party
is not just sitting idly by.
jpnChrName: 言いたい事は分かるがねジェニファー君。 我々とてただ消極化している訳でもないのだ。
jpnSearchText:
言いたい事は分かるがねジェニファー君。
我々とてただ消極化している訳でもないのだ。

engChrName: Look before you leap, as they say. A better opportunity may be waiting just around the corner.
engSearchText:
Look before you leap, as they say. A better
opportunity may be waiting just around the corner.
jpnChrName: 機を見るという事も決断と 同じくらい大切なのだよ……
jpnSearchText:
機を見るという事も決断と
同じくらい大切なのだよ……

engChrName: A politician must be decisive, but not hasty—they must know when the time is right.
engSearchText:
A politician must be decisive, but not hasty—they
must know when the time is right.
jpnChrName: 賭けをするにしても、然るべき時を 見極めてからなのが政治だ。
jpnSearchText:
賭けをするにしても、然るべき時を
見極めてからなのが政治だ。

engChrName: Is that party policy, or just your personal approach?
engSearchText: Is that party policy, or just your personal approach?
jpnChrName: それはポランスキー議員のお考えですか？ それとも共和党の意見なのですか？
jpnSearchText:
それはポランスキー議員のお考えですか？
それとも共和党の意見なのですか？

engChrName: Oh, it's just my intuition speaking. I suspect you'll get similar answers from my fellow partymen, though.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's just my intuition speaking. I suspect you'll get
similar answers from my fellow partymen, though.
jpnChrName: 公式見解ではないが……きっと、 私の同志達も皆同じように答えると思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
公式見解ではないが……きっと、
私の同志達も皆同じように答えると思うよ。

engChrName: We've taken away plenty of hard lessons from those long years under Rocksmith—to say nothing of the current administration.
engSearchText:
We've taken away plenty of hard lessons from those
long years under Rocksmith—to say nothing of the
current administration.
jpnChrName: 長きにわたったロックスミス政権と、その後に 来た今の政権で我々は多くの教訓を得たのだ。
jpnSearchText:
長きにわたったロックスミス政権と、その後に
来た今の政権で我々は多くの教訓を得たのだ。

engChrName: Politics is all about negotiating and bargaining... You need to know how and when to play your cards—and indeed, when NOT to.
engSearchText:
Politics is all about negotiating and bargaining...
You need to know how and when to play your
cards—and indeed, when NOT to.
jpnChrName: 政治は駆け引きの場であるであるからこそ、 時として自らを律する事も肝要なのだ。
jpnSearchText:
政治は駆け引きの場であるであるからこそ、
時として自らを律する事も肝要なのだ。

engChrName: So, on the topic of labor laws, can I count on you to address those if and when the Republican Party regains the majority?
engSearchText:
So, on the topic of labor laws, can I count on you to
address those if and when the Republican Party
regains the majority?
jpnChrName: ではポランスキー議員、土地取引法の 改正は政権交代が出来たらすぐにでも……！
jpnSearchText:
ではポランスキー議員、土地取引法の
改正は政権交代が出来たらすぐにでも……！

engChrName: That's not a promise I can make so easily. The Republican Party has lost much sway in these last two years.
engSearchText:
That's not a promise I can make so easily.
The Republican Party has lost much sway in these
last two years.
jpnChrName: そう簡単にはいかないな、この二年間で 我々共和党が失ったものは少なくない。
jpnSearchText:
そう簡単にはいかないな、この二年間で
我々共和党が失ったものは少なくない。

engChrName: Our policy going forward will need to wait in the wings, potentially for years, and account for how much strength we have.
engSearchText:
Our policy going forward will need to wait in the
wings, potentially for years, and account for how
much strength we have.
jpnChrName: そもそも、政権を奪取できるか否かからして 長いスパンで戦略を練らねばならないが……
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、政権を奪取できるか否かからして
長いスパンで戦略を練らねばならないが……

engChrName: And even if we do regain the majority, we need to focus first and foremost on strengthening our historical voter base.
engSearchText:
And even if we do regain the majority, we need to
focus first and foremost on strengthening our
historical voter base.
jpnChrName: 共和党が与党に復権したとしても、まずは かつての地盤を整える事が先決だ……
jpnSearchText:
共和党が与党に復権したとしても、まずは
かつての地盤を整える事が先決だ……

engChrName: Not to mention, there will be years of Patriot policy to potentially undo.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, there will be years of Patriot policy
to potentially undo.
jpnChrName: 他にも愛国同盟の作った法律には、共和党の 理念からして優先的に改正すべきものも……
jpnSearchText:
他にも愛国同盟の作った法律には、共和党の
理念からして優先的に改正すべきものも……

engChrName: I see... Trade laws, I imagine? Or something else? You don't mean all those laws they rescinded themselves in the handover, do you?
engSearchText:
I see... Trade laws, I imagine? Or something else?
You don't mean all those laws they rescinded
themselves in the handover, do you?
jpnChrName: それでは、土地取引法の……いえ、他にも 各種の政権交代で立ち消えになった法案は……
jpnSearchText:
それでは、土地取引法の……いえ、他にも
各種の政権交代で立ち消えになった法案は……

engChrName: Easy, easy. I know exactly what you're hoping to get out of this alliance.
engSearchText:
Easy, easy. I know exactly what you're hoping to get
out of this alliance.
jpnChrName: 君は焦り過ぎだよ、ジェニファー社長。 付随する利益が欲しいのも判るがね……
jpnSearchText:
君は焦り過ぎだよ、ジェニファー社長。
付随する利益が欲しいのも判るがね……

engChrName: But legislation is not too easily rushed. We will need time, both to PLAN our strategy for retaking the majority, and to actually DO it.
engSearchText:
But legislation is not too easily rushed. We will need
time, both to PLAN our strategy for retaking the
majority, and to actually DO it.
jpnChrName: 準備期間があるというのもまた、 場合によっては貴重な事なのだ。
jpnSearchText:
準備期間があるというのもまた、
場合によっては貴重な事なのだ。

engChrName: Politics are all about the long term, the big picture. Our decisions always take that into account.
engSearchText:
Politics are all about the long term, the big picture.
Our decisions always take that into account.
jpnChrName: もう少し長期的に、そして幅広く 見て判断した方が儲けられるものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し長期的に、そして幅広く
見て判断した方が儲けられるものだよ。

engChrName: Communications have been restored, thankfully, so the districts can coordinate between each other now.
engSearchText:
Communications have been restored, thankfully, so
the districts can coordinate between each other now.
jpnChrName: 幸いにも通信が回復したので、可能な範囲で 関係各所との情報交換はできました……
jpnSearchText:
幸いにも通信が回復したので、可能な範囲で
関係各所との情報交換はできました……

engChrName: Did you see Rocksmith, though? He was together with that elder from Heiyue, still casual like he always is. He just has this aura about him.
engSearchText:
Did you see Rocksmith, though? He was together
with that elder from Heiyue, still casual like he
always is. He just has this aura about him.
jpnChrName: ──それにしても、あの前大統領と黒月の大老…… 何というか、オーラが違うというか……
jpnSearchText:
──それにしても、あの前大統領と黒月の大老……
何というか、オーラが違うというか……

engChrName: I can't believe Polanski can even stand to be near them... I would buckle from the pressure, no doubt.
engSearchText:
I can't believe Polanski can even stand to be
near them... I would buckle from the pressure,
no doubt.
jpnChrName: あの中で立ち回るポランスキー議員…… 今更ながら凄いです、私など気圧されて……
jpnSearchText:
あの中で立ち回るポランスキー議員……
今更ながら凄いです、私など気圧されて……

engChrName: Hmm... But I can't shy away from that, can I? I should learn from how he does it, not just look the other way.
engSearchText:
Hmm... But I can't shy away from that, can I?
I should learn from how he does it, not just look the
other way.
jpnChrName: いえ──この機会です、少しでもポランスキー氏の 立ち回り方を学び取って私も成長せねば……
jpnSearchText:
いえ──この機会です、少しでもポランスキー氏の
立ち回り方を学び取って私も成長せねば……

engChrName: From what the police and Heiyue have told me, the company building is still okay.
engSearchText:
From what the police and Heiyue have told me, the
company building is still okay.
jpnChrName: と、とりあえず警察や黒月の人から 聞く限り、私の会社のビルは無事そうでした……
jpnSearchText:
と、とりあえず警察や黒月の人から
聞く限り、私の会社のビルは無事そうでした……

engChrName: But I just... I don't know where to go from here. What am I supposed to do in a situation like this?
engSearchText:
But I just... I don't know where to go from here.
What am I supposed to do in a situation like this?
jpnChrName: しかし……この状況でこれ以上 一体どうしたら……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……この状況でこれ以上
一体どうしたら……

engChrName: ...No, no, I can't lose my head! Think, Jennifer, think.
engSearchText: ...No, no, I can't lose my head! Think, Jennifer, think.
jpnChrName: いえ……流石に悩んでるだけではいけません。 とにかく、少しでも頭を使わないと……
jpnSearchText:
いえ……流石に悩んでるだけではいけません。
とにかく、少しでも頭を使わないと……

engChrName: I'm... I'm just losing all control out here. This is bad...
engSearchText: I'm... I'm just losing all control out here. This is bad...
jpnChrName: わ、私とした事がまたしても 取り乱して……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私とした事がまたしても
取り乱して……

engChrName: What do I even do? Comms are down, we can't go outside, we're cut off from everywhere else...
engSearchText:
What do I even do? Comms are down, we can't go
outside, we're cut off from everywhere else...
jpnChrName: とはいえ……通信も使えないし、 外にも出られない状況ですし……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……通信も使えないし、
外にも出られない状況ですし……

engChrName: I have no idea what's going on at the company—is our building even still standing?
engSearchText:
I have no idea what's going on at the company—is
our building even still standing?
jpnChrName: 状況の把握も安否確認も、 一体どうしたら……
jpnSearchText:
状況の把握も安否確認も、
一体どうしたら……

engChrName: (I'd expect nothing less than that from Mr. Huckberry, but I can't let him show me up!)
engSearchText:
(I'd expect nothing less than that from Mr.
Huckberry, but I can't let him show me up!)
jpnChrName: （またしてもハックベリー氏……   ですが私も負けませんよ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（またしてもハックベリー氏……
ですが私も負けませんよ……！）

engChrName: (I can't let everything Polanski taught me go to waste. I can do this... Just stay focused!)
engSearchText:
(I can't let everything Polanski taught me go to waste.
I can do this... Just stay focused!)
jpnChrName: （ポランスキー議員から学ばせてもらった事もある、   そう……私はまだ成長できるのだから！）
jpnSearchText:
（ポランスキー議員から学ばせてもらった事もある、
そう……私はまだ成長できるのだから！）

engChrName: Polanski's right: it really does pay off to step back and look at the big picture, especially at a time like this.
engSearchText:
Polanski's right: it really does pay off to step back and
look at the big picture, especially at a time like this.
jpnChrName: まあ、理性的に大局を見て動くよう 努めるのは当然として……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、理性的に大局を見て動くよう
努めるのは当然として……

engChrName: The festival is an excellent opportunity to connect with politicians and string together a network of my own.
engSearchText:
The festival is an excellent opportunity to connect
with politicians and string together a network of
my own.
jpnChrName: やはり記念祭は政治家との関係づくりに 絶好の機会なのは変わらない事実だわ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり記念祭は政治家との関係づくりに
絶好の機会なのは変わらない事実だわ。

engChrName: No need to focus all my attention on Polanski. I'd rather find a more...agreeable senator to schmooze with.
engSearchText:
No need to focus all my attention on Polanski.
I'd rather find a more...agreeable senator to
schmooze with.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員だけに固執せず、もっと 御しやすい議員を見つけて取り入る……
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員だけに固執せず、もっと
御しやすい議員を見つけて取り入る……

engChrName: Right. Time to put his advice into practice!
engSearchText: Right. Time to put his advice into practice!
jpnChrName: これぞ柔軟に大局を見て、 という事に他なりませんわね！
jpnSearchText:
これぞ柔軟に大局を見て、
という事に他なりませんわね！

engChrName: My head just can't keep up with Polanski and their types. He was there to cool my head when I lost it back there.
engSearchText:
My head just can't keep up with Polanski and
their types. He was there to cool my head when I lost
it back there.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員には頭が上がりません…… 先の混乱で取り乱した際はご助言いただき……
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員には頭が上がりません……
先の混乱で取り乱した際はご助言いただき……

engChrName: Where would I be without his advice...? I can't deny it's kinda bearing down on me. Like I can't manage on my own.
engSearchText:
Where would I be without his advice...? I can't deny
it's kinda bearing down on me. Like I can't manage
on my own.
jpnChrName: 経営にも影響が出てしまいましたが、 適切なアドバイスが無ければどうなったか……
jpnSearchText:
経営にも影響が出てしまいましたが、
適切なアドバイスが無ければどうなったか……

engChrName: I need to learn from him, learn to look at the bigger picture before I go making big decisions.
engSearchText:
I need to learn from him, learn to look at the bigger
picture before I go making big decisions.
jpnChrName: 彼を見習い、私も少しでも理性的に 大局を見て動けるように……
jpnSearchText:
彼を見習い、私も少しでも理性的に
大局を見て動けるように……

engChrName: I just don't know how he does it. He seems to have it all figured out, in spite of everything going on.
engSearchText:
I just don't know how he does it. He seems to have it
all figured out, in spite of everything going on.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員……この状況で あそこまで柔軟に……
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員……この状況で
あそこまで柔軟に……

engChrName: He even predicted some of his colleagues would break off from the party!
engSearchText:
He even predicted some of his colleagues would break
off from the party!
jpnChrName: しかも、一部の党員の暴走まで 見据えて語れるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
しかも、一部の党員の暴走まで
見据えて語れるだなんて……

engChrName: He's far more savvy than I thought... And to think he wants to take me under his wing.
engSearchText:
He's far more savvy than I thought... And to think he
wants to take me under his wing.
jpnChrName: わ、私が思っていた以上に大物だったのね…… あれに取り入るだなんて、そんな……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私が思っていた以上に大物だったのね……
あれに取り入るだなんて、そんな……

engChrName: I thought it would be easy to win over some party members, given the slump they're in... How wrong I was.
engSearchText:
I thought it would be easy to win over some party
members, given the slump they're in... How wrong
I was.
jpnChrName: ポランスキー議員……落ち目の共和党議員など、 簡単に籠絡できると思ったのは大間違いでしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ポランスキー議員……落ち目の共和党議員など、
簡単に籠絡できると思ったのは大間違いでしたわ。

engChrName: And he has such a big heart, to set me straight like that.
engSearchText:
And he has such a big heart, to set me straight
like that.
jpnChrName: それに……ああして私を諭すなど…… 本当に懐も大きいというか……
jpnSearchText:
それに……ああして私を諭すなど……
本当に懐も大きいというか……

engChrName: It's strange. Even the sweetest Quincy treat tastes salty when I eat it alone. *sigh*
engSearchText:
It's strange. Even the sweetest Quincy treat tastes
salty when I eat it alone. *sigh*
jpnChrName: はぁ……それにしても……一人で頂くクインシーの お菓子、不思議と塩の味がしますわ……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……それにしても……一人で頂くクインシーの
お菓子、不思議と塩の味がしますわ……

engChrName: I can't believe myself. Did I really just try to do that? And how low will I sink if I don't put a stop to it...?
engSearchText:
I can't believe myself. Did I really just try to do that?
And how low will I sink if I don't put a stop to it...?
jpnChrName: わ、私とした事が……つい 禁じ手と言いますか邪道な手を……
jpnSearchText:
わ、私とした事が……つい
禁じ手と言いますか邪道な手を……

engChrName: But I've made this bed—now I have to lie in it. Our actions at the bank have all boiled down to winning the Republican Party's favor.
engSearchText:
But I've made this bed—now I have to lie in it.
Our actions at the bank have all boiled down to
winning the Republican Party's favor.
jpnChrName: ですが、共和党が唱えていた土地取引法改正案、 それを前提に我が社も動いていたのも事実……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、共和党が唱えていた土地取引法改正案、
それを前提に我が社も動いていたのも事実……

engChrName: If we were to convince them to amend those trade laws, the market would be all but ours after the next election. I guess I let that...blind me.
engSearchText:
If we were to convince them to amend those trade
laws, the market would be all but ours after the
next election. I guess I let that...blind me.
jpnChrName: 現大統領を降ろした後に不動産業界を牛耳るには、 あの法案の復活が一番手っ取り早いのに……
jpnSearchText:
現大統領を降ろした後に不動産業界を牛耳るには、
あの法案の復活が一番手っ取り早いのに……

engChrName: (Grr... That old fox thinks he's some big shot just because he's cushy with Rocksmith!)
engSearchText:
(Grr... That old fox thinks he's some big shot just
because he's cushy with Rocksmith!)
jpnChrName: （ぐぬぬ……この狸爺……   ロックスミスの盟友だけあるわね……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ぐぬぬ……この狸爺……
ロックスミスの盟友だけあるわね……！）

engChrName: (He's about as far across the aisle from Rocksmith as one could possibly be...but he could be my in.)
engSearchText:
(He's about as far across the aisle from Rocksmith as
one could possibly be...but he could be my in.)
jpnChrName: （ロックスミスとは方向性は違うけど、   取り入る隙も……）
jpnSearchText:
（ロックスミスとは方向性は違うけど、
取り入る隙も……）

engChrName: (Wait, is that...President Huckberry? He and Polanski look thick as thieves over there.)
engSearchText:
(Wait, is that...President Huckberry? He and
Polanski look thick as thieves over there.)
jpnChrName: （あれは……ハックベリー社長！？   くっ、随分と親密にポランスキー議員と……）
jpnSearchText:
（あれは……ハックベリー社長！？
くっ、随分と親密にポランスキー議員と……）

engChrName: (Why would Polanski just let an obsequious weasel like him into his inner circle?!)
engSearchText:
(Why would Polanski just let an obsequious weasel
like him into his inner circle?!)
jpnChrName: （あんな軽薄な態度でどうして   あそこまで取り入っているというの……！？）
jpnSearchText:
（あんな軽薄な態度でどうして
あそこまで取り入っているというの……！？）

engChrName: (He should be more concerned about his own hide! The times will leave you behind, old dog!)
engSearchText:
(He should be more concerned about his own hide!
The times will leave you behind, old dog!)
jpnChrName: （あんな老いぼれ……この先も時代に   ついていけるかもわからないというのに……！）
jpnSearchText:
（あんな老いぼれ……この先も時代に
ついていけるかもわからないというのに……！）

engChrName: (Is this really how my career goes down the drain? All because some old fogey only wants a friend his age?!)
engSearchText:
(Is this really how my career goes down the drain?
All because some old fogey only wants a friend
his age?!)
jpnChrName: （同年代同士でよろしくやって……   くっ、私の立場と計画は……！）
jpnSearchText:
（同年代同士でよろしくやって……
くっ、私の立場と計画は……！）

engChrName: The Republican Party should still have strong support and funding from their old regime, but they're on the downswing.
engSearchText:
The Republican Party should still have strong support
and funding from their old regime, but they're on
the downswing.
jpnChrName: 共和党には与党時代に築いた、多くの 支持層や地盤、資金源もまだあるはず……
jpnSearchText:
共和党には与党時代に築いた、多くの
支持層や地盤、資金源もまだあるはず……

engChrName: With how aggressive the Patriot League is, the Republican Party could stand to rally their own voter base.
engSearchText:
With how aggressive the Patriot League is, the
Republican Party could stand to rally their own
voter base.
jpnChrName: 愛国同盟があれほど強気ならば、 もっと思い切っても良いはずでしょうに……
jpnSearchText:
愛国同盟があれほど強気ならば、
もっと思い切っても良いはずでしょうに……

engChrName: We finally heard back from everybody. Our part-timer, Carol, she's okay—and we've confirmed some of the other industry folks are all right.
engSearchText:
We finally heard back from everybody. Our part-timer,
Carol, she's okay—and we've confirmed some
of the other industry folks are all right.
jpnChrName: ……バイトのキャロルさんや、数名の 同業者の無事が確認できました……
jpnSearchText:
……バイトのキャロルさんや、数名の
同業者の無事が確認できました……

engChrName: There's still hope... We can't lose it here. They're saying we're close to a breakthrough.
engSearchText:
There's still hope... We can't lose it here.
They're saying we're close to a breakthrough.
jpnChrName: ……やはり、希望は持てそうですね。 事態の打開に向けての動きも伺いました。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり、希望は持てそうですね。
事態の打開に向けての動きも伺いました。

engChrName: I'd be fine if they postpone the EGC, just as long as it eventually goes through.
engSearchText:
I'd be fine if they postpone the EGC, just as long as it
eventually goes through.
jpnChrName: たとえＥＧＣが延期になっても……私は 希望を体現したものに仕上げたい。
jpnSearchText:
たとえＥＧＣが延期になっても……私は
希望を体現したものに仕上げたい。

engChrName: The hopes and dreams of people everywhere are riding on that show—not to mention my own. I just hope we can hold on to it...
engSearchText:
The hopes and dreams of people everywhere are
riding on that show—not to mention my own. I just
hope we can hold on to it...
jpnChrName: その想いを、持ち続けられるでしょう……
jpnSearchText: その想いを、持ち続けられるでしょう……

engChrName: I had put my all into the EGC... Why did things have to turn out like this?
engSearchText:
I had put my all into the EGC... Why did things have
to turn out like this?
jpnChrName: ……来年への希望を込め、ＥＧＣに 備えていたのに……残念です。
jpnSearchText:
……来年への希望を込め、ＥＧＣに
備えていたのに……残念です。

engChrName: I imagine the staff there are all frozen, too.
engSearchText: I imagine the staff there are all frozen, too.
jpnChrName: おそらく運営委員の方々も“停まって” いる状況でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
おそらく運営委員の方々も“停まって”
いる状況でしょう……

engChrName: I'm the only one who can still move... A cruel coincidence, maybe.
engSearchText:
I'm the only one who can still move... A cruel
coincidence, maybe.
jpnChrName: ですが……その中で私が動けるのは、 一種の天命とも捉えられます。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……その中で私が動けるのは、
一種の天命とも捉えられます。

engChrName: All I can do for now is provide shelter and send supplies to the front. I hope that's enough...
engSearchText:
All I can do for now is provide shelter and send
supplies to the front. I hope that's enough...
jpnChrName: 避難民の受け入れと、防具に使える商品の 提供くらいとはいえ……お役には立てるかと。
jpnSearchText:
避難民の受け入れと、防具に使える商品の
提供くらいとはいえ……お役には立てるかと。

engChrName: Oh, I'm just glad everybody can come out and enjoy the festival this year.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just glad everybody can come out and enjoy
the festival this year.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今年の記念祭もどのお客様も 前向きに楽しまれていて何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今年の記念祭もどのお客様も
前向きに楽しまれていて何よりです。

engChrName: I was worried it'd be a bit of a downer, after everything, but I guess we're all starting to heal. That puts me at ease.
engSearchText:
I was worried it'd be a bit of a downer, after
everything, but I guess we're all starting to heal.
That puts me at ease.
jpnChrName: あの事件もありましたし、落ち込んでいる方も 多いかと思いましたが杞憂でした……
jpnSearchText:
あの事件もありましたし、落ち込んでいる方も
多いかと思いましたが杞憂でした……

engChrName: The way things are going, I think the EGC will be a real showstopper tonight.
engSearchText:
The way things are going, I think the EGC will be a
real showstopper tonight.
jpnChrName: この分であれば、今夜のＥＧＣも 華やかなものに仕上がることでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
この分であれば、今夜のＥＧＣも
華やかなものに仕上がることでしょう。

engChrName: This newest gown was made with a theme of 'hope' in mind... I think that's particularly relevant nowadays. I know it'll be a hit!
engSearchText:
This newest gown was made with a theme of 'hope'
in mind... I think that's particularly
relevant nowadays. I know it'll be a hit!
jpnChrName: 当ブランドの希望をテーマにした 新作ガウンも輝くに違いありません。
jpnSearchText:
当ブランドの希望をテーマにした
新作ガウンも輝くに違いありません。

engChrName: I'm just so glad the EGC is still going forward, along with the festival.
engSearchText:
I'm just so glad the EGC is still going forward, along
with the festival.
jpnChrName: それにしても……記念祭の日に控える ＥＧＣも無事開催できるようで嬉しい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……記念祭の日に控える
ＥＧＣも無事開催できるようで嬉しい限りです。

engChrName: It's part of my life's work, you know? And our theme, hope, is really relevant this year. Everybody could use a little hope right now.
engSearchText:
It's part of my life's work, you know? And our theme,
hope, is really relevant this year. Everybody could use
a little hope right now.
jpnChrName: 私にとってあれも一つのライフワークです…… 今年は一層、希望を感じられるものにできれば。
jpnSearchText:
私にとってあれも一つのライフワークです……
今年は一層、希望を感じられるものにできれば。

engChrName: I hope myself that the festival is a sign of better things to come next year.
engSearchText:
I hope myself that the festival is a sign of better
things to come next year.
jpnChrName: 記念祭も、どうか再び希望のある一年を 迎えるため、相応しいものとなると良いですが……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も、どうか再び希望のある一年を
迎えるため、相応しいものとなると良いですが……

engChrName: The tragedy has come and gone...but the lives we lost? They're... They're never coming back...
engSearchText:
The tragedy has come and gone...but the lives
we lost? They're... They're never coming back...
jpnChrName: 事件は解決したと聞きますが…… 失われたものが戻る事はありません。
jpnSearchText:
事件は解決したと聞きますが……
失われたものが戻る事はありません。

engChrName: We can't forget them...not ever. We have to keep them in our hearts.
engSearchText:
We can't forget them...not ever. We have to keep
them in our hearts.
jpnChrName: 残された私達は…… 彼らのことを忘れないよう努めなくては。
jpnSearchText:
残された私達は……
彼らのことを忘れないよう努めなくては。

engChrName: I've been to that village, and I'll never forget the harmony it had.
engSearchText:
I've been to that village, and I'll never forget the
harmony it had.
jpnChrName: 私もかつて訪れた、あの村で目にした 融和の光景の一端を……
jpnSearchText:
私もかつて訪れた、あの村で目にした
融和の光景の一端を……

engChrName: I want to work that harmony into my clothing designs... It's the least I can do in their memory.
engSearchText:
I want to work that harmony into my
clothing designs... It's the least I can do in
their memory.
jpnChrName: あの雰囲気を落とし込んだ服のデザインを── 決して不可能ではないはずです。
jpnSearchText:
あの雰囲気を落とし込んだ服のデザインを──
決して不可能ではないはずです。

engChrName: Why...? Why Creil? What did they ever do wrong...?
engSearchText: Why...? Why Creil? What did they ever do wrong...?
jpnChrName: まさか、あのクレイユ村が こんな事になってしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、あのクレイユ村が
こんな事になってしまうとは……

engChrName: I remember going there once or twice, on my trips to Remiferia... It was such a wonderful place.
engSearchText:
I remember going there once or twice, on my trips
to Remiferia... It was such a wonderful place.
jpnChrName: 私も、レミフェリアへの出張の際に 滞在した事はありますが……美しい村でした。
jpnSearchText:
私も、レミフェリアへの出張の際に
滞在した事はありますが……美しい村でした。

engChrName: And now those terrorists have killed that beauty forever... I want to cry.
engSearchText:
And now those terrorists have killed that
beauty forever... I want to cry.
jpnChrName: あの美しさが怖ろしいテロによって 跡形も無く……
jpnSearchText:
あの美しさが怖ろしいテロによって
跡形も無く……

engChrName: Lulua's going to take Daphne to the place she works tonight.
engSearchText:
Lulua's going to take Daphne to the place she
works tonight.
jpnChrName: この後は、ルルアさんが普段活動されている 場所を案内するという話をされていましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
この後は、ルルアさんが普段活動されている
場所を案内するという話をされていましたよ。

engChrName: What was it, the, umm...the Riverside Concert Hall?
engSearchText: What was it, the, umm...the Riverside Concert Hall?
jpnChrName: 確か……リバーサイドのライブハウスでしたか。
jpnSearchText: 確か……リバーサイドのライブハウスでしたか。

engChrName: Those two seem like they're getting along pretty well...
engSearchText: Those two seem like they're getting along pretty well...
jpnChrName: お二人とも本当に仲が良い様子でしたけど……
jpnSearchText: お二人とも本当に仲が良い様子でしたけど……

engChrName: But isn't it a tad contradictory that a 'volunteer' like Lulua charges money for her services?
engSearchText:
But isn't it a tad contradictory that a 'volunteer' like
Lulua charges money for her services?
jpnChrName: ボランティアなのにミラを取るとは 矛盾しているような気もしますわね……？
jpnSearchText:
ボランティアなのにミラを取るとは
矛盾しているような気もしますわね……？

engChrName: I've heard that other countries look to Calvard for the newest fashion trends. Our diversity brings a lot of unique flair to the scene.
engSearchText:
I've heard that other countries look to Calvard for the
newest fashion trends. Our diversity brings a lot of
unique flair to the scene.
jpnChrName: 共和国における服飾文化の多様さは 他国から見れば新鮮だそうです。
jpnSearchText:
共和国における服飾文化の多様さは
他国から見れば新鮮だそうです。

engChrName: That's part of what makes designing clothes so interesting—not just for the EGC, but for store brands, too.
engSearchText:
That's part of what makes designing clothes so
interesting—not just for the EGC, but for store
brands, too.
jpnChrName: それだけあって、ＥＧＣに限らずブランドの プロデュースにはやり甲斐があるというもの。
jpnSearchText:
それだけあって、ＥＧＣに限らずブランドの
プロデュースにはやり甲斐があるというもの。

engChrName: You've got traditional stuff from Oración, Central and Far East trends...and then there's Edith, which is like this big melting pot.
engSearchText:
You've got traditional stuff from Oración, Central
and Far East trends...and then there's Edith, which is
like this big melting pot.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの伝統被服から中東・東方の民族衣装、 万国共通の正装に首都特有の若者文化。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの伝統被服から中東・東方の民族衣装、
万国共通の正装に首都特有の若者文化。

engChrName: That's my job: bridging all those unique cultures, and bringing them together to make something new!
engSearchText:
That's my job: bridging all those unique cultures, and
bringing them together to make something new!
jpnChrName: その橋渡しと融合、そして新たな文化の創造…… それを私達はなし得るのですから……
jpnSearchText:
その橋渡しと融合、そして新たな文化の創造……
それを私達はなし得るのですから……

engChrName: They say how you dress is an extension of your personality, and I'm inclined to agree.
engSearchText:
They say how you dress is an extension of your
personality, and I'm inclined to agree.
jpnChrName: 服飾は人の内面を表し、また人の内面に ある種の影響を与える……
jpnSearchText:
服飾は人の内面を表し、また人の内面に
ある種の影響を与える……

engChrName: But all the same, Calvard's fashion trends sorta... stifle people. Bind them to whatever's hot at the time.
engSearchText:
But all the same, Calvard's fashion trends sorta...
stifle people. Bind them to whatever's hot at the time.
jpnChrName: しかし、人が多様である以上は既存の服飾が むしろ束縛になってしまう方もいらっしゃる……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、人が多様である以上は既存の服飾が
むしろ束縛になってしまう方もいらっしゃる……

engChrName: That's why I aim to create clothing that helps bring out people's true natures, regardless of what's hip or trendy.
engSearchText:
That's why I aim to create clothing that helps bring
out people's true natures, regardless of what's hip
or trendy.
jpnChrName: 細やかな気配りと繊細な差異を表現した品で、 そうした方にも馴染むものを育みたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
細やかな気配りと繊細な差異を表現した品で、
そうした方にも馴染むものを育みたいものです。

engChrName: Carol's taking a break today.
engSearchText: Carol's taking a break today.
jpnChrName: 本日はキャロルさんには お休みいただいています。
jpnSearchText:
本日はキャロルさんには
お休みいただいています。

engChrName: Evidently there's something going on at the sharehouse in Old Town.
engSearchText:
Evidently there's something going on at the
sharehouse in Old Town.
jpnChrName: どうやら旧市街のシェアハウスで 何やらご事情があるとの事で……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら旧市街のシェアハウスで
何やらご事情があるとの事で……

engChrName: One look at her outfits lately tells me something's weighing heavy on her mind... I just don't know what.
engSearchText:
One look at her outfits lately tells me something's
weighing heavy on her mind... I just don't
know what.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女にもお悩みがあるのは 着こなしで承知の事……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女にもお悩みがあるのは
着こなしで承知の事……

engChrName: I pray to Arusha that whatever she's struggling with, she gets through it and finds her way.
engSearchText:
I pray to Arusha that whatever she's struggling with,
she gets through it and finds her way.
jpnChrName: 無事に解決して戻ってくる事を 翼の女神に祈ります。
jpnSearchText:
無事に解決して戻ってくる事を
翼の女神に祈ります。

engChrName: The Edith Girls' Collection, or EGC, is an ode to fashion design. All the biggest brands strut their stuff there!
engSearchText:
The Edith Girls' Collection, or EGC, is an ode to
fashion design. All the biggest brands strut their
stuff there!
jpnChrName: ＥＧＣ（イーディス・ガールズコレクション）── 複数の一流ブランドが共催する祭典です。
jpnSearchText:
ＥＧＣ（イーディス・ガールズコレクション）──
複数の一流ブランドが共催する祭典です。

engChrName: This'll be my fifth show, but it never ceases to get me all hyped up when the time rolls around.
engSearchText:
This'll be my fifth show, but it never ceases to get me
all hyped up when the time rolls around.
jpnChrName: 今冬の開催で５回目となりますが…… 準備を始めてみると感慨深いものです。
jpnSearchText:
今冬の開催で５回目となりますが……
準備を始めてみると感慨深いものです。

engChrName: I was actually involved with the very first EGC—it was a very formative experience for me.
engSearchText:
I was actually involved with the very first EGC—it
was a very formative experience for me.
jpnChrName: 一応、第１回の開催にも携わりましたが、 私にとっても衝撃的な経験でした。
jpnSearchText:
一応、第１回の開催にも携わりましたが、
私にとっても衝撃的な経験でした。

engChrName: In a roundabout way, I have the EGC to thank for launching my own career.
engSearchText:
In a roundabout way, I have the EGC to thank for
launching my own career.
jpnChrName: 当ブランドが今に至ったのも…… ＥＧＣがあってこそであるとも言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
当ブランドが今に至ったのも……
ＥＧＣがあってこそであるとも言えるでしょう。

engChrName: Fashion isn't all about looks, y'know. It's about how you feel, how you express your inner self.
engSearchText:
Fashion isn't all about looks, y'know. It's about how
you feel, how you express your inner self.
jpnChrName: 服は人の外観を彩るように見えて内面を表し、 着る者の内面を育てる事もあります。
jpnSearchText:
服は人の外観を彩るように見えて内面を表し、
着る者の内面を育てる事もあります。

engChrName: That's the secret to looking good: you gotta FEEL good. That's what gives lookers their... well, looks!
engSearchText:
That's the secret to looking good: you gotta
FEEL good. That's what gives lookers their...
well, looks!
jpnChrName: それを自ずから踏まえ、服を選べる方にこそ 真のセンスがあると言えるでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
それを自ずから踏まえ、服を選べる方にこそ
真のセンスがあると言えるでしょう……

engChrName: And it is fashion itself that draws out this taste. That's the real point: to make people feel comfortable in their own skin.
engSearchText:
And it is fashion itself that draws out this taste.
That's the real point: to make people feel comfortable
in their own skin.
jpnChrName: そして、そのセンスを引き出しうるのもまた服…… それこそ服飾文化の本質と捉えています。
jpnSearchText:
そして、そのセンスを引き出しうるのもまた服……
それこそ服飾文化の本質と捉えています。

engChrName: Welcome to Erland. We have outfits for the discerning lady and gentleman.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Erland. We have outfits for the
discerning lady and gentleman.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、《エルラント》へようこそ。 紳士服、婦人服共にご用意がございます。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、《エルラント》へようこそ。
紳士服、婦人服共にご用意がございます。

engChrName: Our clothes suit any age and gender, hand-crafted with our philosophy in mind.
engSearchText:
Our clothes suit any age and gender, hand-crafted
with our philosophy in mind.
jpnChrName: 性別・年代に関わらず服を扱っておりますが、 ブランドとしての理念はどれも共通──
jpnSearchText:
性別・年代に関わらず服を扱っておりますが、
ブランドとしての理念はどれも共通──

engChrName: Here at Erland, we work to draw out your true inner beauty—to help you be who you really are.
engSearchText:
Here at Erland, we work to draw out your true inner
beauty—to help you be who you really are.
jpnChrName: 貴方の中の美を際立たせるアイテム。 それがエルラントでございます。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の中の美を際立たせるアイテム。
それがエルラントでございます。

engChrName: And we hope we can help you show your true colors yourself!
engSearchText:
And we hope we can help you show your true
colors yourself!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、実際に着用し、どうか貴方の美しさを 体験していただければ幸いですわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、実際に着用し、どうか貴方の美しさを
体験していただければ幸いですわ。

engChrName: Welcome to Erland. We have outfits for the discerning lady and gentleman.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Erland. We have outfits for the
discerning lady and gentleman.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、《エルラント》へようこそ。 紳士服、婦人服共にご用意がございます。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、《エルラント》へようこそ。
紳士服、婦人服共にご用意がございます。

engChrName: Our clothes suit any age and gender, hand-crafted with our philosophy in mind.
engSearchText:
Our clothes suit any age and gender, hand-crafted
with our philosophy in mind.
jpnChrName: 性別・年代に関わらず服を扱っておりますが、 ブランドとしての理念はどれも共通──
jpnSearchText:
性別・年代に関わらず服を扱っておりますが、
ブランドとしての理念はどれも共通──

engChrName: Here at Erland, we work to draw out your true inner beauty—to help you be who you really are.
engSearchText:
Here at Erland, we work to draw out your true inner
beauty—to help you be who you really are.
jpnChrName: 貴方の中の美を際立たせるアイテム。 それがエルラントでございます。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の中の美を際立たせるアイテム。
それがエルラントでございます。

engChrName: And we hope we can help you show your true colors yourself!
engSearchText:
And we hope we can help you show your true
colors yourself!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、実際に着用し、どうか貴方の美しさを 体験していただければ幸いですわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、実際に着用し、どうか貴方の美しさを
体験していただければ幸いですわ。

engChrName: Just putting on an outfit that matches you can help you release your inner self.
engSearchText:
Just putting on an outfit that matches you can help
you release your inner self.
jpnChrName: 服は着こなし一つをとっても、 着る人の内面が表現される事もあります……
jpnSearchText:
服は着こなし一つをとっても、
着る人の内面が表現される事もあります……

engChrName: Our new hire, Carol, puts a lot of focus into ornate details and accents.
engSearchText:
Our new hire, Carol, puts a lot of focus into ornate
details and accents.
jpnChrName: 今年から働いているキャロルさんも、 細かな装飾から……
jpnSearchText:
今年から働いているキャロルさんも、
細かな装飾から……

engChrName: I see these complex, nuanced emotions woven into all her designs. I wonder if she even knows she's doing it?
engSearchText:
I see these complex, nuanced emotions woven into all
her designs. I wonder if she even knows she's
doing it?
jpnChrName: 何か複雑な想いを感じられます…… 自ずと表出したものでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
何か複雑な想いを感じられます……
自ずと表出したものでしょうか。

engChrName: I'm not sure what she might be going through, but I do know that fashion is an excellent way to learn about your true self.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure what she might be going through, but I
do know that fashion is an excellent way to learn
about your true self.
jpnChrName: 事情は存じ上げませんが、服飾を学ぶ事で、 自らの内心を捉える機会になれば……
jpnSearchText:
事情は存じ上げませんが、服飾を学ぶ事で、
自らの内心を捉える機会になれば……

engChrName: I mean, am I really all right bein' here? I stick out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
I mean, am I really all right bein' here? I stick out like
a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: あのさ……こんな高級ホテルに オレみたいなのがいたら場違いじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
あのさ……こんな高級ホテルに
オレみたいなのがいたら場違いじゃねえか？

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about those prying eyes! You're welcome here as my friend, so relax!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about those prying eyes!
You're welcome here as my friend, so relax!
jpnChrName: 他人の目なんて気にしなくていいのよ！ エディは私の友人なんだから堂々としていて。
jpnSearchText:
他人の目なんて気にしなくていいのよ！
エディは私の友人なんだから堂々としていて。

engChrName: So, you're planning your exit from Desire, I heard?
engSearchText: So, you're planning your exit from Desire, I heard?
jpnChrName: それで……結局《ディザイア》からは 抜けるつもりなのよね？
jpnSearchText:
それで……結局《ディザイア》からは
抜けるつもりなのよね？

engChrName: Yeah. I can't believe Jeffrey was... All of them, really. Can't believe they're all like that.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I can't believe Jeffrey was... All of them, really.
Can't believe they're all like that.
jpnChrName: ああ……まさかジェフリーさんが…… 《ディザイア》があんな連中だと思わなかった。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……まさかジェフリーさんが……
《ディザイア》があんな連中だと思わなかった。

engChrName: Looks like they're willin' to let me off easy, so I'm gettin' out and I ain't lookin' back.
engSearchText:
Looks like they're willin' to let me off easy, so I'm
gettin' out and I ain't lookin' back.
jpnChrName: 今なら簡単に抜けさせて もらえるみたいだし、抜けるよ。
jpnSearchText:
今なら簡単に抜けさせて
もらえるみたいだし、抜けるよ。

engChrName: I don't wanna be some punk livin' on the edge for the rest of my life.
engSearchText:
I don't wanna be some punk livin' on the edge for the
rest of my life.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、イカした不良では あり続けるつもりだけどな！
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、イカした不良では
あり続けるつもりだけどな！

engChrName: Oh, don't judge yourself so harshly, Eddy. You're no punk!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't judge yourself so harshly, Eddy. You're
no punk!
jpnChrName: イカした不良……？ えっと、エディのどこら辺が？
jpnSearchText:
イカした不良……？
えっと、エディのどこら辺が？

engChrName: ...Wha? Thought that's how I came across, I mean... Ain't that me?
engSearchText:
...Wha? Thought that's how I came across, I mean...
Ain't that me?
jpnChrName: えっと……初めて会った時から そのつもりだったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと……初めて会った時から
そのつもりだったんだけど……

engChrName: I heard Jess' manager is coming over to the terrace by the station.
engSearchText:
I heard Jess' manager is coming over to the terrace by
the station.
jpnChrName: ジェスのマネージャーは 駅前のテラス席に来てくれるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスのマネージャーは
駅前のテラス席に来てくれるみたい。

engChrName: Don't tell him I said this, but please make sure Jess is taking care of himself.
engSearchText:
Don't tell him I said this, but please make sure Jess is
taking care of himself.
jpnChrName: 私が言えたことじゃないけど…… ジェスの事……どうかよろしく頼むわね。
jpnSearchText:
私が言えたことじゃないけど……
ジェスの事……どうかよろしく頼むわね。

engChrName: It's just been busy day after busy day, what with EGC prep and all.
engSearchText:
It's just been busy day after busy day, what with EGC
prep and all.
jpnChrName: 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の開催準備も大詰めで 連日忙しいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の開催準備も大詰めで
連日忙しいんですが……

engChrName: But today, I get to slip out from work early! Heehee.
engSearchText: But today, I get to slip out from work early! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今日は早上がりさせて もらえる事になったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今日は早上がりさせて
もらえる事になったんです。

engChrName: Tonight, Jess has a big concert to celebrate his new record. I wouldn't miss it for the world!
engSearchText:
Tonight, Jess has a big concert to celebrate his
new record. I wouldn't miss it for the world!
jpnChrName: 実は今夜はジェスがメジャーデビュー記念の 公演をやることになっていて──
jpnSearchText:
実は今夜はジェスがメジャーデビュー記念の
公演をやることになっていて──

engChrName: I'm so excited, heehee! I gotta make sure I'm all ready.
engSearchText:
I'm so excited, heehee! I gotta make sure I'm
all ready.
jpnChrName: バッチリ準備して駆け付けないと！ ふふっ、待ち遠しいですね！
jpnSearchText:
バッチリ準備して駆け付けないと！
ふふっ、待ち遠しいですね！

engChrName: Welcome. We're still open here, for the time being.
engSearchText: Welcome. We're still open here, for the time being.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ。 当店は平常通り営業しております。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ。
当店は平常通り営業しております。

engChrName: We hope we don't have to close up shop, but the way things are going, we just can't say anything for certain...
engSearchText:
We hope we don't have to close up shop, but the way
things are going, we just can't say anything
for certain...
jpnChrName: ですが今後の情勢次第では 一時営業を見合わせる可能性も……
jpnSearchText:
ですが今後の情勢次第では
一時営業を見合わせる可能性も……

engChrName: Please be careful out there.
engSearchText: Please be careful out there.
jpnChrName: お客様もどうか 慎重に行動なさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
お客様もどうか
慎重に行動なさってくださいね。

engChrName: At this rate, it's a coin flip whether or not the EGC goes forward at all...
engSearchText:
At this rate, it's a coin flip whether or not the EGC
goes forward at all...
jpnChrName: この分では今年の《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の 開催も危ぶまれますが……
jpnSearchText:
この分では今年の《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の
開催も危ぶまれますが……

engChrName: Be careful out there, all right?
engSearchText: Be careful out there, all right?
jpnChrName: ともかく、お客様もどうか 慎重に行動なさってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、お客様もどうか
慎重に行動なさってくださいね。

engChrName: The amazing thing about the EGC is that all the clothes you see the models wearing, you can go and buy for yourself.
engSearchText:
The amazing thing about the EGC is that all the
clothes you see the models wearing, you can go and
buy for yourself.
jpnChrName: 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の凄い所は、同じ会場内で モデルが着ていたアイテムを購入できるんです。
jpnSearchText:
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の凄い所は、同じ会場内で
モデルが着ていたアイテムを購入できるんです。

engChrName: So it's more like an expo than a fashion show, and it's big PR for the brands. In the fashion industry, it's one of the biggest events of the year.
engSearchText:
So it's more like an expo than a fashion show, and it's
big PR for the brands. In the fashion industry, it's one
of the biggest events of the year.
jpnChrName: つまりブランドの大々的なＰＲにもなっていて── 年末の一大イベントといっても過言ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
つまりブランドの大々的なＰＲにもなっていて──
年末の一大イベントといっても過言ではありません。

engChrName: I'll be doing more than just attending this year—I'm helping out as a staff member!
engSearchText:
I'll be doing more than just attending this year—I'm
helping out as a staff member!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、実は私もスタッフとして参加するのは 初めてなんですけれどね♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、実は私もスタッフとして参加するのは
初めてなんですけれどね♪

engChrName: Just two months left until opening day... I gotta work hard. This needs to be everything that a girl could dream of!
engSearchText:
Just two months left until opening day... I gotta
work hard. This needs to be everything that a girl
could dream of!
jpnChrName: 開催まで二ヶ月……カルバード中の女の子たちの 期待に応えられるよう、準備も頑張らないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
開催まで二ヶ月……カルバード中の女の子たちの
期待に応えられるよう、準備も頑張らないとですね！

engChrName: Welcome... Ah, you're that spriggan I hear about!
engSearchText: Welcome... Ah, you're that spriggan I hear about!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ…… ……ってあれ、解決事務所の！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ……
……ってあれ、解決事務所の！

engChrName: If memory serves, you live in that sharehouse, right?
engSearchText: If memory serves, you live in that sharehouse, right?
jpnChrName: あ、確か旧市街で シェアハウスをされている……
jpnSearchText:
あ、確か旧市街で
シェアハウスをされている……

engChrName: Umm, oh! You live in that sharehouse place in Old Town, right?
engSearchText:
Umm, oh! You live in that sharehouse place in Old
Town, right?
jpnChrName: えっと、たしか旧市街で “シェアハウス”？　をされてる……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、たしか旧市街で
“シェアハウス”？　をされてる……

engChrName: You're in that sharehouse, yeah? Didn't realize you worked here.
engSearchText:
You're in that sharehouse, yeah? Didn't realize you
worked here.
jpnChrName: ああ、近所のシェアハウスの。 そうか、ここで働いてたんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、近所のシェアハウスの。
そうか、ここで働いてたんだな。

engChrName: Heehee, yup! I'm the clerk here at Erland.
engSearchText: Heehee, yup! I'm the clerk here at Erland.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうなの──っていけない、 《エルラント》の店員ともあろうものが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、そうなの──っていけない、
《エルラント》の店員ともあろうものが。

engChrName: Let me just... Ahem! Thank you for browsing our products today. If you need help picking out a look, we can curate a selection just for you!
engSearchText:
Let me just... Ahem! Thank you for browsing our
products today. If you need help picking out a look,
we can curate a selection just for you!
jpnChrName: コホン、本日はようこそお越し下さいました。 当店ではキュレーションサービスもございます。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、本日はようこそお越し下さいました。
当店ではキュレーションサービスもございます。

engChrName: We're here to help you find that perfect look. If you have any questions, you need only ask!
engSearchText:
We're here to help you find that perfect look. If you
have any questions, you need only ask!
jpnChrName: 皆様にぴったりのコーディネートも提案できますので どうぞお気軽にお申し付けくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
皆様にぴったりのコーディネートも提案できますので
どうぞお気軽にお申し付けくださいね。

engChrName: Oho. Some bougie brands here. Maybe I'll find something on clearance.
engSearchText:
Oho. Some bougie brands here. Maybe I'll find
something on clearance.
jpnChrName: へえ？　高級路線のブランドみてえだし 冷やかさせてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　高級路線のブランドみてえだし
冷やかさせてもらうか。

engChrName: Sure, why not? I'll take a look around.
engSearchText: Sure, why not? I'll take a look around.
jpnChrName: はは、流石に様になってんな。 まあゆっくり見せてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、流石に様になってんな。
まあゆっくり見せてもらうとするか。

engChrName: Our manager also helped launch the Edith Girls' Collection, or EGC. Now it's the biggest fashion event in the capital!
engSearchText:
Our manager also helped launch the Edith Girls'
Collection, or EGC. Now it's the biggest fashion
event in the capital!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、店長は首都最大のファッションイベント 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》にも立ち上げから関わっていて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、店長は首都最大のファッションイベント
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》にも立ち上げから関わっていて。

engChrName: That earned her the moniker of Dream Weaver, both for her fashion sense and for her own beauty.
engSearchText:
That earned her the moniker of Dream Weaver, both
for her fashion sense and for her own beauty.
jpnChrName: あの物静かな美貌もあって、 伝説のコンパニオンと呼ばれていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの物静かな美貌もあって、
伝説のコンパニオンと呼ばれていたんですよ。

engChrName: She's every bit as knowledgeable as the name implies, heehee. She's still an EGC mainstay.
engSearchText:
She's every bit as knowledgeable as the name
implies, heehee. She's still an EGC mainstay.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ファッションへの造詣も確かですし 今でもとっても人気があるんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ファッションへの造詣も確かですし
今でもとっても人気があるんです。

engChrName: Couldn't help overhearing your plans. You're breaking through the line out there, eh?
engSearchText:
Couldn't help overhearing your plans. You're breaking
through the line out there, eh?
jpnChrName: 話は聞いたぞい。 敵陣に突っ込むつもりだそうじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
話は聞いたぞい。
敵陣に突っ込むつもりだそうじゃな。

engChrName: I hate to have to drop this whole thing in your laps, but right now, it seems like you're our best bet.
engSearchText:
I hate to have to drop this whole thing in your laps,
but right now, it seems like you're our best bet.
jpnChrName: ううむ、若者たちに背負わせる事になるとは…… 口惜しいが、今は託すしかなさそうじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、若者たちに背負わせる事になるとは……
口惜しいが、今は託すしかなさそうじゃ。

engChrName: Just promise me you'll come back in one piece, okay?
engSearchText:
Just promise me you'll come back in one
piece, okay?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、アニエスちゃんたちも。 どうか無事に帰ってきてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、アニエスちゃんたちも。
どうか無事に帰ってきてくれたまえ。

engChrName: And when this is all over, let's soak our worries away in the bathhouse!
engSearchText:
And when this is all over, let's soak our worries
away in the bathhouse!
jpnChrName: また一緒に公衆浴場でくつろげる時を 楽しみにしておるぞい！
jpnSearchText:
また一緒に公衆浴場でくつろげる時を
楽しみにしておるぞい！

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Let's chill in the löyly once this all blows over, yeah?
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me. Let's chill in the löyly once this
all blows over, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かにこれが片付いたら じっくりロウリュを楽しまねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、確かにこれが片付いたら
じっくりロウリュを楽しまねえとな。

engChrName: You stay safe, too, Huck! We're counting on you!
engSearchText: You stay safe, too, Huck! We're counting on you!
jpnChrName: ハックさんもご無理なさらず！ こちらのこと、よろしくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText:
ハックさんもご無理なさらず！
こちらのこと、よろしくお願いしますね！

engChrName: I'm worried sick for Paulette and Yumé, but it's too dangerous to go out looking now. We need to wait...
engSearchText:
I'm worried sick for Paulette and Yumé, but it's too
dangerous to go out looking now. We need to wait...
jpnChrName: ポーレットちゃんとユメの事は心配じゃが…… 体勢を立て直しつつ捜すしかあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットちゃんとユメの事は心配じゃが……
体勢を立て直しつつ捜すしかあるまい。

engChrName: Less than four hours left on the countdown. If only we had a faster car to work with...
engSearchText:
Less than four hours left on the countdown. If only
we had a faster car to work with...
jpnChrName: カウントダウンは残り４時間弱か…… せめてもう少し動かせる車が確保できればな。
jpnSearchText:
カウントダウンは残り４時間弱か……
せめてもう少し動かせる車が確保できればな。

engChrName: Anyway, we've got our own plans to deal with. I know you can all take care of yourselves!
engSearchText:
Anyway, we've got our own plans to deal with.
I know you can all take care of yourselves!
jpnChrName: ……ワシらも手を考えるとしよう。 くれぐれも気をつけてな！
jpnSearchText:
……ワシらも手を考えるとしよう。
くれぐれも気をつけてな！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！！

engChrName: Countin' on you, gramps!
