engSearchText: Countin' on you, gramps!
jpnChrName: ここは頼んだぜ、ハック爺さん！
jpnSearchText: ここは頼んだぜ、ハック爺さん！

engChrName: Looks like it's calmed down a bit, but who knows how long that'll last.
engSearchText:
Looks like it's calmed down a bit, but who knows
how long that'll last.
jpnChrName: ひとまずここは安全なようじゃが、 いつまでそう言っていられるか……
jpnSearchText:
ひとまずここは安全なようじゃが、
いつまでそう言っていられるか……

engChrName: I don't know much about those mafia types, but they went on and on about how they'll 'drown the world in terror,' and other crap like that...
engSearchText:
I don't know much about those mafia types, but they
went on and on about how they'll 'drown the world in
terror,' and other crap like that...
jpnChrName: あのマフィアども、詳しくは分からぬが “大陸全てを染め上げる”と言っておった。
jpnSearchText:
あのマフィアども、詳しくは分からぬが
“大陸全てを染め上げる”と言っておった。

engChrName: Even if we stamp them out, they'll just keep coming back... Bah. No sense thinking about that. We just need to focus on saving everybody we can.
engSearchText:
Even if we stamp them out, they'll just keep coming
back... Bah. No sense thinking about that. We just
need to focus on saving everybody we can.
jpnChrName: たとえ一時を凌いだとしても── いや、それでも今は人命が優先か……
jpnSearchText:
たとえ一時を凌いだとしても──
いや、それでも今は人命が優先か……

engChrName: Good luck out there, your highness! And Van! You take care of Judith, you hear me?!
engSearchText:
Good luck out there, your highness! And Van!
You take care of Judith, you hear me?!
jpnChrName: 殿下、どうかご武運を。 ヴァンよ、ジュディスちゃんを頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
殿下、どうかご武運を。
ヴァンよ、ジュディスちゃんを頼んだぞ！

engChrName: Yeah, yeah! You hold down the fort here, all right?
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah! You hold down the fort here, all right?
jpnChrName: ああ！　爺さんたちも 今は大人しくしていてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ！　爺さんたちも
今は大人しくしていてくれ！

engChrName: Rest assured, we will put this madness to an end!
engSearchText: Rest assured, we will put this madness to an end!
jpnChrName: 事態解決の糸口も 必ずや掴んでみせるとしましょう！
jpnSearchText:
事態解決の糸口も
必ずや掴んでみせるとしましょう！

engChrName: We'll hold down the fort here and keep an eye out for anybody caught up in the crossfire.
engSearchText:
We'll hold down the fort here and keep an eye out for
anybody caught up in the crossfire.
jpnChrName: ワシらも安全を確保しつつ 他に逃げ遅れた者がおらぬか調べてみよう。
jpnSearchText:
ワシらも安全を確保しつつ
他に逃げ遅れた者がおらぬか調べてみよう。

engChrName: We need to find a way out, ourselves, eventually...
engSearchText: We need to find a way out, ourselves, eventually...
jpnChrName: この事態を解決する手立ても 見つけねばならぬだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
この事態を解決する手立ても
見つけねばならぬだろうが……

engChrName: You kids take care out there. We'll be praying for you!
engSearchText: You kids take care out there. We'll be praying for you!
jpnChrName: そちらも重々気を付けてな。 武運を祈っておるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
そちらも重々気を付けてな。
武運を祈っておるぞ！

engChrName: Those association banquets are good food and all, but I just can't stand those old far... Sorry, 'legacy VIPs.'
engSearchText:
Those association banquets are good food and all, but
I just can't stand those old far... Sorry, 'legacy VIPs.'
jpnChrName: 毎年経済連の祝賀会は豪華なんじゃが ジジイ──もとい老獪な大物ばかりでなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
毎年経済連の祝賀会は豪華なんじゃが
ジジイ──もとい老獪な大物ばかりでなぁ。

engChrName: But it's the party afterwards I'm looking forward to the most. Heh, c'mon, let's get the lead out! Time's a-wasting!
engSearchText:
But it's the party afterwards I'm looking forward to
the most. Heh, c'mon, let's get the lead out!
Time's a-wasting!
jpnChrName: だがその後のパーティには期待できそうじゃ。 さあ行くぞ！　もたもたしてはおれん！！
jpnSearchText:
だがその後のパーティには期待できそうじゃ。
さあ行くぞ！　もたもたしてはおれん！！

engChrName: Just don't go gettin' yourself into trouble, Huck.
engSearchText: Just don't go gettin' yourself into trouble, Huck.
jpnChrName: スキャンダルだけは起さねえようにな、 ハック爺さん。
jpnSearchText:
スキャンダルだけは起さねえようにな、
ハック爺さん。

engChrName: Now, I'm no diplomat, but I have an idea of how this'll impact the marketplace...and I don't like where it's headed.
engSearchText:
Now, I'm no diplomat, but I have an idea of how
this'll impact the marketplace...and I don't like where
it's headed.
jpnChrName: 国家としての対応は専門ではないが…… 今は経済への影響が心配じゃのう。
jpnSearchText:
国家としての対応は専門ではないが……
今は経済への影響が心配じゃのう。

engChrName: The markets are like horses—they spook real easily. You get a big incident like this and futures plummet.
engSearchText:
The markets are like horses—they spook real easily.
You get a big incident like this and futures plummet.
jpnChrName: これだけの大事件、情勢不安が続けば 経済恐慌に繋がる可能性もある……
jpnSearchText:
これだけの大事件、情勢不安が続けば
経済恐慌に繋がる可能性もある……

engChrName: I can only hope they get it all resolved soon... How they can even do that, though, is beyond me.
engSearchText:
I can only hope they get it all resolved soon...
How they can even do that, though, is beyond me.
jpnChrName: 早期解決が望まれるが── 穏便な手段では済まぬかもしれぬなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
早期解決が望まれるが──
穏便な手段では済まぬかもしれぬなぁ……

engChrName: Insurance companies are all on fire right now. That can bleed over into other sectors pretty quickly if it keeps up...
engSearchText:
Insurance companies are all on fire right now.
That can bleed over into other sectors pretty quickly
if it keeps up...
jpnChrName: どこの保険会社もパニック寸前のようじゃ。 このままでは実体経済への影響も……
jpnSearchText:
どこの保険会社もパニック寸前のようじゃ。
このままでは実体経済への影響も……

engChrName: Here's hoping they get it all straightened out sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
Here's hoping they get it all straightened out sooner
rather than later.
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、どうにか 早期解決に持ち込めれば良いのじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、どうにか
早期解決に持ち込めれば良いのじゃが……

engChrName: Van, m'boy! What brings you here today?
engSearchText: Van, m'boy! What brings you here today?
jpnChrName: おおヴァン、サイデン地区に来ておったのか。
jpnSearchText: おおヴァン、サイデン地区に来ておったのか。

engChrName: I'll be having some senators over for a meal... Good networking, but man, these stuffy meetings just drive me up the wall.
engSearchText:
I'll be having some senators over for a meal...
Good networking, but man, these stuffy
meetings just drive me up the wall.
jpnChrName: 今夜は議員と会食でなぁ、 堅苦しいのは苦手なんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は議員と会食でなぁ、
堅苦しいのは苦手なんじゃが。

engChrName: Coulda fooled me. You look chill as ever.
engSearchText: Coulda fooled me. You look chill as ever.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そうは見えねえけどな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そうは見えねえけどな。

engChrName: (First time I've seen Huck in a suit. Y'know, he looks presentable—for once.)
engSearchText:
(First time I've seen Huck in a suit. Y'know, he looks
presentable—for once.)
jpnChrName: （しかしスーツ姿のハック爺さん──   旧市街で龍雀打ってる時とは大違いだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（しかしスーツ姿のハック爺さん──
旧市街で龍雀打ってる時とは大違いだな。）

engChrName: They want me at the next banquet, huh? *sigh* Pain in my... I mean, what do they REALLY need my old ass there for?
engSearchText:
They want me at the next banquet, huh? *sigh* Pain
in my... I mean, what do they REALLY need my old
ass there for?
jpnChrName: ……今度は経済連の祝賀会じゃったか？ は～メンド、もうワシ出なくていんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
……今度は経済連の祝賀会じゃったか？
は～メンド、もうワシ出なくていんじゃね？

engChrName: Moderation in everything, Mr. Huckberry. Even in your golden years, you shouldn't let go of your obligations.
engSearchText:
Moderation in everything, Mr. Huckberry. Even in
your golden years, you shouldn't let go of
your obligations.
jpnChrName: お前さんの投げやりさも極まってきたな…… ハックベリー社長ともあろうものが。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの投げやりさも極まってきたな……
ハックベリー社長ともあろうものが。

engChrName: You may be interested to hear, however, that the venue has some fetching ladies in charge of the hospitality.
engSearchText:
You may be interested to hear, however, that the
venue has some fetching ladies in charge of
the hospitality.
jpnChrName: ちなみにパーティ会場には 綺麗所を取り揃えさせておいたが？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにパーティ会場には
綺麗所を取り揃えさせておいたが？

engChrName: ...Well, why didn't you say so?! Let's go, let's go, heh heh! Hell, why don't we kick it off an hour early this time?
engSearchText:
...Well, why didn't you say so?! Let's go, let's go,
heh heh! Hell, why don't we kick it off an hour early
this time?
jpnChrName: よし行こうっ！　何をもたもたしとるんじゃ！ 進行は１時間前倒しでいくぞい！！
jpnSearchText:
よし行こうっ！　何をもたもたしとるんじゃ！
進行は１時間前倒しでいくぞい！！

engChrName: Still cavalier to a fault, eh, old friend?
engSearchText: Still cavalier to a fault, eh, old friend?
jpnChrName: ──友よ、お前はいつも 幸せそうだな……まあいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
──友よ、お前はいつも
幸せそうだな……まあいいんだが。

engChrName: Hey. Just wanted to let you know we got Dingo's notebook back.
engSearchText:
Hey. Just wanted to let you know we got Dingo's
notebook back.
jpnChrName: よう、あの後きっちり ディンゴの手帳を回収させてもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、あの後きっちり
ディンゴの手帳を回収させてもらったぜ。

engChrName: Glad to hear it. It's something worth hangin' on to.
engSearchText: Glad to hear it. It's something worth hangin' on to.
jpnChrName: そうか、それなら良かったぜ。 ディンゴのやつも遺した甲斐があるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、それなら良かったぜ。
ディンゴのやつも遺した甲斐があるだろう。

engChrName: I came across all kinds of people when I was still working underground.
engSearchText:
I came across all kinds of people when I was still
working underground.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……これでも昔は裏ハイヤーとして 色々な連中やブツを運んで来たつもりだが。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……これでも昔は裏ハイヤーとして
色々な連中やブツを運んで来たつもりだが。

engChrName: But seein' Dingo off in Creil's gonna stick out for the rest of my life.
engSearchText:
But seein' Dingo off in Creil's gonna stick out for the
rest of my life.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村で見送った アイツの姿はどうにも忘れられそうにないな。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村で見送った
アイツの姿はどうにも忘れられそうにないな。

engChrName: He always was that sort of principled guy, up on the straight and narrow. Ever since we were young, really.
engSearchText:
He always was that sort of principled guy, up on the
straight and narrow. Ever since we were young, really.
jpnChrName: 昔からの馴染みって事もあるが、 一本筋の通ったナイスガイだったからな……
jpnSearchText:
昔からの馴染みって事もあるが、
一本筋の通ったナイスガイだったからな……

engChrName: It ain't hard to imagine him bein' like that since young.
engSearchText:
It ain't hard to imagine him bein' like that
since young.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: Startin' to feel like a good time to go out for drinks.
engSearchText: Startin' to feel like a good time to go out for drinks.
jpnChrName: ……どうにも、今夜は酒でも 飲みたい気分になってきたな。
jpnSearchText:
……どうにも、今夜は酒でも
飲みたい気分になってきたな。

engChrName: Whaddaya say you join me, big boy?
engSearchText: Whaddaya say you join me, big boy?
jpnChrName: 一緒にどうだい、ビッグボーイ？
jpnSearchText: 一緒にどうだい、ビッグボーイ？

engChrName: Gonna pass on this one. Maybe some other time.
engSearchText: Gonna pass on this one. Maybe some other time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いいぜ……といいたい所だが、 またいつか機会があればな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いいぜ……といいたい所だが、
またいつか機会があればな。

engChrName: Hahaha, I know you're just messin' with me! Come on, let's have some fun!
engSearchText:
Hahaha, I know you're just messin' with me!
Come on, let's have some fun!
jpnChrName: ＨＡＨＡＨＡ、じらしてくれるねぇ～！ いいぜ、楽しみにさせてもらおうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
ＨＡＨＡＨＡ、じらしてくれるねぇ～！
いいぜ、楽しみにさせてもらおうじゃないか。

engChrName: Well, big man...I'm just glad Dingo got that to you in the end.
engSearchText:
Well, big man...I'm just glad Dingo got that to you in
the end.
jpnChrName: ディンゴの遺品をちゃんとビッグボーイ達に 渡す事ができて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴの遺品をちゃんとビッグボーイ達に
渡す事ができて良かったぜ。

engChrName: I'll pour one out for him tonight... It's the right thing to do.
engSearchText:
I'll pour one out for him tonight... It's the right thing
to do.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……今夜は改めて ヤツを偲びながら一人で晩酌といくかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……今夜は改めて
ヤツを偲びながら一人で晩酌といくかな。

engChrName: All I had for you was that key, big man.
engSearchText: All I had for you was that key, big man.
jpnChrName: 俺がビッグボーイ達に託せるのは その鍵だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺がビッグボーイ達に託せるのは
その鍵だけだ。

engChrName: You just make sure you find whatever it was Dingo wanted to get to you.
engSearchText:
You just make sure you find whatever it was Dingo
wanted to get to you.
jpnChrName: ディンゴのヤツの遺品、 ちゃんと回収してやってくれよな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴのヤツの遺品、
ちゃんと回収してやってくれよな。

engChrName: Whew! Love this place. Can't have real Eastern soba without the WA-SA-BI!
engSearchText:
Whew! Love this place. Can't have real Eastern soba
without the WA-SA-BI!
jpnChrName: ＨＵＵ、やはりこの店はイイ。 オリエンタルな蕎麦は正にＷＡＢＩＳＡＢＩ──
jpnSearchText:
ＨＵＵ、やはりこの店はイイ。
オリエンタルな蕎麦は正にＷＡＢＩＳＡＢＩ──

engChrName: How 'bout it, brothers? Care to take a seat and throw one back with your boy?
engSearchText:
How 'bout it, brothers? Care to take a seat and throw
one back with your boy?
jpnChrName: ブラザーたちも、なんなら 相席で一杯どうだい？
jpnSearchText:
ブラザーたちも、なんなら
相席で一杯どうだい？

engChrName: Sorry, gonna have to take a rain check on that. Got some stuff to do today.
engSearchText:
Sorry, gonna have to take a rain check on that.
Got some stuff to do today.
jpnChrName: はは、折角だが用事があってな。 今日の所は遠慮しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、折角だが用事があってな。
今日の所は遠慮しておくぜ。

engChrName: Well, I'm beat. Spent the whole day playin' third wheel on that couple's date.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm beat. Spent the whole day playin' third
wheel on that couple's date.
jpnChrName: スパー……今日は結局あのカップルの デートに付き合っちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
スパー……今日は結局あのカップルの
デートに付き合っちまったな。

engChrName: Had a meal at a real nice place, threw some dough around at the shops, watched a cool sunset... The whole nine arge.
engSearchText:
Had a meal at a real nice place, threw some dough
around at the shops, watched a cool sunset...
The whole nine arge.
jpnChrName: レストランにちょいとリッチなショッピング、 そして夕陽の見えるビュースポット──
jpnSearchText:
レストランにちょいとリッチなショッピング、
そして夕陽の見えるビュースポット──

engChrName: Just glad we got 'em back to the hotel before the weather turned.
engSearchText:
Just glad we got 'em back to the hotel before the
weather turned.
jpnChrName: まァ、降りだす前に ホテルまで送れて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まァ、降りだす前に
ホテルまで送れて良かったぜ。

engChrName: I think I've earned myself a break after all that. Might spring for a kebab at that stand over there, that stuff smells di-VINE.
engSearchText:
I think I've earned myself a break after all that.
Might spring for a kebab at that stand over there, that
stuff smells di-VINE.
jpnChrName: さて、オレも一服するかね。 この近くに串焼きを出すナイスな屋台があってな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、オレも一服するかね。
この近くに串焼きを出すナイスな屋台があってな。

engChrName: I was just taking a walk around the urban part of town for a change of pace.
engSearchText:
I was just taking a walk around the urban part of
town for a change of pace.
jpnChrName: たまには気分を変えて ビル街を歩いてみたけど……
jpnSearchText:
たまには気分を変えて
ビル街を歩いてみたけど……

engChrName: Kinda surprised to find a basketball court here.
engSearchText: Kinda surprised to find a basketball court here.
jpnChrName: ふーん、こんな所に バスケコートなんてあったのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、こんな所に
バスケコートなんてあったのね。

engChrName: How about it, Apollo? Want to play ball?
engSearchText: How about it, Apollo? Want to play ball?
jpnChrName: どう、アポロ。 お前もボール遊びしてみる？
jpnSearchText:
どう、アポロ。
お前もボール遊びしてみる？

engChrName: Woof, woof!
engSearchText: Woof, woof!
jpnChrName: ウォフウォフ！
jpnSearchText: ウォフウォフ！

engChrName: I'm back in Calvard on official business. We're holding a joint meeting with the CPD.
engSearchText:
I'm back in Calvard on official business.
We're holding a joint meeting with the CPD.
jpnChrName: 今日は仕事上の帰国でしてね、共和国警察と クロスベル警察の連携の是非の打ち合わせです。
jpnSearchText:
今日は仕事上の帰国でしてね、共和国警察と
クロスベル警察の連携の是非の打ち合わせです。

engChrName: We've seen an uptick in international crime in recent years, so the Department of Foreign Affairs wants law enforcement agencies to cooperate more.
engSearchText:
We've seen an uptick in international crime in recent
years, so the Department of Foreign Affairs wants law
enforcement agencies to cooperate more.
jpnChrName: 近年は国際犯罪なども多いため、外務省としては 警察の国際協力も一手という意見もありまして。
jpnSearchText:
近年は国際犯罪なども多いため、外務省としては
警察の国際協力も一手という意見もありまして。

engChrName: The guys we see around the Calvard Consulate really know their stuff. They'd be a dream to work with, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
The guys we see around the Calvard Consulate really
know their stuff. They'd be a dream to work with,
I'm sure.
jpnChrName: 特に私達カルバード領事館では、現地警察の 信頼性の高さを鑑み、是非活用したいと。
jpnSearchText:
特に私達カルバード領事館では、現地警察の
信頼性の高さを鑑み、是非活用したいと。

engChrName: I already work with the Consulate itself, so I'm their liaison for this project. Still got a lotta kinks to iron out there, though.
engSearchText:
I already work with the Consulate itself, so I'm their
liaison for this project. Still got a lotta kinks to iron
out there, though.
jpnChrName: なので、領事館の担当者として諸々の報告に 来たのですが──やはり難しいものも多そうです。
jpnSearchText:
なので、領事館の担当者として諸々の報告に
来たのですが──やはり難しいものも多そうです。

engChrName: It's nice being back home, but I'm only here for work... Kinda hard to relax like that.
engSearchText:
It's nice being back home, but I'm only here
for work... Kinda hard to relax like that.
jpnChrName: しかし……せっかくの帰国なのに、あくまで 仕事でというのは結構寂しいもので……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……せっかくの帰国なのに、あくまで
仕事でというのは結構寂しいもので……

engChrName: I do get to see my family, if only for an evening.
engSearchText: I do get to see my family, if only for an evening.
jpnChrName: 一応、この後は家族に会いに行きますが、 一晩しか一緒にはいれない訳ですから。
jpnSearchText:
一応、この後は家族に会いに行きますが、
一晩しか一緒にはいれない訳ですから。

engChrName: Man, it's gonna be hard tearing myself away from them tomorrow...
engSearchText:
Man, it's gonna be hard tearing myself away from
them tomorrow...
jpnChrName: いやはや、一晩でも一緒にいるとやはり 名残惜しくなってしまいますからね。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、一晩でも一緒にいるとやはり
名残惜しくなってしまいますからね。

engChrName: Awright, this looks like a good spot for some hawking!
engSearchText:
Awright, this looks like a good spot for
some hawking!
jpnChrName: さ～て、今日はこの辺りで 声掛けしてみよか～！
jpnSearchText:
さ～て、今日はこの辺りで
声掛けしてみよか～！

engChrName: Can't ruffle too many feathers, though. Police HQ's right over there.
engSearchText:
Can't ruffle too many feathers, though. Police HQ's
right over there.
jpnChrName: お巡りさんの本署があるし 気を付けんとアカンけど……
jpnSearchText:
お巡りさんの本署があるし
気を付けんとアカンけど……

engChrName: But I just know I'll hit it big. This corporate rat race is really wearing people out...and that leads them to spend on stress relief!
engSearchText:
But I just know I'll hit it big. This corporate rat race
is really wearing people out...and that leads them to
spend on stress relief!
jpnChrName: 忙しいサラリーマンほど溜まっとるもんやしな！ ええ出会いがあるとええなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
忙しいサラリーマンほど溜まっとるもんやしな！
ええ出会いがあるとええなぁ！

engChrName: The office parks have all been on lockdown since the state of emergency. We're just trying to keep the peace.
engSearchText:
The office parks have all been on lockdown since the
state of emergency. We're just trying to keep
the peace.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言を受けて、オフィス街は特に 警備を強化してて……私たちも応援に来たの。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言を受けて、オフィス街は特に
警備を強化してて……私たちも応援に来たの。

engChrName: Honestly, I don't know what we can even do... No, don't say that! We'll do what we can because we must!
engSearchText:
Honestly, I don't know what we can even do...
No, don't say that! We'll do what we can because
we must!
jpnChrName: 正直な所、無力感もあるけど…… ううん、今は警察として全力で立ち向かわないと！
jpnSearchText:
正直な所、無力感もあるけど……
ううん、今は警察として全力で立ち向かわないと！

engChrName: Oh, this is a real mess. There's always somethin' new just around the corner...
engSearchText:
Oh, this is a real mess. There's always somethin' new
just around the corner...
jpnChrName: えらい事になって、警察も 諸々の対応に追われとるしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
えらい事になって、警察も
諸々の対応に追われとるしなぁ……

engChrName: We've all been workin' 'round the clock to keep this under control.
engSearchText:
We've all been workin' 'round the clock to keep this
under control.
jpnChrName: うちやカリンを含めて、現場の巡査まで 寝る間も惜しんで働いとるで。
jpnSearchText:
うちやカリンを含めて、現場の巡査まで
寝る間も惜しんで働いとるで。

engChrName: But Creil Village wasn't that long ago, so who knows what could happen next. It's hard to keep our heads up...
engSearchText:
But Creil Village wasn't that long ago, so who knows
what could happen next. It's hard to keep our
heads up...
jpnChrName: せやけどクレイユ村の事を思うと 何が起こるか分からんし、ウチらも不安やで……
jpnSearchText:
せやけどクレイユ村の事を思うと
何が起こるか分からんし、ウチらも不安やで……

engChrName: I tell you what, Verne stocks've been on a real roller coaster ride lately. It's making my head spin.
engSearchText:
I tell you what, Verne stocks've been on a real roller
coaster ride lately. It's making my head spin.
jpnChrName: ふう、ここのところはどうにもヴェルヌ系の 株価変動が激しくて目が回りそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ここのところはどうにもヴェルヌ系の
株価変動が激しくて目が回りそうだ。

engChrName: One minute they have Elsaim cash out the wazoo for that film festival. Next, their subsidiary gets slapped with a patent lawsuit.
engSearchText:
One minute they have Elsaim cash out the wazoo for
that film festival. Next, their subsidiary gets slapped
with a patent lawsuit.
jpnChrName: 映画祭を挟んでエルザイムからの投資がいくらか 増えたと思ったら、傘下企業で特許訴訟ときた。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭を挟んでエルザイムからの投資がいくらか
増えたと思ったら、傘下企業で特許訴訟ときた。

engChrName: They've got a high floor thanks to their federal contracts, but man, they've been putting out fires left and right.
engSearchText:
They've got a high floor thanks to their federal
contracts, but man, they've been putting out fires left
and right.
jpnChrName: 政府系の受注で土台は安定しているのだろうけど、 どうにも対応が後手に回りがちなようだしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
政府系の受注で土台は安定しているのだろうけど、
どうにも対応が後手に回りがちなようだしなぁ。

engChrName: And those reparation funds are a ticking time bomb. Once they dry up, all those stocks could go kaput.
engSearchText:
And those reparation funds are a ticking time bomb.
Once they dry up, all those stocks could go kaput.
jpnChrName: 賠償金の景気で株価が上がったとはいえ…… 色々続いたらガクッと落ちないか不安だな。
jpnSearchText:
賠償金の景気で株価が上がったとはいえ……
色々続いたらガクッと落ちないか不安だな。

engChrName: Their CEO is... Well, let's just say he doesn't have the best reputation on the market floor.
engSearchText:
Their CEO is... Well, let's just say he doesn't have
the best reputation on the market floor.
jpnChrName: 現在のヴェルヌ本社のＣＥＯは……まあ、 うちの業界での評判もいまいちでね。
jpnSearchText:
現在のヴェルヌ本社のＣＥＯは……まあ、
うちの業界での評判もいまいちでね。

engChrName: He's a real knee-jerk kinda guy, always moving to put out fires in the short term at the expense of the long term. It's bad for stability.
engSearchText:
He's a real knee-jerk kinda guy, always moving to put
out fires in the short term at the expense of the
long term. It's bad for stability.
jpnChrName: 保身のために色々と後手に回りがちで、 それで株価を逆に混乱させていると言われる。
jpnSearchText:
保身のために色々と後手に回りがちで、
それで株価を逆に混乱させていると言われる。

engChrName: Something's gotta give there—he can't keep doing that much longer.
engSearchText:
Something's gotta give there—he can't keep doing
that much longer.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう遠くないうちに替わるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText: まあ、そう遠くないうちに替わるんじゃないか？

engChrName: So, should I take that statement as the view of the Patriot League and not the president?
engSearchText:
So, should I take that statement as the view of the
Patriot League and not the president?
jpnChrName: ──となると、今の発言は大統領府ではなく、 “愛国同盟”の見解という理解でよろしいですか？
jpnSearchText:
──となると、今の発言は大統領府ではなく、
“愛国同盟”の見解という理解でよろしいですか？

engChrName: For the most part, yes. The party's stance is rather... disorganized, so some of us have had to release statements independently.
engSearchText:
For the most part, yes. The party's stance is rather...
disorganized, so some of us have had to release
statements independently.
jpnChrName: う、うむ……党としても把握している 事は少なく、独自に動かざるを得ない。
jpnSearchText:
う、うむ……党としても把握している
事は少なく、独自に動かざるを得ない。

engChrName: But, well, the President's Office acting irrespective of the party is nothing new.
engSearchText:
But, well, the President's Office acting irrespective of
the party is nothing new.
jpnChrName: だが……大統領府が党とは別口に動く事など、 ラングドン君なら重々承知のはずだろう？
jpnSearchText:
だが……大統領府が党とは別口に動く事など、
ラングドン君なら重々承知のはずだろう？

engChrName: Oh, yes, I'm well aware. I just wanted to confirm.
engSearchText: Oh, yes, I'm well aware. I just wanted to confirm.
jpnChrName: ええ、承知しています。 単なる確認に過ぎませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、承知しています。
単なる確認に過ぎませんよ。

engChrName: That gives me a good idea of just how deep to dig into the President's office...
engSearchText:
That gives me a good idea of just how deep to dig
into the President's office...
jpnChrName: ともあれ……これで大統領府方面にどの程度 切り込むべきか目星はつきました。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ……これで大統領府方面にどの程度
切り込むべきか目星はつきました。

engChrName: Thank you very much for that info.
engSearchText: Thank you very much for that info.
jpnChrName: 貴重なお話、ありがとうございました先生。
jpnSearchText: 貴重なお話、ありがとうございました先生。

engChrName: We've been locked down after that terrorist attack... It's really clipped our wings.
engSearchText:
We've been locked down after that terrorist attack...
It's really clipped our wings.
jpnChrName: 未曾有の大規模テロに非常事態宣言…… 記者としても動きにくいのは当然でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
未曾有の大規模テロに非常事態宣言……
記者としても動きにくいのは当然でしょう。

engChrName: But me? I've got sources in high places...and now's as good a time as any to put them to use.
engSearchText:
But me? I've got sources in high places...and now's as
good a time as any to put them to use.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……こういう時こそ、私なりに 築いた政府とのパイプも使えるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……こういう時こそ、私なりに
築いた政府とのパイプも使えるはずです。

engChrName: I owe the Tyrell Times a good headline or two, so maybe I should dig a little deeper for this next one.
engSearchText:
I owe the Tyrell Times a good headline or two, so
maybe I should dig a little deeper for this next one.
jpnChrName: タイレル通信社にも幾分か恩はありますしねぇ、 たまには少し強気に取材してみますか。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル通信社にも幾分か恩はありますしねぇ、
たまには少し強気に取材してみますか。

engChrName: The guild's helping out where it can, but we still don't have things under control quite yet.
engSearchText:
The guild's helping out where it can, but we still don't
have things under control quite yet.
jpnChrName: ギルドも協力しているが、 まだ完全に片付いた訳じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドも協力しているが、
まだ完全に片付いた訳じゃねえな。

engChrName: Elaine should be coming back tomorrow. Make sure to give her a warm welcome, will you?
engSearchText:
Elaine should be coming back tomorrow. Make sure
to give her a warm welcome, will you?
jpnChrName: エレインも明日には戻ってくる。 優しく出迎えてやれよ？
jpnSearchText:
エレインも明日には戻ってくる。
優しく出迎えてやれよ？

engChrName: It's our home, after all, even if I've been gone a while.
engSearchText:
It's our home, after all, even if I've been gone
a while.
jpnChrName: 俺もしばらく戻れてないが── 一応俺たちの故郷ではあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺もしばらく戻れてないが──
一応俺たちの故郷ではあるからな。

engChrName: Please offer up a stick of incense for this unworthy disciple.
engSearchText:
Please offer up a stick of incense for this
unworthy disciple.
jpnChrName: この不肖の弟子に代わって 線香の一本でもあげといてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
この不肖の弟子に代わって
線香の一本でもあげといてくれ。

engChrName: If you wouldn't mind, Arkride.
engSearchText: If you wouldn't mind, Arkride.
jpnChrName: 頼んだぜ、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: 頼んだぜ、アークライド。

engChrName: I think we're all going to be pretty busy with the festival just three days away.
engSearchText:
I think we're all going to be pretty busy with the
festival just three days away.
jpnChrName: ３日後の革命記念祭に向けて お互い、忙しくなるのは間違いないわ。
jpnSearchText:
３日後の革命記念祭に向けて
お互い、忙しくなるのは間違いないわ。

engChrName: Everyone should try to relax, at least for tonight. Even you, mister 'hard-boiled' spriggan.
engSearchText:
Everyone should try to relax, at least for tonight.
Even you, mister 'hard-boiled' spriggan.
jpnChrName: せめて今夜くらいはゆっくり過ごしなさい、 自称ハードボイルドな裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
せめて今夜くらいはゆっくり過ごしなさい、
自称ハードボイルドな裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: (Guess she's still salty about me not tellin' her that stuff. Greeeat.)
engSearchText:
(Guess she's still salty about me not tellin' her
that stuff. Greeeat.)
jpnChrName: （グッ……話さなかったことを   やっぱり根に持ってやがるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（グッ……話さなかったことを
やっぱり根に持ってやがるな。）

engChrName: Aren't you...?
engSearchText: Aren't you...?
jpnChrName: ああ、貴方は……
jpnSearchText: ああ、貴方は……

engChrName: Oh, Van. Doing the rounds as usual?
engSearchText: Oh, Van. Doing the rounds as usual?
jpnChrName: あらヴァン。 いつものようにブラついているのね。
jpnSearchText:
あらヴァン。
いつものようにブラついているのね。

engChrName: We didn't have any requests to handle, so we decided to enjoy ourselves a bit.
engSearchText:
We didn't have any requests to handle, so we decided
to enjoy ourselves a bit.
jpnChrName: こちらは支部に戻った後、追加の依頼もなくて 二次会と洒落込んでいるところよ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは支部に戻った後、追加の依頼もなくて
二次会と洒落込んでいるところよ。

engChrName: Thanks for keeping an eye out. We didn't see anything out of the ordinary on our end.
engSearchText:
Thanks for keeping an eye out. We didn't see
anything out of the ordinary on our end.
jpnChrName: ゴクローサマ。 特に怪しげな気配はなさそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ゴクローサマ。
特に怪しげな気配はなさそうだけど。

engChrName: Aww, it's nothin'. Just wrappin' up some errands of my own.
engSearchText:
Aww, it's nothin'. Just wrappin' up some errands of
my own.
jpnChrName: ま、野暮用を済ませがてら適当にな。
jpnSearchText: ま、野暮用を済ませがてら適当にな。

engChrName: You ladies take it easy, hear? Don't go overboard with the hard stuff.
engSearchText:
You ladies take it easy, hear? Don't go overboard with
the hard stuff.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちも元気だねぇ。 さっきも飲んでたし程々にしとけよ？
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちも元気だねぇ。
さっきも飲んでたし程々にしとけよ？

engChrName: Heehee. Well, if I do end up too sloshed to walk myself home, maybe I can call on a certain someone to escort me?
engSearchText:
Heehee. Well, if I do end up too sloshed to walk
myself home, maybe I can call on a certain someone
to escort me?
jpnChrName: ふふ、もし酔い潰れちゃったら 誰かさんに送っていってもらおうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、もし酔い潰れちゃったら
誰かさんに送っていってもらおうかしら？

engChrName: You'll take ANY 4SPG, riiight?
engSearchText: You'll take ANY 4SPG, riiight?
jpnChrName: どうやら４ｓｐｇとやらは どんな筋からの依頼も請けるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら４ｓｐｇとやらは
どんな筋からの依頼も請けるみたいだし。

engChrName: Whew.
engSearchText: Whew.
jpnChrName: ひゅう。
jpnSearchText: ひゅう。

engChrName: (These two are already sauced. Looks like you've got a rough night coming up, Alvis.)
engSearchText:
(These two are already sauced. Looks like you've got a
rough night coming up, Alvis.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱりこの二人って……   ………アルヴィス、ご愁傷様かしら。）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱりこの二人って……
………アルヴィス、ご愁傷様かしら。）

engChrName: Haha. Please, I'm joking. I would never do something so demeaning.
engSearchText:
Haha. Please, I'm joking. I would never do something
so demeaning.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ただの冗談よ。 そんなみっともない事するわけないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ただの冗談よ。
そんなみっともない事するわけないでしょう。

engChrName: I imagine you're pretty exhausted yourself, between today's incident and the mess in the old capital.
engSearchText:
I imagine you're pretty exhausted yourself, between
today's incident and the mess in the old capital.
jpnChrName: 古都での死闘に後始末、そして今日の事件…… あなたの方こそ疲れが溜まっているはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
古都での死闘に後始末、そして今日の事件……
あなたの方こそ疲れが溜まっているはずよ。

engChrName: We've got a brief bit of calm before the storm, so make sure you rest up tonight.
engSearchText:
We've got a brief bit of calm before the storm, so
make sure you rest up tonight.
jpnChrName: 記念祭前のちょっとした“凪”── せめて今夜くらいはゆっくり過ごしなさい。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭前のちょっとした“凪”──
せめて今夜くらいはゆっくり過ごしなさい。

engChrName: Yup. Back at'cha.
engSearchText: Yup. Back at'cha.
jpnChrName: ……へいへい。 そっくり同じ言葉を返しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……へいへい。
そっくり同じ言葉を返しておくぜ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival, huh...? Don't think I've ever been before.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival, huh...? Don't think I've ever
been before.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭か…… わたしは何気に初めてかな。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭か……
わたしは何気に初めてかな。

engChrName: Gonna get pretty busy for me. I do wanna at least bring back some fun stories to tell everybody back home.
engSearchText:
Gonna get pretty busy for me. I do wanna at least
bring back some fun stories to tell everybody
back home.
jpnChrName: 忙しくなりそうだけど、年末に帰省した時に みんなへの土産話を仕入れておこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
忙しくなりそうだけど、年末に帰省した時に
みんなへの土産話を仕入れておこうかな。

engChrName: (She was in Class VII, right? No wonder she's got those ties pullin' her back across the border—she might as well be a celebrity.)
engSearchText:
(She was in Class VII, right? No wonder she's got
those ties pullin' her back across the border—she
might as well be a celebrity.)
jpnChrName: （たしか“Ⅶ組”だったか……？   いまだ横の繋がりが強いようだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（たしか“Ⅶ組”だったか……？
いまだ横の繋がりが強いようだな。）

engChrName: We've been doing our own investigation at the guild, plus prepping our own countermeasures against you-know-who.
engSearchText:
We've been doing our own investigation at the guild,
plus prepping our own countermeasures
against you-know-who.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》関連については、ギルドでも 分析・対策を進めているが……
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》関連については、ギルドでも
分析・対策を進めているが……

engChrName: Feels like Elaine's been digging a bit deeper than the rest of us, though.
engSearchText:
Feels like Elaine's been digging a bit deeper than the
rest of us, though.
jpnChrName: ……そういえばエレインさん、 近頃特に入れ込んでいるような……
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばエレインさん、
近頃特に入れ込んでいるような……

engChrName: Apparently she's even doing her own research after hours... Talk about dedication. She needs to make sure she doesn't burn herself out.
engSearchText:
Apparently she's even doing her own research
after hours... Talk about dedication. She needs to
make sure she doesn't burn herself out.
jpnChrName: 仕事の合間を縫って独自に調査しているみたいだ。 ……あまり根を詰めすぎないといいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
仕事の合間を縫って独自に調査しているみたいだ。
……あまり根を詰めすぎないといいんだが……

engChrName: You guys again, huh? Sticking your noses into trouble as usual, I take it.
engSearchText:
You guys again, huh? Sticking your noses into trouble
as usual, I take it.
jpnChrName: お前たちか……またコソコソ何かを 嗅ぎ回っているようだが……
jpnSearchText:
お前たちか……またコソコソ何かを
嗅ぎ回っているようだが……

engChrName: But, well, I guess that's not ALWAYS a bad thing. I do owe you for Basel.
engSearchText:
But, well, I guess that's not ALWAYS a bad thing.
I do owe you for Basel.
jpnChrName: まあともかく──コホン、 バーゼルではよくやったじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
まあともかく──コホン、
バーゼルではよくやったじゃないか？

engChrName: We were just discussing our cleanup efforts, and what we subsequently learned about the group's movements.
engSearchText:
We were just discussing our cleanup efforts, and what
we subsequently learned about the
group's movements.
jpnChrName: 丁度事後処理について話していた所よ。 《Ａ》の足取りについてもね。
jpnSearchText:
丁度事後処理について話していた所よ。
《Ａ》の足取りについてもね。

engChrName: Whoa, am I dreaming? I got props from a bracer AND they're letting me in on some insider info?
engSearchText:
Whoa, am I dreaming? I got props from a bracer
AND they're letting me in on some insider info?
jpnChrName: へえ？　珍しく遊撃士サマにも褒められたし 情報交換にでも混ぜてくれんのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　珍しく遊撃士サマにも褒められたし
情報交換にでも混ぜてくれんのかよ？

engChrName: Oh, don't get ahead of yourself. I just...can't STOP you from listening in on us when you're right there.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't get ahead of yourself. I just...can't STOP
you from listening in on us when you're right there.
jpnChrName: そ、そんな訳ないだろう── だが立ち話を聞いてしまったくらいなら……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな訳ないだろう──
だが立ち話を聞いてしまったくらいなら……

engChrName: (Something tells me that cold shoulder's just for show.)
engSearchText:
(Something tells me that cold shoulder's just
for show.)
jpnChrName: （アルヴィスさん……素直じゃないと言うか。）
jpnSearchText: （アルヴィスさん……素直じゃないと言うか。）

engChrName: (Even the guild has to admit you played a large part in Basel.)
engSearchText:
(Even the guild has to admit you played a large part
in Basel.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、先月の一件は   ギルドも認めざるを得ない所でしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、先月の一件は
ギルドも認めざるを得ない所でしょう。）

engChrName: We lost track of their airship, unfortunately, but we did manage to ferret out their other moves in the meantime.
engSearchText:
We lost track of their airship, unfortunately, but
we did manage to ferret out their other moves in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: 例の高速艇はロスト── ただ連中の主だった動きは洗い出せたわ。
jpnSearchText:
例の高速艇はロスト──
ただ連中の主だった動きは洗い出せたわ。

engChrName: We've also been cracking down on their business ties and collaborators, which has helped us make numerous high-profile arrests.
engSearchText:
We've also been cracking down on their business ties
and collaborators, which has helped us make
numerous high-profile arrests.
jpnChrName: バーゼル以外でも大企業やインフラに関わる 業種を中心に検挙を進め、成果を上げている所よ。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル以外でも大企業やインフラに関わる
業種を中心に検挙を進め、成果を上げている所よ。

engChrName: Sounds like the CID's really siccin' the hounds. Hard to blame them.
engSearchText:
Sounds like the CID's really siccin' the hounds.
Hard to blame them.
jpnChrName: ま、あれだけハデにやっちまったら ＣＩＤ（こいつら）も本腰で動かざるを得ねぇよな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あれだけハデにやっちまったら
ＣＩＤ（こいつら）も本腰で動かざるを得ねぇよな。

engChrName: Yeah, that checks out. After the shitshow in Basel, I bet the CID wants these guys gone.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that checks out. After the shitshow in Basel, I
bet the CID wants these guys gone.
jpnChrName: ま、あれだけハデにやっちまったら ＣＩＤも本腰で動かざるを得ないよな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あれだけハデにやっちまったら
ＣＩＤも本腰で動かざるを得ないよな。

engChrName: That's good to hear...but I'm still bothered that we have no intel on them in terms of motives or end goals.
engSearchText:
That's good to hear...but I'm still bothered that we
have no intel on them in terms of motives or
end goals.
jpnChrName: 一安心ではあるけど…… ……連中の本当の目的は……
jpnSearchText:
一安心ではあるけど……
……連中の本当の目的は……

engChrName: Yeah. And what's also weird is, Messeldam's calmed down a lot. You'd think they'd be ramping UP their activities there, right?
engSearchText:
Yeah. And what's also weird is, Messeldam's calmed
down a lot. You'd think they'd be ramping UP their
activities there, right?
jpnChrName: ああ……それに実はメッセルダムを中心とした 連中の活動が低下しているらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……それに実はメッセルダムを中心とした
連中の活動が低下しているらしくてな。

engChrName: The guild's trying to get to the bottom of that now— we want to figure out the impetus for that swing.
engSearchText:
The guild's trying to get to the bottom of that now—
we want to figure out the impetus for that swing.
jpnChrName: 検挙の影響だけでなく、 内部で何かがあったとギルドでは分析している。
jpnSearchText:
検挙の影響だけでなく、
内部で何かがあったとギルドでは分析している。

engChrName: Chief Rouran has ordered us on high alert, in fact.
engSearchText: Chief Rouran has ordered us on high alert, in fact.
jpnChrName: ……ロウラン室長もまだ警戒レベルを 下げないように指示を出しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
……ロウラン室長もまだ警戒レベルを
下げないように指示を出しているわ。

engChrName: Though that's just bureaucracy, really. At any rate, I do hope the guild takes our intel into account.
engSearchText:
Though that's just bureaucracy, really. At any rate, I
do hope the guild takes our intel into account.
jpnChrName: あくまで情報開示としてだけれど、 ギルド側も認識しておいて頂けると。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで情報開示としてだけれど、
ギルド側も認識しておいて頂けると。

engChrName: Oh, we will. Hell, if we get info BEFORE they attack, maybe we can stop them from killing a ton of people! Wouldn't THAT be nice?!
engSearchText:
Oh, we will. Hell, if we get info BEFORE they
attack, maybe we can stop them from killing a ton
of people! Wouldn't THAT be nice?!
jpnChrName: そちらこそ──次こそは民間人に被害が出る前に 情報を共有してくれるとありがたいんだがな！？
jpnSearchText:
そちらこそ──次こそは民間人に被害が出る前に
情報を共有してくれるとありがたいんだがな！？

engChrName: (It sounds like there's some tension between those two... I hope they can put that aside.)
engSearchText:
(It sounds like there's some tension between
those two... I hope they can put that aside.)
jpnChrName: （色々あるみたいですけど……   最低限の足並みは揃えているみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（色々あるみたいですけど……
最低限の足並みは揃えているみたいですね。）

engChrName: (HQ was correct: the guild and the CID remain at odds. I hope for their sake that they can learn to cooperate.)
engSearchText:
(HQ was correct: the guild and the CID remain
at odds. I hope for their sake that they can learn
to cooperate.)
jpnChrName: （確執はあれど、最低限の足並みは揃えている……   本社の分析通りですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（確執はあれど、最低限の足並みは揃えている……
本社の分析通りですね。）

engChrName: (Neither side wants to yield to the other, I see... They're at least TRYING to cooperate, though. That's good.)
engSearchText:
(Neither side wants to yield to the other, I see...
They're at least TRYING to cooperate, though.
That's good.)
jpnChrName: （縄張り争いか……やれやれだけど。   最低限の足並みは揃えているみたいだね。）
jpnSearchText:
（縄張り争いか……やれやれだけど。
最低限の足並みは揃えているみたいだね。）

engChrName: (Well, heh heh... That was juicy. I'll have to keep an eye on how that all plays out.)
engSearchText:
(Well, heh heh... That was juicy. I'll have to keep an
eye on how that all plays out.)
jpnChrName: （情勢が確認できたのは儲けモンだな。   ……ま、引き続き気には留めておくぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（情勢が確認できたのは儲けモンだな。
……ま、引き続き気には留めておくぞ。）

engChrName: Well, I'm stuffed, I'm set, and I've got two hours to burn before my next job.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm stuffed, I'm set, and I've got two hours to
burn before my next job.
jpnChrName: うっし、腹も膨れたし 次の仕事まで２時間ほどスキマもある。
jpnSearchText:
うっし、腹も膨れたし
次の仕事まで２時間ほどスキマもある。

engChrName: Guess I've got some time for that little thing you asked me about.
engSearchText:
Guess I've got some time for that little thing you
asked me about.
jpnChrName: 前から頼まれてたアレ、 やっちまうとするかよ？
jpnSearchText:
前から頼まれてたアレ、
やっちまうとするかよ？

engChrName: Oh, yeah, sorry for asking when you're so busy. It'd be a big help if you could, though!
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, sorry for asking when you're so busy. It'd be
a big help if you could, though!
jpnChrName: ええ、ラハドさんもお忙しい中すみません。 是非よろしくお願いします──！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ラハドさんもお忙しい中すみません。
是非よろしくお願いします──！

engChrName: Haha. C'mon, loosen up, now. You're a B-rank, right? Gotta learn to be more casual on the job and let the rank speak for itself.
engSearchText:
Haha. C'mon, loosen up, now. You're a
B-rank, right? Gotta learn to be more casual on the
job and let the rank speak for itself.
jpnChrName: クク、そう固くなんなよ。 実力でいやあお前さんは十分Ｂ級相当さ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そう固くなんなよ。
実力でいやあお前さんは十分Ｂ級相当さ。

engChrName: Now, let's see if you can keep up with my full-course treatment.
engSearchText:
Now, let's see if you can keep up with my
full-course treatment.
jpnChrName: ……俺の本気の“稽古（シゴキ）”について来れたら、な。
jpnSearchText: ……俺の本気の“稽古（シゴキ）”について来れたら、な。

engChrName: Yes, sir! (This is like a Zin or Elaine-level client I'm working with here! I can't mess this up!)
engSearchText:
Yes, sir!
(This is like a Zin or Elaine-level client I'm working
with here! I can't mess this up!)
jpnChrName: はいっ！（ジンさんエレインさんに次ぐ実力者── 今日は何としても食らいついていくぞ！！）
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！（ジンさんエレインさんに次ぐ実力者──
今日は何としても食らいついていくぞ！！）

engChrName: You've got a long way to go, but you won't do yourself any favors by rushing your steps. Take it at your own pace, get me?
engSearchText:
You've got a long way to go, but you won't do
yourself any favors by rushing your steps. Take it at
your own pace, get me?
jpnChrName: フィーの実力にアテられんのも分かるが、 焦らず行けよ？
jpnSearchText:
フィーの実力にアテられんのも分かるが、
焦らず行けよ？

engChrName: Old man Hazel has a good eye, you know. That promotion will come around when you're ready for it.
engSearchText:
Old man Hazel has a good eye, you know.
That promotion will come around when you're ready
for it.
jpnChrName: ヘイゼルのジイさんはちゃんと見てくれる人だ。 昇格なんざ、自然とついてくるモンだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヘイゼルのジイさんはちゃんと見てくれる人だ。
昇格なんざ、自然とついてくるモンだからよ。

engChrName: Oh, I know, I know. I just wanna get this monkey off my back, you get me? I've wanted this promotion for a while.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know, I know. I just wanna get this monkey off
my back, you get me? I've wanted this promotion for
a while.
jpnChrName: ええ、大丈夫です。どちらかというと 不甲斐ない自分の殻を破りたいというか──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大丈夫です。どちらかというと
不甲斐ない自分の殻を破りたいというか──

engChrName: (I really wanna land on Elaine's radar soon. If I can get her to train me, I'll be on the fast-track to a promotion...!)
engSearchText:
(I really wanna land on Elaine's radar soon. If I can
get her to train me, I'll be on the fast-track to a
promotion...!)
jpnChrName: （早くエレインさんに認められるような……   それに、たまにはエレインさんの特訓だって……）
jpnSearchText:
（早くエレインさんに認められるような……
それに、たまにはエレインさんの特訓だって……）

engChrName: Hmm? What was that?
engSearchText: Hmm? What was that?
jpnChrName: アン？　何か言ったかよ？
jpnSearchText: アン？　何か言ったかよ？

engChrName: Oh, uhh, nothing! Haha... Yeah.
engSearchText: Oh, uhh, nothing! Haha... Yeah.
jpnChrName: ハハ……何でもないです！
jpnSearchText: ハハ……何でもないです！

engChrName: (I guess it wouldn't be the worst thing in the world if those two got together...)
engSearchText:
(I guess it wouldn't be the worst thing in the world if
those two got together...)
jpnChrName: （エレインさんとこの男が   上手くいった方が、私的には──）
jpnSearchText:
（エレインさんとこの男が
上手くいった方が、私的には──）

engChrName: (...Wait! YES IT WOULD! Gahh! Why did I let myself think that?! Regina, you blockhead!)
engSearchText:
(...Wait! YES IT WOULD! Gahh! Why did I let
myself think that?! Regina, you blockhead!)
jpnChrName: （って何考えてるのよっ！   私のバカバカ！　そんなんじゃ……！！）
jpnSearchText:
（って何考えてるのよっ！
私のバカバカ！　そんなんじゃ……！！）

engChrName: (Huh? Girl, you drunk or somethin'? You're all mumblin' and shit.)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Girl, you drunk or somethin'? You're all
mumblin' and shit.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……？　よく分からんが   軽く酔ってるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……？　よく分からんが
軽く酔ってるみてえだな。）

engChrName: Now then, I suppose I'd better make for the hall upstairs. Even with the festival coming up, Edith has its own social niceties to attend to.
engSearchText:
Now then, I suppose I'd better make for the
hall upstairs. Even with the festival coming up, Edith
has its own social niceties to attend to.
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ上のホールに行かないと…… 記念祭前は首都に来ても社交界があるのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そろそろ上のホールに行かないと……
記念祭前は首都に来ても社交界があるのよねぇ。

engChrName: It does serve as a wonderful opportunity to expand my social network beyond Oración...
engSearchText:
It does serve as a wonderful opportunity to expand my
social network beyond Oración...
jpnChrName: オラシオン以外の街の有力者と 交流する機会ではあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン以外の街の有力者と
交流する機会ではあるけど……

engChrName: ...but good grief, why must these social functions be exactly the same, no matter where I go?
engSearchText:
...but good grief, why must these social functions be
exactly the same, no matter where I go?
jpnChrName: どうして社交界はどこも 似たような感じなのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
どうして社交界はどこも
似たような感じなのかしら？

engChrName: I was under the impression Edith was more...fun than Oración. Are the upper crust really as stuffy and sobering as they are back home?
engSearchText:
I was under the impression Edith was more...fun
than Oración. Are the upper crust really as stuffy and
sobering as they are back home?
jpnChrName: せっかく首都なんだし、オラシオンとかとは 違う事で交流したら面白いはずなのにねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく首都なんだし、オラシオンとかとは
違う事で交流したら面白いはずなのにねぇ。

engChrName: Madam, if you would. The dinner party will begin soon.
engSearchText:
Madam, if you would. The dinner party will
begin soon.
jpnChrName: 奥様、そろそろ晩餐会の時間でございます。
jpnSearchText: 奥様、そろそろ晩餐会の時間でございます。

engChrName: As your husband's representative, it would be wise to arrive early so as not to tarnish his good name.
engSearchText:
As your husband's representative, it would be wise to
arrive early so as not to tarnish his good name.
jpnChrName: 旦那様の代理でもございますので、一応は 少々早めに入場されるのがよろしいかと。
jpnSearchText:
旦那様の代理でもございますので、一応は
少々早めに入場されるのがよろしいかと。

engChrName: Ronald got busted for extortion, last I heard. Guy has the IQ of a freakin' chicken nugget.
engSearchText:
Ronald got busted for extortion, last I heard. Guy has
the IQ of a freakin' chicken nugget.
jpnChrName: ……ロナールの奴、恐喝の容疑で 警察の取り調べを受けてるらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
……ロナールの奴、恐喝の容疑で
警察の取り調べを受けてるらしくてな。

engChrName: I wish he'd wise up and cut his ties for good.
engSearchText: I wish he'd wise up and cut his ties for good.
jpnChrName: アイツ、これでマフィアからも 抜けられるといいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
アイツ、これでマフィアからも
抜けられるといいんだが……

engChrName: Damn it all... If I'd just been there back then, he wouldn't be caught up in all this shit!
engSearchText:
Damn it all... If I'd just been there back then, he
wouldn't be caught up in all this shit!
jpnChrName: クソッ、せめてあの時俺が傍に居りゃあ あいつだってここまで道を──！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ、せめてあの時俺が傍に居りゃあ
あいつだってここまで道を──！

engChrName: ...Well, whatever. It's too late now.
engSearchText: ...Well, whatever. It's too late now.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、なんつっても イマサラすぎるがよ………
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、なんつっても
イマサラすぎるがよ………

engChrName: Word on the street is, Ronald got busted for extortion. Dumbass.
engSearchText:
Word on the street is, Ronald got busted
for extortion. Dumbass.
jpnChrName: ……ロナールの奴、恐喝の容疑で 警察の取り調べを受けてるって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
……ロナールの奴、恐喝の容疑で
警察の取り調べを受けてるって話だ。

engChrName: Maybe he can take the hint and get his shit together.
engSearchText: Maybe he can take the hint and get his shit together.
jpnChrName: これでアイツも立ち直って くれりゃいいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
これでアイツも立ち直って
くれりゃいいんだが……

engChrName: What the hell, man? How'd Sasha walk all over us like that?!
engSearchText:
What the hell, man? How'd Sasha walk all over us
like that?!
jpnChrName: クソッ！　サーシャの野郎 コテンパンにしやがって……！！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ！　サーシャの野郎
コテンパンにしやがって……！！

engChrName: And then they just toss out the shit with Ronald like it's nothin'.
engSearchText:
And then they just toss out the shit with Ronald like
it's nothin'.
jpnChrName: その上、ロナールの奴の近況まで 言い残していきやがるとは……
jpnSearchText:
その上、ロナールの奴の近況まで
言い残していきやがるとは……

engChrName: Tch. Never woulda thought he'd throw in with the mafia.
engSearchText:
Tch. Never woulda thought he'd throw in with
the mafia.
jpnChrName: ……チッ、まさかあいつが マフィアなんぞに入ってやがったなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……チッ、まさかあいつが
マフィアなんぞに入ってやがったなんて……

engChrName: The hell'd it come to this? Shit really got outta hand...
engSearchText: The hell'd it come to this? Shit really got outta hand...
jpnChrName: ……いくらなんでもやりすぎだろ…… どうしてこうなっちまったんだ……
jpnSearchText:
……いくらなんでもやりすぎだろ……
どうしてこうなっちまったんだ……

engChrName: Renne and Sasha're gettin' full of themselves... Pisses me off.
engSearchText:
Renne and Sasha're gettin' full of themselves...
Pisses me off.
jpnChrName: レンやサーシャの野郎に デカい顔されんのもイラつくが……
jpnSearchText:
レンやサーシャの野郎に
デカい顔されんのもイラつくが……

engChrName: But then Ronald went and took things too far. How'd we even get here...?
engSearchText:
But then Ronald went and took things too far.
How'd we even get here...?
jpnChrName: ロナールの奴もやりすぎだろ…… ……クソッ、どうしてこうなっちまったんだ……
jpnSearchText:
ロナールの奴もやりすぎだろ……
……クソッ、どうしてこうなっちまったんだ……

engChrName: I am SO sick of lookin' at your face.
engSearchText: I am SO sick of lookin' at your face.
jpnChrName: テメー、いつまでもウゼエんだよ……
jpnSearchText: テメー、いつまでもウゼエんだよ……

engChrName: Don't you dare bitch about playing rough, got it? I'm gonna whoop your ass and you're gonna like it!
engSearchText:
Don't you dare bitch about playing rough, got it?
I'm gonna whoop your ass and you're gonna like it!
jpnChrName: 先に言っとくがラフプレーで文句付けんなよ？ ソッコーでブッ潰すかんな！！
jpnSearchText:
先に言っとくがラフプレーで文句付けんなよ？
ソッコーでブッ潰すかんな！！

engChrName: We haven't seen any obvious moves from them.
engSearchText: We haven't seen any obvious moves from them.
jpnChrName: ……そう、まだ表立った動きは ないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……そう、まだ表立った動きは
ないみたいね。

engChrName: What I really want to know is if the President's office has stumbled on to anything.
engSearchText:
What I really want to know is if the President's office
has stumbled on to anything.
jpnChrName: 大統領府の方が何か掴んでいるのか── それくらいは知りたいものだけど。
jpnSearchText:
大統領府の方が何か掴んでいるのか──
それくらいは知りたいものだけど。

engChrName: Listen to yourself, Sasha, please. We have our own position to consider.
engSearchText:
Listen to yourself, Sasha, please. We have our own
position to consider.
jpnChrName: 勘弁しろよ、俺にも立場ってモンがある。
jpnSearchText: 勘弁しろよ、俺にも立場ってモンがある。

engChrName: I understand you want to look out for your fellow students, but that shouldn't come at your own expense.
engSearchText:
I understand you want to look out for your fellow
students, but that shouldn't come at your
own expense.
jpnChrName: 学校の同級生や後輩たちのため、だったか？ 分からんでもないが、程々にしろよサーシャ。
jpnSearchText:
学校の同級生や後輩たちのため、だったか？
分からんでもないが、程々にしろよサーシャ。

engChrName: Well, thank you for the advice, unsolicited as it was.
engSearchText: Well, thank you for the advice, unsolicited as it was.
jpnChrName: ご忠告どーも。
jpnSearchText: ご忠告どーも。

engChrName: But as a schoolmate and as a friend, I want to do anything I can to help.
engSearchText:
But as a schoolmate and as a friend, I want to do
anything I can to help.
jpnChrName: でも先輩として友人として、 今はやれるだけやっときたいからね。
jpnSearchText:
でも先輩として友人として、
今はやれるだけやっときたいからね。

engChrName: It's part of my duty as the general club manager to look out for everybody here, and that includes him.
engSearchText:
It's part of my duty as the general club manager to
look out for everybody here, and that includes him.
jpnChrName: 部活連の統括としても 後輩や友人たちの身の安全を図らないと。
jpnSearchText:
部活連の統括としても
後輩や友人たちの身の安全を図らないと。

engChrName: So, would you mind keeping in touch? When you can?
engSearchText:
So, would you mind keeping in touch? When
you can?
jpnChrName: 悪いけど、ちょくちょく 連絡取らせてもらうわよ？
jpnSearchText:
悪いけど、ちょくちょく
連絡取らせてもらうわよ？

engChrName: Are you even listening to—okay, you know what? Fine. It's clear you've made up your mind.
engSearchText:
Are you even listening to—okay, you know what?
Fine. It's clear you've made up your mind.
jpnChrName: お前な…… まあ言っても聞かないんだろうけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前な……
まあ言っても聞かないんだろうけどよ。

engChrName: (Up until April, James was hanging around with this punk named Ronald.)
engSearchText:
(Up until April, James was hanging around with this
punk named Ronald.)
jpnChrName: （ジェイムスは４月まで、ロナールっていう   ロクデナシの取り巻きをやってたのよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ジェイムスは４月まで、ロナールっていう
ロクデナシの取り巻きをやってたのよね。）

engChrName: (Ronald dropped out, but James still covers for him.)
engSearchText: (Ronald dropped out, but James still covers for him.)
jpnChrName: （そいつはもう退学しちゃったんだけど   ジェイムスは一人で意地張っててね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（そいつはもう退学しちゃったんだけど
ジェイムスは一人で意地張っててね～。）

engChrName: (Well, I guess I can help him vent some of his frustrations, at least. Might have to play a little rough with him, though!)
engSearchText:
(Well, I guess I can help him vent some of his
frustrations, at least. Might have to play a little rough
with him, though!)
jpnChrName: （ま、気晴らしに吐き出させてみますか。   ……多少強引にでもね！）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、気晴らしに吐き出させてみますか。
……多少強引にでもね！）

engChrName: Hell do you want? Why'd you drag me out here?
engSearchText: Hell do you want? Why'd you drag me out here?
jpnChrName: ……何だよ、こんな所に連れて来やがって。
jpnSearchText: ……何だよ、こんな所に連れて来やがって。

engChrName: Oh, nothing big. I just figured a match or two might change your outlook on things.
engSearchText:
Oh, nothing big. I just figured a match or two might
change your outlook on things.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、大した事じゃないわ。 一度勝負したらあんたも変わるかなってね♪
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、大した事じゃないわ。
一度勝負したらあんたも変わるかなってね♪

engChrName: Huh? Hell're you talkin' about?
engSearchText: Huh? Hell're you talkin' about?
jpnChrName: はァ、言ってる意味がわかんねぇんだが。
jpnSearchText: はァ、言ってる意味がわかんねぇんだが。

engChrName: I can tell you've got a lot on your plate right now. A lotta things stressing you out.
engSearchText:
I can tell you've got a lot on your plate right now.
A lotta things stressing you out.
jpnChrName: ……色々と溜め込んでるのは お見通しなのよね～。
jpnSearchText:
……色々と溜め込んでるのは
お見通しなのよね～。

engChrName: I've known you since before Ronald dragged you into this mess, after all.
engSearchText:
I've known you since before Ronald dragged you into
this mess, after all.
jpnChrName: 一応、あんたがロナールの“取り巻き”なんて やる前からの付き合いなわけだし。
jpnSearchText:
一応、あんたがロナールの“取り巻き”なんて
やる前からの付き合いなわけだし。

engChrName: Even Renne is giving you props for trying to get yourself back on track, now that he's dropped out.
engSearchText:
Even Renne is giving you props for trying to get
yourself back on track, now that he's dropped out.
jpnChrName: あいつが退学しても、一人で残って 意地張ってる根性だけはレンも認めてる。
jpnSearchText:
あいつが退学しても、一人で残って
意地張ってる根性だけはレンも認めてる。

engChrName: But aren't you tired of all that work by yourself? It's okay to ask for help, you know. We can help you get back on the straight and narrow!
engSearchText:
But aren't you tired of all that work by yourself?
It's okay to ask for help, you know. We can help you
get back on the straight and narrow!
jpnChrName: でも──もういいんじゃない？ あたしが引導を渡してあげるわ♪
jpnSearchText:
でも──もういいんじゃない？
あたしが引導を渡してあげるわ♪

engChrName: ...Pfft. Get off your friggin' high horse. And you've got some nerve, pickin' a fight you know you'll lose!
engSearchText:
...Pfft. Get off your friggin' high horse. And you've
got some nerve, pickin' a fight you know you'll lose!
jpnChrName: クク……煽ってんじゃねーぞコラァ！ しかもテメーの得意分野で挑んできやがってよ！
jpnSearchText:
クク……煽ってんじゃねーぞコラァ！
しかもテメーの得意分野で挑んできやがってよ！

engChrName: Oh, don't count me out just like that. I'm the captain of the basketball club for a reason.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't count me out just like that. I'm the captain
of the basketball club for a reason.
jpnChrName: バスケ部の部長やってるのは あくまで一番好きってだけなんだけどな～。
jpnSearchText:
バスケ部の部長やってるのは
あくまで一番好きってだけなんだけどな～。

engChrName: In fact, I'd venture to say I'm a better athlete than you in general! Pick a sport, I'll wipe the floor with you!
engSearchText:
In fact, I'd venture to say I'm a better athlete than you
in general! Pick a sport, I'll wipe the floor with you!
jpnChrName: 陸上でも水泳でも 今のあんたに負ける気はしないけど？
jpnSearchText:
陸上でも水泳でも
今のあんたに負ける気はしないけど？

engChrName: Come at me! And when I win, you get the hell outta my face!
engSearchText:
Come at me! And when I win, you get the hell outta
my face!
jpnChrName: 上等だぜ──その代わり俺が勝ったら 二度と絡んでくるんじゃねーぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
上等だぜ──その代わり俺が勝ったら
二度と絡んでくるんじゃねーぞ！！

engChrName: AAAGH! No, no, y-you didn't see that! I just lost my composure for a second! I mean...
engSearchText:
AAAGH! No, no, y-you didn't see that! I just lost my
composure for a second! I mean...
jpnChrName: わぁぁっ、違う違う違うんですさっきのは！！ 頭に血が上っちゃって～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
わぁぁっ、違う違う違うんですさっきのは！！
頭に血が上っちゃって～～っ！！

engChrName: Ohh, that's what that was? I, haha... I see.
engSearchText: Ohh, that's what that was? I, haha... I see.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そうでしたか……
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そうでしたか……

engChrName: Though, no offense, it'll be hard for me to un-see you thwacking those monsters with a polearm.
engSearchText:
Though, no offense, it'll be hard for me to un-see you
thwacking those monsters with a polearm.
jpnChrName: ポール片手に化け物を滅多打ちにする姿が 目に焼き付いていますが……
jpnSearchText:
ポール片手に化け物を滅多打ちにする姿が
目に焼き付いていますが……

engChrName: I said you didn't see iiit! Aaagh! I'm gonna die! This is too embarrassing!
engSearchText:
I said you didn't see iiit! Aaagh! I'm gonna die!
This is too embarrassing!
jpnChrName: ひやァァァ！！　止めてください！！ ははは恥ずかしいッッ！！
jpnSearchText:
ひやァァァ！！　止めてください！！
ははは恥ずかしいッッ！！

engChrName: (It...doesn't really seem embarrassing to me. But I guess that's neither here nor there—what matters is that we're all safe.)
engSearchText:
(It...doesn't really seem embarrassing to me. But I
guess that's neither here nor there—what matters is
that we're all safe.)
jpnChrName: （恥ずかしいとかそういう問題だろうか。   う～ん、お陰で冷静になってきたぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（恥ずかしいとかそういう問題だろうか。
う～ん、お陰で冷静になってきたぞ。）

engChrName: L-Listen, umm...you've got it all wrong! Honest! I-I don't even know what I was saying back there, I'm just a weak little lady! I swear!
engSearchText:
L-Listen, umm...you've got it all wrong! Honest!
I-I don't even know what I was saying back there, I'm
just a weak little lady! I swear!
jpnChrName: その違うんですよ色々口走っちゃいましたけど 私はか弱い三十路女ですからっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
その違うんですよ色々口走っちゃいましたけど
私はか弱い三十路女ですからっ……！！

engChrName: (I'm honestly thankful for the rescue, but I doubt she'd want to hear it from me. What to do...?)
engSearchText:
(I'm honestly thankful for the rescue, but I doubt
she'd want to hear it from me. What to do...?)
jpnChrName: （助けてくれたお礼を言いたいけど   話を聞いてくれなさそうだし……）
jpnSearchText:
（助けてくれたお礼を言いたいけど
話を聞いてくれなさそうだし……）

engChrName: (Well, we're still not out of the woods, at any rate. I need to do my part, too!)
engSearchText:
(Well, we're still not out of the woods, at any rate.
I need to do my part, too!)
jpnChrName: （まだ危機を脱したわけじゃなさそうだ……   俺もやるべき事をやらないとな……！）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ危機を脱したわけじゃなさそうだ……
俺もやるべき事をやらないとな……！）

engChrName: Tch. If I knew this was gonna happen, I'd have brought my trusty sword.
engSearchText:
Tch. If I knew this was gonna happen, I'd have
brought my trusty sword.
jpnChrName: チッ、ンな事になんなら 愛用の木刀を持ってくるべきだったぜ……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、ンな事になんなら
愛用の木刀を持ってくるべきだったぜ……

engChrName: You don't scare me! I've been beating you bastards down since I ran with the Stegoros!
engSearchText:
You don't scare me! I've been beating you bastards
down since I ran with the Stegoros!
jpnChrName: ステゴロなんざ族やってた頃以来だぜ。 腐れバケモンどもがよォ！！
jpnSearchText:
ステゴロなんざ族やってた頃以来だぜ。
腐れバケモンどもがよォ！！

engChrName: Thank you very much for meeting with me today, Ms. Sonia.
engSearchText:
Thank you very much for meeting with me today,
Ms. Sonia.
jpnChrName: 本日はお会いしていただき ありがとうございます、ソニアさん。
jpnSearchText:
本日はお会いしていただき
ありがとうございます、ソニアさん。

engChrName: I do apologize. My parents have been trying to marry me off as of late... They're getting quite heavy-handed.
engSearchText:
I do apologize. My parents have been trying to marry
me off as of late... They're getting
quite heavy-handed.
jpnChrName: すみません、そろそろ結婚しろと 両親がうるさくてですね……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、そろそろ結婚しろと
両親がうるさくてですね……

engChrName: They're putting that on your back at twenty-five? That's rough...
engSearchText:
They're putting that on your back at twenty-five?
That's rough...
jpnChrName: おほほ、まだ２５歳でいらっしゃるのに それは大変というか……
jpnSearchText:
おほほ、まだ２５歳でいらっしゃるのに
それは大変というか……

engChrName: And you're still aiming for the Ministry of Home Affairs, aren't you? You're really shooting for the moon!
engSearchText:
And you're still aiming for the Ministry of Home
Affairs, aren't you? You're really shooting
for the moon!
jpnChrName: でもそのお歳で内務省の課長だなんて 有望というか、素晴らしいですわね！
jpnSearchText:
でもそのお歳で内務省の課長だなんて
有望というか、素晴らしいですわね！

engChrName: Oh, no, I'm sure there are plenty of others more suited for the role than I.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, I'm sure there are plenty of others more
suited for the role than I.
jpnChrName: いえ、私より優秀な人材も多いですし──
jpnSearchText: いえ、私より優秀な人材も多いですし──

engChrName: Well, no sense standing here chatting all day. Shall we take a little trip around town?
engSearchText:
Well, no sense standing here chatting all day.
Shall we take a little trip around town?
jpnChrName: と、立ち話が過ぎましたね。 よろしければ街を一回りしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
と、立ち話が過ぎましたね。
よろしければ街を一回りしましょうか。

engChrName: I've booked us a nice table for dinner, but I'd like to hear first where you might want to go.
engSearchText:
I've booked us a nice table for dinner, but I'd like to
hear first where you might want to go.
jpnChrName: 一応ディナーなども予約してありますが まずはソニアさんのお好きな所へ参りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
一応ディナーなども予約してありますが
まずはソニアさんのお好きな所へ参りましょう。

engChrName: Oh, of course! (Nice, got my festival date locked in!)
engSearchText:
Oh, of course!
(Nice, got my festival date locked in!)
jpnChrName: は、はい……！ （記念祭デート来たぁぁ！！！）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……！
（記念祭デート来たぁぁ！！！）

engChrName: (And with some nice arm candy, to boot. He's young, he's handsome, he's high-class...)
engSearchText:
(And with some nice arm candy, to boot. He's young,
he's handsome, he's high-class...)
jpnChrName: （エスコートもスマートだし   何より年下のイケメンエリート……）
jpnSearchText:
（エスコートもスマートだし
何より年下のイケメンエリート……）

engChrName: (That's the whole package right there!)
engSearchText: (That's the whole package right there!)
jpnChrName: （いいんじゃない、彼！？）
jpnSearchText: （いいんじゃない、彼！？）

engChrName: I apologize, I really should have asked you earlier.
engSearchText: I apologize, I really should have asked you earlier.
jpnChrName: すみません、事前にもっと ご希望を伺っておけばよかった。
jpnSearchText:
すみません、事前にもっと
ご希望を伺っておけばよかった。

engChrName: Is there anywhere in particular you'd like to go, Ms. Sonia?
engSearchText:
Is there anywhere in particular you'd like to go,
Ms. Sonia?
jpnChrName: ソニアさんはどこか 行きたい所はありますか？
jpnSearchText:
ソニアさんはどこか
行きたい所はありますか？

engChrName: (Oh, man! Oh, man! Oh, man! He's even asking me what *I* want, even though he already had a plan! Green flag, baby!)
engSearchText:
(Oh, man! Oh, man! Oh, man! He's even asking me
what *I* want, even though he already had a plan!
Green flag, baby!)
jpnChrName: （デートプランを用意しつつ   私の希望を優先してくれる所もグッド！）
jpnSearchText:
（デートプランを用意しつつ
私の希望を優先してくれる所もグッド！）

engChrName: (Age? Check. Looks? Check. Status? Check. Personality? BIG ol' check. This one's a keeper and you bet your ass I'm keeping him!)
engSearchText:
(Age? Check. Looks? Check. Status? Check.
Personality? BIG ol' check. This one's a keeper and
you bet your ass I'm keeping him!)
jpnChrName: （何より年下のイケメンエリート……   何としてもモノにするわよっ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（何より年下のイケメンエリート……
何としてもモノにするわよっ！！）

engChrName: *hic!* I said SCREW guys! Who says I gotta marry one just 'cause I'm 'thaaat aaage' and... *hic!*
engSearchText:
*hic!* I said SCREW guys! Who says I gotta marry
one just 'cause I'm 'thaaat aaage' and... *hic!*
jpnChrName: ヒック……オトコがなんだァ～！！ コンキがなんだァ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒック……オトコがなんだァ～！！
コンキがなんだァ～っ！！

engChrName: Not like I'm gonna just curl up and DIE if I'm single in my thirties! *hic!*
engSearchText:
Not like I'm gonna just curl up and DIE if I'm single
in my thirties! *hic!*
jpnChrName: べっつにいいじゃないのよォ～！ 三十路越えて独身だって……ヒック……
jpnSearchText:
べっつにいいじゃないのよォ～！
三十路越えて独身だって……ヒック……

engChrName: AwwRIGHT! Y'all, tonight we're gonna drink till I forget alllll abouddit!
engSearchText:
AwwRIGHT! Y'all, tonight we're gonna drink till I
forget alllll abouddit!
jpnChrName: よォし、今夜はツブれるまで飲むどォ──！！
jpnSearchText: よォし、今夜はツブれるまで飲むどォ──！！

engChrName: Oh, wow. You're a teacher at Aramis? That's incredible!
engSearchText:
Oh, wow. You're a teacher at Aramis?
That's incredible!
jpnChrName: ほう！　名門アラミスで教師を！ それは素晴らしいお仕事ですね！
jpnSearchText:
ほう！　名門アラミスで教師を！
それは素晴らしいお仕事ですね！

engChrName: Oh, haha! It's really no big deal. My career's only just getting started! (Even though I'm in my thirties...)
engSearchText:
Oh, haha! It's really no big deal. My career's only just
getting started!
(Even though I'm in my thirties...)
jpnChrName: お、おほほ……大したことは。 まだまだ新米ですし（三十路越えちゃったけど）。
jpnSearchText:
お、おほほ……大したことは。
まだまだ新米ですし（三十路越えちゃったけど）。

engChrName: Your students are in good hands, I bet, with a teacher like you.
engSearchText:
Your students are in good hands, I bet, with a teacher
like you.
jpnChrName: ソニアさんのような素敵な女性に 教えてもらえるだなんて、生徒たちが羨ましい。
jpnSearchText:
ソニアさんのような素敵な女性に
教えてもらえるだなんて、生徒たちが羨ましい。

engChrName: I must say, you've piqued my curiosity, my fair lady.
engSearchText: I must say, you've piqued my curiosity, my fair lady.
jpnChrName: 嗚呼、貴女のことを もっと知りたくなってしまったな。
jpnSearchText:
嗚呼、貴女のことを
もっと知りたくなってしまったな。

engChrName: What do you do when a particularly...naughty student misbehaves? How do you rein them in?
engSearchText:
What do you do when a particularly...naughty
student misbehaves? How do you rein them in?
jpnChrName: 普段学校ではどのような教育方針を── 例えば反抗的な生徒にはどういった指導を？
jpnSearchText:
普段学校ではどのような教育方針を──
例えば反抗的な生徒にはどういった指導を？

engChrName: Oh, well, I teach PE, so it's mostly just physical stuff. I call them out and have them do thirty laps around the grounds.
engSearchText:
Oh, well, I teach PE, so it's mostly just physical stuff.
I call them out and have them do thirty laps around
the grounds.
jpnChrName: ええ、それは勿論、体育教師ですから。 まずは呼び出し、校庭３０周のランニング──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それは勿論、体育教師ですから。
まずは呼び出し、校庭３０周のランニング──

engChrName: Buuut I've always got my trusty wooden sword on hand, too, so as long as I don't go totally corporal on their—
engSearchText:
Buuut I've always got my trusty wooden sword on
hand, too, so as long as I don't go totally corporal on
their—
jpnChrName: 愛用の竹刀がありまして、 体罰にならない程度にビシバシと……！
jpnSearchText:
愛用の竹刀がありまして、
体罰にならない程度にビシバシと……！

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?
jpnChrName: えっ……？
jpnSearchText: えっ……？

engChrName: Oh. Oh, no.
engSearchText: Oh. Oh, no.

engChrName: (AAAH, now I've gone and done it! Should've kept my stupid mouth shut!)
engSearchText:
(AAAH, now I've gone and done it!
Should've kept my stupid mouth shut!)
jpnChrName: （しまったァァ！！　調子に乗って   つい喋りすぎたァァァ──！！！）
jpnSearchText:
（しまったァァ！！　調子に乗って
つい喋りすぎたァァァ──！！！）

engChrName: (What's Ms. Sonia doing here...?)
engSearchText: (What's Ms. Sonia doing here...?)
jpnChrName: （……ソニア先生、こんな所で何を……）
jpnSearchText: （……ソニア先生、こんな所で何を……）

engChrName: (Single 'n' mingling, if I had to guess. Looks like it ain't goin' so hot, though.)
engSearchText:
(Single 'n' mingling, if I had to guess. Looks like it
ain't goin' so hot, though.)
jpnChrName: （そりゃま、お見合いってヤツだろ？   撃沈したみてえだけどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そりゃま、お見合いってヤツだろ？
撃沈したみてえだけどな。）

engChrName: A...wooden sword? Did I hear that right?
engSearchText: A...wooden sword? Did I hear that right?

engChrName: (I'm DEAD! I am SLAIN! Three months biding my time for a hot date and I BLEW IT! Aidios, smite me!)
engSearchText:
(I'm DEAD! I am SLAIN! Three months biding my
time for a hot date and I BLEW IT! Aidios,
smite me!)
jpnChrName: （死んだァァ！！　３ヶ月ぶりにありつけた   有望なお見合いだったのに……私の馬鹿ァァ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（死んだァァ！！　３ヶ月ぶりにありつけた
有望なお見合いだったのに……私の馬鹿ァァ！！）

engChrName: M-Ms. Sonia?! What are you... N-No, never mind that. It's dangerous, we need to get inside!
engSearchText:
M-Ms. Sonia?! What are you... N-No, never
mind that. It's dangerous, we need to get inside!
jpnChrName: ソソ、ソニアさん……！？ ひとまず危ないですから、中へ……
jpnSearchText:
ソソ、ソニアさん……！？
ひとまず危ないですから、中へ……

engChrName: My thanks for the rescue, though! Truly!
engSearchText: My thanks for the rescue, though! Truly!
jpnChrName: 守ってくださったのは ありがたいんですけども……！
jpnSearchText:
守ってくださったのは
ありがたいんですけども……！

engChrName: Buzz off, small fry!
engSearchText: Buzz off, small fry!
jpnChrName: バケモンがナンボのもんじゃゴラァ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>バケモンがナンボのもんじゃゴラァ！！

engChrName: One 'a you so much as touches anybody and I'll freakin' rip your limbs off!
engSearchText:
One 'a you so much as touches anybody and
I'll freakin' rip your limbs off!
jpnChrName: 身内に手ェ出したら 消しクズにすんぞ、アア！？
jpnSearchText:
身内に手ェ出したら
消しクズにすんぞ、アア！？

engChrName: (Wh—Who is THIS?! Surely this isn't the lady I just talked to?)
engSearchText:
(Wh—Who is THIS?! Surely this isn't the lady I just
talked to?)
jpnChrName: （え、ええええええ～～～！？   ソニアさん、デート中とまるで別人じゃ……）
jpnSearchText:
（え、ええええええ～～～！？
ソニアさん、デート中とまるで別人じゃ……）

engChrName: (I-I mean, I do appreciate her protection, but just... Is this what they mean by 'crouching tiger'?!)
engSearchText:
(I-I mean, I do appreciate her protection, but just...
Is this what they mean by 'crouching tiger'?!)
jpnChrName: （みんなを守ってくれたし   ぶっちゃけ強いけど、ギャップが……！？？）
jpnSearchText:
（みんなを守ってくれたし
ぶっちゃけ強いけど、ギャップが……！？？）

engChrName: (Is that really the same Sonia?)
engSearchText: (Is that really the same Sonia?)
jpnChrName: （ソ、ソニア先生って一体……）
jpnSearchText: （ソ、ソニア先生って一体……）

engChrName: (Oh, yeah. I heard about her. Loses it at the drop of a hat and goes ham on her students. Real loose cannon.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, yeah. I heard about her. Loses it at the drop of a
hat and goes ham on her students. Real
loose cannon.)
jpnChrName: （怒らせるとコエー体育教師だろ？   新米の頃はよく切れて吠えてたモンだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（怒らせるとコエー体育教師だろ？
新米の頃はよく切れて吠えてたモンだぜ。）

engChrName: I told the press I'd be lying low for the time being, mainly with Nina and the others.
engSearchText:
I told the press I'd be lying low for the time being,
mainly with Nina and the others.
jpnChrName: インタビューには、ニナ達と ゆっくり過ごすつもりって答えたけど。
jpnSearchText:
インタビューには、ニナ達と
ゆっくり過ごすつもりって答えたけど。

engChrName: But I think I'm gonna tag along with you today, so let me know if there's anything you need me for.
engSearchText:
But I think I'm gonna tag along with you today, so let
me know if there's anything you need me for.
jpnChrName: 今日も貴方達に付き合うつもりだから、 必要とあらば呼びに来なさいよね。
jpnSearchText:
今日も貴方達に付き合うつもりだから、
必要とあらば呼びに来なさいよね。

engChrName: Well, less than an hour until it's go time. Let's make sure everything is in order.
engSearchText:
Well, less than an hour until it's go time. Let's make
sure everything is in order.
jpnChrName: さて、件の突入作戦まで１時間足らず── 我々も可能な限り協力するとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、件の突入作戦まで１時間足らず──
我々も可能な限り協力するとしようか。

engChrName: Right. We've already secured supplies and emergency funds on our end.
engSearchText:
Right. We've already secured supplies and emergency
funds on our end.
jpnChrName: ですな、必要資材の調達や輸送は ほぼほぼ段取りましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ですな、必要資材の調達や輸送は
ほぼほぼ段取りましたが。

engChrName: We'll need to think about cleanup, too, among other things I'm sure I'm forgetting.
engSearchText:
We'll need to think about cleanup, too, among other
things I'm sure I'm forgetting.
jpnChrName: まだできる事もあるでしょう。 作戦後の取り回しも含めて。
jpnSearchText:
まだできる事もあるでしょう。
作戦後の取り回しも含めて。

engChrName: Yeah, I dunno all the nitty-gritty stuff, so I'll leave that to you suits.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I dunno all the nitty-gritty stuff, so I'll leave
that to you suits.
jpnChrName: 詳しくは判らねえが…… 政治家として動いてくれてるって事か。
jpnSearchText:
詳しくは判らねえが……
政治家として動いてくれてるって事か。

engChrName: Much obliged. Once you're ready, make for Expressway 1.
engSearchText:
Much obliged. Once you're ready, make for
Expressway 1.
jpnChrName: ふふ、君たちは準備が出来次第 首都高一号線へ向いたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、君たちは準備が出来次第
首都高一号線へ向いたまえ。

engChrName: They should have everything ready for you there. And Agnès...please do take care of yourself.
engSearchText:
They should have everything ready for you there.
And Agnès...please do take care of yourself.
jpnChrName: 彼らが準備を進めているはずだ。 ……アニエス君も、気をつけてな。
jpnSearchText:
彼らが準備を進めているはずだ。
……アニエス君も、気をつけてな。

engChrName: I will, don't worry! We leave the rest to you!
engSearchText: I will, don't worry! We leave the rest to you!
jpnChrName: はい……！　後の事は どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！　後の事は
どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: They may not be my constituents anymore, but I still care deeply for the people of Oración. You have my thanks for your help there.
engSearchText:
They may not be my constituents anymore, but I still
care deeply for the people of Oración. You have my
thanks for your help there.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでの君たちの活躍も聞いているよ。 元大統領として君たちには礼を言わせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでの君たちの活躍も聞いているよ。
元大統領として君たちには礼を言わせてもらおう。

engChrName: I believe that the future of this country is in good hands, with your generation on the horizon. I'll have to pass that along to Kilika, haha.
engSearchText:
I believe that the future of this country is in good
hands, with your generation on the horizon. I'll have
to pass that along to Kilika, haha.
jpnChrName: キリカ君達にも言える事だが、君たちのような有望な 若者が揃っているなら共和国の未来は安泰だな！
jpnSearchText:
キリカ君達にも言える事だが、君たちのような有望な
若者が揃っているなら共和国の未来は安泰だな！

engChrName: Funny that we would run into each other under such...bizarre circumstances.
engSearchText:
Funny that we would run into each other under
such...bizarre circumstances.
jpnChrName: いやはや、こんなタイミングで 再会を果たすとは……
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、こんなタイミングで
再会を果たすとは……

engChrName: Two years is far too long, old friend. It's good to see you again.
engSearchText:
Two years is far too long, old friend. It's good to see
you again.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりですな、ギエン殿。 かれこれ２年ぶりになりますか。
jpnSearchText:
お久しぶりですな、ギエン殿。
かれこれ２年ぶりになりますか。

engChrName: You can say that again. Haven't seen you since I stepped off that stage.
engSearchText:
You can say that again. Haven't seen you since I
stepped off that stage.
jpnChrName: フフ、ヌシが政界を去って以来ゆえ、 そのくらいになるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ヌシが政界を去って以来ゆえ、
そのくらいになるだろう。

engChrName: It's important to keep on good terms with the principality. Can't leave it all up to my son, can I?
engSearchText:
It's important to keep on good terms with
the principality. Can't leave it all up to my son, can I?
jpnChrName: 息子（ファン）のみならず公国方面も含め、 いまだ交流盛んなようで重畳だが。
jpnSearchText:
息子（ファン）のみならず公国方面も含め、
いまだ交流盛んなようで重畳だが。

engChrName: Haha. Fair enough.
engSearchText: Haha. Fair enough.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハッ、恐れ入ります。

engChrName: (He really does know about that thing with Elsaim? Yeesh... But, well, he IS an elder. I guess that's to be expected.)
engSearchText:
(He really does know about that thing with Elsaim?
Yeesh... But, well, he IS an elder. I guess that's to
be expected.)
jpnChrName: （う～む、まさか公国との事まで……   さすがは黒月きってのルウ家の──）
jpnSearchText:
（う～む、まさか公国との事まで……
さすがは黒月きってのルウ家の──）

engChrName: Anyway, who's this with you? I feel like I've seen him somewhere before.
engSearchText:
Anyway, who's this with you? I feel like I've seen him
somewhere before.
jpnChrName: して、この者はいったい何者だ？ どこか見覚えがある気はするが。
jpnSearchText:
して、この者はいったい何者だ？
どこか見覚えがある気はするが。

engChrName: Ah, Elder Gien Lu. I believe this is the first we've met.
engSearchText:
Ah, Elder Gien Lu. I believe this is the first
we've met.
jpnChrName: ハハ……お目にかかるのは 初めてですな、ギエン・ルウ大老。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……お目にかかるのは
初めてですな、ギエン・ルウ大老。

engChrName: My name is Polanski, of the Republican Party. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
engSearchText:
My name is Polanski, of the Republican Party.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
jpnChrName: わたくし《共和党》に所属する ポランスキーというしがない議員でして……
jpnSearchText:
わたくし《共和党》に所属する
ポランスキーというしがない議員でして……

engChrName: He's quite the hard worker, you see. As the minority leader, he has his hands full, but he's holding his own quite well.
engSearchText:
He's quite the hard worker, you see. As the minority
leader, he has his hands full, but he's holding his own
quite well.
jpnChrName: フフ、与党が議席の過半数を占める中、 何とか踏ん張り続けている苦労人です。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、与党が議席の過半数を占める中、
何とか踏ん張り続けている苦労人です。

engChrName: I had hoped I could introduce you to Ryan Connery as well, he's one of our newer members...but alas.
engSearchText:
I had hoped I could introduce you to Ryan Connery
as well, he's one of our newer members...but alas.
jpnChrName: 実は彼に加えてライアン・コネリーという、 “新人”も紹介したかったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
実は彼に加えてライアン・コネリーという、
“新人”も紹介したかったのですが……

engChrName: Ahh, yes. MacDowell's son-in-law, correct?
engSearchText: Ahh, yes. MacDowell's son-in-law, correct?
jpnChrName: ああ、そちらは存じておる。 かのマクダエル家の娘婿だった者か。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そちらは存じておる。
かのマクダエル家の娘婿だった者か。

engChrName: He was a bit...bland, when I met him, but he does offer some sharp political insight. I wouldn't mind talking with him again.
engSearchText:
He was a bit...bland, when I met him, but he does
offer some sharp political insight. I wouldn't mind
talking with him again.
jpnChrName: 地味だが面白い着眼点を持っている。 少々、興味深く思っていた所だ。
jpnSearchText:
地味だが面白い着眼点を持っている。
少々、興味深く思っていた所だ。

engChrName: Perhaps once this mess is over, we can all sit down for a chat.
engSearchText:
Perhaps once this mess is over, we can all sit down for
a chat.
jpnChrName: この異変が片付きしだい、 改めて席を設けていただこうか。
jpnSearchText:
この異変が片付きしだい、
改めて席を設けていただこうか。

engChrName: You'd be more than welcome to join us, Mr. Polanski.
engSearchText:
You'd be more than welcome to join us,
Mr. Polanski.
jpnChrName: ──その場にて ヌシとも改めて挨拶させてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
──その場にて
ヌシとも改めて挨拶させてもらおう。

engChrName: O-Oh! Well, it would be my pleasure! Thank you very much.
engSearchText:
O-Oh! Well, it would be my pleasure! Thank you
very much.
jpnChrName: おお、それはそれは……！ 感謝いたしますぞ、ルウ大老！
jpnSearchText:
おお、それはそれは……！
感謝いたしますぞ、ルウ大老！

engChrName: Hahaha! Look at you, Polanski!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Look at you, Polanski!
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、 よかったな、ポランスキー君。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、
よかったな、ポランスキー君。

engChrName: (That old fox, workin' his magic as always.)
engSearchText: (That old fox, workin' his magic as always.)
jpnChrName: （さすがは元大ダヌキ……）
jpnSearchText: （さすがは元大ダヌキ……）

engChrName: (Man's starin' Heiyue dead in the face, and he's still makin' connections all casual.)
engSearchText:
(Man's starin' Heiyue dead in the face, and he's still
makin' connections all casual.)
jpnChrName: （黒月の最有力者を相手に   こんな時まで“次”の仕込みとはな。）
jpnSearchText:
（黒月の最有力者を相手に
こんな時まで“次”の仕込みとはな。）

engChrName: (It's always daunting to see politicians at work. They're strong and steadfast, just like Father.)
engSearchText:
(It's always daunting to see politicians at work.
They're strong and steadfast, just like Father.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、これが政治家……   やはり父も含めて強（したた）かですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、これが政治家……
やはり父も含めて強（したた）かですね。）

engChrName: Of course, standing around here chatting won't make a lick of difference until we get this cleared up.
engSearchText:
Of course, standing around here chatting won't make
a lick of difference until we get this cleared up.
jpnChrName: ……この場でいくら口約束をしようとも、 異変が解決しなければ無意味な事よ。
jpnSearchText:
……この場でいくら口約束をしようとも、
異変が解決しなければ無意味な事よ。

engChrName: Heiyue will assist, of course. Cao and my son are out there in the field.
engSearchText:
Heiyue will assist, of course. Cao and my son are out
there in the field.
jpnChrName: 黒月としても打てる手は打たせてもらうつもりだ。 今頃、息子やツァオ達が動いている事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
黒月としても打てる手は打たせてもらうつもりだ。
今頃、息子やツァオ達が動いている事だろう。

engChrName: I'll leave the rest to you, spriggan and company.
engSearchText: I'll leave the rest to you, spriggan and company.
jpnChrName: 仕上げは任せたぞ、裏解決屋。 それとおぬしもしっかりやるといい。
jpnSearchText:
仕上げは任せたぞ、裏解決屋。
それとおぬしもしっかりやるといい。

engChrName: Don't gotta tell me twice.
engSearchText: Don't gotta tell me twice.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言われるまでもねーよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言われるまでもねーよ。

engChrName: Sorry for startling you earlier.
engSearchText: Sorry for startling you earlier.
jpnChrName: 先程は驚かせてしまってすみませんでした。
jpnSearchText: 先程は驚かせてしまってすみませんでした。

engChrName: It looks like Saara and the hotel staff have got the evacuees calmed down, though. Good...
engSearchText:
It looks like Saara and the hotel staff have got the
evacuees calmed down, though. Good...
jpnChrName: それにしても……避難して来た方々が落ち着けるよう サァラさんやホテルの方が働きかけているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……避難して来た方々が落ち着けるよう
サァラさんやホテルの方が働きかけているようですね。

engChrName: I should go ask if there's anything I can do to help.
engSearchText: I should go ask if there's anything I can do to help.
jpnChrName: 私も何か力になれないか 相談させて頂きたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
私も何か力になれないか
相談させて頂きたいと思います。

engChrName: Please be careful out there... Come back safe, okay?
engSearchText: Please be careful out there... Come back safe, okay?
jpnChrName: 先輩も皆さんも、どうかお気をつけて…… 絶対無事に帰って来て下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
先輩も皆さんも、どうかお気をつけて……
絶対無事に帰って来て下さいね。

engChrName: I was just shocked to hear what happened with Dingo...
engSearchText:
I was just shocked to hear what happened
with Dingo...
jpnChrName: 私もディンゴさんの件は本当にショックでしたが……
jpnSearchText: 私もディンゴさんの件は本当にショックでしたが……

engChrName: Seeing Marielle pull herself back together and press on just... It gave me the strength to carry on, too.
engSearchText:
Seeing Marielle pull herself back together and press
on just... It gave me the strength to carry on, too.
jpnChrName: マリエルさんの一生懸命な姿を見ると 救われるような気持ちがします。
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんの一生懸命な姿を見ると
救われるような気持ちがします。

engChrName: I really admire her. She never gives up, no matter what.
engSearchText:
I really admire her. She never gives up, no
matter what.
jpnChrName: それに、先輩のああいう所は やっぱり尊敬してしまいますね。
jpnSearchText:
それに、先輩のああいう所は
やっぱり尊敬してしまいますね。

engChrName: I want to learn how to be like that, and still support everyone in my own way.
engSearchText:
I want to learn how to be like that, and still support
everyone in my own way.
jpnChrName: 私も勉強させてもらいつつ 陰ながら応援させてもらいたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
私も勉強させてもらいつつ
陰ながら応援させてもらいたいと思います。

engChrName: Please take care of her for me, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Please take care of her for me, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: アークライドさん…… 先輩のこと、どうかお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
アークライドさん……
先輩のこと、どうかお願いします。

engChrName: She—Judith, I mean—is the brightest star in film. We can't lose her.
engSearchText:
She—Judith, I mean—is the brightest star in film.
We can't lose her.
jpnChrName: 先輩は──ジュディスさんは 映画界に無くてはならない人なんです。
jpnSearchText:
先輩は──ジュディスさんは
映画界に無くてはならない人なんです。

engChrName: I mean, compared to her, I'm just...
engSearchText: I mean, compared to her, I'm just...
jpnChrName: ………の……私なんかよりずっと………
jpnSearchText: ………の……私なんかよりずっと………

engChrName: Hey!
engSearchText: Hey!

engChrName: Nina?!
engSearchText: Nina?!
jpnChrName: ニ、ニナさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ニ、ニナさん……！？

engChrName: Are you okay? Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Are you okay? Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですか？ 身体の調子が悪いんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫ですか？
身体の調子が悪いんじゃ……

engChrName: Oh, no, it's all right. I just got a little light headed.
engSearchText: Oh, no, it's all right. I just got a little light headed.
