jpnChrName: ふふ、大丈夫です。 ちょっと立ちくらみしただけで。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、大丈夫です。
ちょっと立ちくらみしただけで。

engChrName: To be honest, I hardly slept a wink last night. I was too busy prepping for the festival.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I hardly slept a wink last night. I was
too busy prepping for the festival.
jpnChrName: ──白状すると記念祭のイベント準備で 昨日あまり寝ていないんです。
jpnSearchText:
──白状すると記念祭のイベント準備で
昨日あまり寝ていないんです。

engChrName: Oh, poor thing.
engSearchText: Oh, poor thing.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Oh, come on. You've gotta take better care of yourself!
engSearchText:
Oh, come on. You've gotta take better care
of yourself!
jpnChrName: も、もう…… 無茶しちゃ駄目ですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
も、もう……
無茶しちゃ駄目ですよ～！

engChrName: I'll get her for you, don't worry.
engSearchText: I'll get her for you, don't worry.
jpnChrName: ……ま、あんたの先輩は 責任をもって見つけてきてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、あんたの先輩は
責任をもって見つけてきてやるよ。

engChrName: And if I run into that crazy cat lady...then maybe I'll lend her a hand, too.
engSearchText:
And if I run into that crazy cat lady...then maybe I'll
lend her a hand, too.
jpnChrName: ついでにグリムキャッツとかいう お間抜け怪盗も助けてくるから安心しな。
jpnSearchText:
ついでにグリムキャッツとかいう
お間抜け怪盗も助けてくるから安心しな。

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you, Mister Spriggan.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you, Mister Spriggan.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… お願いしますね、解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
お願いしますね、解決屋さん。

engChrName: You just lie down for a bit, okay?
engSearchText: You just lie down for a bit, okay?
jpnChrName: ニナさんは少し休んでいてください。
jpnSearchText: ニナさんは少し休んでいてください。

engChrName: I'll bug the hotel staff and get you something warm to drink.
engSearchText:
I'll bug the hotel staff and get you something warm
to drink.
jpnChrName: 今ホテルの方とお話をして、 なにか温かい飲み物を持って来ますから。
jpnSearchText:
今ホテルの方とお話をして、
なにか温かい飲み物を持って来ますから。

engChrName: I'm sorry, Saara... You shouldn't have to worry about me with everything else going on.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, Saara... You shouldn't have to worry about
me with everything else going on.
jpnChrName: サァラさんも大変なのに 気を遣わせてしまってすみません……
jpnSearchText:
サァラさんも大変なのに
気を遣わせてしまってすみません……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. This is just what friends do.
engSearchText: Don't sweat it. This is just what friends do.
jpnChrName: 気になさらないでください、 こういう時は持ちつ持たれつですよ。
jpnSearchText:
気になさらないでください、
こういう時は持ちつ持たれつですよ。

engChrName: (Looks like they've got it under control.)
engSearchText: (Looks like they've got it under control.)
jpnChrName: （後の事は任せておいても大丈夫そうだな。）
jpnSearchText: （後の事は任せておいても大丈夫そうだな。）

engChrName: (We'd better get out there and make sure that cat doesn't get her whiskers snipped.)
engSearchText:
(We'd better get out there and make sure that cat
doesn't get her whiskers snipped.)
jpnChrName: （俺達は早い所、   あのお間抜け怪盗を助けてやるとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（俺達は早い所、
あのお間抜け怪盗を助けてやるとするか。）

engChrName: Oh, didn't expect to run into you here. Something up?
engSearchText:
Oh, didn't expect to run into you here.
Something up?
jpnChrName: おっ、こんな所で会うとは奇遇だな。 何かあったのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、こんな所で会うとは奇遇だな。
何かあったのかよ？

engChrName: Just wanted to check out a few things before this interview I've got in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
Just wanted to check out a few things before this
interview I've got in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: ああ、メッセルダムに取材へ行く前に 裏取りをしておきたい事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、メッセルダムに取材へ行く前に
裏取りをしておきたい事があってな。

engChrName: Messeldam, huh? Sucks, what's goin' on over there. Just hearin' the name makes me think of those guys.
engSearchText:
Messeldam, huh? Sucks, what's goin' on over there.
Just hearin' the name makes me think of those guys.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムか……その名前を聞くと つい《Ａ》の事を思い出しちまうが。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムか……その名前を聞くと
つい《Ａ》の事を思い出しちまうが。

engChrName: Yeah. Shame, too. That place is real beautiful, has a great view out over the Northern Sea.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Shame, too. That place is real beautiful, has a
great view out over the Northern Sea.
jpnChrName: そうだな……あそこは北海を臨める 景色の良い街でもあるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……あそこは北海を臨める
景色の良い街でもあるんだが。

engChrName: Though last I heard, they've already moved their operations further inland.
engSearchText:
Though last I heard, they've already moved their
operations further inland.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、《Ａ》の本拠地は 既にあの湾岸都市から移されたらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、《Ａ》の本拠地は
既にあの湾岸都市から移されたらしくてな。

engChrName: The police and the guild are all over them, so they're lying low for the time being.
engSearchText:
The police and the guild are all over them, so they're
lying low for the time being.
jpnChrName: 警察や遊撃士の監視の目を盗み、 本格的に“表”から姿を消したようだ。
jpnSearchText:
警察や遊撃士の監視の目を盗み、
本格的に“表”から姿を消したようだ。

engChrName: I suspect they'll be back at it soon enough.
engSearchText: I suspect they'll be back at it soon enough.
jpnChrName: 奴らがまだ何か企んでいるのは 間違いないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
奴らがまだ何か企んでいるのは
間違いないだろう。

engChrName: Tch. Figures. And here I thought I could finally relax for a bit.
engSearchText:
Tch. Figures. And here I thought I could finally relax
for a bit.
jpnChrName: チッ、ますます事が大きくなってきやがったな。 今後も油断ならねえって事か──
jpnSearchText:
チッ、ますます事が大きくなってきやがったな。
今後も油断ならねえって事か──

engChrName: Well, you catch wind of anything on your end, I'd appreciate it if you kicked it over my way.
engSearchText:
Well, you catch wind of anything on your end, I'd
appreciate it if you kicked it over my way.
jpnChrName: 向こうで何か掴めたら こっちにも流してくれると助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
向こうで何か掴めたら
こっちにも流してくれると助かるぜ。

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: フッ、ああそうしよう。
jpnSearchText: フッ、ああそうしよう。

engChrName: Y'know, credit where it's due, Marielle put out a pretty decent piece on Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Y'know, credit where it's due, Marielle put out a
pretty decent piece on Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ……そういえばマリエルが書いた サルバッドの記事は中々よかった。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばマリエルが書いた
サルバッドの記事は中々よかった。

engChrName: She's been running around all over the place lately, but I guess there's a method to her madness.
engSearchText:
She's been running around all over the place lately,
but I guess there's a method to her madness.
jpnChrName: 近頃は多忙にしているようだし、 ようやく軌道に乗って来たのかもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
近頃は多忙にしているようだし、
ようやく軌道に乗って来たのかもしれないな。

engChrName: I don't know if I'll be able to help out with the plan, but I can at least get you some intel. Leave it to me!
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'll be able to help out with the plan,
but I can at least get you some intel. Leave it to me!
jpnChrName: 作戦に間に合うかは分かりませんが…… 私なりに貴重な取材ができるはずです！
jpnSearchText:
作戦に間に合うかは分かりませんが……
私なりに貴重な取材ができるはずです！

engChrName: Just you watch, Dingo... I'm gonna record Almata's last stand and write the article of a lifetime! This one's for you!
engSearchText:
Just you watch, Dingo... I'm gonna record Almata's
last stand and write the article of a lifetime!
This one's for you!
jpnChrName: アルマータの起こした最後の事件…… ディンゴさんのためにも必ず……！！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの起こした最後の事件……
ディンゴさんのためにも必ず……！！

engChrName: Right now, my plan is to keep interviewing evacuees and track how things are going in the other districts.
engSearchText:
Right now, my plan is to keep interviewing evacuees
and track how things are going in the other districts.
jpnChrName: わたしは引き続き、避難してきた人を取材しつつ…… 他の街区の様子を見て回ろうと思ってます。
jpnSearchText:
わたしは引き続き、避難してきた人を取材しつつ……
他の街区の様子を見て回ろうと思ってます。

engChrName: I'm gonna need some better transportation to bust out of Seiden, but I'll figure something out!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna need some better transportation to bust out
of Seiden, but I'll figure something out!
jpnChrName: サイデン地区を出るには足が必要ですけど。 そこは後でなんとかしてみせますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区を出るには足が必要ですけど。
そこは後でなんとかしてみせますよっ！

engChrName: I can't let anything get between me and the truth.
engSearchText: I can't let anything get between me and the truth.
jpnChrName: だって、どんな時でも 真実を掴むために足を止めない──
jpnSearchText:
だって、どんな時でも
真実を掴むために足を止めない──

engChrName: That's what separates the good journalists from the greats. They stop at nothing to find the truth, and neither will I!
engSearchText:
That's what separates the good journalists from
the greats. They stop at nothing to find the truth, and
neither will I!
jpnChrName: それがわたしの憧れた先輩記者の在り方ですから！
jpnSearchText: それがわたしの憧れた先輩記者の在り方ですから！

engChrName: Good to see you pumped about it.
engSearchText: Good to see you pumped about it.
jpnChrName: ハッ……その意気なんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……その意気なんじゃねえか。

engChrName: But please be careful out there! You can be a little, uh, scatterbrained sometimes.
engSearchText:
But please be careful out there! You can be a little, uh,
scatterbrained sometimes.
jpnChrName: でも気を付けて下さいね！　マリエルさんって おっちょこちょいな所がありますし……
jpnSearchText:
でも気を付けて下さいね！　マリエルさんって
おっちょこちょいな所がありますし……

engChrName: I-I'll be fine, thank you! See, I got this amulet from Fan. It wards off evil for me!
engSearchText:
I-I'll be fine, thank you! See, I got this amulet
from Fan. It wards off evil for me!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫です！ ファンさんから魔除けのお札も貰いましたし！
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫です！
ファンさんから魔除けのお札も貰いましたし！

engChrName: It's right...here? Uhh... Oh, no, where did I put it?
engSearchText: It's right...here? Uhh... Oh, no, where did I put it?
jpnChrName: ……って、あれ？ どこに仕舞ったんだっけ……？
jpnSearchText:
……って、あれ？
どこに仕舞ったんだっけ……？

engChrName: ...So as I was sayin', watch your back out there. I got enough on my plate as is.
engSearchText:
...So as I was sayin', watch your back out there. I got
enough on my plate as is.
jpnChrName: まじで気を付けてくれよ…… 仕事を増やされちゃかなわねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
まじで気を付けてくれよ……
仕事を増やされちゃかなわねえからな。

engChrName: I just... I can't stomach writing an article about this. It's too much...
engSearchText:
I just... I can't stomach writing an article about this.
It's too much...
jpnChrName: この異変の事を記事として使えるかは 分かりませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
この異変の事を記事として使えるかは
分かりませんけど……

engChrName: But I want to at least keep a good record of it... for him. That means keeping tabs on you guys, too.
engSearchText:
But I want to at least keep a good record of it...
for him. That means keeping tabs on you guys, too.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと記録しておきたいと思います。 勿論、解決事務所の皆さんの事も。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと記録しておきたいと思います。
勿論、解決事務所の皆さんの事も。

engChrName: We gotta make sure we stay safe. Wouldn't want to make Dingo worry... He's watching out for us, I'm sure!
engSearchText:
We gotta make sure we stay safe. Wouldn't want to
make Dingo worry... He's watching out for us,
I'm sure!
jpnChrName: きっと見守ってくれてるディンゴさんに 心配をかけない為にも、お互いに頑張りましょう！
jpnSearchText:
きっと見守ってくれてるディンゴさんに
心配をかけない為にも、お互いに頑張りましょう！

engChrName: Nina's not the only one. All of the evacuees are exhausted, physically and mentally...
engSearchText:
Nina's not the only one. All of the evacuees are
exhausted, physically and mentally...
jpnChrName: ニナさんだけでなく、避難してきた皆さんも 心身共に疲弊している様子ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんだけでなく、避難してきた皆さんも
心身共に疲弊している様子ですね。

engChrName: I'll have to try and help however I can.
engSearchText: I'll have to try and help however I can.
jpnChrName: 取材もしつつ、わたしも皆さんのフォローを させてもらいます。
jpnSearchText:
取材もしつつ、わたしも皆さんのフォローを
させてもらいます。

engChrName: You guys stay safe!
engSearchText: You guys stay safe!
jpnChrName: 解決事務所の皆さんもどうかお気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText: 解決事務所の皆さんもどうかお気をつけて……！

engChrName: I've come to realize how much everyone has been supporting me, and how narrow my focus has been.
engSearchText:
I've come to realize how much everyone has been
supporting me, and how narrow my focus has been.
jpnChrName: わたし、他にも皆さんに沢山支えられていたのに…… 目の前の事しか見えてなかったんだなって。
jpnSearchText:
わたし、他にも皆さんに沢山支えられていたのに……
目の前の事しか見えてなかったんだなって。

engChrName: Aww, man. What am I doing getting all teary-eyed at the festival? C-C'mon, haha... I should be enjoying myself!
engSearchText:
Aww, man. What am I doing getting all teary-eyed at
the festival? C-C'mon, haha... I should be
enjoying myself!
jpnChrName: なんて……えへへ、記念祭なのに 泣いてちゃ勿体ないですよね！
jpnSearchText:
なんて……えへへ、記念祭なのに
泣いてちゃ勿体ないですよね！

engChrName: Judith even came over to cheer me up. Right, no crying for me! Gotta turn this frown upside down!
engSearchText:
Judith even came over to cheer me up. Right, no
crying for me! Gotta turn this frown upside down!
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんに励ましてもらっちゃいましたし、 気持ちを切り替えていきますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんに励ましてもらっちゃいましたし、
気持ちを切り替えていきますよっ！

engChrName: Reporters live for moments like these!
engSearchText: Reporters live for moments like these!
jpnChrName: ですから、こういう時こそ記者として……！
jpnSearchText: ですから、こういう時こそ記者として……！

engChrName: To think, after everything in Oración, we bump into each other again... Fate, surely! Now's my chance to repay you for all your help!
engSearchText:
To think, after everything in Oración, we bump into
each other again... Fate, surely! Now's my chance to
repay you for all your help!
jpnChrName: オラシオンでも協力してくれたあなたがここに 来てくれたのも、きっと女神様の導きですっ！
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでも協力してくれたあなたがここに
来てくれたのも、きっと女神様の導きですっ！

engChrName: ...Uh, how? All I did was run away. And really, I'm not good at these joint interviews. Can we just—
engSearchText:
...Uh, how? All I did was run away. And really, I'm
not good at these joint interviews. Can we just—
jpnChrName: え、いや僕はただ逃げてきただけで…… 最早こんなの、取材どころじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
え、いや僕はただ逃げてきただけで……
最早こんなの、取材どころじゃ……

engChrName: Oh, no, no. I just want to tag along as a fellow reporter, y'know?
engSearchText:
Oh, no, no. I just want to tag along as a fellow
reporter, y'know?
jpnChrName: そんな……私を連れて行ってくれるだけでも 良いですから、同じ記者として……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな……私を連れて行ってくれるだけでも
良いですから、同じ記者として……！

engChrName: Okay, fine. But we're just walking together, that's it! We're not WORKING together, we're WALKING, got it?!
engSearchText:
Okay, fine. But we're just walking together, that's it!
We're not WORKING together, we're WALKING,
got it?!
jpnChrName: くっ……ええい！ ほ、本当に送るだけだからな！？
jpnSearchText:
くっ……ええい！
ほ、本当に送るだけだからな！？

engChrName: Fine by me! A real reporter doesn't rely on other people for scoops!
engSearchText:
Fine by me! A real reporter doesn't rely on other
people for scoops!
jpnChrName: 十分です……！　一人の記者として 取材は自分の力でやりますから！
jpnSearchText:
十分です……！　一人の記者として
取材は自分の力でやりますから！

engChrName: ...You drive a hard bargain. Can't help but just follow you and pitch in, feels like.
engSearchText:
...You drive a hard bargain. Can't help but just follow
you and pitch in, feels like.
jpnChrName: ……本当に君は断りにくいというか ペースが乱れるというか……
jpnSearchText:
……本当に君は断りにくいというか
ペースが乱れるというか……

engChrName: I mean, you give a big impassioned speech like that and I just feel inadequate, damn it! Now I HAVE to put my back into it!
engSearchText:
I mean, you give a big impassioned speech like that
and I just feel inadequate, damn it! Now I HAVE to
put my back into it!
jpnChrName: そんな事言われたら、僕も《ＲＧ》の記者として 動かざるを得ないだろう……！？
jpnSearchText:
そんな事言われたら、僕も《ＲＧ》の記者として
動かざるを得ないだろう……！？

engChrName: Heehee! Thanks for the help, Ferdinand!
engSearchText: Heehee! Thanks for the help, Ferdinand!
jpnChrName: えへへ……ありがとうございます、 フェルディナンさん！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……ありがとうございます、
フェルディナンさん！！

engChrName: Well, now. Who could have imagined those jewels I brought along would come in handy?
engSearchText:
Well, now. Who could have imagined those jewels I
brought along would come in handy?
jpnChrName: はは、念の為に持って来た宝石が これほどまでに役立つとはね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、念の為に持って来た宝石が
これほどまでに役立つとはね。

engChrName: With those demon spheres cleared out, Naje and I should be able to hold this area.
engSearchText:
With those demon spheres cleared out, Naje and I
should be able to hold this area.
jpnChrName: 魔球による脅威が去った今、 私とナージェでもこの場は守れるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
魔球による脅威が去った今、
私とナージェでもこの場は守れるだろう。

engChrName: Now, go. The city needs you elsewhere. I trust Arkride Solutions to make good on that request!
engSearchText:
Now, go. The city needs you elsewhere. I trust
Arkride Solutions to make good on that request!
jpnChrName: 君たちは成すべき事を成したまえ。 解決事務所の活躍に期待しているよ。
jpnSearchText:
君たちは成すべき事を成したまえ。
解決事務所の活躍に期待しているよ。

engChrName: I say, this makes my whole trip worth it, right here. What more could a man want?
engSearchText:
I say, this makes my whole trip worth it, right here.
What more could a man want?
jpnChrName: いやはや、このような場が持てるとは 公国から足を伸ばした甲斐があるというものだ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、このような場が持てるとは
公国から足を伸ばした甲斐があるというものだ。

engChrName: These stalls are simply overflowing with wonderful food and drink!
engSearchText:
These stalls are simply overflowing with wonderful
food and drink!
jpnChrName: それに、この屋台に来れた事も喜ばしい限りだよ！
jpnSearchText: それに、この屋台に来れた事も喜ばしい限りだよ！

engChrName: Quite the pleasant change of pace, I must admit— Naje simply has to be a stick in the mud and forbid me from snacking at the hotel.
engSearchText:
Quite the pleasant change of pace, I must admit—
Naje simply has to be a stick in the mud and forbid
me from snacking at the hotel.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、近場のホテルに泊まっているんだが ナージェに買い食いを反対されてしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、近場のホテルに泊まっているんだが
ナージェに買い食いを反対されてしまってね。

engChrName: But today, I am FREE! Oh, the joys of juicy grilled chicken! The refreshing note of cold brew!
engSearchText:
But today, I am FREE! Oh, the joys of juicy grilled
chicken! The refreshing note of cold brew!
jpnChrName: ずっと気になっていたから、 焼き鳥も冷酒も堪能できて満足だよ。
jpnSearchText:
ずっと気になっていたから、
焼き鳥も冷酒も堪能できて満足だよ。

engChrName: Incidentally, his highness is standing by at the hotel.
engSearchText: Incidentally, his highness is standing by at the hotel.
jpnChrName: ちなみに殿下はホテルで 待機していらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに殿下はホテルで
待機していらっしゃいます。

engChrName: This incident is quickly spreading beyond Calvard's borders... We dawdle too long, and we may be unable to contain it.
engSearchText:
This incident is quickly spreading beyond
Calvard's borders... We dawdle too long, and we may
be unable to contain it.
jpnChrName: もはや事態は共和国内だけに 留まるものではありません。
jpnSearchText:
もはや事態は共和国内だけに
留まるものではありません。

engChrName: We'll do what we can on our end. Godspeed, all of you.
engSearchText:
We'll do what we can on our end. Godspeed, all
of you.
jpnChrName: 我々も可能な限り動くとしましょう。 そちらもどうかご武運を。
jpnSearchText:
我々も可能な限り動くとしましょう。
そちらもどうかご武運を。

engChrName: To think this is the work of a single organization... It stands to reason that they have backers in high places.
engSearchText:
To think this is the work of a single organization...
It stands to reason that they have backers in
high places.
jpnChrName: 一介のマフィアに成し得る状況ではないでしょう。 一体どのような裏があるのか……
jpnSearchText:
一介のマフィアに成し得る状況ではないでしょう。
一体どのような裏があるのか……

engChrName: At any rate, we'll continue our reconnaissance and report our findings to you. Please, stay safe.
engSearchText:
At any rate, we'll continue our reconnaissance and
report our findings to you. Please, stay safe.
jpnChrName: ともかく、我々もこちらで情報収集を続けます。 皆様の方もどうかお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、我々もこちらで情報収集を続けます。
皆様の方もどうかお気をつけて。

engChrName: I swear, I take my eyes off Shaheena for one second, and she just blossoms into a responsible young lady.
engSearchText:
I swear, I take my eyes off Shaheena for one second,
and she just blossoms into a responsible young lady.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナも、少し見ない間に 頼もしくなったように思います。
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナも、少し見ない間に
頼もしくなったように思います。

engChrName: At this rate, she's going to eclipse my big sister energy—and I can't have that! I have to do what I can to lift everybody's spirits!
engSearchText:
At this rate, she's going to eclipse my big sister
energy—and I can't have that! I have to do what I can
to lift everybody's spirits!
jpnChrName: ふふ、私も姉として負けていられません。 こんな状況だからこそ前を向かないと……！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私も姉として負けていられません。
こんな状況だからこそ前を向かないと……！

engChrName: Even the evacuees are getting back on their feet. That's good!
engSearchText:
Even the evacuees are getting back on their feet.
That's good!
jpnChrName: ふふ、避難をして来た皆さんも 少しずつ調子を取り戻しているみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、避難をして来た皆さんも
少しずつ調子を取り戻しているみたいですね。

engChrName: I'll try and help out the hotel staff however I can.
engSearchText: I'll try and help out the hotel staff however I can.
jpnChrName: 私もホテルの皆さんの お手伝いをさせていただくつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私もホテルの皆さんの
お手伝いをさせていただくつもりです。

engChrName: I don't know the specifics about what's going on, but I trust Shaheena and all of you to take care of it. I just gotta do what I can!
engSearchText:
I don't know the specifics about what's going on, but
I trust Shaheena and all of you to take care of it. I just
gotta do what I can!
jpnChrName: ……難しい事情があるようですが、 私も、きっとシャヒーナも皆さんを信じていますから。
jpnSearchText:
……難しい事情があるようですが、
私も、きっとシャヒーナも皆さんを信じていますから。

engChrName: Come back safely, okay? I'd hate for you to get hurt out there!
engSearchText:
Come back safely, okay? I'd hate for you to get hurt
out there!
jpnChrName: どうか気を付けて。 怪我のないように行って来て下さいね……！
jpnSearchText:
どうか気を付けて。
怪我のないように行って来て下さいね……！

engChrName: Shaheena said she was gonna meet up with some friends of hers over at the bathhouse.
engSearchText:
Shaheena said she was gonna meet up with some
friends of hers over at the bathhouse.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナは前に約束をした方たちと 公衆浴場へ行っているはずですよ。
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナは前に約束をした方たちと
公衆浴場へ行っているはずですよ。

engChrName: It's really nice to see her making new friends.
engSearchText: It's really nice to see her making new friends.
jpnChrName: あの子にもお友達が増えたみたいで嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText: あの子にもお友達が増えたみたいで嬉しいです。

engChrName: And everyone has been so kind to me as well. I really feel like I've made some lifelong friends, heehee.
engSearchText:
And everyone has been so kind to me as well. I really
feel like I've made some lifelong friends, heehee.
jpnChrName: それに私の方も皆さんにとても良くして頂いて。 ふふ、この縁は大切にしていきたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それに私の方も皆さんにとても良くして頂いて。
ふふ、この縁は大切にしていきたいですね。

engChrName: Wow! Bet you could haul all kinds of stuff with a car that big!
engSearchText:
Wow! Bet you could haul all kinds of stuff with a car
that big!
jpnChrName: これだけおっきい車なら たくさん運べそうだよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
これだけおっきい車なら
たくさん運べそうだよねっ！

engChrName: Oh, looks like the whole Arkride gang is here.
engSearchText: Oh, looks like the whole Arkride gang is here.
jpnChrName: 解決事務所のみんなも 全員集まれたみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所のみんなも
全員集まれたみたいだし……

engChrName: Make sure you come back okay! We'll be waiting for you!
engSearchText:
Make sure you come back okay! We'll be waiting
for you!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ぜったい無事に帰ってきてよね！ あたしたち、待ってるから！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ぜったい無事に帰ってきてよね！
あたしたち、待ってるから！！

engChrName: *sniffle* Thank the Goddess you're safe!
engSearchText: *sniffle* Thank the Goddess you're safe!
jpnChrName: ぐすっ、お姉が無事でよかったよぉ～！
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ、お姉が無事でよかったよぉ～！

engChrName: You, too, Shaheena. You, too... You really stepped up today.
engSearchText:
You, too, Shaheena. You, too... You really stepped
up today.
jpnChrName: ふふ、シャヒーナこそ…… 危険な街中をよく頑張って来てくれたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、シャヒーナこそ……
危険な街中をよく頑張って来てくれたわね。

engChrName: Good, the sisters are back together. That's one less thing to worry about.
engSearchText:
Good, the sisters are back together. That's one less
thing to worry about.
jpnChrName: おっと……無事に合流出来たみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: おっと……無事に合流出来たみてえだな。

engChrName: Yeah, I ran into this racer guy, and he gave me a lift in his car!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I ran into this racer guy, and he gave me a lift
in his car!
jpnChrName: うん、途中で走り屋って人達の車に 乗せてもらったりして来たんだ！
jpnSearchText:
うん、途中で走り屋って人達の車に
乗せてもらったりして来たんだ！

engChrName: And that chief guy came along, too, so we all made it out okay!
engSearchText:
And that chief guy came along, too, so we all made it
out okay!
jpnChrName: あの警部さんも付いててくれたし、 なんとかね！
jpnSearchText:
あの警部さんも付いててくれたし、
なんとかね！

engChrName: Sorry for worrying you guys.
engSearchText: Sorry for worrying you guys.
jpnChrName: 皆さんにも心配をおかけしました。
jpnSearchText: 皆さんにも心配をおかけしました。

engChrName: It's okay! We're just happy you two found each other.
engSearchText: It's okay! We're just happy you two found each other.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、お二人が無事に 合流できて良かったです！
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、お二人が無事に
合流できて良かったです！

engChrName: But what's with the limo and all these boxes, out of curiosity?
engSearchText:
But what's with the limo and all these boxes, out
of curiosity?
jpnChrName: それにしても…… このリムジンにダンボールは一体……？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……
このリムジンにダンボールは一体……？

engChrName: The boxes are full of supplies we procured from the police station.
engSearchText:
The boxes are full of supplies we procured from the
police station.
jpnChrName: そちらは警察署にあった備品です。 突入作戦に必要な資材だとか──
jpnSearchText:
そちらは警察署にあった備品です。
突入作戦に必要な資材だとか──

engChrName: And with His Highness' limousine, we'll be delivering these supplies to areas that need them.
engSearchText:
And with His Highness' limousine, we'll be delivering
these supplies to areas that need them.
jpnChrName: 他にも足りない資材をかき集めて 殿下のリムジンで例の地点に運搬する予定ですね。
jpnSearchText:
他にも足りない資材をかき集めて
殿下のリムジンで例の地点に運搬する予定ですね。

engChrName: Ah, that's a good idea. Best of luck!
engSearchText: Ah, that's a good idea. Best of luck!
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね…… 私たちも心強いです。
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんですね……
私たちも心強いです。

engChrName: Most vehicles have been halted out on the roads, but a few are still moving... The common link being that they all relate to Van.
engSearchText:
Most vehicles have been halted out on the roads, but
a few are still moving... The common link being that
they all relate to Van.
jpnChrName: 動かない車両がほとんどらしいけど、 ヴァンさんと“縁がある”ものは動くって事か。
jpnSearchText:
動かない車両がほとんどらしいけど、
ヴァンさんと“縁がある”ものは動くって事か。

engChrName: Yeeeah, haha, all that stuff's kinda over my head. But we'll still pitch in!
engSearchText:
Yeeeah, haha, all that stuff's kinda over my head.
But we'll still pitch in!
jpnChrName: えへへ、よく分かんないけど あたしたちも手伝うよ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、よく分かんないけど
あたしたちも手伝うよ！

engChrName: Yeah. Now's our chance to pay everyone back for all their help!
engSearchText:
Yeah. Now's our chance to pay everyone back for all
their help!
jpnChrName: ええ、今まで色々助けて頂きましたし。 一緒に頑張りましょう！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今まで色々助けて頂きましたし。
一緒に頑張りましょう！

engChrName: Thanks much. I'll leave that to you.
engSearchText: Thanks much. I'll leave that to you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは有り難ぇ…… それじゃ後の事は宜しく頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そいつは有り難ぇ……
それじゃ後の事は宜しく頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Indeed. I wish you the best of luck.
engSearchText: Indeed. I wish you the best of luck.
jpnChrName: ええ、皆さんの方もご武運を。
jpnSearchText: ええ、皆さんの方もご武運を。

engChrName: So you guys ended up here, too... I'm aware there's a plan to break through this mess.
engSearchText:
So you guys ended up here, too... I'm aware there's a
plan to break through this mess.
jpnChrName: お前達か……状況打破のために動きがあるのは こちらも把握しているのでな。
jpnSearchText:
お前達か……状況打破のために動きがあるのは
こちらも把握しているのでな。

engChrName: We're down on manpower 'cause of this whole 'freezing' thing, but we'll do what we can to help.
engSearchText:
We're down on manpower 'cause of this whole
'freezing' thing, but we'll do what we can to help.
jpnChrName: 警察でも可能な限りの事をするつもりだ。 まあ、“動ける”者は限られるが……
jpnSearchText:
警察でも可能な限りの事をするつもりだ。
まあ、“動ける”者は限られるが……

engChrName: Yeah, we're heading out for Vantail in a bit. We'll leave the inner city to you.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're heading out for Vantail in a bit.
We'll leave the inner city to you.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺達もじきにヴァンタイユに突入する、 街の治安はあんたらに任せるとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺達もじきにヴァンタイユに突入する、
街の治安はあんたらに任せるとするぜ。

engChrName: Actually, you been to Old Town? We don't have the time to check ourselves. Everything okay over there?
engSearchText:
Actually, you been to Old Town? We don't have the
time to check ourselves. Everything okay over there?
jpnChrName: それはそうと……旧市街の方は大丈夫か？ 俺達は戻る余裕も無さそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと……旧市街の方は大丈夫か？
俺達は戻る余裕も無さそうだが……

engChrName: Yeah, that lady running the tobacco kiosk is rounding everybody up. All things considered, they should be fine.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that lady running the tobacco kiosk is rounding
everybody up. All things considered, they should
be fine.
jpnChrName: ああ、あのタバコ屋のご婦人が皆を纏めて くれていてな、かなり安定している。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのタバコ屋のご婦人が皆を纏めて
くれていてな、かなり安定している。

engChrName: I couldn't stay, though. Man of the law. This is my responsibility now.
engSearchText:
I couldn't stay, though. Man of the law. This is my
responsibility now.
jpnChrName: 俺も警察の一員として、いつまでもあの場だけに 留まる訳にもいくまい……
jpnSearchText:
俺も警察の一員として、いつまでもあの場だけに
留まる訳にもいくまい……

engChrName: My family's taking shelter over at Montmart...and I'm out here trying to figure out this mess.
engSearchText:
My family's taking shelter over at Montmart...and I'm
out here trying to figure out this mess.
jpnChrName: 家族もモンマルトに預け、事態そのものの 解決のために身を賭すつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
家族もモンマルトに預け、事態そのものの
解決のために身を賭すつもりだ。

engChrName: Yeah, that tracks. Old Town folks are tough as nails.
engSearchText: Yeah, that tracks. Old Town folks are tough as nails.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……まあ、確かに 旧市街の連中も骨がある。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……まあ、確かに
旧市街の連中も骨がある。

engChrName: That old lady knows what she's doin'. They'll be all right.
engSearchText:
That old lady knows what she's doin'. They'll be
all right.
jpnChrName: 婆さんが纏めてくれてんなら安心だろう。
jpnSearchText: 婆さんが纏めてくれてんなら安心だろう。

engChrName: Yeah. And I called some officers out there for backup, just to make sure.
engSearchText:
Yeah. And I called some officers out there for
backup, just to make sure.
jpnChrName: ああ、一応警官の派遣も手配したし、 あの場はひとまず大丈夫だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一応警官の派遣も手配したし、
あの場はひとまず大丈夫だろう。

engChrName: I'm planning to gather up some officers and sweep around town for...
engSearchText:
I'm planning to gather up some officers and sweep
around town for...
jpnChrName: 俺は他の部下と共に首都全域の──
jpnSearchText: 俺は他の部下と共に首都全域の──

engChrName: ...Hmph. I can just hear her chewing me out for putting my job first again.
engSearchText:
...Hmph. I can just hear her chewing me out for
putting my job first again.
jpnChrName: フッ、これでは事件が終わった後、また 家族に仕事ばかりと呆れられてしまうな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、これでは事件が終わった後、また
家族に仕事ばかりと呆れられてしまうな。

engChrName: Old Town is as safe as we can reasonably get it, so I'm gonna head out to the other districts and get them under control.
engSearchText:
Old Town is as safe as we can reasonably get it, so
I'm gonna head out to the other districts and get
them under control.
jpnChrName: 旧市街の安全はある程度確保できている、 俺は首都全域の解放のため動くつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
旧市街の安全はある程度確保できている、
俺は首都全域の解放のため動くつもりだ。

engChrName: *sigh* Here I am, leaving my family behind to go out on the job. Again. How am I gonna make it up to them once this is all over...?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Here I am, leaving my family behind to go out
on the job. Again. How am I gonna make it up to
them once this is all over...?
jpnChrName: フ……またしても家族は残してきてしまった、 事件が終わったら何か詫びてやらんとな。
jpnSearchText:
フ……またしても家族は残してきてしまった、
事件が終わったら何か詫びてやらんとな。

engChrName: Longlai? I heard things can get a little sketchy there, being a border town and all, but it's supposed to be pretty safe otherwise.
engSearchText:
Longlai? I heard things can get a little sketchy there,
being a border town and all, but it's supposed to be
pretty safe otherwise.
jpnChrName: しかし龍來か……あそこも国境の町故の苦労も あるとは聞くが、基本的には穏やかな町だ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし龍來か……あそこも国境の町故の苦労も
あるとは聞くが、基本的には穏やかな町だ。

engChrName: Don't you cause any trouble there.
engSearchText: Don't you cause any trouble there.
jpnChrName: まあ、せいぜいあっちでも 問題は起こさないようにする事だな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、せいぜいあっちでも
問題は起こさないようにする事だな。

engChrName: Seems like wherever you go, Gehenna seems to follow. Hopefully this time you keep your nose outta trouble.
engSearchText:
Seems like wherever you go, Gehenna seems
to follow. Hopefully this time you keep your nose
outta trouble.
jpnChrName: 行く先々で事件を引き寄せているお前も、 今回は流石に落ち着いてみるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
行く先々で事件を引き寄せているお前も、
今回は流石に落ち着いてみるがいい。

engChrName: Longlai? I heard things can get a little sketchy there, being a border town and all, but it's supposed to be pretty safe otherwise.
engSearchText:
Longlai? I heard things can get a little sketchy there,
being a border town and all, but it's supposed to be
pretty safe otherwise.
jpnChrName: しかし龍來か……あそこも国境の町故の苦労も あるとは聞くが、基本的には穏やかな町だ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし龍來か……あそこも国境の町故の苦労も
あるとは聞くが、基本的には穏やかな町だ。

engChrName: Don't you cause any trouble there.
engSearchText: Don't you cause any trouble there.
jpnChrName: まあ、せいぜいあっちでも 問題は起こさないようにする事だな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、せいぜいあっちでも
問題は起こさないようにする事だな。

engChrName: Seems like wherever you go, Gehenna seems to follow. Hopefully this time you keep your nose outta trouble.
engSearchText:
Seems like wherever you go, Gehenna seems
to follow. Hopefully this time you keep your nose
outta trouble.
jpnChrName: 行く先々で事件を引き寄せているお前も、 今回は流石に落ち着いてみるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
行く先々で事件を引き寄せているお前も、
今回は流石に落ち着いてみるがいい。

engChrName: On the subject of trouble, we're sending some officers to Tharbad in case anything funny happens at the Film Festival.
engSearchText:
On the subject of trouble, we're sending some officers
to Tharbad in case anything funny happens at the
Film Festival.
jpnChrName: ……そういう訳で、サルバッドでは 映画祭警備での警官派遣も予定されているが……
jpnSearchText:
……そういう訳で、サルバッドでは
映画祭警備での警官派遣も予定されているが……

engChrName: Had this source tip us off that something might be brewing over there...
engSearchText:
Had this source tip us off that something might be
brewing over there...
jpnChrName: 別口で、気になる情報もあってな。
jpnSearchText: 別口で、気になる情報もあってな。

engChrName: It may very well be just a rumor, but I got a hunch it's not. We might need you for backup if things go south.
engSearchText:
It may very well be just a rumor, but I got a hunch
it's not. We might need you for backup if things
go south.
jpnChrName: 杞憂であれば良いが……悪い予感が当たれば、 お前達や現地警察の力も必要かもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
杞憂であれば良いが……悪い予感が当たれば、
お前達や現地警察の力も必要かもしれん。

engChrName: I can't give any details beyond that, but just be ready for anything.
engSearchText:
I can't give any details beyond that, but just be ready
for anything.
jpnChrName: 詳しい事はまだ伏せるが、 意識しておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
詳しい事はまだ伏せるが、
意識しておいてくれ。

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: はっ、了解しました警部殿！
jpnSearchText: はっ、了解しました警部殿！

engChrName: So you're here, too. I heard from Inspector Daswani that you're involved with this plan going forward.
engSearchText:
So you're here, too. I heard from Inspector Daswani
that you're involved with this plan going forward.
jpnChrName: あんた達も来ていたか……ダスワニ警部から 作戦に参加するって話は聞いたよ。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達も来ていたか……ダスワニ警部から
作戦に参加するって話は聞いたよ。

engChrName: Never thought I'd work with a spriggan on this, but desperate times and all. We're counting on you.
engSearchText:
Never thought I'd work with a spriggan on this, but
desperate times and all. We're counting on you.
jpnChrName: まあ、裏解決屋にこういう事を言うのも 何だけど……頑張ってくれ、本当に。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、裏解決屋にこういう事を言うのも
何だけど……頑張ってくれ、本当に。

engChrName: I'll do what I can here to help the inspector out.
engSearchText: I'll do what I can here to help the inspector out.
jpnChrName: 僕も一応、ダスワニ警部の部下として ここで出来る限りの事をするからさ。
jpnSearchText:
僕も一応、ダスワニ警部の部下として
ここで出来る限りの事をするからさ。

engChrName: We've got Tyrell locked down with the help of the guild, so I headed out here to try and get this area under control.
engSearchText:
We've got Tyrell locked down with the help of the
guild, so I headed out here to try and get this area
under control.
jpnChrName: タイレル地区は現地の警官や遊撃士がしっかり やってくれてるし、僕もこっちに来れたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
タイレル地区は現地の警官や遊撃士がしっかり
やってくれてるし、僕もこっちに来れたんだ。

engChrName: I had to leave my girlfriend for this...again. I really can't keep doing that... I gotta treat her right from now on.
engSearchText:
I had to leave my girlfriend for this...again. I really
can't keep doing that... I gotta treat her right from
now on.
jpnChrName: 彼女は……まあ、またほったらかしに しちゃったけど、やっぱりやり直したいな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は……まあ、またほったらかしに
しちゃったけど、やっぱりやり直したいな。

engChrName: Once this is all done, I'm gonna try to make it up to her one more... No, I won't TRY. I WILL!
engSearchText:
Once this is all done, I'm gonna try to make it up to
her one more... No, I won't TRY. I WILL!
jpnChrName: 彼女に謝ってやり直せる日常を取り戻す ためにも、今は僕に出来る事を……！
jpnSearchText:
彼女に謝ってやり直せる日常を取り戻す
ためにも、今は僕に出来る事を……！

engChrName: Oookay. Gonna take that day off, and then we'll have a nice little dinner date and a hotel stay for the night!
engSearchText:
Oookay. Gonna take that day off, and then we'll have
a nice little dinner date and a hotel stay for the night!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ早速有休を取って…… ホテルやディナーの予約もしないといけないな！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ早速有休を取って……
ホテルやディナーの予約もしないといけないな！

engChrName: Heh, don't worry. I've got the mira. May not look it, but I'm pretty well off as an investigator.
engSearchText:
Heh, don't worry. I've got the mira. May not look it,
but I'm pretty well off as an investigator.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、ミラの心配はしなくていいよ。 こう見えて僕ってデキる捜査官だからさっ！
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、ミラの心配はしなくていいよ。
こう見えて僕ってデキる捜査官だからさっ！

engChrName: Okay, I think I can get that day off. No way I'm turning you down this time.
engSearchText:
Okay, I think I can get that day off. No way I'm
turning you down this time.
jpnChrName: まあ、その日は休み取れそうだし そこまで言われたら断りにくいし……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その日は休み取れそうだし
そこまで言われたら断りにくいし……

engChrName: It's a date, then. Just make sure it's a good one, won't you?
engSearchText:
It's a date, then. Just make sure it's a good one,
won't you?
jpnChrName: ……わかった、その代わり ちゃんと楽しませてよね！？
jpnSearchText:
……わかった、その代わり
ちゃんと楽しませてよね！？

engChrName: So, what do you think of the Tharbad Film Festival? Would you be interested in going at all, just the two of us?
engSearchText:
So, what do you think of the Tharbad Film Festival?
Would you be interested in going at all, just the two
of us?
jpnChrName: なぁ、どうだい？　サルバッド映画祭、 僕らの初めての旅行にピッタリじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
なぁ、どうだい？　サルバッド映画祭、
僕らの初めての旅行にピッタリじゃないか！

engChrName: Hmm... Well, it does sound kinda fun.
engSearchText: Hmm... Well, it does sound kinda fun.
jpnChrName: え～……まあ、興味が無い訳じゃないけど……
jpnSearchText: え～……まあ、興味が無い訳じゃないけど……

engChrName: But it's only been two weeks since we really got to know each other. For a first date, that seems a little, uh...much?
engSearchText:
But it's only been two weeks since we really got to
know each other. For a first date, that seems a little,
uh...much?
jpnChrName: この前、しつこい客引きから助けてくれて 付き合い始めて２週間──初めてのデートがそれ？
jpnSearchText:
この前、しつこい客引きから助けてくれて
付き合い始めて２週間──初めてのデートがそれ？

engChrName: It just feels a little fast to me, I guess.
engSearchText: It just feels a little fast to me, I guess.
jpnChrName: ちょっと本格的すぎるって気も……
jpnSearchText: ちょっと本格的すぎるって気も……

engChrName: I get that, yeah, but time off is few and far between. I gotta seize the day, y'know?
engSearchText:
I get that, yeah, but time off is few and far between.
I gotta seize the day, y'know?
jpnChrName: だからこそだって、僕も忙しくて 中々デートできなかったし！
jpnSearchText:
だからこそだって、僕も忙しくて
中々デートできなかったし！

engChrName: And then I thought: what better way to spend my day off than with you?
engSearchText:
And then I thought: what better way to spend my day
off than with you?
jpnChrName: お互いを知るためにもピッタリかなってさ！
jpnSearchText: お互いを知るためにもピッタリかなってさ！

engChrName: Ehh... Like, I see your point.
engSearchText: Ehh... Like, I see your point.
jpnChrName: う～ん、ちゃんと考えて くれてるんならいいケド……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、ちゃんと考えて
くれてるんならいいケド……

engChrName: But I'd better not see you drooling over the dancers while we're there, got it?
engSearchText:
But I'd better not see you drooling over the dancers
while we're there, got it?
jpnChrName: その代わり、向こうでホステスとかに 鼻の下伸ばすんじゃないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
その代わり、向こうでホステスとかに
鼻の下伸ばすんじゃないわよ？

engChrName: Well, of course! I'll have a hard enough time keeping my eyes off of YOU, honey.
engSearchText:
Well, of course! I'll have a hard enough time keeping
my eyes off of YOU, honey.
jpnChrName: まさかぁ～！　君がいるのに そんな事する訳がないじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
まさかぁ～！　君がいるのに
そんな事する訳がないじゃないか！

engChrName: Everyone needs to relieve stress every now and then— that's exactly what these places are for.
engSearchText:
Everyone needs to relieve stress every now and then—
that's exactly what these places are for.
jpnChrName: たまには息抜きもいいでしょう。 こういった場を設けるのも意義ある事よ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには息抜きもいいでしょう。
こういった場を設けるのも意義ある事よ。

engChrName: Why not have a seat? I'll take care of the bill for you.
engSearchText: Why not have a seat? I'll take care of the bill for you.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちも気が向いたら同席なさい。 経費で落としてあげるわよ？
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちも気が向いたら同席なさい。
経費で落としてあげるわよ？

engChrName: (Freakin' suits tryin' to butter me up with free shit. René pulls this all the time, too!)
engSearchText:
(Freakin' suits tryin' to butter me up with free shit.
René pulls this all the time, too!)
jpnChrName: （くっ、ルネの野郎といい……   これだから政府のお偉いさんはよ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（くっ、ルネの野郎といい……
これだから政府のお偉いさんはよ……！）

engChrName: We'll be entrusting Almata's artifacts to the church... and the 'leftovers' will fall under Heiyue's jurisdiction.
engSearchText:
We'll be entrusting Almata's artifacts to the church...
and the 'leftovers' will fall under Heiyue's jurisdiction.
jpnChrName: アルマータの“遺産”に関しては黒月に。 禁制古代遺物に関しては教会に任せてあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの“遺産”に関しては黒月に。
禁制古代遺物に関しては教会に任せてあるわ。

engChrName: The CID and the guild should make quick work of what stragglers remain.
engSearchText:
The CID and the guild should make quick work of
what stragglers remain.
jpnChrName: 残党の処理に関してはＣＩＤや遊撃士の方で 問題なく対処できるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
残党の処理に関してはＣＩＤや遊撃士の方で
問題なく対処できるでしょう。

engChrName: Melchior is still a concern, being one of their most prominent leaders, but we haven't noticed any moves from him as of late.
engSearchText:
Melchior is still a concern, being one of their most
prominent leaders, but we haven't noticed any moves
from him as of late.
jpnChrName: 幹部メルキオルは懸念事項だけれど 今の所大きな動きは無さそうね。
jpnSearchText:
幹部メルキオルは懸念事項だけれど
今の所大きな動きは無さそうね。

engChrName: Not that we should write them off just yet. We'll need to stay vigilant.
engSearchText:
Not that we should write them off just yet.
We'll need to stay vigilant.
jpnChrName: とはいえ油断はならない── 貴方達も留意しておくべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ油断はならない──
貴方達も留意しておくべきでしょう。

engChrName: I don't know if Cao's going to be able to make the capture, but either way, we should gather up some troops and head that way.
engSearchText:
I don't know if Cao's going to be able to make the
capture, but either way, we should gather up some
troops and head that way.
jpnChrName: ツァオの方は捕まるか分からないが、 配下を集める為にもあそこに向かうとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオの方は捕まるか分からないが、
配下を集める為にもあそこに向かうとしようか。

engChrName: Here's hoping you can meet up with the people you're looking for there, too, Aaron and Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
Here's hoping you can meet up with the people you're
looking for there, too, Aaron and Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: アークライド君、それにアーロン。 そちらも仲間との無事の合流出来る事を祈っているよ。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド君、それにアーロン。
そちらも仲間との無事の合流出来る事を祈っているよ。

engChrName: That's the plan. Don't throw your back out, all right?
engSearchText: That's the plan. Don't throw your back out, all right?
jpnChrName: ああ、オッサンも気を付けてな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、オッサンも気を付けてな。

engChrName: The fiends out there aren't trying to get inside any buildings, from the looks of it. Perhaps they're... forbidden, somehow.
engSearchText:
The fiends out there aren't trying to get inside any
buildings, from the looks of it. Perhaps they're...
forbidden, somehow.
jpnChrName: 悪鬼は建物内部には侵入して来ないのか…… そこにも何らかの法則性がありそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
悪鬼は建物内部には侵入して来ないのか……
そこにも何らかの法則性がありそうだが。

engChrName: At any rate, you can leave the hotel to us. I'm a touch rusty, but I still remember my arts.
engSearchText:
At any rate, you can leave the hotel to us. I'm a touch
rusty, but I still remember my arts.
jpnChrName: ともかく、ホテルの守りは私に任せて行って来るといい。 久しいとはいえ私も符術には通じている方だからね。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、ホテルの守りは私に任せて行って来るといい。
久しいとはいえ私も符術には通じている方だからね。

engChrName: Take care of yourself out there, Aaron.
engSearchText: Take care of yourself out there, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロンも気を付けて行ってくるように。
jpnSearchText: アーロンも気を付けて行ってくるように。

engChrName: Heh. Speak for yourself.
engSearchText: Heh. Speak for yourself.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せときやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せときやがれ。

engChrName: Haha... I imagine I'll have some interesting conversations with the former president and the crown prince.
engSearchText:
Haha... I imagine I'll have some interesting
conversations with the former president and
the crown prince.
jpnChrName: ふふ、閣下も公太子も型にはまらない方々でね。 とても興味深い話を聞かせてもらっているよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、閣下も公太子も型にはまらない方々でね。
とても興味深い話を聞かせてもらっているよ。

engChrName: They're both quite unconventional fellows... Ones you don't often get to talk with. Those connections must be handled with care.
engSearchText:
They're both quite unconventional fellows...
Ones you don't often get to talk with.
Those connections must be handled with care.
jpnChrName: 今後ともこの縁を 大切にしていきたいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
今後ともこの縁を
大切にしていきたいものだ。

engChrName: I'm impressed you tracked down this little meeting of ours, Mr. Arkride. As I'd heard, you've a keen eye and a sharper nose.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed you tracked down this little meeting of
ours, Mr. Arkride. As I'd heard, you've a keen eye
and a sharper nose.
jpnChrName: 君たちがこの会議に居合わせた所をみるに、 やはりアークライド君の“嗅覚”は本物だな。
jpnSearchText:
君たちがこの会議に居合わせた所をみるに、
やはりアークライド君の“嗅覚”は本物だな。

engChrName: At any rate, Ashen should be here for the festival. It would be nice if you could show her a good time.
engSearchText:
At any rate, Ashen should be here for the festival.
It would be nice if you could show her a good time.
jpnChrName: ともかく、記念祭にはアシェンも遊びに来るはずだ。 その時はどうか遊んであげてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、記念祭にはアシェンも遊びに来るはずだ。
その時はどうか遊んであげてくれ。

engChrName: Yeah! It's been two months already... I can't wait to see her again!
engSearchText:
Yeah! It's been two months already... I can't wait to
see her again!
jpnChrName: えへへ、あれから２ヶ月ですし わたしたちも楽しみですっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、あれから２ヶ月ですし
わたしたちも楽しみですっ！

engChrName: Yeah, I don't mind. Long as she keeps her opinions to herself.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I don't mind. Long as she keeps her opinions
to herself.
jpnChrName: ま、小言さえなきゃ歓迎してやるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、小言さえなきゃ歓迎してやるぜ。

engChrName: Said the pot to the kettle.
engSearchText: Said the pot to the kettle.
jpnChrName: ってお前も自信満々に言ってんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ってお前も自信満々に言ってんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: The storm has subsided for the moment...but we can hardly tell when it may return.
engSearchText:
The storm has subsided for the moment...but we can
hardly tell when it may return.
jpnChrName: ひとまず安全は確保できたようだが 事態は依然、予断を許さない状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず安全は確保できたようだが
事態は依然、予断を許さない状況だ。

engChrName: I wish I had a better grasp of the situation, but alas, I cannot redraw my cards. We will play with the hands we're dealt.
engSearchText:
I wish I had a better grasp of the situation, but alas, I
cannot redraw my cards. We will play with the hands
we're dealt.
jpnChrName: 気になることもあるが── 今は確実に打てる手を打っていくしかなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
気になることもあるが──
今は確実に打てる手を打っていくしかなさそうだ。

engChrName: I'll be assisting myself, in Heiyue's name.
engSearchText: I'll be assisting myself, in Heiyue's name.
jpnChrName: 私も黒月として動かせてもらうつもりだよ。
jpnSearchText: 私も黒月として動かせてもらうつもりだよ。

engChrName: You can leave the hotel perimeter to me. I should be able to handle these beasts myself.
engSearchText:
You can leave the hotel perimeter to me. I should be
able to handle these beasts myself.
jpnChrName: ええ、ホテル近辺の警護はお任せを。 今なら私一人で対処できるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ホテル近辺の警護はお任せを。
今なら私一人で対処できるでしょう。

engChrName: Sounds good. We're countin' on you.
engSearchText: Sounds good. We're countin' on you.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そいつは頼もしい限りだ。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そいつは頼もしい限りだ。

engChrName: Shock and awe...but we've no time to dawdle. We need to intercept these villains and put an end to their plans.
engSearchText:
Shock and awe...but we've no time to dawdle.
We need to intercept these villains and put an end to
their plans.
jpnChrName: 未曾有の事態ではあるが 連中の思惑は絶対に阻止しなくてはならない。
jpnSearchText:
未曾有の事態ではあるが
連中の思惑は絶対に阻止しなくてはならない。

engChrName: And then, once this mess is over, we can all get back to our regularly-scheduled festival cheer.
engSearchText:
And then, once this mess is over, we can all get back
to our regularly-scheduled festival cheer.
jpnChrName: 早い所この状況を解決して 楽しい記念祭に戻ろうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
早い所この状況を解決して
楽しい記念祭に戻ろうじゃないか。

engChrName: After all, I had only just begun to let loose before I was so rudely interrupted!
engSearchText:
After all, I had only just begun to let loose before I
was so rudely interrupted!
jpnChrName: 色々と巡りたい所をチェックしていたんだが、 まだ満足に遊べていなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
色々と巡りたい所をチェックしていたんだが、
まだ満足に遊べていなくてね。

engChrName: Pfft, get a load of this guy. There's absentminded and then there's that.
engSearchText:
Pfft, get a load of this guy. There's absentminded and
then there's that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何をお気楽な事をと 言いてえ所だが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、何をお気楽な事をと
言いてえ所だが……

engChrName: Hey, I'm with him. I've still got a buncha candy and pastry places on my bucket list.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm with him. I've still got a buncha candy and
pastry places on my bucket list.
jpnChrName: ええ、俺もまだ食べられてない 記念祭限定スイーツが待ってますからね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、俺もまだ食べられてない
記念祭限定スイーツが待ってますからね。

engChrName: I'm all for wrappin' this up ASAP, and you should be, too. Y'know, for uhh...peace. And shit.
engSearchText:
I'm all for wrappin' this up ASAP, and you should
be, too. Y'know, for uhh...peace. And shit.
jpnChrName: きっちり落とし前を付けて また祭り騒ぎといきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
きっちり落とし前を付けて
また祭り騒ぎといきましょう。

engChrName: Indeed. Arkride Solutions, don't fail me now!
engSearchText: Indeed. Arkride Solutions, don't fail me now!
jpnChrName: ああ…… 解決事務所諸君の活躍に期待しているよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
解決事務所諸君の活躍に期待しているよ。

engChrName: Incidentally, the clamor in Langport has subsided for the time being.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, the clamor in Langport has subsided for
the time being.
jpnChrName: ちなみにラングポートの情勢としては 落ち着いたものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにラングポートの情勢としては
落ち着いたものですよ。

engChrName: I heard your comrades may have been mixed up in all the chaos, there.
engSearchText:
I heard your comrades may have been mixed up in all
the chaos, there.
jpnChrName: 揉め事の際には、貴方の仲間が 奮闘するという一幕もあったようですしね。
jpnSearchText:
揉め事の際には、貴方の仲間が
奮闘するという一幕もあったようですしね。

engChrName: But I must say, those young men do inspire confidence in me. The future is in good hands with their types at the helm.
engSearchText:
But I must say, those young men do inspire
confidence in me. The future is in good hands with
their types at the helm.
jpnChrName: フフ、将来有望な若者が多く 私としても安心している所ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、将来有望な若者が多く
私としても安心している所ですよ。

engChrName: Syd and the boys, huh? Good to hear they're doing all right.
engSearchText:
Syd and the boys, huh? Good to hear they're doing
all right.
jpnChrName: シド達か……連絡も取ってるが 元気でやってるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
シド達か……連絡も取ってるが
元気でやってるみてえだな。

engChrName: Might as well kick back with them if they're coming on down for the festival.
engSearchText:
Might as well kick back with them if they're coming
on down for the festival.
jpnChrName: 記念祭にも顔を出すとか言ってたし、 せいぜいイジってやるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭にも顔を出すとか言ってたし、
せいぜいイジってやるとするか。

engChrName: I'm sure you're aware, but taking that group out of the equation has shaken things up here in Edith.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you're aware, but taking that group out of the
equation has shaken things up here in Edith.
jpnChrName: 分かっていると思うが、《Ａ》が消えた事で 首都の情勢にも影響が現れている事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
分かっていると思うが、《Ａ》が消えた事で
首都の情勢にも影響が現れている事だろう。

engChrName: Time for you to make good on your name, spriggan.
engSearchText: Time for you to make good on your name, spriggan.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋を名乗るのならば、 上手く立ちまわってみせる事だな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋を名乗るのならば、
上手く立ちまわってみせる事だな。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Was figurin' that anyway.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Was figurin' that anyway.
jpnChrName: へいへい、元よりそのつもりだけどな。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、元よりそのつもりだけどな。

engChrName: We'll need to be ready for anything—if anything unexpected crops up, we have to respond at a moment's notice.
engSearchText:
We'll need to be ready for anything—if anything
unexpected crops up, we have to respond at a
moment's notice.
jpnChrName: あらゆる状況を想定しつつ、 私達の方でも最善を尽くすつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
あらゆる状況を想定しつつ、
私達の方でも最善を尽くすつもりです。

engChrName: I'm still not quite over having you cover our sixes, but backup is backup. We're counting on you.
engSearchText:
I'm still not quite over having you cover our sixes, but
backup is backup. We're counting on you.
jpnChrName: 貴方達だけに背負わせるつもりも ないけれど、期待させてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達だけに背負わせるつもりも
ないけれど、期待させてもらうわ。

engChrName: These abominations will spread their poison across the continent if they're not stopped. We need to finish this here and now.
engSearchText:
These abominations will spread their poison across
the continent if they're not stopped. We need to
finish this here and now.
jpnChrName: ……大陸全土に悪魔が溢れ返れば、 まさしくこの世の終わりでしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
……大陸全土に悪魔が溢れ返れば、
まさしくこの世の終わりでしょうから。

engChrName: Incidentally, our mutual friend has been in contact fairly regularly.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, our mutual friend has been in contact
fairly regularly.
jpnChrName: ……そういえば“あの子”から 定期連絡が届いていたんだったわね。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば“あの子”から
定期連絡が届いていたんだったわね。

engChrName: I just hope they keep things under control on their end.
engSearchText:
I just hope they keep things under control on
their end.
jpnChrName: ふう、あちらの任務は 順調だといいのだけれど……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、あちらの任務は
順調だといいのだけれど……

engChrName: (Don't quite catch her drift there, but I guess something's keepin' the CID busy.)
engSearchText:
(Don't quite catch her drift there, but I guess
something's keepin' the CID busy.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……？　よく分からねえが   ＣＩＤも忙しいみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……？　よく分からねえが
ＣＩＤも忙しいみてえだな。）

engChrName: Kaela's been all over the place directing the CID, but I can't help worrying for her safety...
engSearchText:
Kaela's been all over the place directing the CID, but
I can't help worrying for her safety...
jpnChrName: 姉さんはＣＩＤの現場指揮のために 移動するようだが、やはり不安というか……
jpnSearchText:
姉さんはＣＩＤの現場指揮のために
移動するようだが、やはり不安というか……

engChrName: ...No, no. I have to trust her. I have my own job to do, so I gotta stay in my lane!
engSearchText:
...No, no. I have to trust her. I have my own job to
do, so I gotta stay in my lane!
jpnChrName: い、いや、姉さんの腕を信じて 俺は閣下の護衛を勤め上げるまでだ！
jpnSearchText:
い、いや、姉さんの腕を信じて
俺は閣下の護衛を勤め上げるまでだ！

engChrName: Don't you let up either. We can't let all our effort go to waste because of one weak link!
engSearchText:
Don't you let up either. We can't let all our effort go
to waste because of one weak link!
jpnChrName: そっちもしっかりやるんだな。 俺たちの努力を無駄にしないためにも！
jpnSearchText:
そっちもしっかりやるんだな。
俺たちの努力を無駄にしないためにも！

engChrName: Well, look at you, out here doin' security for the bigwigs. Looks like they're keepin' you busy.
engSearchText:
Well, look at you, out here doin' security for
the bigwigs. Looks like they're keepin' you busy.
jpnChrName: お前さんも随分と気苦労が 絶えなさそうだな、こんな会合の護衛とは。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも随分と気苦労が
絶えなさそうだな、こんな会合の護衛とは。

engChrName: Ha, yeah. I was NOT expecting I'd get assigned to a post like this.
engSearchText:
Ha, yeah. I was NOT expecting I'd get assigned to a
post like this.
jpnChrName: ふう……まあ、流石に このような形になるのは想定外だった。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……まあ、流石に
このような形になるのは想定外だった。

engChrName: I mean, I get it, the president needs security for all his visits, just...me?
engSearchText:
I mean, I get it, the president needs security for all his
visits, just...me?
jpnChrName: 閣下が記念祭に際して、市井を見回りつつ 各方面との折衝をする事自体は判っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
閣下が記念祭に際して、市井を見回りつつ
各方面との折衝をする事自体は判っていたが……

engChrName: Bleh, no, bad thoughts. Just gotta shut up and do my job! Don't need any pity or pep talks for that!
engSearchText:
Bleh, no, bad thoughts. Just gotta shut up and do
my job! Don't need any pity or pep talks for that!
jpnChrName: と、とはいえ自分はやる事をやるだけだからな！ お前に同情される筋合いはない！
jpnSearchText:
と、とはいえ自分はやる事をやるだけだからな！
お前に同情される筋合いはない！

engChrName: Yep. Keep your chin up, bud.
engSearchText: Yep. Keep your chin up, bud.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜい頑張ってくれ。
jpnSearchText: ま、せいぜい頑張ってくれ。

engChrName: (If I remember right, he's Kaela's brother. Seems like they both have their hands full with bureaucracy and all that kinda crap.)
engSearchText:
(If I remember right, he's Kaela's brother. Seems like
they both have their hands full with bureaucracy and
all that kinda crap.)
jpnChrName: （──確かカエラとかいう少佐の弟だったな。   こいつも色々ありそうだが……まあいいか。）
jpnSearchText:
（──確かカエラとかいう少佐の弟だったな。
こいつも色々ありそうだが……まあいいか。）

engChrName: The President says he likes that new outfit of his a lot.
engSearchText:
The President says he likes that new outfit of his
a lot.
jpnChrName: ちなみに……閣下は、今となっては この服装が大層気に入られてしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに……閣下は、今となっては
この服装が大層気に入られてしまってな。

engChrName: It blends in well on the streets, and he can just slip right into it after big meetings or ceremonies.
engSearchText:
It blends in well on the streets, and he can just slip
right into it after big meetings or ceremonies.
jpnChrName: 市井に溶け込めるという事もあって 式典の後すぐに着替えられたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
市井に溶け込めるという事もあって
式典の後すぐに着替えられたんだ。

engChrName: That said, I'm not sure if he picked it out today because he expected more casual company, or what.
engSearchText:
That said, I'm not sure if he picked it out today
because he expected more casual company, or what.
jpnChrName: ……このような方々との会合を 見越した上での行動なのかは分からないが……
jpnSearchText:
……このような方々との会合を
見越した上での行動なのかは分からないが……

engChrName: At any rate, I'm glad you and the president are safe.
engSearchText: At any rate, I'm glad you and the president are safe.
jpnChrName: ……そう、 とにかく貴方も閣下も無事で良かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
……そう、
とにかく貴方も閣下も無事で良かったわ。

engChrName: This brought back ugly memories of the war... I couldn't help but worry about you.
engSearchText:
This brought back ugly memories of the war...
I couldn't help but worry about you.
jpnChrName: 帝国のあの事件とどこか似た状況でもあるから 心配していたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
帝国のあの事件とどこか似た状況でもあるから
心配していたのだけど……

engChrName: You can't help but worry about everything, heh. But yeah, I'm glad you're all right, too.
engSearchText:
You can't help but worry about everything, heh.
But yeah, I'm glad you're all right, too.
jpnChrName: 心配しすぎだって。 ……でも、姉さんの方こそ無事で良かった。
jpnSearchText:
心配しすぎだって。
……でも、姉さんの方こそ無事で良かった。

engChrName: Good to see you two safe and sound. Guess siblings got a way of finding each other, huh?
engSearchText:
Good to see you two safe and sound. Guess siblings
got a way of finding each other, huh?
jpnChrName: アンタもこっちに合流してたのか。 姉弟水入らずって訳か？
jpnSearchText:
アンタもこっちに合流してたのか。
姉弟水入らずって訳か？

engChrName: Ah! You're here, too. Good work dealing with the demon sphere.
engSearchText:
Ah! You're here, too. Good work dealing with the
demon sphere.
jpnChrName: ああ、貴方達でしたか。 “魔球”の対処、お疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、貴方達でしたか。
“魔球”の対処、お疲れ様でした。

engChrName: Keeping the CID informed is part of my duty, right alongside security detail for the president.
engSearchText:
Keeping the CID informed is part of my duty, right
alongside security detail for the president.
jpnChrName: フン、閣下の護衛のついでに ＣＩＤ職員として情報交換していたまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、閣下の護衛のついでに
ＣＩＤ職員として情報交換していたまでだ。

engChrName: I heard you're joining in on that big plan they've got. Make sure to stay in your own lane, though.
engSearchText:
I heard you're joining in on that big plan they've got.
Make sure to stay in your own lane, though.
jpnChrName: お前たちは例の作戦に加わるらしいが…… せいぜいヘマはしない事だな。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちは例の作戦に加わるらしいが……
せいぜいヘマはしない事だな。

engChrName: The President himself arranged this plan, so we'd better not let him down.
engSearchText:
The President himself arranged this plan, so we'd
better not let him down.
jpnChrName: 段取ってくださっている閣下のためにも。
jpnSearchText: 段取ってくださっている閣下のためにも。

engChrName: ...All right? Dunno what he has to do with all this, but sure.
engSearchText:
...All right? Dunno what he has to do with all this,
but sure.
jpnChrName: ハン……？　そこに関係あんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？　そこに関係あんのかよ？

engChrName: He's probably tryna smooth things over with, y'know, the rest of the continent.
engSearchText:
He's probably tryna smooth things over with, y'know,
the rest of the continent.
jpnChrName: 恐らく国内に留まらない関係者に 話を通して下さってるんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく国内に留まらない関係者に
話を通して下さってるんだろ。

engChrName: And I figure he's keepin' my connection to it on the downlow, so they don't get suspicious.
engSearchText:
And I figure he's keepin' my connection to it on the
downlow, so they don't get suspicious.
jpnChrName: 大陸全土に広がりつつある“汎魔化”…… その鍵が俺らしい事を伏せた状態で。
jpnSearchText:
大陸全土に広がりつつある“汎魔化”……
その鍵が俺らしい事を伏せた状態で。

engChrName: Yeah, that makes sense. Tensions are running high right now... He needs to try and keep everyone calm.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that makes sense. Tensions are running high
right now... He needs to try and keep everyone calm.
jpnChrName: ……そういう事でしたか……… 恐らく外交問題にならないように……
jpnSearchText:
……そういう事でしたか………
恐らく外交問題にならないように……

engChrName: Indeed, restoring order is in Calvard's best interests.
engSearchText: Indeed, restoring order is in Calvard's best interests.
jpnChrName: これは共和国の国益の為でもあるわ。
jpnSearchText: これは共和国の国益の為でもあるわ。

engChrName: Obviously I'm not asking you to shoulder all the weight, but we ARE counting on you out there.
engSearchText:
Obviously I'm not asking you to shoulder all the
weight, but we ARE counting on you out there.
jpnChrName: 無論、貴方達だけに背負わせるつもりも ないけれど、期待させてもらいたいのも確かね。
jpnSearchText:
無論、貴方達だけに背負わせるつもりも
ないけれど、期待させてもらいたいのも確かね。

engChrName: Ah, right. My boss asked me to relay a message to you: 'Hurry up and get this taken care of.'
engSearchText:
Ah, right. My boss asked me to relay a message to
you: 'Hurry up and get this taken care of.'
jpnChrName: ああ、それと……上官から伝言を預かっているわ。 『とっととケリを付けてこい』だそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それと……上官から伝言を預かっているわ。
『とっととケリを付けてこい』だそうよ。

engChrName: Mr. Kincaid is doing his own damage control behind the scenes, I imagine.
engSearchText:
Mr. Kincaid is doing his own damage control behind
the scenes, I imagine.
jpnChrName: キンケイド補佐官── どうやら裏で動いてらっしゃるようですね？
jpnSearchText:
キンケイド補佐官──
どうやら裏で動いてらっしゃるようですね？

engChrName: Course he is—and he's bankin' on us to help him out.
engSearchText: Course he is—and he's bankin' on us to help him out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言われるまでもねえよ。 “期待”されてる事も含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、言われるまでもねえよ。
“期待”されてる事も含めてな。

engChrName: It's a lot of pressure, for sure...but pressure to perform is a fine motivator.
engSearchText:
It's a lot of pressure, for sure...but pressure to perform
is a fine motivator.
jpnChrName: プレッシャーが凄いけど…… でもそれくらいの緊張感を持って挑まないとね。
jpnSearchText:
プレッシャーが凄いけど……
でもそれくらいの緊張感を持って挑まないとね。

engChrName: Well said. The buck stops here.
engSearchText: Well said. The buck stops here.
jpnChrName: うむ、必ずや阻止してみせるとしよう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、必ずや阻止してみせるとしよう。

engChrName: I'm gonna try and retrace Yumé and Paulette's steps, figure out where they might've gone.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna try and retrace Yumé and Paulette's steps,
figure out where they might've gone.
jpnChrName: これからポーレットとユメがいそうな ルートを調べに行くつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
これからポーレットとユメがいそうな
ルートを調べに行くつもりだ。

engChrName: There's a car nearby, but it's stalled out. If it were just my own car, I know I could get it to move...
engSearchText:
There's a car nearby, but it's stalled out. If it were just
my own car, I know I could get it to move...
jpnChrName: 実はそう遠くない所に一台、車を止めていてね。 あの愛車なら動いてくれると思うんだが……
jpnSearchText:
実はそう遠くない所に一台、車を止めていてね。
あの愛車なら動いてくれると思うんだが……

engChrName: ...but I'll figure something out, I swear. The monsters are thinning out a bit, thank Goddess.
engSearchText:
...but I'll figure something out, I swear. The monsters
are thinning out a bit, thank Goddess.
jpnChrName: いや、必ず何とかしてみせるさ。 化け物の数も減ったことだしね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、必ず何とかしてみせるさ。
化け物の数も減ったことだしね。

engChrName: Anyway, y'all take care of yourselves! Godspeed!
engSearchText: Anyway, y'all take care of yourselves! Godspeed!
jpnChrName: ともかくそちらも気を付けたまえ！ お互い女神の加護を……！
jpnSearchText:
ともかくそちらも気を付けたまえ！
お互い女神の加護を……！

engChrName: Maxim, could you tell us about your plans for next year?
engSearchText:
Maxim, could you tell us about your plans for
next year?
jpnChrName: それでは来年度のＺ１レースについて マクシム選手の展望は……
jpnSearchText:
それでは来年度のＺ１レースについて
マクシム選手の展望は……

engChrName: Well, what we all need is time. These new cars, these new regs, they're gonna take some getting used to.
engSearchText:
Well, what we all need is time. These new cars, these
new regs, they're gonna take some getting used to.
jpnChrName: そうだな、近年はマシンの高性能化に伴い ドライバーも変化が求められていると言えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、近年はマシンの高性能化に伴い
ドライバーも変化が求められていると言えるだろう。

engChrName: I wanna spend as much time testing as possible, so I know I'm bringing out the car's full performance.
engSearchText:
I wanna spend as much time testing as possible, so I
know I'm bringing out the car's full performance.
jpnChrName: 当然、来年のグランプリも狙っていくが マシンの性能をいかに引き出すかが課題で──
jpnSearchText:
当然、来年のグランプリも狙っていくが
マシンの性能をいかに引き出すかが課題で──

engChrName: And then...not gonna lie, I'm still kinda bitter about the Ored GP. I wanna smash the competition next year to make up for last time.
engSearchText:
And then...not gonna lie, I'm still kinda bitter about
the Ored GP. I wanna smash the competition next
year to make up for last time.
jpnChrName: ……例えばオレドＧＰ、今年は後塵を拝した 唯一のコースだし、リベンジはマストだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……例えばオレドＧＰ、今年は後塵を拝した
唯一のコースだし、リベンジはマストだろう。

engChrName: Thank you. And, do you have any insight on ETWS Racing's internal issues?
engSearchText:
Thank you. And, do you have any insight on ETWS
Racing's internal issues?
jpnChrName: なるほど、エトワス・レーシングの 課題も見えてきたという所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、エトワス・レーシングの
課題も見えてきたという所でしょうか。

engChrName: Or any comment on your own scandal as of late? Could you tell us your side of the story?
engSearchText:
Or any comment on your own scandal as of late?
Could you tell us your side of the story?
jpnChrName: マクシム選手といえば、一時は スキャンダル騒動などもありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
マクシム選手といえば、一時は
スキャンダル騒動などもありましたが……

engChrName: Oh, yeah, that. Ha, uh... No. That was just a misunderstanding. I think I put out a statement the other day on that.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, that. Ha, uh... No. That was just
a misunderstanding. I think I put out a statement the
other day on that.
jpnChrName: そ、それは……誤解を招いてしまった事は 改めて謝罪させていただこう。
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは……誤解を招いてしまった事は
改めて謝罪させていただこう。

engChrName: She and I, we're just friends. I know a lot of people believed those rumors, and I wanna apologize to everybody who got misled.
engSearchText:
She and I, we're just friends. I know a lot of people
believed those rumors, and I wanna apologize to
everybody who got misled.
jpnChrName: 既に公式発表させてもらっているが 彼女とは友人関係であって──
jpnSearchText:
既に公式発表させてもらっているが
彼女とは友人関係であって──

engChrName: The only lady for me is my car, now and forever!
engSearchText: The only lady for me is my car, now and forever!
jpnChrName: ……僕は今も昔もマシンが恋人さッ！
jpnSearchText: ……僕は今も昔もマシンが恋人さッ！

engChrName: (...Well, that was hokey as hell. Good that he's at least trying to clear it up, though.)
engSearchText:
(...Well, that was hokey as hell. Good that he's at
least trying to clear it up, though.)
jpnChrName: （盛大に滑ってやがるが……   ま、ヘタレの割には頑張ってんじゃねーか？）
jpnSearchText:
（盛大に滑ってやがるが……
ま、ヘタレの割には頑張ってんじゃねーか？）

engChrName: (I just hope people don't read too deep into how hard he stammered there. He didn't read his lines all that well.)
engSearchText:
(I just hope people don't read too deep into how hard
he stammered there. He didn't read his lines all
that well.)
jpnChrName: （そ、そうね……下手に言い繕って   自爆しなければだけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（そ、そうね……下手に言い繕って
自爆しなければだけど。）

engChrName: (He's holdin' himself accountable, at least. Best he can do right now. Let's just keep an eye out for him.)
engSearchText:
(He's holdin' himself accountable, at least. Best he
can do right now. Let's just keep an eye out for him.)
jpnChrName: （ま、本人も自覚してるみてえだし   当面は見守っててやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、本人も自覚してるみてえだし
当面は見守っててやるか。）

engChrName: Ahem! At any rate, I apologize again for my behavior.
engSearchText: Ahem! At any rate, I apologize again for my behavior.
jpnChrName: コホン、僕も反省しているというか──
jpnSearchText: コホン、僕も反省しているというか──

engChrName: I just wanna put all that behind me. The festival's always a good time, and then next year, I wanna leave it all out on the track.
engSearchText:
I just wanna put all that behind me. The festival's
always a good time, and then next year, I wanna leave
it all out on the track.
jpnChrName: ともかく今は次のレースに集中するつもりさ。 もちろん革命記念祭は楽しむつもりだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく今は次のレースに集中するつもりさ。
もちろん革命記念祭は楽しむつもりだけどね。

engChrName: 'Always a good time,' you say? And what do you get up to when the festival comes around?
engSearchText:
'Always a good time,' you say? And what do you get
up to when the festival comes around?
jpnChrName: えっと、それって……
jpnSearchText: えっと、それって……

engChrName: Wh-What's with the tone there? It's nothing bad!
engSearchText: Wh-What's with the tone there? It's nothing bad!
jpnChrName: ああいやっ！　変な意味じゃなくてだね……！
jpnSearchText: ああいやっ！　変な意味じゃなくてだね……！

engChrName: Chin up, champ... Chin up.
engSearchText: Chin up, champ... Chin up.
jpnChrName: ……ま、頑張れよな。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、頑張れよな。

engChrName: Someday, I wanna take a little family trip, just the three of us. I wanna show Paulette and Yumé that I can be a good dad.
engSearchText:
Someday, I wanna take a little family trip, just the
three of us. I wanna show Paulette and Yumé that I
can be a good dad.
jpnChrName: 僕もいつか家族３人で旅行に行けたら…… はぁ、ポーレット……それにユメ……
jpnSearchText:
僕もいつか家族３人で旅行に行けたら……
はぁ、ポーレット……それにユメ……

engChrName: Anything to put a smile on her face! Anything, I swear!
engSearchText:
Anything to put a smile on her face! Anything,
I swear!
jpnChrName: ううっ、君たちの幸せのために 僕は……僕はっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、君たちの幸せのために
僕は……僕はっ……！！

engChrName: (I'm gettin' a real bad vibe from this... Feel like I should step in.)
engSearchText:
(I'm gettin' a real bad vibe from this... Feel like I
should step in.)
jpnChrName: （面倒な予感しかしねえし、   起こすのは止めとくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（面倒な予感しかしねえし、
起こすのは止めとくか。）

engChrName: Gah! This is Oración all over again. Talk about getting out of the frying pan and landing right into the fire!
engSearchText:
Gah! This is Oración all over again. Talk about
getting out of the frying pan and landing right
into the fire!
jpnChrName: ええい、ままよ！　オラシオンでも知らぬ間に とんでもない事案に協力していたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、ままよ！　オラシオンでも知らぬ間に
とんでもない事案に協力していたんだ！

engChrName: *sigh* Oh, well. All I can do now is wait for this shaking to stop, and then I can take her wherever she wants to go.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Oh, well. All I can do now is wait for
this shaking to stop, and then I can take her
wherever she wants to go.
jpnChrName: こうなったら震えが止まり次第、 とことん付き合ってやるさ！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら震えが止まり次第、
とことん付き合ってやるさ！

engChrName: We'll use my car, which, thankfully, still works.
engSearchText:
We'll use my car, which, thankfully, still
works.
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、この愛車が動いてくれて 良かったというか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、この愛車が動いてくれて
良かったというか何というか……

engChrName: It's thanks to this bad boy that I was able to escape those monsters in the first place. It's like Aidios was watching out for me!
engSearchText:
It's thanks to this bad boy that I was able to
escape those monsters in the first place. It's like
Aidios was watching out for me!
jpnChrName: お陰で化物から逃げ回れたし、 彼女を送り届けられるわけだからな……！
jpnSearchText:
お陰で化物から逃げ回れたし、
彼女を送り届けられるわけだからな……！

engChrName: August 27th, 3:20PM
engSearchText: August 27th, 3:20PM

engChrName: Second District, Seiden
engSearchText: Second District, Seiden
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス二区　サイデン地区
jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス二区　サイデン地区

engChrName: Edith Police Department Headquarters
engSearchText: Edith Police Department Headquarters
jpnChrName: 共和国首都警察　サイデン本署
jpnSearchText: 共和国首都警察　サイデン本署

engChrName: Please, Ms. Claudel. You can talk to me.
engSearchText: Please, Ms. Claudel. You can talk to me.
jpnChrName: ……クローデルさん、 どうか話してくれないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……クローデルさん、
どうか話してくれないかしら？

engChrName: What were you doing in a place like that? What did the man with you say to trick you into going?
engSearchText:
What were you doing in a place like that? What did
the man with you say to trick you into going?
jpnChrName: どうしてあんな場所に？ あの連れの男に何を唆（そそのか）されたの？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてあんな場所に？
あの連れの男に何を唆（そそのか）されたの？

engChrName: Nothing. If anything, I was the one who persuaded him.
engSearchText:
Nothing. If anything, I was the one who
persuaded him.
jpnChrName: 唆されたなんて…… むしろ私の方がお願いしているんです。
jpnSearchText:
唆されたなんて……
むしろ私の方がお願いしているんです。

engChrName: What the request was that Mr. Arkride accepted, though, I'm afraid I can't say anything more about.
engSearchText:
What the request was that Mr. Arkride accepted,
though, I'm afraid I can't say anything more about.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容については……済みません。 アークライド所長にお任せしているので。
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容については……済みません。
アークライド所長にお任せしているので。

engChrName: You are aware that this may end up causing trouble for your school, aren't you?
engSearchText:
You are aware that this may end up causing trouble
for your school, aren't you?
jpnChrName: 貴女ね……名門アラミスの名前に 泥を塗ることになりかねないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
貴女ね……名門アラミスの名前に
泥を塗ることになりかねないわよ？

engChrName: I'm not sure how we can avoid contacting them now that you're involved in this.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure how we can avoid contacting them now
that you're involved in this.
jpnChrName: こうなった以上、学校への連絡は 避けられないと思ってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
こうなった以上、学校への連絡は
避けられないと思ってちょうだい。

engChrName: I understand.
engSearchText: I understand.

engChrName: (This all feels like a nightmare. I can't believe someone I was just talking to hours ago is now...)
engSearchText:
(This all feels like a nightmare. I can't believe
someone I was just talking to hours ago is now...)
jpnChrName: （……まさかこんな事に……   数時間前に言葉を交わした人が……）
jpnSearchText:
（……まさかこんな事に……
数時間前に言葉を交わした人が……）

engChrName: (And all my insisting has gotten Van caught up in this...)
engSearchText:
(And all my insisting has gotten Van caught up
in this...)
jpnChrName: （それにヴァンさんも……   ………私の都合に巻き込んで………）
jpnSearchText:
（それにヴァンさんも……
………私の都合に巻き込んで………）

engChrName: Who do you think you're fooling, Arkride?!
engSearchText: Who do you think you're fooling, Arkride?!
jpnChrName: ──いい加減にしろ、 ヴァン・アークライド！
jpnSearchText:
──いい加減にしろ、
ヴァン・アークライド！

engChrName: You think we'll believe it was just some coincidence that you were in the maintenance tunnel?!
engSearchText:
You think we'll believe it was just some coincidence
that you were in the maintenance tunnel?!
jpnChrName: あの整備路には偶然入っただけ！？ 連れの子には社会科見学させていた！？
jpnSearchText:
あの整備路には偶然入っただけ！？
連れの子には社会科見学させていた！？

engChrName: That you were just taking that girl with you alone on some field trip?! Not a chance!
engSearchText:
That you were just taking that girl with you alone on
some field trip?! Not a chance!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな言い訳が 通用するとでも思ってんのかぁ！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな言い訳が
通用するとでも思ってんのかぁ！？

engChrName: What do you want me to say? It's the truth.
engSearchText: What do you want me to say? It's the truth.
jpnChrName: 実際、事実なんだから仕方ない。
jpnSearchText: 実際、事実なんだから仕方ない。

engChrName: You think I 'volunteered' to come in here just to tell lies?
engSearchText:
You think I 'volunteered' to come in here just to
tell lies?
jpnChrName: “任意同行”にわざわざ付き合って デタラメ言うわけにもいかないだろ？
jpnSearchText:
“任意同行”にわざわざ付き合って
デタラメ言うわけにもいかないだろ？

engChrName: Ugh... I sure do. You may as well be a criminal yourself, 'spriggan.'
engSearchText:
Ugh... I sure do. You may as well be a criminal
yourself, 'spriggan.'
jpnChrName: くっ……《裏解決屋》だったか！？ 怪しげな仕事をしているのも掴んでいる！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……《裏解決屋》だったか！？
怪しげな仕事をしているのも掴んでいる！

engChrName: No way in hell someone like you just happened to come across a murder scene!
engSearchText:
No way in hell someone like you just happened to
come across a murder scene!
jpnChrName: そんな人間が殺人現場に居合わせて 何も関係ないとかあり得ないだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
そんな人間が殺人現場に居合わせて
何も関係ないとかあり得ないだろう！？

engChrName: Stranger things have happened. Come on—you interrogate all your victims this way?
engSearchText:
Stranger things have happened. Come on—you
interrogate all your victims this way?
jpnChrName: だから偶然だって、偶然。 むしろコッチは被害者だろう。
jpnSearchText:
だから偶然だって、偶然。
むしろコッチは被害者だろう。

engChrName: You tense from overwork? How 'bout I lend a hand? I got a handyman's license, even!
engSearchText:
You tense from overwork? How 'bout I lend a hand?
I got a handyman's license, even!
jpnChrName: それに（一応）便利屋の資格も取ってるぜ？ いつもニコニコきめ細やかなサービス♪
jpnSearchText:
それに（一応）便利屋の資格も取ってるぜ？
いつもニコニコきめ細やかなサービス♪

engChrName: Service with a smile and always willing to lend an ear! That's the Arkride Solutions motto!
engSearchText:
Service with a smile and always willing to lend an ear!
That's the Arkride Solutions motto!
jpnChrName: 貴方の悩みに寄り添い解決をサポートします、 アークライド解決事務所をご贔屓に♪
jpnSearchText:
貴方の悩みに寄り添い解決をサポートします、
アークライド解決事務所をご贔屓に♪

engChrName: Y-You son of a...
engSearchText: Y-You son of a...
jpnChrName: こ、この～っ………
jpnSearchText: こ、この～っ………

engChrName: I'm more curious why YOU happened to show up when you did.
engSearchText:
I'm more curious why YOU happened to show up
when you did.
jpnChrName: ──そういうアンタらこそ どうしてあのタイミングで踏み込んだ？
jpnSearchText:
──そういうアンタらこそ
どうしてあのタイミングで踏み込んだ？

engChrName: He was a real slimeball, but he was also a nobody. Just what were you hoping to get out of him?
engSearchText:
He was a real slimeball, but he was also a nobody.
Just what were you hoping to get out of him?
jpnChrName: 下種（ゲス）だがチンケな情報屋相手に…… 何を聞きだそうとしてたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
下種（ゲス）だがチンケな情報屋相手に……
何を聞きだそうとしてたんだ？

engChrName: What was so important that it requires a bunch of officers and TWO investigators?
engSearchText:
What was so important that it requires a bunch of
officers and TWO investigators?
jpnChrName: 捜査官２人が、警官を引き連れてまで。
jpnSearchText: 捜査官２人が、警官を引き連れてまで。

engChrName: I can see the rumors of how much a handful you are weren't overselling you.
engSearchText:
I can see the rumors of how much a handful you are
weren't overselling you.
jpnChrName: ……どうやら噂以上に 一筋縄じゃいかん若造のようだな。
jpnSearchText:
……どうやら噂以上に
一筋縄じゃいかん若造のようだな。

engChrName: Your weapon might not have a blade, but I've never seen anything like it—then you've got a state-of-the-art orbment, too.
engSearchText:
Your weapon might not have a blade, but I've never
seen anything like it—then you've got a
state-of-the-art orbment, too.
jpnChrName: 刃こそ付いていないとはいえ 見たこともない武器に、最新式の戦術導力器。
jpnSearchText:
刃こそ付いていないとはいえ
見たこともない武器に、最新式の戦術導力器。

engChrName: You've been skirting the line of legality dangerously close these past few years...
engSearchText:
You've been skirting the line of legality dangerously
close these past few years...
jpnChrName: ここ数年の業績内容も限りなくグレーで 非合法のラインをギリギリで見極めている。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数年の業績内容も限りなくグレーで
非合法のラインをギリギリで見極めている。

engChrName: You do know we could come down on you if we wanted to, right?
engSearchText:
You do know we could come down on you if we
wanted to, right?
jpnChrName: ……こちらがその気になればいつでも “検挙”に切り替えられるんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
……こちらがその気になればいつでも
“検挙”に切り替えられるんだぞ？

engChrName: Wow. That's harsh. It's just a self-defense baton.
engSearchText: Wow. That's harsh. It's just a self-defense baton.
jpnChrName: そりゃ怖い──と言っても 護身用の特殊警棒でしかないけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ怖い──と言っても
護身用の特殊警棒でしかないけどな。

engChrName: As for my Xipha, that's just for the orbal net. I've been authorized to have one as a tester, I'll have you know.
engSearchText:
As for my Xipha, that's just for the orbal net.
I've been authorized to have one as a tester, I'll have
you know.
jpnChrName: Ｘｉｐｈａ（ザイファ）はあくまで導力ネット用で テスターとしての所持許可も持っている。
jpnSearchText:
Ｘｉｐｈａ（ザイファ）はあくまで導力ネット用で
テスターとしての所持許可も持っている。

engChrName: Though, hey, even I know that authorization comin' from a questionable foreign company ain't the best look.
engSearchText:
Though, hey, even I know that authorization comin'
from a questionable foreign company ain't the
best look.
jpnChrName: ま、得体の知れない外国企業の お墨付きってのが胡散臭いのは認めるが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、得体の知れない外国企業の
お墨付きってのが胡散臭いのは認めるが。

engChrName: Took the words right out of my mouth... You really know how to throw people off.
engSearchText:
Took the words right out of my mouth... You really
know how to throw people off.
jpnChrName: 自分で言うな、自分で。 ………まったく調子の狂う若造だ。
jpnSearchText:
自分で言うな、自分で。
………まったく調子の狂う若造だ。

engChrName: Inspector! I say we grill this guy good!
engSearchText: Inspector! I say we grill this guy good!
jpnChrName: 警部、こうなったら とことん締め上げるしかないですよ！
jpnSearchText:
警部、こうなったら
とことん締め上げるしかないですよ！

engChrName: It's clear he's a total good for nothing! You don't lead a pretty lady astray without having some kind of ulterior motive!
engSearchText:
It's clear he's a total good for nothing! You don't lead
a pretty lady astray without having some kind of
ulterior motive!
jpnChrName: あんな可愛い子を誑（たぶら）かしている時点で ロクなヤツじゃないのは確かなんですから！
jpnSearchText:
あんな可愛い子を誑（たぶら）かしている時点で
ロクなヤツじゃないのは確かなんですから！

engChrName: Like 'em that young, Detective? Huh.
engSearchText: Like 'em that young, Detective? Huh.
jpnChrName: なんだアンタ、 ああいう乳臭いのがタイプなのか？
jpnSearchText:
なんだアンタ、
ああいう乳臭いのがタイプなのか？

engChrName: Just don't go too deep down that rabbit hole. Y'think I look bad—just wait till people hear a cop got hooked on hitting up juveniles for 'favors.'
engSearchText:
Just don't go too deep down that rabbit hole.
Y'think I look bad—just wait till people hear a cop
got hooked on hitting up juveniles for 'favors.'
jpnChrName: 気をつけろよ～、警察官の身で 援交とかハマったら洒落にならんぜ。
jpnSearchText:
気をつけろよ～、警察官の身で
援交とかハマったら洒落にならんぜ。

engChrName: But you know my address if you ever get in hot water over it.
engSearchText:
But you know my address if you ever get in hot water
over it.
jpnChrName: トラブった場合は相談に乗るけどよ。
jpnSearchText: トラブった場合は相談に乗るけどよ。

engChrName: You think you can waltz in here and...!
engSearchText: You think you can waltz in here and...!
jpnChrName: っ、こいつ……！
jpnSearchText: っ、こいつ……！

engChrName: Nate! Don't let him rile you up—
engSearchText: Nate! Don't let him rile you up—
jpnChrName: コラ、安い挑発に乗ってんじゃ──
jpnSearchText: コラ、安い挑発に乗ってんじゃ──

engChrName: You're wasting your time with that one.
engSearchText: You're wasting your time with that one.
jpnChrName: ええ── マトモに相手をするだけ無駄ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
マトモに相手をするだけ無駄ですよ。

engChrName: A-And just who the hell are you? This room's off limits!
engSearchText:
A-And just who the hell are you? This room's off
limits!
jpnChrName: な、なんだアンタ……！？ ここは部外者が入っていい──
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだアンタ……！？
ここは部外者が入っていい──

engChrName: I would be with the Central Intelligence Department—the group that asked for your help on this case.
engSearchText:
I would be with the Central Intelligence
Department—the group that asked for your help on
this case.
jpnChrName: 失礼、今回の件で 協力を要請したＣＩＤの者です。
jpnSearchText:
失礼、今回の件で
協力を要請したＣＩＤの者です。

engChrName: The name's Kincaid. I'm with the CID's analytical division.
engSearchText:
The name's Kincaid. I'm with the CID's analytical
division.
jpnChrName: カルバード中央情報省（ＣＩＤ）、 分析室所属、キンケイドです。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード中央情報省（ＣＩＤ）、
分析室所属、キンケイドです。

engChrName: On its behalf, I thank you for your aid in locating Giacomo Conte.
engSearchText:
On its behalf, I thank you for your aid in locating
Giacomo Conte.
jpnChrName: この度はジャコモ・コンテの捜索に 協力していただいて感謝します。
jpnSearchText:
この度はジャコモ・コンテの捜索に
協力していただいて感謝します。
