engChrName: And I see your line caught a second fish as well.
engSearchText: And I see your line caught a second fish as well.
jpnChrName: まあ、一歩及ばず 釣れたのは別の小物のようですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、一歩及ばず
釣れたのは別の小物のようですが。

engChrName: Are you serious...?
engSearchText: Are you serious...?

engChrName: We feel awful for losing him. Really!
engSearchText: We feel awful for losing him. Really!
jpnChrName: い、いや～、本当に面目ない。
jpnSearchText: い、いや～、本当に面目ない。

engChrName: But it's clear as day that this guy knows SOMETHING!
engSearchText:
But it's clear as day that this guy knows
SOMETHING!
jpnChrName: ですが犯人を逃したとはいえ、この男が 何か知っているのは間違いないですよ！
jpnSearchText:
ですが犯人を逃したとはいえ、この男が
何か知っているのは間違いないですよ！

engChrName: We'll have it out of him before long. Mark my—
engSearchText: We'll have it out of him before long. Mark my—
jpnChrName: 何としても締め上げて──
jpnSearchText: 何としても締め上げて──

engChrName: That won't be necessary. He and his companion will be coming with us.
engSearchText:
That won't be necessary. He and his companion will
be coming with us.
jpnChrName: ああ、必要ありません。 彼と連れのお嬢さんは引き取ります。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、必要ありません。
彼と連れのお嬢さんは引き取ります。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: On what grounds?
engSearchText: On what grounds?

engChrName: Our own investigation has led us to safely rule them out as culprits in Mr. Conte's murder.
engSearchText:
Our own investigation has led us to safely rule them
out as culprits in Mr. Conte's murder.
jpnChrName: 状況的にジャコモ殺害の容疑からは 外しても問題ないのでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
状況的にジャコモ殺害の容疑からは
外しても問題ないのでしょう？

engChrName: As such, for reasons I am not at liberty to discuss, they will be coming into our custody.
engSearchText:
As such, for reasons I am not at liberty to discuss,
they will be coming into our custody.
jpnChrName: ならば諸般の事情により、 ＣＩＤで身柄を預からせてもらいます。
jpnSearchText:
ならば諸般の事情により、
ＣＩＤで身柄を預からせてもらいます。

engChrName: I trust that won't be a problem?
engSearchText: I trust that won't be a problem?
jpnChrName: 機密のため詳細は説明できかねますが、 ………よろしいですね？
jpnSearchText:
機密のため詳細は説明できかねますが、
………よろしいですね？

engChrName: O-Oh, not at all! Do what you want with them!
engSearchText: O-Oh, not at all! Do what you want with them!
jpnChrName: そ、それはもうっ！ 自由に連れて行っちゃってくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それはもうっ！
自由に連れて行っちゃってくださいっ！

engChrName: Don't be such a damned suckup. Bah. Should've known this was how it'd be once they showed up.
engSearchText:
Don't be such a damned suckup. Bah. Should've
known this was how it'd be once they showed up.
jpnChrName: 尻尾を振ってんじゃねえ！ チッ、いきなり出てきたと思えば。
jpnSearchText:
尻尾を振ってんじゃねえ！
チッ、いきなり出てきたと思えば。

engChrName: ...Very well. This was always the CID's request. Do as you will.
engSearchText:
...Very well. This was always the CID's request. Do as
you will.
jpnChrName: ……元々そちらの要請だ。 引き渡しそのものはいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……元々そちらの要請だ。
引き渡しそのものはいいだろう。

engChrName: But as much of a lowlife piece of scum as he was, we're dealing with a man's death here.
engSearchText:
But as much of a lowlife piece of scum as he was,
we're dealing with a man's death here.
jpnChrName: だが──ロクデナシのゲス野郎とはいえ、 人一人が死んでるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが──ロクデナシのゲス野郎とはいえ、
人一人が死んでるんだ。

engChrName: I'll thank you AND you to remember that.
engSearchText: I'll thank you AND you to remember that.
jpnChrName: アンタも、そこの若造も そこん所はキッチリ弁えておけよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタも、そこの若造も
そこん所はキッチリ弁えておけよ。

engChrName: Course I will.
engSearchText: Course I will.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、分かったぜ。

engChrName: You needn't worry about that. Leave everything to us.
engSearchText: You needn't worry about that. Leave everything to us.
jpnChrName: ご心配なく──後はお任せを。
jpnSearchText: ご心配なく──後はお任せを。

engChrName: Van! Oh, thank goodness. They let you go, too?
engSearchText: Van! Oh, thank goodness. They let you go, too?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！ よかった、解放してもらえたんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……！
よかった、解放してもらえたんですね？

engChrName: Yeah—after this troublemaker showed up.
engSearchText: Yeah—after this troublemaker showed up.
jpnChrName: ああ、妙な横槍が入ったおかげでな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、妙な横槍が入ったおかげでな。

engChrName: I'll be taking my leave now, sir.
engSearchText: I'll be taking my leave now, sir.
jpnChrName: ……分析官。 それでは自分はこれで。
jpnSearchText:
……分析官。
それでは自分はこれで。

engChrName: Understood. You know what needs doing next—and be sure to send your report to the chief.
engSearchText:
Understood. You know what needs doing next—and
be sure to send your report to the chief.
jpnChrName: ああ、例のルートは任せた。 室長への報告も頼む。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、例のルートは任せた。
室長への報告も頼む。

engChrName: She said she was with the Central Intelligence Department.
engSearchText:
She said she was with the Central Intelligence
Department.
jpnChrName: ……ＣＩＤ…… 中央情報省の方、だそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
……ＣＩＤ……
中央情報省の方、だそうですね？

engChrName: Looks that way. Seems real competent, too.
engSearchText: Looks that way. Seems real competent, too.
jpnChrName: らしいな。 若手だが結構やりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
らしいな。
若手だが結構やりそうだ。

engChrName: And you're able to bark out orders to her just like that, huh? Shows you've moved up in the world, René.
engSearchText:
And you're able to bark out orders to her just like
that, huh? Shows you've moved up in the
world, René.
jpnChrName: そんなやり手を顎で使うとは 随分出世したじゃねえか──ルネ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなやり手を顎で使うとは
随分出世したじゃねえか──ルネ。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnSearchText: え……

engChrName: Kincaid. Not René. You know that.
engSearchText: Kincaid. Not René. You know that.
jpnChrName: ルネと呼ぶなと言っただろう。
jpnSearchText: ルネと呼ぶなと言っただろう。

engChrName: Though perhaps you need reminding after three years.
engSearchText:
Though perhaps you need reminding after
three years.
jpnChrName: ──久しぶりだな、ヴァン。 直接顔を合わせるのは３年ぶりか。
jpnSearchText:
──久しぶりだな、ヴァン。
直接顔を合わせるのは３年ぶりか。

engChrName: Hard to say if three years ago even counted as a proper hello.
engSearchText:
Hard to say if three years ago even counted as a
proper hello.
jpnChrName: あれを顔合わせと 言っていいかは疑問だがな。
jpnSearchText:
あれを顔合わせと
言っていいかは疑問だがな。

engChrName: You're still on the ball as ever, you spectacled sadist.
engSearchText: You're still on the ball as ever, you spectacled sadist.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずの切れ味じゃねえか、 この鬼畜眼鏡が。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらずの切れ味じゃねえか、
この鬼畜眼鏡が。

engChrName: Same to you, spriggan.
engSearchText: Same to you, spriggan.
jpnChrName: お前ほどじゃないさ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: お前ほどじゃないさ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: Still working from the shadows and relying on old-fashioned stubbornness and trickery to get the job done, I see.
engSearchText:
Still working from the shadows and relying on
old-fashioned stubbornness and trickery to get the job
done, I see.
jpnChrName: 裏技に搦め手──持ち前のしぶとさを 最大限に活かしている意味ではな。
jpnSearchText:
裏技に搦め手──持ち前のしぶとさを
最大限に活かしている意味ではな。

engChrName: Heh. Damn right.
engSearchText: Heh. Damn right.
jpnChrName: ヘッ……言ってろ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ……言ってろ。

engChrName: Eheh... Umm...
engSearchText: Eheh... Umm...
jpnChrName: え、え、あの……
jpnSearchText: え、え、あの……

engChrName: The CID is currently hot on the trail of the duo who murdered Giacomo Conte.
engSearchText:
The CID is currently hot on the trail of the duo who
murdered Giacomo Conte.
jpnChrName: ──現在、ＣＩＤ（ウチ）はジャコモを殺った “二人組”を捜している。
jpnSearchText:
──現在、ＣＩＤ（ウチ）はジャコモを殺った
“二人組”を捜している。

engChrName: We found trace evidence of them at the scene.
engSearchText: We found trace evidence of them at the scene.
jpnChrName: 僅かだが、あの整備室に 痕跡を残していた二人組を。
jpnSearchText:
僅かだが、あの整備室に
痕跡を残していた二人組を。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnSearchText: ……！

engChrName: Knew you wouldn't waste time. Then...
engSearchText: Knew you wouldn't waste time. Then...
jpnChrName: 流石仕事が早いじゃねえか。 フン、となると……
jpnSearchText:
流石仕事が早いじゃねえか。
フン、となると……

engChrName: I know your nose and circle of suspicious contacts are not to be underestimated.
engSearchText:
I know your nose and circle of suspicious contacts are
not to be underestimated.
jpnChrName: お前の鼻の良さと 胡散臭い人脈だけは買っている。
jpnSearchText:
お前の鼻の良さと
胡散臭い人脈だけは買っている。

engChrName: I won't be getting in the way of whatever you and your friend are working on.
engSearchText:
I won't be getting in the way of whatever you and
your friend are working on.
jpnChrName: そちらのお嬢さんの依頼とやらにも 関知はしない──
jpnSearchText:
そちらのお嬢さんの依頼とやらにも
関知はしない──

engChrName: If you hear anything interesting, however, you'll give me a call. You owe it to me after bailing you out.
engSearchText:
If you hear anything interesting, however, you'll give
me a call. You owe it to me after bailing you out.
jpnChrName: 代わりに何か分かれば連絡しろ。 さっきの借りを返す意味でもな。
jpnSearchText:
代わりに何か分かれば連絡しろ。
さっきの借りを返す意味でもな。

engChrName: Tch.
engSearchText: Tch.
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: Contact information exchanged.
engSearchText: Contact information exchanged.
jpnChrName: 連絡先を交換したわよ。
jpnSearchText: 連絡先を交換したわよ。

engChrName: I don't believe I've heard that holo before.
engSearchText: I don't believe I've heard that holo before.
jpnChrName: 面白いホロウを使っているな。
jpnSearchText: 面白いホロウを使っているな。

engChrName: By the way, have you told her you're back yet?
engSearchText: By the way, have you told her you're back yet?
jpnChrName: ──ところでヴァン、 “あいつ”には連絡したのか？
jpnSearchText:
──ところでヴァン、
“あいつ”には連絡したのか？
っ……！

engChrName: Well, that answers that. Will you ever grow up?
engSearchText: Well, that answers that. Will you ever grow up?
jpnChrName: クク、まだまだ青いな。
jpnSearchText: クク、まだまだ青いな。

engChrName: Take care, then. You as well, young lady.
engSearchText: Take care, then. You as well, young lady.
jpnChrName: ──それでは、お嬢さんもお気を付けて。
jpnSearchText: ──それでは、お嬢さんもお気を付けて。

engChrName: Uh... Thank you...
engSearchText: Uh... Thank you...

engChrName: So...you two are friends?
engSearchText: So...you two are friends?
jpnChrName: えっと…… お知り合い、みたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
えっと……
お知り合い、みたいですね？

engChrName: Nah. He's just an old acquaintance I can't seem to shake.
engSearchText:
Nah. He's just an old acquaintance I can't seem
to shake.
jpnChrName: ハン……昔馴染みってだけだ。 “腐れ”が付くたぐいのな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……昔馴染みってだけだ。
“腐れ”が付くたぐいのな。

engChrName: Anyway, much as I hate being in his debt over anything, this'll be over way faster with him on the case.
engSearchText:
Anyway, much as I hate being in his debt over
anything, this'll be over way faster with him on
the case.
jpnChrName: まあ、ヤツに借りを作るのは忌々しいが 大幅に時間が短縮できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヤツに借りを作るのは忌々しいが
大幅に時間が短縮できそうだ。

engChrName: Both solving Giacomo's murder and your job.
engSearchText: Both solving Giacomo's murder and your job.
jpnChrName: ジャコモの殺しについても…… あんたのそもそもの依頼についてもな。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモの殺しについても……
あんたのそもそもの依頼についてもな。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...

engChrName: If you wanna call this whole thing off, I'm fine with that.
engSearchText:
If you wanna call this whole thing off, I'm fine
with that.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに、ここで退くのも 選択肢としてはアリだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに、ここで退くのも
選択肢としてはアリだぜ？

engChrName: Won't charge you anything if you do—not after how much of a mess this has turned into.
engSearchText:
Won't charge you anything if you do—not after how
much of a mess this has turned into.
jpnChrName: トラブっちまった詫びじゃねえが 今なら依頼料もタダにしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
トラブっちまった詫びじゃねえが
今なら依頼料もタダにしてやる。

engChrName: Leaving this all to me also works if you trust me enough.
engSearchText:
Leaving this all to me also works if you trust
me enough.
jpnChrName: もしくは信用できないかもしれないが、 俺一人に任せるとかな。
jpnSearchText:
もしくは信用できないかもしれないが、
俺一人に任せるとかな。

engChrName: That's not an issue, but...
engSearchText: That's not an issue, but...
jpnChrName: いえ……
jpnSearchText: いえ……

engChrName: Now that someone's lost their life, I don't think I can afford to avert my eyes. It's not right.
engSearchText:
Now that someone's lost their life, I don't think I can
afford to avert my eyes. It's not right.
jpnChrName: 人が亡くなったからこそ 目を逸らすわけには……ううん。
jpnSearchText:
人が亡くなったからこそ
目を逸らすわけには……ううん。

engChrName: Can I not stay with you for at least today?
engSearchText: Can I not stay with you for at least today?
jpnChrName: ──せめて今日一日だけは お付き合い願えないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
──せめて今日一日だけは
お付き合い願えないでしょうか？

engChrName: It pains me to cause you more problems than I already have, but at the same time...
engSearchText:
It pains me to cause you more problems than I already
have, but at the same time...
jpnChrName: その、これ以上ヴァンさんにご迷惑を 掛けることだけは心苦しいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その、これ以上ヴァンさんにご迷惑を
掛けることだけは心苦しいですけど……

engChrName: Heh. You're too young to worry about causing your elders problems.
engSearchText:
Heh. You're too young to worry about causing your
elders problems.
jpnChrName: ハッ、学生がナマ言ってんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、学生がナマ言ってんじゃねえ。

engChrName: All right. If you're that set on this, then let's get back to work.
engSearchText:
All right. If you're that set on this, then let's get back
to work.
jpnChrName: 分かった──腹を括ってんなら とっとと行動を再開するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった──腹を括ってんなら
とっとと行動を再開するぞ。

engChrName: Next up, we take the subway to Riverside.
engSearchText: Next up, we take the subway to Riverside.
jpnChrName: ここからだと…… まずは地下鉄でリバーサイドだな。
jpnSearchText:
ここからだと……
まずは地下鉄でリバーサイドだな。

engChrName: What? You aren't thinking of going back to the scene of the crime, are you?
engSearchText:
What? You aren't thinking of going back to the scene
of the crime, are you?
jpnChrName: え……ひょっとして またあの現場に、ですか？
jpnSearchText:
え……ひょっとして
またあの現場に、ですか？

engChrName: Nah. Still gonna be sealed off, so no way we're getting close to it. I've got somewhere else in mind.
engSearchText:
Nah. Still gonna be sealed off, so no way we're
getting close to it. I've got somewhere else in mind.
jpnChrName: いや、まだ警察が封鎖してるだろうし、 それとは別筋だ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、まだ警察が封鎖してるだろうし、
それとは別筋だ。

engChrName: Let's get movin'. I'd still like to get this wrapped up today.
engSearchText:
Let's get movin'. I'd still like to get this wrapped
up today.
jpnChrName: とにかく急ぐぞ、 今日中にケリを付けるためにもな。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく急ぐぞ、
今日中にケリを付けるためにもな。

engChrName: A-All right!
engSearchText: A-All right!
jpnChrName: は、はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: は、はいっ……！

engChrName: Excuse me! Can I have a moment of your time?!
engSearchText: Excuse me! Can I have a moment of your time?!
jpnChrName: すみません～、 ちょっといいですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
すみません～、
ちょっといいですかっ！？

engChrName: You just came out of the police station, didn't you?
engSearchText: You just came out of the police station, didn't you?
jpnChrName: 今、警察署から出てきましたよね！？
jpnSearchText: 今、警察署から出てきましたよね！？

engChrName: I'm hearing there was just a murder. Was that why you were in there?!
engSearchText:
I'm hearing there was just a murder. Was that why
you were in there?!
jpnChrName: どこかで殺人事件があったそうですけど それ関連で呼ばれたとかですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
どこかで殺人事件があったそうですけど
それ関連で呼ばれたとかですかっ！？

engChrName: P-Pardon me?
engSearchText: P-Pardon me?
jpnChrName: えっ……
jpnSearchText: えっ……

engChrName: Huh? And just who're you?
engSearchText: Huh? And just who're you?
jpnChrName: ……へえ？ お嬢ちゃん、アンタは？
jpnSearchText:
……へえ？
お嬢ちゃん、アンタは？

engChrName: I'm Marielle Aymé, the newest reporter with the Tyrell Times!
engSearchText:
I'm Marielle Aymé, the newest reporter with the
Tyrell Times!
jpnChrName: 《タイレル通信》新人記者の マリエル・エーメっていいますっ！
jpnSearchText:
《タイレル通信》新人記者の
マリエル・エーメっていいますっ！

engChrName: I only just joined the paper's local news division and happened to hear what was going on from a source of mine.
engSearchText:
I only just joined the paper's local news division and
happened to hear what was going on from a source
of mine.
jpnChrName: 社会部に配属されたばかりで、 とある方面から小耳に挟みましてっ！
jpnSearchText:
社会部に配属されたばかりで、
とある方面から小耳に挟みましてっ！

engChrName: You wouldn't happen to have anything to add about the murder, would you?! I'll take anything!
engSearchText:
You wouldn't happen to have anything to add about
the murder, would you?! I'll take anything!
jpnChrName: 事件について何かご存じだったり！？ ぜひぜひコメントをっ！
jpnSearchText:
事件について何かご存じだったり！？
ぜひぜひコメントをっ！

engChrName: Umm... We...
engSearchText: Umm... We...
jpnChrName: あ、あの、私たちは……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの、私たちは……

engChrName: You got good instincts on you, missy.
engSearchText: You got good instincts on you, missy.
jpnChrName: お目が高いな、お嬢ちゃん。
jpnSearchText: お目が高いな、お嬢ちゃん。

engChrName: The cops just took in a key witness. Being questioned as we speak.
engSearchText:
The cops just took in a key witness. Being questioned
as we speak.
jpnChrName: ちょうど今、重要参考人が引っ張られて 集中的に取り調べを受けてるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど今、重要参考人が引っ張られて
集中的に取り調べを受けてるらしい。

engChrName: Sounds like it's a detective called Nate in charge. I'm thinkin' he'll have more for you if you run in now.
engSearchText:
Sounds like it's a detective called Nate in charge.
I'm thinkin' he'll have more for you if you run in now.
jpnChrName: 担当者はネイトって捜査官だそうだ。 突撃したら色々掴めるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
担当者はネイトって捜査官だそうだ。
突撃したら色々掴めるんじゃないか？

engChrName: V-Van, you can't just—
engSearchText: V-Van, you can't just—
jpnChrName: え、ちょっとヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: え、ちょっとヴァンさん……

engChrName: Really?! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Really?! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: わあっ、親切にありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: わあっ、親切にありがとうございます！

engChrName: Just you wait, Dingo! I'll get one over you this time!
engSearchText: Just you wait, Dingo! I'll get one over you this time!
jpnChrName: 見てなさいよ～、ディンゴ・ブラッド！ 今度こそ出し抜いてやるんだから～！
jpnSearchText:
見てなさいよ～、ディンゴ・ブラッド！
今度こそ出し抜いてやるんだから～！

engChrName: W-Wait! The key witnesses here are—
engSearchText: W-Wait! The key witnesses here are—
jpnChrName: あの、待ってください！ その重要参考人っていうのは──
jpnSearchText:
あの、待ってください！
その重要参考人っていうのは──

engChrName: Having a rough day?
engSearchText: Having a rough day?
jpnChrName: （……災難だったようだな。）
jpnSearchText: （……災難だったようだな。）

engChrName: Ehh, nothin' I'm not used to. I'm gonna go see Bermotti now.
engSearchText:
Ehh, nothin' I'm not used to. I'm gonna go see
Bermotti now.
jpnChrName: （ま、いつもの事だ。   これからベルモッティに顔を出す。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、いつもの事だ。
これからベルモッティに顔を出す。）

engChrName: That should square us out after I lent a hand on that case with the spoiled brat.
engSearchText:
That should square us out after I lent a hand on that
case with the spoiled brat.
jpnChrName: （ドラ息子絡みの貸しの残りだ。   よろしく頼むぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ドラ息子絡みの貸しの残りだ。
よろしく頼むぜ。）

engChrName: Heh. Sure. I'll get it done.
engSearchText: Heh. Sure. I'll get it done.
jpnChrName: （フッ、任せておけ。）
jpnSearchText: （フッ、任せておけ。）

engChrName: *sigh* That wasn't very nice of you, Van.
engSearchText: *sigh* That wasn't very nice of you, Van.
jpnChrName: はあ……もうヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: はあ……もうヴァンさん。

engChrName: You can't just feed someone in her position false information.
engSearchText:
You can't just feed someone in her position
false information.
jpnChrName: あんな風にいい加減なことを 言ってもいいんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あんな風にいい加減なことを
言ってもいいんですか？

engChrName: Sure I can. Last thing we need when we're busy is a reckless rookie sticking her nose into our shit.
engSearchText:
Sure I can. Last thing we need when we're busy is a
reckless rookie sticking her nose into our shit.
jpnChrName: クク、空回りがちな新米記者に 首を突っ込まれても面倒だからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、空回りがちな新米記者に
首を突っ込まれても面倒だからな。

engChrName: Why not let her make trouble for the cops to make our job easier?
engSearchText:
Why not let her make trouble for the cops to make
our job easier?
jpnChrName: せいぜい俺たちが動きやすいよう 警察方面を引っかき回してもらうさ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい俺たちが動きやすいよう
警察方面を引っかき回してもらうさ。

engChrName: W-Wait for me!
engSearchText: W-Wait for me!
jpnChrName: って、待ってください～！
jpnSearchText: って、待ってください～！

engChrName: This is the Seiden District. Our target's in the waterways underneath here.
engSearchText:
This is the Seiden District. Our target's in the
waterways underneath here.
jpnChrName: ここがサイデン地区。 目的の地下水道がある場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
ここがサイデン地区。
目的の地下水道がある場所だ。

engChrName: Whoa... The air here is so different from the other districts.
engSearchText:
Whoa... The air here is so different from the
other districts.
jpnChrName: わぁ……ここからだと あのトリオンタワーがよく見えますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……ここからだと
あのトリオンタワーがよく見えますねっ。

engChrName: It's very...business-y.
engSearchText: It's very...business-y.
jpnChrName: それに、他のエリアとは随分と雰囲気が違います。 すごくキリっとしているような。
jpnSearchText:
それに、他のエリアとは随分と雰囲気が違います。
すごくキリっとしているような。

engChrName: Well, a lot of government bodies and big companies work out of here.
engSearchText:
Well, a lot of government bodies and big companies
work out of here.
jpnChrName: ここは官公庁や大企業のビルが 多く集まっている区ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここは官公庁や大企業のビルが
多く集まっている区ですね。

engChrName: There's a large police station over there that no doubt contributes, too.
engSearchText:
There's a large police station over there that no doubt
contributes, too.
jpnChrName: 近くに警察署があるのも、空気が 引き締まっている理由かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
近くに警察署があるのも、空気が
引き締まっている理由かもしれません。

engChrName: The hotel over to our left is really famous and regularly hosts important visitors from abroad.
engSearchText:
The hotel over to our left is really famous and
regularly hosts important visitors from abroad.
jpnChrName: 左手に見えるのは有名なシティホテルで 外国からの賓客も多いみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
左手に見えるのは有名なシティホテルで
外国からの賓客も多いみたいです。

engChrName: How interesting... You sure know a lot about this area, Agnès!
engSearchText:
How interesting... You sure know a lot about this
area, Agnès!
jpnChrName: なるほど…… アニエスさん、詳しいですね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
アニエスさん、詳しいですね！

engChrName: Well, I do live here. I'd say it's natural to know a lot about the city you live in.
engSearchText:
Well, I do live here. I'd say it's natural to know a lot
about the city you live in.
jpnChrName: あはは…… 首都の住民ですからこのくらいは。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
首都の住民ですからこのくらいは。

jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: Umm... So where are we supposed to enter the underground waterway?
engSearchText:
Umm... So where are we supposed to enter the
underground waterway?
jpnChrName: えっと、上水道というのは どこから入るんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、上水道というのは
どこから入るんでしょうか？

engChrName: The entrance should be under that bridge over there.
engSearchText: The entrance should be under that bridge over there.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちの高架の下に 入口があった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そっちの高架の下に
入口があった筈だ。

engChrName: It's past three, so it's getting late. That, and we weren't exactly plannin' to look around this area...
engSearchText:
It's past three, so it's getting late. That, and we
weren't exactly plannin' to look around this area...
jpnChrName: もう３時を過ぎたし、この地区は 元々予定していた活動範囲外だ。
jpnSearchText:
もう３時を過ぎたし、この地区は
元々予定していた活動範囲外だ。

engChrName: ...so let's just head straight over.
engSearchText: ...so let's just head straight over.
jpnChrName: このまま上水道に直行するぞ。
jpnSearchText: このまま上水道に直行するぞ。

engChrName: Here we are.
engSearchText: Here we are.
jpnChrName: ここだ。
jpnSearchText: ここだ。

engChrName: This does look like the spot.
engSearchText: This does look like the spot.
jpnChrName: ここが上水道への入口ですか。
jpnSearchText: ここが上水道への入口ですか。

engChrName: So we're busting the door down since it's locked?
engSearchText: So we're busting the door down since it's locked?
jpnChrName: 扉がロックされていますね。 強行突破しますか？
jpnSearchText:
扉がロックされていますね。
強行突破しますか？

engChrName: Uhh... No. Put that away.
engSearchText: Uhh... No. Put that away.
jpnChrName: しないから仕舞っとけ……
jpnSearchText: しないから仕舞っとけ……

engChrName: We've been given the code to open it. I think I input it here?
engSearchText:
We've been given the code to open it. I think I input
it here?
jpnChrName: 一応解除コードも送られたからな。 ──操作パネルはこいつか。
jpnSearchText:
一応解除コードも送られたからな。
──操作パネルはこいつか。

engChrName: Okay—c'mon.
engSearchText: Okay—c'mon.
jpnChrName: 入るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 入るぞ。

engChrName: Okay, you've made it clear that you were there on a job given to you by the CID.
engSearchText:
Okay, you've made it clear that you were there on a
job given to you by the CID.
jpnChrName: ……お前があそこにいたのが ＣＩＤからの依頼なのは分かった。
jpnSearchText:
……お前があそこにいたのが
ＣＩＤからの依頼なのは分かった。

engChrName: Then we can go, right? We're busy people, y'know.
engSearchText: Then we can go, right? We're busy people, y'know.
jpnChrName: 分かったらもういいだろ？ こっちも暇じゃないんでね。
jpnSearchText:
分かったらもういいだろ？
こっちも暇じゃないんでね。

engChrName: Of COURSE you can't!
engSearchText: Of COURSE you can't!
jpnChrName: いいわけないだろう！
jpnSearchText: いいわけないだろう！

engChrName: How do we know that working for the CID wasn't just a cover story and you were secretly working with Grimcat?!
engSearchText:
How do we know that working for the CID wasn't
just a cover story and you were secretly working
with Grimcat?!
jpnChrName: 依頼を隠れ蓑に、裏でグリムキャッツと 通じていない証拠がどこにある！？
jpnSearchText:
依頼を隠れ蓑に、裏でグリムキャッツと
通じていない証拠がどこにある！？

engChrName: Oh, c'mon. It's a cop's job to prove we're guilty, not ours to prove we're innocent.
engSearchText:
Oh, c'mon. It's a cop's job to prove we're guilty, not
ours to prove we're innocent.
jpnChrName: あのなぁ……証拠ってのは やったことに対して出すもんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
あのなぁ……証拠ってのは
やったことに対して出すもんだろうが。

engChrName: You guys sure suck at this. Maybe you should think about a career change.
engSearchText:
You guys sure suck at this. Maybe you should think
about a career change.
jpnChrName: やってないことに証拠を求めるのは 捜査官として無能の表れじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
やってないことに証拠を求めるのは
捜査官として無能の表れじゃねえのか？

engChrName: S-Say that again!
engSearchText: S-Say that again!
jpnChrName: な、なんだとぉ──！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだとぉ──！？

engChrName: So, what? She steal somethin' from a government building?
engSearchText:
So, what? She steal somethin' from a
government building?
jpnChrName: 察するにどこぞの省庁に 予告付きで入られたわけか。
jpnSearchText:
察するにどこぞの省庁に
予告付きで入られたわけか。

engChrName: After she told you she was coming, too. But man, you STILL couldn't stop her.
engSearchText:
After she told you she was coming, too. But man, you
STILL couldn't stop her.
jpnChrName: それで待ち構えてたはいいが 裏をかかれてまんまと逃げられたと。
jpnSearchText:
それで待ち構えてたはいいが
裏をかかれてまんまと逃げられたと。

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...
jpnChrName: ぐぅ……
jpnSearchText: ぐぅ……

engChrName: I mean, can't say I don't feel bad for you, gettin' screwed over like that.
engSearchText:
I mean, can't say I don't feel bad for you, gettin'
screwed over like that.
jpnChrName: ま、無様にやられたのは同情するが……
jpnSearchText: ま、無様にやられたのは同情するが……

engChrName: But don't go takin' your frustration out on good, law-abiding citizens.
engSearchText:
But don't go takin' your frustration out on good,
law-abiding citizens.
jpnChrName: それで善良な市民に八つ当たりすんのは 流石に見苦しくねえか？
jpnSearchText:
それで善良な市民に八つ当たりすんのは
流石に見苦しくねえか？

engChrName: You? A good, law-abiding citizen?! Besides, she only caught us off guard because she used the dark and that gas—
engSearchText:
You? A good, law-abiding citizen?! Besides, she only
caught us off guard because she used the dark and
that gas—
jpnChrName: う、うるさいっ！　誰が善良な市民だ！ そもそも暗闇とガスを使うなんて卑怯な──
jpnSearchText:
う、うるさいっ！　誰が善良な市民だ！
そもそも暗闇とガスを使うなんて卑怯な──

engChrName: NATE!
engSearchText: NATE!
jpnChrName: ネイト……！
jpnSearchText: ネイト……！

engChrName: Even putting Grimcat aside for a moment...
engSearchText: Even putting Grimcat aside for a moment...
jpnChrName: グリムキャッツを抜きにしても、だ。
jpnSearchText: グリムキャッツを抜きにしても、だ。

engChrName: ...what were you thinking, taking a student and a child into a place full of monsters?
engSearchText:
...what were you thinking, taking a student and a
child into a place full of monsters?
jpnChrName: 学生と子供を連れて魔獣が出没する場所に 潜り込むとはどういう了見だ？
jpnSearchText:
学生と子供を連れて魔獣が出没する場所に
潜り込むとはどういう了見だ？

engChrName: To say nothing of the dangerous-looking weapon the child had.
engSearchText:
To say nothing of the dangerous-looking weapon the
child had.
jpnChrName: しかもあんな物騒な得物を持たせといて。
jpnSearchText: しかもあんな物騒な得物を持たせといて。

engChrName: Yeeeah... That one you got a fair point with.
engSearchText: Yeeeah... That one you got a fair point with.
jpnChrName: いや……それについては お説ごもっともではあるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……それについては
お説ごもっともではあるけどよ。

engChrName: But it's not like I told 'em to come with me—I was just respecting their decisions.
engSearchText:
But it's not like I told 'em to come with me—I was
just respecting their decisions.
jpnChrName: それでもあくまで 本人たちの自由意志を尊重した結果だ。
jpnSearchText:
それでもあくまで
本人たちの自由意志を尊重した結果だ。

engChrName: As for the weapon, did you want us to take care of a tough CID request with our bare hands or somethin'?
engSearchText:
As for the weapon, did you want us to take care of a
tough CID request with our bare hands or somethin'?
jpnChrName: そもそもＣＩＤから回ってきた“掃除”── 武器も持たずに素手でやれってか？
jpnSearchText:
そもそもＣＩＤから回ってきた“掃除”──
武器も持たずに素手でやれってか？

engChrName: I tell ya, is this any way to treat people who worked for the good of their country?
engSearchText:
I tell ya, is this any way to treat people who worked
for the good of their country?
jpnChrName: 結果的にお国のために働いたっつーのに、 随分な扱いじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
結果的にお国のために働いたっつーのに、
随分な扱いじゃねえか。

engChrName: If you were thinking of your country, you'd be a little more cooperative with its law enforcement!
engSearchText:
If you were thinking of your country, you'd be a little
more cooperative with its law enforcement!
jpnChrName: 国のためなら国家警察への 真摯な協力はあって然るべきだろう！
jpnSearchText:
国のためなら国家警察への
真摯な協力はあって然るべきだろう！

engChrName: Yet you never share more information than necessary, wield deadly weapons of unknown origin, and now you're training children in combat!
engSearchText:
Yet you never share more information than necessary,
wield deadly weapons of unknown origin, and now
you're training children in combat!
jpnChrName: なのに情報提供を拒否、危険な武装の所持と 年端もいかない戦闘員を育成しているなど……
jpnSearchText:
なのに情報提供を拒否、危険な武装の所持と
年端もいかない戦闘員を育成しているなど……

engChrName: No one could be blamed for thinking you might be colluding with terrorists!
engSearchText:
No one could be blamed for thinking you might be
colluding with terrorists!
jpnChrName: テロリストと繋がっていると 見なされても仕方がないと思うがな！？
jpnSearchText:
テロリストと繋がっていると
見なされても仕方がないと思うがな！？

engChrName: So, are either of you feeling ready to talk now?
engSearchText: So, are either of you feeling ready to talk now?
jpnChrName: ねえ、何か話す気になった？
jpnSearchText: ねえ、何か話す気になった？

engChrName: *sigh* This is getting me nowhere...
engSearchText: *sigh* This is getting me nowhere...
jpnChrName: これじゃあ埒が明かないわね。 はぁ……仕方がない。
jpnSearchText:
これじゃあ埒が明かないわね。
はぁ……仕方がない。

engChrName: (I'll just have to give up and hope Inspector Daswani has better luck.)
engSearchText:
(I'll just have to give up and hope Inspector
Daswani has better luck.)
jpnChrName: （ダスワニ警部の方に期待して、   切り上げるしかなさそうね……）
jpnSearchText:
（ダスワニ警部の方に期待して、
切り上げるしかなさそうね……）

engChrName: Don't even think about it.
engSearchText: Don't even think about it.
jpnChrName: 無駄です。
jpnSearchText: 無駄です。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: I've received hostage training. You won't be able to torture a word out of me.
engSearchText:
I've received hostage training. You won't be able to
torture a word out of me.
jpnChrName: 捕虜となった際の訓練は受けています。 どんな拷問をされても決して屈しません。
jpnSearchText:
捕虜となった際の訓練は受けています。
どんな拷問をされても決して屈しません。

engChrName: ...Torture?
engSearchText: ...Torture?
jpnChrName: いや拷問って……
jpnSearchText: いや拷問って……

engChrName: But if you must try it, torture me and me alone!
engSearchText: But if you must try it, torture me and me alone!
jpnChrName: どんな拷問でも構いませんが、 やるならわたしにだけやってください。
jpnSearchText:
どんな拷問でも構いませんが、
やるならわたしにだけやってください。

engChrName: Please, leave Agnès out of this!
engSearchText: Please, leave Agnès out of this!
jpnChrName: どうかアニエスさんには ひどいことをしないでくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
どうかアニエスさんには
ひどいことをしないでくださいっ！

engChrName: Umm... Thanks?
engSearchText: Umm... Thanks?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん…… えっと……ありがと？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん……
えっと……ありがと？

engChrName: But it wouldn't sit right with me if you were the only one who suffered.
engSearchText:
But it wouldn't sit right with me if you were the only
one who suffered.
jpnChrName: ──でも私もフェリちゃんにだけ 背負わせるつもりはありません。
jpnSearchText:
──でも私もフェリちゃんにだけ
背負わせるつもりはありません。

engChrName: So we're going to suffer through this together!
engSearchText: So we're going to suffer through this together!
jpnChrName: 二人で一緒に乗り越えましょう！
jpnSearchText: 二人で一緒に乗り越えましょう！

engChrName: Aww! You're so kind!
engSearchText: Aww! You're so kind!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんっ……！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさんっ……！

engChrName: No one's going to be suffering anything! The press would have a field day!
engSearchText:
No one's going to be suffering anything! The press
would have a field day!
jpnChrName: しないわよ拷問なんてっ！ ただでさえマスコミがうるさいのに……！
jpnSearchText:
しないわよ拷問なんてっ！
ただでさえマスコミがうるさいのに……！

engChrName: And you really shouldn't put yourselves in danger like that again—especially with shady men like that one.
engSearchText:
And you really shouldn't put yourselves in danger like
that again—especially with shady men like that one.
jpnChrName: でもね、あんな胡散臭い男と 危ないことをするのはもうよしなさい。
jpnSearchText:
でもね、あんな胡散臭い男と
危ないことをするのはもうよしなさい。

engChrName: I'm saying this for your own good—
engSearchText: I'm saying this for your own good—
jpnChrName: これは貴女たちのために言って──
jpnSearchText: これは貴女たちのために言って──

engChrName: Yes, I'm actually questioning them right now...
engSearchText: Yes, I'm actually questioning them right now...
jpnChrName: はい、今取り調べ中で……
jpnSearchText: はい、今取り調べ中で……

engChrName: ...What?!
engSearchText: ...What?!

engChrName: Umm... You're serious?
engSearchText: Umm... You're serious?
jpnChrName: ………いえ、その…… ……マジですか……？
jpnSearchText:
………いえ、その……
……マジですか……？

engChrName: (What's up with that reaction? It's clearly not René this time.)
engSearchText:
(What's up with that reaction? It's clearly not René
this time.)
jpnChrName: （この反応……ルネじゃない？）
jpnSearchText: （この反応……ルネじゃない？）

engChrName: I thought that was going to be the CID again, not...
engSearchText: I thought that was going to be the CID again, not...
jpnChrName: ……またＣＩＤからと思ったが まさかあんな所からのお達しとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……またＣＩＤからと思ったが
まさかあんな所からのお達しとはな。

engChrName: Just who is that girl?
engSearchText: Just who is that girl?
jpnChrName: 一体何モンだ、あっちにいる──
jpnSearchText: 一体何モンだ、あっちにいる──

engChrName: Oh, whatever. Just get out of here!
engSearchText: Oh, whatever. Just get out of here!
jpnChrName: もういい、とっとと出て行け！
jpnSearchText: もういい、とっとと出て行け！

engChrName: You ain't gotta tell me twice.
engSearchText: You ain't gotta tell me twice.
jpnChrName: へいへい。
jpnSearchText: へいへい。

engChrName: See ya!
engSearchText: See ya!
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、ご苦労さん～。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、ご苦労さん～。

engChrName: Man, that was a headache I didn't need. This is all that kinkster's fault.
engSearchText:
Man, that was a headache I didn't need. This is all
that kinkster's fault.
jpnChrName: ったく、とんだとばっちりだったぜ。 これもあの痴女のせいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、とんだとばっちりだったぜ。
これもあの痴女のせいだ。

engChrName: I always knew I might find myself facing off against police one day...
engSearchText:
I always knew I might find myself facing off against
police one day...
jpnChrName: いずれ警察と対峙することも あると覚悟していましたが……
jpnSearchText:
いずれ警察と対峙することも
あると覚悟していましたが……

engChrName: ...but I didn't expect it to happen so soon after moving to Calvard.
engSearchText:
...but I didn't expect it to happen so soon after
moving to Calvard.
jpnChrName: こんな機会で実現するとは 少し意外でした。
jpnSearchText:
こんな機会で実現するとは
少し意外でした。

engChrName: I still can't believe I've now been interrogated twice in such a short time...
engSearchText:
I still can't believe I've now been interrogated twice in
such a short time...
jpnChrName: 私も、この短い期間で２回も警察で 事情聴取されるとは思いませんでした………
jpnSearchText:
私も、この短い期間で２回も警察で
事情聴取されるとは思いませんでした………

engChrName: Tell me about it... Gotta be rough for a model student like you, huh?
engSearchText:
Tell me about it... Gotta be rough for a model student
like you, huh?
jpnChrName: やれやれ……優等生の お嬢様にはちとキツかったか？
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……優等生の
お嬢様にはちとキツかったか？

engChrName: I-I'm fine! I'm part of this operation now, too!
engSearchText: I-I'm fine! I'm part of this operation now, too!
jpnChrName: い、いえ！　私も解決事務所の 一員ですから大丈夫です……！
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ！　私も解決事務所の
一員ですから大丈夫です……！

engChrName: Umm... Do you want me to teach you how to withstand torture in case you ever need it?
engSearchText:
Umm... Do you want me to teach you how to
withstand torture in case you ever need it?
jpnChrName: えと……あ、良かったらわたしが 対拷問の訓練法を教えましょうかっ？
jpnSearchText:
えと……あ、良かったらわたしが
対拷問の訓練法を教えましょうかっ？

engChrName: I-I'm certain I'm not going to need that...
engSearchText: I-I'm certain I'm not going to need that...
jpnChrName: そ、それはさすがに必要は……
jpnSearchText: そ、それはさすがに必要は……

engChrName: ...Or so I hope.
engSearchText: ...Or so I hope.
jpnChrName: 必要ないと……いいなぁ…………
jpnSearchText: 必要ないと……いいなぁ…………

engChrName: ...Hmm? Anyway, why were we just allowed to go like that?
engSearchText:
...Hmm? Anyway, why were we just allowed to go
like that?
jpnChrName: ……？　それにしてもどうして いきなり解放されたんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
……？　それにしてもどうして
いきなり解放されたんでしょう？

engChrName: Was wonderin' the same thing.
engSearchText: Was wonderin' the same thing.
jpnChrName: ああ…… やけにあっさりだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
やけにあっさりだったな。

engChrName: S-So was I...
engSearchText: S-So was I...
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてでしょうね……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしてでしょうね……

engChrName: (Surely they aren't on to me...?)
engSearchText: (Surely they aren't on to me...?)
jpnChrName: （まさか“あちら”の方から……   ううん、まだバレてないはず……！）
jpnSearchText:
（まさか“あちら”の方から……
ううん、まだバレてないはず……！）

engChrName: ...Anyway, that marks the end of the day's training. Good job, both of you.
engSearchText:
...Anyway, that marks the end of the day's training.
Good job, both of you.
jpnChrName: ……ま、とりあえず研修は終了だ。 二人ともご苦労だったな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、とりあえず研修は終了だ。
二人ともご苦労だったな。

engChrName: How about we go celebrate?
engSearchText: How about we go celebrate?
jpnChrName: 少し早いが、打ち上げに行くか。
jpnSearchText: 少し早いが、打ち上げに行くか。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Where are we going?
engSearchText: Where are we going?
jpnChrName: 打ち上げですか？
jpnSearchText: 打ち上げですか？

engChrName: To the movie theater we walked past earlier. It's on me.
engSearchText:
To the movie theater we walked past earlier. It's
on me.
jpnChrName: 昼間の映画館、あそこで映画鑑賞だ。 今回は大盤振る舞いで奢ってやる。
jpnSearchText:
昼間の映画館、あそこで映画鑑賞だ。
今回は大盤振る舞いで奢ってやる。

engChrName: Really?! Yaaay!
engSearchText: Really?! Yaaay!
jpnChrName: わぁ～、映画鑑賞！！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～、映画鑑賞！！

engChrName: There's one movie I've had my eye on for a while, so this is as good a chance as any to check it out.
engSearchText:
There's one movie I've had my eye on for a while,
so this is as good a chance as any to check it out.
jpnChrName: ちょうど気になった映画があってな、 そのついでだ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど気になった映画があってな、
そのついでだ。

engChrName: And just so we're clear, I'm not bein' baited by the churros. Okay?
engSearchText:
And just so we're clear, I'm not bein' baited by
the churros. Okay?
jpnChrName: 言っとくが限定販売のチュロスに 釣られたわけじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが限定販売のチュロスに
釣られたわけじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Heehee. Oh, I'm sure. Then shall we get going?
engSearchText: Heehee. Oh, I'm sure. Then shall we get going?
jpnChrName: ふふ、分かっています。 それじゃあ行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、分かっています。
それじゃあ行きましょうか。

engChrName: I can't wait!
engSearchText: I can't wait!
jpnChrName: 楽しみです、映画！
jpnSearchText: 楽しみです、映画！

engChrName: I have to admit, I never thought you would be the one asking to go out with me.
engSearchText:
I have to admit, I never thought you would be the one
asking to go out with me.
jpnChrName: いや～、まさか君の方から お誘いがあるとは思わなかった。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、まさか君の方から
お誘いがあるとは思わなかった。

engChrName: We did appear at an event together... Was that all it took to spark such a passionate plea?
engSearchText:
We did appear at an event together... Was that all
it took to spark such a passionate plea?
jpnChrName: 以前イベントで同席したが…… 思った以上に情熱的なんだね？
jpnSearchText:
以前イベントで同席したが……
思った以上に情熱的なんだね？

engChrName: Hah. I'd like to believe I put more passion into my films than anyone, if nothing else.
engSearchText:
Hah. I'd like to believe I put more passion into my
films than anyone, if nothing else.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: フフ、映画に込める“熱”は 誰にも負けるつもりはないしね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、映画に込める“熱”は
誰にも負けるつもりはないしね。

engChrName: I'm sure it's the same with you and racing. And now these two passionate souls can finally have the talk I've always wanted.
engSearchText:
I'm sure it's the same with you and racing. And now
these two passionate souls can finally have the talk
I've always wanted.
jpnChrName: 貴方がレースに込めるのと同じ…… 一度、話をしてみたいと思ってたの。
jpnSearchText:
貴方がレースに込めるのと同じ……
一度、話をしてみたいと思ってたの。

engChrName: Even if I feel bad for your girlfriend and fans for meeting with you like this.
engSearchText:
Even if I feel bad for your girlfriend and fans for
meeting with you like this.
jpnChrName: 貴方のファンや恋人さんに ちょっと悪い気もするけど。
jpnSearchText:
貴方のファンや恋人さんに
ちょっと悪い気もするけど。

engChrName: My partner in life is my car, I'll have you know.
engSearchText: My partner in life is my car, I'll have you know.
jpnChrName: いやいや、これでもマシンが恋人でね。
jpnSearchText: いやいや、これでもマシンが恋人でね。

engChrName: Of course, I have been known to savor some special moments with only the most beautiful of women.
engSearchText:
Of course, I have been known to savor some special
moments with only the most beautiful of women.
jpnChrName: もちろん麗しく魅力的な女性相手には その限りじゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん麗しく魅力的な女性相手には
その限りじゃないけど。

engChrName: Oh, look at you, laying on the charm.
engSearchText: Oh, look at you, laying on the charm.
jpnChrName: あら、お上手ね。
jpnSearchText: あら、お上手ね。

engChrName: So...no girlfriend? Could I take that to mean that you also don't have a wife or kids?
engSearchText:
So...no girlfriend? Could I take that to mean that
you also don't have a wife or kids?
jpnChrName: でも──恋人はともかく、 奥さんやお子さんはいらっしゃったり？
jpnSearchText:
でも──恋人はともかく、
奥さんやお子さんはいらっしゃったり？

engChrName: ...?! O-Of course I don't! Haha...
engSearchText: ...?! O-Of course I don't! Haha...
jpnChrName: っ……！？ そ、そんなわけ無いじゃないか～！
jpnSearchText:
っ……！？
そ、そんなわけ無いじゃないか～！

engChrName: Anyway, it would be a shame to just let the evening end with dinner now that we're together like this.
engSearchText:
Anyway, it would be a shame to just let the evening
end with dinner now that we're together like this.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ折角の機会だ。 食事だけなのも勿体ないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ折角の機会だ。
食事だけなのも勿体ないだろう。

engChrName: What do you say to joining me for a drive on the expressway?
engSearchText:
What do you say to joining me for a drive on
the expressway?
jpnChrName: ──お近づきの印にこれから 首都高ドライブに招待するよ。
jpnSearchText:
──お近づきの印にこれから
首都高ドライブに招待するよ。

engChrName: As for whether that will be where the night ends... well, that will be up to us.
engSearchText:
As for whether that will be where the night ends...
well, that will be up to us.
jpnChrName: その先はどうなるか…… 僕と君しだいになるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
その先はどうなるか……
僕と君しだいになるけどね。

engChrName: ...Oho.
engSearchText: ...Oho.
jpnChrName: ふぅん……？
jpnSearchText: ふぅん……？

engChrName: (He sure is used to this... He makes even cringeworthy lines like that seem totally natural.)
engSearchText:
(He sure is used to this... He makes even
cringeworthy lines like that seem totally natural.)
jpnChrName: （……さすが手慣れてるわね。   歯の浮く台詞も様になってるし。）
jpnSearchText:
（……さすが手慣れてるわね。
歯の浮く台詞も様になってるし。）

engChrName: (Eh, whatever. This is my chance to see if there's any truth to that rumor about him traveling the country.)
engSearchText:
(Eh, whatever. This is my chance to see if there's
any truth to that rumor about him traveling
the country.)
jpnChrName: （まあいいわ、各地に出向いている噂──   バッチリ確かめさせてもらうわよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあいいわ、各地に出向いている噂──
バッチリ確かめさせてもらうわよ。）

engChrName: That's fine by me. I'm looking forward to seeing how fast you can—
engSearchText:
That's fine by me. I'm looking forward to seeing how
fast you can—
jpnChrName: ええ、構わないわ。 それじゃあお手並み拝見と──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、構わないわ。
それじゃあお手並み拝見と──
……！？

engChrName: Wh-What was...?
engSearchText: Wh-What was...?
jpnChrName: な、なんだ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだ！？

engChrName: Z1 racer Maxim Lugan! I'm a reporter with Buzzraider Magazine!
engSearchText:
Z1 racer Maxim Lugan! I'm a reporter with
Buzzraider Magazine!
jpnChrName: Ｚ１トップレーサー、マクシム・ルーガンさん！ 《バズレイダー》の者です！
jpnSearchText:
Ｚ１トップレーサー、マクシム・ルーガンさん！
《バズレイダー》の者です！

engChrName: Think we could steal a few minutes of your time?
engSearchText: Think we could steal a few minutes of your time?
jpnChrName: お話を聞かせてもらえないでしょうか！？
jpnSearchText: お話を聞かせてもらえないでしょうか！？

engChrName: B-Buzzraider?! Not the gossip rag that's even worse than Meld...
engSearchText:
B-Buzzraider?! Not the gossip rag that's even worse
than Meld...
jpnChrName: バ、バズレイダー！？ 《メルド》以上にタチの悪いゴシップか。
jpnSearchText:
バ、バズレイダー！？
《メルド》以上にタチの悪いゴシップか。

engChrName: I'll take that as a yes! Excellent.
engSearchText: I'll take that as a yes! Excellent.
jpnChrName: それでですね、マクシムさん！
jpnSearchText: それでですね、マクシムさん！

engChrName: So, we know you've been everywhere from Tharbad and Langport to Messeldam and Crossbell in the past three months.
engSearchText:
So, we know you've been everywhere from Tharbad
and Langport to Messeldam and Crossbell in the
past three months.
jpnChrName: ここ３ヶ月の間、サルバッドにラングポート、 メッセルダムにクロスベル自治州まで……
jpnSearchText:
ここ３ヶ月の間、サルバッドにラングポート、
メッセルダムにクロスベル自治州まで……

engChrName: You're a bit of a globetrotter in your off time, wouldn't you say?
engSearchText:
You're a bit of a globetrotter in your off time,
wouldn't you say?
jpnChrName: オフ中あちこちに行ってますよね！？
jpnSearchText: オフ中あちこちに行ってますよね！？

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnSearchText: なっ……！？

engChrName: Now, it's clear you've been living up to your single status to find yourself a girl in every town.
engSearchText:
Now, it's clear you've been living up to your single
status to find yourself a girl in every town.
jpnChrName: 独身なのをいいことに各地で “愛人”を作ってのやりたい放題──
jpnSearchText:
独身なのをいいことに各地で
“愛人”を作ってのやりたい放題──

engChrName: Then could it be you're on the hunt for one here in Edith now, too?
engSearchText:
Then could it be you're on the hunt for one here in
Edith now, too?
jpnChrName: いよいよ首都でも解禁ってわけですか！？
jpnSearchText: いよいよ首都でも解禁ってわけですか！？

engChrName: How did you...? Have you been following me EVERYWHERE I go?!
engSearchText:
How did you...? Have you been following me
EVERYWHERE I go?!
jpnChrName: どうしてそれを…… まさか毎回尾けていたのか！？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてそれを……
まさか毎回尾けていたのか！？

engChrName: Ugh... I'll admit that I spend my nights out on the town, but that's not why I'm traveling around—
engSearchText:
Ugh... I'll admit that I spend my nights out on the
town, but that's not why I'm traveling around—
jpnChrName: くっ、確かに夜遊びくらいはしてるが、 ちゃんと目的は別に──
jpnSearchText:
くっ、確かに夜遊びくらいはしてるが、
ちゃんと目的は別に──

engChrName: HOLY CANNOLI!
engSearchText: HOLY CANNOLI!
jpnChrName: あああああっ！！？
jpnSearchText: あああああっ！！？

jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: W-Wait! She's got nothing to do with—
engSearchText: W-Wait! She's got nothing to do with—
jpnChrName: ま、待ってくれ、彼女は別に──
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってくれ、彼女は別に──

engChrName: I can't believe what a scoop we have on our hands. Meld's gonna be eating our dust with this one!
engSearchText:
I can't believe what a scoop we have on our hands.
Meld's gonna be eating our dust with this one!
jpnChrName: まさかこんな大物がかかるとは……！ よぉし──これで《メルド》に勝てる！！
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな大物がかかるとは……！
よぉし──これで《メルド》に勝てる！！

engChrName: So, how long have the two of you been dating, Ms. Judith Lanster?!
engSearchText:
So, how long have the two of you been dating, Ms.
Judith Lanster?!
jpnChrName: いつからのお付き合いなんですか── トップ女優、ジュディス・ランスターさん！？
jpnSearchText:
いつからのお付き合いなんですか──
トップ女優、ジュディス・ランスターさん！？

engChrName: Nice to see you again. I see you've got a new recruit.
engSearchText: Nice to see you again. I see you've got a new recruit.
jpnChrName: お前らか……って、 この前とは違う顔ぶれだな。
jpnSearchText:
お前らか……って、
この前とは違う顔ぶれだな。

engChrName: Strange time for a new hire...though why do I feel like I know you from somewhere?
engSearchText:
Strange time for a new hire...though why do I feel
like I know you from somewhere?
jpnChrName: よくこんな時に新入りを── ってどこかで見た顔みたいだが？
jpnSearchText:
よくこんな時に新入りを──
ってどこかで見た顔みたいだが？

engChrName: Ahaha. Oh, no worries. I get that a lot...
engSearchText: Ahaha. Oh, no worries. I get that a lot...
jpnChrName: あはは……気のせいでは？
jpnSearchText: あはは……気のせいでは？

engChrName: Business has been boomin' lately, is all. Enough to justify splurging for another temp.
engSearchText:
Business has been boomin' lately, is all. Enough to
justify splurging for another temp.
jpnChrName: それなりに忙しくてな。 臨時のバイトくらいは雇うさ。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに忙しくてな。
臨時のバイトくらいは雇うさ。

engChrName: Well, you sure know how to pick the pretty ones! Hey, miss, ever wanted to go out for dinner with an officer of the law?
engSearchText:
Well, you sure know how to pick the pretty ones!
Hey, miss, ever wanted to go out for dinner with an
officer of the law?
jpnChrName: おおっ、またもや凄い美人さん！ ねえねえ、よかったらお茶しない！？
jpnSearchText:
おおっ、またもや凄い美人さん！
ねえねえ、よかったらお茶しない！？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと………
jpnSearchText: えっと………

engChrName: You idiot. Show some class—this isn't the place or the time.
engSearchText:
You idiot. Show some class—this isn't the place or
the time.
jpnChrName: 馬鹿野郎……時と場合を考えろ。
jpnSearchText: 馬鹿野郎……時と場合を考えろ。

engChrName: S-Sorry... I was just hoping to lighten the mood before this conference.
engSearchText:
S-Sorry... I was just hoping to lighten the mood
before this conference.
jpnChrName: す、すいません…… 会議前にちょっと和みたくて。
jpnSearchText:
す、すいません……
会議前にちょっと和みたくて。

engChrName: The air's so heavy right now, I almost can't take it.
engSearchText: The air's so heavy right now, I almost can't take it.
jpnChrName: いくらなんでも空気が重すぎて 耐えられそうにないっていうか……
jpnSearchText:
いくらなんでも空気が重すぎて
耐えられそうにないっていうか……

engChrName: Is the conference on what to do about A?
engSearchText: Is the conference on what to do about A?
jpnChrName: ……会議ってのは、 《Ａ》の対策についてか？
jpnSearchText:
……会議ってのは、
《Ａ》の対策についてか？

engChrName: Exactly that. We knew they were trouble, but I think we underestimated just how much.
engSearchText:
Exactly that. We knew they were trouble, but I think
we underestimated just how much.
jpnChrName: ……そうだ。 ヤバイ連中だとは思ったが、ここまでとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ。
ヤバイ連中だとは思ったが、ここまでとはな。

engChrName: A-Are you sure it's all right to be telling them that, sir?
engSearchText:
A-Are you sure it's all right to be telling them
that, sir?
jpnChrName: け、警部！？ 彼らに話しちゃっていいんですか？
jpnSearchText:
け、警部！？
彼らに話しちゃっていいんですか？

engChrName: If it wasn't, I wouldn't have done it. It's not as though they're uninvolved in all of this.
engSearchText:
If it wasn't, I wouldn't have done it. It's not as though
they're uninvolved in all of this.
jpnChrName: ま、こいつらも部外者じゃないだろう。
jpnSearchText: ま、こいつらも部外者じゃないだろう。

engChrName: We might not always see eye to eye, but I think all of us are at least united in not wanting what happened in Creil to happen ever again.
engSearchText:
We might not always see eye to eye, but I think all of
us are at least united in not wanting what happened
in Creil to happen ever again.
jpnChrName: クレイユの二の舞は絶対に阻止する── 多分、その思いだけは同じなハズだ。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユの二の舞は絶対に阻止する──
多分、その思いだけは同じなハズだ。

engChrName: Sir...
engSearchText: Sir...
jpnChrName: 警部……
jpnSearchText: 警部……

engChrName: You're damn right there. Don't know how much we can contribute, but we'll do what we can.
engSearchText:
You're damn right there. Don't know how much we
can contribute, but we'll do what we can.
jpnChrName: ああ── 及ばずながら、だがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
及ばずながら、だがな。

engChrName: I can't help but wonder why they even picked Creil as their target in the first place.
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder why they even picked Creil as
their target in the first place.
jpnChrName: ……そもそもどうして クレイユ村だったんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……そもそもどうして
クレイユ村だったんでしょう。

engChrName: It was such a beautiful, peaceful village full of kind people. There was nothing that made it stand out.
engSearchText:
It was such a beautiful, peaceful village full of
kind people. There was nothing that made it
stand out.
jpnChrName: 自然に囲まれた、平和で穏やかな村。 それ以外は何もないはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
自然に囲まれた、平和で穏やかな村。
それ以外は何もないはずなのに……

engChrName: Yeah. It's not like they had specific enemies there like Aida's unit.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's not like they had specific enemies there like
Aida's unit.
jpnChrName: はい……アイーダさんたちのような “標的”がいたわけでも無さそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
はい……アイーダさんたちのような
“標的”がいたわけでも無さそうですし。

engChrName: There's been discussion in some circles that it might have been racially motivated, but it's just rumor at this point.
engSearchText:
There's been discussion in some circles that it might
have been racially motivated, but it's just rumor at
this point.
jpnChrName: 一部で囁かれている噂だが…… 民族・人種問題が絡んでる可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
一部で囁かれている噂だが……
民族・人種問題が絡んでる可能性もある。

engChrName: Really, now...?
engSearchText: Really, now...?
jpnChrName: 民族・人種問題……
jpnSearchText: 民族・人種問題……

engChrName: It's not like this is the first time we've heard Almata's been funded by racist terrorists, so it's not implausible.
engSearchText:
It's not like this is the first time we've heard Almata's
been funded by racist terrorists, so it's
not implausible.
jpnChrName: ……そちら方面から連中に 資金が流れてるっつうのは聞いたが。
jpnSearchText:
……そちら方面から連中に
資金が流れてるっつうのは聞いたが。

engChrName: Now that I'm thinking about it, people do say it's got a lot of immigrants for a village up north.
engSearchText:
Now that I'm thinking about it, people do say it's got
a lot of immigrants for a village up north.
jpnChrName: ハッ……北の方にしちゃ珍しく 移民が多い村だったらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……北の方にしちゃ珍しく
移民が多い村だったらしいが。

engChrName: Even that could be a pretext, I fear.
engSearchText: Even that could be a pretext, I fear.
jpnChrName: いいえ── それすら“口実”の可能性もあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ──
それすら“口実”の可能性もあるわ。

engChrName: Ms. Rouran.
engSearchText: Ms. Rouran.
jpnChrName: ロウラン室長……
jpnSearchText: ロウラン室長……

engChrName: Good day to you, detectives. Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Good day to you, detectives. Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様、ダスワニ警部、 アークライド事務所の皆さんも。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ様、ダスワニ警部、
アークライド事務所の皆さんも。

engChrName: You're...
engSearchText: You're...
jpnChrName: 皆さんは……
jpnSearchText: 皆さんは……

engChrName: Here all the way from Vantail, huh?
engSearchText: Here all the way from Vantail, huh?
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… ヴァンタイユ（一区）からお出ましか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
ヴァンタイユ（一区）からお出ましか。

engChrName: Funny how you meet someone for the first time and then just happen to bump into 'em again and again, huh?
engSearchText:
Funny how you meet someone for the first time and
then just happen to bump into 'em again and
again, huh?
jpnChrName: ──室長さんもそうだが、 どうも知った顔に良く会うな。
jpnSearchText:
──室長さんもそうだが、
どうも知った顔に良く会うな。

engChrName: Yes, it's...funny.
engSearchText: Yes, it's...funny.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、そうね。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、そうね。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to run into you again this soon, either.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to run into you again this
soon, either.
jpnChrName: こんなに早く再会するとは……
jpnSearchText: こんなに早く再会するとは……

engChrName: Are the three of you here to take part in this conference, too, then?
engSearchText:
Are the three of you here to take part in this
conference, too, then?
jpnChrName: ここに来たってことは、 会議とやらに参加するためか？
jpnSearchText:
ここに来たってことは、
会議とやらに参加するためか？

engChrName: That is correct. The president has ordered that the army and the police work together on quelling this crisis.
engSearchText:
That is correct. The president has ordered that the
army and the police work together on quelling
this crisis.
jpnChrName: ええ──軍と警察が大統領府の指示で 連携して事態の収拾に当たっているから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──軍と警察が大統領府の指示で
連携して事態の収拾に当たっているから。

engChrName: We at the CID will be serving as a bridge between the two organizations.
engSearchText:
We at the CID will be serving as a bridge between
the two organizations.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ（ウチ）も橋渡しをする必要があるのよ。
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤ（ウチ）も橋渡しをする必要があるのよ。

engChrName: ...Then your goal is to lure Almata out of hiding?
engSearchText: ...Then your goal is to lure Almata out of hiding?
jpnChrName: ……やはりアルマータを 炙り出すため、ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
……やはりアルマータを
炙り出すため、ですよね？

engChrName: That is one goal, certainly. Our first objective is ensuring the safety of the capital—then we can begin the next phase of our operation.
engSearchText:
That is one goal, certainly. Our first objective is
ensuring the safety of the capital—then we can begin
the next phase of our operation.
jpnChrName: それもあるけど、まずは首都の安全。 確保できしだい次のフェイズに移行するわ。
jpnSearchText:
それもあるけど、まずは首都の安全。
確保できしだい次のフェイズに移行するわ。

engChrName: According to our expert sources, the artifacts in their possession thankfully don't give them the ability to teleport over large distances.
engSearchText:
According to our expert sources, the artifacts in their
possession thankfully don't give them the ability to
teleport over large distances.
jpnChrName: ただ専門家の分析では、彼らの所持する遺物は “長距離転位”までは出来ないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ただ専門家の分析では、彼らの所持する遺物は
“長距離転位”までは出来ないみたいね。

engChrName: That means it shouldn't take us that long to bolster the city's defenses.
engSearchText:
That means it shouldn't take us that long to bolster
the city's defenses.
jpnChrName: その意味では、首都の防衛体制が 整うのも時間は掛からないはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味では、首都の防衛体制が
整うのも時間は掛からないはずよ。

engChrName: Heh. I don't need two guesses on who those expert sources are.
engSearchText:
Heh. I don't need two guesses on who those expert
sources are.
jpnChrName: 専門家……あの連中か。
jpnSearchText: 専門家……あの連中か。

engChrName: More shady people?
engSearchText: More shady people?
jpnChrName: え、また何か 怪しいツテがあるわけ？
jpnSearchText:
え、また何か
怪しいツテがあるわけ？

engChrName: Marduk has reached the same conclusion. The odds of Edith being Almata's next target are low.
engSearchText:
Marduk has reached the same conclusion. The odds
of Edith being Almata's next target are low.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社も同じ分析結果を出しています。 次に首都が襲撃対象になる可能性は低いかと。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社も同じ分析結果を出しています。
次に首都が襲撃対象になる可能性は低いかと。

engChrName: We're going to be working on more thorough measures to eradicate them, but those may take a while.
engSearchText:
We're going to be working on more thorough
measures to eradicate them, but those may take
a while.
jpnChrName: もちろん具体的な対策は 同時進行で進んでいるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん具体的な対策は
同時進行で進んでいるけれど……

engChrName: In the meantime, we're going to have to rely on slightly more unusual measures to keep everyone safe.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, we're going to have to rely on
slightly more unusual measures to keep everyone safe.
jpnChrName: ……恐らく今回はかなり、 イレギュラーな対応になるでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
……恐らく今回はかなり、
イレギュラーな対応になるでしょうね。

engChrName: Which is why you decided to leak Dingo's video?
engSearchText: Which is why you decided to leak Dingo's video?
jpnChrName: ハン……そのためにディンゴが遺した 映像データを流出させたんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……そのためにディンゴが遺した
映像データを流出させたんだろうが。

engChrName: I'm sure a bunch of jaegers will be in action after what's happened on behalf of clients.
engSearchText:
I'm sure a bunch of jaegers will be in action after
what's happened on behalf of clients.
jpnChrName: ……雇い主は色々でしょうが 幾つかの猟兵団が動いていそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……雇い主は色々でしょうが
幾つかの猟兵団が動いていそうです。

engChrName: And I doubt Heiyue's gonna stay quiet.
engSearchText: And I doubt Heiyue's gonna stay quiet.
jpnChrName: ま、黒月も黙っちゃいねえだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ま、黒月も黙っちゃいねえだろうな。

engChrName: I expect the same will be true of my own employer. They will involve themselves in this in some way or another.
engSearchText:
I expect the same will be true of my own employer.
They will involve themselves in this in some way
or another.
jpnChrName: “本社”も恐らく、何らかの形で 今回の件に関わってくるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
“本社”も恐らく、何らかの形で
今回の件に関わってくるでしょう。

engChrName: I wouldn't quite say we're trying to fight evil with evil, but at the very least, the army and the police may not be enough.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't quite say we're trying to fight evil with evil,
but at the very least, the army and the police may not
be enough.
jpnChrName: 蛇の道は蛇……ではないけれど 万全を期すには軍と警察だけでは足りない。
jpnSearchText:
蛇の道は蛇……ではないけれど
万全を期すには軍と警察だけでは足りない。

engChrName: So the president believes.
engSearchText: So the president believes.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも大統領閣下はそうお考えのようね。
jpnSearchText: 少なくとも大統領閣下はそうお考えのようね。

engChrName: (Sh-Should we really be hearing all of this?)
engSearchText: (Sh-Should we really be hearing all of this?)
jpnChrName: （これ……僕たちが   聞いちゃってもいいんですかね？）
jpnSearchText:
（これ……僕たちが
聞いちゃってもいいんですかね？）

engChrName: (I understand how you feel, but keep your head down and listen. This knowledge could be useful to you someday.)
engSearchText:
(I understand how you feel, but keep your head down
and listen. This knowledge could be useful to
you someday.)
jpnChrName: （気持ちは分かるが黙って聞いてろ。   いつか役に立つはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（気持ちは分かるが黙って聞いてろ。
いつか役に立つはずだ。）

engChrName: So is René with the president?
engSearchText: So is René with the president?
jpnChrName: ちなみにルネのヤツは大統領のトコか？
jpnSearchText: ちなみにルネのヤツは大統領のトコか？

engChrName: I'm assumin' so, since he's got the fancy temp title of 'presidential aide' and all.
engSearchText:
I'm assumin' so, since he's got the fancy temp title of
'presidential aide' and all.
jpnChrName: “臨時補佐官”なんて 大層な肩書を賜ったみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
“臨時補佐官”なんて
大層な肩書を賜ったみたいだが。

engChrName: He is. He's currently on loan to the president, serving as our point of contact in his vicinity.
engSearchText:
He is. He's currently on loan to the president, serving
as our point of contact in his vicinity.
jpnChrName: ええ、大統領府付きの“出向”になるわ。 ホットラインはあって然るべきだから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大統領府付きの“出向”になるわ。
ホットラインはあって然るべきだから。

engChrName: I'm confident that he will do a first-rate job—though I can't help but worry about just what that entails to an ambitious man like him.
engSearchText:
I'm confident that he will do a first-rate job—though
I can't help but worry about just what that entails to
an ambitious man like him.
jpnChrName: 彼なら問題ないでしょうけど…… まあ、別の意味では少しだけ心配ね。
jpnSearchText:
彼なら問題ないでしょうけど……
まあ、別の意味では少しだけ心配ね。

engChrName: Yeah, I feel you.
engSearchText: Yeah, I feel you.
jpnChrName: ま、気持ちは分かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、気持ちは分かるぜ。

engChrName: Oh, right. I have a message from you-know-who.
engSearchText: Oh, right. I have a message from you-know-who.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに“あの方”からの伝言だ。
jpnSearchText: ……ちなみに“あの方”からの伝言だ。

engChrName: He says that the group sealing off the mountains to the south of Longlai is acting off.
engSearchText:
He says that the group sealing off the mountains to
the south of Longlai is acting off.
jpnChrName: 龍來南の山脈方面を封鎖している “例の団”にも動きがあったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
龍來南の山脈方面を封鎖している
“例の団”にも動きがあったらしい。

engChrName: And this is from me: if you're going to meddle, just be careful.
engSearchText:
And this is from me: if you're going to meddle, just
be careful.
jpnChrName: アンタらがどう首を突っ込むかは 知らないが、気に掛けておくんだな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらがどう首を突っ込むかは
知らないが、気に掛けておくんだな。

engChrName: Thanks for the heads up. Give him our regards, too.
engSearchText: Thanks for the heads up. Give him our regards, too.
jpnChrName: そうか…… 御大にも礼を言っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
御大にも礼を言っててくれ。

engChrName: That's Ikaruga, right?
engSearchText: That's Ikaruga, right?
jpnChrName: それって、あの《斑鳩</R>》とかいう……
jpnSearchText: それって、あの《<R>斑鳩</R>》とかいう……

engChrName: Great. Not those monsters.
engSearchText: Great. Not those monsters.
jpnChrName: あのやべぇ連中もかよ……
jpnSearchText: あのやべぇ連中もかよ……

engChrName: The last thing we want is more trouble right now...
engSearchText: The last thing we want is more trouble right now...
jpnChrName: ますます混沌としてきたね……
jpnSearchText: ますます混沌としてきたね……

engChrName: It's almost time for the conference to begin, Inspector.
engSearchText:
It's almost time for the conference to
begin, Inspector.
jpnChrName: ──ダスワニ警部。 そろそろ会議の時間が……
jpnSearchText:
──ダスワニ警部。
そろそろ会議の時間が……

engChrName: Got it. Are you ready, Ms. Rouran?
engSearchText: Got it. Are you ready, Ms. Rouran?
jpnChrName: ああ、分かった。 ──室長、いいですかね？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、分かった。
──室長、いいですかね？

engChrName: Of course. Let's be going.
engSearchText: Of course. Let's be going.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、では行きましょう。
jpnSearchText: ごめんなさい、では行きましょう。

engChrName: I can't pretend to be a fan of the work you do...
engSearchText: I can't pretend to be a fan of the work you do...
jpnChrName: お前の仕事は気に喰わんが……
jpnSearchText: お前の仕事は気に喰わんが……

engChrName: ...but I know you're trying to stop this madness as much as we are.
engSearchText:
...but I know you're trying to stop this madness as
much as we are.
jpnChrName: それでもお前なりの流儀で 立ち向かおうとしているのは分かる。
jpnSearchText:
それでもお前なりの流儀で
立ち向かおうとしているのは分かる。

engChrName: We're going to do the best we can in our own way— you should do the same.
engSearchText:
We're going to do the best we can in our own way—
you should do the same.
jpnChrName: 警察（俺たち）は警察で力を尽くす── そちらも貫いてみせろ。
jpnSearchText:
警察（俺たち）は警察で力を尽くす──
そちらも貫いてみせろ。

engChrName: That goes without sayin'.
engSearchText: That goes without sayin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、言われるまでもねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、言われるまでもねぇ。

engChrName: Pandemonium's effect seems to be even more pronounced here.
engSearchText:
Pandemonium's effect seems to be even more
pronounced here.
jpnChrName: やはり“汎魔化”の度合いは 更に強そうですね……！
jpnSearchText:
やはり“汎魔化”の度合いは
更に強そうですね……！

engChrName: Oh! Look up there!
engSearchText: Oh! Look up there!
jpnChrName: あ──見てください！
jpnSearchText: あ──見てください！

engChrName: You kidding me? Why's it gotta be so high up?
engSearchText: You kidding me? Why's it gotta be so high up?
jpnChrName: チッ……あんな所にか！
jpnSearchText: チッ……あんな所にか！

engChrName: If we can't do something about it, this miasma will only grow thicker.
engSearchText:
If we can't do something about it, this miasma will
only grow thicker.
jpnChrName: あれを何とかしない限り この一帯の瘴気も……
jpnSearchText:
あれを何とかしない限り
この一帯の瘴気も……

engChrName: We have company!
engSearchText: We have company!
jpnChrName: やはり顕れたか……！
jpnSearchText: やはり顕れたか……！

engChrName: Then let's take 'em down! Then we can—
engSearchText: Then let's take 'em down! Then we can—
jpnChrName: ええ、速攻でブチ倒して──
jpnSearchText: ええ、速攻でブチ倒して──

engChrName: Wait! Leave this to us!
engSearchText: Wait! Leave this to us!
jpnChrName: いや──ここは任せたまえ！
jpnSearchText: いや──ここは任せたまえ！

engChrName: Your Highness! Naje!
engSearchText: Your Highness! Naje!
jpnChrName: 殿下にナージェさん……！
jpnSearchText: 殿下にナージェさん……！

engChrName: Fan! I forgot you were in this part of town!
engSearchText: Fan! I forgot you were in this part of town!
jpnChrName: ファンのオッサン！ そういやこっちにいたか！
jpnSearchText:
ファンのオッサン！
そういやこっちにいたか！

engChrName: Illume the darkness! Seven Shahms!
engSearchText: Illume the darkness! Seven Shahms!
jpnChrName: 闇を照らせ── セブンシャムス！
jpnSearchText:
闇を照らせ──
セブンシャムス！

engChrName: I shall join you—even if it has been some time since I last fought.
engSearchText:
I shall join you—even if it has been some time since I
last fought.
jpnChrName: ならばこちらも── ──久々にはなるが……！
jpnSearchText:
ならばこちらも──
──久々にはなるが……！

engChrName: Begone, foul fiends...and disperse!
engSearchText: Begone, foul fiends...and disperse!
jpnChrName: 退散せよ悪鬼──急々如律令（きゅうきゅうにょりつりょう）！
jpnSearchText: 退散せよ悪鬼──急々如律令（きゅうきゅうにょりつりょう）！

engChrName: It's over! Verethragna!
engSearchText: It's over! Verethragna!
jpnChrName: とどめだ──ウルスラグナ！！
jpnSearchText: とどめだ──ウルスラグナ！！

engChrName: Amazing...
engSearchText: Amazing...
jpnChrName: す、すごい……！
jpnSearchText: す、すごい……！

engChrName: That wasn't the last of them!
engSearchText: That wasn't the last of them!
jpnChrName: 更なる霊子反応──！
jpnSearchText: 更なる霊子反応──！

engChrName: This must be the demon sphere's work.
engSearchText: This must be the demon sphere's work.
jpnChrName: やはり魔球の仕業か……！
jpnSearchText: やはり魔球の仕業か……！

engChrName: We should retreat for now! We'll only wear ourselves down trying to face them all!
engSearchText:
We should retreat for now! We'll only wear ourselves
down trying to face them all!
jpnChrName: いったん退きましょう！ 相手をしても切りがありません！
jpnSearchText:
いったん退きましょう！
相手をしても切りがありません！

engChrName: This way, you guys!
engSearchText: This way, you guys!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち、こっちです！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんたち、こっちです！

engChrName: You'll be safe indoors!
engSearchText: You'll be safe indoors!
jpnChrName: 建物の中は安全ですから！
jpnSearchText: 建物の中は安全ですから！

engChrName: There's more than enough space for everyone in here!
engSearchText: There's more than enough space for everyone in here!
jpnChrName: 殿下たちもどうかお早く……！
jpnSearchText: 殿下たちもどうかお早く……！

engChrName: Marielle! Nina! Saara!
engSearchText: Marielle! Nina! Saara!
jpnChrName: マリエルさんに ニナさん、サァラさんも……！
jpnSearchText:
マリエルさんに
ニナさん、サァラさんも……！

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: 分かった……！
jpnSearchText: 分かった……！

engChrName: We're on our way!
engSearchText: We're on our way!
jpnChrName: お邪魔しますっ……！
jpnSearchText: お邪魔しますっ……！

engChrName: They hurried inside the hotel and remained vigilant while making sure that no devils were going to follow them inside.
engSearchText:
They hurried inside the hotel and remained vigilant
while making sure that no devils were going to follow
them inside.
jpnChrName: その後、悪魔がホテルにまで 入ってこないことを確認してから……
jpnSearchText:
その後、悪魔がホテルにまで
入ってこないことを確認してから……

engChrName: They then began exchanging information with one another.
engSearchText:
They then began exchanging information with
one another.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは公太子やマリエルたちと 改めて情報交換をするのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは公太子やマリエルたちと
改めて情報交換をするのだった。

engChrName: So Judith went off on her own, huh?
engSearchText: So Judith went off on her own, huh?
jpnChrName: ……そうか、ジュディスが一人で。
jpnSearchText: ……そうか、ジュディスが一人で。

engChrName: Yes, that's right. She went out saying she 'had something to take care of' after that message from the mafia earlier.
engSearchText:
Yes, that's right. She went out saying she 'had
something to take care of' after that message from the
mafia earlier.
jpnChrName: はい、先ほどマフィアの通信があった後、 『少し出てくる』なんて言って……
jpnSearchText:
はい、先ほどマフィアの通信があった後、
『少し出てくる』なんて言って……

engChrName: She insisted that she had someone she could depend on so we shouldn't worry, but of course I'm going to worry.
engSearchText:
She insisted that she had someone she could depend
on so we shouldn't worry, but of course I'm going
to worry.
jpnChrName: 『頼れる人がいるから心配しないで』と 仰っていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
『頼れる人がいるから心配しないで』と
仰っていましたけど……

engChrName: I can't help but wonder if it's that 'Grimcat' who made an appearance in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I can't help but wonder if it's that 'Grimcat' who
made an appearance in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ふむ、サルバッドにも現れた 《グリムキャッツ》なる女怪盗かな？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、サルバッドにも現れた
《グリムキャッツ》なる女怪盗かな？

engChrName: She and Judith didn't feel like strangers to me.
engSearchText: She and Judith didn't feel like strangers to me.
jpnChrName: なにやらジュディス君と 関係がありそうな感じだったが。
jpnSearchText:
なにやらジュディス君と
関係がありそうな感じだったが。

engChrName: ...Your Highness.
engSearchText: ...Your Highness.
jpnChrName: ……殿下。
jpnSearchText: ……殿下。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: (I wouldn't put it past the prince or Fan to figure out the truth at all.)
engSearchText:
(I wouldn't put it past the prince or Fan to figure out
the truth at all.)
jpnChrName: （ま、公太子にオッサンあたりは   気付いてても当然だろうな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、公太子にオッサンあたりは
気付いてても当然だろうな。）

engChrName: (Marduk strongly suspects that she's Grimcat as well.)
engSearchText: (Marduk strongly suspects that she's Grimcat as well.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、マルドゥックでの評価でも   ある程度推定されていましたし。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、マルドゥックでの評価でも
ある程度推定されていましたし。）

engChrName: I've heard all kinds of rumors about how capable Grimcat is as a thief, so I could rest a little easier if she's helping Judith...
engSearchText:
I've heard all kinds of rumors about how capable
Grimcat is as a thief, so I could rest a little easier if
she's helping Judith...
jpnChrName: グリムキャッツ……義賊としても 有名な謎の女怪盗でしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
グリムキャッツ……義賊としても
有名な謎の女怪盗でしたっけ。

engChrName: ...but only a little. Anyway, she seemed like she was off to investigate that sphere.
engSearchText:
...but only a little. Anyway, she seemed like she was
off to investigate that sphere.
jpnChrName: でもやっぱり心配ですよ…… あの“球”を調べてるみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
でもやっぱり心配ですよ……
あの“球”を調べてるみたいですし。

engChrName: I had a feeling that was what she was out to do... Okay! Leave this to us!
engSearchText:
I had a feeling that was what she was out to do...
Okay! Leave this to us!
jpnChrName: やっぱり…… でも、わたしたちにお任せを！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり……
でも、わたしたちにお任せを！

engChrName: She's the main reason we're in the area, yeah. She's one of us now—we gotta look out for her.
engSearchText:
She's the main reason we're in the area, yeah.
She's one of us now—we gotta look out for her.
jpnChrName: 元々そのために来ているからな。 同じ釜のメシを食ってる縁もある。
jpnSearchText:
元々そのために来ているからな。
同じ釜のメシを食ってる縁もある。

engChrName: I do remember her saying that you were helping her prepare for her next film or something.
engSearchText:
I do remember her saying that you were helping her
prepare for her next film or something.
jpnChrName: たしか“役作り”のためしばらく 事務所の手伝いをしているとか……
jpnSearchText:
たしか“役作り”のためしばらく
事務所の手伝いをしているとか……

engChrName: We leave her in your capable hands, then!
engSearchText: We leave her in your capable hands, then!
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんのこと どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさんのこと
どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: She was sure that you were going to come for her. She didn't doubt it for a moment.
engSearchText:
She was sure that you were going to come for her.
She didn't doubt it for a moment.
jpnChrName: ……先輩、アークライドさんたちが 来るって疑っていませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
……先輩、アークライドさんたちが
来るって疑っていませんでした。

engChrName: I suspect she's waiting for you even now.
engSearchText: I suspect she's waiting for you even now.
jpnChrName: 多分、皆さんのことを 今も待っていると思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
多分、皆さんのことを
今も待っていると思うんです。

engChrName: Judith...
engSearchText: Judith...
jpnChrName: ジュディスさん……
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさん……

engChrName: Got it. Thanks for tellin' us all this.
engSearchText: Got it. Thanks for tellin' us all this.
jpnChrName: そうか──了解だ。
jpnSearchText: そうか──了解だ。

engChrName: Still, we've been led to believe that the power of this demon sphere is quite formidable.
engSearchText:
Still, we've been led to believe that the power of this
demon sphere is quite formidable.
jpnChrName: ふむ、聞いた限り “魔球”の力は相当なようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、聞いた限り
“魔球”の力は相当なようだ。

engChrName: I don't know how much we'll be able to help you, but we would like to join you all the same.
engSearchText:
I don't know how much we'll be able to help you, but
we would like to join you all the same.
jpnChrName: どこまで力になれるか分からないが 私たちにも付き合わせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
どこまで力になれるか分からないが
私たちにも付き合わせてもらうよ。

engChrName: You sure? We're not gonna turn down your help if you're willin' to give it.
engSearchText:
You sure? We're not gonna turn down your help if
you're willin' to give it.
jpnChrName: いいんですか？ この状況じゃ助かりますが。
jpnSearchText:
いいんですか？
この状況じゃ助かりますが。

engChrName: I most certainly am. I was planning to head out myself to investigate if Judith had not spoken up first.
engSearchText:
I most certainly am. I was planning to head out
myself to investigate if Judith had not spoken up first.
jpnChrName: ああ、ジュディス君が申し出なければ 私が出向こうと思っていたくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ジュディス君が申し出なければ
私が出向こうと思っていたくらいだ。

engChrName: I wasn't able to do anything to help you near Central Station, but His Highness and I will give you our full support now.
engSearchText:
I wasn't able to do anything to help you near
Central Station, but His Highness and I will give you
our full support now.
jpnChrName: 中央駅では一足先に失礼しました。 殿下共々、ご助力させて頂ければ。
jpnSearchText:
中央駅では一足先に失礼しました。
殿下共々、ご助力させて頂ければ。

engChrName: In that case, you can leave protecting this hotel to me.
engSearchText: In that case, you can leave protecting this hotel to me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、僭越ながら ここの守りは私が引き受けよう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、僭越ながら
ここの守りは私が引き受けよう。

engChrName: Sounds good. You and your curses should be plenty to keep this place secure.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. You and your curses should be plenty to
keep this place secure.
jpnChrName: ま、あんたの符術なら ここの守りも万全だろうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あんたの符術なら
ここの守りも万全だろうぜ。

engChrName: Then we will accept your most gracious of offers.
engSearchText: Then we will accept your most gracious of offers.
jpnChrName: それではお二人とも よろしくお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
それではお二人とも
よろしくお願いいたします。

engChrName: Now that we've settled this matter, we should be on the move.
engSearchText:
Now that we've settled this matter, we should be on
the move.
jpnChrName: よし──それでは参るか。
jpnSearchText: よし──それでは参るか。

engChrName: Just please, all of you—be careful.
engSearchText: Just please, all of you—be careful.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、どうか気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、どうか気をつけて……！

engChrName: That includes you, Van! Don't ever let what Dingo said leave your mind!
engSearchText:
That includes you, Van! Don't ever let what Dingo
said leave your mind!
jpnChrName: 特にヴァンさん、ディンゴさんの 言葉を忘れちゃ駄目ですからね！
jpnSearchText:
特にヴァンさん、ディンゴさんの
言葉を忘れちゃ駄目ですからね！

engChrName: Wouldn't dream of it.
engSearchText: Wouldn't dream of it.
jpnChrName: ああ、もちろんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、もちろんだ。

engChrName: Crown Prince Sherid and Naje have temporarily joined the party as guests.
engSearchText:
Crown Prince Sherid and Naje have temporarily
joined the party as guests.
jpnChrName: シェリド公太子と護衛官ナージェが ゲストとして一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
シェリド公太子と護衛官ナージェが
ゲストとして一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: I can sense people inside. I'm going in first!
engSearchText: I can sense people inside. I'm going in first!
jpnChrName: 内部に気配……！ 先行して突入します！
jpnSearchText:
内部に気配……！
先行して突入します！

engChrName: Got it. Just be care—
engSearchText: Got it. Just be care—
jpnChrName: ああ、くれぐれも──
jpnSearchText: ああ、くれぐれも──

engChrName: No, get back!
engSearchText: No, get back!
jpnChrName: いや、離れろ！
jpnSearchText: いや、離れろ！

engChrName: Ack!
engSearchText: Ack!
jpnChrName: あうっ……！？
jpnSearchText: あうっ……！？

engChrName: Feri! Van!
engSearchText: Feri! Van!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、ヴァンさんも！
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん、ヴァンさんも！

engChrName: I-I'm fine! Forget about me!
engSearchText: I-I'm fine! Forget about me!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫です…… それよりも……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫です……
それよりも……！

engChrName: That doesn't look like it's gonna be easy to break.
engSearchText: That doesn't look like it's gonna be easy to break.
jpnChrName: チッ……ヤバそうなのを 張りやがったな！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……ヤバそうなのを
張りやがったな！？

engChrName: It's an extremely potent barrier made up of tens of layers!
engSearchText:
It's an extremely potent barrier made up of tens
of layers!
jpnChrName: しかも数十枚に及ぶ 多重結界で出来てるようです！
jpnSearchText:
しかも数十枚に及ぶ
多重結界で出来てるようです！

engChrName: Seven stones from the sea of stars, become my strength!
engSearchText:
Seven stones from the sea of stars, become
my strength!
jpnChrName: 『星海より降り注ぎたる七石よ──   毅（たけ）き力となれ！』
jpnSearchText:
『星海より降り注ぎたる七石よ──
毅（たけ）き力となれ！』

engChrName: Your Highness!
engSearchText: Your Highness!
jpnChrName: 殿下……！
jpnSearchText: 殿下……！

engChrName: The jewel arts of the Asval family!
engSearchText: The jewel arts of the Asval family!
jpnChrName: アスヴァール家の宝石術か……！
jpnSearchText: アスヴァール家の宝石術か……！

engChrName: Ugh... My power alone isn't going to be enough!
engSearchText: Ugh... My power alone isn't going to be enough!
jpnChrName: くっ…… 私一人では無理か……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
私一人では無理か……！

engChrName: Bah!
engSearchText: Bah!
jpnChrName: ちぃ……！
jpnSearchText: ちぃ……！

engChrName: Mmgh... If only we could break through here...!
engSearchText: Mmgh... If only we could break through here...!
jpnChrName: ……くっ……… これを突破できるとすれば！
jpnSearchText:
……くっ………
これを突破できるとすれば！

engChrName: Then allow me to grant you my aid.
engSearchText: Then allow me to grant you my aid.
jpnChrName: ならば僭越ながら 力添えさせていただこう。
jpnSearchText:
ならば僭越ながら
力添えさせていただこう。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Ashladd!
engSearchText: Ashladd!
jpnChrName: アシュラッド、おぬしか──！
jpnSearchText: アシュラッド、おぬしか──！

engChrName: The Thaumaturgy of the church!
engSearchText: The Thaumaturgy of the church!
jpnChrName: 成程、教会の法術か……！
jpnSearchText: 成程、教会の法術か……！

engChrName: You'll only have a moment to get inside once it breaks! Naje, go with them!
engSearchText:
You'll only have a moment to get inside once
it breaks! Naje, go with them!
jpnChrName: 入れるとしたら一瞬だ！ ナージェ、君も付いていくがいい！
jpnSearchText:
入れるとしたら一瞬だ！
ナージェ、君も付いていくがいい！

engChrName: ...If that is your wish, Your Highness!
engSearchText: ...If that is your wish, Your Highness!
jpnChrName: っ──承知しました！
jpnSearchText: っ──承知しました！

engChrName: It's gonna break! NOW!
engSearchText: It's gonna break! NOW!
jpnChrName: 割れるぞ───今だ！！
jpnSearchText: 割れるぞ───今だ！！

engChrName: Yes! There you are!
engSearchText: Yes! There you are!
jpnChrName: ……！ ヴァン、みんなも……！
jpnSearchText:
……！
ヴァン、みんなも……！

engChrName: Am I ever happy to see you, spriggan!
engSearchText: Am I ever happy to see you, spriggan!
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋のみんな……！？
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋のみんな……！？

engChrName: Judith! Maxim!
engSearchText: Judith! Maxim!
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんにマクシムさんも……！
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさんにマクシムさんも……！

engChrName: I'm not seein' Yumé and Paulette here, but that just means we don't gotta be gentle!
engSearchText:
I'm not seein' Yumé and Paulette here, but that just
means we don't gotta be gentle!
jpnChrName: ユメたちはいねぇか──だったら 思いっきりやれるってモンだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ユメたちはいねぇか──だったら
思いっきりやれるってモンだぜ！

engChrName: Can you two take care of this?
engSearchText: Can you two take care of this?
jpnChrName: アーロン、リゼットも頼む！
jpnSearchText: アーロン、リゼットも頼む！

engChrName: No problem!
engSearchText: No problem!
jpnChrName: いいだろう……！
jpnSearchText: いいだろう……！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: お任せ下さい──！
jpnSearchText: お任せ下さい──！

engChrName: Whoooa!
engSearchText: Whoooa!
jpnChrName: うわああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うわああっ……！？

engChrName: Phew! Nice work!
engSearchText: Phew! Nice work!
jpnChrName: や、やるじゃない──！
jpnSearchText: や、やるじゃない──！

engChrName: Now the real battle begins!
engSearchText: Now the real battle begins!
jpnChrName: さて、ケリを付けようか！
jpnSearchText: さて、ケリを付けようか！

engChrName: I won't fail the crown prince after he helped forge a path for us!
engSearchText:
I won't fail the crown prince after he helped forge a
path for us!
jpnChrName: ええ、送り出して頂いた 殿下に報いるためにも……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、送り出して頂いた
殿下に報いるためにも……！

engChrName: We're countin' on you, bodyguard! ...How about you? What're you gonna do?
engSearchText:
We're countin' on you, bodyguard! ...How about you?
What're you gonna do?
jpnChrName: 頼んだぜ、護衛官さん！ ──お前さんはどうする！？
jpnSearchText:
頼んだぜ、護衛官さん！
──お前さんはどうする！？

engChrName: It's payback time after I let myself get captured without a fight, of course!
engSearchText:
It's payback time after I let myself get captured
without a fight, of course!
jpnChrName: 呆気なく捕まっちゃったし、 当然やらせてもらうわよ──！
jpnSearchText:
呆気なく捕まっちゃったし、
当然やらせてもらうわよ──！

engChrName: E-Everything's back to normal...
engSearchText: E-Everything's back to normal...
jpnChrName: も、元に戻った……
jpnSearchText: も、元に戻った……

engChrName: *pant* That's what you get...for messing with ME!
engSearchText: *pant* That's what you get...for messing with ME!
jpnChrName: はあはあ…… ザマーみなさいっての……
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……
