ザマーみなさいっての……

engChrName: But what took you so long?! We were waiting for ages!
engSearchText:
But what took you so long?! We were waiting
for ages!
jpnChrName: ──遅いじゃないの！ どれだけ待たせるつもりなの！？
jpnSearchText:
──遅いじゃないの！
どれだけ待たせるつもりなの！？

engChrName: Heehee. Sorry about that.
engSearchText: Heehee. Sorry about that.
jpnChrName: えへへ……すみません。
jpnSearchText: えへへ……すみません。

engChrName: All's well that ends well, though.
engSearchText: All's well that ends well, though.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… でも無事で本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
でも無事で本当に良かったです。

engChrName: Sounds like you believed in your heart of hearts that we'd come for you. Heh. That's kinda sweet.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you believed in your heart of hearts that
we'd come for you. Heh. That's kinda sweet.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺たちを信じて待っていて くれたみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺たちを信じて待っていて
くれたみたいだしな。

engChrName: Don't try and get cute with me. I just have a duty as Grimcat to—ah.
engSearchText:
Don't try and get cute with me. I just have a duty
as Grimcat to—ah.
jpnChrName: あ、あたしは別に……！ グリムキャッツとしての使命で──あ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、あたしは別に……！
グリムキャッツとしての使命で──あ。

engChrName: I heard nothing.
engSearchText: I heard nothing.
jpnChrName: 私は何も聞いておりません。
jpnSearchText: 私は何も聞いておりません。

engChrName: Erm... I feel like I just heard something mindblowing...
engSearchText:
Erm... I feel like I just heard
something mindblowing...
jpnChrName: えっと……なんか凄いことを 聞いちゃった気もするけど。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……なんか凄いことを
聞いちゃった気もするけど。

engChrName: ...but my brain's kind of fried right now, so I'm just gonna...forget it.
engSearchText:
...but my brain's kind of fried right now, so I'm just
gonna...forget it.
jpnChrName: 正直、完全に容量オーバーだし、 聞かなかったことにさせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、完全に容量オーバーだし、
聞かなかったことにさせてもらうよ。

engChrName: I...appreciate that.
engSearchText: I...appreciate that.
jpnChrName: ……そ、それはどうも。
jpnSearchText: ……そ、それはどうも。

engChrName: It's like the worst kept secret in the world at this point.
engSearchText:
It's like the worst kept secret in the world at
this point.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ今更だろ。
jpnSearchText: クク、まあ今更だろ。

engChrName: I see everything worked out.
engSearchText: I see everything worked out.
jpnChrName: やあ、何とかなったみたいだね？
jpnSearchText: やあ、何とかなったみたいだね？

engChrName: I'm glad you're all right, Your Highness. And you were from the church, I believe?
engSearchText:
I'm glad you're all right, Your Highness. And you
were from the church, I believe?
jpnChrName: 殿下…… それと教会の方でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
殿下……
それと教会の方でしたか。

engChrName: He is part of the Papal Guard. It is reassuring that you are also working to quell this crisis.
engSearchText:
He is part of the Papal Guard. It is reassuring that
you are also working to quell this crisis.
jpnChrName: 僧兵庁の者だ。 おぬしも動き始めていたか。
jpnSearchText:
僧兵庁の者だ。
おぬしも動き始めていたか。

engChrName: Indeed—though I regret that I am alone. All of my subordinates are frozen in place.
engSearchText:
Indeed—though I regret that I am alone. All of my
subordinates are frozen in place.
jpnChrName: ええ、手勢の者たちは 軒並み“停まって”いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、手勢の者たちは
軒並み“停まって”いますが。

engChrName: Hmm... Makes sense.
engSearchText: Hmm... Makes sense.
jpnChrName: ハン……やっぱりそうか。
jpnSearchText: ハン……やっぱりそうか。

engChrName: We're acquainted with you, but we haven't said a word to any of your people.
engSearchText:
We're acquainted with you, but we haven't said a
word to any of your people.
jpnChrName: あんたとはともかく、部下たちとは 言葉すら交わさなかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたとはともかく、部下たちとは
言葉すら交わさなかったからな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Huh? Wh-What? Am I missing something?
engSearchText: Huh? Wh-What? Am I missing something?
jpnChrName: え、え、どういうこと？
jpnSearchText: え、え、どういうこと？

engChrName: So this is connected to you in some manner. I did wonder.
engSearchText:
So this is connected to you in some manner. I
did wonder.
jpnChrName: ふむ、やはり貴方に関わる 何某（なにがし）かの理由があるのだな？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、やはり貴方に関わる
何某（なにがし）かの理由があるのだな？

engChrName: Speak. We don't have much time, but this sounds like something we should at least hear a brief summary of before heading off.
engSearchText:
Speak. We don't have much time, but this sounds like
something we should at least hear a brief summary of
before heading off.
jpnChrName: ふむ、時間はあまりないが 最低限の情報は聞かせてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、時間はあまりないが
最低限の情報は聞かせてもらおうか。

engChrName: They shared their theory with those present in case any of them had evidence that would support or discredit it.
engSearchText:
They shared their theory with those present in case
any of them had evidence that would support or
discredit it.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンは真偽を確かめる意味でも 公太子たちに“例の推測”について説明した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンは真偽を確かめる意味でも
公太子たちに“例の推測”について説明した。

engChrName: I can't believe it... So right now everyone moving is someone connected to you in some way?
engSearchText:
I can't believe it... So right now everyone moving is
someone connected to you in some way?
jpnChrName: ま、まさか今動けてるのが あんたの知り合いだけだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか今動けてるのが
あんたの知り合いだけだなんて……

engChrName: I-Is that even possible?
engSearchText: I-Is that even possible?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が あり得るんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな事が
あり得るんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Hmm... The vast majority of my men are also frozen, but now that I think about it...
engSearchText:
Hmm... The vast majority of my men are also frozen,
but now that I think about it...
jpnChrName: ふむ、確かに私の部下たちも ほぼ全員が停まっていた……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、確かに私の部下たちも
ほぼ全員が停まっていた……

engChrName: ...the only exceptions are the ones who acted as guides for you in Langport.
engSearchText:
...the only exceptions are the ones who acted as guides
for you in Langport.
jpnChrName: 唯一停まっていなかったのは以前、 君たちを案内させた者だけだったな。
jpnSearchText:
唯一停まっていなかったのは以前、
君たちを案内させた者だけだったな。

engChrName: It's the same for my people. Only those who interacted with him are still moving.
engSearchText:
It's the same for my people. Only those who
interacted with him are still moving.
jpnChrName: 私の随行たちも同じかな。 動けているのは彼と話した者だった。
jpnSearchText:
私の随行たちも同じかな。
動けているのは彼と話した者だった。

engChrName: I don't know what exactly this means, but I suspect investigating and resolving the matter is your cross to bear.
engSearchText:
I don't know what exactly this means, but I suspect
investigating and resolving the matter is your cross
to bear.
jpnChrName: ──それが何を意味するのかは どうやら君自身の問題のようだが。
jpnSearchText:
──それが何を意味するのかは
どうやら君自身の問題のようだが。

engChrName: Y-Your Highness...
engSearchText: Y-Your Highness...
jpnChrName: で、殿下……
jpnSearchText: で、殿下……

engChrName: Yes, Your Highness. I'm painfully aware of that.
engSearchText: Yes, Your Highness. I'm painfully aware of that.
jpnChrName: ええ、重々承知しています。
jpnSearchText: ええ、重々承知しています。

engChrName: I gotta clean up my own mess—and trust me, I will.
engSearchText: I gotta clean up my own mess—and trust me, I will.
jpnChrName: 何とかしてみますよ、 てめぇのケツを拭く意味でもね。
jpnSearchText:
何とかしてみますよ、
てめぇのケツを拭く意味でもね。

engChrName: If I may, Your Highness, that's not true.
engSearchText: If I may, Your Highness, that's not true.
jpnChrName: ──公太子殿下、違います。
jpnSearchText: ──公太子殿下、違います。

engChrName: This isn't just Van's cross to bear—we will all bear it with him.
engSearchText:
This isn't just Van's cross to bear—we will all bear it
with him.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんだけの問題ではありません、 私たち解決事務所の問題ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんだけの問題ではありません、
私たち解決事務所の問題ですから。

engChrName: She's right. We've all confronted Almata in the past.
engSearchText: She's right. We've all confronted Almata in the past.
jpnChrName: そうですね──アルマータとは それぞれ因縁もあることですし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね──アルマータとは
それぞれ因縁もあることですし。

engChrName: Yeah. We don't plan on letting him pull his 'I gotta do this alone!' BS this time around.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We don't plan on letting him pull his 'I gotta
do this alone!' BS this time around.
jpnChrName: てめえ一人が背負った気に なってんじゃねえぞコラ。
jpnSearchText:
てめえ一人が背負った気に
なってんじゃねえぞコラ。

engChrName: You still clearly have a lot to learn, young one.
engSearchText: You still clearly have a lot to learn, young one.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、この期に及んで 修行が足りておらぬようだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、この期に及んで
修行が足りておらぬようだな。

engChrName: Should've known...
engSearchText: Should've known...

engChrName: What a great team...
engSearchText: What a great team...
jpnChrName: 皆さん……
jpnSearchText: 皆さん……

engChrName: Heh. Fair enough—I see that I was mistaken.
engSearchText: Heh. Fair enough—I see that I was mistaken.
jpnChrName: フフ…… これは一本取られたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
これは一本取られたようだ。

engChrName: Well, I still need you guys to prepare for my next role, which means that I'll be sticking around until I'm satisfied.
engSearchText:
Well, I still need you guys to prepare for my next role,
which means that I'll be sticking around until
I'm satisfied.
jpnChrName: ま、“役作り”もあるし それならあたしも手伝うだけね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、“役作り”もあるし
それならあたしも手伝うだけね。

engChrName: So let's take these jerks DOWN! Who knows? Maybe the experience'll come in handy if they ever ask me to play Grimcat!
engSearchText:
So let's take these jerks DOWN! Who knows?
Maybe the experience'll come in handy if they ever
ask me to play Grimcat!
jpnChrName: いずれグリムキャッツ役でもやる参考に 連中の野望、挫かせて貰おうじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
いずれグリムキャッツ役でもやる参考に
連中の野望、挫かせて貰おうじゃない！

engChrName: (I don't think she cares how silly her story sounds as long as she can justify coming with us.)
engSearchText:
(I don't think she cares how silly her story sounds as
long as she can justify coming with us.)
jpnChrName: （ジュディスさん、ヤケクソですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ジュディスさん、ヤケクソですね。）

engChrName: (Ahaha...) Still, we're very happy to have you!
engSearchText:
(Ahaha...)
Still, we're very happy to have you!
jpnChrName: （あはは……） ──でも本当に心強いです！
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……）
──でも本当に心強いです！

engChrName: Yeah. Now we just have to find Quatre, and the Arkride Solutions gang is all back together.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Now we just have to find Quatre, and the
Arkride Solutions gang is all back together.
jpnChrName: ああ、これで事務所メンバーも 残るはカトル一人だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これで事務所メンバーも
残るはカトル一人だ。

engChrName: So let's get on over to the Auber District.
engSearchText: So let's get on over to the Auber District.
jpnChrName: とっととオーベル地区に向かうか。
jpnSearchText: とっととオーベル地区に向かうか。

engChrName: Yeah. The countdown's still going, so we don't have—
engSearchText:
Yeah. The countdown's still going, so we don't
have—
jpnChrName: ああ、クソったれな カウントダウンも続いてるし──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、クソったれな
カウントダウンも続いてるし──

engChrName: Not again!
engSearchText: Not again!
jpnChrName: ッ……またかよ！
jpnSearchText: ッ……またかよ！

engChrName: This isn't Ms. Bright...
engSearchText: This isn't Ms. Bright...
jpnChrName: レン様でもなさそうですね……！
jpnSearchText: レン様でもなさそうですね……！

engChrName: Hello again! It's time for another update.
engSearchText: Hello again! It's time for another update.
jpnChrName: やあ、最新状況を伝えるよ。
jpnSearchText: やあ、最新状況を伝えるよ。

engChrName: The demon spheres in the 2nd, 9th, and 10th districts have all been destroyed.
engSearchText:
The demon spheres in the 2nd, 9th, and 10th districts
have all been destroyed.
jpnChrName: ２区サイデン、９区中央市場（セントルマルシェ）、 １０区レーヴルの魔球が消滅した。
jpnSearchText:
２区サイデン、９区中央市場（セントルマルシェ）、
１０区レーヴルの魔球が消滅した。

engChrName: Now you have three hours and fifty minutes remaining. Better get to it, now!
engSearchText:
Now you have three hours and fifty
minutes remaining. Better get to it, now!
jpnChrName: カウントダウンは残り３時間５０分── この調子で頑張ってね～。
jpnSearchText:
カウントダウンは残り３時間５０分──
この調子で頑張ってね～。

engChrName: He still gets my goat, but he sure seemed less talkative than he did back in Oración.
engSearchText:
He still gets my goat, but he sure seemed less talkative
than he did back in Oración.
jpnChrName: ……相変わらずだけど、 古都よりは口数が少ないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……相変わらずだけど、
古都よりは口数が少ないわね。

engChrName: I'm not surprised, either—everyone on our side has been working so hard to stop them.
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised, either—everyone on our side has
been working so hard to stop them.
jpnChrName: はい、他の皆さんも順調に 動いてくれているみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
はい、他の皆さんも順調に
動いてくれているみたいですし。

engChrName: Yeah. If we exclude Vantail for now, there's only three districts left to handle, like Auber.
engSearchText:
Yeah. If we exclude Vantail for now, there's only
three districts left to handle, like Auber.
jpnChrName: ああ──ヴァンタイユを除けば 残るはオーベル含めて３街区だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ヴァンタイユを除けば
残るはオーベル含めて３街区だけだ。

engChrName: You're heading back out there now, then?
engSearchText: You're heading back out there now, then?
jpnChrName: 行くんだな、君たち。
jpnSearchText: 行くんだな、君たち。

engChrName: Yeah. Leave Paulette and Yumé to us—we'll bring 'em back safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Leave Paulette and Yumé to us—we'll bring
'em back safe and sound.
jpnChrName: ああ、ポーレットと ユメのことは任せときな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ポーレットと
ユメのことは任せときな。

engChrName: You said you were separated from them when you were escaping Vantail, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You said you were separated from them when you
were escaping Vantail, didn't you?
jpnChrName: ヴァンタイユ地区から逃げる時、 はぐれてしまったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンタイユ地区から逃げる時、
はぐれてしまったんですよね？

engChrName: Yeah. I'm planning to head back out and check a few routes out of it where they could be myself.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm planning to head back out and check a few
routes out of it where they could be myself.
jpnChrName: ああ、これから幾つか可能性が ありそうなルートを調べに行く。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これから幾つか可能性が
ありそうなルートを調べに行く。

engChrName: I'll leave Auber to you. If you do find them, then please help them!
engSearchText:
I'll leave Auber to you. If you do find them, then
please help them!
jpnChrName: オーベル地区の方は分からないが 見つけたら宜しく頼む……！
jpnSearchText:
オーベル地区の方は分からないが
見つけたら宜しく頼む……！

engChrName: That goes without sayin'. I've known 'em both way longer than you have, y'know.
engSearchText:
That goes without sayin'. I've known 'em both way
longer than you have, y'know.
jpnChrName: たりめーだ。 あんたより付き合いは長いしな。
jpnSearchText:
たりめーだ。
あんたより付き合いは長いしな。

engChrName: Please be careful, you guys!
engSearchText: Please be careful, you guys!
jpnChrName: どうか気をつけて……！
jpnSearchText: どうか気をつけて……！

engChrName: I'm going to keep doing all I can as a reporter—and cover for what Dingo would've done too while I'm at it!
engSearchText:
I'm going to keep doing all I can as a reporter—and
cover for what Dingo would've done too while I'm
at it!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの分まで わたしも取材を続けますからっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんの分まで
わたしも取材を続けますからっ！

engChrName: I plan to help out whenever and wherever I can, too. Just like my sister.
engSearchText:
I plan to help out whenever and wherever I can, too.
Just like my sister.
jpnChrName: 妹同様、私もできる限りの お手伝いをさせて頂きます……！
jpnSearchText:
妹同様、私もできる限りの
お手伝いをさせて頂きます……！

engChrName: Come back safe, Judith.
engSearchText: Come back safe, Judith.
jpnChrName: 先輩──どうか気をつけて。
jpnSearchText: 先輩──どうか気をつけて。

engChrName: And if she tries to do anything silly, give her a good telling off for me, everyone.
engSearchText:
And if she tries to do anything silly, give her a good
telling off for me, everyone.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、先輩が調子に乗ったら 遠慮なく窘めてあげてくださいね？
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、先輩が調子に乗ったら
遠慮なく窘めてあげてくださいね？

engChrName: D-Don't act like you're my mother!
engSearchText: D-Don't act like you're my mother!
jpnChrName: だ、だからアンタは どうして保護者目線なのよっ！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だからアンタは
どうして保護者目線なのよっ！

engChrName: Iscariot's taciturn vice captain departed shortly after, saying he had another mission to take care of.
engSearchText:
Iscariot's taciturn vice captain departed shortly after,
saying he had another mission to take care of.
jpnChrName: その後、寡黙な副兵長は 何らかの使命があるとその場を辞し──
jpnSearchText:
その後、寡黙な副兵長は
何らかの使命があるとその場を辞し──

engChrName: Van and friends also departed the area, leaving everyone to return to action in their own ways.
engSearchText:
Van and friends also departed the area, leaving
everyone to return to action in their own ways.
jpnChrName: それ以外の者たちも動き始める中、 ヴァンたちも行動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の者たちも動き始める中、
ヴァンたちも行動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Judith rejoined the party.
engSearchText: Judith rejoined the party.
jpnChrName: ジュディスがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ジュディスがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Auber District' or choose it from the Travel menu instead.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Auber District' or
choose it from the Travel menu instead.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、車を調べるか 移動メニューでオーベル地区を選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、車を調べるか
移動メニューでオーベル地区を選んで下さい。

engChrName: Oh, is that...?
engSearchText: Oh, is that...?
jpnChrName: あそこにいるのは……
jpnSearchText: あそこにいるのは……

engChrName: Well, look what we have here: an inspector and a bracer shootin' the shit over drinks.
engSearchText:
Well, look what we have here: an inspector and a
bracer shootin' the shit over drinks.
jpnChrName: なんだ、警部とギルドの重鎮が よろしく飲んでんのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、警部とギルドの重鎮が
よろしく飲んでんのかよ。

engChrName: Man, if even you two can be friends, the capital's in good hands.
engSearchText:
Man, if even you two can be friends, the capital's in
good hands.
jpnChrName: こりゃ首都の治安も安泰だな。
jpnSearchText: こりゃ首都の治安も安泰だな。

engChrName: I wouldn't exactly call us 'friends.'
engSearchText: I wouldn't exactly call us 'friends.'
jpnChrName: 本当はよろしくやる仲じゃないがな。
jpnSearchText: 本当はよろしくやる仲じゃないがな。

engChrName: The guild's not the CID, but they're far from our allies. At best, we're rivals.
engSearchText:
The guild's not the CID, but they're far from
our allies. At best, we're rivals.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤほどじゃないが、警察とギルドも どちらかというとライバル関係だ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤほどじゃないが、警察とギルドも
どちらかというとライバル関係だ。

engChrName: But given how much our work overlaps, we often see each other out in the field. We respect each other as fellow public servants.
engSearchText:
But given how much our work overlaps, we often see
each other out in the field. We respect each other as
fellow public servants.
jpnChrName: それでも現場が重なることが多いから、 どうしても縁ができちまうもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも現場が重なることが多いから、
どうしても縁ができちまうもんだ。

engChrName: So rivals we may be, but we can still share a drink or two, eh?
engSearchText:
So rivals we may be, but we can still share a drink or
two, eh?
jpnChrName: 別にライバルでもなんでも、たまには こうして一緒に酒を飲むくらいいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
別にライバルでもなんでも、たまには
こうして一緒に酒を飲むくらいいいだろう。

engChrName: You care to join us?
engSearchText: You care to join us?
jpnChrName: お前さんもどうだ、一杯？
jpnSearchText: お前さんもどうだ、一杯？

engChrName: Nah, I'm good. Gonna stretch my legs a bit more.
engSearchText: Nah, I'm good. Gonna stretch my legs a bit more.
jpnChrName: いや、もう少し散歩したいから 遠慮しとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、もう少し散歩したいから
遠慮しとくぜ。

engChrName: Heh, fair enough. Drinking with old dogs like us isn't the most attractive offer, I guess.
engSearchText:
Heh, fair enough. Drinking with old dogs like us isn't
the most attractive offer, I guess.
jpnChrName: まあ、オッサンと飲んでも面白くないか。
jpnSearchText: まあ、オッサンと飲んでも面白くないか。

engChrName: But y'know, I'm sure Elaine wouldn't mind having a drinking buddy after work.
engSearchText:
But y'know, I'm sure Elaine wouldn't mind having a
drinking buddy after work.
jpnChrName: 今はまだ仕事中だが、 たまにはエレインを誘ったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
今はまだ仕事中だが、
たまにはエレインを誘ったらどうだ？

engChrName: ...I'm gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
engSearchText: ...I'm gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
jpnChrName: 余計なお世話だっつの。
jpnSearchText: 余計なお世話だっつの。

engChrName: That reminds me. I heard you pitched in during that mess in Basel?
engSearchText:
That reminds me. I heard you pitched in during that
mess in Basel?
jpnChrName: そう言えばアークライド……バーゼルでの 一件にも関わってたそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
そう言えばアークライド……バーゼルでの
一件にも関わってたそうだな？

engChrName: Yeah, I heard from Alvis. Sounds like you made yourself pretty busy over there.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I heard from Alvis. Sounds like you made
yourself pretty busy over there.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスから聞いたぜ、 また大活躍だったそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスから聞いたぜ、
また大活躍だったそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Wasn't what I was there for, but yeah, I helped out where I could.
engSearchText:
Wasn't what I was there for, but yeah, I helped out
where I could.
jpnChrName: 不本意ながらな。
jpnSearchText: 不本意ながらな。

engChrName: How about next time you let us know where you're headed beforehand? That way we can clean up these messes you inevitably get into.
engSearchText:
How about next time you let us know where you're
headed beforehand? That way we can clean up these
messes you inevitably get into.
jpnChrName: 今度はどこで事件を起こすか、 事前に教えてもらいたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
今度はどこで事件を起こすか、
事前に教えてもらいたいものだな。

engChrName: Yes, because I'm totally the one causing 'em all. Riiight.
engSearchText:
Yes, because I'm totally the one causing 'em all.
Riiight.
jpnChrName: 俺のせいみたいに言うのは止めてくれ、 こっちは被害者側だっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
俺のせいみたいに言うのは止めてくれ、
こっちは被害者側だっつーの。

engChrName: But in case you'd like to know, most of next week'll be Arkride-free here in Edith.
engSearchText:
But in case you'd like to know, most of next week'll
be Arkride-free here in Edith.
jpnChrName: まあでもそういうことなら 来週の数日くらいは安心していいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあでもそういうことなら
来週の数日くらいは安心していいぜ。

engChrName: Me and the gang're takin' a little vacation.
engSearchText: Me and the gang're takin' a little vacation.
jpnChrName: うちの事務所は旅行に行く予定でな。
jpnSearchText: うちの事務所は旅行に行く予定でな。

engChrName: Hey, not a bad idea—I bet you could use the break. Where are you headed?
engSearchText:
Hey, not a bad idea—I bet you could use the break.
Where are you headed?
jpnChrName: へえ、いいじゃないか。 どの辺に行くんだ？
jpnSearchText:
へえ、いいじゃないか。
どの辺に行くんだ？

engChrName: Figured it'd be nice to get away from the hustle and bustle for a while, so we're headed out to Longlai for a little hot spring trip.
engSearchText:
Figured it'd be nice to get away from the hustle and
bustle for a while, so we're headed out to Longlai for
a little hot spring trip.
jpnChrName: 大都市の喧騒から離れた、 共和国東の端にある温泉郷だ。
jpnSearchText:
大都市の喧騒から離れた、
共和国東の端にある温泉郷だ。

engChrName: Longlai, huh? My wife and I went there for our honeymoon.
engSearchText:
Longlai, huh? My wife and I went there for
our honeymoon.
jpnChrName: 《龍來》か…… 昔、新婚旅行で一度だけ行ったな。
jpnSearchText:
《龍來》か……
昔、新婚旅行で一度だけ行ったな。

engChrName: Beautiful place. I'd love to take my daughter there someday...if I could ever get time off.
engSearchText:
Beautiful place. I'd love to take my daughter there
someday...if I could ever get time off.
jpnChrName: いつか娘を連れて行きたいが、 なかなか都合がつかなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
いつか娘を連れて行きたいが、
なかなか都合がつかなくてな。

engChrName: Aww, worked to the bone, huh?
engSearchText: Aww, worked to the bone, huh?
jpnChrName: へえ…… まあ警部殿は忙しそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ……
まあ警部殿は忙しそうだしな。

engChrName: Yup. And whose fault is that, do you think?
engSearchText: Yup. And whose fault is that, do you think?
jpnChrName: ……言っておくがお前も その一因だからな？
jpnSearchText:
……言っておくがお前も
その一因だからな？

engChrName: Hah! Well, you picked a good time to go there. The autumn leaves are just stunning in Longlai.
engSearchText:
Hah! Well, you picked a good time to go there.
The autumn leaves are just stunning in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ハハ……しかしいいな、 この時期の龍來は紅葉も見ごろだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……しかしいいな、
この時期の龍來は紅葉も見ごろだ。

engChrName: Since you'll be down that way, say hi to everybody for me, will ya?
engSearchText:
Since you'll be down that way, say hi to everybody for
me, will ya?
jpnChrName: せっかくだから 俺の分も“挨拶”しておいてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだから
俺の分も“挨拶”しておいてくれよ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. You're from around there, aren't you?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. You're from around there, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ……そうか、考えてみりゃ アンタの故郷か。
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、考えてみりゃ
アンタの故郷か。

engChrName: ...Wait, okay, could you not go guessin' at my background?
engSearchText:
...Wait, okay, could you not go guessin' at
my background?
jpnChrName: 勝手にこっちの背景を 見抜いてんじゃねえと言いたいが。
jpnSearchText:
勝手にこっちの背景を
見抜いてんじゃねえと言いたいが。

engChrName: Hah! Sorry, sorry. Just, your fighting form was enough of a tell.
engSearchText:
Hah! Sorry, sorry. Just, your fighting form was
enough of a tell.
jpnChrName: ハハ、お前さんの型を考えればな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、お前さんの型を考えればな。

engChrName: And hey, a personal favor, if you don't mind: I'd appreciate it if you burned some incense for my old master while you're there.
engSearchText:
And hey, a personal favor, if you don't mind: I'd
appreciate it if you burned some incense for my old
master while you're there.
jpnChrName: まあ、立ち寄ったら俺の師匠にも 線香の一本でもあげといてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、立ち寄ったら俺の師匠にも
線香の一本でもあげといてくれや。

engChrName: Sure, sure. (Tch. Read me like a book.)
engSearchText:
Sure, sure.
(Tch. Read me like a book.)
jpnChrName: 分かったよ。 （ったく、敵わねぇな……）
jpnSearchText:
分かったよ。
（ったく、敵わねぇな……）

engChrName: Taking a trip, huh? Man, I'd love to take one with the girls myself.
engSearchText:
Taking a trip, huh? Man, I'd love to take one with the
girls myself.
jpnChrName: 旅行か、いいなあ…… ………僕も彼女たちと………
jpnSearchText:
旅行か、いいなあ……
………僕も彼女たちと………

engChrName: Oh, back in the land of the living, are you?
engSearchText: Oh, back in the land of the living, are you?
jpnChrName: おっと、ようやく生き返ったか？
jpnSearchText: おっと、ようやく生き返ったか？

engChrName: Last we saw, you'd plastered yourself to sleep.
engSearchText: Last we saw, you'd plastered yourself to sleep.
jpnChrName: さっきまで死体のように 酔いつぶれていてな……
jpnSearchText:
さっきまで死体のように
酔いつぶれていてな……

engChrName: I figured I'd just drop you off at the precinct, but I, uh... Pfft, heh. I couldn't stop laughing at your face, man.
engSearchText:
I figured I'd just drop you off at the precinct, but
I, uh... Pfft, heh. I couldn't stop laughing at your
face, man.
jpnChrName: 交番に運ぼうかとも思ったが。 ……しかし、やはりこの顔は……
jpnSearchText:
交番に運ぼうかとも思ったが。
……しかし、やはりこの顔は……

engChrName: Hah! You two in cahoots, perhaps?
engSearchText: Hah! You two in cahoots, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ハハ、もしかしてお前さんたち絡みで 何かあったのかね？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、もしかしてお前さんたち絡みで
何かあったのかね？

engChrName: No comment. Don't go lumping us together.
engSearchText: No comment. Don't go lumping us together.
jpnChrName: ノーコメントだ。 別に仲いいってワケでもないしな。
jpnSearchText:
ノーコメントだ。
別に仲いいってワケでもないしな。

engChrName: Ouch! Why you gotta gimme the cold shoulder, man?
engSearchText: Ouch! Why you gotta gimme the cold shoulder, man?
jpnChrName: うう、冷たいこと言うなよ……
jpnSearchText: うう、冷たいこと言うなよ……

engChrName: A little trip really does sound nice...
engSearchText: A little trip really does sound nice...
jpnChrName: それにしても旅行か、いいなぁ……
jpnSearchText: それにしても旅行か、いいなぁ……

engChrName: Okay, so...go take one. Y'know, yourself.
engSearchText: Okay, so...go take one. Y'know, yourself.
jpnChrName: ……行けばいいだろ、自分で。
jpnSearchText: ……行けばいいだろ、自分で。

engChrName: Well, no! What's the point in taking a trip alone? It's the perfect chance to kindle the flames of romance! You know, right?
engSearchText:
Well, no! What's the point in taking a trip alone?
It's the perfect chance to kindle the flames
of romance! You know, right?
jpnChrName: せっかくなら愛する人たちと 一緒に行きたいじゃないかぁっ！？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくなら愛する人たちと
一緒に行きたいじゃないかぁっ！？

engChrName: How should I know?!
engSearchText: How should I know?!
jpnChrName: 知らねえよ！
jpnSearchText: 知らねえよ！

engChrName: And you're really gonna push your luck and butter 'em up with some trip? She didn't just magically forget what happened.
engSearchText:
And you're really gonna push your luck and butter
'em up with some trip? She didn't just magically
forget what happened.
jpnChrName: つーかさっきの今でもう旅行とか考えてんのか？ どう考えても気が早すぎるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
つーかさっきの今でもう旅行とか考えてんのか？
どう考えても気が早すぎるだろ。

engChrName: I... Look, we're moving on from that, okay?
engSearchText: I... Look, we're moving on from that, okay?
jpnChrName: うぐっ……そ、そんなことないっ！
jpnSearchText: うぐっ……そ、そんなことないっ！

engChrName: See, when we met up last time, she said I could 'come by again sometime,' if I wanted to!
engSearchText:
See, when we met up last time, she said I could 'come
by again sometime,' if I wanted to!
jpnChrName: 会計の時に『宜しかったらまたどうぞ』 って言ってくれたし──
jpnSearchText:
会計の時に『宜しかったらまたどうぞ』
って言ってくれたし──

engChrName: And the kid, she said, 'You're such a weirdo, mister! Hey, can you stop by again? I wanna talk to you some more!'
engSearchText:
And the kid, she said, 'You're such a weirdo, mister!
Hey, can you stop by again? I wanna talk to you
some more!'
jpnChrName: あの子（ユメ）だって『オジサン 面白いからまた来てねー』って言ってくれたし！
jpnSearchText:
あの子（ユメ）だって『オジサン
面白いからまた来てねー』って言ってくれたし！

engChrName: ...Yeah, of course she was nice to you, she's a freakin' waitress. Yumé's reaction said it all: you ARE a weirdo.
engSearchText:
...Yeah, of course she was nice to you, she's a
freakin' waitress. Yumé's reaction said it all: you ARE
a weirdo.
jpnChrName: 接客トークと変なオジサンを 面白がってただけだろ。
jpnSearchText:
接客トークと変なオジサンを
面白がってただけだろ。

engChrName: I know I took on your request, but man, get your head outta your ass. Basic courtesy ain't affection.
engSearchText:
I know I took on your request, but man, get your
head outta your ass. Basic courtesy ain't affection.
jpnChrName: こっちも依頼を受けた責任ってモンがある。 距離感と筋の通し方を間違えんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
こっちも依頼を受けた責任ってモンがある。
距離感と筋の通し方を間違えんなよ？

engChrName: I know that! I'm just trying to make amends!
engSearchText: I know that! I'm just trying to make amends!
jpnChrName: わ、分かっているさっ……！ 彼女たちに迷惑だけは絶対かけない！
jpnSearchText:
わ、分かっているさっ……！
彼女たちに迷惑だけは絶対かけない！

engChrName: I mean, sure, I'd love it if they could let me back into their lives, but...
engSearchText:
I mean, sure, I'd love it if they could let me back into
their lives, but...
jpnChrName: 振り向いてくれたらそりゃあ嬉しいけど、 あくまでそれは二の次だ……！
jpnSearchText:
振り向いてくれたらそりゃあ嬉しいけど、
あくまでそれは二の次だ……！

engChrName: ...I just, I gotta take that first step myself! I wanna make up for all that time we should've spent together!
engSearchText:
...I just, I gotta take that first step myself! I wanna
make up for all that time we should've spent together!
jpnChrName: そばに居なかった間の埋め合わせは どんな形ででもして……！
jpnSearchText:
そばに居なかった間の埋め合わせは
どんな形ででもして……！

engChrName: That's my new goal in life: putting a smile on their faces!
engSearchText:
That's my new goal in life: putting a smile on
their faces!
jpnChrName: 彼女たちが幸せになれるように全力を尽くす！ それが今の僕の生きる意味さっ！
jpnSearchText:
彼女たちが幸せになれるように全力を尽くす！
それが今の僕の生きる意味さっ！

engChrName: Swell.
engSearchText: Swell.
jpnChrName: お、おう……
jpnSearchText: お、おう……

engChrName: ...Heh. Guess that was the wake-up call he needed.
engSearchText: ...Heh. Guess that was the wake-up call he needed.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、そこまで 心配はいらねえのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、そこまで
心配はいらねえのかもな。

engChrName: Guy's learned he can't just treat life like it's one big game.
engSearchText:
Guy's learned he can't just treat life like it's one
big game.
jpnChrName: とことんふんだくってやるつもりだったが、 今回はほどほどにしてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
とことんふんだくってやるつもりだったが、
今回はほどほどにしてやるか。

engChrName: Sounds like you two have had your share of run-ins before.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you two have had your share of
run-ins before.
jpnChrName: ハハ、やっぱり色々あったみたいだが……
jpnSearchText: ハハ、やっぱり色々あったみたいだが……

engChrName: Oh, didn't he bring his car here? I saw it parked outside.
engSearchText:
Oh, didn't he bring his car here? I saw it
parked outside.
jpnChrName: あれ、そういえばこの兄さん、近くの駐車場に 車を停めてるとか言ってなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、そういえばこの兄さん、近くの駐車場に
車を停めてるとか言ってなかったか？

engChrName: *sigh* Of course he did... I'll lug him over to the precinct. He can sleep it off there.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Of course he did... I'll lug him over to
the precinct. He can sleep it off there.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……やっぱり今晩は 交番で寝泊まりしてもらうしかないな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……やっぱり今晩は
交番で寝泊まりしてもらうしかないな。

engChrName: Nice little party you guys got here. Don't mind if I do.
engSearchText:
Nice little party you guys got here. Don't mind if
I do.
jpnChrName: おいおいこれは何のパーティーだ？
jpnSearchText: おいおいこれは何のパーティーだ？

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Aaron and the Arkride crew. Good to see you've kept well.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Aaron and the Arkride crew. Good to
see you've kept well.
jpnChrName: おやアーロンにアークライド君たち。 しばらくぶりだが元気そうで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
おやアーロンにアークライド君たち。
しばらくぶりだが元気そうで何よりだ。

engChrName: Huh. Never thought I'd see a bracer, a Heiyue elder, a Marduk security chief, and the CID head all banded together like this.
engSearchText:
Huh. Never thought I'd see a bracer, a Heiyue
elder, a Marduk security chief, and the CID
head all banded together like this.
jpnChrName: ギルドの重鎮にＣＩＤの室長、 加えて黒月の長老家とＭＫの警備主任……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの重鎮にＣＩＤの室長、
加えて黒月の長老家とＭＫの警備主任……

engChrName: Can't deny it makes me a bit on edge, though. Types from both sides of the law tend not to mix well.
engSearchText:
Can't deny it makes me a bit on edge, though.
Types from both sides of the law tend not to
mix well.
jpnChrName: 表裏の重役がしれっと揃ってんじゃねえよ、 なんかありそうで不安になってくるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
表裏の重役がしれっと揃ってんじゃねえよ、
なんかありそうで不安になってくるぜ。

engChrName: I assure you, it's much less charged than you make it out to be.
engSearchText:
I assure you, it's much less charged than you make it
out to be.
jpnChrName: そう構えることはないわ。
jpnSearchText: そう構えることはないわ。

engChrName: We're just exchanging information and confirming agreements. Please, pay us no mind.
engSearchText:
We're just exchanging information and
confirming agreements. Please, pay us no mind.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした情報交換といくつかの 取り決めを確認しているだけだから。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした情報交換といくつかの
取り決めを確認しているだけだから。

engChrName: Kasim...
engSearchText: Kasim...
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんまで……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃんまで……

engChrName: You look busier than ever, Mr. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: You look busier than ever, Mr. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様です、カシム警備主任。
jpnSearchText: お疲れ様です、カシム警備主任。

engChrName: Oh, I haven't seen you since Oración. We were actually just talking about how to go about cleaning up that mess.
engSearchText:
Oh, I haven't seen you since Oración. We were
actually just talking about how to go about cleaning
up that mess.
jpnChrName: オラシオン以来だな。 ちょうどその件の事後処理について話している所だ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン以来だな。
ちょうどその件の事後処理について話している所だ。

engChrName: Taking care of the Almata remnants, you mean?
engSearchText: Taking care of the Almata remnants, you mean?
jpnChrName: 壊滅後のアルマータに関して、ですか。
jpnSearchText: 壊滅後のアルマータに関して、ですか。

engChrName: Yeah. We've smoked out pretty much all the hideouts they had left.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We've smoked out pretty much all the hideouts
they had left.
jpnChrName: ああそうさ、各地の拠点にいた やつら構成員は大方一掃した。
jpnSearchText:
ああそうさ、各地の拠点にいた
やつら構成員は大方一掃した。

engChrName: We're taking our own measures, of course—mostly concerning Almata's trade and supply routes.
engSearchText:
We're taking our own measures, of course—mostly
concerning Almata's trade and supply routes.
jpnChrName: ちなみにアルマータが握っていた “貿易ルート”に関しては──
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにアルマータが握っていた
“貿易ルート”に関しては──

engChrName: The more problematic trade routes have been taken care of. Heiyue will see to the rest.
engSearchText:
The more problematic trade routes have been taken
care of. Heiyue will see to the rest.
jpnChrName: 問題があるものを取り潰し、残りは 我々黒月が“管理”することになりました。
jpnSearchText:
問題があるものを取り潰し、残りは
我々黒月が“管理”することになりました。

engChrName: Bet that's just what you were hoping for.
engSearchText: Bet that's just what you were hoping for.
jpnChrName: 最初から狙ってんだろうが……
jpnSearchText: 最初から狙ってんだろうが……

engChrName: We did also uncover some artifacts they had been using—the church is handling those.
engSearchText:
We did also uncover some artifacts they had been
using—the church is handling those.
jpnChrName: それといくつか禁制アーティファクトも 発見されたけど、教会の方が回収したわ。
jpnSearchText:
それといくつか禁制アーティファクトも
発見されたけど、教会の方が回収したわ。

engChrName: Yes. Celis and Leon took care of that.
engSearchText: Yes. Celis and Leon took care of that.
jpnChrName: セリスとリオンが上手くやったようだな。
jpnSearchText: セリスとリオンが上手くやったようだな。

engChrName: Well, good to hear that's taken care of.
engSearchText: Well, good to hear that's taken care of.
jpnChrName: ようやく一段落ね。
jpnSearchText: ようやく一段落ね。

engChrName: That's one problem solved.
engSearchText: That's one problem solved.
jpnChrName: ようやく一段落ですね。
jpnSearchText: ようやく一段落ですね。

engChrName: It's nice to have that resolved in time for the festival.
engSearchText: It's nice to have that resolved in time for the festival.
jpnChrName: これで安心して記念祭を迎えられるかな。
jpnSearchText: これで安心して記念祭を迎えられるかな。

engChrName: Cool. Nice not to have that looming over the festival.
engSearchText: Cool. Nice not to have that looming over the festival.
jpnChrName: これで心置きなく 記念祭を楽しめそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
これで心置きなく
記念祭を楽しめそうだな。

engChrName: In truth, that's why I'm here.
engSearchText: In truth, that's why I'm here.
jpnChrName: 実を言うと私がここに来たのも そっちの方がメインでね。
jpnSearchText:
実を言うと私がここに来たのも
そっちの方がメインでね。

engChrName: The festival has the full support of the Kowloon Group this year.
engSearchText:
The festival has the full support of the Kowloon
Group this year.
jpnChrName: 今回の革命記念祭には九龍グループが 全面協力することになっている。
jpnSearchText:
今回の革命記念祭には九龍グループが
全面協力することになっている。

engChrName: That, of course, does lead to some overlap between us and Marduk. I'm here to make sure we don't step on each other's toes, so to speak.
engSearchText:
That, of course, does lead to some overlap between us
and Marduk. I'm here to make sure we don't step on
each other's toes, so to speak.
jpnChrName: ビジネスにおいてはあちらのマルドゥック社と 食い合っている部分も多いがね。
jpnSearchText:
ビジネスにおいてはあちらのマルドゥック社と
食い合っている部分も多いがね。

engChrName: I can't tell you much, I'm afraid—only the general approach HQ is taking.
engSearchText:
I can't tell you much, I'm afraid—only the general
approach HQ is taking.
jpnChrName: この場では自分は本社の意向を 伝える役に過ぎません。
jpnSearchText:
この場では自分は本社の意向を
伝える役に過ぎません。

engChrName: You'll have to wait three days for more in-depth negotiations. Mr. Thorndyke will be holding a meeting to go over our itinerary.
engSearchText:
You'll have to wait three days for more
in-depth negotiations. Mr. Thorndyke will be
holding a meeting to go over our itinerary.
jpnChrName: 具体的な線引きの話については３日後 ソーンダイクＧＭが直々参加することでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
具体的な線引きの話については３日後
ソーンダイクＧＭが直々参加することでしょう。

engChrName: Well, then you're right, now probably isn't the best time. Can't go jumping the gun!
engSearchText:
Well, then you're right, now probably isn't the
best time. Can't go jumping the gun!
jpnChrName: はは、確かに今する話ではなかったな。
jpnSearchText: はは、確かに今する話ではなかったな。

engChrName: They're discussing all sorts of things, from the looks of it.
engSearchText:
They're discussing all sorts of things, from the looks
of it.
jpnChrName: 色々あるみたいですね……
jpnSearchText: 色々あるみたいですね……

engChrName: Yeah. Nothin' to do with us, though.
engSearchText: Yeah. Nothin' to do with us, though.
jpnChrName: ま、俺らとは関係のない話だ。
jpnSearchText: ま、俺らとは関係のない話だ。

engChrName: On the contrary, I do have some information you might find useful.
engSearchText:
On the contrary, I do have some information you
might find useful.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちにも関係のある話として 一応伝えておくけど……
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちにも関係のある話として
一応伝えておくけど……

engChrName: We're still tracking down some Almata holdouts that have taken to the underground...
engSearchText:
We're still tracking down some Almata holdouts that
have taken to the underground...
jpnChrName: 当局の掃討から逃れたアルマータの構成員や 半グレたちも少数だが残っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
当局の掃討から逃れたアルマータの構成員や
半グレたちも少数だが残っているわ。

engChrName: ...along with some of the hate groups they used for their ends.
engSearchText:
...along with some of the hate groups they used for
their ends.
jpnChrName: それと以前利用した反移民団体や 下部組織などもね。
jpnSearchText:
それと以前利用した反移民団体や
下部組織などもね。

engChrName: Leftovers, huh?
engSearchText: Leftovers, huh?
jpnChrName: アルマータの残党か……
jpnSearchText: アルマータの残党か……

engChrName: And Melchior's still on the run, too. Can't count them out just yet.
engSearchText:
And Melchior's still on the run, too. Can't count
them out just yet.
jpnChrName: そういやメルキオルの野郎も生き残ってるな。 まだ捕まってねえみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
そういやメルキオルの野郎も生き残ってるな。
まだ捕まってねえみてぇだが……

engChrName: He pools those thugs back up and we'll have Almata 2 on our hands.
engSearchText:
He pools those thugs back up and we'll have Almata
2 on our hands.
jpnChrName: あいつがその残党をまとめ上げたら 厄介なことになるんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
あいつがその残党をまとめ上げたら
厄介なことになるんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: Indeed, he's quite the wild card. We haven't seen any movements from him as of late...
engSearchText:
Indeed, he's quite the wild card. We haven't seen any
movements from him as of late...
jpnChrName: 幹部メルキオルの消息はまだ 捉えられていないけれど──
jpnSearchText:
幹部メルキオルの消息はまだ
捉えられていないけれど──

engChrName: ...but then, that means he hasn't been contacting said remnants, either.
engSearchText:
...but then, that means he hasn't been contacting said
remnants, either.
jpnChrName: 今の所、彼がそういった残党と 接触した痕跡はないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
今の所、彼がそういった残党と
接触した痕跡はないみたいね。

engChrName: The guild's working on exposing Almata's business ties. We wanna pull it all out by the roots.
engSearchText:
The guild's working on exposing Almata's
business ties. We wanna pull it all out by the roots.
jpnChrName: 関連組織の摘発などにはギルドも協力してる。
jpnSearchText: 関連組織の摘発などにはギルドも協力してる。

engChrName: Elaine and some S-ranks from HQ are in charge of that.
engSearchText:
Elaine and some S-ranks from HQ are in charge
of that.
jpnChrName: 今もエレインと総本部から派遣されたＳ級が 共にそのミッションの最中だ。
jpnSearchText:
今もエレインと総本部から派遣されたＳ級が
共にそのミッションの最中だ。

engChrName: Got'cha. How's she doin', outta curiosity?
engSearchText: Got'cha. How's she doin', outta curiosity?
jpnChrName: そうか……あいつの様子はどうだ？
jpnSearchText: そうか……あいつの様子はどうだ？

engChrName: Sorry, can't say for sure.
engSearchText: Sorry, can't say for sure.
jpnChrName: 俺からはなんとも言えねぇな。
jpnSearchText: 俺からはなんとも言えねぇな。

engChrName: She should be back tomorrow, though. I'm sure she'd appreciate a nice, warm welcome when she gets home!
engSearchText:
She should be back tomorrow, though. I'm sure she'd
appreciate a nice, warm welcome when she
gets home!
jpnChrName: まあ、明日には戻ってくるから お前さんが優しく出迎えてやれよ？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、明日には戻ってくるから
お前さんが優しく出迎えてやれよ？

engChrName: Butt out, bucko.
engSearchText: Butt out, bucko.
jpnChrName: 余計なお世話だっつの……！
jpnSearchText: 余計なお世話だっつの……！

engChrName: Oh, Van!
engSearchText: Oh, Van!
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Already doing your rounds, huh?
engSearchText: Already doing your rounds, huh?
jpnChrName: あら、早速回ってるみたいね。
jpnSearchText: あら、早速回ってるみたいね。

engChrName: Congrats on the festival going off without a hitch.
engSearchText: Congrats on the festival going off without a hitch.
jpnChrName: ふふ、革命記念祭、 おめでとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、革命記念祭、
おめでとうございます。

engChrName: Yes, congratulations. It's so nice to see the whole city come together to celebrate.
engSearchText:
Yes, congratulations. It's so nice to see the whole city
come together to celebrate.
jpnChrName: おめでとうございます──いいですね。 こんな風に街中（まちじゅう）でお祝いをするなんて。
jpnSearchText:
おめでとうございます──いいですね。
こんな風に街中（まちじゅう）でお祝いをするなんて。

engChrName: Hard to stop a hundred-year tradition, after all.
engSearchText: Hard to stop a hundred-year tradition, after all.
jpnChrName: ま、百年前から続いている 伝統みたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、百年前から続いている
伝統みたいだからな。

engChrName: Though this festival makes all the others look like a low-budget office party.
engSearchText:
Though this festival makes all the others look like a
low-budget office party.
jpnChrName: 首都以外じゃそこまで 祝われていないとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
首都以外じゃそこまで
祝われていないとは思うが。

engChrName: It's still a special day for all of Calvard.
engSearchText: It's still a special day for all of Calvard.
jpnChrName: それでも共和国にとったら やっぱり特別な日なのは確かだわ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも共和国にとったら
やっぱり特別な日なのは確かだわ。

engChrName: There's been a ton of reporters asking me for interviews. 'What do you think of the festival?' 'Any big plans for next year?' All that stuff.
engSearchText:
There's been a ton of reporters asking me
for interviews. 'What do you think of the festival?'
'Any big plans for next year?' All that stuff.
jpnChrName: ……おかげでさっきまで記念祭にかこつけて インタビュー攻めだったし。
jpnSearchText:
……おかげでさっきまで記念祭にかこつけて
インタビュー攻めだったし。

engChrName: I heard you got caught up in a flock of paparazzi yourself.
engSearchText:
I heard you got caught up in a flock of
paparazzi yourself.
jpnChrName: フフ、さっきまで記念祭にかこつけて インタビュー攻めだったみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、さっきまで記念祭にかこつけて
インタビュー攻めだったみたいだし。

engChrName: Oh, I just consider that part of the festival spirit! Heehee.
engSearchText:
Oh, I just consider that part of the festival spirit!
Heehee.
jpnChrName: あはは……あんな風に 盛り上がるものなんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……あんな風に
盛り上がるものなんですね。

engChrName: I do see a lot of people interviewing celebrities during the festival. I suppose it makes sense.
engSearchText:
I do see a lot of people interviewing celebrities during
the festival. I suppose it makes sense.
jpnChrName: ふふ、記念祭をどう過ごすか…… 芸能人の方には定番の質問ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、記念祭をどう過ごすか……
芸能人の方には定番の質問ですよね。

engChrName: Yeah, they gotta know everything about you. What you're gonna do, where you're gonna eat, what color panties you've got on...
engSearchText:
Yeah, they gotta know everything about you.
What you're gonna do, where you're gonna eat, what
color panties you've got on...
jpnChrName: ハン、記念祭をどう過ごすか…… 芸能人には定番の質問みてーだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、記念祭をどう過ごすか……
芸能人には定番の質問みてーだな。

engChrName: That does seem to be the standard for interviews.
engSearchText: That does seem to be the standard for interviews.
jpnChrName: ああ、記念祭をどう過ごすか…… 芸能人には定番の質問みたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、記念祭をどう過ごすか……
芸能人には定番の質問みたいだけど。

engChrName: Yeah, that tracks. They gotta know everything about your personal life, or they ain't journos.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that tracks. They gotta know everything about
your personal life, or they ain't journos.
jpnChrName: ああ、記念祭をどう過ごすか…… 芸能人なんかには定番の質問ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、記念祭をどう過ごすか……
芸能人なんかには定番の質問ってな。

engChrName: I hope they didn't bother you too much. It sounds kinda fun, though!
engSearchText:
I hope they didn't bother you too much. It sounds
kinda fun, though!
jpnChrName: そうなんですか…… えへへ、でもいいですねっ！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか……
えへへ、でもいいですねっ！

engChrName: I see... It sounds rather flattering, actually.
engSearchText: I see... It sounds rather flattering, actually.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… ふふ、そういうのも素敵ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
ふふ、そういうのも素敵ですね。

engChrName: I see... Hah. It's overbearing just to imagine that much attention on you.
engSearchText:
I see... Hah. It's overbearing just to imagine that
much attention on you.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… フフ、なかなかに微笑ましいな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
フフ、なかなかに微笑ましいな。

engChrName: I just wish the reporters would chill with the really personal questions.
engSearchText:
I just wish the reporters would chill with the really
personal questions.
jpnChrName: うーん、でも最近それ以上に 際どい質問なんかも多くって……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、でも最近それ以上に
際どい質問なんかも多くって……

engChrName: Nowadays, they really pick at you to try and get gossip material. Whatever happened to journalistic integrity?
engSearchText:
Nowadays, they really pick at you to try and get
gossip material. Whatever happened to
journalistic integrity?
jpnChrName: スキャンダルネタは控えるっていう 慣例が少し崩れてるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
スキャンダルネタは控えるっていう
慣例が少し崩れてるかもしれません。

engChrName: That last guy, Goddess, he did not know how to take a hint.
engSearchText:
That last guy, Goddess, he did not know how to take
a hint.
jpnChrName: さっきの記者もしつこかったですし……
jpnSearchText: さっきの記者もしつこかったですし……

engChrName: Huh. You handle the interviews and stuff?
engSearchText: Huh. You handle the interviews and stuff?
jpnChrName: へえ、インタビュー会見、 お前さんが仕切ってたのか？
jpnSearchText:
へえ、インタビュー会見、
お前さんが仕切ってたのか？

engChrName: Well, it did kinda end up that way, yeah.
engSearchText: Well, it did kinda end up that way, yeah.
jpnChrName: あ、はいっ。 皆さんから任せられる形で。
jpnSearchText:
あ、はいっ。
皆さんから任せられる形で。

engChrName: I still have a lot to learn, though. My seniors at the Tyrell Times have really been helping me out.
engSearchText:
I still have a lot to learn, though. My seniors at the
Tyrell Times have really been helping me out.
jpnChrName: タイレル通信の先輩方にも 助けられちゃいましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
タイレル通信の先輩方にも
助けられちゃいましたけど……

engChrName: Oh, don't be so hard on yourself. You've been a busy bee lately!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be so hard on yourself. You've been a busy
bee lately!
jpnChrName: ううん、そんなことないです。 色々フォローしていただいて……
jpnSearchText:
ううん、そんなことないです。
色々フォローしていただいて……

engChrName: I really owe you for helping me out with that article. It was about to blow up, wasn't it, Judith?
engSearchText:
I really owe you for helping me out with that article.
It was about to blow up, wasn't it, Judith?
jpnChrName: 先輩なんか例の記事について 蒸し返されそうな所を助けられましたよね？
jpnSearchText:
先輩なんか例の記事について
蒸し返されそうな所を助けられましたよね？

engChrName: Yup. First thing in the morning. I swear, those Buzzraider guys never learn.
engSearchText:
Yup. First thing in the morning. I swear, those
Buzzraider guys never learn.
jpnChrName: ああ、朝一であった…… ほんとバズレイダーも懲りないんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、朝一であった……
ほんとバズレイダーも懲りないんだから。

engChrName: Yeah, just a bit ago. Those Buzzraider guys never learn, I swear.
engSearchText:
Yeah, just a bit ago. Those Buzzraider guys never
learn, I swear.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっきの…… ほんとバズレイダーも懲りないんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、さっきの……
ほんとバズレイダーも懲りないんだから。

engChrName: Seriously, thanks, Marielle. I saw you out there in Oración, too, giving it 110% like you always do.
engSearchText:
Seriously, thanks, Marielle. I saw you out there in
Oración, too, giving it 110% like you always do.
jpnChrName: ほんとありがとね、マリエルさん。 オラシオンでも陰ながら頑張ってくれたし。
jpnSearchText:
ほんとありがとね、マリエルさん。
オラシオンでも陰ながら頑張ってくれたし。

engChrName: You, haha... You really think so? Hearing you say that makes my heart all...
engSearchText:
You, haha... You really think so? Hearing you say that
makes my heart all...
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですかね。 まだまだ未熟だとは思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、そうですかね。
まだまだ未熟だとは思いますが……

engChrName: All...?
engSearchText: All...?

engChrName: ...Uh-huh.
engSearchText: ...Uh-huh.

engChrName: ...Wh-What?! It's not like that! I just... My emotions got the better of—I mean, no, they didn't!
engSearchText:
...Wh-What?! It's not like that! I just... My emotions
got the better of—I mean, no, they didn't!
jpnChrName: あ、いえ、違うんです！ 何かちょっと感慨深かっただけで！
jpnSearchText:
あ、いえ、違うんです！
何かちょっと感慨深かっただけで！

engChrName: I mean, I feel really thankful for all the help I've gotten! Not JUST from Dingo, okay?!
engSearchText:
I mean, I feel really thankful for all the help
I've gotten! Not JUST from Dingo, okay?!
jpnChrName: 別にディンゴさんだけじゃなくて、 色んな人に助けられてるなぁって……！
jpnSearchText:
別にディンゴさんだけじゃなくて、
色んな人に助けられてるなぁって……！

engChrName: I'm just...happy, you know?
engSearchText: I'm just...happy, you know?
jpnChrName: ………わたし、本当に幸せ者ですね。
jpnSearchText: ………わたし、本当に幸せ者ですね。

engChrName: Oh, Marielle...
engSearchText: Oh, Marielle...
jpnChrName: マリエルさん………
jpnSearchText: マリエルさん………

engChrName: ...Well, uhh, that's good to hear.
engSearchText: ...Well, uhh, that's good to hear.
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: I've got it. I wanna repay you for setting everything up for us, so how about I treat you to a little makeover?
engSearchText:
I've got it. I wanna repay you for setting everything
up for us, so how about I treat you to a
little makeover?
jpnChrName: よし──会見の仕切りのお礼に エステのフルコースを奢らせてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
よし──会見の仕切りのお礼に
エステのフルコースを奢らせてもらうわ！

engChrName: I know the perfect place. Nina, Saara, why don't you two come along with us?
engSearchText:
I know the perfect place. Nina, Saara, why don't you
two come along with us?
jpnChrName: 良いところを知ってるから ニナ、サァラさんも付き合いなさい！
jpnSearchText:
良いところを知ってるから
ニナ、サァラさんも付き合いなさい！

engChrName: Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, how about you, Agnès?
engSearchText:
Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, how about
you, Agnès?
jpnChrName: あとシャヒーナちゃんに── もちろんアニエスたちもね！
jpnSearchText:
あとシャヒーナちゃんに──
もちろんアニエスたちもね！

engChrName: I—ME?!
engSearchText: I—ME?!
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, why don't we bring Feri along, too?
engSearchText:
Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, why don't we bring
Feri along, too?
jpnChrName: あとシャヒーナちゃんに── もちろんフェリちゃんたちもね！
jpnSearchText:
あとシャヒーナちゃんに──
もちろんフェリちゃんたちもね！

engChrName: Wait, me?
engSearchText: Wait, me?
jpnChrName: ふえっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ふえっ……！？

engChrName: Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, let's get you all spruced up, Risette!
engSearchText:
Oh, and Shaheena, and... Oooh, let's get you all
spruced up, Risette!
jpnChrName: あとシャヒーナちゃんに── もちろんリゼットさんたちもね！
jpnSearchText:
あとシャヒーナちゃんに──
もちろんリゼットさんたちもね！

engChrName: Erm...
engSearchText: Erm...
jpnChrName: まあ……
jpnSearchText: まあ……

engChrName: W-W-Wait, you want to treat me?!
engSearchText: W-W-Wait, you want to treat me?!
jpnChrName: え、え、わたしもですか……！？
jpnSearchText: え、え、わたしもですか……！？

engChrName: If I didn't, I wouldn't have offered! It's the least I can do, really.
engSearchText:
If I didn't, I wouldn't have offered! It's the least I can
do, really.
jpnChrName: 貴女へのお礼だから当然でしょ？
jpnSearchText: 貴女へのお礼だから当然でしょ？

engChrName: A girl's gotta look good when she takes the stage, y'know?
engSearchText:
A girl's gotta look good when she takes the
stage, y'know?
jpnChrName: ──女はステージを上がったら 自分へのご褒美をしてあげるモンよ。
jpnSearchText:
──女はステージを上がったら
自分へのご褒美をしてあげるモンよ。

engChrName: The limelight's coming your way, I can just tell. This is your chance to get used to all the attention!
engSearchText:
The limelight's coming your way, I can just tell.
This is your chance to get used to all the attention!
jpnChrName: これから何度だって機会はあるんだから 手始めにそういうのにも慣れておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
これから何度だって機会はあるんだから
手始めにそういうのにも慣れておきなさい。

engChrName: Then, when you get to strut your stuff to the one you...ahem, APPRECIATE, you'll look good when you do it!
engSearchText:
Then, when you get to strut your stuff to the one
you...ahem, APPRECIATE, you'll look good when
you do it!
jpnChrName: 貴女の大切な──誇りたい人にいつか、 胸を張れる自分を見てもらうためにも。
jpnSearchText:
貴女の大切な──誇りたい人にいつか、
胸を張れる自分を見てもらうためにも。

engChrName: Judith...
engSearchText: Judith...

engChrName: ...Okay! Sounds like a plan!
engSearchText: ...Okay! Sounds like a plan!
jpnChrName: ……わかりましたっ！ 遠慮なくお言葉に甘えます！
jpnSearchText:
……わかりましたっ！
遠慮なくお言葉に甘えます！

engChrName: Atta girl!
engSearchText: Atta girl!
jpnChrName: うんうん、それでヨシ！
jpnSearchText: うんうん、それでヨシ！

engChrName: Shaheena might be a tad young for this, though. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Shaheena might be a tad young for this, though.
Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……シャヒーナには ちょっと早そうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……シャヒーナには
ちょっと早そうですけど。

engChrName: Mmm... I just wish Judith's friend Rixia could've tagged along with us. She was supposed to be back today...
engSearchText:
Mmm... I just wish Judith's friend Rixia could've
tagged along with us. She was supposed to be
back today...
jpnChrName: うーん、できれば今日帰るっていう、 先輩のお友達（リーシャさん）も誘いたかったですね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、できれば今日帰るっていう、
先輩のお友達（リーシャさん）も誘いたかったですね。

engChrName: (Heh. Can't keep a good girl down.)
engSearchText: (Heh. Can't keep a good girl down.)
jpnChrName: （ったく……   女ってのは逞しいよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ったく……
女ってのは逞しいよな。）

engChrName: (They're quite the headstrong bunch. Like a certain someone I know...)
engSearchText:
(They're quite the headstrong bunch. Like a certain
someone I know...)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ……   本当、女の人って強いな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ……
本当、女の人って強いな。）

engChrName: (Quite the firecrackers, aren't they? Haha.)
engSearchText: (Quite the firecrackers, aren't they? Haha.)
jpnChrName: （フフ……   まこと頼もしき娘たちだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ……
まこと頼もしき娘たちだ。）

engChrName: Ah, good to see you, Van. Been a while since Longlai, eh?
engSearchText:
Ah, good to see you, Van. Been a while since
Longlai, eh?
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: おお、ヴァン君。 龍來以来になるかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、ヴァン君。
龍來以来になるかなぁ。

engChrName: You as well, Master Bergard. So nice to see you again.
engSearchText:
You as well, Master Bergard. So nice to see
you again.
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: ベルガルド先生もご無沙汰しています。
jpnSearchText: ベルガルド先生もご無沙汰しています。

engChrName: Indeed. I hope you've been well.
engSearchText: Indeed. I hope you've been well.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 一月振りですな、ご隠居。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
一月振りですな、ご隠居。

engChrName: Oh, good to see you two. Been a while since Longlai, eh?
engSearchText:
Oh, good to see you two. Been a while since
Longlai, eh?
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: おお、ヴァン君たち。 龍來以来になるかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、ヴァン君たち。
龍來以来になるかなぁ。

engChrName: Hey, c'mon, Mr. Prez. Think about your position for a second, yeah?
engSearchText:
Hey, c'mon, Mr. Prez. Think about your position
for a second, yeah?
jpnChrName: いやいや……御大、 少しはお立場を考えてくださいよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや……御大、
少しはお立場を考えてくださいよ。

engChrName: Well, it's good to see you again, Mr. President.
engSearchText: Well, it's good to see you again, Mr. President.
jpnChrName: あはは…… ご無沙汰しています、閣下。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
ご無沙汰しています、閣下。

engChrName: Pleased to see you again, Mr. President.
engSearchText: Pleased to see you again, Mr. President.
jpnChrName: ご無沙汰しております、閣下。
jpnSearchText: ご無沙汰しております、閣下。

engChrName: It's, er, good to see you again, Mr. President.
engSearchText: It's, er, good to see you again, Mr. President.
jpnChrName: ご、ご無沙汰しています、閣下。
jpnSearchText: ご、ご無沙汰しています、閣下。

engChrName: Oh, I saw you on the ceremony broadcast!
engSearchText: Oh, I saw you on the ceremony broadcast!
jpnChrName: えへへ……式典の実況で 映ってたのは見ましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……式典の実況で
映ってたのは見ましたけど。

engChrName: (Wait, Rocksmith is here, too?)
engSearchText: (Wait, Rocksmith is here, too?)
jpnChrName: （ロ、ロックスミス元大統領……）
jpnSearchText: （ロ、ロックスミス元大統領……）

engChrName: (I mean, we do know each other from Longlai, but he still gives me stage fright...)
engSearchText:
(I mean, we do know each other from Longlai, but he
still gives me stage fright...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、あたしも龍來で   紹介はしてもらったけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、あたしも龍來で
紹介はしてもらったけど。）

engChrName: Huh. Fan and the crown prince shootin' the shit over drinks? Now there's somethin' you don't see every day.
engSearchText:
Huh. Fan and the crown prince shootin' the shit
over drinks? Now there's somethin' you don't see
every day.
jpnChrName: で、ファン叔々（おじさん）に公太子まで一緒に こんな場所で飲んでいるとはなァ。
jpnSearchText:
で、ファン叔々（おじさん）に公太子まで一緒に
こんな場所で飲んでいるとはなァ。

engChrName: Couldn't even tell you were all here until we were right in front of you. That's the Flying Swallow for you.
engSearchText:
Couldn't even tell you were all here until we were
right in front of you. That's the Flying Swallow
for you.
jpnChrName: 気配も殆ど感じさせねぇし、 さすが飛燕紅児の采配ってところか？
jpnSearchText:
気配も殆ど感じさせねぇし、
さすが飛燕紅児の采配ってところか？

engChrName: Also, Fan and the crown prince shootin' the shit over drinks? Now there's somethin' you don't see every day.
engSearchText:
Also, Fan and the crown prince shootin' the shit
over drinks? Now there's somethin' you don't see
every day.
jpnChrName: で、ファン大人に皇太子殿下まで一緒に こんな場所で飲んでいるとは……
jpnSearchText:
で、ファン大人に皇太子殿下まで一緒に
こんな場所で飲んでいるとは……

engChrName: Couldn't even tell you were all here until we were right in front of you. That's the Flying Swallow for you.
engSearchText:
Couldn't even tell you were all here until we were
right in front of you. That's the Flying Swallow
for you.
jpnChrName: 気配も殆ど感じさせねぇし、 さすが飛燕紅児の采配ってところか？
jpnSearchText:
気配も殆ど感じさせねぇし、
さすが飛燕紅児の采配ってところか？

engChrName: Oh, don't give me too much credit. They owe much to their excellent attendants.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't give me too much credit. They owe
much to their excellent attendants.
jpnChrName: フフ、買いかぶる必要はないわ。 頼もしき随行もいることだしね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、買いかぶる必要はないわ。
頼もしき随行もいることだしね。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Whoa—!
engSearchText: Whoa—!

engChrName: Oh, good. I thought my senses were playing tricks on me.
engSearchText:
Oh, good. I thought my senses were playing tricks
on me.
jpnChrName: よかった…… 気のせいじゃなかったみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
よかった……
気のせいじゃなかったみたいです。

engChrName: I had felt something faint...
engSearchText: I had felt something faint...
jpnChrName: センサーに僅かに 反応がありましたが……
jpnSearchText:
センサーに僅かに
反応がありましたが……

engChrName: Heh. Well done.
engSearchText: Heh. Well done.
jpnChrName: フ、見事なものだ。
jpnSearchText: フ、見事なものだ。

engChrName: Well, perhaps I can think of this as a little Longlai reunion party.
engSearchText:
Well, perhaps I can think of this as a little Longlai
reunion party.
jpnChrName: まあ、君たちを龍來に招待した面子が だいたい揃っているというわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、君たちを龍來に招待した面子が
だいたい揃っているというわけだ。

engChrName: These sorts of meetings are few and far between— how could I refuse?
engSearchText:
These sorts of meetings are few and far between—
how could I refuse?
jpnChrName: 普段なかなかお目にかかれない分、 こういった機会を逃したくなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
普段なかなかお目にかかれない分、
こういった機会を逃したくなくてね。

engChrName: Incidentally, I told Naje to take a few days off.
engSearchText: Incidentally, I told Naje to take a few days off.
jpnChrName: フフ、ちなみにナージェには しばし休憩を申しつけておいたよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ちなみにナージェには
しばし休憩を申しつけておいたよ。

engChrName: Dare I say, this company here can fend for themselves just fine.
engSearchText:
Dare I say, this company here can fend for themselves
just fine.
jpnChrName: これだけの護りが揃っていれば 万が一すらあり得ないだろうからね。
jpnSearchText:
これだけの護りが揃っていれば
万が一すらあり得ないだろうからね。

engChrName: Glad to hear Naje's getting a break. I actually just ran into her a while ago.
engSearchText:
Glad to hear Naje's getting a break. I actually just ran
into her a while ago.
jpnChrName: ご尤もで…… さっき彼女にも会いましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ご尤もで……
さっき彼女にも会いましたよ。

engChrName: Glad to hear Naje's getting a break. She always looks like you're keepin' her busy.
engSearchText:
Glad to hear Naje's getting a break. She always looks
like you're keepin' her busy.
jpnChrName: ご尤もで……彼女も 日頃から多忙そうですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ご尤もで……彼女も
日頃から多忙そうですしね。

engChrName: Aaanyway, I'm sure you guys got a buncha stuff you wanna talk about.
engSearchText:
Aaanyway, I'm sure you guys got a buncha stuff you
wanna talk about.
jpnChrName: ──何にせよ、積もる話は それこそ幾らでもありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
──何にせよ、積もる話は
それこそ幾らでもありそうだ。

engChrName: I'll mosey on out of here before your bodyguards glare a hole in my skull.
engSearchText:
I'll mosey on out of here before your bodyguards glare
a hole in my skull.
jpnChrName: 護衛の方々に睨まれないうちに ボチボチ退散するとしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
護衛の方々に睨まれないうちに
ボチボチ退散するとしますよ。

engChrName: I'm not GLARING...
engSearchText: I'm not GLARING...
jpnChrName: っ、自分は別に……
jpnSearchText: っ、自分は別に……

engChrName: Come now, you've no need to stand on formality in this company.
engSearchText:
Come now, you've no need to stand on formality in
this company.
jpnChrName: フフ、気を利かせずとも 貴方たちならば遠慮は無用よ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、気を利かせずとも
貴方たちならば遠慮は無用よ。

engChrName: You're right, you're right. Why not take a seat and help yourself to some skewers?
engSearchText:
You're right, you're right. Why not take a seat and
help yourself to some skewers?
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: うむうむ、折角だし 大将の串焼きでもどうかね？
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ、折角だし
大将の串焼きでもどうかね？

engChrName: This was one of my favorite local haunts back when I was in office. The skewers pair perfectly with a cold glass of Far Eastern sake!
engSearchText:
This was one of my favorite local haunts back when I
was in office. The skewers pair perfectly with a cold
glass of Far Eastern sake!
engHtmlText: ロックスミス元大統領
jpnChrName: 在任中は足繁く訪れてなぁ。 これがまた極東の冷酒に合うんだ！
jpnSearchText:
在任中は足繁く訪れてなぁ。
これがまた極東の冷酒に合うんだ！

engChrName: Heh, yes, I think you'll find the sake crisp and refreshing. Quite different from the aged stuff you'll find elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Heh, yes, I think you'll find the sake crisp
and refreshing. Quite different from the aged stuff
you'll find elsewhere.
jpnChrName: フフ、キリッとした口当たりは 老酒にはない爽やかさがありますな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、キリッとした口当たりは
老酒にはない爽やかさがありますな。

engChrName: Speaking of, looks like you two have empty glasses. How about another round on me?
engSearchText:
Speaking of, looks like you two have empty glasses.
How about another round on me?
jpnChrName: おっと、お二人とも杯が空いてますよ。 ──ささ、もう一献。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、お二人とも杯が空いてますよ。
──ささ、もう一献。

engChrName: ...Yes, that's just fine. As we speak, the threads of fate are coming together.
engSearchText:
...Yes, that's just fine. As we speak, the threads of fate
are coming together.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、それで構いません。 既に幾重の流れが収束しつつある。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、それで構いません。
既に幾重の流れが収束しつつある。

engChrName: When the time comes, I will make my move.
engSearchText: When the time comes, I will make my move.
jpnChrName: 程なく顕れるものを見て判断します。
jpnSearchText: 程なく顕れるものを見て判断します。

engChrName: Uhh, Nina?
engSearchText: Uhh, Nina?
jpnChrName: って、ニナ……？
jpnSearchText: って、ニナ……？

engChrName: Oh, Judith. And the Arkride crew, too.
engSearchText: Oh, Judith. And the Arkride crew, too.
jpnChrName: って先輩、皆さんも……
jpnSearchText: って先輩、皆さんも……

engChrName: What are you all doing he... Er, haha. I guess you could ask me the same.
engSearchText:
What are you all doing he... Er, haha. I guess you
could ask me the same.
jpnChrName: ……こんな所でどうして──って、 あはは、それは私も同じですか。
jpnSearchText:
……こんな所でどうして──って、
あはは、それは私も同じですか。

engChrName: Yeah, I think I will. The hell're you up to, lady?
engSearchText: Yeah, I think I will. The hell're you up to, lady?
jpnChrName: 判ってんじゃねーか。 いったい何をしてたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
判ってんじゃねーか。
いったい何をしてたんだ？

engChrName: It sounded like you were talking to someone, but you don't have a device or anything.
engSearchText:
It sounded like you were talking to someone, but you
don't have a device or anything.
jpnChrName: 誰かと喋っていたような…… ……でも、何も持ってませんし。
jpnSearchText:
誰かと喋っていたような……
……でも、何も持ってませんし。

engChrName: Oh, dear. Umm... Yeah, that's a bad habit of mine. Sometimes I just sorta switch into character and recite my lines when nobody's around.
engSearchText:
Oh, dear. Umm... Yeah, that's a bad habit of mine.
Sometimes I just sorta switch into character and
recite my lines when nobody's around.
jpnChrName: その……先輩ならたまに 見たことがあると思いますけど。
jpnSearchText:
その……先輩ならたまに
見たことがあると思いますけど。

engChrName: I'm sure Judith could tell you all about it... She's seen me do it once or twice.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Judith could tell you all about it... She's seen
me do it once or twice.
jpnChrName: 私──たまに役のイメージが降りてきて つい台詞を喋っちゃう時があって。
jpnSearchText:
私──たまに役のイメージが降りてきて
つい台詞を喋っちゃう時があって。

engChrName: Obviously it's kinda creepy when I do it, so I try to make sure I'm alone when I practice.
engSearchText:
Obviously it's kinda creepy when I do it, so I try to
make sure I'm alone when I practice.
jpnChrName: その……たぶん気味が悪いでしょうから 人目のない場所を選んでるんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
その……たぶん気味が悪いでしょうから
人目のない場所を選んでるんですけど。

engChrName: That does sound fair.
engSearchText: That does sound fair.
jpnChrName: 成程、そうでしたか……
jpnSearchText: 成程、そうでしたか……

engChrName: Oh, right, I remember hearing about that. They say you get really into character—almost like you're possessed!
engSearchText:
Oh, right, I remember hearing about that. They say
you get really into character—almost like
you're possessed!
jpnChrName: “憑依型”なんて呼ばれているのは 聞いていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
“憑依型”なんて呼ばれているのは
聞いていましたけど……

engChrName: Yeah, I've kinda gotten used to it, but maybe pack it in at times like this, yeah?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I've kinda gotten used to it, but maybe pack it
in at times like this, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、あたしは慣れっこだけど こんな状況だし少しは我慢なさい。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あたしは慣れっこだけど
こんな状況だし少しは我慢なさい。

engChrName: Once this is all over, I'd be happy to help you practice your lines as much as you need.
engSearchText:
Once this is all over, I'd be happy to help you practice
your lines as much as you need.
jpnChrName: この事態が無事解決したら 幾らでも稽古に付き合ってあげるから。
jpnSearchText:
この事態が無事解決したら
幾らでも稽古に付き合ってあげるから。

engChrName: Ah...! Haha, I think I'll take you up on that.
engSearchText: Ah...! Haha, I think I'll take you up on that.
jpnChrName: あ……… ──ふふっ、分かりました。
jpnSearchText:
あ………
──ふふっ、分かりました。

engChrName: I'm going to head back to the lobby. They need all the help they can get over there.
engSearchText:
I'm going to head back to the lobby. They need all
the help they can get over there.
jpnChrName: 私、ロビーに戻りますね。 手伝うことは幾らでもありますし。
jpnSearchText:
私、ロビーに戻りますね。
手伝うことは幾らでもありますし。

engChrName: Take care of yourself, everyone. Promise me, okay, Judith?
engSearchText:
Take care of yourself, everyone. Promise me,
okay, Judith?
jpnChrName: 先輩もどうか無理をせず── アークライドさんたちもお気を付けて。
jpnSearchText:
先輩もどうか無理をせず──
アークライドさんたちもお気を付けて。

engChrName: Roger that.
engSearchText: Roger that.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だぜ。

engChrName: Just be a good girl and wait for this to blow over, okay?
engSearchText:
Just be a good girl and wait for this to blow
over, okay?
jpnChrName: ちゃんと良い子にして 待ってなさいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと良い子にして
待ってなさいよ。

engChrName: Good work out there, Elaine. You, too, Fie. I don't even know how to begin thanking you.
engSearchText:
Good work out there, Elaine. You, too, Fie. I don't
even know how to begin thanking you.
jpnChrName: エレインさん、本当にお疲れ様でした。 それにフィーも何てお礼を言ったらいいか。
jpnSearchText:
エレインさん、本当にお疲れ様でした。
それにフィーも何てお礼を言ったらいいか。

engChrName: Actually, are you two okay coming along? I know you only just got done with all that.
engSearchText:
Actually, are you two okay coming along? I know you
only just got done with all that.
jpnChrName: って、打ち上げに出たばかりだそうですけど 付き合ってもらって良かったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
って、打ち上げに出たばかりだそうですけど
付き合ってもらって良かったんですか？

engChrName: Eh, that was mostly just talking. I'm good to go a little longer.
engSearchText:
Eh, that was mostly just talking. I'm good to go a
little longer.
jpnChrName: ま、お喋りがメインだったし、 もうちょっとくらいは行けるから大丈夫。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お喋りがメインだったし、
もうちょっとくらいは行けるから大丈夫。

engChrName: You really held your own, Regina. I'm impressed.
engSearchText: You really held your own, Regina. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: レジーナこそお疲れさま。
jpnSearchText: レジーナこそお疲れさま。

engChrName: I heard you helped keep Edith safe while I was away.
engSearchText: I heard you helped keep Edith safe while I was away.
jpnChrName: 私たちが首都を留守にしていた間も、 ちゃんとカバーしてくれたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
私たちが首都を留守にしていた間も、
ちゃんとカバーしてくれたみたいね。

engChrName: Even you-know-who had some good things to say.
engSearchText: Even you-know-who had some good things to say.
jpnChrName: “あの人”が誉めていたわよ？
jpnSearchText: “あの人”が誉めていたわよ？

engChrName: I-I'm sure he was just being nice. I really do depend on him too much...
engSearchText:
I-I'm sure he was just being nice. I really do depend
on him too much...
jpnChrName: そ、それは恐れ多いですよ…… 完全に頼り切りになっちゃいましたし。
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは恐れ多いですよ……
完全に頼り切りになっちゃいましたし。

engChrName: ...On the topic of you-know-who, was he helpful out at the old capital?
engSearchText:
...On the topic of you-know-who, was he helpful out
at the old capital?
jpnChrName: ………そういえばアルヴィスなんですけど、 古都でちゃんとお手伝いできていました？
jpnSearchText:
………そういえばアルヴィスなんですけど、
古都でちゃんとお手伝いできていました？

engChrName: He didn't do anything reckless out there, right? Like, get himself into trouble? Please tell me he didn't get in your way...
engSearchText:
He didn't do anything reckless out there, right?
Like, get himself into trouble? Please tell me he didn't
get in your way...
jpnChrName: 危ないことをしてエレインさんたちの 足を引っ張ったり、危険な目に遭ったりは……
jpnSearchText:
危ないことをしてエレインさんたちの
足を引っ張ったり、危険な目に遭ったりは……

engChrName: Heh. I wonder.
engSearchText: Heh. I wonder.
jpnChrName: へえ。
jpnSearchText: へえ。

engChrName: Is that...concern I hear?
engSearchText: Is that...concern I hear?
jpnChrName: あら。
jpnSearchText: あら。

engChrName: Wha—n-no! It's just, I don't want a coworker making us all look bad! I hope he's doing okay for HIS sake!
engSearchText:
Wha—n-no! It's just, I don't want a coworker
making us all look bad! I hope he's doing okay for
HIS sake!
jpnChrName: べ、別に他意はありませんからね？ 同期として気になってるくらいで……！
jpnSearchText:
べ、別に他意はありませんからね？
同期として気になってるくらいで……！

engChrName: I know he's been worried about looking good lately, since he's got that promotion lined up.
engSearchText:
I know he's been worried about looking good lately,
since he's got that promotion lined up.
jpnChrName: ただ、彼もＢ級に昇格する目前で 手応えも相当感じてるみたいですけど──
jpnSearchText:
ただ、彼もＢ級に昇格する目前で
手応えも相当感じてるみたいですけど──

engChrName: I'm just worried he's acting riskier because of it. Especially with what happened to Ewan.
engSearchText:
I'm just worried he's acting riskier because of it.
Especially with what happened to Ewan.
jpnChrName: そういう時こそ逆に危険じゃないですか。 ………ユアンさんのことを考えると尚更。
jpnSearchText:
そういう時こそ逆に危険じゃないですか。
………ユアンさんのことを考えると尚更。

engChrName: True. Bracer ranks are more than just skill—there's a fair bit of luck in the equation, too.
engSearchText:
True. Bracer ranks are more than just skill—there's a
fair bit of luck in the equation, too.
jpnChrName: ええ……実力があったとしても、 運次第というのは確かにあるわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……実力があったとしても、
運次第というのは確かにあるわね。

engChrName: But Alvis will be fine, rest assured.
engSearchText: But Alvis will be fine, rest assured.
jpnChrName: でも、アルヴィス君なら大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText: でも、アルヴィス君なら大丈夫よ。

engChrName: Yeah, he looked real shaken when he heard about that Ewan guy.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he looked real shaken when he heard about
that Ewan guy.
jpnChrName: ん、ユアンって人の話を聞いて かなりショックだったみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ん、ユアンって人の話を聞いて
かなりショックだったみたいだけど……

engChrName: But he turned right around and backed us up the whole way, along with Lahad and Xiaoling.
engSearchText:
But he turned right around and backed us up the
whole way, along with Lahad and Xiaoling.
jpnChrName: ラハドやシャオリンと一緒に万全に わたしたちをサポートしてくれたかな。
jpnSearchText:
ラハドやシャオリンと一緒に万全に
わたしたちをサポートしてくれたかな。

engChrName: Seemed like proof enough to me that he knows how to focus and prioritize.
engSearchText:
Seemed like proof enough to me that he knows how
to focus and prioritize.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと自分が見えてる証拠だと思う。
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと自分が見えてる証拠だと思う。

engChrName: I see... Well, good. He'd better be able to clear his head like that if he wants to get that B-rank.
engSearchText:
I see... Well, good. He'd better be able to clear his
head like that if he wants to get that B-rank.
jpnChrName: そっか……まあそのくらいは、 Ｂ級に上がるなら当然でしょうけど。
jpnSearchText:
そっか……まあそのくらいは、
Ｂ級に上がるなら当然でしょうけど。

engChrName: There it is. NOW she's speaking her mind.
engSearchText: There it is. NOW she's speaking her mind.
jpnChrName: はい出たツン発言。
jpnSearchText: はい出たツン発言。

engChrName: You know, you're not far off yourself. Why not join him on the job now and then?
engSearchText:
You know, you're not far off yourself. Why not join
him on the job now and then?
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴女もそろそろって話もあるし、 一緒に頑張ってみるといいんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、貴女もそろそろって話もあるし、
一緒に頑張ってみるといいんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: Well...maybe. I'll give it some thought.
engSearchText: Well...maybe. I'll give it some thought.
jpnChrName: その…………考えておきます。
jpnSearchText: その…………考えておきます。

engChrName: (Huh. Looks like Elaine and the other bracers are having an afterparty. I thought they all split up after they got back.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Looks like Elaine and the other bracers are
having an afterparty. I thought they all split up
after they got back.)
jpnChrName: （エレインたちは同僚で二次会か……   支部に戻った後で解散したそうだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（エレインたちは同僚で二次会か……
支部に戻った後で解散したそうだが。）

engChrName: (Huh. Looks like Elaine and the other bracers are having an afterparty. I thought they all split up after they got back.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Looks like Elaine and the other bracers are
having an afterparty. I thought they all split up
after they got back.)
jpnChrName: （エレインたちは同僚で二次会か……   支部に戻った後で解散でもしたのか？）
jpnSearchText:
（エレインたちは同僚で二次会か……
支部に戻った後で解散でもしたのか？）

engChrName: (Not a group I want to stick my nose in, but they might take it the wrong way if I pretend I don't see 'em.)
engSearchText:
(Not a group I want to stick my nose in, but they
might take it the wrong way if I pretend I don't
see 'em.)
jpnChrName: （触らぬ神にっぽいが……スルーしたら   それはそれで嫌味を言われそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（触らぬ神にっぽいが……スルーしたら
それはそれで嫌味を言われそうだな。）

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: (Heard some b-ball team from Seiden's been makin' waves lately. This guy looks like the team captain.)
engSearchText:
(Heard some b-ball team from Seiden's been makin'
waves lately. This guy looks like the team captain.)
jpnChrName: （サイデン地区のバスケチームのリーダー…… 　やっぱりこいつで間違いなさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（サイデン地区のバスケチームのリーダー……
　やっぱりこいつで間違いなさそうだな。）

engChrName: Hey there. Got time for a quick question?
engSearchText: Hey there. Got time for a quick question?
jpnChrName: 実はお前さんに、ちょいと聞きたい事があるんだが。
jpnSearchText: 実はお前さんに、ちょいと聞きたい事があるんだが。

engChrName: Yeah? What's up?
engSearchText: Yeah? What's up?
jpnChrName: ああ、なんだ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、なんだ？

engChrName: We're from Arkride Solutions, and we're workin' on an investigation right now.
engSearchText:
We're from Arkride Solutions, and we're workin' on
an investigation right now.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンでな。 依頼を受けて調査をしてる所なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンでな。
依頼を受けて調査をしてる所なんだが。

engChrName: You know anything about a guy named Mark who hangs around with Desire?
engSearchText:
You know anything about a guy named Mark who
hangs around with Desire?
jpnChrName: アンタ──《ディザイア》に所属してた マルクってヤツの事を知ってるよな？
jpnSearchText:
アンタ──《ディザイア》に所属してた
マルクってヤツの事を知ってるよな？

engChrName: Mark, huh...? Yeah, I know him. You lookin' into him?
engSearchText:
Mark, huh...? Yeah, I know him. You lookin'
into him?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ…… マルクについて調査してるっていうのか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ……
マルクについて調査してるっていうのか。

engChrName: Yes, we received a request from his girlfriend.
engSearchText: Yes, we received a request from his girlfriend.
jpnChrName: はい、マルクさんの彼女の方から 依頼を受けたんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、マルクさんの彼女の方から
依頼を受けたんです。

engChrName: She hasn't heard from him in over a month, so she'd like us to find him.
engSearchText:
She hasn't heard from him in over a month, so she'd
like us to find him.
jpnChrName: 一か月音信不通になっている マルクさんについて調べて欲しいと。
jpnSearchText:
一か月音信不通になっている
マルクさんについて調べて欲しいと。

engChrName: Yeah, we got a request from Mark's girlfriend.
engSearchText: Yeah, we got a request from Mark's girlfriend.
jpnChrName: はい、マルクさんの彼女さんから 依頼を受けたんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、マルクさんの彼女さんから
依頼を受けたんです。

engChrName: She said she wanted us to find him, since she hasn't heard from him for over a month.
engSearchText:
She said she wanted us to find him, since she hasn't
heard from him for over a month.
jpnChrName: 一か月音信不通になっている マルクさんについて調べて欲しいって。
jpnSearchText:
一か月音信不通になっている
マルクさんについて調べて欲しいって。

engChrName: Yeah, Mark's girl wants us to drag his ass back.
engSearchText: Yeah, Mark's girl wants us to drag his ass back.
jpnChrName: ああ、マルクの彼女から依頼を受けたんだよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、マルクの彼女から依頼を受けたんだよ。

engChrName: Hasn't heard from him for over a month.
engSearchText: Hasn't heard from him for over a month.
jpnChrName: 一か月音信不通になってる マルクについて調べて欲しいってな。
jpnSearchText:
一か月音信不通になってる
マルクについて調べて欲しいってな。

engChrName: What I understand, you've been buds with him since you were kids.
engSearchText:
What I understand, you've been buds with him since
you were kids.
jpnChrName: アンタとマルクが 幼馴染だって事も調べがついてる。
jpnSearchText:
アンタとマルクが
幼馴染だって事も調べがついてる。

engChrName: You got any idea what he's been up to lately?
engSearchText: You got any idea what he's been up to lately?
jpnChrName: ここ最近のマルクについて、 何か知ってる事はねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近のマルクについて、
何か知ってる事はねえか？

engChrName: Huh. So she ain't heard from him, either?
engSearchText: Huh. So she ain't heard from him, either?
jpnChrName: そうか……やっぱり 彼女の所にも連絡は来てないんだな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……やっぱり
彼女の所にも連絡は来てないんだな。

engChrName: I'd kinda been expecting bad news but...man, he really went and screwed himself over, didn't he?
engSearchText:
I'd kinda been expecting bad news but...man, he
really went and screwed himself over, didn't he?
jpnChrName: 覚悟はしてたが…… 本当に馬鹿だよアイツは……
jpnSearchText:
覚悟はしてたが……
本当に馬鹿だよアイツは……

engChrName: Sounds like you know somethin' about what he's gotten himself into. Care to elaborate?
engSearchText:
Sounds like you know somethin' about what he's
gotten himself into. Care to elaborate?
jpnChrName: ……その様子だと、 色々と事情を知ってるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
……その様子だと、
色々と事情を知ってるみてえだな。

engChrName: Well, if his girl... If Amy sent you, then I guess it wouldn't hurt to tell you.
engSearchText:
Well, if his girl... If Amy sent you, then I guess it
wouldn't hurt to tell you.
jpnChrName: マルクの彼女……確かエイミーって言ったか？ 彼女からの依頼ってんなら全部話してやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
マルクの彼女……確かエイミーって言ったか？
彼女からの依頼ってんなら全部話してやるよ。

engChrName: I figure you guys know what's best for him. Right?
engSearchText: I figure you guys know what's best for him. Right?
jpnChrName: 何より、アンタ達なら俺よりも ちゃんと正しい判断が出来そうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
何より、アンタ達なら俺よりも
ちゃんと正しい判断が出来そうだからな。

engChrName: So, a month ago I got this letter from him, and it's weird because he never does that. Ever.
engSearchText:
So, a month ago I got this letter from him, and it's
weird because he never does that. Ever.
jpnChrName: 一か月ほど前の事だったかな…… アイツから珍しく手紙が送られて来たんだ。
jpnSearchText:
一か月ほど前の事だったかな……
アイツから珍しく手紙が送られて来たんだ。

engChrName: Said they gave him a job to sneak into some jaeger camp outside of Baume City. Why? Dunno.
engSearchText:
Said they gave him a job to sneak into some jaeger
camp outside of Baume City. Why? Dunno.
jpnChrName: ある目的でボーメ市の郊外に張られた、 猟兵団の陣地に乗り込む仕事を受けたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ある目的でボーメ市の郊外に張られた、
猟兵団の陣地に乗り込む仕事を受けたらしい。

engChrName: He told me it was some kinda trial. They were gonna have him go out there by himself and scout the enemy, or somethin'.
engSearchText:
He told me it was some kinda trial. They were gonna
have him go out there by himself and scout the
enemy, or somethin'.
jpnChrName: 一人で潜入して、敵陣の勢力を把握する…… そんな無謀な仕事内容だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
一人で潜入して、敵陣の勢力を把握する……
そんな無謀な仕事内容だったみたいだな。

engChrName: (Oh, no...)
engSearchText: (Oh, no...)

engChrName: I was afraid that was it...
engSearchText: I was afraid that was it...
jpnChrName: もしかして、とは思ってましたけど……
jpnSearchText: もしかして、とは思ってましたけど……

engChrName: (Called it.)
engSearchText: (Called it.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱりか…………）
jpnSearchText: （やっぱりか…………）

engChrName: He sent me that message the night before he was supposed to go.
engSearchText:
He sent me that message the night before he was
supposed to go.
jpnChrName: 手紙を書いたのは、その陣地に 乗り込む前日の夜だったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
手紙を書いたのは、その陣地に
乗り込む前日の夜だったらしい。

engChrName: He... You could tell he was shakin' when he wrote it. He said, 'I dunno if I'm coming back from this one, man.'
engSearchText:
He... You could tell he was shakin' when he wrote it.
He said, 'I dunno if I'm coming back from this
one, man.'
jpnChrName: 『はっきり言って、生きて帰れるか分からない』 ──震える字でそんな風に書いてあったよ。
jpnSearchText:
『はっきり言って、生きて帰れるか分からない』
──震える字でそんな風に書いてあったよ。

engChrName: Wrote about Amy, too...
engSearchText: Wrote about Amy, too...
jpnChrName: それと、エイミーさんの事についても書いてあった。
jpnSearchText: それと、エイミーさんの事についても書いてあった。
