engSearchText: Mind givin' me their number?
jpnChrName: よければ教えて貰えないか。
jpnSearchText: よければ教えて貰えないか。

engChrName: Oh, yes, of course.
engSearchText: Oh, yes, of course.
jpnChrName: ええ……構わないわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ……構わないわ。

engChrName: Van plugged in the contact info Carol gave him and immediately dialed it up.
engSearchText:
Van plugged in the contact info Carol gave him and
immediately dialed it up.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはさっそく キャロルから聞いた連絡先に通信し──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはさっそく
キャロルから聞いた連絡先に通信し──

engChrName: He got through to Jess' manager, who agreed to meet him at the terrace in front of the station.
engSearchText:
He got through to Jess' manager, who agreed to meet
him at the terrace in front of the station.
jpnChrName: ジェスのマネージャーと 駅前のテラス席で会う約束を取り付けた。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスのマネージャーと
駅前のテラス席で会う約束を取り付けた。

engChrName: Got'cha. Let's get on over there.
engSearchText: Got'cha. Let's get on over there.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、さっそく向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ、さっそく向かいましょうか。

engChrName: All right, let's get over there.
engSearchText: All right, let's get over there.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、さっそく向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ、さっそく向かうとするか。

engChrName: The terrace by the station, right? Let's go.
engSearchText: The terrace by the station, right? Let's go.
jpnChrName: はい、駅前のテラス席ですね。
jpnSearchText: はい、駅前のテラス席ですね。

engChrName: Roger. I know where that is!
engSearchText: Roger. I know where that is!
jpnChrName: 了解です、駅前のテラス席ですね。
jpnSearchText: 了解です、駅前のテラス席ですね。

engChrName: Easy enough. Let's get a move on.
engSearchText: Easy enough. Let's get a move on.
jpnChrName: ああ、駅前のテラス席だな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、駅前のテラス席だな。

engChrName: Right. Our destination is the station terrace.
engSearchText: Right. Our destination is the station terrace.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました、 駅前のテラス席ですね。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました、
駅前のテラス席ですね。

engChrName: All right. That sounds simple enough.
engSearchText: All right. That sounds simple enough.
jpnChrName: うん、駅前のテラス席だね。
jpnSearchText: うん、駅前のテラス席だね。

engChrName: Got it. Let's get going to that terrace.
engSearchText: Got it. Let's get going to that terrace.
jpnChrName: 了解よ、駅前のテラス席ね。
jpnSearchText: 了解よ、駅前のテラス席ね。

engChrName: That sounds good. To the terrace, yes?
engSearchText: That sounds good. To the terrace, yes?
jpnChrName: うむ、駅前のテラス席だな。
jpnSearchText: うむ、駅前のテラス席だな。

engChrName: We're here. This is the Seiden District.
engSearchText: We're here. This is the Seiden District.
jpnChrName: 着いたっ…… ここがサイデン地区だよ。
jpnSearchText:
着いたっ……
ここがサイデン地区だよ。

engChrName: (I got a little lost and took the long way around, though.)
engSearchText:
(I got a little lost and took the long way
around, though.)
jpnChrName: （途中ちょっと道を間違えて   遠回りになっちゃったけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（途中ちょっと道を間違えて
遠回りになっちゃったけど。）

engChrName: *sniff* Whoa, what is THAT? It smells delicious!
engSearchText: *sniff* Whoa, what is THAT? It smells delicious!
jpnChrName: くんくん……わあっ、なんだか 美味しそうな匂いがするよ……！
jpnSearchText:
くんくん……わあっ、なんだか
美味しそうな匂いがするよ……！

engChrName: Ah! Hey! Stop running off!
engSearchText: Ah! Hey! Stop running off!
jpnChrName: あっ、こらっ……！ すぐあちこち行くんだから……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、こらっ……！
すぐあちこち行くんだから……！

engChrName: Wait, that's not the way to the police station!
engSearchText: Wait, that's not the way to the police station!
jpnChrName: 待って、警察署はそっちじゃ……！
jpnSearchText: 待って、警察署はそっちじゃ……！

engChrName: Hmm? Where are you going at this hour, young lady?
engSearchText: Hmm? Where are you going at this hour, young lady?
jpnChrName: ん～？ こんな時間にどうした、お嬢ちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
ん～？
こんな時間にどうした、お嬢ちゃん。

engChrName: It's a little late for children to be running around alone.
engSearchText:
It's a little late for children to be running
around alone.
jpnChrName: 子供がこんな時間に フラフラしちゃいかんぞぉ～。
jpnSearchText:
子供がこんな時間に
フラフラしちゃいかんぞぉ～。

engChrName: Eep!
engSearchText: Eep!
jpnChrName: ひいっ……
jpnSearchText: ひいっ……

engChrName: Hey!
engSearchText: Hey!
jpnChrName: うおっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うおっ……！？

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about us!
engSearchText: Oh, don't worry about us!
jpnChrName: 心配には及びません。
jpnSearchText: 心配には及びません。

engChrName: I'm just taking these lost kids to the police station.
engSearchText: I'm just taking these lost kids to the police station.
jpnChrName: わたしが迷子になった二人を 警察に送り届けている所ですのでっ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしが迷子になった二人を
警察に送り届けている所ですのでっ。

engChrName: ...Huh. All right, then. Just don't get lost, okay? I'm heading on home myself.
engSearchText:
...Huh. All right, then. Just don't get lost, okay?
I'm heading on home myself.
jpnChrName: そ、そうかい……オジサンも帰るから、 あんまり遅くならないようになぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうかい……オジサンも帰るから、
あんまり遅くならないようになぁ～。

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: ほえ～……
jpnSearchText: ほえ～……

engChrName: Hey, you're too fast!
engSearchText: Hey, you're too fast!
jpnChrName: お、お姉ちゃん速い……！
jpnSearchText: お、お姉ちゃん速い……！

engChrName: I'm just glad he didn't cause any trouble.
engSearchText: I'm just glad he didn't cause any trouble.
jpnChrName: 悪い人じゃなさそうでよかったね。
jpnSearchText: 悪い人じゃなさそうでよかったね。

engChrName: This street goes to the police station, so just stick with me, okay?
engSearchText:
This street goes to the police station, so just stick with
me, okay?
jpnChrName: この道も警察署に繋がってるから このまま一緒にいこうかっ。
jpnSearchText:
この道も警察署に繋がってるから
このまま一緒にいこうかっ。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: うんっ……！
jpnSearchText: うんっ……！

engChrName: Yeesh. Had me sweatin' for a sec.
engSearchText: Yeesh. Had me sweatin' for a sec.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 微妙に肝が冷えるっつの。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
微妙に肝が冷えるっつの。

engChrName: Wait, what are they doin'? That's the wrong way.
engSearchText: Wait, what are they doin'? That's the wrong way.
jpnChrName: だがこの道は……
jpnSearchText: だがこの道は……

engChrName: Huh? What're kids doing out here this late?
engSearchText: Huh? What're kids doing out here this late?
jpnChrName: あれぇ？ 子供がこんな時間に何してんだ？
jpnSearchText:
あれぇ？
子供がこんな時間に何してんだ？

engChrName: We were just getting the party started. You brats trying to spoil our fun?
engSearchText:
We were just getting the party started. You brats
trying to spoil our fun?
jpnChrName: 折角夜の集会やってるってのに、 ガキがこんなところに来たら白けるだろぉ～？
jpnSearchText:
折角夜の集会やってるってのに、
ガキがこんなところに来たら白けるだろぉ～？

engChrName: Mmm... I'm scared...
engSearchText: Mmm... I'm scared...
jpnChrName: うう……こわいよう……
jpnSearchText: うう……こわいよう……

engChrName: H-Help me...!
engSearchText: H-Help me...!
jpnChrName: お、お姉ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: お、お姉ちゃん……

engChrName: (This is just a mess tonight...)
engSearchText: (This is just a mess tonight...)
jpnChrName: （ふう、今夜は色々起きるなあ。）
jpnSearchText: （ふう、今夜は色々起きるなあ。）

engChrName: Look, we're not up to anything.
engSearchText: Look, we're not up to anything.
jpnChrName: ──わたし達は 別に遊びに来た訳じゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
──わたし達は
別に遊びに来た訳じゃありません。

engChrName: We're just passing by, so could you please let us through?
engSearchText:
We're just passing by, so could you please let
us through?
jpnChrName: このまま立ち去るので、 道を開けてもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
このまま立ち去るので、
道を開けてもらえませんか？

engChrName: What wuzzat? Don't you get uppity with us, brat.
engSearchText: What wuzzat? Don't you get uppity with us, brat.
jpnChrName: はぁ……？　なんか生意気だなぁ～？
jpnSearchText: はぁ……？　なんか生意気だなぁ～？

engChrName: You want through, huh? Well, sorry, kid. You gotta pay the toll, see?
engSearchText:
You want through, huh? Well, sorry, kid. You gotta
pay the toll, see?
jpnChrName: ここを通りたいならそうだなぁ、 通行料でも払ってもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
ここを通りたいならそうだなぁ、
通行料でも払ってもらおうか？

engChrName: Us poor boys gotta eat. Inflation really hit us hard, y'know?
engSearchText:
Us poor boys gotta eat. Inflation really hit us
hard, y'know?
jpnChrName: ボクちゃんたち金欠でさ～。 飲み代が欲しいのよ、飲み代が。
jpnSearchText:
ボクちゃんたち金欠でさ～。
飲み代が欲しいのよ、飲み代が。

engChrName: Huh? Why should I pay you mira?
engSearchText: Huh? Why should I pay you mira?
jpnChrName: ？　なんで貴方たちに ミラを払う必要があるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
？　なんで貴方たちに
ミラを払う必要があるんですか？

engChrName: Do you not have jobs? There are plenty of places you could work to get some money.
engSearchText:
Do you not have jobs? There are plenty of places you
could work to get some money.
jpnChrName: あちこちでアルバイトを募集してますし 金欠なら労働すればいいような……
jpnSearchText:
あちこちでアルバイトを募集してますし
金欠なら労働すればいいような……

engChrName: Say that again? Little punk-ass bitch, you wanna go?!
engSearchText: Say that again? Little punk-ass bitch, you wanna go?!
jpnChrName: あ、ああん？ 煽ってんじゃねえぞこのガキ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああん？
煽ってんじゃねえぞこのガキ！

engChrName: Spoiled rotten. Never got taught to respect her elders.
engSearchText: Spoiled rotten. Never got taught to respect her elders.
jpnChrName: 余裕こきやがって…… 大人に対して礼儀がなってねえよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
余裕こきやがって……
大人に対して礼儀がなってねえよなぁ。

engChrName: Well, let's give her a li'l lesson, then! She'll pay in teeth!
engSearchText:
Well, let's give her a li'l lesson, then! She'll pay
in teeth!
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、俺達が特別に 社会勉強させてやってもいいんだぜぇ？
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえ、俺達が特別に
社会勉強させてやってもいいんだぜぇ？

engChrName: Eep!
engSearchText: Eep!
jpnChrName: ひっ……
jpnSearchText: ひっ……

engChrName: Oh, no!
engSearchText: Oh, no!
jpnChrName: お、お姉ちゃ──
jpnSearchText: お、お姉ちゃ──

engChrName: YEOWCH?!
engSearchText: YEOWCH?!
jpnChrName: あだあっ！？
jpnSearchText: あだあっ！？

engChrName: A... A coin?!
engSearchText: A... A coin?!
jpnChrName: コ、コイン……！？
jpnSearchText: コ、コイン……！？

engChrName: OW, OW, OW! What the shit?!
engSearchText: OW, OW, OW! What the shit?!
jpnChrName: うお──いででででっ！！
jpnSearchText: うお──いででででっ！！

engChrName: How can a little girl hit that hard...?!
engSearchText: How can a little girl hit that hard...?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだ今の動き……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだ今の動き……！？

engChrName: Do you still wanna fight?
engSearchText: Do you still wanna fight?
jpnChrName: ──それで、まだやりますか？
jpnSearchText: ──それで、まだやりますか？

engChrName: Or do you just wanna come with me to the police station?
engSearchText:
Or do you just wanna come with me to the
police station?
jpnChrName: 警察署に一緒に来てもらうのも アリかもしれませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
警察署に一緒に来てもらうのも
アリかもしれませんけど。

engChrName: N-No, ma'am! We're good!
engSearchText: N-No, ma'am! We're good!
jpnChrName: や、やりませんっ……！
jpnSearchText: や、やりませんっ……！

engChrName: We, uh... We'll start workin' tomorrow! Yeah! Workin' real hard!
engSearchText:
We, uh... We'll start workin' tomorrow! Yeah!
Workin' real hard!
jpnChrName: 明日からマジメに働きまぁす！！
jpnSearchText: 明日からマジメに働きまぁす！！

engChrName: Are you okay?
engSearchText: Are you okay?
jpnChrName: 怪我はなかった？
jpnSearchText: 怪我はなかった？

engChrName: Holy COW! You beat them up in a flash!
engSearchText: Holy COW! You beat them up in a flash!
jpnChrName: す……すごい！ あんな怖い人達を一瞬で！
jpnSearchText:
す……すごい！
あんな怖い人達を一瞬で！

engChrName: You're so cool! I wanna be strong like that when I grow up!
engSearchText:
You're so cool! I wanna be strong like that when I
grow up!
jpnChrName: かっこいい～！　わたしも お姉ちゃんみたいになりたいっ！
jpnSearchText:
かっこいい～！　わたしも
お姉ちゃんみたいになりたいっ！

engChrName: Oh, that was nothing, heehee. I had some help there, too.
engSearchText:
Oh, that was nothing, heehee. I had some help
there, too.
jpnChrName: えへへ、そんな大した事じゃ…… 助けてもらっちゃいましたし。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、そんな大した事じゃ……
助けてもらっちゃいましたし。

engChrName: Oh, I was just makin' sure you didn't kill 'em, heh.
engSearchText: Oh, I was just makin' sure you didn't kill 'em, heh.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あのくらい一人でも なんとかできただろうけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あのくらい一人でも
なんとかできただろうけどな。

engChrName: The precinct's just over there. Don't want to keep your parents waiting, right?
engSearchText:
The precinct's just over there. Don't want to keep
your parents waiting, right?
jpnChrName: 警察署はすぐそこだ。 両親が待ってるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
警察署はすぐそこだ。
両親が待ってるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: They arrived at the station to find the parents waiting for them. They scooped up the kids with open arms, relief washing across their faces.
engSearchText:
They arrived at the station to find the parents waiting
for them. They scooped up the kids with open arms,
relief washing across their faces.
jpnChrName: その後、警察署に向かうと “丁度”子供たちの両親が待っており……
jpnSearchText:
その後、警察署に向かうと
“丁度”子供たちの両親が待っており……

engChrName: Feri and Van were showered in thank-yous before they made their way out.
engSearchText:
Feri and Van were showered in thank-yous before
they made their way out.
jpnChrName: フェリは何度も礼を言われつつ、 ヴァンと共にその場を後にした。
jpnSearchText:
フェリは何度も礼を言われつつ、
ヴァンと共にその場を後にした。

engChrName: Thanks for that, Van.
engSearchText: Thanks for that, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、ありがとうございました。

engChrName: You told the parents to come to the station, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You told the parents to come to the station,
didn't you?
jpnChrName: あのご両親が警察署に来るように 手配してくれたのはヴァンさんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
あのご両親が警察署に来るように
手配してくれたのはヴァンさんですよね？

engChrName: Huh? Dunno what you're talkin' about there, sorry. Heh.
engSearchText:
Huh? Dunno what you're talkin' about there, sorry.
Heh.
jpnChrName: さあて、何の事だか分からないな。
jpnSearchText: さあて、何の事だか分からないな。

engChrName: How 'bout you, though? Never pegged you as the type to take initiative like that.
engSearchText:
How 'bout you, though? Never pegged you as the
type to take initiative like that.
jpnChrName: しかしお前もお節介だねえ。 迷子の兄妹をわざわざ警察に連れてくなんざ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしお前もお節介だねえ。
迷子の兄妹をわざわざ警察に連れてくなんざ。

engChrName: You could've just left it to the adults, but nope. You really took the reins there.
engSearchText:
You could've just left it to the adults, but nope.
You really took the reins there.
jpnChrName: その辺の大人にでも任せときゃいいのによ。
jpnSearchText: その辺の大人にでも任せときゃいいのによ。

engChrName: Heehee. They kinda reminded me of my own siblings, so I just couldn't leave them alone.
engSearchText:
Heehee. They kinda reminded me of my own
siblings, so I just couldn't leave them alone.
jpnChrName: あはは、妹弟たちを思い出して 放っておけなくなりまして。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、妹弟たちを思い出して
放っておけなくなりまして。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I remember you sayin' something about that. You got a brother and sister, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I remember you sayin' something
about that. You got a brother and sister, right?
jpnChrName: そういや……いつだったか、 妹と弟がいるって言ってたな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや……いつだったか、
妹と弟がいるって言ってたな。

engChrName: You did kinda give off big sis vibes, the way you were helpin' 'em.
engSearchText:
You did kinda give off big sis vibes, the way you were
helpin' 'em.
jpnChrName: たしかにさっきまでのお前さんは “姉”って感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
たしかにさっきまでのお前さんは
“姉”って感じだったな。

engChrName: H-Hey, that's embarrassing, heehee.
engSearchText: H-Hey, that's embarrassing, heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……そうでしょうか。 なんだか照れますけど。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……そうでしょうか。
なんだか照れますけど。

engChrName: I AM a big sister, though. My little sister's ten, and my little brother's eight.
engSearchText:
I AM a big sister, though. My little sister's ten, and
my little brother's eight.
jpnChrName: 妹は１０歳、弟は８歳でして。 丁度あの子たちと同じくらいになるんです。
jpnSearchText:
妹は１０歳、弟は８歳でして。
丁度あの子たちと同じくらいになるんです。

engChrName: Whew. Your mom and pop got busy. Must be hectic growin' up in a tribe like that.
engSearchText:
Whew. Your mom and pop got busy. Must be hectic
growin' up in a tribe like that.
jpnChrName: へぇ……戦士団の中でとなると さぞ忙しそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……戦士団の中でとなると
さぞ忙しそうだな。

engChrName: Yeah. Being one of the older children, I would help Umi around the house, and I'd look after the other kids, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Being one of the older children, I would help
Umi around the house, and I'd look after the other
kids, too.
jpnChrName: はい、なのでお母さん（アマ）とわたしで協力して 家事をやったり、面倒を見たりしてましたね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、なのでお母さん（アマ）とわたしで協力して
家事をやったり、面倒を見たりしてましたね。

engChrName: They'd sneak in combat training whenever I got the time. And sometimes, I would sneak a peek at tribal meetings!
engSearchText:
They'd sneak in combat training whenever I got
the time. And sometimes, I would sneak a peek at
tribal meetings!
jpnChrName: 合間をぬって戦闘訓練をしたり、 戦士団の会議を覗きに行ったりして……
jpnSearchText:
合間をぬって戦闘訓練をしたり、
戦士団の会議を覗きに行ったりして……

engChrName: It was pretty crazy, looking back on it. I didn't get much time to rest because I was always training and helping out.
engSearchText:
It was pretty crazy, looking back on it. I didn't get
much time to rest because I was always training and
helping out.
jpnChrName: 家を守りながら、父や兄のような一人前の戦士に なるために休んでる暇なんてありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
家を守りながら、父や兄のような一人前の戦士に
なるために休んでる暇なんてありませんでした。

engChrName: N-Not to say this job is easy! I'm not slacking, I promise! I'm giving this job my all, just like my training!
engSearchText:
N-Not to say this job is easy! I'm not slacking,
I promise! I'm giving this job my all, just like
my training!
jpnChrName: ある意味、今の生活よりも──あ、バイトとして 手を抜いてる訳じゃありませんからっ。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味、今の生活よりも──あ、バイトとして
手を抜いてる訳じゃありませんからっ。

engChrName: Heh heh. Hey, don't worry about it. I know you are.
engSearchText: Heh heh. Hey, don't worry about it. I know you are.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言われなくても分かってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言われなくても分かってるっつの。

engChrName: How'd the little ones take it when you left? They cry when ol' reliable had to leave the nest?
engSearchText:
How'd the little ones take it when you left? They cry
when ol' reliable had to leave the nest?
jpnChrName: しかし、それだけ出来た姉だったら 里を離れる時には泣きつかれたんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、それだけ出来た姉だったら
里を離れる時には泣きつかれたんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Well, uh... Yeah, haha.
engSearchText: Well, uh... Yeah, haha.
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですね……
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうですね……

engChrName: My older brother left a few years ago himself. He only comes back to visit once a year.
engSearchText:
My older brother left a few years ago himself.
He only comes back to visit once a year.
jpnChrName: ……何年か前に、歳の離れた兄も 里を出て独立していまして。
jpnSearchText:
……何年か前に、歳の離れた兄も
里を出て独立していまして。

engChrName: He's all by himself out there now.
engSearchText: He's all by himself out there now.
jpnChrName: 年に一度くらいしか帰って来ませんから。
jpnSearchText: 年に一度くらいしか帰って来ませんから。

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: I wanna grow up to be like him...so I feel like that's something I gotta do, too.
engSearchText:
I wanna grow up to be like him...so I feel like that's
something I gotta do, too.
jpnChrName: 兄と同じで、 これはわたしにとって“必要な事”だから……
jpnSearchText:
兄と同じで、
これはわたしにとって“必要な事”だから……

engChrName: That's what I told my younger siblings when I left.
engSearchText: That's what I told my younger siblings when I left.
jpnChrName: ……そう言って 下の子たちを納得させましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
……そう言って
下の子たちを納得させましたけど。

engChrName: But honestly, I still don't know why we need to do this—or why my brother needed to, anyway.
engSearchText:
But honestly, I still don't know why we need to do
this—or why my brother needed to, anyway.
jpnChrName: 兄がどうして里を出てしまったのか…… わたしも少し納得いってなかったりするんです。
jpnSearchText:
兄がどうして里を出てしまったのか……
わたしも少し納得いってなかったりするんです。

engChrName: He could've lent that strength to the tribe and helped us all grow back home.
engSearchText:
He could've lent that strength to the tribe and helped
us all grow back home.
jpnChrName: 兄のように腕の立つ戦士こそが、 戦士団で活躍するべきなのに……
jpnSearchText:
兄のように腕の立つ戦士こそが、
戦士団で活躍するべきなのに……

engChrName: So you never heard why he left?
engSearchText: So you never heard why he left?
jpnChrName: ……どうして里を出たのか、 具体的な話は聞いてねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
……どうして里を出たのか、
具体的な話は聞いてねえのか？

engChrName: No, but I think Abi knows. He gave him permission to leave.
engSearchText:
No, but I think Abi knows. He gave him permission
to leave.
jpnChrName: はい……でも、兄に許しを出したお父さん（アブ）は どこか事情を知ってるみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
はい……でも、兄に許しを出したお父さん（アブ）は
どこか事情を知ってるみたいで。

engChrName: I just wish he would tell me...
engSearchText: I just wish he would tell me...
jpnChrName: わたしにも教えてくれたっていいのに……
jpnSearchText: わたしにも教えてくれたっていいのに……

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...

engChrName: Well...maybe he has his reasons. And maybe when I'm all grown up, he can tell me. Heehee.
engSearchText:
Well...maybe he has his reasons. And maybe when
I'm all grown up, he can tell me. Heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ……なんて、いじけたって 仕方ない事は分かってるんですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……なんて、いじけたって
仕方ない事は分かってるんですけどね。

engChrName: I've got a long way to go before I can call myself a warrior, anyway.
engSearchText:
I've got a long way to go before I can call myself a
warrior, anyway.
jpnChrName: それに、わたしは戦士として まだ“半人前”にすら至っていませんから。
jpnSearchText:
それに、わたしは戦士として
まだ“半人前”にすら至っていませんから。

engChrName: So that's my goal: I'm gonna grow strong enough for Abi and my brother to accept me as a real warrior!
engSearchText:
So that's my goal: I'm gonna grow strong enough for
Abi and my brother to accept me as a real warrior!
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）に──それに兄に認めてもらえるくらい まずは成長しないとですよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）に──それに兄に認めてもらえるくらい
まずは成長しないとですよねっ！

engChrName: That's the spirit!
engSearchText: That's the spirit!
jpnChrName: ああ、その意気だろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その意気だろ。

engChrName: (Heh. She's more responsible than I gave her credit for. Felt like I'd have to babysit her at the start, but nope.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. She's more responsible than I gave her
credit for. Felt like I'd have to babysit her at the start,
but nope.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、出会いたての頃はもっと   見てて危なっかしかったモンだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、出会いたての頃はもっと
見てて危なっかしかったモンだが……）

engChrName: Huh? Something wrong, Van?
engSearchText: Huh? Something wrong, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Oh. Nah, it's nothin'.
engSearchText: Oh. Nah, it's nothin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、なんでもねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、なんでもねえよ。

engChrName: Anyway, I got these meat buns from the Eastern restaurant over by Tyrell. Want some?
engSearchText:
Anyway, I got these meat buns from the Eastern
restaurant over by Tyrell. Want some?
jpnChrName: それよりさっき、タイレルの東方料理屋で 肉まんをテイクアウトしてきたんだが、食うか？
jpnSearchText:
それよりさっき、タイレルの東方料理屋で
肉まんをテイクアウトしてきたんだが、食うか？

engChrName: What? How'd you know I was so hungry?! I'd love some!
engSearchText:
What? How'd you know I was so hungry?! I'd
love some!
jpnChrName: ！　いただきますっ！ なんだかお腹がすいちゃいましたし！
jpnSearchText:
！　いただきますっ！
なんだかお腹がすいちゃいましたし！

engChrName: Those meat buns didn't last long. Van and Feri quickly resumed their patrol, bellies appeased.
engSearchText:
Those meat buns didn't last long. Van and Feri
quickly resumed their patrol, bellies appeased.
jpnChrName: その後、二人で肉まんを食べてから 夜の巡回を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、二人で肉まんを食べてから
夜の巡回を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Van quickly dealt with the paperwork Risette had provided.
engSearchText:
Van quickly dealt with the paperwork Risette
had provided.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはリゼットが整理していた書類に 滞りなく記入を済ませ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはリゼットが整理していた書類に
滞りなく記入を済ませ……

engChrName: He packed it up and made for the Seiden District police station.
engSearchText:
He packed it up and made for the Seiden District
police station.
jpnChrName: 提出先であるサイデン地区の 警察署へと向かった。
jpnSearchText:
提出先であるサイデン地区の
警察署へと向かった。

engChrName: Man, I can't believe I spaced on this. I completely forgot today was the cutoff.
engSearchText:
Man, I can't believe I spaced on this. I completely
forgot today was the cutoff.
jpnChrName: いやぁうっかりしてたぜ。 まさか提出期限が今日だったとはな。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁうっかりしてたぜ。
まさか提出期限が今日だったとはな。

engChrName: Right, this whole 'customization form' thing... They just rolled that out, if I recall?
engSearchText:
Right, this whole 'customization form' thing...
They just rolled that out, if I recall?
jpnChrName: 車の『構造変更申請』── 近年できた制度だったか。
jpnSearchText:
車の『構造変更申請』──
近年できた制度だったか。

engChrName: Correct. The government is inspecting customized automobiles to ensure they're not hazardous to public safety.
engSearchText:
Correct. The government is inspecting customized
automobiles to ensure they're not hazardous to
public safety.
jpnChrName: ええ、カスタムした車が安全基準に則っているか、 審査を行う為の申請ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、カスタムした車が安全基準に則っているか、
審査を行う為の申請ですね。

engChrName: Failing to submit this form will void your tax exemption and other credits. Your car will effectively be illegal.
engSearchText:
Failing to submit this form will void your tax
exemption and other credits. Your car will effectively
be illegal.
jpnChrName: 提出期限を過ぎた場合は違法改造扱いとして、 導力車に関しての免税等が解除されます。
jpnSearchText:
提出期限を過ぎた場合は違法改造扱いとして、
導力車に関しての免税等が解除されます。

engChrName: Smaller customizations can use a separate form from this one.
engSearchText:
Smaller customizations can use a separate form from
this one.
jpnChrName: 簡単なカスタムであれば、 簡略化した申請で済むそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
簡単なカスタムであれば、
簡略化した申請で済むそうですが……

engChrName: Yeah, this one's probably their way of preparing for like, engine swaps and lift kits and shit.
engSearchText:
Yeah, this one's probably their way of preparing for
like, engine swaps and lift kits and shit.
jpnChrName: 例のデカいカスタムも控えてるからな。
jpnSearchText: 例のデカいカスタムも控えてるからな。

engChrName: I got the paperwork a while ago, but I kept puttin' it off. Looked like a pain in the ass.
engSearchText:
I got the paperwork a while ago, but I kept puttin'
it off. Looked like a pain in the ass.
jpnChrName: 必要な書類はもらってたんだが 面倒でつい後回しにしちまってたんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
必要な書類はもらってたんだが
面倒でつい後回しにしちまってたんだよな。

engChrName: You really saved my bacon, getting this stuff sorted for me.
engSearchText:
You really saved my bacon, getting this stuff sorted
for me.
jpnChrName: 今回はお前さんが準備しといてくれた おかげで助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
今回はお前さんが準備しといてくれた
おかげで助かったぜ。

engChrName: Of course. These clerical affairs are my forte.
engSearchText: Of course. These clerical affairs are my forte.
jpnChrName: ふふ、事務作業を任されたからには このくらいの事は。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、事務作業を任されたからには
このくらいの事は。

engChrName: Shall we get this dealt with, then?
engSearchText: Shall we get this dealt with, then?
jpnChrName: それでは、手早く申請を 済ませてしまいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、手早く申請を
済ませてしまいましょうか。

engChrName: Ah, crap.
engSearchText: Ah, crap.
jpnChrName: おっと……
jpnSearchText: おっと……

engChrName: Hmph. Fancy meeting you here.
engSearchText: Hmph. Fancy meeting you here.
jpnChrName: む…… こんな場所で会うなんて珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
む……
こんな場所で会うなんて珍しいな。

engChrName: Ain't 'cause I wanna be here, trust me.
engSearchText: Ain't 'cause I wanna be here, trust me.
jpnChrName: 別に来たくて来たわけじゃなかったが。
jpnSearchText: 別に来たくて来たわけじゃなかったが。

engChrName: Oho! Finally decided to come clean, huh? About damn time.
engSearchText:
Oho! Finally decided to come clean, huh?
About damn time.
jpnChrName: ハハン、さてはついに 諸々の余罪を自首する気になったのか？
jpnSearchText:
ハハン、さてはついに
諸々の余罪を自首する気になったのか？

engChrName: Come clean for what, jackass? I'm just here to turn in some papers for my truck mods.
engSearchText:
Come clean for what, jackass? I'm just here to turn in
some papers for my truck mods.
jpnChrName: ちげえよ、つうか何の容疑だよ。 車の書類を出しに来ただけだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
ちげえよ、つうか何の容疑だよ。
車の書類を出しに来ただけだっつの。

engChrName: Huh, I saw that young lady with you in Tharbad.
engSearchText: Huh, I saw that young lady with you in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ……ところでそちらの女性は サルバッドでも同行していた……
jpnSearchText:
……ところでそちらの女性は
サルバッドでも同行していた……

engChrName: Thank you for your help back then. My name is Risette Twinings—I'm a concierge for the Marduk Company.
engSearchText:
Thank you for your help back then. My name is
Risette Twinings—I'm a concierge for the
Marduk Company.
jpnChrName: ふふ、先日はお世話になりました。 マルドゥック社ＳＣのトワイニングです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、先日はお世話になりました。
マルドゥック社ＳＣのトワイニングです。

engChrName: I'm currently assisting Mr. Arkride on official business.
engSearchText:
I'm currently assisting Mr. Arkride on
official business.
jpnChrName: この度正式に出向することになりまして。
jpnSearchText: この度正式に出向することになりまして。

engChrName: Official—?! How do you keep fumbling your way into a harem, dick?!
engSearchText:
Official—?! How do you keep fumbling your way into
a harem, dick?!
jpnChrName: しゅ、出向ぉ？ またこんな美人さんが……！
jpnSearchText:
しゅ、出向ぉ？
またこんな美人さんが……！

engChrName: Marduk, huh...?
engSearchText: Marduk, huh...?
jpnChrName: マルドゥックと言えば……
jpnSearchText: マルドゥックと言えば……

engChrName: Hey, you mind if I pull you aside for some questions, miss? I'll take care of the paperwork for you.
engSearchText:
Hey, you mind if I pull you aside for some
questions, miss? I'll take care of the paperwork
for you.
jpnChrName: ……お前の書類はこちらで受理しよう。 ついでに色々聞かせてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
……お前の書類はこちらで受理しよう。
ついでに色々聞かせてもらおうか？

engChrName: Ugh... Thought they were never gonna let us go.
engSearchText: Ugh... Thought they were never gonna let us go.
jpnChrName: ふう、ようやく解放されたぜ…… ったく、何度取り調べするんだっての。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ようやく解放されたぜ……
ったく、何度取り調べするんだっての。

engChrName: You have any idea they were gonna do that to you when you got to the precinct?
engSearchText:
You have any idea they were gonna do that to you
when you got to the precinct?
jpnChrName: お前さん、わざとあの流れに持って行ったな？
jpnSearchText: お前さん、わざとあの流れに持って行ったな？

engChrName: I did know they wanted to question me. I figured that I might as well accompany you and get it over with there.
engSearchText:
I did know they wanted to question me. I figured that
I might as well accompany you and get it over
with there.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いずれ問い質されそうですし 今のうちに片付けたほうが効率的かと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いずれ問い質されそうですし
今のうちに片付けたほうが効率的かと。

engChrName: But that's neither here nor there. Good work getting your form filled out—that's most of your paperwork done for today.
engSearchText:
But that's neither here nor there. Good work getting
your form filled out—that's most of your paperwork
done for today.
jpnChrName: ひとまず申請についてはお疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText: ひとまず申請についてはお疲れ様でした。

engChrName: Thanks... Wait, 'most'? What's next?
engSearchText: Thanks... Wait, 'most'? What's next?
jpnChrName: ひとまず、って他にも何かあるのか？
jpnSearchText: ひとまず、って他にも何かあるのか？

engChrName: Oh, nothing major, just your taxes. Heehee.
engSearchText: Oh, nothing major, just your taxes. Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、税務手続きなどの最終確認など 細々としたものではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、税務手続きなどの最終確認など
細々としたものではありますが。

engChrName: And while we're at it, I did want to run some equipment maintenance and office resupplies by you.
engSearchText:
And while we're at it, I did want to run some
equipment maintenance and office resupplies by you.
jpnChrName: せっかくですし事務所の各種備品の補充や 設備改善の相談にも乗っていただければと。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくですし事務所の各種備品の補充や
設備改善の相談にも乗っていただければと。

engChrName: Man, I almost feel bad, puttin' you to work this hard after you just joined... Almost.
engSearchText:
Man, I almost feel bad, puttin' you to work this hard
after you just joined... Almost.
jpnChrName: そこまでやってくれてんのか…… 来たばかりだってのに悪いな。
jpnSearchText:
そこまでやってくれてんのか……
来たばかりだってのに悪いな。

engChrName: Let's go ahead and tackle all that while we're at it.
engSearchText: Let's go ahead and tackle all that while we're at it.
jpnChrName: ああもう、わかった。 面倒極まりないがまとめて片付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、わかった。
面倒極まりないがまとめて片付けるぞ！

engChrName: Perfect. Our next destination is Station Street, then.
engSearchText: Perfect. Our next destination is Station Street, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは駅前通りに向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それでは駅前通りに向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Van accompanied Risette as they navigated their busywork for the day.
engSearchText:
Van accompanied Risette as they navigated their
busywork for the day.
jpnChrName: その後、諸々の雑務作業や手続きを リゼットと共に済ませ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、諸々の雑務作業や手続きを
リゼットと共に済ませ……

engChrName: After a round of shopping on Station Street, they took a little break at a nearby café.
engSearchText:
After a round of shopping on Station Street, they
took a little break at a nearby café.
jpnChrName: 最後に駅前通りでいくつかの買い出しを 済ませてから、カフェで休憩することにした。
jpnSearchText:
最後に駅前通りでいくつかの買い出しを
済ませてから、カフェで休憩することにした。

engChrName: Huh. You goin' solo?
engSearchText: Huh. You goin' solo?
jpnChrName: なんだ、お前一人だけか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、お前一人だけか？

engChrName: What, were you expecting a swarm of VIPs like with the afterparty?
engSearchText:
What, were you expecting a swarm of VIPs like with
the afterparty?
jpnChrName: フッ、あの時の二次会のような 華やかなゲストでも期待していたのか？
jpnSearchText:
フッ、あの時の二次会のような
華やかなゲストでも期待していたのか？

engChrName: No, obviously. I just didn't know if Elaine set somethin' up again or what.
engSearchText:
No, obviously. I just didn't know if Elaine set
somethin' up again or what.
jpnChrName: してねえっつーの。 またエレインにどやされそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
してねえっつーの。
またエレインにどやされそうだしな。

engChrName: On the topic, she suggested the venue, right?
engSearchText: On the topic, she suggested the venue, right?
jpnChrName: そういやあの時の店は 当時の彼女の紹介だったっけか？
jpnSearchText:
そういやあの時の店は
当時の彼女の紹介だったっけか？

engChrName: She did, yes. This place was her recommendation, too.
engSearchText:
She did, yes. This place was her
recommendation, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちなみに今回は 今の彼女にオススメされた店だな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちなみに今回は
今の彼女にオススメされた店だな。

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: マジかよ……
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……

engChrName: ...What? She knows her way around town. There's nothing odd about that.
engSearchText:
...What? She knows her way around town.
There's nothing odd about that.
jpnChrName: こういった庶民的な店に 詳しい女性なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
こういった庶民的な店に
詳しい女性なんでな。

engChrName: I know, that's not what I mean. Just, she's still upset, isn't she?
engSearchText:
I know, that's not what I mean. Just, she's still upset,
isn't she?
jpnChrName: いやそうじゃなくて…… 今も彼女いやがんだな？
jpnSearchText:
いやそうじゃなくて……
今も彼女いやがんだな？

engChrName: Of course she is, after all these years.
engSearchText: Of course she is, after all these years.
jpnChrName: 当たり前だろう、あれから 何年経ったと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
当たり前だろう、あれから
何年経ったと思っている。

engChrName: Man, you've always been like this. You never miss a beat when it comes to anything.
engSearchText:
Man, you've always been like this. You never miss a
beat when it comes to anything.
jpnChrName: ったく、お前は昔からそうだよな、 仕事もプライベートもそつなくこなしやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、お前は昔からそうだよな、
仕事もプライベートもそつなくこなしやがる。

engChrName: I try. It's not easy keeping everything in balance, but the reward is well worth it.
engSearchText:
I try. It's not easy keeping everything in balance, but
the reward is well worth it.
jpnChrName: たしかに両立し、維持していくのは 難しいがやりがいはある。
jpnSearchText:
たしかに両立し、維持していくのは
難しいがやりがいはある。

engChrName: ...That said, it's not exactly a good look for me to attend a social function sans a partner.
engSearchText:
...That said, it's not exactly a good look for me to
attend a social function sans a partner.
jpnChrName: 今後社交の場に出ていくにしても パートナー不在では示しがつかんだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
今後社交の場に出ていくにしても
パートナー不在では示しがつかんだろうしな。

engChrName: Well, I'm sure that all fits into your master plan somehow. Heh.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm sure that all fits into your master
plan somehow. Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン、ある意味お前の最大目標のためにも 必要な要素の一つってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ある意味お前の最大目標のためにも
必要な要素の一つってワケか。

engChrName: Gotta scheme your way to the top in this world, and a certain four-eyed demon knows that all too well.
engSearchText:
Gotta scheme your way to the top in this world, and a
certain four-eyed demon knows that all too well.
jpnChrName: さすがはその歳で大統領補佐官まで 上りつめただけあるぜ、この鬼畜メガネが。
jpnSearchText:
さすがはその歳で大統領補佐官まで
上りつめただけあるぜ、この鬼畜メガネが。

engChrName: Oh, I'm far from done. The road ahead is longer than the road behind...
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm far from done. The road ahead is longer than
the road behind...
jpnChrName: あくまで臨時だ──むしろここから先が 長いだろうという話だがな。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで臨時だ──むしろここから先が
長いだろうという話だがな。

engChrName: ...especially when I consider what—or WHO—lies at the end of that road.
engSearchText:
...especially when I consider what—or WHO—lies at
the end of that road.
jpnChrName: 現状、そのポジションにいる人間を考えると。
jpnSearchText: 現状、そのポジションにいる人間を考えると。

engChrName: ...Damn, you got me shakin' in my boots with that grin of yours. You almost look like some kinda movie villain, there.
engSearchText:
...Damn, you got me shakin' in my boots with that
grin of yours. You almost look like some kinda movie
villain, there.
jpnChrName: ………ったく、ギラギラしてんなぁ。 これだから野心家ってのは。
jpnSearchText:
………ったく、ギラギラしてんなぁ。
これだから野心家ってのは。

engChrName: Please, I'm not that conniving. I'm just shrewd.
engSearchText: Please, I'm not that conniving. I'm just shrewd.
jpnChrName: フッ、別に全てが 打算というわけでもないが。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、別に全てが
打算というわけでもないが。

engChrName: She's a good person, truly. I mean, I should know.
engSearchText: She's a good person, truly. I mean, I should know.
jpnChrName: いいものだぞ、彼女というのは。 とっくに知っているだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
いいものだぞ、彼女というのは。
とっくに知っているだろうが。

engChrName: Would you? You were always buried in books and poring over current events. Elaine and I were nowhere near as boring.
engSearchText:
Would you? You were always buried in books and
poring over current events. Elaine and I were
nowhere near as boring.
jpnChrName: ハッ……俺とエレインはお前ほど “リア充！”って感じじゃなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……俺とエレインはお前ほど
“リア充！”って感じじゃなかったが。

engChrName: Unlike a certain four-eyes, you'd never find US filing paperwork on our lunch breaks.
engSearchText:
Unlike a certain four-eyes, you'd never find US filing
paperwork on our lunch breaks.
jpnChrName: 誰かさんみたいに、生徒会業務の休憩中に 甲斐甲斐しく差し入れとかもなかったし。
jpnSearchText:
誰かさんみたいに、生徒会業務の休憩中に
甲斐甲斐しく差し入れとかもなかったし。

engChrName: Ha. No, you two were too busy tripping over yourselves and averting your gazes.
engSearchText:
Ha. No, you two were too busy tripping over
yourselves and averting your gazes.
jpnChrName: フッ、顔を合わせれば照れ隠しに 言い合っていたな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、顔を合わせれば照れ隠しに
言い合っていたな。

engChrName: Your little will-they-won't-they routine was top entertainment, you know. Every student, every teacher, we all ate it up.
engSearchText:
Your little will-they-won't-they routine was top
entertainment, you know. Every student, every
teacher, we all ate it up.
jpnChrName: 全校生徒、教員に至るまで、その初々しい 付き合いぶりを微笑ましく見守っていたものだ。
jpnSearchText:
全校生徒、教員に至るまで、その初々しい
付き合いぶりを微笑ましく見守っていたものだ。

engChrName: No shit? First I've heard of that.
engSearchText: No shit? First I've heard of that.
jpnChrName: ……マジかよ……？ 初耳なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
……マジかよ……？
初耳なんだが。

engChrName: Really? You two were the single most popular couple in the entire school.
engSearchText:
Really? You two were the single most popular couple
in the entire school.
jpnChrName: ある意味学校一注目されていた カップルだったろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味学校一注目されていた
カップルだったろうからな。

engChrName: I even lent you a hand from time to time—Elaine had plenty of suitors, but I kept them well clear of her.
engSearchText:
I even lent you a hand from time to time—Elaine had
plenty of suitors, but I kept them well clear of her.
jpnChrName: まあ、エレイン狙いだった男子からの横槍を 未然に防ぐためにそう誘導した部分もあるが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、エレイン狙いだった男子からの横槍を
未然に防ぐためにそう誘導した部分もあるが。

engChrName: ...You tellin' me I had a wingman the entire damn time?!
engSearchText:
...You tellin' me I had a wingman the entire
damn time?!
jpnChrName: ってお前のせいじゃねーか！？
jpnSearchText: ってお前のせいじゃねーか！？

engChrName: Ah, that reminds me... We never did make good on our old promise, did we?
engSearchText:
Ah, that reminds me... We never did make good on
our old promise, did we?
jpnChrName: そういえば…… あの時の約束がお預けのままだったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……
あの時の約束がお預けのままだったな。

engChrName: What promi—oh, right. That.
engSearchText: What promi—oh, right. That.
jpnChrName: 約束？　──って、ああ。
jpnSearchText: 約束？　──って、ああ。

engChrName: The basketball club, back when a certain super-sub would come trundling in to fill gaps on the team...
engSearchText:
The basketball club, back when a certain super-sub
would come trundling in to fill gaps on the team...
jpnChrName: あの頃、バスケ部を兼部していた俺と、 様々な部活の助っ人をしていたお前──
jpnSearchText:
あの頃、バスケ部を兼部していた俺と、
様々な部活の助っ人をしていたお前──

engChrName: We were in plenty of matches together, but we never did get the chance to face off against each other one-on-one.
engSearchText:
We were in plenty of matches together, but we never
did get the chance to face off against each
other one-on-one.
jpnChrName: 何度か共に試合に出たこともあったが、 真っ向から勝負をしたことはなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
何度か共に試合に出たこともあったが、
真っ向から勝負をしたことはなかったな。

engChrName: So I told you we could square off in that intramural tournament before we graduated. Now I remember...
engSearchText:
So I told you we could square off in that intramural
tournament before we graduated. Now I remember...
jpnChrName: それでお前の卒業前に、球技大会で 決着をつけるって約束してたんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
それでお前の卒業前に、球技大会で
決着をつけるって約束してたんだったか。

engChrName: ...Yeah, I kinda broke that, didn't I?
engSearchText: ...Yeah, I kinda broke that, didn't I?
jpnChrName: ……結局、破っちまったが。
jpnSearchText: ……結局、破っちまったが。

engChrName: You can't bellyache your way out of this one like some old dodder. We WILL have our match.
engSearchText:
You can't bellyache your way out of this one like some
old dodder. We WILL have our match.
jpnChrName: 飲みすぎて動けない、などと ヤワなことは言わないだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
飲みすぎて動けない、などと
ヤワなことは言わないだろうな。

engChrName: Heh. Back at'cha.
engSearchText: Heh. Back at'cha.
jpnChrName: ハッ、誰にモノ言ってやがる。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、誰にモノ言ってやがる。

engChrName: All that desk work wreck your eyes?
engSearchText: All that desk work wreck your eyes?
jpnChrName: お前の方こそデスクワークばかりで カンが鈍ってねぇだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
お前の方こそデスクワークばかりで
カンが鈍ってねぇだろうな？

engChrName: I believe I showed you this afternoon how athletic I still am. Let's finish this.
engSearchText:
I believe I showed you this afternoon how athletic I
still am. Let's finish this.
jpnChrName: 運動神経なら昼に見せた通りだ── やり残し、片付けるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
運動神経なら昼に見せた通りだ──
やり残し、片付けるとしようか。

engChrName: Van and Kincaid took to the basketball court for a one-on-one showdown years in the making.
engSearchText:
Van and Kincaid took to the basketball court for a
one-on-one showdown years in the making.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはそのままバスケコートに移動し、 １ｏｎ１の勝負を開始した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはそのままバスケコートに移動し、
１ｏｎ１の勝負を開始した。

engChrName: And as the memories of their high school days came rushing back, their friendly rivalry started to get a little...un-friendly.
engSearchText:
And as the memories of their high school days came
rushing back, their friendly rivalry started to get a
little...un-friendly.
jpnChrName: 最初はお遊びのような雰囲気だったが、 学生時代の熱を思い出しながら少しずつ白熱し……
jpnSearchText:
最初はお遊びのような雰囲気だったが、
学生時代の熱を思い出しながら少しずつ白熱し……

engChrName: Their no-holds-barred match drew a crowd of ballers and neighbors from all around, marveling at what they saw.
engSearchText:
Their no-holds-barred match drew a crowd of ballers
and neighbors from all around, marveling at what
they saw.
jpnChrName: やがてバスケ少年や近隣の住民たちが ぽつぽつと集まって魅入るほどになっていった。
jpnSearchText:
やがてバスケ少年や近隣の住民たちが
ぽつぽつと集まって魅入るほどになっていった。

engChrName: The seconds wound down, the buzzer at the ready...
engSearchText: The seconds wound down, the buzzer at the ready...
jpnChrName: そして試合の最終局面──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして試合の最終局面──

engChrName: Yooo! He hit that from the PARKING LOT!
engSearchText: Yooo! He hit that from the PARKING LOT!
jpnChrName: おおおおっ、３ポイントシュート！
jpnSearchText: おおおおっ、３ポイントシュート！

engChrName: The nerd beat him! I can't believe it!
engSearchText: The nerd beat him! I can't believe it!
jpnChrName: 眼鏡の兄ちゃんの勝ちだぁ！
jpnSearchText: 眼鏡の兄ちゃんの勝ちだぁ！

engChrName: But man, that blue-haired dude could really ball, too!
engSearchText:
But man, that blue-haired dude could really
ball, too!
jpnChrName: 青い兄ちゃんもいい動きだったぜー！
jpnSearchText: 青い兄ちゃんもいい動きだったぜー！

engChrName: Shit! Nothin' I could do... Wait. When'd the whole neighborhood get here?
engSearchText:
Shit! Nothin' I could do... Wait. When'd the whole
neighborhood get here?
jpnChrName: ああクソ、やられたか…… っていつの間にこんなに人が。
jpnSearchText:
ああクソ、やられたか……
っていつの間にこんなに人が。

engChrName: Phew... Hah. I might've gotten a little too into that one.
engSearchText:
Phew... Hah. I might've gotten a little too into
that one.
jpnChrName: フッ…… 少々熱が入りすぎてしまったか。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……
少々熱が入りすぎてしまったか。

engChrName: Damn, man. I thought I had a chance there, but you had me locked down at the end.
engSearchText:
Damn, man. I thought I had a chance there, but you
had me locked down at the end.
jpnChrName: ああクソ、行けると思ったのにな…… 全然ブランクねぇじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ああクソ、行けると思ったのにな……
全然ブランクねぇじゃねえか。

engChrName: I do still practice on my days off. All that desk work will wreck my eyes, after all.
engSearchText:
I do still practice on my days off. All that desk work
will wreck my eyes, after all.
jpnChrName: まあ今でも休日に軽くやってはいるからな。
jpnSearchText: まあ今でも休日に軽くやってはいるからな。

engChrName: You held up pretty well yourself. Perhaps there's something to be said for the jack of all trades.
engSearchText:
You held up pretty well yourself. Perhaps there's
something to be said for the jack of all trades.
jpnChrName: お前のほうこそよく粘ったと褒めておこう。 “何でも屋”は伊達じゃないな。
jpnSearchText:
お前のほうこそよく粘ったと褒めておこう。
“何でも屋”は伊達じゃないな。

engChrName: Heh... Jack of all trades, master of none's better than a master of one.
engSearchText:
Heh... Jack of all trades, master of none's better than
a master of one.
jpnChrName: はっ……それも懐かしいあだ名だぜ。
jpnSearchText: はっ……それも懐かしいあだ名だぜ。

engChrName: Been a while since anybody called me that—takes me back to when I'd just join whatever club I could for spare cash.
engSearchText:
Been a while since anybody called me that—takes me
back to when I'd just join whatever club I could for
spare cash.
jpnChrName: 当時も色々な部活を手伝って こっそり小銭稼いだりしてたもんだが。
jpnSearchText:
当時も色々な部活を手伝って
こっそり小銭稼いだりしてたもんだが。

engChrName: Y'know, that ain't too far from the work I do now... Maybe that's how it started for me.
engSearchText:
Y'know, that ain't too far from the work I do now...
Maybe that's how it started for me.
jpnChrName: 今にして思えば、裏解決屋になったのにも 少しは影響していたのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
今にして思えば、裏解決屋になったのにも
少しは影響していたのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: That line of work suits you well, I'd say.
engSearchText: That line of work suits you well, I'd say.
jpnChrName: 結局は進むべき道を選んだ、 ということなのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
結局は進むべき道を選んだ、
ということなのだろう。

engChrName: In a way, I think school helped us all find our paths to walk. Elaine the bracer, Van the spriggan...and me.
engSearchText:
In a way, I think school helped us all find our paths
to walk. Elaine the bracer, Van the spriggan...and me.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士になったエレインも、 勿論、この俺も含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士になったエレインも、
勿論、この俺も含めてな。

engChrName: Not to sound like a broken record, but...you really wanna stick your nose in that business, huh?
engSearchText:
Not to sound like a broken record, but...you really
wanna stick your nose in that business, huh?
jpnChrName: ったく、話は戻るが物好きなもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、話は戻るが物好きなもんだ。

engChrName: You're starin' Gehenna in the face, René. You know that, right?
engSearchText:
You're starin' Gehenna in the face, René. You know
that, right?
jpnChrName: 好き好んで魑魅魍魎どもが 跋扈する世界に踏み入ろうなんてな。
jpnSearchText:
好き好んで魑魅魍魎どもが
跋扈する世界に踏み入ろうなんてな。

engChrName: You don't wanna make Elaine even more worried than she already is.
engSearchText:
You don't wanna make Elaine even more worried
than she already is.
jpnChrName: ……あんまり無理するんじゃねえぞ？ 彼女も心配するだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
……あんまり無理するんじゃねえぞ？
彼女も心配するだろうしな。

engChrName: I'm well aware, trust me.
engSearchText: I'm well aware, trust me.
jpnChrName: フッ……言われるまでもない。
jpnSearchText: フッ……言われるまでもない。

engChrName: And you could stand to take that advice, too. You've got something self-destructive written on your face...
engSearchText:
And you could stand to take that advice, too.
You've got something self-destructive written on
your face...
jpnChrName: 個人的にはその何分の一かでも 自分自身に向けろと言いたいが。
jpnSearchText:
個人的にはその何分の一かでも
自分自身に向けろと言いたいが。

engChrName: 'I'm glad we got to see each other one last time.' 'Good note to wrap things up on.'
engSearchText:
'I'm glad we got to see each other one last time.'
'Good note to wrap things up on.'
jpnChrName: 『こんな機会があって良かった』 『いい区切りになった』
jpnSearchText:
『こんな機会があって良かった』
『いい区切りになった』

engChrName: Well? Am I wrong?
engSearchText: Well? Am I wrong?
jpnChrName: ……そんな顔をしているぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……そんな顔をしているぞ？

engChrName: Wha—no, I...
engSearchText: Wha—no, I...

engChrName: I know well what lies ahead—and I know that it won't be pleasant.
engSearchText:
I know well what lies ahead—and I know that it
won't be pleasant.
jpnChrName: 俺の方は、本格的に忙しくなるのは まだまだ先の話だろう。
jpnSearchText:
俺の方は、本格的に忙しくなるのは
まだまだ先の話だろう。

engChrName: But I'll make sure not to get too detached from my bonds. I will always cherish our friendship.
engSearchText:
But I'll make sure not to get too detached from
my bonds. I will always cherish our friendship.
jpnChrName: だがどんな道を進んだとしても この縁を蔑ろにするつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
だがどんな道を進んだとしても
この縁を蔑ろにするつもりはない。

engChrName: Don't you forget your dreams, either...or why so many people gathered at that bistro to pay you back. You're special in your own right.
engSearchText:
Don't you forget your dreams, either...or why so many
people gathered at that bistro to pay you back.
You're special in your own right.
jpnChrName: お前もゆめ忘れないことだ──どうして今夜、 あれほどの人たちがビストロに集まったのかを。
jpnSearchText:
お前もゆめ忘れないことだ──どうして今夜、
あれほどの人たちがビストロに集まったのかを。

engChrName: ...Pfft. Get a load of the young master here, handin' out speeches like candy.
engSearchText:
...Pfft. Get a load of the young master here, handin'
out speeches like candy.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、やっぱり性格悪いな、 ルネ坊ちゃんは。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、やっぱり性格悪いな、
ルネ坊ちゃんは。

engChrName: But fine. If it helps you sleep at night. I'll watch myself.
engSearchText:
But fine. If it helps you sleep at night. I'll
watch myself.
jpnChrName: 分かった、肝に銘じておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、肝に銘じておくぜ。

engChrName: And I'll try not to bore you with my lectures going forward.
engSearchText:
And I'll try not to bore you with my lectures
going forward.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、お小言もこれくらいにしておくか。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、お小言もこれくらいにしておくか。

engChrName: I think I could use another round or two. Care to join me?
engSearchText:
I think I could use another round or two. Care to
join me?
jpnChrName: まだ微妙に飲み足りなくてな。 あと一杯くらいは付き合っていけ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ微妙に飲み足りなくてな。
あと一杯くらいは付き合っていけ。

engChrName: Now you're speakin' my language.
engSearchText: Now you're speakin' my language.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: The old friends made some light-hearted small talk over one last round of drinks.
engSearchText:
The old friends made some light-hearted small talk
over one last round of drinks.
jpnChrName: その後、二人で他愛のない話をしながら 最後に一杯の酒と軽いツマミを楽しみ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、二人で他愛のない話をしながら
最後に一杯の酒と軽いツマミを楽しみ……

engChrName: And after that, they went their separate ways into the night.
engSearchText:
And after that, they went their separate ways into
the night.
jpnChrName: 夜の巡回へと戻っていったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>夜の巡回へと戻っていったのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Yup, that's luxury—excess express all the way. I don't think I could handle her...
engSearchText:
Yup, that's luxury—excess express all the way. I don't
think I could handle her...
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱ高級車は違うねぇ。 とても手は出ねえが……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱ高級車は違うねぇ。
とても手は出ねえが……

engChrName: No, no, resist the temptation, Van. Only got eyes for Ingert—can you really say you love your car when you haven't modded the hell out of it?
engSearchText:
No, no, resist the temptation, Van. Only got eyes for
Ingert—can you really say you love your car when you
haven't modded the hell out of it?
jpnChrName: イヤイヤ、俺はインゲルト一筋だ。 カスタムを極めた先にこそ究極の愛車が──
jpnSearchText:
イヤイヤ、俺はインゲルト一筋だ。
カスタムを極めた先にこそ究極の愛車が──

engChrName: Aren't you...?
engSearchText: Aren't you...?
jpnChrName: ああっ、貴方は……！
jpnSearchText: ああっ、貴方は……！

engChrName: Hey, look who it is. Bumped into each other in Langport, too, didn't we? We have a knack for doin' that.
engSearchText:
Hey, look who it is. Bumped into each other in
Langport, too, didn't we? We have a knack for
doin' that.
jpnChrName: お前さんか、 ラングポートといいよく会うな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんか、
ラングポートといいよく会うな。

engChrName: Well, what timing! I've been looking for you!
engSearchText: Well, what timing! I've been looking for you!
jpnChrName: そのラングポートの件で 貴方を探してたんです！
jpnSearchText:
そのラングポートの件で
貴方を探してたんです！

engChrName: Is it true that you and your company had a hand in resolving that incident?
engSearchText:
Is it true that you and your company had a hand in
resolving that incident?
jpnChrName: 結局貴方たちがあの時の事件を 解決したっていうのはホントなんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
結局貴方たちがあの時の事件を
解決したっていうのはホントなんですか！？

engChrName: May I ask a few questions, please? I'd like your account of the events!
engSearchText:
May I ask a few questions, please? I'd like your
account of the events!
jpnChrName: 一体なにがあったのか、 じっくりたっぷり話してください！
jpnSearchText:
一体なにがあったのか、
じっくりたっぷり話してください！

engChrName: Whoa, whoa, okay, slow down. What're we talkin' about here? You might be mixin' me up.
engSearchText:
Whoa, whoa, okay, slow down. What're we talkin'
about here? You might be mixin' me up.
jpnChrName: あー……一体何の話をしてるんだ？ 情報が錯綜しているみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
あー……一体何の話をしてるんだ？
情報が錯綜しているみたいだが。

engChrName: We booked it back to Edith after you saw us, so I don't think we had any part in that.
engSearchText:
We booked it back to Edith after you saw us, so I
don't think we had any part in that.
jpnChrName: 俺たちはあの後とっとと 首都に帰ったから関係ねぇと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちはあの後とっとと
首都に帰ったから関係ねぇと思うぜ。

engChrName: I have reports that you were at the scene. Don't play dumb, please!
engSearchText:
I have reports that you were at the scene. Don't play
dumb, please!
jpnChrName: とぼけないでくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: とぼけないでくださいっ！

engChrName: We've also heard that you traveled to Creil Village, shortly before that attack there...
engSearchText:
We've also heard that you traveled to Creil Village,
shortly before that attack there...
jpnChrName: 少し前に事件が起きたクレイユ村にも 出張していたって噂も聞いてますっ。
jpnSearchText:
少し前に事件が起きたクレイユ村にも
出張していたって噂も聞いてますっ。

engChrName: There's something about you, something that makes these incidents pop up wherever you go! There's gotta be a correlation!
engSearchText:
There's something about you, something that makes
these incidents pop up wherever you go! There's gotta
be a correlation!
jpnChrName: やっぱり貴方たちには事件を呼び寄せる 何かがある……間違いありませんっ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり貴方たちには事件を呼び寄せる
何かがある……間違いありませんっ！

engChrName: Yeah, no, we weren't even there. (Man, she's nosy. How the hell does she know...?)
engSearchText:
Yeah, no, we weren't even there.
(Man, she's nosy. How the hell does she know...?)
jpnChrName: いや、何の根拠にもなってねぇだろ。 （面倒くせえのに見つかったな……）
jpnSearchText:
いや、何の根拠にもなってねぇだろ。
（面倒くせえのに見つかったな……）

engChrName: Oh, shit. Is that Dingo over there?
engSearchText: Oh, shit. Is that Dingo over there?
jpnChrName: ……おい、あそこにいるのは ディンゴじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
……おい、あそこにいるのは
ディンゴじゃねえか？

engChrName: Wait, reall—hey! You're not getting me with that again!
engSearchText:
Wait, reall—hey! You're not getting me with
that again!
jpnChrName: ええっ……って騙されませんよ！
jpnSearchText: ええっ……<w500>って騙されませんよ！

engChrName: You're trying to throw me off the scent, just like with that Maxim scoop.
engSearchText:
You're trying to throw me off the scent, just like with
that Maxim scoop.
jpnChrName: マクシム・ルーガンの時みたいに わたしを撒こうったってそうは──
jpnSearchText:
マクシム・ルーガンの時みたいに
わたしを撒こうったってそうは──

engChrName: No, seriously, I swear that's him. And who's that lady huggin' his arm?
engSearchText:
No, seriously, I swear that's him. And who's that lady
huggin' his arm?
jpnChrName: いやマジだっつの。 しかも女連れみてぇだ。
jpnSearchText:
いやマジだっつの。
しかも女連れみてぇだ。

engChrName: Are you actually serious?
engSearchText: Are you actually serious?
jpnChrName: へっ……
jpnSearchText: へっ……

engChrName: W-Wait...
engSearchText: W-Wait...

engChrName: Hoho. Sly dog. Didn't think he had it in him.
engSearchText: Hoho. Sly dog. Didn't think he had it in him.
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、いつの間に…… アイツも隅におけねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、いつの間に……
アイツも隅におけねぇな。

engChrName: And that's a pretty snazzy hotel they're walkin' into. What's the scoop there, I wonder?
engSearchText:
And that's a pretty snazzy hotel they're walkin' into.
What's the scoop there, I wonder?
jpnChrName: 二人で高級ホテルに入っていったが いったいどういう関係なんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
二人で高級ホテルに入っていったが
いったいどういう関係なんだろうな？

engChrName: Just wait a second.
engSearchText: Just wait a second.
jpnChrName: ──待ってください。
jpnSearchText: ──待ってください。

engChrName: Not sure why you're houndin' me. Shouldn't you be lookin' into Dingo?
engSearchText:
Not sure why you're houndin' me. Shouldn't you be
lookin' into Dingo?
jpnChrName: ……俺よりもディンゴを 追及したほうがいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
……俺よりもディンゴを
追及したほうがいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I know, I know! I need your help with him!
engSearchText: I know, I know! I need your help with him!
jpnChrName: ええ、ですから手伝ってくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: ええ、ですから手伝ってくださいっ！

engChrName: You specialize in investigations, right? You're all, like, sneaky and stealthy and stuff.
engSearchText:
You specialize in investigations, right? You're all, like,
sneaky and stealthy and stuff.
jpnChrName: 尾行や調査は 貴方の得意分野でしょうっ！？
jpnSearchText:
尾行や調査は
貴方の得意分野でしょうっ！？

engChrName: Well, no, I ain't a detective. Why would I just tail a guy like that?
engSearchText:
Well, no, I ain't a detective. Why would I just tail a
guy like that?
jpnChrName: そりゃ探偵か何かだろ…… なんで俺がそんなことを──
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ探偵か何かだろ……
なんで俺がそんなことを──

engChrName: Mrrgh...!
engSearchText: Mrrgh...!

engChrName: *sigh* Fine, I can stalk him.
engSearchText: *sigh* Fine, I can stalk him.
jpnChrName: ふう……しょうがねぇな、 少しだけなら付き合ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……しょうがねぇな、
少しだけなら付き合ってやるよ。

engChrName: Grr, what are they saying?! I can barely hear them!
engSearchText: Grr, what are they saying?! I can barely hear them!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……何を言っているか ほとんど聞こえません……！
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬ……何を言っているか
ほとんど聞こえません……！

engChrName: Hence why I said we should get a bit closer.
engSearchText: Hence why I said we should get a bit closer.
jpnChrName: だからもっと近くにしろと言ったんだが。
jpnSearchText: だからもっと近くにしろと言ったんだが。

engChrName: Well, then he'd spot us for sure!
engSearchText: Well, then he'd spot us for sure!
jpnChrName: それだとバレるじゃないですか！
jpnSearchText: それだとバレるじゃないですか！

engChrName: From my 'sneaky and stealthy' experience, no, I think we'd be fine.
engSearchText:
From my 'sneaky and stealthy' experience, no, I think
we'd be fine.
jpnChrName: 結果は同じだと思うがな……
jpnSearchText: 結果は同じだと思うがな……

engChrName: Sorry for keeping you like that.
engSearchText: Sorry for keeping you like that.
jpnChrName: ……無駄な時間を取らせたな。
jpnSearchText: ……無駄な時間を取らせたな。

engChrName: Oh, not a problem. I'm glad we were able to talk this out some more.
engSearchText:
Oh, not a problem. I'm glad we were able to talk this
out some more.
jpnChrName: いいえ、お話しできただけでも前進です。
jpnSearchText: いいえ、お話しできただけでも前進です。

engChrName: I'll be back, you know!
engSearchText: I'll be back, you know!
jpnChrName: 私、諦めませんから……！
jpnSearchText: 私、諦めませんから……！

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: So what the heck were they talking about? They weren't breaking up, were they? That's not the vibe I got...
engSearchText:
So what the heck were they talking about?
They weren't breaking up, were they? That's not the
vibe I got...
jpnChrName: ええと、結局何を話していたんでしょう…… 別れ話？　とはちょっと違う感じですし……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、結局何を話していたんでしょう……
別れ話？　とはちょっと違う感じですし……

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...
jpnChrName: うむむ…………
jpnSearchText: うむむ…………

engChrName: Whaaa—?!
engSearchText: Whaaa—?!
jpnChrName: ひょわわっ！？
jpnSearchText: ひょわわっ！？

engChrName: How long have you two been there?
engSearchText: How long have you two been there?
jpnChrName: お前たち、さっきから何をしてるんだ？
jpnSearchText: <C1>お前たち、さっきから何をしてるんだ？

engChrName: D-Dingo! Umm, well...
engSearchText: D-Dingo! Umm, well...
jpnChrName: ディ、ディンゴさんっ…… こ、これはそのっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディ、ディンゴさんっ……
こ、これはそのっ！

engChrName: Told you. He knew from the start.
engSearchText: Told you. He knew from the start.
jpnChrName: ま、最初から気づいてるわな。
jpnSearchText: ま、最初から気づいてるわな。

engChrName: Dingo! Who was that woman just now?!
engSearchText: Dingo! Who was that woman just now?!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん！ さっきの女の人は一体誰なんですか！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん！
さっきの女の人は一体誰なんですか！

engChrName: Is she your...you know...?!
engSearchText: Is she your...you know...?!
jpnChrName: もしかしてディンゴさんの……！
jpnSearchText: もしかしてディンゴさんの……！

engChrName: Umm... No? She's a colleague, Marielle.
engSearchText: Umm... No? She's a colleague, Marielle.
jpnChrName: ふう、何か誤解しているようだが。
jpnSearchText: ふう、何か誤解しているようだが。

engChrName: She's on this selection committee for an award body.
engSearchText: She's on this selection committee for an award body.
jpnChrName: ……彼女は“とある賞”の選考委員でな。
jpnSearchText: ……彼女は“とある賞”の選考委員でな。

engChrName: Award body?
engSearchText: Award body?
jpnChrName: とある賞……？
jpnSearchText: とある賞……？

engChrName: Oh, don't tell me.
engSearchText: Oh, don't tell me.
jpnChrName: ハン、まさかと思うが……
jpnSearchText: ハン、まさかと思うが……

engChrName: Somebody got himself a Fulitzer, huh?
engSearchText: Somebody got himself a Fulitzer, huh?
jpnChrName: あの《フューリッツァ賞》ってヤツか？
jpnSearchText: あの《フューリッツァ賞》ってヤツか？

engChrName: Well, not quite, but yes, they've been bugging me about it for a while.
engSearchText:
Well, not quite, but yes, they've been bugging me
about it for a while.
jpnChrName: ……前々から打診を受けていてな。
jpnSearchText: ……前々から打診を受けていてな。

engChrName: Wait... The FULITZER?! You're in the running for the highest journalistic award in the land, and you didn't TELL anybody?!
engSearchText:
Wait... The FULITZER?! You're in the running for
the highest journalistic award in the land, and you
didn't TELL anybody?!
jpnChrName: フュ、フューリッツァ賞ってあの……！？ 記者にとってこの上ない栄誉じゃないですか！
jpnSearchText:
フュ、フューリッツァ賞ってあの……！？
記者にとってこの上ない栄誉じゃないですか！

engChrName: What for?! Why are you being so secretive about—
engSearchText: What for?! Why are you being so secretive about—
jpnChrName: どうしてディンゴさんに！？ もっと詳しく──
jpnSearchText:
どうしてディンゴさんに！？
もっと詳しく──

engChrName: Gah, my stupid phone! Who could be... The editor-in-chief?! NOW?!
engSearchText:
Gah, my stupid phone! Who could be...
The editor-in-chief?! NOW?!
jpnChrName: な、なんですか？ 今いい所で──って編集長っ！？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんですか？
今いい所で──って編集長っ！？

engChrName: Hello...? Okay... Yes... Right, I get that...
engSearchText: Hello...? Okay... Yes... Right, I get that...

engChrName: Wha—sir, please! I... Okay, okay... All right. I'll be there in a bit.
engSearchText:
Wha—sir, please! I... Okay, okay... All right. I'll be
there in a bit.
jpnChrName: で、でも……うう、分かりました。 直ちに帰ります……
jpnSearchText:
で、でも……うう、分かりました。
直ちに帰ります……

engChrName: Ouch, heh. They tell you to stop wanderin' around and start doin' your job?
engSearchText:
Ouch, heh. They tell you to stop wanderin' around
and start doin' your job?
jpnChrName: ハン、会社からの連絡か。 勝手にブラついてないで帰ってこいってか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、会社からの連絡か。
勝手にブラついてないで帰ってこいってか？

engChrName: Of all the stinking times...!
engSearchText: Of all the stinking times...!
jpnChrName: くうう、よりによってこんな時に……！
jpnSearchText: くうう、よりによってこんな時に……！

engChrName: I'm holding you to this, Dingo! You'd better fess up next time!
engSearchText:
I'm holding you to this, Dingo! You'd better fess up
next time!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん、今度は絶対に 詳しい話を聞かせてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん、今度は絶対に
詳しい話を聞かせてくださいね！

engChrName: Looks like you got your hands full these days.
engSearchText: Looks like you got your hands full these days.
jpnChrName: お前も色々と大変だな。
jpnSearchText: お前も色々と大変だな。

engChrName: She's...eccentric. I'll leave it at that.
engSearchText: She's...eccentric. I'll leave it at that.
jpnChrName: フッ…… 熱意まで否定するつもりはないがな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……
熱意まで否定するつもりはないがな。

engChrName: But damn, nice job on the Fulitzer nod. I had no idea they were reachin' out to you about that.
engSearchText:
But damn, nice job on the Fulitzer nod. I had no idea
they were reachin' out to you about that.
jpnChrName: しかし、俺も初耳だったぜ。 そんな大層な賞の打診を受けてたとはな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、俺も初耳だったぜ。
そんな大層な賞の打診を受けてたとはな。

engChrName: Though now that I think about it, I guess you were kinda a shoo-in. You were on the ground for the war, if I recall.
engSearchText:
Though now that I think about it, I guess you were
kinda a shoo-in. You were on the ground for the war,
if I recall.
jpnChrName: 思い当たるとしたら── ２年前の“大戦”での話か。
jpnSearchText:
思い当たるとしたら──
２年前の“大戦”での話か。

engChrName: Yup. I remember running into you once or twice— you were on the Mirage side, but you still lent us a hand from time to time.
engSearchText:
Yup. I remember running into you once or twice—
you were on the Mirage side, but you still lent us a
hand from time to time.
jpnChrName: ……お前も当時は“陽炎”側に参加しながら こちらにも協力してくれていたな。
jpnSearchText:
……お前も当時は“陽炎”側に参加しながら
こちらにも協力してくれていたな。

engChrName: I had comms with all of Calvard's media outlets at the time. The Royal Guardian, the Tyrell Times, you name it.
engSearchText:
I had comms with all of Calvard's media outlets at
the time. The Royal Guardian, the Tyrell Times, you
name it.
jpnChrName: 当時、俺はタイレル通信やロイヤルガーディアンを 始めとした共和国の各メディアと連絡をとりつつ……
jpnSearchText:
当時、俺はタイレル通信やロイヤルガーディアンを
始めとした共和国の各メディアと連絡をとりつつ……

engChrName: I even branched out to some international outlets. I was chasing the truth behind it all, everything else be damned.
engSearchText:
I even branched out to some international outlets.
I was chasing the truth behind it all, everything else
be damned.
jpnChrName: さらにリベールや帝国の通信社や放送局とも 連携しながらあの大戦の“裏側”を追っていた。
jpnSearchText:
さらにリベールや帝国の通信社や放送局とも
連携しながらあの大戦の“裏側”を追っていた。

engChrName: I put a lot of stuff together from a buncha different sources, so I guess they wanted to recognize that.
engSearchText:
I put a lot of stuff together from a buncha different
sources, so I guess they wanted to recognize that.
jpnChrName: 結果的にいくつかのスクープを取ったことで “特別賞”にという話が上がったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
結果的にいくつかのスクープを取ったことで
“特別賞”にという話が上がったらしい。

engChrName: Heard you were up on the front lines when the fighting broke out, snappin' photos of the battle.
engSearchText:
Heard you were up on the front lines when the
fighting broke out, snappin' photos of the battle.
jpnChrName: 開戦日には最前線にまで行って 戦場カメラマンをやってたんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
開戦日には最前線にまで行って
戦場カメラマンをやってたんだってな。

engChrName: 'The Reality of War,' those outlets called it. You were anonymous at the time, but I had a feeling it was you. Blew everyone away...
engSearchText:
'The Reality of War,' those outlets called it. You were
anonymous at the time, but I had a feeling it was you.
Blew everyone away...
jpnChrName: 戦後に各誌に掲載された“戦争の現実”── 匿名だったのも含めてすげえ反応だったが。
jpnSearchText:
戦後に各誌に掲載された“戦争の現実”──
匿名だったのも含めてすげえ反応だったが。

engChrName: That's the thing: it wasn't just me. I can't accept that award in good faith if it means putting down everyone else.
engSearchText:
That's the thing: it wasn't just me. I can't accept that
award in good faith if it means putting down
everyone else.
jpnChrName: 全て俺一人で出来たことじゃない。 受けるのはさすがにためらわれてな。
jpnSearchText:
全て俺一人で出来たことじゃない。
受けるのはさすがにためらわれてな。

engChrName: I'd hoped they'd just leave me be if I kept running long enough, but nope. Here they are in Edith.
engSearchText:
I'd hoped they'd just leave me be if I kept running
long enough, but nope. Here they are in Edith.
jpnChrName: ずっと躱（かわ）し続けていたんだが、 ついに首都まで押しかけられてしまったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ずっと躱（かわ）し続けていたんだが、
ついに首都まで押しかけられてしまったわけだ。

engChrName: I get that, but c'mon, don't sell yourself short.
engSearchText: I get that, but c'mon, don't sell yourself short.
jpnChrName: ハッ、せっかくだから受けちまえば よかったんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、せっかくだから受けちまえば
よかったんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: You risked your life out there to get those photos. Somebody's gotta be recognized for that, and it might as well be you.
engSearchText:
You risked your life out there to get those photos.
Somebody's gotta be recognized for that, and it might
as well be you.
jpnChrName: フューリッツァ賞を取ったとなりゃ 一気に売れっ子も間違いねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フューリッツァ賞を取ったとなりゃ
一気に売れっ子も間違いねぇだろう。

engChrName: Plus you accept that award and it gives you a platform. You can thank 'em all you want once your articles start sellin' like hotcakes.
engSearchText:
Plus you accept that award and it gives you
a platform. You can thank 'em all you want once your
articles start sellin' like hotcakes.
jpnChrName: 命まで賭けた見返りとしちゃあ 安すぎるくらいだと思うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
命まで賭けた見返りとしちゃあ
安すぎるくらいだと思うぜ？

engChrName: ...Nah. Still doesn't feel right—and I don't think I'd be that big.
engSearchText:
...Nah. Still doesn't feel right—and I don't think I'd
be that big.
jpnChrName: ……いや、むしろ 釣りが出るくらいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、むしろ
釣りが出るくらいだろう。

engChrName: No, ol' Dingo Brad is still a two-bit gossip rag reporter.
engSearchText:
No, ol' Dingo Brad is still a two-bit gossip
rag reporter.
jpnChrName: しがないゴシップ誌のルポライター…… 今の俺にはそれがちょうどいい。
jpnSearchText:
しがないゴシップ誌のルポライター……
今の俺にはそれがちょうどいい。

engChrName: That's all I'm ever gonna be, and all I ever wanna be.
engSearchText: That's all I'm ever gonna be, and all I ever wanna be.
jpnChrName: それ以上にはなれないし、なる気もないさ。
jpnSearchText: それ以上にはなれないし、なる気もないさ。

engChrName: I mean...sure, I guess? It's your life, and all.
engSearchText: I mean...sure, I guess? It's your life, and all.
jpnChrName: ハン……？ まあ好きにすりゃいいけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
まあ好きにすりゃいいけどよ。

engChrName: You let that whole nihilist bit slip a little when you watch over that new girl, though. Just a heads-up.
engSearchText:
You let that whole nihilist bit slip a little when you
watch over that new girl, though. Just a heads-up.
jpnChrName: ニヒルを気取ってるくせに、あんな新米を 放っておけないのも矛盾してる気がするが。
jpnSearchText:
ニヒルを気取ってるくせに、あんな新米を
放っておけないのも矛盾してる気がするが。

engChrName: That's rich, coming from you.
engSearchText: That's rich, coming from you.
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: You act all tough, but then you ferry all your part-timers around like some kinda mother hen. Big ol' softie.
engSearchText:
You act all tough, but then you ferry all your
part-timers around like some kinda mother hen.
Big ol' softie.
jpnChrName: ……何だかんだ言いつつ助手たちの 面倒を見ているお前には言われたくないが。
jpnSearchText:
……何だかんだ言いつつ助手たちの
面倒を見ているお前には言われたくないが。

engChrName: Tch.
engSearchText: Tch.
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: But, well, I guess you've got a point. There's nothing wrong with training her up as an apprentice.
engSearchText:
But, well, I guess you've got a point. There's nothing
wrong with training her up as an apprentice.
jpnChrName: ……だが、そうだな。 背中を見せる相手がいる、か。
jpnSearchText:
……だが、そうだな。
背中を見せる相手がいる、か。

engChrName: Pfft. Don't need to give it a cool spin to justify it.
engSearchText: Pfft. Don't need to give it a cool spin to justify it.
jpnChrName: ま、別に格好つける必要はねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText: ま、別に格好つける必要はねえだろうが。

engChrName: Nothin' wrong with doin' you. Just as long as we don't make fools of ourselves in front of the young'uns.
engSearchText:
Nothin' wrong with doin' you. Just as long as we
don't make fools of ourselves in front of
the young'uns.
jpnChrName: お互い、若いの相手に恰好悪い背中は 見せないようにしていかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
お互い、若いの相手に恰好悪い背中は
見せないようにしていかねえとな。

engChrName: Heh. Bud, you're on the right side of 25, you ARE a young'un. But yeah, we just gotta keep moving forward, you know?
engSearchText:
Heh. Bud, you're on the right side of 25, you ARE
a young'un. But yeah, we just gotta keep moving
forward, you know?
jpnChrName: フッ、お前も十分若いと思うが。 ……せいぜい精進するとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、お前も十分若いと思うが。
……せいぜい精進するとしよう。

engChrName: Van bid Dingo farewell, and returned to his work.
engSearchText: Van bid Dingo farewell, and returned to his work.
jpnChrName: その後、ディンゴと別れてから 改めて業務を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ディンゴと別れてから
改めて業務を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Nihao, Van!
engSearchText: Nihao, Van!
jpnChrName: 你好（ニーハオ）、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: 你好（ニーハオ）、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Thanks for coming, heehee. You're okay with giving me a little tour, right?
engSearchText:
Thanks for coming, heehee. You're okay with giving
me a little tour, right?
jpnChrName: ふふ、来てくれて嬉しいわ。 引き受けてくれるのよね、首都案内。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、来てくれて嬉しいわ。
引き受けてくれるのよね、首都案内。

engChrName: So first, I was thinking—
engSearchText: So first, I was thinking—
jpnChrName: それじゃあさっそく──
jpnSearchText: それじゃあさっそく──

engChrName: Whoa, pump the brakes a sec. Had a quick question for you, if you don't mind.
engSearchText:
Whoa, pump the brakes a sec. Had a quick question
for you, if you don't mind.
jpnChrName: まあ待て、とりあえず話を聞いてからだ。
jpnSearchText: まあ待て、とりあえず話を聞いてからだ。

engChrName: You picked a weird-ass time to visit Edith. What's the itinerary?
engSearchText:
You picked a weird-ass time to visit Edith.
What's the itinerary?
jpnChrName: そもそも何でお前さんが こんな時期に首都に来てるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
そもそも何でお前さんが
こんな時期に首都に来てるんだ？

engChrName: I doubt you're here on your own.
engSearchText: I doubt you're here on your own.
jpnChrName: さすがに一人じゃないだろうが。
jpnSearchText: さすがに一人じゃないだろうが。

engChrName: Yeah, Bàbà's on a business trip here, so I decided to tag along.
engSearchText:
Yeah, Bàbà's on a business trip here, so I decided to
tag along.
jpnChrName: 爸爸（パパ）がこっちに出張することになってね。 あたしはそれに同伴してきたの。
jpnSearchText:
爸爸（パパ）がこっちに出張することになってね。
あたしはそれに同伴してきたの。

engChrName: Though I do have some business of my own, if I'm being honest.
engSearchText:
Though I do have some business of my own, if I'm
being honest.
jpnChrName: まあ、個人的に動く必要もあるんだけど。
jpnSearchText: まあ、個人的に動く必要もあるんだけど。

engChrName: Right. The sketchy business, if I had to guess?
engSearchText: Right. The sketchy business, if I had to guess?
jpnChrName: っつうことは、 その出張は《黒月》としてってことか。
jpnSearchText:
っつうことは、
その出張は《黒月》としてってことか。

engChrName: Doubt your old man's negotiatin' bake sales.
engSearchText: Doubt your old man's negotiatin' bake sales.
jpnChrName: さぞ穏やかな目的じゃなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText: さぞ穏やかな目的じゃなさそうだ。

engChrName: Well, you're not wrong.
engSearchText: Well, you're not wrong.
jpnChrName: フフ、まぁ当たってるかな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、まぁ当たってるかな。

engChrName: He's got a few of our companies together to figure out a plan for you-know-who.
engSearchText:
He's got a few of our companies together to figure
out a plan for you-know-who.
jpnChrName: いくつかの取引先と 《Ａ》への対策を協議することになったの。
jpnSearchText:
いくつかの取引先と
《Ａ》への対策を協議することになったの。

engChrName: Cao came along as well, but he's... Well, I'm not sure where he is, actually.
engSearchText:
Cao came along as well, but he's... Well, I'm not sure
where he is, actually.
jpnChrName: ツァオも一緒に来たんだけど、 着いてすぐにどっか行っちゃったのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオも一緒に来たんだけど、
着いてすぐにどっか行っちゃったのよねぇ。

engChrName: Real shame, honestly, this was a wonderful chance for a date.
engSearchText:
Real shame, honestly, this was a wonderful chance for
a date.
jpnChrName: はぁ、首都デートしたかったのになぁ……
jpnSearchText: はぁ、首都デートしたかったのになぁ……

engChrName: White Orchid Dragon's up to somethin', huh? (I don't like the smell of that.)
engSearchText:
White Orchid Dragon's up to somethin', huh?
(I don't like the smell of that.)
jpnChrName: 《白蘭竜》が別行動ねえ。 （どう考えてもキナ臭いが……）
jpnSearchText:
《白蘭竜》が別行動ねえ。
（どう考えてもキナ臭いが……）

engChrName: Well, anyway, I still have a while before the meeting, so I figured: why not take a walk around?
engSearchText:
Well, anyway, I still have a while before the meeting,
so I figured: why not take a walk around?
jpnChrName: まあ、そういうワケだけど 会合まで時間が結構余っちゃってね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういうワケだけど
会合まで時間が結構余っちゃってね。

engChrName: Bàbà's busy getting everything ready with the attendees, so I have nothing else to do.
engSearchText:
Bàbà's busy getting everything ready with the
attendees, so I have nothing else to do.
jpnChrName: 爸爸（パパ）も各方面との段取りで 忙しいみたいだしその間に首都観光したいの。
jpnSearchText:
爸爸（パパ）も各方面との段取りで
忙しいみたいだしその間に首都観光したいの。

engChrName: You know Edith like the back of your hand, don't you?
engSearchText:
You know Edith like the back of your hand,
don't you?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんにとっては 首都は庭みたいなものでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんにとっては
首都は庭みたいなものでしょう？

engChrName: I mean, yeah, but can't Aaron do it? Might as well ask him.
engSearchText:
I mean, yeah, but can't Aaron do it? Might as well
ask him.
jpnChrName: ったく……そういうのは 幼馴染（アーロン）に頼めと言いたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……そういうのは
幼馴染（アーロン）に頼めと言いたいんだが。

engChrName: I did! But he canceled out of nowhere, the jerk!
engSearchText: I did! But he canceled out of nowhere, the jerk!
jpnChrName: 頼んでたの！　でも当日になって いきなりドタキャンしてきてさ！
jpnSearchText:
頼んでたの！　でも当日になって
いきなりドタキャンしてきてさ！

engChrName: He didn't even call me, he TEXTED! Can you believe that? Just texted me, 'Something came up, go ask the old man if he'll do it.'
engSearchText:
He didn't even call me, he TEXTED! Can you
believe that? Just texted me, 'Something came up, go
ask the old man if he'll do it.'
jpnChrName: 『急用ができたからオッサンにでも頼め』とか テキトーなメッセージだけ残して……！
jpnSearchText:
『急用ができたからオッサンにでも頼め』とか
テキトーなメッセージだけ残して……！

engChrName: He hasn't changed a bit, I swear...
engSearchText: He hasn't changed a bit, I swear...
jpnChrName: 首都に来てもホンットああいうところは 変わんないわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
首都に来てもホンットああいうところは
変わんないわよねぇ。

engChrName: (That little shit...!)
engSearchText: (That little shit...!)
jpnChrName: （押しつけやがったな、あのガキ……！）
jpnSearchText: （押しつけやがったな、あのガキ……！）

engChrName: C'mon, Van, please? For me?
engSearchText: C'mon, Van, please? For me?
jpnChrName: ね、お願～いヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: ね、お願～いヴァンさん！

engChrName: It's been so long since I last visited Edith. There's so much to see, so many souvenirs to buy!
engSearchText:
It's been so long since I last visited Edith. There's so
much to see, so many souvenirs to buy!
jpnChrName: 首都に来るの、久々だから 色々お土産とか見繕いたくって。
jpnSearchText:
首都に来るの、久々だから
色々お土産とか見繕いたくって。

engChrName: It'll be a favor Heiyue owes you for! C'mon, pleeease?
engSearchText: It'll be a favor Heiyue owes you for! C'mon, pleeease?
jpnChrName: ちょっとでも《黒月》に恩を売っとくか、 くらいのノリでもいいからさ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとでも《黒月》に恩を売っとくか、
くらいのノリでもいいからさ！

engChrName: Heiyue really isn't gonna care about... *sigh* Okay, fine. I'll show you around a bit.
engSearchText:
Heiyue really isn't gonna care about... *sigh*
Okay, fine. I'll show you around a bit.
jpnChrName: こんなことで売れるとは思わんが…… まあいい、ここまで来たんだしな。
jpnSearchText:
こんなことで売れるとは思わんが……
まあいい、ここまで来たんだしな。

engChrName: We'll call it an apology for how that job thing went down.
engSearchText:
We'll call it an apology for how that job thing
went down.
jpnChrName: バイトの不始末の詫びと思って ちょっとくらいなら付き合ってやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
バイトの不始末の詫びと思って
ちょっとくらいなら付き合ってやるさ。

engChrName: Yay! Thanks! ❤
engSearchText: Yay! Thanks! ❤
jpnChrName: やった、ありがと❤ それじゃさっそく出発しましょ！
jpnSearchText:
やった、ありがと❤
それじゃさっそく出発しましょ！

engChrName: Hey, so which of these do you think would look good on Cao?
engSearchText:
Hey, so which of these do you think would look good
on Cao?
jpnChrName: ねえヴァンさん、 どっちがツァオに似合うと思う？
jpnSearchText:
ねえヴァンさん、
どっちがツァオに似合うと思う？

engChrName: You're really thinkin' about him instead? Thought this tour was for YOU.
engSearchText:
You're really thinkin' about him instead?
Thought this tour was for YOU.
jpnChrName: いの一番にアイツへのプレゼントかよ…… どれでもいいんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
いの一番にアイツへのプレゼントかよ……
どれでもいいんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Oh, don't be such a killjoy.
engSearchText: Oh, don't be such a killjoy.
jpnChrName: もう、マジメに付き合ってよ！
jpnSearchText: もう、マジメに付き合ってよ！

engChrName: Cao and I are in Edith together for the very first time! This is the perfect chance to deepen our bond!
engSearchText:
Cao and I are in Edith together for the very first time!
This is the perfect chance to deepen our bond!
jpnChrName: せっかく一緒に首都に来たんだし 点数を上げるチャンスなんだから！
jpnSearchText:
せっかく一緒に首都に来たんだし
点数を上げるチャンスなんだから！

engChrName: Hmm... Should I pick out a matching piece for myself, now that I think about it? I think that's a good idea.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Should I pick out a matching piece for
myself, now that I think about it? I think that's a
good idea.
jpnChrName: あ、どうせならあたしも ペアルックで買っちゃおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
あ、どうせならあたしも
ペアルックで買っちゃおうかな？

engChrName: I can just hear him now. 'Ah... We match, I see.'
engSearchText: I can just hear him now. 'Ah... We match, I see.'
jpnChrName: ふとした時に気づいちゃって 『え、まさかこの服はアシェン様と……ドキ❤』
jpnSearchText:
ふとした時に気づいちゃって
『え、まさかこの服はアシェン様と……ドキ❤』

engChrName: And then he'll get all flustered, and... Oooooh!
engSearchText: And then he'll get all flustered, and... Oooooh!
jpnChrName: みたいに意識されちゃったりして～！
jpnSearchText: みたいに意識されちゃったりして～！

engChrName: Lady, your mind works in strange ways.
engSearchText: Lady, your mind works in strange ways.
jpnChrName: まったく場面が想像できねえ。
jpnSearchText: まったく場面が想像できねえ。

engChrName: Ahh, that was fun! I got to buy a ton of stuff, I got to see all the sights, everything!
engSearchText:
Ahh, that was fun! I got to buy a ton of stuff, I got to
see all the sights, everything!
jpnChrName: うーん、楽しかった。 お土産もいっぱい買えたし！
jpnSearchText:
うーん、楽しかった。
お土産もいっぱい買えたし！

engChrName: It was really something seeing the tower up close. It gives the Great Spire a run for its mira!
engSearchText:
It was really something seeing the tower up close.
It gives the Great Spire a run for its mira!
jpnChrName: タワーも近くで見ると壮観だったわね～。 煌天楼といい勝負かしら。
jpnSearchText:
タワーも近くで見ると壮観だったわね～。
煌天楼といい勝負かしら。

engChrName: Not sure those are really in the same category, but fair enough.
engSearchText:
Not sure those are really in the same category, but
fair enough.
jpnChrName: まあ、比べるもんでもねぇだろうがな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、比べるもんでもねぇだろうがな。

engChrName: ...Hey.
engSearchText: ...Hey.
jpnChrName: ……おい、アンタ。
jpnSearchText: ……おい、アンタ。

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about them. I'm perfectly aware of them.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about them. I'm perfectly aware
of them.
jpnChrName: ああ、大丈夫──分かってるから。
jpnSearchText: ああ、大丈夫──分かってるから。

engChrName: I assume you're here on Lu family business? You're quite a ways from Langport, though.
engSearchText:
I assume you're here on Lu family business?
You're quite a ways from Langport, though.
jpnChrName: 今回はルウ家の用事── 煌都から遥々何の用かしら？
jpnSearchText:
今回はルウ家の用事──
煌都から遥々何の用かしら？

engChrName: Seems everybody's traveling on business these days.
engSearchText: Seems everybody's traveling on business these days.
jpnChrName: 最近はそちらも何かと “出張”が多いみたいだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
最近はそちらも何かと
“出張”が多いみたいだけれど。

engChrName: ...Hah. I'd expect no less of you, Lady Ashen.
engSearchText: ...Hah. I'd expect no less of you, Lady Ashen.
jpnChrName: ……フフ、さすがはアシェン様。
jpnSearchText: <C2>……フフ、さすがはアシェン様。

engChrName: Xiongshou, huh? Not from the Lu family, are they?
engSearchText: Xiongshou, huh? Not from the Lu family, are they?
jpnChrName: 凶手か…… ルウ家の、じゃないな？
jpnSearchText:
凶手か……
ルウ家の、じゃないな？

engChrName: Indeed not. Though they seem awfully casual for xiongshou—normally they try to hide their presence.
engSearchText:
Indeed not. Though they seem awfully casual for
xiongshou—normally they try to hide their presence.
