jpnChrName: ええ── わざと気配の消し方を甘くしてたでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
わざと気配の消し方を甘くしてたでしょ？

engChrName: So is the message being sent here that a xiongshou doesn't even need to try in order to keep tabs on little old me?
engSearchText:
So is the message being sent here that a xiongshou
doesn't even need to try in order to keep tabs on
little old me?
jpnChrName: 小娘の監視には“凶手”の本気を出すまでもない、 っていうメッセージかと思ってたわ。
jpnSearchText:
小娘の監視には“凶手”の本気を出すまでもない、
っていうメッセージかと思ってたわ。

engChrName: I think you're mistaken, Lady Ashen.
engSearchText: I think you're mistaken, Lady Ashen.
jpnChrName: ……アシェン様は誤解なされている様子。
jpnSearchText: ……アシェン様は誤解なされている様子。

engChrName: My master simply wishes to banish these clouds looming over Heiyue, that we might shine brighter.
engSearchText:
My master simply wishes to banish these clouds
looming over Heiyue, that we might shine brighter.
jpnChrName: 我が主は、暗雲渦巻くこの国で 《黒月》が栄え続ける道を模索しているにすぎませぬ。
jpnSearchText:
我が主は、暗雲渦巻くこの国で
《黒月》が栄え続ける道を模索しているにすぎませぬ。

engChrName: ...It's really impressive how you can say that with a straight face.
engSearchText:
...It's really impressive how you can say that with a
straight face.
jpnChrName: よくそんな言葉を吐けるわね。
jpnSearchText: よくそんな言葉を吐けるわね。

engChrName: You really think your master's looking to resolve all this peacefully? That just doesn't sound right, does it?
engSearchText:
You really think your master's looking to resolve all
this peacefully? That just doesn't sound right, does it?
jpnChrName: 足並みを揃える気があるとは、 到底思えないけど。
jpnSearchText:
足並みを揃える気があるとは、
到底思えないけど。

engChrName: Now, obviously, I'm not going to pick a fight with you. At least not in public.
engSearchText:
Now, obviously, I'm not going to pick a fight
with you. At least not in public.
jpnChrName: 当然、争うつもりはないのでしょう。 ──少なくとも表向きには。
jpnSearchText:
当然、争うつもりはないのでしょう。
──少なくとも表向きには。

engChrName: But IF—that's a big if—your boss thinks he can get the better of us...
engSearchText:
But IF—that's a big if—your boss thinks he can get
the better of us...
jpnChrName: だけどもし、今後何らかの機に乗じて、 こちらを出し抜こうって腹積もりなら──
jpnSearchText:
だけどもし、今後何らかの機に乗じて、
こちらを出し抜こうって腹積もりなら──

engChrName: ...then the Lu family will accept your challenge anytime.
engSearchText:
...then the Lu family will accept your
challenge anytime.
jpnChrName: ルウ家は謹んで受けて立たせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText: ルウ家は謹んで受けて立たせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Hmph...
engSearchText: Hmph...

engChrName: I will let them know.
engSearchText: I will let them know.
jpnChrName: ……たしかに我が主に。
jpnSearchText: ……たしかに我が主に。

engChrName: All right, let's head back now.
engSearchText: All right, let's head back now.
jpnChrName: じゃあ帰りましょ。
jpnSearchText: じゃあ帰りましょ。

engChrName: Okay, wait... Gimme a second to process all that.
engSearchText: Okay, wait... Gimme a second to process all that.
jpnChrName: ……いや、切り替え早すぎだろ。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、切り替え早すぎだろ。

engChrName: Heiyue's own little princess, huh? Apple doesn't fall far from the tree, there.
engSearchText:
Heiyue's own little princess, huh? Apple doesn't fall
far from the tree, there.
jpnChrName: 黒月の令嬢……か。 ったく、血は争えねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
黒月の令嬢……か。
ったく、血は争えねぇな。

engChrName: Remind me not to piss you off, I like having my head on my neck. Scary to think what would've happened if I turned you down...
engSearchText:
Remind me not to piss you off, I like having my head
on my neck. Scary to think what would've happened
if I turned you down...
jpnChrName: 今回のを断って機嫌を損ねてたら どうなってたことやら。
jpnSearchText:
今回のを断って機嫌を損ねてたら
どうなってたことやら。

engChrName: How rude! I wouldn't have done anything...probably.
engSearchText: How rude! I wouldn't have done anything...probably.
jpnChrName: ひっどーい！　そんなことしないわ。
jpnSearchText: ひっどーい！　そんなことしないわ。

engChrName: I do value our friendship, Van, and I'd like to keep it that way! Heehee.
engSearchText:
I do value our friendship, Van, and I'd like to keep it
that way! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんとはこれからも 良いお付き合いをしたいんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんとはこれからも
良いお付き合いをしたいんだから。

engChrName: I really owe you, both for Langport and for keeping Aaron safe. I mean it!
engSearchText:
I really owe you, both for Langport and for keeping
Aaron safe. I mean it!
jpnChrName: ラングポートの件やアーロンのことは 感謝してるんだし……嘘じゃないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートの件やアーロンのことは
感謝してるんだし……嘘じゃないわよ？

engChrName: Oh, I know. I was just messin' with you.
engSearchText: Oh, I know. I was just messin' with you.
jpnChrName: 冗談だ、分かってるさ。
jpnSearchText: 冗談だ、分かってるさ。

engChrName: But what were you talkin' about back there? Sounded like some kinda turf war business.
engSearchText:
But what were you talkin' about back there?
Sounded like some kinda turf war business.
jpnChrName: しかし……妙に不穏な話をしてたな？ 出し抜くだのなんだの。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……妙に不穏な話をしてたな？
出し抜くだのなんだの。

engChrName: Oh, just some shadows sneaking around. It's nothing to worry about.
engSearchText:
Oh, just some shadows sneaking around. It's nothing
to worry about.
jpnChrName: ちょっと裏で気になる “予兆”があるみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと裏で気になる
“予兆”があるみたいでね。

engChrName: Bàbà might've told you, but Heiyue is split between several groups and families. Sometimes we have to tie those loose ends back up ourselves.
engSearchText:
Bàbà might've told you, but Heiyue is split between
several groups and families. Sometimes we have to tie
those loose ends back up ourselves.
jpnChrName: 爸爸（パパ）も言ってたけど、黒月も一枚岩じゃない── 身内でも締めるところは締めないと。
jpnSearchText:
爸爸（パパ）も言ってたけど、黒月も一枚岩じゃない──
身内でも締めるところは締めないと。

engChrName: 'Hope for the best, plan for the worst.' That's what Yéye always said.
engSearchText:
'Hope for the best, plan for the worst.' That's what
Yéye always said.
jpnChrName: 『最善を望み、最悪に備えよ』ってね。 爷爷（イェイェ）の受け売りだけど。
jpnSearchText:
『最善を望み、最悪に備えよ』ってね。
爷爷（イェイェ）の受け売りだけど。

engChrName: Okay, let's head on back! I should let Bàbà know what happened.
engSearchText:
Okay, let's head on back! I should let Bàbà know
what happened.
jpnChrName: さ、帰りましょヴァンさん！ 爸爸（パパ）にも一応報告しときたいし。
jpnSearchText:
さ、帰りましょヴァンさん！
爸爸（パパ）にも一応報告しときたいし。

engChrName: Do you wanna see him? He should be back now, and I think he might wanna thank you for today.
engSearchText:
Do you wanna see him? He should be back now, and
I think he might wanna thank you for today.
jpnChrName: そろそろ戻ってる頃だし会っていく？ 今日のお礼も出してくれると思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ戻ってる頃だし会っていく？
今日のお礼も出してくれると思うけど。

engChrName: I'm good, thanks.
engSearchText: I'm good, thanks.
jpnChrName: いや、結構だ。
jpnSearchText: いや、結構だ。

engChrName: That's kinda like askin' me to walk into a minefield, no offense.
engSearchText:
That's kinda like askin' me to walk into a minefield,
no offense.
jpnChrName: あんまり厄介な連中と 密な付き合いをするもんじゃないしな。
jpnSearchText:
あんまり厄介な連中と
密な付き合いをするもんじゃないしな。

engChrName: Hey, come on! Don't antagonize us like that!
engSearchText: Hey, come on! Don't antagonize us like that!
jpnChrName: もう、だから厄介とか言わないでよ～！
jpnSearchText: もう、だから厄介とか言わないでよ～！

engChrName: Ashen eventually got Van to reconsider—read: comply—and exchange pleasantries with her father.
engSearchText:
Ashen eventually got Van to reconsider—read:
comply—and exchange pleasantries with her father.
jpnChrName: そのままアシェンに引っ張られるまま 結局ファンと挨拶を交わし……
jpnSearchText:
そのままアシェンに引っ張られるまま
結局ファンと挨拶を交わし……

engChrName: Despite being worn out from the encounter, Van met up with the rest of the gang and went right back to work.
engSearchText:
Despite being worn out from the encounter, Van met
up with the rest of the gang and went right back
to work.
jpnChrName: どっと疲れを感じながらも仲間と合流し、 裏解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
どっと疲れを感じながらも仲間と合流し、
裏解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Erry one'a them gubmint suits 'round these parts think they're sooo... *hic!* They're just SUMP'N ELSE, huh?!
engSearchText:
Erry one'a them gubmint suits 'round these parts
think they're sooo... *hic!* They're just SUMP'N
ELSE, huh?!
jpnChrName: ヒック…… この国の役人共は高慢ちきだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ヒック……
この国の役人共は高慢ちきだよなぁ。

engChrName: Weee run the country, they say! Buncha BS, is whaddit is.
engSearchText:
Weee run the country, they say! Buncha BS, is
whaddit is.
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつも自分たちが、 国を回してると思いやがってよお……！
jpnSearchText:
どいつもこいつも自分たちが、
国を回してると思いやがってよお……！

engChrName: You're right, yes—though I'd say that applies to more than just government.
engSearchText:
You're right, yes—though I'd say that applies to more
than just government.
jpnChrName: ふむ……それもまた世の常だと思うが。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……それもまた世の常だと思うが。

engChrName: The hierarchy breeds haves and have-nots—and this zeitgeist of noblesse oblige instills some sense of duty among the upper class...
engSearchText:
The hierarchy breeds haves and have-nots—and this
zeitgeist of noblesse oblige instills some sense of duty
among the upper class...
jpnChrName: 持つ者が持たざる者を助ける“喜捨（ザカート）”、 あるいは“貴族の義務（ノブレスオブリージュ）”の精神自体は──
jpnSearchText:
持つ者が持たざる者を助ける“喜捨（ザカート）”、
あるいは“貴族の義務（ノブレスオブリージュ）”の精神自体は──

engChrName: Wuzzat? Loogit Fancy Pants here, toggin' like he knows errything.
engSearchText:
Wuzzat? Loogit Fancy Pants here, toggin' like he
knows errything.
jpnChrName: ああん？　何だい兄ちゃん、 分かったような物言いじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ああん？　何だい兄ちゃん、
分かったような物言いじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Why don'tcha go back to loogin' down on us peasants from yer penthouse or— *hic!*
engSearchText:
Why don'tcha go back to loogin' down on us peasants
from yer penthouse or— *hic!*
jpnChrName: 綺麗な服着ちゃってさぁ、 オレたちを見下してんのかぁ？
jpnSearchText:
綺麗な服着ちゃってさぁ、
オレたちを見下してんのかぁ？

engChrName: He's harmless, man. Give him a break.
engSearchText: He's harmless, man. Give him a break.
jpnChrName: まーまー、おっちゃん。 こっちの兄さんも悪気はないからさ。
jpnSearchText:
まーまー、おっちゃん。
こっちの兄さんも悪気はないからさ。

engChrName: I'll treat you to a round if you look the other way for me.
engSearchText:
I'll treat you to a round if you look the other way
for me.
jpnChrName: お詫びに一杯奢るから勘弁してくれよ。
jpnSearchText: お詫びに一杯奢るから勘弁してくれよ。

engChrName: Nooow! Now THERE'S a guy who knows what's up!
engSearchText: Nooow! Now THERE'S a guy who knows what's up!
jpnChrName: おっ、話が分かるねえ！
jpnSearchText: おっ、話が分かるねえ！

engChrName: (Well, this isn't going as smoothly as I'd hoped.)
engSearchText: (Well, this isn't going as smoothly as I'd hoped.)
jpnChrName: （なかなか上手くはいかないな……）
jpnSearchText: （なかなか上手くはいかないな……）

engChrName: Van and Sherid toured some more entertainment venues before heading for the bathhouse to wash off all the sweat and second-hand booze.
engSearchText:
Van and Sherid toured some more entertainment
venues before heading for the bathhouse to wash off
all the sweat and second-hand booze.
jpnChrName: その後もいくつか盛り場を巡った後、 最後に旧市街の公衆浴場で汗を流すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
その後もいくつか盛り場を巡った後、
最後に旧市街の公衆浴場で汗を流すことにした。
